1b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI pa ra mA di nA ma ma hA yA na ka la ba rA dza/ bod skad du/
1b2(rgyud 'bum): dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes
1b3(rgyud 'bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
2a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis rlabs dang /
2a2(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig dang / mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
2a3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi rin po che thams cad kyi cod pan gyis khams gsum du dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/ de bzhin
2a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang
2b1(rgyud 'bum): phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa sna tshogs kyi bya ba mdzad de/
2b2(rgyud 'bum): sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba'i 'phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs
2b3(rgyud 'bum): rje che ba/ rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa/ dus gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
2b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs shing bsngags pa/ bstod pa/ nor bu chen po dang rin po ches
2b5(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ kha dog sna tshogs pa'i dril bu btags pa/ dar gyi ba dan dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / dra ba dang /
3a1(rgyud 'bum): dra ba phyed pa dang / zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyi gzhan
3a2(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub
3a3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub
3a4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur dang / byang chub sems dpa'
3a5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / byang
3a6(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'jom
3b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag brgyad dang thabs cig ste/ yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ thog mar dge ba
3b2(rgyud 'bum): bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par
3b3(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di yang dag par ston te/ 'di ltar rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so//
3b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags kyi mda' rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// reg pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so//
3b5(rgyud 'bum): sdug pa'i 'ching ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// thams cad la dbang phyug dang dbang rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang
3b6(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ / lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
3b7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i gnas so/ / sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// bsnyems pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
4a1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i gnas so/ / rgyan rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// yid tshim par byed pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni//
4a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di lha ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lus bde ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta
4a3(rgyud 'bum): ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
4a4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i gnas so/ / dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so//
4a5(rgyud 'bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// badz+ra hUM/ lag na/
4a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje su la las chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i gnas sgrub pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan cig thos na'ang / de byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad
4a7(rgyud 'bum): dang chod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa chen po bsags kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song rnams su rnams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ro//
4b1(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa'ang byang ma thag tu sdug bsngal med par byang bar 'gyur ro// su zhig 'dzin pa 'am/ nyin re zhing klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de tshe 'di nyid la chos thams cad
4b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob pas chos thams cad la dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ / chos thams cad la dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub
4b3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
4b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad pa/ rdo rje dbyings mtha' dag gi sems dpa'i mchog/ khams gsum po mtha' dag na 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa las rnam par
4b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa 'dul bar spyod pa/ don thams cad grub pa/ lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa thams cad pa/ dam tshig chen po pa/ rdo rje gsang ba'i
4b6(rgyud 'bum): sems can chen po du mas g.yog byas pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi don 'di ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings te/ thog ma'i rdo rje chen po gsor nas
4b7(rgyud 'bum): rang gi snying khar gtod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di smras so/ / hUM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs
5a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bcas pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khams gsum thams cad nas rjes su mnyes par byas te bkug nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par
5a2(rgyud 'bum): snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug ste/ dam tshig gis bcings nas dbang du byas te dngos grub thams cad grub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bde ba chen po'i snyam
5a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas bzhugs so/ / de nas phyag na rdo rje gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig
5a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya bzhi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid rdo rje dbyings kyis byin gyis brlabs pa chen po zhes bya ba'i
5a5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// de nyid dang po dam tshig che// rdo rje byin rlabs zhes bya'o// gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang //
5a6(rgyud 'bum): khyams rnams kyis ni yongs bskor ba// rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan// 'od zer 'bar rab 'khrigs pa'i 'od// dkyil 'khor gyi ni grwa rnams dang // sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su//
5a7(rgyud 'bum): zla ba phyed la rab gnas pa'i// rin chen kun gyis nye bar mdzes// rtse mo sna tshogs pa dan ni// dril bu mchog btags rlung gis bskyod// me tog chun 'phyang mo long spras// phyi yi dkyil
5b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bri bar bya/ / de yi nang du 'khor lo ni// dkyil 'khor brgyad dang mnyam pa ru// rdo rje thig gis thig gdab pa// rdo rje 'khor lo zhes byar bshad// de yi dbus su cig rigs
5b2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ sangs rgyas sgyu ni gzhag bya ste// 'dzum bcas zla ba'i mdog can la// rdo rje bsnyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rdo rje 'phreng sogs kyis spras shing // sna tshogs 'bar ba 'khrigs
5b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'od/ / pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par ni// lugs ma'am mngon par 'dus byas pa'o// rang gi snying po kun bzlas te// de tshe dkyil 'khor rtag par bya// rdo rje sems sogs sems
5b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rnams/ / snying po nyid kyis yang dag dgod// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag bsdus// gzhag gam yang na bri bar bya// phyogs rnams
5b5(rgyud 'bum): kun tu ston pa'o/ / mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbu rgyan can// rdo rje mtshon ni gsor bar brtson// dmar skya dag tu nges par dgod// sangs rgyas kyi ni g.yas
5b6(rgyud 'bum): logs su/ / rdo rje kI lI kA la ni// yan lag kun gyis yongs 'khyud pa// rdo rje can gzugs nyi ma'i 'od// rgyab tu rdo rje 'dod pa ni// chu srin gyi ni rgyal mtshan thogs// sngo skya'i mdog can
5b7(rgyud 'bum): ci rigs par/ / blo dang ldan pas gzhag par bya// g.yon du rdo rje bsnyems pa ni// bsnyems pa'i rdo rje gnyis kyis ni// rdo rje bsnyems pa gnyis 'dzin pa// btso ma'i gser dang 'dra ba
6a1(rgyud 'bum): dgod/ / sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshams rnams su// me tog la sogs kyis mtshan cing // thal mo spyi bor legs 'jog pa'i// mchod pa chen po gzhag par bya// phyi yi
6a2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su/ / lha mo'i tshogs rnams dgod par bya// sgo yi dbus ni thams cad du// gzugs mtshan la sogs bsdus pa dgod// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
6a3(rgyud 'bum): can brgyad ni/ / rdo rje 'dzin sogs bri bar bya// rdo rje 'khor lo thams cad du// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin gyis bskor// phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug
6a4(rgyud 'bum): bri bya ste/ / mdun du 'jig rten gsum rgyal lo// 'dod pa tshangs pa zhi byed mchog/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par 'byung ste/ de la dang po nyid
6a5(rgyud 'bum): du ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga 'dis zhugs pa'i slob dpon ni rdo rje chen po'i slob dpon dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon dang / dam tshig thams cad shes pa dang / chos thams cad
6a6(rgyud 'bum): rig pa dang / las thams cad sgrub pa dang / dngos grub thams cad grub pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa dang / thams
6a7(rgyud 'bum): cad shes pa dang ldan pa dang / mchod pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di'i dbang du 'gyur ba dang / 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'di'i
6b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya thams cad kyang rang nyid kyis bcings pas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / dam tshig thams cad kyi lam la nyes pa dang bcas kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing byin gyis brlabs par rtog par
6b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / ma brlabs par yang thams cad shes par 'gyur ro// mchod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// mdor bsdus na tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub kyi mchog ji ltar
6b3(rgyud 'bum): mngon par 'dod pa de lta bur sangs rgyas nyid dam/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'di'i snying la bzhugs shing
6b4(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa'i phyir bkug cing dam tshig gis bcings la dbang du byas te rjes su mnyes pas bdag nyid slob dpon du gyur nas 'jug cing bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de nas rdo rje'i phyag
6b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya bcings la dang po'i rdo rje'i lha bas bltas te/ snying po lan cig brjod nas/ dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub par bya'o// de nas rdo rje rnam par sgeg pa'i phyag rgyas bzlas brjod lan cig byas la/
6b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag byas nas gos dmar po gyon la me tog gi 'phreng ba thogs te gdong dris byugs pa dang / rdo rje thal mos rdo rje'i gar byed cing bskor bas snying khar me tog thogs te bdag nyid 'jug par bya'o//
6b7(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas kyang rnam par sgeg pa dang / bskor bas gdud cing snying po'ang bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas bltas te/ de bzhin du 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das
7a1(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag nyid dgyes pas mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur zhing smin ma bskyod la sku thams cad dam yan lag rnams bskyod cing
7a2(rgyud 'bum): kha dog dmar por 'gyur ro/ / 'od zer gyi rang bzhin gyi zhal lam sku thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// ro 'phrul dpag tu med pa'ang ston par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid mthong
7a3(rgyud 'bum): bstsol lam dngos grub mchog kyang stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas brtsams te nyin re zhing dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang du zhugs pa tsam nyid kyis mi tshugs pa mi song bar 'gyur
7a4(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / ye shes thams cad dang / bya ba thams cad bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sgrub par mdzad do// de nas de yang dag par
7a5(rgyud 'bum): mchod de rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur zhing dpa' bo'i rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la mnos la/ snying po bzlas nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba stsal nas rang nyid kyis stsol ces brjod la rang gis blang bar
7a6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de nas skad cig de nyid la dngos grub mchog yid la 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang na bdag nyid kyis zla ba drug gis yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan
7a7(rgyud 'bum): 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ / de nas ming gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'ang de bzhin no// de nas byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas yang ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho gas bsgrubs la 'byung
7b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i gsang ba sgrub pa lan cig bya'o/ / de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ de la dang por rdo rje slob dpon gyis dang po'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la 'jug
7b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / zhugs nas de bzhin du phyag byas la snying pos ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i tshig dang bcom ldan 'das bsgrub pas phyag rgya chen pos bsgrub par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das bsgrubs
7b3(rgyud 'bum): pas mtshan ma de nyid 'byung ste/ shes nas phyag rgya chen po nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur te/ zhugs pa 'dis ni rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid de bzhin du
7b4(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de nas de bzhin du rdo rje blang ba la sogs pa byas nas rdo rje slob ma la cho ga rgyas pa 'di bzhin du byas te phyag rgya bcing ba'ang bslab par bya'o// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa
7b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la sogs pa'i dam tshig la mos pa de rnams la'ang rang gi lhag pa'i lha yi 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / / de bzhin du yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//
7b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas lha gzhan dag la dad pa rnams la de bzhin du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas ji ltar zhugs pa rnams zas dang / ro bcud dang / gnas
7b7(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par tshim par byas la/ ji ltar shes pa'i gar dang / glu dang / dgod pa dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / gnyen
8a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshams dang bcas pas kyang mchod par bya'o/ / de la 'dir ni snod dang snod ma yin pa brtag par mi bya ste/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams bde ba chen
8a2(rgyud 'bum): po rdo rje dam tshig 'di dang / 'dod pa'i bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rdo rje'i sbyor bas rdo rje chos kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa yin pa'i phyir ro// dkyil 'khor chen po'o//
8a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas cho ga 'byung ste/ zla ba nya nas brtsams nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la/ ji ltar skyo bar ma gyur par dang por byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas
8a4(rgyud 'bum): la rdo rje tshig gis brjod cing ji srid zla ba gcig gi bar de srid du bzlas brjod byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / de nas brtsams nas phyag na rdo rje'i bka' ji lta ba bzhin du dngos grub tham
8a5(rgyud 'bum): cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de nas ras ris 'dri ba'am 'drir gzhug par 'dod na/ dang por rdo rje bri ba'i phyag rgyas bris la/ de'i 'og tu ni tso bder bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad du'ang
8a6(rgyud 'bum): de nyid kyis dang por brtsam par bya ste/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bri zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis sems dpa' chen po brgyad bri bar bya'o// de nas zla ba nya nas brtsams
8a7(rgyud 'bum): te phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ de bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa'i tshul lhar bzlas na zla ba nye ba'i mtshan mo thog thag ji lta ba bzhin du skyo bar ma gyur pas phyag rgya ma bkrol bar bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas
8b1(rgyud 'bum): nang par bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum zhing zla ba dang mnyam pa'i mdangs can mthong ba stsol cing sangs rgyas nyid dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub mchog rnams stsol bar
8b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / cho ga gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang / phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
8b3(rgyud 'bum): dang rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad bri bar bya'o/ / de nas de bzhin du bsgrubs pas sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa dngos grub thams cad 'grub bo// ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje bsnyems
8b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang bcas par bris la/ de'i spyan sngar dang po'i phyag rgya chen pos gnas nas bzlas brjod 'bum byas te/ 'bum rdzogs na phyag na rdo rje nyid thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
8b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dpa' bo gcig pa bris nas yang mthar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub pa'i las rnams dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ba ni//
8b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la ni 'dod chags la sogs pa bde ba thams cad phul bas so// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po mnyes par bya ba la ni rdo rje sems
8b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' dang 'khyud cing 'o byed pas so/ / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la ni dpag tu med pa'i bzlas pas so// rdo rje thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba ni rang gi snying po
9a1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pas so/ / gzhan srung ba lnga la sogs pa sems can thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni thams cad du 'bum bzlas pas so// bdag srung ba la ni yungs kar
9a2(rgyud 'bum): la lan cig bzlas pas so/ / gzhan srung ba la ni rdo rje bskor bas so// thams cad srung ba la ni yid kyis lan cig go// mtshams dang / phyogs dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad bcing ba la ni
9a3(rgyud 'bum): lta ba'am yungs kar la sogs pas so/ / sems can thams cad rengs par bya ba la ni dbugs mi 'byin par bzlas pas so// sems can thams cad rmugs par bya ba la ni rdo rje 'tshor bas so// sems
9a4(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad rmongs par bya ba la ni mig btsum nas bzlas pas so/ / thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje dral bas so// sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgyas so//
9a5(rgyud 'bum): snying thams cad 'dren cing 'byin pa la ni yid kyis bzlas pas so// sems can thams cad za ba la ni ldang zhing myur bar zlog pas so// thams cad bsreg par bya ba la ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi phyag
9a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas so/ / nor thams cad dgug pa la ni gser gyi bzlas pas so// nor dang 'bru thams cad dgug pa la ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni pi wang
9a7(rgyud 'bum): rdung ba dang bcas pa'i ka ka la'i glu len pas bzlas brjod bya'o/ / thams cad 'bigs pa dang rjes su chags par bya ba la ni rdo rje mda'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad chags par bya ba la ni phyogs thams
9b1(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes pas so/ / sdug pa'i 'ching ba brtan par bya ba la ni snying brtan pos nges par 'chir bas so// ma rungs pa rab tu sgrub pa la ni rdo rje spen pas so// rgyan thams cad
9b2(rgyud 'bum): dbrog pa la ni 'bar ba'i lta bas dbrog pas so/ / thams cad yid tshim pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur snying khar bzhag pas so// mun pa snang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje kha shar du bltas te bskor bas so// lus bde
9b3(rgyud 'bum): pabar bya ba la ni rang gi mtshan gyi bzlas pas so/ / gzugs thams cad snang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gzugs kyi mchog gi phyag rgyas so// sgra thams cad thos par bya ba la ni rdo rje pi wang gis so// dri zhim
9b4(rgyud 'bum): po sna tshogs pa'i phyir ni sna'i dbugs 'byin pa'i glu yis so/ / zas dang / skom thams cad dang / bcud thams cad spo ba la ni rdo rjes spo bar bya'o// dbab pa thams cad la ni mnyam pa'i thal mo
9b5(rgyud 'bum): dang se gol dang / glu'i bzlas pas so// thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa la ni bdag nyid gar byed cing bzlas pas so// thams cad glu len du gzhug pa la ni lce bskyod cing bzlas so//
9b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad sbyar gzhug pa la ni rdo rje mchu yis so// thams cad babs nas lan ston pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs pas so// gdon thams cad las thar par bya ba la ni rdo rje myu gu'i phyag rgyas so// gdon
9b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'dzin du gzhug pa la ni tshogs kyi bdag po rab tu dga' ba'i khro bos bzlas pas so/ / rims thams cad 'dzin du gzhug pa la ni rdo rje'i rims kyi gdon gyis so// rims thams cad
10a1(rgyud 'bum): bsal ba la ni rdo rje'i lhubs bsal bas so/ / dug thams cad sbar ba la ni rdo rje lta bu'i dug gis so// dug thams cad gzhig pa la ni rma bya'i chun pos so// dug thams
10a2(rgyud 'bum): cad bza' ba la ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i phyag rgyas so/ / bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad brlag pa la ni 'khrugs pas dpag tu med par bzlas pas so// mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon thams cad
10a3(rgyud 'bum): las grol bar bya ba la ni rdo rje chen po gsor ba'i phyag rgyas so/ / phyag rgya thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'phen pas so// mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / gdul
10a4(rgyud 'bum): ba la ni rdo rje kha T+wAM ga'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas so/ / ma mo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa dang / gsang ba gzhig
10a5(rgyud 'bum): pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i yi gI phaT kyis so/ / ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad mngag gzhug par bya ba la ni ma mo'i gnas su khros pas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o// bdud thams cad kyi stob
10a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhom pa la ni rdo rje drag po'i ha ha zhes bya ba'i gad rgyangs kyis so/ / gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa la ni rdo rje la yongs su bzlas la 'phang ngo // 'thab pa thams cad las thar par bya ba
10a7(rgyud 'bum): la ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgyas so/ / thams cad bcing ba la ni gos la mdud pa bya'o// thams cad grol ba la ni yi ge mu yis so// ro langs dang 'khrul 'khor thams cad gzhig
10b1(rgyud 'bum): pa la ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis so/ / lcags sgrog thams cad dgrol ba la ni rdo rje khab long gis so// me yang dag par bskyed pa la ni rdo rje me shel gyis so// chu med par chu yang dag par bskyed
10b2(rgyud 'bum): pa la ni rdo rje chu shel gyis so/ / nam mkha' las zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / rgyan thams cad la sogs pa yo byad mang po 'byung ba la ni nam mkha' la lba zhing bzlas brjod 'bum
10b3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / nam mkha' la sangs rgyas kyi sku la sogs pa gzugs thams cad ston pa la ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran la nam mkhar lta zhing bzlas pas so// nam mkha' las yi ges 'das pa dang /
10b4(rgyud 'bum): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i lung bsgo ba bden par ston pa la ni yi ge a bris la bzlas brjod 'brum byas pas so// pra sa na thams cad las 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
10b5(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'i lung bsgo ba bden par ston pa la ni rdo rje pra se na thams cad dbab pas so/ / de bzhin du mig gis bden pa thams cad mthong ba la ni rang gi mig la bzlas pa 'bum byas pas so// rna bas
10b6(rgyud 'bum): thos par bya ba la ni rang gi rna ba la bzlas pa 'bum byas pas so/ / snas bsnam par bya ba la ni sna la bzlas pas so// lces rang nyid smra ba la ni lce la bzlas pas so// lus kyis reg par bya ba la
10b7(rgyud 'bum): ni lus la bzlas pas so/ / yid kyis shes par bya ba la ni yid la 'bum bzlas pas so// rmad du byung ba thams cad bstan pa la ni sangs rgyas kyi sku bsgrubs pas so// sgyu ma thams cad
11a1(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa la ni rma bya'i sgo'i chun po la 'bum bzlas so/ / thams cad g.yogs par bya ba la ni zhi ba'i gnas su 'bum bzlas pas so// thams cad la lan ldon par bya ba la
11a2(rgyud 'bum): ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi rdo rjes so/ / rdzu 'phrul thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi phyag rgyas so// cho 'phrul thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas so// rang gi lus la sog
11a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dngos po thams cad las sangs rgyas dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas so/ / lha thams cad dbab pa
11a4(rgyud 'bum): la ni rdo rje bskor bas so/ / klu thams cad rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la ni klu'i rgyal po'i mtshar bzlas brjod bya'o// gnod sbyin thams cad mngag gzhug par bya ba la ni rdo rje bka' bsgo bas so// 'byung
11a5(rgyud 'bum): po thams cad gdul ba la ni lha chen po mnan nas khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o/ / ser ba thams cad bzlog pa la ni rdo rje srid srung gi phyag gi phyag rgyas so// glog 'bab pa thams cad bzlog pa la ni rdo rje khro
11a6(rgyud 'bum): gnyer can gyi phyag rgyas so/ / char 'bab pa la ni klu'i mtshor bzlas brjod bya'o// char gcad pa la ni dri ma med pa'i chu'i sbyin lugs bya'o// sprin bskyed pa la ni klu bris nas bdug pas bdug par
11a7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / sprin bshig pa la ni rdo rje nam mkha'i spyan gyis so// chu med pa'i phyogs su shin tu bsil ba'i chu'i tshogs rtag tu 'byung ba la ni rdo rje klu'i phyag rgyas so// gter thams cad shes par bya
11b1(rgyud 'bum): bal ni snong du chu blugs par bya'o/ / gter thams cad brko ba la ni rdo rje 'jor gyis so// gter thams cad rnyed pa la ni rdo rje nor gyis so// rgyal srid thams cad thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje dbang bskur
11b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyag rgyas so/ / sa'i bdag por bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so// dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas so// phyag rgya thams cad sgrub
11b3(rgyud 'bum): pa la ni bde ba chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so/ / dam tshig thams cad sgrub pa la ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje bsnyems pa'i ljags kyu 'phyag
11b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas so/ / ma grub pa thams cad grub par ston pa la ni rdo rje grub pa'i phyag rgyas so// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas so// rdo rje thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje
11b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi mchog gi phyag rgyas so/ / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrub pa la ni thugs kyi rdo rjes so// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid sgrub pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos so// sangs rgyas nyid
11b6(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas so/ / bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po
11b7(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sgrub pa zhes bya
12a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gsungs te/ rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// don gcig pa nyid kyi
12a2(rgyud 'bum): phyir don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ / ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// thams
12a3(rgyud 'bum): cad la rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ / lag na rdo rje gang la la chos mngon par sgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa
12a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de sdig pa thams cad la spyod kyang byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du ngan song tha mas cad las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro// de nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas
12a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa'i don gyi gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin 'dzum pa dang bcas te chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po 'di gsungs so/ / aHde nas 'di
12a6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'dus par mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyogs thams cad du rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis zhugs
12a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / sems dpa' chen po brgyad phyi'i dkyil 'khor du phyogs brgyad du bzhad pa chen pos bzhad cing bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin
12b1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig chen po'i
12b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris la/ de'i dbus su thig gsum gyi 'khor lo bris nas/ bcom ldan 'das
12b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi thad kar sna tshogs pad+ma rab tu gnas pa'i de'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa chen po sa la sogs pa las byas pa gzhag go/ / de'i phyogs thams cad
12b4(rgyud 'bum): dus la sogs pa las byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad gzhag gam bri bar bya'o/ / de nas tshon gyis thig le rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
12b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ / phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi dang / mtshams rnams su byang chub sems dpa' brgyad ji lta ba bzhin gzhag nas bum pa gang ba bzhi sgo rnams su
12b6(rgyud 'bum): dgod par bya'o/ / byang chub kyi mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya ste/ shar nas brtsams te ne'u gsing sa dang bcas pa'i dum bu dang / ro drug gis yongs su gang zhing dbyig dang / gser dang /
12b7(rgyud 'bum): rin po che dang / gos la sogs pas yongs su bkang ba'i snod dang / 'jam zhing shin tu bde ba'i stan dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dgod do// de nas de bzhin du gos gyon la de bzhin gces
13a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings nas zhugs na/ bdag nyid slob dpon med par yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par
13a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de nas brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa dang / dngos grub thams cad la mi tshugs pa dang / mi sod pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur
13a3(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / de nas slob ma'ang de bzhin du gzhug go// zhugs nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa byin la rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba'ang sbyin par bya'o// de nas dam tshig 'di dag bya bar bsgo bar bya'o// sems can kun la
13a4(rgyud 'bum): phan phyir dang / bstan pa thams cad srung ba'i phyir// rnam par mi rtog sbyor ba yis// ci bde bar ni thams cad kyis// zhes bya'o// de nas mtshan ma bzhi 'byor pa ji lta bas skal ba ji lta ba bzhin
13a5(rgyud 'bum): du sbyin par bya'o/ / dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sgrub pa ni ras la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'bum pa dang bcas shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi
13a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin par bya'o/ / gzhan thams cad ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du byon/ de nas de bzhin du sems dpa' mchog sgrub pa dang / dngos grub mchog rnams
13a7(rgyud 'bum): kyang de bzhin no/ / gzhan yang ras la bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo gcig pu bris te/ 'di'i mdun du rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas mtshan/
13b1(rgyud 'bum): mo thog thag bzlas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'thob cing dngos grub thob pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur la/ de nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs pas kyang
13b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam nyid kyis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa la ni ji snyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba thams
13b3(rgyud 'bum): cad phul bas so/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa la ni bdag phul bas so// dkon mchog gsum mchod pa la ni me tog la sogs pa la bzlas pas so//
13b4(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad mchod pa la ni thams cad la byams pa'i bzlas pas so// chos thams cad bsdu ba la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bzhi po gdon pas so// bdud thams cad
13b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dul ba la ni brtan zhing nges pa'i bzlas pas so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rgyan thams cad dbul zhing rang nyid bcings pas so// chos nyid thams cad
13b6(rgyud 'bum): thob pa la ni rdo rje pad+ma la lta bas so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid dngos grub thob pa la ni rdo rje las kyi mchog gis so// sangs rgyas nyid rab tu thob pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi
13b7(rgyud 'bum): khu tshur gyi de kho na nyid kyi phyag rgya chen pos so/ / bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje dam chog
14a1(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so/ / de nas ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang yang chos thams cad
14a2(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par rgyal ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa 'di gsungs te/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do// zhe sdang gi
14a3(rgyud 'bum): spros pa med pa nyid kyis gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid do/ / gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab
14a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ / lag na rdo rje gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa des 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir khams
14a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
14a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos nyid 'di'i don rgya cher ston cing / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings la/ khro gnyer dang bcas
14a7(rgyud 'bum): shing smin ma bteg ste 'bar bar balha la pad+ma'i gdong khro zhing dgod de/ mche ba gtsags nas rkang pa g.yas pa bskum pa'i tshul du gnas pas gnas nas/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsu
14b1(rgyud 'bum): / hUM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams yang dag par bkug ste lhung bar mdzad nas dkyil
14b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor du bcug nas rnam par rgyal bar mdzad/ bcings te dbang du byas nas btul zhing rjes su btul te bslangs nas yang dam tshig gis bcings nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po chung
14b3(rgyud 'bum): ma dang bcas pa zhabs gnyis su phab nas mnan pa mdzad do/ / de nas de rnams kyis 'jig rten gsum po thams cad du sgra chen po bsgrags te/ kye rdo rje 'chang chen po yongs su skyob par mdzod cig/ bdag
14b4(rgyud 'bum): cag rnams ma gzir cig/ 'dir khyod la bdag cag skyabs su mchi'o// dam tshig dang bka' bsgo ba'ang bsgrub par bgyi'o// ma mo thams cad kyang btul zhing dam la btags nas dkyil 'khor
14b5(rgyud 'bum): yang rnam par bshig ste/ phyag rgya thams cad dang / dam tshig kyang dral zhing rnam par bshig pa dang / gdon thams cad kyang bzlog cing nad thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / gnod pa dang /
14b6(rgyud 'bum): dug dang / ngan 'gro rnams dral cing rnam par bshigs pas sgra chen po sgrogs shing 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i tshig rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyid la skyabs su song ngo // bcom ldan
14b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis kyang zhal rnam par bzhad pas de rnams dkyil 'khor du bcug ste/ dam tshig gis bcings nas rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur nas rang gi mtshan ma rnams rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs te rdo rje ming
15a1(rgyud 'bum): gis dbang bskur ba'ang rjes su stsal nas sems can ma lus pa'i don du phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs su rab tu gzhag go/ / de nas rdo rje khro bo'i rdo rje las phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i dngos po'i
15a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid can kha dog dang / rgyan dang / mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs pa bsnams pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i rdo rje'i mche ba gtsigs pa/ tshems kyis sgros gnon pa/ smin ma mi bzad cing khro gnyer bskor
15a3(rgyud 'bum): baHspyan dang / dbu skra dang / ag tsom 'bar ba/ zhal 'jigs pa/ rdo rje lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / mtshon cha mda' dang / dbyig pa dang / ral gri dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / gri rings
15a4(rgyud 'bum): dang chu gri phyag na bsnams pa/ khro bo chen po hUM mdzad las phyung ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs so// lha la sogs pa de rnams kyang rang
15a5(rgyud 'bum): gi dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis brlabs nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor du gzhag go/ gdon la sogs pa de dag kyang dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol na gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
15a6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyi khro bo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ khams gsum po mtha' dag las rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i
15a7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba// 'dul ba chen po 'dul byed pa'o// dkyil 'khor
15b1(rgyud 'bum): dang po'i sbyor ba yis/ / phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang gi 'khor lo ni// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa dag dang mtshungs// de yi dbus su khro bo che// phyag na rdo rje gzhag par bya// sangs
15b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas 'phreng la sogs pas spras/ / ut+pal sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba// zhal ni cung zad mche ba gtsigs// khros bcas bzhad pa'i zhal mnga' ba// g.yon brkyang ba yis legs bzhugs la/
15b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje hUM mdzad bsdus pa'o// g.yon gyi zhabs kyis legs mnan pa// de yi bya ba dbang phyug che// g.yas ni dka' thub bzlog pa yi// nu ma'i steng du rab tu 'jog/ 'bar 'phreng 'khrigs
15b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'od ldan pa/ / sa sogs bcas pa'i khams rnams kyi// khro bo kun tu gzhag par bya// 'bar 'phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa// 'khor lo de yang mkhas pa yis// 'bar 'phreng
15b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khrigs pa'i 'od can bri/ / phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams so// khro bo'i mtshan ma bzhi po ni// gzhu dang mda' dang ral gri dang // 'khor lo de bzhin
15b6(rgyud 'bum): rtse gsum sbreng / / sgo rnams kun tu bri bar bya// phyi rol gnas pa'i gdon rnams kyi// sna tshogs gtor mas bkang ba dang // ba dan sngon po dril btags shing // rtse mo kha dog sna tshogs
15b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / de nas 'dir 'jug pa la ni yan lag thams cad ras sngon po zung gis g.yogs shing khros pas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang bcas par 'dzin par gyur pas zhugs na/ bcom ldan
16a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis rdo rje rigs kyi slob dpon du byin gyis rlob par mdzad do/ / de nas brtsams te sdig pa las rnam par grol zhing mi sod pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang / mu stegs thams
16a2(rgyud 'bum): cad la tshar gcod pa dang / phan 'dogs nus shing thams cad las rgyal ba dang / dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas slob ma de bzhin du bcug la snying po byin te dkyil 'khor
16a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du'ang bya'o/ / de nas rdo rje rnon po rtse bzhi pa 'bar ba byin la rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas/ rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin par bya// 'di ni gdug pa 'dul byed pa'i// phyag
16a4(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rje rdo rje ste/ / ma rungs thams cad 'dul ba la// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // de nas de bzhin du bya'o// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sgrub pa nI ras la bcom ldan 'das khro ba'i
16a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug byas la/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi tsho gas kyang sems dpa' chen po thams cad bya'o// phyogs thams cad du ni lha la sogs pa dang ma mo rnams bri bar bya ste/ de nas sgrub pa chen
16a6(rgyud 'bum): po la'ang de bzhin te/ de bzhin du dngos grub mchog rnams la ni ras la bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas/ de'i mdun du lag pa gnyis kyis phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o//
16a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas yi ge hUM tsam gyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad dang / de bzhin du thams cad rjes su chags
16b1(rgyud 'bum): par yang bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dgrol ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / lkugs par bya ba dang / rengs par bya ba dang / rmongs par bya ba dang / gnyid med
16b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / lhung ba dang / brdeg pa dang / gsad pa dang / gso bar bya ba la sogs pa'ang lan cig bzlas pas byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje
16b3(rgyud 'bum): khro bo mthar byed kyis so/ / thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni khro bo'i lta ba'i bzlas pas so// thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje khros pas gzhig par bya'o// thams cad dnges par gnon pa la ni rdo rje
16b4(rgyud 'bum): dang khros pas phyogs der brdeg par bya'o/ / gdon thams cad dbug pa la ni rdo rje phra mo 'bigs byed kyis so// thams cad kyi snying 'byin pa la ni khros pa'i yid kyis dbyung bar bya'o// gdug pa
16b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad tshar gcad pa la ni khros pas rdo rje bskor bar bya'o/ / gdug cing khros pa dag pa la ni khros pas lcags phye'i sbyin sreg gis so// bdud thams cad brlag pa la ni rang gi sa bon gyi sbyin sreg
16b6(rgyud 'bum): gis so/ / gnod sbyin thams cad bskrad pa la ni ha ha zhes dgod cing bzlas pas so// klu thams cad gdon pa la ni rdo rje sa la rdeb cing bzlas pas so// lha rnams lhung bar bya ba la ni lha mo rdo rje lhung byed
16b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis so/ / lha'i bdag po thams cad dbang du bya ba dang / 'dul ba dang / bsnun pa dang / gsod pa dang / dul bar bya ba la ni rdo rje srid pa gsum po gdul bar byed pas so// rnam thos sras
17a1(rgyud 'bum): rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la ni rnam thos sras mnan nas khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o/ / lus ngan po mnan nas dpal dbrog pa la ni rdo rje skyes bus so// 'dod pa'i lha dbang du
17a2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba la ni 'dod pa'i lha'i mdun du khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o/ / tshangs pa lhung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgyas so// khyab 'jug gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo dral bas so// dbang
17a3(rgyud 'bum): phyug chen po gdul ba la ni rdo rje tri shU la dral bas so/ / ma mo thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs kyi srin mos so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang / dam tshig dang / chos dang /
17a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i dngos grub rnam par gtor zhing rnam par 'jig pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gdug pa'i dam tshig 'jigs par byed pas so// ri dang / shing dang / khyim dang / gtsug lag khang dang / grong khyer
17a5(rgyud 'bum): dang mchod rten dang / lha'i khang pa dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / glang po dang bcas pa'i rta la sogs pa thams cad gzhom pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas mig la reg pas so// lhung ba thams cad
17a6(rgyud 'bum): bslang ba la ni rdo rje khro bo bsnang bas so/ / thams cad spong ba la ni rdo rje khros pa'i rnal 'byor mas so// thams cad dbrog pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur dang dbrog pas so// 'jigs pa thams cad bskye
17a7(rgyud 'bum): pab la ni rdo rje khro bo'i ltabs so/ / dpung thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gnod sbyin mos so// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa dang / gnon pa dang / rmongs par bya ba dang / long bar bya
17b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / gsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo ma rungs pa'i srin mos so// rgyal po la sogs pa mi chen po thams cad gsad pa la ni dong ka'i shing la rang gi khrag gis sbyin sreg byas pas so//
17b2(rgyud 'bum): lha thams cad gzhig pa la ni thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan phur bus btab pas so// lha'i bdag po thams cad sreg pa la ni lha thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi yam shing gis so// rang gi khrag
17b3(rgyud 'bum): gi rgyun 'bab pas sa thams cad nub par bya ba la ni rdo rje khro bo sa 'og gi phyag rgyas so/ / khams gsum thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas so// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las
17b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par rgyal ba la ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog gi rdo rje'i khro bos so/ / khams gsum thams cad dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / nges
17b5(rgyud 'bum): par gnon pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo'i phyag rgyas so/ / khams gsum po thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang /
17b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang du bya ba dang / gnon par bya ba dang / sgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dam tshig gi khro bos so// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ khams gsum
17b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid dag pa'i chos nyid thob pas yang chos thams
18a1(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs te/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam
18a2(rgyud 'bum): par dag pa nyid kyis kyang 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ / dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid kyis 'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//
18a3(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// shes pa thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam
18a4(rgyud 'bum): par dag par 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de 'dod chags dang dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug
18a5(rgyud 'bum): kyang pad+mo lta bur 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams dang / dri ma rnams dang / glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
18a6(rgyud 'bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don gyi gnas 'di nyid yang rgya chen por ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum dbul
18a7(rgyud 'bum): te/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri mas mi gos pa la lta zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi phyir pad+ma'i gzugs sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// hrIHde nas
18b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis pad+ma chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba'i pad+mas mtshan ma'i gzugs can nges pa byung nas/ bcom
18b2(rgyud 'bum): 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rim pa dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos thams cad la gzigs
18b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so//
18b4(rgyud 'bum): phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba'i nang du gnyis pa ni zur bzhi pa las de bzhin du sgo dang mtshamasu bcas pa bri'o// de nas dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul du thig bzhi thig btab pa la tshon dmar
18b5(rgyud 'bum): pos pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri bar bya'o/ / de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das dgod par bya'o// de'i mdun du bcom ldan 'das pad+ma chen po chags pa sku mdog dmar po pad+ma'i gzugs
18b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa/ pad+ma chen po dang / mda' dang / gzhu bsnams pa/ g.yas su bcom ldan 'das pad+ma chen po'i gtum po dbang phyug dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o/
18b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyab tu pad+ma chen po khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'dzin pa sku mdog nag po gzhag par bya'o// g.yon du pad+ma chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa sku mdog dkar po gzhag par
19a1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / g.yas kyi mtshams su pad+ma chen pos 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// mtshams gnyis par pad+ma chen po rgyu mtsho chu lha'i gzugs 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// gsum
19a2(rgyud 'bum): par pad+ma chen po nyi ma'i gzugs can gzhag par bya'o/ / bzhi par pad+ma chen po rlung gi gzugs 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su/ shrI hI gI d+hI lha mo
19a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi gzhag par bya ste/ thams cad kyang g.yas na rang gi mtshan ma 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa pad+ma 'dzin par bya ste/ sgo rnams su ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / mya ngan
19a4(rgyud 'bum): las 'das pa'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ bud med kyi gzugs dang / sbrul gyi gzugs dang / phag gi gzugs dang / pad+ma'i gzugs bya'o// de nas gos dkar po
19a5(rgyud 'bum): bgos te/ gos dkar pos gdong g.yogs la pad+ma chen po'i phyag rgya chen po me tog dang bcas par bcings te zhugs la me tog dor bar bya ste/ gang du babs pa de des bsgrub par bya'o//
19a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas pad+ma blangs la pad+ma'i ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la 'di skad ces brjod par bya zhing pad+ma'i 'dab ma la blta bar bya ste/ ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di// tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos
19a7(rgyud 'bum): te/ dam gyi nang na dag pa ltar// 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs de bzhin// de ltar chos rnams bsgoms na ni// blo ldan nyon mongs bcas gyur kyang // nyon mongs kun las rnam grol nas//
19b1(rgyud 'bum): myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug nyid thob par 'gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan
19b2(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang phyug ces mtshan btags so/ / de nas brtsams te bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad shin tu yongs su dag pa dang / so shing dngos grub thams cad byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du
19b3(rgyud 'bum): rjes su myong bar 'gyur zhing myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par 'gyur te/ slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'ang de bzhin no// ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ro// sgrub pa la ni de zhin du ras kyi ri mo gnyis
19b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / de nas ma bsgrubs kyang thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni pad+ma la lan stong bzlas te sbyin par bya'o// thams cad gsad pa la ni
19b5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma chen po'i khro bo'i phyag rgyas so/ / thams cad rmongs par bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po phag gis so// nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po rnam par gzigs
19b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas so/ / sa thams cad kyi bdag por bya ba la ni sa la skyil mo krung bcas pas bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas mthar mtshan mo thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o// chu thams
19b7(rgyud 'bum): cad dbab pa la ni klu bris nas de'i steng du 'dug nas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o/ / thams cad snang bar bya ba la ni mun par nyi ma chen po'i 'od kyis so// rlung thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang /
20a1(rgyud 'bum): bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po rlung gi mchog gis so// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ nyon mong pa thams cad rnam
20a2(rgyud 'bum): par dag pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos yang de bzhin
20a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba las byung ba ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyi
20a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/ / nor sbyin pa ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos sbyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// zang zing sbyin pa ni lus
20a5(rgyud 'bum): dang ngag dang / sems kyi bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po bzhin rab tu 'dzum pa dang bcas te rang gi mgo la rdo rje
20a6(rgyud 'bum): rin po che sa dbang bskur ba'i 'phreng ba 'ching zhing don yod pa 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dam tshig rin po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// traM/ de nas 'di gsungs
20a7(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi rin po che de la thams cad dbang bskur ba la sogs pa yo byad dang gter thams cad byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis byang chub
20b1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i gzugs nyid kyis zhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi rin po che rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
20b2(rgyud 'bum): bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nor bu rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du byas pa'i
20b3(rgyud 'bum): nang du rin po che zur brgyad pa/ rin po che'i ka ba brgyad la gnas pa/ dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul las rin po che'i lcug mas yongs su bskor ba/ rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba cog dang
20b4(rgyud 'bum): me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / ba dan dang / gdugs dang / rnga yab kyis nye bar mdzes par bya'o// de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das rnga'i khri la bzhugs pa dbang bskur ba'i 'phreng ba rang
20b5(rgyud 'bum): nyid 'ching bar mdzad cing / zhal rnam par bzhad cing margad kyi mdog can gzhag par bya'o// de'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po
20b6(rgyud 'bum): che zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i cod pan 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o/ / g.yas su rin po che chen po'i nor sbyin pa dbyig gi gter 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// rgyab tu chos chen po'i rin po che'i
20b7(rgyud 'bum): glegs bam 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o/ / g.yon du rin po che chen po ro myang ba zas dang skom thams cad 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// mtshams rnams su mchod pa'i lha mo rnams rin po rnaH
21a1(rgyud 'bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / rnga dang / srog shing rnams 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// phyi rol gyi mtshams su bum pa gang ba rnams so// sgo rnams su dbang bskur
21a2(rgyud 'bum): ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya'o/ / phyi rol tu ni gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bla re rnams kyis kun tu khyab par bya'o// de nas de bzhin du rdo rje rin
21a3(rgyud 'bum): chen gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pas zhugs nas/ de nas brtsams te nor thams cad 'grub pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas zhugs nas kyang dbang bskur ba'i 'phreng
21a4(rgyud 'bum): ba bcings te rin po che blangs nas rin po che'i ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la sbyin pa thams cad phul nas slar dbyung bar bya'o/ / slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'ang de bzhin no// rdo rje
21a5(rgyud 'bum): rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ro/ / sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas ma bsgrubs par dbang bskur ba thams cad 'thob pa la ni rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i 'phreng bas
21a6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa la ni nyin re zhing nyi ma 'char kar bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa byas pas so// chos thams cad kyi don shes pa la ni dri ma med pa'i nam mkha'
21a7(rgyud 'bum): la blta zhing bzlas brjod bya'o/ / zas dang skom thams cad la sogs pa dang / ro thams cad thob par bya ba la ni nam mkha' las yid la 'dod pa bzhin du nyin re zhing bcom ldan 'das
21b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi bzlas brjod stong byas pas so/ / shin tu mthon po thob par bya ba la ni gdugs bzung nas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o// rnam par rgyal ba chen po thob pa la ni rin chen rgyal mtshan mchog
21b2(rgyud 'bum): gis so/ / grags pa dang snyan pa chen po mchog dang ming thob par bya ba la ni nyin re zhing kha thams cad du bltas nas bzlas pa bya'o// bdag po chen po thob pa la ni rin po che'i srog shing gi phyag
21b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas so/ / bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs
21b4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs
21b5(rgyud 'bum): pa rtag pas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa
21b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos thams cad
21b7(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i
22a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro// su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba'i tshul
22a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / sgom pa des dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / shes pa thams cad dang / dgos pa
22a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
22a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pas don gyi gnas 'di rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing
22a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sra zhing rdo rje sra ba'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ / a/ de nas 'di gsung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs
22a6(rgyud 'bum): p a sems can thams cad bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya thams cad kyis rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dngos grub mchog gi rgyus rgyas gdab
22a7(rgyud 'bum): bo/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyis yang sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje thams cad las phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya thams cad kyi dam tshig sems dpa' phyung nas kyang
22b1(rgyud 'bum): dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs par gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khu tshur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rdo rje zhes bya ba
22b2(rgyud 'bum): ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ phyag rgya thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang po'i sbyor bas bris la nang du rdo rje'i thig gis
22b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo bri'o/ / de bzhin du de'i dbus su dkyil 'khor brgyad par thig btab la/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur phyag gnyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa zhal rnam par bzhad pa gzhag
22b4(rgyud 'bum): go/ / de'i mdun du rdo rje sku'i mchog ces bya ba rdo rje bsnyems par 'dzin pa'o// g.yas su rdo rje ljags zhes bya ba rdo rje lce'i mchog 'dzin pa'o// rgyab tu ting nge 'dzin rdo rje zhes bya ba rdo rje
22b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa'o/ / g.yon du rdo rje rdo rje zhes bya ba bsnyems par 'dzin pa'o// shar lho'i mtshams su phyag rgya'i khu tshur zhes bya ba dang / gnyis pa la ni nor gyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dang /
22b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa la ni chos kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dang / bzhi pa la ni las kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dang / rang gi phyag rgya dang phyag mtshan yang 'dzin par bya'o// sgo rnams su ni rdo rje bsnyems ma la sogs
22b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams bri bar bya'o/ / de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya yongs su bzung la rang nyid zhugs nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi slob dpon du 'gyur ro// de nas brtsams te dngos grub thams cad
23a1(rgyud 'bum): don yod par 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dbang phyug tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myur bar mngon par rdzogs par
23a2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / der zhugs nas phyag rgya bcing ba bcom ldan 'das la bslab par bya zhing rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas bskur la 'di skad brjod par bya'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
23a3(rgyud 'bum): yi/ gzugs brnyan lta bur sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya kun zhes bya bar bsgrags// dam tshig dngos grub kun ster ba'o// slob ma gzhug pa'ang de bzhin no// phyag rgya thams cad kyi
23a4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor ro/ / sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i las rnams kyang de bzhin no// phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba sgrub pa la ni snying khar rdo rje'i khu tshur
23a5(rgyud 'bum): gyis so/ / phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje chen po'i khu tshur gyis so// dam tshig thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i khu tshur gyis so// sems can rjes su chags par bya ba la ni
23a6(rgyud 'bum): chags pa chen po'i khu tshur gyis so/ / thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje bzhad pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad bcing ba la ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad bsdam
23a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba la ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi khu tshur gyis so/ / thams cad lkugs par bya ba la ni rdo rje zhal zhal gyi khu tshur gyis so// thams cad btsir ba la ni rdo rje bsdam pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams
23b1(rgyud 'bum): cad gsang pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur gyis so/ / thams cad bza' ba la ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi khu tshur gyis so// thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje nges par 'tsher ba'i khu tshur gyis so//
23b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dral ba la ni rdo rje dral ba'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi khu tshur gyis so//
23b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad smrar gzhug pa la ni rdo rje brdung ba'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad rengs par bya ba la ni rdo rje dmigs pa'i khu tshur gyis so// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad lkugs pa dang / 'phye bar
23b4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba la ni rdo rje chen po'i phye ba'i khu tshur gyis so/ / phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba la ni rdo rje thar pa'i khu tshur gyis so// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa la ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi
23b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khu tshur gyis so/ / gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dbye ba la ni hUM mdzad kyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// phyag rgya thams cad rdo rjer
23b6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis so/ / thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni rdo rje ma mo'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad phye mar bya ba la ni rdo rje bzang po'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad rnam par gzhig
23b7(rgyud 'bum): pa la ni rdo rje gdug pa'i khu tshur gyis so/ / thams cad gzhig pa dang rnam par gzhom pa la ni dbang po'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// chu'i nang du gnas shing chags pa la ni rdo rje gnon po khu tshur
24a1(rgyud 'bum): gyis so/ / gzugs mang por ston pa la ni rdo rje sna tshogs pa rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis so// mi snang ba'i dngos grub la ni mi snang ba'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// rgyu ba dang mi rgyu
24a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dngos po rnams 'byung ba la ni rdo rje nam mkha'i khu tshur gyis so/ / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur gyis so// rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje
24a3(rgyud 'bum): ral gri'i khu tshur gyis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje las kyi khu tshur gyis so// thams cad mkhyen pa grub pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis so//
24a4(rgyud 'bum): nor thams cad kyi dngos grub la ni rdo rje nor gyi khu tshur gyis so// phyag rgya thams cad kyi bdag po nyid la ni rdo rje phyag rgya'i khu tshur gyis so// las thams cad kyi dngos grub la ni rdo rje thams cad kyi khu
24a5(rgyud 'bum): tshur gyis so/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad grub pa la ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i khu tshur gyis so// rang nyid 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dngos grub rnams ston pa la ni rdo rje lcags kyu
24a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi khu tshur gyis so/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la ni rdo rje bsnyems pa'i khu tshur gyis so// sangs rgyas nyid la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis so// bde ba chen
24a7(rgyud 'bum): bo'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ phyag rgya thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi dam tshig ces bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// de nas
24b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis
24b2(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad stong pa'o/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o// smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad smon pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
24b3(rgyud 'bum): pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa don 'di rgya cher ston zhing bzhin 'dzum bzhin du ral gri des de bzhin
24b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i mchog 'di gsungs so/ / a de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus
24b5(rgyud 'bum): pa mdzad nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs so/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pas spros pa med pa'i ral gri zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
24b6(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas/ 'khor lo lhar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba'i nang du 'khor lo bris la/ a la sogs pa'i yi ge'i 'phreng ba go rim bzhin
24b7(rgyud 'bum): du bri bar bya'o/ / de nas dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul gyis thig btab la/ de'i lte ba la bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i cha lugs 'chang zhing 'dzum pa dang bcas pa nam mkha'i mdog
25a1(rgyud 'bum): can phyag bzhi dang / ral gris de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs par gzhag par bya'o// de'i mdun la sogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams
25a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya'o/ / phyi'i mtshams rnams su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi lung ji ltar thob pa bzhin du gzhag par bya'o// sgo rnams su ni mtshan ma bzhi gzhag par bya'o// 'di lnga s+t+waM/ ral
25a3(rgyud 'bum): gri dang / mdung dang / lhung bzed dang / glegs bam rnams so// de nas ral gri dang / glegs bam gyi phyag rgya de bzhin du chos kyi slob dpon du byin gyis brlab bo// de nas ral gri blangs te ral
25a4(rgyud 'bum): gri'i ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la chos 'di bshad par bya ste/ ral gri 'di ni rtag zung la// shes rab tshul ni dkar smra zhing // nam mkha' sangs rgyas sbyor ba yis// 'debs na myur du
25a5(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas bstan pa srung phyir dang // sems can mang po srung ba'i phyir// 'dis bsad sdig par mi 'gyur zhing // bsod nams ngag kyang thob par 'gyur// slob ma rnam
25a6(rgyud 'bum): la'ang de bzhin te/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dngos grub rnams kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
25a7(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi dkyil 'khor ro// sgrub pa'ang de bzhin no// ma bsgrubs par yang de bzhin du las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa la ni thams cad nam mkha' bsgoms pas
25b1(rgyud 'bum): so/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa la ni mtshan ma dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas so// smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa la ni smon pa med pa bsgoms pas so// rang
25b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos kyi ye shes 'thob pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas so/ / nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa la ni chos bsgoms pas so// yi ge thams
25b3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes la ni spros pa med pa'i ye shes bsgoms pas so/ / gnas thams cad du yi ges chos kyi bya ba mthong ba la ni a la sogs pa'i yi ge'i ngo bo nyid bsgoms pas so// /
25b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub pa thob pa la ni rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgyas so// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ 'khor lo chen po lhar yi ge bskor ba'i
25b5(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i nang du 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas
25b6(rgyud 'bum): yang 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ / rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur
25b7(rgyud 'bum): don gyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor
26a1(rgyud 'bum): lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag
26a2(rgyud 'bum): tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chos nyid kyi don 'di rgya cher ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum nas/ rdo rje 'khor lo bskor zhing rdo rje 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras
26a3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / hUMHde nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po can khams gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs nas/
26a4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dam tshig sems dpa' rnams nges par byung nas dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
26a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khro bo 'khor lo thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad du 'jug pa'i
26a6(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig ces bya ba'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ / phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/ nang gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'khor lo bris la/ dbus su rdo rje'i 'khor lo
26a7(rgyud 'bum): bskor ba gzhag par bya'o/ / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rnam pa thams cad du dkyil 'khor dang po'i tshul du gzhag par bya'o// phyi'i mtshams rnams su rdo rje'i
26b1(rgyud 'bum): rags kyi dkyil 'khor bzhi bri bar bya'o/ / sgo rnams su mtshan ma bzhi gzhag par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sku dang / rdo rje khro bo'i sku dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi/
26b2(rgyud 'bum): sku dang / nam mkha'i snying po'i sku rnams so// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor thams cad du sangs rgyas nyid dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro//
26b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'khor lo blangs la 'khor lo'i ming gis dbang bskur ba ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi thig btab pa'i rigs rnams su 'jug par bya'o// slob ma gzhug pa'ang de bzhin rdo rje 'khor
26b4(rgyud 'bum): lo'i dkyil 'khor ro/ / sgrub pa'ang de bzhin no// ma bsgrubs par yang dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa la ni rdo rje 'khor los gter rang gi khar bcug la gzhag par bya'o// dkyil
26b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen por 'jug pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo chen pos so/ / de bzhin du phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas so// de bzhin du
26b6(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni dam tshig chen po'i 'khor los so/ / las kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni rdo rje thams cad kyi 'khor los so// de bzhin du rjes su chags
26b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / don thob pa dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / bcad pa dang / 'jug pa dang / mchod pa dang / gdug pa 'dul ba'i las rnams la ni sems dpa' chen po
27a1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad kyi phyag rgya g.yon na 'khor lo dang bcas pa rnams kyis so/ / bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ dkyil 'khor thams cad//
27a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa
27a3(rgyud 'bum): snod kyis mchod pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ / byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas
27a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
27a5(rgyud 'bum): cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / rjod pa dang / ston pa dang / nyan pa dang /
27a6(rgyud 'bum): sems pa dang / sgom pa dang / mchod pa byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod don de
27a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing las thams cad don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// oM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' thams cad las mchod
27b1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa nam mkha'i khams ma lus par spros par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i mdzod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bzhugs
27b2(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas par byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje'i mchod pa'i mchog don yod
27b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ / phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin du nang du rin po che'i ka ba brgyad byas la/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa/
27b4(rgyud 'bum): zhal 'dzum pa/ sku dang yan lag zla ba'i mdog la sogs pa'i kha dog lnga pa'i mdog can gzhag par bya'o// de'i phyogs thams cad du dam tshig sems dpa' rnams gzhag par bya'o// 'di lta
27b5(rgyud 'bum): g+he/ phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po/ byang chub kyi sems dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang bskur ba dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
27b6(rgyud 'bum): stong pa nyid smra ba dang / dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang / mchod pa thams cad dang / sems can rnams yongs su skyob pa ni bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa phyag na 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis ji lta ba bzhin
27b7(rgyud 'bum): du gzhag go/ / phyi'i mtshams rnams su ni me tog la sogs pa rnams dang / sgo rnams su ni dbyig dang / gser dang / mu tig dang / rin po che ste mtshan ma bzhi gzhag par bya'o// de nas
28a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du rdo rje thams cad kyis mchod pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / zhugs nas sna tshogs rdo rje blangs la/ sna tshogs rdo rje'i ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas
28a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa rnam pa bzhi bya ste/ 'di lha ste/ lus kyi las thams cad dang / phyag bya ba dang / ngag dang / yid dang / sems kyi chos kyi dbyings su spros pas mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyis
28a3(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bya zhing / rdo rje dang phyag rgyas mchod pa gcig tu byas pa'o// slob ma rnams kyi gzhug pa'i las kyang de bzhin no// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sgrub pa dang dngos grub dag kyang
28a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin no/ / de nas ma bsgrubs par yang byang chub kyi sems kyi mchod pa la ni rang gi snying khar rdo rje bsgoms pas so// ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa la ni thams cad dag par bsgoms pas so//
28a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ba'i mchod pa la ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba sna tshogs kyis so// phyag rgya'i mchod pa la ni rdo rje thams cad kyi sna tshogs kyis so// stong pa nyid kyi mchod pa la ni a la sogs pa'i yi ge
28a6(rgyud 'bum): lung bstan pas so/ / dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa la ni 'khor lo sna tshogs kyis so// mchod pa thams cad la ni sna tshogs rdo rjes so// gdug pa 'dul ba'i mchod pa la ni khro bos so// metog
28a7(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa dor ba la ni bzlas pas so/ / bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ sna tshogs rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen
28b1(rgyud 'bum): po rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdug pa thams cad 'dul nus pas yang ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa sems can thams cad
28b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dul ba ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid do// sems can thams cad dul
28b3(rgyud 'bum): ba nyid pas khro ba dul ba nyid do/ / sems can thams cad chos nyid pas khro ba chos nyid do// sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro ba rdo rje nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can
28b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub bo/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa don de nyid rgya cher ston te bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje
28b5(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyi rdo rje khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya ba snying po 'di smras so/ / ha/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i sems dpa' rnams bcom ldan 'das
28b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi thugs las byung ste dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs thams cad kyis 'dul ba khro bo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
28b7(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gdug pa thams cad 'dul zhing byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/ phyi yi
29a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ / de yi nang rim nyid du ni// dkyil 'khor bzang po gru bzhi pa// sgo bzhi pa la thig bzhir ldan// tshon sna lnga yis rnam par bri// ka ba brgyad ni mdun
29a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas par/ / 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan// de yi dbus su ci rigs par// rdo rje gnod sbyin gzhag bya ste// rdo rje mche ba gtsags pa dang // 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i
29a3(rgyud 'bum): 'od/ / 'jigs byed kha dog sngo ba dang // ha ha zhes bzhad gsal ba'i zhal// de yi kun tu gnod sbyin ni// shin tu 'jigs pa gzhag par bya// de nyid dang po la sogs mchog/ phyag na rdo rje
29a4(rgyud 'bum): sogs mtshan 'chang / / phyi yi dkyil 'khor mtshams su ni// mche ba'i phyag rgya bri bar bya// sgo yi gnas ni thams cad du// rdo rje'i mtshan ma gzhag par bya// de nas 'jug pa la sogs
29a5(rgyud 'bum): pa byung ste/ rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / ha ha zhes bzhad pa dang bcas pas zhugs nas gdug pa thams cad 'dul nus shing myur du rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// de nas zhugs
29a6(rgyud 'bum): nas rdo rje mche ba blang la rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur la rdo rjes rdo rje gnod sbyin nyid bsnun no/ / de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi zhal nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan
29a7(rgyud 'bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad srung ba po gnod sbyin gyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje gtum por bdag grub pa yin no zhes shes par bya'o/ / de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya zhing bsgrub
29b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / de nas mchod pa la de bzhin du yang dag par tshim par byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan cig brjod la slar dbyung bar bya'o// de bzhin du phyag rgya bcing ba
29b2(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa cho ga rgyas pa ni dang po la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du bya'o/ / phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin te/ ma bsgrubs par yang
29b3(rgyud 'bum): dang po ji lta ba bzhin no/ / gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba la ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgyas so// sems can thams cad 'dul ba la ni khro bas ha ha zhes dgod cing zlos pas so// nyan thos dang
29b4(rgyud 'bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba las lhung bar bya ba la ni chos gos dang snam sbyar gyi sbyin sreg gis so/ / dbang bskur ba thams cad dbrog pa la ni khams thams cad kyi phye ma'i sbyin sreg
29b5(rgyud 'bum): gis so/ / thams cad rgyus gdab pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgyas so// thams cad gcad pa la ni gzugs brnyan byas nas gtubs pas so// ma rungs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor
29b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gzung nas 'jug par bya'o/ / mchod pa thams cad rnam par gzhig pa la ni khros nas bzlas brjod bya'o// thams cad skrag par bya ba la ni 'jigs byed kyi lha
29b7(rgyud 'bum): bas blta bar bya'o/ / bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//
