30a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas yang chos thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad/
30a2(rgyud 'bum): ngo/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// thams cad don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do// thams cad chos nyid pas shes
30a3(rgyud 'bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid do/ / thams cad las nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
30a4(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ don yod pa thams cad kyi dam tshig
30a5(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ / hUM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad thugs las byung ste/ dam tshig gi de kho na nyid
30a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po der zhugs par gyur to/ / de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la nges par btud de dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// dkyil
30a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen po bris la dkyil 'khor gyi gnas brgyad du rdo rje khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa dkyil 'khor so sor gzhag go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dam tshig thams
30b1(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du phyi'i dkyil
30b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bris la/ de'i dbus su rdo rje 'khor lo bris nas/ 'khor lo'i gnas rnams su dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa bri bar bya'o// thams cad kyang dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i thig gis btab
30b3(rgyud 'bum): cing sems dpa' chen po gzhag par bya'o/ / phyi'i dkyil 'khor du phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs ji ltar rjes su 'thun par bri bar bya'o// sgo rnams su ni rigs rnam pa bzhi'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par
30b4(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de nas dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thams cad rgyas par bya'o// dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i de kho na nyid dam tshig ces bya ba'i
30b5(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ bde ba thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang
30b6(rgyud 'bum): mdzad kyis yang sems can thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin
30b7(rgyud 'bum): yin pas sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no/ / thams cad rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur bzhed pas sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po can no// ngag thams cad rab
31a1(rgyud 'bum): tu 'byung bas sems can thams cad ni chos kyi snying po can no/ / sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa la sbyor bas sems can thams cad ni las kyi snying po can no// de nas
31a2(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis ca co'i sgra phyung nas chos nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing snying po phul te/ de nas rdo rje dbang phyug chen po rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di phul lo// tri/ de nas
31a3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ kun nas zlum pa thig gsum pa dkyil 'khor chen po sgo bzhi pa mtshams rnams su mdung rtse gsum pa bri bar bya'o// de'i dbus su dbang phyug chen po bri bar
31a4(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de'i logs thams cad du tshogs brgyad po bri bar bya ste/ 'di lha ste/ nag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / dril chen dang / gar gyi dbang phyug rnam
31a5(rgyud 'bum): ni phyogs rnams su'o/ / mtshams su ni thod pa bzang po dang / gtum po'i dbang phyug dang / lag na kha T+wAM ga dang / ba lang rna ba'i dbang phyug dang ngo // thig gi mtshams rnams su ni ma
31a6(rgyud 'bum): mo'i tshogs thams cad gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ / sgo rnams su dbyig pa'i dbang phyug dang / mgo'i dbang phyug dang / dril rna dang / drag po chen po'o// phyi rol tu ni 'byung ba
31a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / yi ge rnams bri bar bya'o// de nas slob dpon thal ba gtsang mas lus bskus shing gos gtsang ma bgos te/ mdung rtse gsum gyi mtshan ma gzhag par bya'o// zhugs nas kyang
31b1(rgyud 'bum): snying po bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas slob ma de bzhin du bcug la lag par mdung rtse gsum pa byin la chos bshad par bya'o// sems can kun la phan phyir dang // bskur ba thams cad srung phyir dang /
31b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod kun bdag po nyid phyir dang // drag po'i las la gnas par gyis// de nas phyag rgya'i ye shes bslabs te gtor ma sbyin par bya'o// de nas brtsams te 'jigs pa med par dngos grub
31b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyis bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / thams cad rjes su myong nas drag po'i 'jig rten du mchod par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor chen po zhi
31b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mdung thung gi mtshan ma zhes bya ba'o/ / de nas ma mo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ dang po mgrin gcig tu thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / gsad pa dang /
31b5(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo// b+h+yo/ de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya'o// zur bzhi pa byang gi sgo can gyi dkyil 'khor thig btab la/ dbus su
31b6(rgyud 'bum): nag po gar byed bzhin pa gzhag par bya'o/ / de'i phyogs dang mtshams thams cad du ma mo brgyad bri bar bya'o// 'di lta ste/ drag mo dang / tshangs pa mo dang / khyab 'jug mo dang / gzhon
31b7(rgyud 'bum): nu mo dang / nag mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / zab mo dang / srin mo'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi'i mtshams rnams su ni drag po'i mkha' 'gro ma bzhi bri bar bya ste/ zhi ba mo dang / be ruN+Da dang /
32a1(rgyud 'bum): gtum mo dang / 'jigs byed ma rnams so// de rnams kyi mtshan ma ni mdung rtse gsum pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / 'khor lo dang / dril bu dang / zod pa khrag dang bcas pa
32a2(rgyud 'bum): dang 'khar gsil dang / mche ba dang / kha T+wAM ga'o// sgo srungs rnams kyi ni thod pa dang / rus pa'i lu gu rgyud dang / bya rgod dang / byi la'o// de nas phyag rgya'i slob dpon chos spyod pa/
32a3(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ba/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa thams cad za ba 'am/ thams cad spyad pa la'ang smad pa med de/ zhi ba'i pho nyi'i phyag rgyas zhugs la snying po bzlas par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
32a4(rgyud 'bum): nas b+h+yo chen po thos par 'gyur ro/ / de nas slob dpon ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad ji ltar 'ongs pa zhugs par 'gyur zhing 'thob par 'gyur te/ gdug pa'i dam tshig ni ma gtogs so//
32a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas slob ma lag na me tog thogs pas ras kyis mig bkab la nag po chen po'i phyag rgyas bcug ste/ rnam par dam tshig chen po b+h+yo zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas skrag nas me tog 'dor
32a6(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / de nas gang du lhung ba de lhag pa'i lhar bsgrub par bya'o// gal te lhung bar ma gyur na'ang 'dor du gzhug go// des ni 'jigs par byed par nus shing rnal 'byor yang so sor 'thob par
32a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o// gdug pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas mchod nas snying po dang rang rang gi mtshan ma sbyin par bya'o// de nas dam tshig
32b1(rgyud 'bum): bstan par bya ste/ sems can thams cad rgyas gdab cing // dam tshig sdang rnams bza' bar bya// sngags rnams bstan par mi bya ste// dam tshig rnal 'byor grub ster bya'o// drag po'i/
32b2(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig mdung rtse dang // ma mo rnams kyi rgyas 'debs par// gal te 'das na khyod kyi snying // rtag tu 'jig par byed par 'gyur// de nas brtsams te gang sha chen po za ba ni de ring po mi thog
32b3(rgyud 'bum): par rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / gang za bar mi 'gyur ba de'i rnal 'byor med do// gal te dam tshig las 'das par ma gyur na tshogs thams cad kyis kyang mi gsod par 'gyur ro//
32b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ phyag rgya'i gar dang mchod pa byas nas gtor ma sbyin zhing bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / longs spyod la sogs pas tshim par byas nas phyir byung bar
32b5(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sbrang rtsir byed pa la sogs pa ming po gsum gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te mgrin
32b6(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di phul lo/ / swa/ de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ zur bzhi pa dang sgo bzhi par// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang
32b7(rgyud 'bum): du dkyil 'khor ni/ / gzhu yi dbyibs can bri bar bya// de yi dbus su ming po ni// mchog gsum dag ni gzhag bya ste// sbrang rtsir byed dang rgyal byed dang // don kun grub byed ces bya ba'o//
33a1(rgyud 'bum): go cha ya lad bgos par dang // de bzhin thod pa mtshan ma 'dzin// lha yi gos dang 'phreng ba 'chang // cung zad dgod cing khro ba dang // seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa dang // 'od
33a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes pa'o/ / dngos grub kun ster dag pa ste// gsum ni srid gsum dag dang mtshungs// sgo dang mtshams ni thams cad du// tshogs la sogs pa legs par gzhag/
33a3(rgyud 'bum): grub dang 'phel chen gnod sbyin dang // gtum dang khro mchog gsod pa'o// phyi rol ba dan rtse mo la// dril bu'i 'phreng bcas thams cad du// bum pa gang ba rol mchog bcas// 'byung po ma
33a4(rgyud 'bum): lus gtor mar bcas/ / klu rnams glu ru len pa dang // rol mo rdung bar byed pa dang // de bzhin slob dpon gar byed pas// phyag rgya kun gyis 'jug par bya// zhugs nas spun la dad pa
33a5(rgyud 'bum): yis/ yang dang yang du 'dud bya zhing // me tog kun gyis mchod pa yis// sgrub dang de nyid dag kyang brjod// 'jig rten gsum po srid gsum mchog/ ngan song gsum mchod gsum rnam gsum
33a6(rgyud 'bum): legs ldan sbas pas grub pa ni/ / dngos grub kun la rtag tu'o// de nas snying po lan cig brjod cing phyag rgya thams cad kyi g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyur byas la dgug par bya'o// de nas dril
33a7(rgyud 'bum): bu dang bcas pa'i 'phreng ba rnams g.yo'o/ / thams cad phab nas de bzhin du gzhug par bya'o// de nas dam tshig 'di brjod par bya ste/ gal te dam tshig 'das gyur na// pha gsod 'gro ba gang
33b1(rgyud 'bum): yin dang / / ma gsod pa yi 'gro ba gang // 'gro ba der ni 'gro bar 'gyur// rtag tu dam pa bsten par bya// dam pa min pa yongs su spang // gzhan la de nyid bstan mi bya// rtag tu ming po gsum
33b2(rgyud 'bum): po sgrub/ 'di ni dam tshig go// de nas glu dang / gar dang / rol mo dang / dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / za ba dang / mgu bas mel rtse bya'o// phyag rgya dang gar gyi rol mo'i mchod pa'ang byas
33b3(rgyud 'bum): la/ slob dpon gyis kyang phyag rgya de dang bcas pas byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ye shes brjod par bya'o// de nas brtsams te dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
33b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'byor pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sring mo bzhis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di phul lo// hUM/
33b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor kun nas zlum por thig btab la/ thig bzhi la 'khor lo bzhi pa byas la/ dkyil 'khor de rnams su sgo bzhir lta ba'i lha mo bzhi'i
33b6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs brnyan gzhag par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ dga' ba mo ni shar du lte ba/ mda' dang gzhu thogs pa la brtson pa/ sgeg ma mdog dmar ba'o// gsod ma lho phyogs su lta ba/ lag na gri dang
33b7(rgyud 'bum): phub thogs pa/ mdog nag po'o// phag mo nub tu lha ba/ lag na gser gyi gter thogs pa/ gser gyi mdog can no// grub pa mo zhi ba mo zhes bya ba byang du lba ba/ lag na gri dang sha
34a1(rgyud 'bum): ka ra thogs pa/ mdog dkar mo'o// phyi rol gyi sgo bzhir mtshan ma dgod pa gzhag par bya'o// de nas slob dpon dril bu dkrol zhing lag pa g.yon pa kha T+wAM ga dang bcas
34a2(rgyud 'bum): pas 'jug par bya'o/ / zhugs nas snying po bzla bar bya'o// de nas phyag dang gar gyi mchod pa btab par bya'o// de nas yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro// thams
34a3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/ / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gdon rnams kyis mi tshugs pa dang / 'di ni nor rnams kyang bskyed par 'gyur ro// ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i thams cad kyis
34a4(rgyud 'bum): mnyes par byed pa dang / gter thams cad 'byin pa dang / dngos grub thams cad sgrub nus par 'gyur ro// slob ma gzhug pa'ang de bzhin no// de rnams kyang 'di dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur
34a5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom
34a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas mu med pas mthar thug cing mu med pa'i chos dang ldan pas yang cho ga 'di mthar thug par byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi
34a7(rgyud 'bum): mthar thug pa byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha'
34b1(rgyud 'bum): yas pa nyid do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma nyid pas chos thams cad du ma nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
34b2(rgyud 'bum): phyin pa mthar thug pa med pa nyid pas las thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid yin no/ / gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston
34b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / rjod pa dang / sgom pa de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mthar thug pa med pa'i mthar phyin te sgrib pa thams cad zad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am rdo rje 'dzin par myur du
34b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don yod pa dang / thogs pa med par myur du grub par bya ba'i phyir lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin
34b5(rgyud 'bum): no/ / sems can chen po legs so legs// bde ba chen po legs so legs// theg pa chen po legs so legs// blo gros chen po legs so legs// cho ga 'di ni legs par smras// sangs
34b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis/ / 'bras bu yod pa 'dul ba'i mchog/ rdo rje'i mdo 'di'i byin gyi rlabs// cho ga'i rgyal po bla na med// gang rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa ni// bdud la sogs pa thams
34b7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis/ / de dag mi song mi tshugs so// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa bzhin// ring por mi thogs
35a1(rgyud 'bum): 'thob par 'gyur/ / de skad gsungs nas gsang grub phyir// rdo rje can gyis bshad pa la// kun mchog sangs rgyas mkhas bcas pa// thams cad kyis ni mngon par bstod//
35a2(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsar+ya shwad d+hA ka ra barma dang
35a3(rgyud 'bum): zhu chen gyi lo tsob dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
35a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa/ chos thams cad spros pa med pas yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba/ rdo rje chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dpal mchog dang
35a5(rgyud 'bum): po thog ma dang / tha ma dang / dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni/ bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam
35a6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// de bzhin
35a7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni/ bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
35b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi bdud chen po'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa'i dngos grub dam pa ni/ khams gsum pa thams cad dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khams gsum/
35b2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi dngos grub dam pa ni/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir/ 'khor ba la'ang ma chags shing brtson 'grus
35b3(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa bde ba'i mchog shin tu bde ba chen
35b4(rgyud 'bum): po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe// de srid mtshungs med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da'
35b5(rgyud 'bum): byed par nus/ / shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang // ye shes gnas su bsgrubs pas ni// chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir// 'khor ba yongs su dag par 'gyur// chags la sogs pas
35b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dul na ni/ / 'khor ba'i bar du rtag par yang // 'jig rten sdig byed de sbyong phyir// 'khor ba srid du bdag nyid 'dul// ji ltar pad+ma rab dmar ba// 'dam gyi nyes pas mi gos pas// de bzhin
35b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'i nyes pa yis/ / 'gro phan rnams la mi gos so// 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag/ bde ba chen po nor che la// khams gsum dbang phyug thos pas na// sems can don rnams
36a1(rgyud 'bum): sbron par byed/ / gang la la zhig nang par langs nas dpal mchog dang po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re bzhin 'don pa dang / nyan
36a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de yis bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ro// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di
36a3(rgyud 'bum): la thob par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog kyang 'grub ste/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po thams cad dam/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// bde ba chen po
36a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dpal mchog dang po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rdzogs so//
36a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis rlob pa'i rdo rje gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
36a6(rgyud 'bum): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i don yod cing bstan pa'i cho ga phyag rgya btab pa'i sku gsung thugs thams cad kyis rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po thams cad la rab
36a7(rgyud 'bum): tu zhugs nas chos nyid rtogs pa'i ye shes la rab tu zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i 'phrin las kyis dus gsum du 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par spros pa las
36b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi mtha' can/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po/ zla ba phyed pa du ma la rab tu gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che rnams kyi 'od zer sna tshogs pa rnam par 'bar ba'i 'od kyis gsal ba gser
36b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi dril bu btags pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i ba dan rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pas/ me tog gi 'phreng ba sna tshogs pa dang / na bza' dang / me long dang / mu tig
36b3(rgyud 'bum): gi 'phreng ba rab tu 'phyang bas mdzes shing brgyan pa/ sna tshogs pa'i kha khyer la gnas pa mchog tu gyur pa'i lha'i bu mo dgod pa dang / sgeg pa dang / gar dang / glu yis rab tu brgyan pa dang /
36b4(rgyud 'bum): bstod pas sad par byed pa/ bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas gzhal yas khang pa la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
36b5(rgyud 'bum): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' thams cad dang / dbang bskur ba thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin las tham cad
36b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu gyur pa/ khams gsum thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa/ thams cad dbang du byed pa po 'byin pa po 'dod pa thams cad pa/ rgya che ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga thams cad pa/ rtag
36b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa/ ji srid srid pa'i bar gnas pa// de srid sems can don mchog mchod// sems can khams ni mtha' yas dang // rgyal sras srid
37a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'dod pa'i phyir/ / srid pa'i skyon rnams 'joms phyir dang / bde ba chen po 'phel bya'i phyir// gsang ba'i rtog pa mchog gsung ba'i// rjes su gnang bar bdag la
37a2(rgyud 'bum): stsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa nyid la lhag par dgongs nas/ gdul bya thams cad thugs rje chen po'i sna tshogs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
37a3(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / thams cad yongs su bskyang ba dang / phan pa dang /
37a4(rgyud 'bum): bde ba dang / dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / ye shes dang / las dang / mchog gi dngos grub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad nyid dang / rdo rje
37a5(rgyud 'bum): 'chang chen po thob pa mchog gi dngos grub kyi don bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dang po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sku'i 'phreng ba'i
37a6(rgyud 'bum): cod pan gyis dbang bskur bas yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i bde ba chen po mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa dngos grub thams cad thob
37a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba'i phyir/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas te su drang por srang ste/ g.yon pa bsnyems pa'i tshul du mdzad nas g.yas pa rdo rje gsor bas rang gi thugs kar dang po'i rdo rje mchog sa
37b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba 'dzin cing / bde ba chen po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs las 'byung ngo // oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM ho su ra s+t+waM/ de nas phyung ba tsam
37b2(rgyud 'bum): kyigyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur yongs su bzung ba rnams slar yang byang chub chen po mngon par rtogs nas de rnams kyis bzhad pa chen
37b3(rgyud 'bum): po mngon par mdzad do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos pa dang shin tu g.yos pas yongs su dag par gyur to// khams gsum rgyas par spros pa thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor
37b4(rgyud 'bum): chen por gyur to/ / gang gi sems can thams cad bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur to// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod cing / thogs pa med pa
37b5(rgyud 'bum): las mngon par 'byung bar rdo rje chen po phyag ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba rnam par gnon par mdzad nas de'i sku thams cad las dngos
37b6(rgyud 'bum): grub thams cad dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba ster ba rtag tu rjes su 'brel ba can lhan cig tu spyod pa bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi sems dpa' rnams phyung nas phyogs thams cad du phyung
37b7(rgyud 'bum): stemadun du rdo rje gsang ba yid las byung ba/ g.yas su rdo rje kI li kI li/ rgyab tu 'dod pa'i rdo rje/ g.yon du rdo rje bsgyings pa'o// mtshams rnams su mchod pa'i lha mo rnams so//
38a1(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol gyi kha khyer mtshams su lha'i bu mo rnams so// sgo srungs pa rnams ni rdo rje lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / dril bu 'dzin pa'o// phyi rol
38a2(rgyud 'bum): tu rdo rje sgo srungs kyi tshogs dang / pho nya dang / bran rnams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khu tshur bcings te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang
38a3(rgyud 'bum): / chub rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'chang chen po la gsol ba btab ste/ sems can kun la bde don du// rgyal ba
38a4(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'byung ba ste/ / chags bral de rnams chags ldan yang // rang gi btsun mo'ang gsol mdzad pas// de phyir bdag gis khyod la gsol// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// gsang ba'i rtog/
38a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dngos grub ste// 'dul ba mchog ni bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i bka' bde ba chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub 'dul ba rdo rje 'dod pa'i mchog
38a6(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas/ rdo rje chen po gsang ba'i dmachog ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa
38a7(rgyud 'bum): ste/ bde ba chen po rdo rje mchog/ dam tshig dam pa'i ming can yin// dkyil 'khor gnas ni 'dus byas nas// de'i dbus cho ga bzhin du ni// phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag nas/
38b1(rgyud 'bum): der ni dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// gsar zhing legs par bsgril ba dang // mdud pa dag ni med pa yi// thig skung dmar pos thig btab nas// tshon gyi phye mas bri bar bya// zur bzhi
38b2(rgyud 'bum): pab la sgo bzhi pa/ / sgo khyud bzhis ni mdzes pa dang // kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor// mtshams su lha yi bu mos mdzes// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtshams rnams dang // sgo dang sgo khyud
38b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshams rnams su/ / zla ba phyed la gnas pa yi// rdo rje rin chen 'od zer 'bar// rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril bu mchog/ ba dan sna tshogs mdzes pa yin// me long dra ba me tog 'phreng //
38b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri// de ni nang du 'khor lo ni// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa dang 'dra ba// rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor ba'i// rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri// de dbus cho ga bzhin du/
38b5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya// blugs sam yang na byas pa'am// brdungs sam yang na bris pa yis// bzhad pa dang bcas zla ba'i 'od// 'bar ba'i 'od zer dmar pos khyab//
38b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas 'phreng bas rnam par mdzes// skul tshon gyis yang dag byugs// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rdo rje bsnyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod nas//
38b7(rgyud 'bum): snying khar rnam par dgod par bya// de yi logs ni thams cad du// sems dpa' chen po rnams bris te// tshon nam yang na rdul tshon gyis// gor mi ji bzhin bri bar bya// mdun du sku mngon
39a1(rgyud 'bum): dmar po ni/ / rdo rje mtshon cha la brtson pa// g.yas su dag pa'i dkar po ste// legs par 'khyud pa'i rdo rje can// rtsub tu sku mdog ser po ste// chu srin gyi ni rgyal
39a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan 'dzin/ / g.yon du sku mdog sngon po ste// phyag gis snyems pa 'dzin la sogs// mchod pa'i snod rnams 'dzin pa'o// mchod pa'i lha mo bri bar bya// sgeg mo bzhad ma glu ma dang /
39a3(rgyud 'bum): dkar mo lha yi bu mo'i tshogs// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang // rdo rje lcags sgrog dril bu bsnams// sgo ni bzhi po rnams la ni// sgo srungs bzhi po dgod par bya// de nas de dag gi snying po
39a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni 'di yin te/ hUM badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti samA ke ma Ta/ hUM badz+ra kI li kI la ye hUM/ hUM sma ra badz+ra bi d+ha hUM/ hUM tuSh+Ta badz+raHhUM/ rdo rje bran no// de nas mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyi ni/ hUM ma d+hu ra badz+ri hUM/
39a5(rgyud 'bum): / hUM badz+ra me g+he hUM/ hUM shA rad badz+ra hUM/ hUM badz+ra shi shi ri hUM/ de nas lha'i bu mo rnams kyi ni/ hUM badz+ra lA s+ye/ ma hA ba ra badz+ra Ni/ oM badz+ra gI te badz+ra/ oM nr-i te badz+ra/ de nas sgo srungs rnams kyi ni/
39a6(rgyud 'bum): dzaHaM ku sha pra ti ha ra/ hUM badz+ra pA sha ga na/ baM badz+ra s+pho Ta du ha/ a badz+ra g+he Tats+tshe ra/ de ltar lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du/ bud med grags pa nyid ni dgod// bkod na de dag rnams kyis ni/ byin
39a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis brlabs pa nyid du 'gyur/ / de na phyag na rdo rje 'dzin// dkyil 'khor kun tu bris byas nas// bum pa gang ba ji snyed dang // me tog la sogs kun gyis mchod// dril bu btags pa'i
39b1(rgyud 'bum): ba dan rnams/ / mtshams rnams su ni gzhag par bya// lcug ma dang bcas bum pa rnams// sgo yi phyi rol dag tu gzhag/ rdo rje dang bcas gzhi dang bcas// bcug mo yongs su bzlas nas
39b2(rgyud 'bum): ni/ dri chus gang ba'i bum pa ste// phyag na rdo rje'i mdun gzhag bya// de la 'di ltar bde ba chen po'i dam tshig gi bdud rtsi'i chu byin gyis brlab pa'i snying po ni/ oM ma hA su kha badz+ra sa ma ya/ a
39b3(rgyud 'bum): b+he khe kA dzaHhUM baM hoH/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o// chu 'di gtor ba'am 'thungs na sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu byang ba dang / bde ba thams cad rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin no// de nas rang
39b4(rgyud 'bum): gi dam tshig rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o/ / dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes brjod nas/ dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcings nas skad cig gis dbang du 'gyur ro// phyag rgya chen po
39b5(rgyud 'bum): mnyam bzhag ste/ / de bzhin g.yas su mdzub lcags kyus/ dgug pa 'di ni lan cig gis// 'grub par rab tu gzhug par bya// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa/ a a hi shri g+h+raM su kha badz+ra gu h+ya sa ma
39b6(rgyud 'bum): ya ma nu sma ra prA nu sma ra pra b+hU ta sa ma ya s+thA hri da yaM/ su toSh+yo me b+ha wa/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ a d+hi tiSh+ThA b+ha ga bAM a na ti na dan sid d+h+waM tu me man+da pa daiH/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ de nas rtag
39b7(rgyud 'bum): tu bcom ldan 'das/ / dkyil 'khor du ni rang nyid byin// dgug cing bcug nas brtan pa dang // dbang du 'gyur zhing 'grub pa yin// rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul dum rnams mthong ba'am
40a1(rgyud 'bum): yang na bcom ldan 'das rang nyid kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis slob dpon ni phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa/ dam tshig thams cad shes pa/ las
40a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// 'jug pa'i cho ga 'di yis rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid ji snyed pa'i dris byugs shing bsgos pa/ rgyan dang bcas pa'i me tog gi
40a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng bas lus shin tu brgyan pa/ gos dmar po gnyis bgos pas rang nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod cing rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje bsnyems pas rang nyid 'jug par bya'o// bstod pa ni drug
40a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan la sogs pa glu yis bya'o/ / 'dod chags la sogs bde kun yid khyod ni// kun tu bdag la bde ba la stsol cig/ rdo rje sems dgongs myur du bdag bstan mdzod// bdag dgyes mdzad dang
40a5(rgyud 'bum): bde mchog grub la 'dud/ / de nas rab tu zhugs nas dgongs su gsol bar bya ste/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// kun tu bzang po khyod yin te// rdo rje
40a6(rgyud 'bum): bsnyems bdag khyab bdag yin/ / sems kyi sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin// de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog dam tshig dngos grub can// rdo rje sems bdag de grub mdzod// de nas bcos
40a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan de nyid kyis/ / rdo rje slob dpon byin brlabs gyur// de sngar ma byung ba'i so so rang rig pa'i bde ba gnyis ka la skye bar 'gyur ro// phra mo dbab par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das grub
40b1(rgyud 'bum): par gyur to zhes shes par bya'o/ / de nas de bzhin du 'dug la ci 'dod pa'i bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas de bzhin du 'dug la rang gi bsod nams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro//
40b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas brtsams te sems dpa' chen po thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhing mthong bar 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis kyang de la dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad do// phyag rgya thams cad kyang
40b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag rang nyid kyis bcings na las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / dam tshig thams cad kyang 'di la bstan par 'gyur ro// yid kyi 'dod pa'i las rnams kyang byed pa yin no// bde ba dang
40b4(rgyud 'bum): yid bde ba thams cad nyams su myong zhing gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang mi sod pas lo gcig 'das nas sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thob pa yin no/ / de nas sems can thams
40b5(rgyud 'bum): can zhugs pa'i don du brtag par bya ba yin no/ / rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid snga ma bzhin du lus la brgyan nas rab tu bde ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rab tu bcug ste/ de bzhin du de kho na nyid chen
40b6(rgyud 'bum): po bskul bas yang dag par bskul la dgug pa'i bya la 'di skad ces brjod do/ / srid pa'i bde ba rnam dag phyir// sngar gyi srid pa la khrod dga'// 'dod pa kun gyi dngos grub che// 'gro ba kun
40b7(rgyud 'bum): la'ang 'grub par gyis/ / de nas mchod pa byas la/ rang gi lhag pa'i lha gang yin pa de'i dam tshig phyag rgya me tog dang bcas pa gzhug par bya ste/ bcug nas rna bar 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o//
41a1(rgyud 'bum): chags bral nyid kyis 'dul bar 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// rdo rje sems dpa' sbas pa yin// 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi// sdug bsngal gzhan ni rang
41a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin med/ / de bas sems can chags bral la// slar yang yid ni ma byed cig/ de nas me tog la sogs pa snying po 'dis 'dor du gzhug go// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa pra ti gr-ih+Na sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas
41a3(rgyud 'bum): gang du babs pa de ni de'i lha yin no/ / de nas de kho na nyid chen por brjod par bya'o// gang 'dod pa'i snying po byin la sgrub tu bcug la rang nyid lhag pa'i lha dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas de'i mtshan
41a4(rgyud 'bum): ma lag pa gnyis su byin te/ de'i rigs kyi ming gi dbang bskur la snying po 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta At+ma kohaM/ badz+ra d+ha ra sa mu khe b+ha a b+hi khe tAM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi gr-ih+Na
41a5(rgyud 'bum): sid+d+hi badz+ri te a mo g+ha sid+d+hi s+thA/ de nas phyag rgya bcings pa bslab par bya'o// de nas ci 'dod pa'i mchod pa byas shing byed du bcug nas ci 'dod pa bza' ba dang btung bas slob ma rnams tshim par byas la
41a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan gar dang rgod pa byed du bcug cing rang nyid kyis kyang bya'o/ / de nas thams cad bskrad nas 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ thog mtha' rgyu yi 'gro ba 'di// dga' bas mchog la ragasus
41a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po rdo rjer 'gyur/ / slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol// de nas snyim pa'i me tog dor nas dbyung bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor yang rang nyid kyis phyag
41b1(rgyud 'bum): rdul tshon de dag gi rol bu byas la bzhag na las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi bdud rtsi'i tshul de'ang bcug na tshe 'phel ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad
41b2(rgyud 'bum): dgongs pa yin no/ / de nyid kyis dbang bskur na'ang dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba thob pa dang mchog gi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro// gal he sku bri ba'i ri mo mkhan pa rnyed na rang rang gi
41b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag mtshan gyi phyag rgya rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ / gal te de'ang mi shes na phyag mtshan gzhag par bya'o// phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de ras bcom ldan 'das
41b4(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa thogs pa med pa myur du 'grub pa'i cho ga rgya che ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnam par gnon par mdzad nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos 'di gsungs so//
41b5(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen po rab bsgrubs dang // 'dod pa chen po rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub pa ni// rtag par myur du bshad par bya// ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// de srid sems
41b6(rgyud 'bum): can gnon par bya/ / mya ngan 'das pa byang chub sgrib// de nyid kyi ni dam tshig rnams// ji srid pa la gnas pa ni// de srid sems can don nyid byed// thams cad dag pa'i mchog chos
41b7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / ji ltar sems can kun gyi don// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa// de phyir sbyin tshogs pha rol phyin// byang chub spyod pa mchog gi min// de bzhin gshegs ni 'dul min la//
42a1(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun rnams don mdzad pa// 'di ni dngos grub rab sgrub na// dus kun tu ni thams cad mdzad// de ras sgrub pa 'di bya ste// dngos grub shin tu brtag pa yin/
42a2(rgyud 'bum): gang gis srid pa 'di nyid du// shin tu brtag pa'i dngos grub thob// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs kyang // dam tshig rnam par spangs pa 'am// bsod nams med kyang thams cad du// srid pa 'di
42a3(rgyud 'bum): la myur du 'grub/ / gal te dngos grub sgrub 'dod na// rtag tu yul dang ldan gyur na// gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas ni// rang rang phyag rgyas 'grub par 'gyur// drug ldan la sogs snyan pa'i
42a4(rgyud 'bum): glu/ chags pa kun kyang phyir 'dod par// bzlas pa'i don ni ci nus pas// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya// 'di yis 'dod pa'i kun dbang phyug/ ci 'dod 'ong ngo mkha' la rgyu// dngos
42a5(rgyud 'bum): grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub/ / rga shi med cing gtso bor 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyis mchod byas la// rang gzhan kun gyis bsnyen bkur zhing // rdo rje 'chang chen dang mtshungs shing // don yod
42a6(rgyud 'bum): kur spyod pa yin no/ / bde ba chen po rdo rje grub pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster ba'i rdo rje 'chang byang chub sems dpa' yin na/ gal te de bzhin gshes
42a7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi dngos grub mngon par 'dod pa des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa ras ris la bri bar bya'o// bzhad pa
42b1(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa dngos po thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ / de'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas/ rdo rje'i tshig gis stong
42b2(rgyud 'bum): phrag brgya bzlas par bya'o/ / 'bum rdzogs pa na mtshan phyed na bdud kyi tshogs rnams 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de nas bdud thams cad kyi stobs gzhom pas bcom par bya'o// de nas tho rangs kyi dus
42b3(rgyud 'bum): su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ / gal te rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid mngon par 'dod na des lugs sam/ 'dus byas pa 'am/ brdungs pa 'am/
42b4(rgyud 'bum): ras ris la sog par leg pa gri ba'i phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du sngar grub pa la sku gzugs kyi khyad par ji ltar thob pa rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa bshad do// zla ba drug gis rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dngos
42b5(rgyud 'bum): grub chen po 'grub bo/ / gal te rdo rje 'chang chen po dgug na bde ba chen po rdo rje lcags kyus dgug cing ci 'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o// zla ba gcig bzlas nas thams cad gsol bar bya'o// gal te rang
42b6(rgyud 'bum): gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid sgrub na rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te bsgoms pas bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yin no zhes bsgoms la bsgrub par bya'o/ / de ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pas bdag nyid
42b7(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya'o/ / yang dang yang du sgom zhing bzlas pa de srid bdag gis bya'o// ji srid rdo rje 'chang nyid zla ba phyed bzlas nas thob par 'gyur ro// de nas 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug bsgrub par 'dod//
43a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du rang yid du 'ong ba dang bcas par rab tu zhugs te phyag rgya bcings la de srid bzlas par bya'o// ji srid bdag 'dod pa rnams kyi dbang phyug dang khams gsum pa ma lus pa
43a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag por 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang khams gsum pa ma lus pa'i rdo rje'i rgyun gyi rang bzhin thams cad grub pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes rnam par rol par mdzad nas ma bsgrubs pa'i
43a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i las kyi rgyun rdo rje'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di gsungs so/ / ma bsgrubs pa'i snying po'i las rnams 'di lha ste/ bdag nyid srung ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i gtsug tor gyis so// thams
43a4(rgyud 'bum): cad srung ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i mdzod spus so/ / phyogs thams cad dang / mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas so// bdud
43a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi stobs gzhom pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba mi bskyod pas so/ / tshe 'phel bar bya ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i bdud rtsis so// gzugs chen po phun sum tshogs pa ni bde ba
43a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i gzugs can gyis so/ / gzi brjid dang na tshod shin tu bzang por rab tu 'phel ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i bcud kyis len gyis so// stobs dang mdog 'phel ba
43a7(rgyud 'bum): la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i mthu yis so/ / dbang bskur ba thams cad la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i cod pan gyis so// nor thams cad thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang phyug gis so// rgyal
43b1(rgyud 'bum): srid thob pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyas so/ / sa ma lus pa thob pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rtsal gyis so// thams cad dbab pa dang / g.yo bar byas pa dang / gar byed du gzhugs pa dang /
43b2(rgyud 'bum): dus gsum bden pa nyid du smrar gzhug pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi don du gzhug pas so// pra se na thams cad grub pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i pra se na dbab pas so// gdon thams
43b3(rgyud 'bum): cad las thar pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rengs pas so/ / thams cad gnyid log par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gnyid kyis so// thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig
43b4(rgyud 'bum): gi mkha' 'gro mas so/ / thams cad du gsang ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba mthar byed kyis so// thams cad bsgyel ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i hUM mdzad kyis so// thams cad bslang ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i
43b5(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig gis bslang ba'o/ / thams cad bcing ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba bcing bas so// thams cad thar par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i yi ge mus so// 'phra men ma thams cad las thar par bya ba la
43b6(rgyud 'bum): dang po sngon gyi gnas skabs rjes su sbyin pa la ni gsang ba chen po he ru ka'i rdo rjes so/ / ma mo'i gdon thams cad las thar par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i drag mos so// 'phra men ma thams cad kyis
43b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas btab pa la dang / thar par bya ba la dang / snying zos pa las snying gzhan 'byung bar 'jug pa dang / shi ba gso ba la ni dam chog chen po gsang ba'i he ru ka'i rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas
44a1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rdo rjes so// rims thams cad zhi ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i 'bar ba'i lta bas so// dug thams cad
44a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhig pa dang / bza' ba dang / 'bab pa dang / 'chi ba gso ba la ni gsang ba chen po rdo rje nor bu'i phyag rgyas so// dug thams cad dang / sbyar ba'i dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje
44a3(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i dug med pas so/ / gshed byed thams cad dang / byad dang / ro langs dang / byur dang / gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin sreg gis so// rtsod pa thams
44a4(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i zhal rab tu gdangs pas so// yams dang / 'tshe ba thams cad dang / sdig pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa gzhig pa la
44a5(rgyud 'bum): ni rdo rje gsang ba'i zhi bas so/ / gzhan gyi dpung thams cad rengs par bya ba dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / rmongs par bya ba dang / lkugs par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / bsad pa la ni bde
44a6(rgyud 'bum): ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i gshed byed kyis so/ / 'thab mo thams cad las rgyal ba thob pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi dpung rgyan gyis so// gdug pa thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i
44a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje legs pas so/ / bgegs thams cad zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i thabs sbyor gyis so// dgra bo thams cad rnam par gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rnam par 'thor bas so//
44b1(rgyud 'bum): bdud kyi stobs thams cad gzhom pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rab tu 'dul bas so// spyir bskyed pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i sprin chen pos so// char dbab pa lan rdo rje gsang ba'i sdigs mdzub kyis
44b2(rgyud 'bum): so/ thog dbab pa dang / glog dang / rlung dang / char zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i sprin srung gis so// sprin dang / mun pa dang / khug rdza zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bde ba chen po'i sbyin
44b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis so/ / klu thams cad dgug pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgyas so// klu thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni gsang ba thams cad kyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas so// klu thams cad rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la ni
44b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gsang ba'i klu 'dul bas so/ / klu thams cad 'byin pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i klu 'don pas so// sa ma lus pa g.yo zhing 'gul bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i thar pas so// chu med par chu'i
44b5(rgyud 'bum): phung po char bsil zhing dri ma med par bskyed pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje klu'i phyag rgyas so/ / mun par nyi ma'i snang ba chen po bskyed pa la ni rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgyas so// rlung thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni
44b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rlung thams cad kyis so/ / nam mkha' la gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i 'dzin pas so// nam mkha' las dngos po thams cad 'byung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang
44b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'byung bas so/ / nam mkha' la rang gi bdag nyid kyi dngos po kun tu bstan par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis so// nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa la
45a1(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rnam par 'phrul bas so// nam mkhan shing thams cad sa
45a2(rgyud 'bum): ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad 'byung ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dus kyi phyag rgyas so// sa'i cha thams cad la 'bras bu'i chathams cad smin par 'gyur ba la ni rdo rje gsang pa
45a3(rgyud 'bum): gshol gyi zug rgyas so/ / thams cad las lha'i kha zas dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / rgyun dang / gnas gsar ba dang / bu mo gzhon nu 'byung ba dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang /
45a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyan pa dang / rgyan pa thams cad 'drung bar bya ba la ni bde bachen po rda rji ma tshig gi bsod nams kyi rgyabs so// gdul dung dpung mi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bstan gyis sum bzed pa la ni rde rdza de pan
45a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sdom pa lo/ / mA ma rnams cad btsun pa pa rje pade chog gis so// bde chos go thathams cad la rde rje ma'i brungs so// rlung dbyung ba dang tsha baphrul lams cad brdzun pa na
45a6(rgyud 'bum): / #nga/ / bya mi
45b1(rgyud 'bum): chu'i steng du gzhag pa dang / bdag nyid gzugs mang po'i dngos po ston pa dang / mi snang ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgyas so// lha la sogs
45b2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad mngag gzhug par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' bsgo bas so/ / sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang gis so// mi rU ba thams cad drang ba dang / dbab pa
45b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / bden par smrar gzhug pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dngos grub chen po'i phyag rgyas so// gzugs brnyan thams cad dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / dgod par bya ba dang / gar byed du gzhug pa
45b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / kun tu rol par bya ba dang / bsgo ba thams cad byed du gzhug pa dang / thams cad khyer te 'ong ba dang / las thams cad byed du gzhug pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig sgrub pas so// thams
45b5(rgyud 'bum): cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje yid las byung bas so/ / rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad rtser gzhug pa la ni rdo rje ki li ki li'i gsang bas so// thams cad brtan par bya ba la ni rdo rje chu
45b6(rgyud 'bum): srin gyi phyag rgyas so/ / thams cad dang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje bsnyems pas so// rmi lam ngan pa bzlog pa la ni rdo rje ngag gis so// gzhan dag gis rang 'dod pa'i rmi lam mthong bar bya ba la ni rdo rje
45b7(rgyud 'bum): lam mthong bas so/ / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje sreg blugs kyis so// rmi lam bzang ba thams cad sgrub pa brtan par bya ba la ni rdo rje rmi lam grub pas so// nang dang gnod/
46a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad bsal ba la ni rdo rje spyan gyis so// rims thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje brgyad kyis len gyis so// dus ma yin par 'chi ba gzhig pa la ni rdo rje drang bas so//
46a2(rgyud 'bum): dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan 'gro thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje sdig pa dral bas so// sku thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje sku mchog gis so// gsung thams cad sgrub pa la ni rang gi lce 'das pa dang
46a3(rgyud 'bum): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dngos po thams cad bden par ston pa'o rdo rje gsang ba'i ljags kyi mchog gis so// thugs thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje thugs thams cad bskyed pas so// rdo rje thams
46a4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi dngos grub ni rab tu dag pa'i rdo rjes so/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'jug pa la ni rdo rje 'khor los so// phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi
46a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen pos so/ / thams cad dam tshig thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so// las thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pas so// dngos grub thams cad la ni rdo rje
46a6(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i bde ba chen po'i grub pas so/ / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad la ni rdo rje lhung ba las gdon pa'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas so//
46a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi mchod pa bya ba nyid la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gar gyis so// rdo rje thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa la ni rdo rje bde ba chen po'i rdo rjes so// sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub dam
46b1(rgyud 'bum): pa las rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i mchog gi bde ba chen pos so/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dngos grub
46b2(rgyud 'bum): dam pa la ni bde ba chen po gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so/ / bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o//
46b3(rgyud 'bum): / de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig gi sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa gsang ba'i chos can rnam par snang mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur
46b4(rgyud 'bum): yongs su 'dzin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo byin gyis rlob pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo//
46b5(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen po rab grub dang // 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas nyid// dam pa'i rigs ni bskyed du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen
46b6(rgyud 'bum): po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bde ba chen po mi phyed pa'i rnam par gnon pa mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje rdo rje thams cad la rab
46b7(rgyud 'bum): tu zhugs nas thams cad kyi bdag nyid mnyam par spros nas/ bde ba chen po rdo rje phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di gsungs so// oM d+hi/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rnam pa drug tu
47a1(rgyud 'bum): g.yos gyur te/ / sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun// kun nas 'dus shing bstan par gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis// thams cad grub phyir kun nas
47a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs/ / bzhad pa chen po'i khyad par gyis// rmad byung chen po rab tu bzhad// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin du rdo rje la snyoms par zhugs te/ bde ba chen
47a3(rgyud 'bum): po'i dam chog rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ / ji ltar chos kyi bris nas ni// rgyal ba g.yon du bsnyems 'dzin pa// dam tshig mchog gi mchog bkod nas/
47a4(rgyud 'bum): sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas// rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs gzung // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// me tog la sogs spyir thal sbyar// de la
47a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jug la sogs pa yi/ / cho ga rgyas pa'i khyad par ni 'di yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bya ba'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje glu 'dis 'jug par bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa yis
47a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rer chen blun med/ / rnga rje chos ni b+hur blangs byas// rdo rje'i las ni byed par 'gyur// de nas rab tu zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi gzungs bde bachen pa
47a7(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i lcags kyus dgug par bya'o/ / oM badz+ra d+hAr su ra ma hA su le sar+b+ba par thab ma ta ya// sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na me mu drA pa de dzaHhUM baM hoH/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dzin
47b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang bcas pa yang dag par byon par 'gyur ro/ / yid bde ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'byung ngo // cho 'phrul du ma dag mthong ba yin no// de nas chog rgyas pa dang / sgrub pa dang / yid kyi 'dod/
47b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / don yod pa dang / thogs pa med par myur du dam pa grub pa yin no// de bzhin du bya'o// de nas ma bsgrubs par lan cig bzlas pas las rnams byed par 'gyur
47b3(rgyud 'bum): ro/ thams cad srung ba la ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyis so// sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje mdzod spras so// chos nyid thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje chos nyid kyis so// de bzhin gshegs
47b4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyis mchod pa'i dngos grub ni rdo rje mchod pas so/ / gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba la ni khro bos so// byang chub kyi spyod pa ma lus par rdzogs par bya ba la ni rdo rje spyod pa'i phyag rgyas so//
47b5(rgyud 'bum): bdud thams cad gzhom pa la ni bdud thams cad 'joms par byed pas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du bya ba la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis so// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba las/
47b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i bka' bstan pa/ de bzhin
47b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje chen po thabs bde ba chen po'i khro bo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo// bde ba chen po
48a1(rgyud 'bum): rab grub dang / / chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// gdug pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir// rang gis sprul mdzod rdo rje 'dzin// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
48a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo 'di gsungs so/ / hUM rak+Sha dz+wA la mA le pra ti la ya/ ag+ni pra bi ta te/ ma hA su ra ta badz+ra kro d+hadza
48a3(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje las kun nas 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba'i snying po can smin ma 'gyur zhing khro gnyir bsdus pa/ sma ra ser zhing spyan
48a4(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba/ rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pas mchu'i sgros rnam par gnon pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ dbu skra gyen du 'bar ba/ rdo rje dang gzhu la sogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil
48a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen po'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang khams gsum pa'i gdug pa thams cad 'dul bar mdzad nas/ rdo rje dam tshig chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa'o// dkyil
48a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor thams cad thig gdab phyir/ / de la dang po khros pa gzhag/ su ra tod b+ha ba hUM zhes zlos// ut+pal sngon po'i 'od 'bar ba// rdo rje bsnyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ mche ba cung zad gcig
48a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i zhal/ / khro dang bcas pa bzhad pa'i zhal// rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// 'od zer 'bar ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni// thams cad du mi
48b1(rgyud 'bum): bri/ rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya chen pos dang por slob dpon gyis 'jug par bya ste/ slob ma rnams kyang de bzhin no// slob dpon zhugs nas khros pas lcags kyu de nyid kyis dgug
48b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / hUM su ra ta badz+ra kroN+Da/ a ya te/ ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa dza/ sarba badz+ra ku la ne tra pra be sha ya hUM/ sar+b+ba mu drA ga Na ban+d+ha ya baM/ sarba ma yaM bi shA ku ru ho/ sarba karma Ne tra satwA ya a/ de nas
48b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i rigs thams cad bcom ldan 'das dang bcas pa byon zhing grub pa yin no/ / slob dpon dang slob ma rnams la dgyes pa dang / khro bo 'bab pa'i mtshan yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
48b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang cung zad 'byung ba yin na de grub pa dang / dngos grub dang / cho ga rgyas pa'ang de bzhin du'o// gal te ma grub na lan cig bzla'o// khams gsum pa ma lus pa las rgyal bar bya ba
48b5(rgyud 'bum): la ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgyas so/ / sems can gyi khams thams cad 'dul ba la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gsang bas so// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba la ni 'jig rten gsum las
48b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas so/ / thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / gzhig pa dang / rengs pa dang / gnyid log par bya
48b7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / bsgyel ba dang / gsad par bya ba la ni bide ba chen po rdo rje khro bos so// thams cad lhung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje khro mar thabs so// thams cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i
49a1(rgyud 'bum): khro bas so/ / thams cad nges par gnon pa la ni rdo rje gang rgyangs kyis so// las thams cad nye bar dgod pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi khro bos so// bde ba chen//
49a2(rgyud 'bum): po'i rdo rje'i gsang ba las/ rab tu dga' ba las byung ba rdo rje gsang ba rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
49a3(rgyud 'bum): c ad kyi don yod cing thogs pa med pa thams cad dag pa'i chos sgrib pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
49a4(rgyud 'bum): rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo/ / bde ba chen po rab grub dang // 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir// pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la// mchog cher khyod kyis bskyed pa
49a5(rgyud 'bum): mdzod/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos chos thams cad la gzigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas/ bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i pad+ma zhes bya ba
49a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di gsungs so/ / oM hrI baM hoH'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas pad+ma'i mdog gi mdangs can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od lnga bu pad+ma'i mdangs la sogs pa
49a7(rgyud 'bum): yongs su 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba dang / ral pa'i cod pan dang / na bza' dmar po 'chang ba dang / pad+ma chen po'i sems dpa' rnams byung nas dkyil 'khor
49b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das zhal rab tu bzhad pas rdo rje g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin cing de bzhin du rdo rje bsnyems pas skyil mo krung gis bzhugs so// de nas dkyil/
49b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad thig gdab bo// rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gzhag/ pad+ma'i mtshan ma'i tshogs rnams bri// de nas
49b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje pad+mas zhugs la mdzub mo'i lcags kyu gnyis kyis dgug par bya'o/ / oM hri ba~M hoHoM hriHma hA su kha badz+ra a lo ke shwa rA ya me/ A A he pra be shid+ha d+hi me b+ha ba sid+d+hi m+ba ra mu drA pa
49b4(rgyud 'bum): de dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon te mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// snang ba'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro// cho ga rgyas pa
49b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / sgrub pa dang / dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin no// mi bsgrubs kyang lan cig bzlas pas las thams cad byed do// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba la nI pad+ma chen
49b6(rgyud 'bum): bos so/ / thams cad srung ba la ni pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyis so// thams cad rjes su chags pa la ni pad+ma la blta bas so// thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa la no pad+ma kha 'byed pas
49b7(rgyud 'bum): so/ zung med thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po 'dod chags kyis so// sus pa thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po'i dbang phyug gis so// rmi lam gdab pa la ni pad+ma chen po
50a1(rgyud 'bum): dmar pos so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi mchog thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i pad+ma rmongs pa med pas so// bde ba chen po pad+ma gsang ba las/ bde ba chen po pad+ma'i rigs
50a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rin po che'i
50a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo// bde ba chen po rab grub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// nor
50a4(rgyud 'bum): bu chen po'i rigs mchog ni/ / mgrin sbyor phyir ni bskyed par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig rab tu bzhag pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par
50a5(rgyud 'bum): gnon par mdzad nas/ bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so// oM li ti d+ha b+hadz+nyAT te traM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das dbang bskur ba'i
50a6(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen po'i rdo rje las nor bu rin po che rab tu phyung nas phyag g.yon pa la rab tu gnas so/ / nor bu rin po che dag pa de'ang mar gang rnyog pa med pa'i mdog can rdo rje rin po che rang gi 'od zer gyis dbang
50a7(rgyud 'bum): bskur ba can/ nor bu rin po che'i mda' la sogs pa'i mtshan ma yongs su bsdams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis zhugs so// de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// dkyi
50b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor thams cad thig gdab bya/ / rdo rje rin chen bdag po gzhag/ nor bu'i rigs ni chen po bri// rdo rje rin chen gyigs rgyas zhugs te/ de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags kyus dgug par
50b2(rgyud 'bum): / bya'o// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra bi b+hU te ra ya b+ha ga bAM daM A kaR+Sha ya gi ra baM sarba ta thA ga ta a graM sa tra sa ma be na nA ma b+he ra ma tra be traM pa Da Da swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i nor bu thams cad
50b3(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa byon pa yin no/ / spyi bo nas spu ldang ba'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la dbang bskur ba la ni zhes shes par bya'o// de nas slob ma rnams gzhug
50b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya ste cho ga rgyas pa thams cad de bzhin du bya'o/ / de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i las rnams lan cig bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur ro// dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje rin po che myu gus
50b5(rgyud 'bum): so/ / don thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mos so// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la ni rdo rje nor bu chen po'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgyas so// gter
50b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi sa 'og gi phyag rgyas so/ / rdo rje dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rdo rje chen po'i 'phreng bas so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni
50b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje chen po'i 'phreng bas so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur ba dam pa'i 'phreng bas so// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por dbang bskur ba thob pa lan
51a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog gi rdo rje rin chen gyi con pan gyi 'phreng bas so/ / bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba las/ bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi nor bu'i
51a2(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs thams cad bsdus pa'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i ye shes thob pas sems can thams cad gzhug pa'i 'khor lo rdo rje'i
51a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / thog ma tha ma med pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo// bde ba chen po rab grub pa// chags pa chen po
51a4(rgyud 'bum): rnam dag phyir/ / bde ba chen po don gyi phyir// 'gro rnams ci bder bzhugs su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad pas rnam par rgyal ba 'gro ba kun 'dul ba/ dam tshig thams//
51a5(rgyud 'bum): cad dang dngos grub thams cad stsol ba rdo rje 'chang chen po ston pa po/ sgrub pa po/ stobs dang pha rol gnon pa/ thogs pa med pa thams cad la rjes su ston pas don yod par grub pa dam tshig
51a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnon pa mdzad nas/ bde ba chen po dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i don yod pa mtshungs pa med pa'i thams cad kyi snying po 'di gsungs so//
51a7(rgyud 'bum): AHhUMHhrIHhUM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po der yang dag par gnas te/
51b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gcig nyid du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos sems can thams cad rjes su gzhug pa bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gsang ba gsungs pa/ dkyil
51b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad kun tu bri// dkyil 'khor chen po dang por ni// de yi dbus su brtag par bya// de yi dbus su rigs rnams kyis// dkyil 'khor chen po
51b3(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya/ / phyi yi mtshams kyi mtha' ma ru// phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams bri// sgo rnams kun tu 'jug par ni// rang gi phyag rgyar rab tu gnas// dkyil 'khor dam pa lnga sdud cing //
51b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje shugs kyis 'jug par bya// cho ga rgyas pa thams cad dang / dngos grub thams cad dang / las thams cad kyang de bzhin no// de nas lha la sogs pa dam tshig sems dpa' thams cad
51b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das las rang rang gi rjes su gnang ba mnos nas/ sems can thams cad la bde ba'i don yod pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'i zhabs la phyag byas nas rang rang gi gsang
51b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i snying po 'di rnams phul lo/ / de nas 'jig rten gsum pos gsol pa/ oM b+h+rUM trAM/ de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// phyi yi dkyil 'khor mchog
51b7(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / de yi dbus su dngos grub phyir// gzhu yi se ral kar ldan zhing // mda' dang tso shi ga thogs bri// sbrang rtsir byed dang rgyal bar byed// sgrub pa thams cad sgrub pa po// rtse gsum
52a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yis/ / pus mo lhung btsugs byas te// zhugs nas dam tshig bcings nas ni// yang dag dgug pa nyid du byas// oM b+hA ra b+hA ba swAhA/
52a2(rgyud 'bum): gcig bzlas pa yis// thams cad kun gyis yongs bskor ba// dngos grub kun ston 'ongs pa la// ji ltar rnyed pa'i gtor ma sbyin// slob dpon gyi ni 'jug pa yis// slob ma thams
52a3(rgyud 'bum): cad gzhug par bya/ / dam tshig mchog ni de nyid dang // gsang ba'i de nyid brjod par bya// gal te ma brtags ma smras dang // 'on te 'di skad bshad pa'i chos// 'dir ni kun tu ma spyad na/
52a4(rgyud 'bum): rtse gsum gyis ni khyod snying 'joms// snying stobs rdul dang mun pa ni// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// ming po gsum po 'di dag ste// nam yang brnyas par mi bya'o// gang zhig
52a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag la brnyas pas/ / yang dang yang du rab bzhugs nas// dkyil 'khor mchod pa byed pa de// dngos grub thams cad thob pa ni// phyag rgya dag kyang bstan byas nas// de yis gar gyi
52a6(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa bya/ / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po yis// rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// de nas gsang ba'i lha mo rnams kyis rang gi phyag rgya phul lo// hrIHhUM shrI b+h+yo/ dkyil 'khor
52a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bya ba ni/ / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// ka ba chen po bzhi dang bcas// gru chad bzhi yis rnam par mdzes// de yi dbus su de bzhin du// dkyil
52b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bzhi po bri bar bya/ / sgo ru mngon phyogs bzhi po na// snying po dang bcas gzhag par bya// dga' mo lag na mtshon cha thogs// dngos grub bya ba bsnyems dang bcas// de nas dang pa
52b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor du/ / de bzhin kun nas 'jug par bya// sring mo rang gi phyag rgya yis// go rims ji bzhin 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas 'jug pa la sogs kyis// cho ga bzhin du mchod
52b3(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ / gsang ba de nyid rab grub pas// dgug pa yang dag bya ba yin// oM kA li me nir de pro ta la/ me b+hA rak+Sha si pa ra s+thA ma ya he ba ho ba/ ba ra he bi d+ye s+thA ma ya swA hA/ sid+d+hi ke sid+d+hi s+thAm
52b4(rgyud 'bum): a he/ phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis so// hrIHhUM shrI b+h+yo/ de nas thams cad 'bab par 'gyur ro// babs nas gzhug par bya'o// de nas de bzhin phyag rgya bcings pa bslabs la mna'
52b5(rgyud 'bum): bsgrags nas gsang ba brjod par bya'o/ / sems can don la gang zhugs pa// gang du dkyil 'khor ston pa rnams// gal te gsang ba mi srung na// khyod kyis de dag gsang ba yin//
52b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // de bzhin zas dang skom dang ro// chos kyis brten pas bde ba dang // chos min pas ni sdug bsngal te// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis// ci 'dod par
52b7(rgyud 'bum): ni mchod par bya/ / ji snyed pa dang ci 'dod bzhin// yul rnams la ni brten par bya// de nas lha ma yin thams cad kyis rang gi snying po phul lo// oM sarba ma hA tsakra pra brda la dpram baM hUM u0f7f z
53a1(rgyud 'bum): ur bzhi pa yi dkyil 'khor ni/ / khru gang tsam du brkos byas nas// gyen du kha bltas sgo bri bar// bde mchog la sogs bri bar bya// 'khor lo rab tu zhugs byas la/
53a2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag dgug par dgug par bya// me tog la sogs gtor bar bya// sha la sogs pa'i gtor ma byas// oM biSh+Nu tsakra A na ya/ sha brtsi ma tsi ta traM su ra a d+hi paM he sho haM/ sar+b+ba mA yA g+h+r-i taM
53a3(rgyud 'bum): d+hapa me sid d+ha hA hA swA hA/ de nas yid kyi 'dod pa'i sgyum thams cad grub pa yin no// slob ma gzhug pa'ang de bzhin du bya'o// de nas klu rigs bzhis snying po phul lo// phuH/ de nas dkyil
53a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bri ba ni/ / zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sbrul gyi thig gis kun tu bri// klu yi gdengs ka'i btsun mos 'khyud// mtshams kyi char ni mjug rtse bdud// de yi dbus su sa 'dzin pa/
53a5(rgyud 'bum): klu yi rgyal po she Sha bri// shes rab can gyis klu chen gyi// rigs rnams thams cad bri bar bya// de nas 'dzin shugs kyis ni// khros shing drug pas 'jug par bya// dkyil 'khor der ni
53a6(rgyud 'bum): rab zhugs nas/ / gdengs ka'i phyag rgya dgug par bya// oM hrIHa nI la dza ba be ga pri thi b+hin+da d+ha ra She Sha Na/ A ya hU~MHphu sarba nA ga ku la a na ya hUM phu/ sa ma ya pra be she ya phu/ sar+b+ba sA d+hA ya
53a7(rgyud 'bum): phuHphuHphuHphuH/ de nas klu thams cad phu zhes bya ba zlos shing dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas babs par 'gyur zhing 'thob bo// de nas slob dpon gyis ri mo'i phyag rgyas dug med par bya'o// de nas
53b1(rgyud 'bum): brtsams te thams cad zos na'ang bdud rtsi bzhin du 'ju bar byed do/ / 'di rnams lhan cig tu gar byed pa dang / dug thams cad sreg pa dang / 'jig pa dang / za bar nus par 'gyur ro//
53b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas ci 'dod pa'i dam tshig sbyin par bya ste/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste// 'di dag 'jig rten dug gsum mo// gal te bden las 'das gyur na// 'chi ba'i 'jig rten 'di rtag
53b3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ gal te dngos grub thob 'dod na// glog brnyas par yang mi bya zhing // ser ba bzlog par mi bya'o// sbrul ni gang yang gsang mi bya// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal
53b4(rgyud 'bum): po las/ bde ba chen po'i dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas rdo rje chen po yi// ri rab ri yi rtse mo ni// rdo rje rin chen 'od gsal bas// dri med
53b5(rgyud 'bum): gzi brjid mdzes pa la/ / zur bzhi pa la sgro bzhi pa// sgo khyud kyis ni rnam par mdzes// kha khyer rnams la gnas pa'o// rdo rje lha mo tshogs kyi mchod// zla ba phyed la gnas pa yi//
53b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis mdzes// rlung gis bskyod pa'i dar bzangs kyis// ba dan dril bu'i sgra sgrogs pa// dra ba me long me tog gi/ 'phreng ba chen po btags pas brgyan// bde ba
53b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po rdo rje che/ / rdo rje kun gyi mngon 'dus byas// rdo rje sems dpa' gnas chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyis nges bsten pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa mchog/ rdo rje
54a1(rgyud 'bum): 'chang ba kun gyi gnas/ / bde ba chen po rdo rje che// nor bu chen po mchog ces bya// rdo rje chen po'i khang pa na// bde ba chen po bzhugs gnas yin// thog mtha' med
54a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems dpa' ni/ / rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// brtan phyir
54a3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpar bshad pa yin/ / mnyam par bzhag pas ting 'dzin te// nges pa'i phyir ni rdo rjer 'gyur// sems dpa' byin rlabs sbyor ba yis// slar yang rdo rjer sems dpar 'gyur//
54a4(rgyud 'bum): de nyid rtag pa bcom ldan 'das// byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'gro yin// rang sems so sor rtogs sogs na// sangs rgyas byang chub cho ga bzhin// bdud ni sangs rgyas rdo rje can// rdo rje
54a5(rgyud 'bum): 'chang chen de nyid yin/ / de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// de nyid rdo rje rigs chen po// de nyid pad+ma'i rigs dag pa// de nyid nor bu'i rigs dam pa// de nyid 'dod chags bral
54a6(rgyud 'bum): ba yis/ / 'dod dang thar pa nyid yin te// dus su srid gsum mchog gsum dang // 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum pa// mi g.yo thams cad mchog de nyid// brtan zhing snying
54a7(rgyud 'bum): po nor bu che/ / rgyu ba sems kyi 'du byed thabs// thams cad byed pa thams cad nyid// dang po'i sems dpa' sems dpa' che// byang chub sems dpa' bde rab stsol// sems dpa'
54b1(rgyud 'bum): skyil mo krung bcas nas/ / pad+ma'i lte bar zhugs pa yin// btsun mo'i tshogs bcas sna tshogs pa'i// rdo rje lha mo rnams kyis bskor// bde ba chen po rab grub dang // chags pa chen
54b2(rgyud 'bum): po rnam dag phyir/ / ma lus gdul bya'i don dang ni// dngos grub thams cad rab grub phyir// bdag nyid la sogs sems dpa' che// dngos grub thams cad rab grub phyir// dam tshig
54b3(rgyud 'bum): chen po dam tshig rnams/ / rgyal bas kyang ni srung bar mdzad// snyems bcas rdo rje gsor ba dang // rdo rje bsnyems bcas yang dag ldan// phyag rgya thams cad rnam dag dang // rdo rje sems
54b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' mchog grub phyir/ / bde ba chen po rdo rje che// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa la// ye shes phyag rgyar yang dag ldan// snying po chen por dam pa yin// gang gi bsod nams mi ldan dang //
54b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma lus zhugs// don yod thogs med nyid mchog gi/ dngos grub thams cad rnyed mi dka'// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// gsang ba'i mchog de dam tshig bstan// dngos
54b6(rgyud 'bum): grub thams cad sgrub pa yin/ / rtog pa thams cad myur 'grub byed// thog mtha' med par dang po 'byung // bsod nams thams cad cher mtho ba// gzi can rnams dang bde mchog dang // 'dod /
54b7(rgyud 'bum): chags chen po rnam dag phyir// rjes su chags pa sgom pa zhes// ji bzhin ye shes rab 'jug pa// nye ba'i snying po bcas snying po// bskal thob bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// hUM/ de nas
55a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ / sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa rnams// nye bar 'dzin pa mdzad nas ni// 'gro ba thams cad bskyed par mdzad// sna tshogs 'gro ba kun bskyed nas/
55a2(rgyud 'bum): / gtso bos dngos grub dris gyur pas// ji ltar skad cig gis 'di 'grub// sems dpa' chen po myur du spros// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po ni// thog mar dkyil 'khor byin rlabs ni// rdo rje kun mchog
55a3(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig ni/ / cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs nas ni// de nas phan chad sems can 'byung // ji bzhin las kyi rjes 'gro ba// rtag par sdig pa kun spyod dang // dran sems dang ni le lo can// de ni skyes po gsum
55a4(rgyud 'bum): gzigs nas/ / 'jig rten gtso bo rnams kyi gzigs// bcom ldan ji ltar 'on ni// byis pa dge ba kun tu bskyed// de rnams kyi ni tshig gsan nas// tshig ni 'di skad gsungs pa yin// rdo rje 'dzar kun
55a5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa pos/ / las kyi 'chi ba ltos gyur pa// de yi tshig de thos nas ni// sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// thugs rje chen pos 'di skad gsungs// bde ba chen po rab grub dang // shin tu
55a6(rgyud 'bum): chags pa rnam dag phyir/ / kun mchog cho ga rgyas pa yis// snying po 'di ni bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// dngos grub thams cad stsol ba yin// rtog pa kun gyi bde ba che// rdo rje gsang
55a7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang po mchog/ gzhan yang snying po bstan pa dang // dkyil 'khor la sogs cho ga che// sna tshogs phyi ma'i rgyud dang bcas// dngos grub thams cad rab grub byed// 'jig rten thams cad khams chen
55b1(rgyud 'bum): po/ / phra rab rdul rnams dang mnyam pa// snying po chen po 'di nyid kyis// grub pa'i bden pa dam par 'gyur// de nas bde gshegs de rnams ni// de yi tshig mchog gsan gyur nas// dang po'i dkyil
55b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor grub stsol ba/ / de tshe de la gsol ba btab// chags pa dang bral 'dul ba'i phyir// chags bral bstan par bya ba 'am// 'dod chags thams cad rnam dag phyir// nyid kyi thugs kyis cho ga gsungs//
55b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i glu chen po gsung zhing dkyil 'khor brtag par mdzad do// thams cad rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab tu byung ba yin// rab tu
55b4(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba 'gro ba kun gyi bde chen po/ / brtan mtho de ring bdag la myur 'grub mngon phyogs mdzod// ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor glu len cing brtags par mdzad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis/
55b5(rgyud 'bum): dang po'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// phyag na rdo rje thams cad du// rdo rje lha mo la sogs tshogs// ji ltar cho ga bzhin du ni// brgyan par byas te rab 'jug bya// g.yon du bu mo rdo rje 'dzin// bsdus te
55b6(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor bca' bar bya/ / rdo rje dang bcas bsnyems pa yi// phyag rgya mchog gis rang nyid 'jug/ dkyil 'khor de ru zhugs nas kyang // lan gsum du ni bskor bar bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i mdun 'dug
55b7(rgyud 'bum): / de nyid gsang ba'ang brjod par bya// hUM hUM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa dza/ hUM baM ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM a nu rak+te me b+ha ba su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha b+ha ga bAM/ a na di ni d+he na swA hA/ ma hA
56a1(rgyud 'bum): su kha badz+ra satwa sa ma ya gu h+ya sa ma sid+d+him+me pra lats+tsha oM ha ha ha ha a/ de nas rab tu dga' bas rdo rje lha mo dga' ba'i gtam bya'o// oM badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti sa ma ya ke maT/ badz+ra kI li kI li ho/ hUM s+tha
56a2(rgyud 'bum): ra badz+ra Ni baM d+ha hUM hUM tuSh+Ta badz+ra Ni hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du nye bar 'dug ste/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bdag la 'grub par mdzod cig ces bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba brjod par bya'o//
56a3(rgyud 'bum): myur du thams cad rjes chags par// ki li kau las thams cad nus// thams cad rjes su chags dran dang // rtag tu legs par mnyes gyur bdag/ oM ma hA su kha sid+d+ha badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM ho/ sid+d+ha sa
56a4(rgyud 'bum): ma ya s+t+wa~M sid+d+hi hUM/ de nas chen po'i rdo rje chus dbang bskur zhing 'thungs la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bzung ste/ bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yin zhes rang gi ming brjod pa la snga ma bzhin du gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa bya ste/
56a5(rgyud 'bum): ltar rnyed pa'i yul dang ldan pas slob ma dang lhan cig mchod pa byas nas byung bar bya'o// slob ma gzhug par bya zhing rang nyid kyang der zhugs pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// rdo rje
56a6(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon thams cad phyag rgya thams cad kyi bdag po dam tshig thams cad shes pa thams cad la tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs par nus pa/ dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi las byed
56a7(rgyud 'bum): ba/ rang nyid 'jug pa tsam nyid kyis slob dpon ma yin pa dang dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs par skad cig nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyi rlob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan
56b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das nyid nges par rang nyid rang gi dam tshig gi rdo rje slob dpon du gyur nas 'jug par mdzad do/ / las thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas par yang mdzad pa yin no// snying po 'di'i byin rlabs kyis dkyil 'khor
56b2(rgyud 'bum): du ma zhugs na'ang dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs pa dang / thams cad kyi slob dpon du 'gyur ro// lan cig bzlas pas mi song ba dang / mi tshugs pa dang / thams cad du sna tshogs pa'i yi ge rnams
56b3(rgyud 'bum): kyis mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / rig pa dang / shes pa yin no// rdo rje 'chang chen po dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad ma lus par mdzad nas/ dngos grub thams cad de la stsol pa
56b4(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / yongs su sbyang ba dang rten pa'i don du ma yin no// bgegs byed pa rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje 'chang chen shin tu brtan zhing shin tu
56b5(rgyud 'bum): dgyes pa rjes su chags pa shin tu rgyas pa dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / ye shes thams cad las thams cad gdon mi za ba'i grub pas myur du sgrub par mdzad pa yin
56b6(rgyud 'bum): no/ / 'on kyang gang gis bris sam/ 'drir bcug gam/ lan cig brjod pa 'am/ 'dzin pa des ma bsgrubs shing dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs na'ang tshe 'di nyid la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i mchog
56b7(rgyud 'bum): gi dngos grub thams cad grub pa yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don yod cing thogs pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po'i bdag po'i bdag dang / de bzhin gsheg
57a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyis kyang bar chad byed par mi nus so/ / thams cad rjes su chags pa nyid kyi phyir ro// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang rjes su chags pa las byung ba yin no// 'dod
57a2(rgyud 'bum): pa brtan pas rjes su chags te/ de mi 'dod pa ji ltar mchog gi bde ba chen po la sogs pa'i go 'phang thams cad du 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar thogs pa med pa'i bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen
57a3(rgyud 'bum): po'i bde ba chen pos gsungs so/ / grub na bde ba chen po ni// rdo rje chags pas skad cig ster// grub pa'i dam tshig 'di yin te// 'di ni kun gyis 'da' bar dka'// sdig pa chen po byed pa
57a4(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ / de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba// lan cig bzlas pas sdig sbyangs pas// mchog grub pas ni grub par 'gyur// rtog par gsungs pa 'am 'dod pa yis// gzugs brnyan rjes su
57a5(rgyud 'bum): dran bsgoms na/ / snying po yang na glegs bam du// thams cad nyid phyir bdag po grub// gang la gzugs brnyan med pa dang // glegs bam med par 'gyur na yang // yi ge hUM ni thams cad du// bris
57a6(rgyud 'bum): te bdag sgrub bsgrub par bya/ / zhes bya ba don yod pa'i thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub can rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so// de nas rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'o// las kun sgrub par 'dod na ni/
