57a7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor thams cad theg btab nas// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri bar bya// dang po'i rdo rjes zhugs nas ni// brjod par bya ste/ chags pa che las thogs pa che// thogs po che las bde ba che/
57b1(rgyud 'bum): bde ba che las rdo rje brtan// rdo rje las ni phyag rgyas 'byung // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya thams cad bshad pa ste// dam tshig 'da' bar
57b2(rgyud 'bum): dka' ba'o/ / phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang la sogs// yang dag bsdus par gyur nas no// mnyam pa'i 'jig rten grub par 'gyur// ji ltar rgyal ba'i phyag rgya
57b3(rgyud 'bum): yis/ bka' ni 'da' bar dka' ba ste// de bzhin rgyal ba kun gyis ni// phyag rgya 'da' bar nus pa min// sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'chang // de ltar bskal pa bye ba yis// thob min ji
57b4(rgyud 'bum): ltar phyag rgya mchog/ bsdus pa tshe 'di nyid la thob// ji ltar gdul ba'i 'jig rten ni// de bzhin dngos po gsungs pa yin// de yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste// dngos grub thams cad byed pa
57b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ de bzhin cho ga rgyas pa dang // dngos grub thams cad gdon mi za'o// de nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi// gsang ba'i dam tshig 'di yin te// sor mo thams cad kun sbyar nas/
57b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje thal mo zhes brjod do// sor mo nang du bcings pa las// rdo rje bsdams pa dag tu bshad// rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du ni// mdzub mo mthe bong yang dag sbyar// g.yas pa ya~M ni mthe bong ste/
57b7(rgyud 'bum): bcug sde btsir ba'i lcags kyu 'dzin// mda' lnga bsdus pa bcings pa nang du gnas// mthe bong bsnyems pa'i mtha' rdo rje// dang po'o bde ba dam pa ste// mtheb mdzub rtse sbyar dbus ma'i
58a1(rgyud 'bum): rtse/ / mig 'bras lhar sbyar 'dzin pa'o// dbus ma'i rdo rje'i 'og tu ni// mthe bong gis mnan btsir bar bya'o// rdo rje 'dren ma dang 'dren pa// srin lag mthe chung kha
58a2(rgyud 'bum): phye ba/ bskor nas pus mor gzhag pa ni// dang po rdo rje las byung ba'o// gyen du gtor dang shur du blugs// mthe bong sbyar nas bskor ba dang // rab tu brkyang zhing blugs pa dang // bskor zhing
58a3(rgyud 'bum): spyi bor gnas pa dang / / bskor nas snying khar gzhag pa dang // yongs su bskor zhing dgod pa'o// kha las gyen du 'byung ba dang // de bzhin gar gyis bskor ba dang // mdzub mo'i sor mo
58a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyi dang / / g.yon pa'i mdzub mo g.yas kyis gzung // mdzub mo'i mthe bong bcing ba dang // mthe bong mtha' ma'i nang du gzhag/ khu tshur gyi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas don yod cing
58a5(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa med pa 'di rnams kho na'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba mchog tu gsang ba bla na med cing bla ma'i las kyi tshogs sgrub par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pa'i bdag gis
58a6(rgyud 'bum): kyang gnon par mi nus so/ / de la bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i las rdo rje sen mo'i rtse mo mchu la sogs par gzhag pa dang / 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / rdo rje nor bu dang ji ltar 'dod pa'i
58a7(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kun tu byed pa rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rdo rje rin po che dang / mchog gi dngos grub bo// rdo rje 'dren mas ni mig
58b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bras kyi las so/ / g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i mig gis bltas pas thams cad rjes su chags pas so// mig 'bras tshur 'dren pas ni dgug pa'o// gzhug pas thams cad gzhug pa'o//
58b2(rgyud 'bum): btsar bas 'ching ba'o// btsun pa med pas dbang du bya ba'o// rdo rje ki li ki li las dbus ma la tsum pa na dang / 'khyud pa dang / rol pa dang / dbus ma dang mthe bo'i rtse mor bde bar rdeg
58b3(rgyud 'bum): pas mthong ba dang / rol pa dang / btsir ba rnams kyis thams cas la rol pa ste/ rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad du lha'i gzugs kyis bud med rnams 'byung ba yin no// ji srid 'di rnams
58b4(rgyud 'bum): dang rol cing rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo la'ang rol bar byed do/ / rdo rje chu srin mas btsir ba dang / gyen du bteg pa dang / myang ba dang / drung du 'gro ba dang / myur du za ba rnams kyis brtan
58b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chags pas bcing ba dang / thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang / chu'i nang du gnas pa dang / 'chag pa dang / thams cad za ba grub pa'o// rdo rje bskor bas g.yo zhing g.yo ba dang / lhod
58b6(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa dang / btsir ba dang / dbus ma phan tshun lhan cig dgug pa dang / mgyogs par dbus ma'i rdo rje dral ba rnams kyis khro ba thams cad 'bar ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / thams
58b7(rgyud 'bum): cad la rgyas btab pa dang / ltung ba dang / gsod pa rnams myur du 'grub bo// mthe bong rdo rje'i nang du zhugs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod na rdo rje 'chang chen pos kyang mchod par
59a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du lha'i bu mo rnams kyis mthe bong rdo rje'i nang du zhugs pa'i las rnams kyi lha'i bu mo thams cad kyang bkug nas rol pa la sogs pa'i las thams
59a2(rgyud 'bum): cad nye bar sbyar ba'o/ / rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i nang gi khu tshur gyi sa las rnams kyis yid kyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad do// de nas dngos grub thams cad kyi rgyud ni rdo rje sems
59a3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' phyag rgya chen pos dngos grub dang / dam tshig dang / ye shes dang / las kyi dngos grub grub pa'o// don yod pas grub pa myur du thams cad kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis
59a4(rgyud 'bum): brlabs pas yid kyis 'dod pa grub pa'o/ / rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sems mi g.yo bar byed pas las thams cad bsgrub par byas ni thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub kyi grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin
59a5(rgyud 'bum): du rang gi phyag mtshan rnams kyis dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/ / dang po nyin re lan cig tu// phyag rgya chen pos snying po bzla// rdo rje nye ba'i snying po yis// phyag rgya thams cad nges sbyar
59a6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ thams cad don yod par sgrub pa'o// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// gsang ba'i rtog pa mchog phyi ma// sgrub pa don yod dam tshig ni// snying pos skad cig dngos grub ster// rtsa rgyud phyo
59a7(rgyud 'bum): ma'i rgyud dang bcas/ / phyag rgya'i rgyud ni bla na med// dngos grub mchog ni de bzhin du// bla na med pa'i ye shes grub// de nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad rgyud
59b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya chen po'i rgyud ni/ bang pa g.yon du dgod bya ba// zhabs kyi pad+ma ci bder bri// rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas nas/
59b2(rgyud 'bum): sku ni drang por 'dzin pa bde// bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni// rdo rje bsnyems pa yang dag 'chang // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid 'gyur// 'dis
59b3(rgyud 'bum): ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ / sangs rgyas nyid dam sras nyid dam/ dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug nyid// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// ji bzhin phyag
59b4(rgyud 'bum): rgya'i rjes 'brangs nas/ / mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan pa yis// sems dpa' chen po rang nyid 'gyur// phyag rgya chen po'o// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rjer
59b5(rgyud 'bum): bshad do/ / rdo rje mda' la sogs pa'i bzhi po 'di las byung ngo // mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu'i phyi rol tu mngon par phyogs pa'o// mthe bos 'khyud pa'o// mthe bong gnyis kha
59b6(rgyud 'bum): phye la mdzub mo gnyis kyis dbus ma'i rtse mo 'dren cing srin lag dang mthe'u chung mnyam par sbyar la rtse mo so sor phye bas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan gyis sgreng ba'o/ / brla gnyis la bskor zhing gnas
59b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du mtshams rnams la rdo rje thal mos bskor bas so/ / sgo'i phyag rgya rnams ni rdo rje bsnyems pa'i khu tshur gyis so// bde chen mchog gi phyag rgya che// de bzhin dngos grub rab
60a1(rgyud 'bum): stsol ba/ / mda' sogs dam tshig sna tshogs pa'i// dngos grub chen po mchog ster ba'o// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya ni// ho bid hUM d+h+ri ka hUM/ de rnams kyang dngos grub thams/
60a2(rgyud 'bum): cad stsol ba'o// de nas las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje med pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya'o// g.yon pa'i rdo rje bsnyems pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur bstod pa'i tshul gyis snying khar bzung bar byas pa ste
60a3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu dga' ba bstan par byed cing dngos grub thams cad stsol ba'o/ / mda' gzhu gtod pa'i rdo rje mtshon cha ma'o// 'og tu 'khyud pa'o// rgyal mtshan gyen du bsgreng ba'o// bsnyems pa gnyi
60a4(rgyud 'bum): gtod pa'o/ / sgeg pa dang bcas mtha' la sogs pas bkrol bas glog 'gyur ba'i gar yongs su bskor bas me tog la sogs pa'i ka pu ti'i thal mo spyi bo nas phab/ rdo rje thal mo bkrol bas de
60a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du sgeg pa dang bcas pas mchod pa dor bar bya'o/ / rdo rje gar gyi nang gi mtshams kyi la'o// rdzogs pa 'am ni ma tshang ba// yang na ji ltar rnyed pa bzhin// me tog mchod la sogs ma yin//
60a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub mchog stsol thun mong yin// dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i sbyor mtshan yongs su bzung ba'o// 'di rnams kyang don yod pa'i las sgrub pa rnams so// rnams tshul gyi bdud rtsi'i chu bzla'o//
60a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa'i cho ga'i phyag rgya bshad pa ni// dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i 'jug pa'i phyag rgya gnyis pa ni/ g.yon
60b1(rgyud 'bum): mtheb mdzub mo'i skye gnas su/ / g.yas pa'i mthe bo'i lhag bcug la// btsir ba bde ba ster ba'o// mdzub mo lcags kyu bcings pa ste// dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'jug par bya// yang
60b2(rgyud 'bum): na sems dpa' gang la 'jug/ de der myur du 'grub par 'gyur// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje ma'o// rang gi khu tshur gyis rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i chu blangs na chu'i rgyun des dbang bskur te 'thung du bcug na
60b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ / dbang bskur ba thams cad kyis na tshod dar la bab pa dang / nad med pa dang / dngos grub thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'di la rims dang / gdon dang / dug
60b4(rgyud 'bum): dang sbyar dug dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / phyag rgya la sogs pas gnod pa byed par mi nus so// skyil mo krung gis ni gar dang mchod pa dbul bar bya'o// de nas mchod pa ni rdo rje gar gyis so//
60b5(rgyud 'bum): rdorje glu blangs pas rdo rje gar dbul ba ni 'khor lo sgyur ba'i gar gyis so// rdo rje khu tshur yongs su bzung ba rdo rje gtod pas rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs par bsgreng bar bya ste/ mthar sgeg mo dga'
60b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rdo rje gsang ba'i bzhad pa dang bcas pa'i zhal dang spyan g.yo bas phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang dgyes pas dga' ba thams cad la sogs pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba thams
60b7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis dngos grub stsol ba yin no/ / rdo rje bsdams pa btsir ba rang gi snying khar bde ba bkrol na dkyil 'khor bkrol ba la rdo rje sems dpa'i sgom pas re ga dang rdo rje yid kyis gyen du bteg
61a1(rgyud 'bum): la/ rim pa nang gi dkyil 'khor du zhugs na dam tshig nyams par mi 'gyur ro// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgom pas dkyil 'khor phyags na dam tshig nyams par yang mi 'gyur/
61a2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni/ bde ba chen po rdo rje spyi bo dang / dpral ba dang / snying khar bzhag pa phab ste/ phyogs thams cad du 'bar ba'i ra ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rdo rje khro bo'i
61a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen po rnams kyis kyang 'jug par mi nus so/ / snying khar sgom pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'o// gyen du kha lta bas lhung bar bya'o// rang gi gdong yongs su sbyangs nas gdong par
61a4(rgyud 'bum): bkrol bar bya'o/ / dbus ma'i rdo rje brtag par bya'o// dpung 'og gnyis su gzhag cing spring khar gzhag par bya'o// dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba mthong ba'o// skye gnas las dong
61a5(rgyud 'bum): tshe 'byin pa'o/ / spyi bor gzhag par bya'o// sa la reg par bya'o// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i rtags kyi lcags kyus so// rtse mo gtod pa'i skye gnas bkrol ba lag pa g.yon
61a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mthil nyed cing bsnun par bya'o/ / de btsir bar bya'o// mig btsum par bya'o// bskor zhing btsir nas khro bo'i lte bas blta bar bya'o// yongs su bskor nas kha'i mtha'
61a7(rgyud 'bum): mche ba bstan pa'i g.yas pa'i mdzub mos sdigs mdzub bo/ / mdzub mos blta bar bya'o// mthe bong btsir bar bya'o// yi ge mus phyag rgya bkrol ba'o// dang po'i mthe'u chung
61b1(rgyud 'bum): gis rdo rje bsnun par bya'o/ / de nyid rnam 'gyur ba'i gdong bas so// de nyid yongs su bskor nas dpral bar gyed du kha blta bas gnas pa'o// de nyid kyis nam mkha' la gdeg pa'o//
61b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yo zhing btsum pa'i mig gis phyag rgya bcings par dkrol ba'o// mthe'u chung gis nor bus reg pa bya'o// mdzub mo mnyam pos zhabs kyi sor mo rje bar bya ste/ bza' ba 'am yid kyis
61b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya'o/ / mdzub mos sbyin sreg byed pa'o// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje gdong par dgrol bar bya'o// sbyin sreg byed pa'o// mthe'u chung gnyis skye gnas la sbyar te phyag rgya
61b4(rgyud 'bum): bral bar bya'o/ / srin lag dang mtha' ma mnyam par sbyar sor mo ba dan gyi tshul du bsgreng bar bya'o// rdo rje bsdams pas legs par byed pa mdzub mo'i mthe bong mnyam po bye ba dang
61b5(rgyud 'bum): bkug pa bskor nas dral bar bya'o/ / rdo rje bsdams rab tu brkyang ba'i mthil las reg par bya'o// dang po'i rdo rje sbyin bskyed pa'o// mdzub mos char bskyed par bya'o// mdzub mos
61b6(rgyud 'bum): bzlog par bya'o/ / rdo rje lta bas 'phrog par bya'o// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje bshad do// mdzub mo gcig gi nor bu'o// mthe'u chung rdo rje sngogs mdzub bo// mdzub mos sa 'og nas
61b7(rgyud 'bum): chu mig bkug la bstan pa'o/ / bde ba chen po rdo rje sa la bzung nas g.yo bar bya'o// mdzub mo gnyis kyis gdengs ka'i tshul bstan pa'o// mdzub mo bzhi'i 'od zer gyis
62a1(rgyud 'bum): stag bstan pa'o/ / mdzub mo rlung bskyed pa'o// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes mdzub mo me long dang / rol pa dang / nam mkha' rdo rje lta ba dang / steng du bskor bar bya'o//
62a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i mangs shing drung thams cad dang / nags dang / skyed mos tshal dang / 'bru thams cad la gzhag par bya'o// rnon pos klog par bya'o// bdag nyid kyis thams cad la drang bar
62a3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / phyi rol gyi dpung mdun du bskor bar bya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis glog 'gyur bas bskor bar bya'o// glog 'gru bas nam mkha' la bskor bar bya'o// g.yas pas g.yon pa
62a4(rgyud 'bum): la brdeg par bya'o/ / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis g.yo zhing g.yo ba med la gzhag par bya'o// mdzub mo mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni nor bu'o// mdzub mo'i rdo rje g.yon pa'i mthe bong gi pu gar
62a5(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa'i mdzub mo gzhug par bya'o/ / rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes steng du nam mkha' la bka' ba skyod pa dang / skye gnas g.yo ba dang / dbus ma'i rdo rje bskyod cing btsor ba'o// rdo rje yid
62a6(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba dang / rdo rje ki li ki li dang / rdo rje chu srin dang / rdo rje bsnyems ma ni bshad pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mos gsol ba 'debs par byed pas mdzub mo gnyis
62a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis rang gi mig bkag la yid kyis ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bsgom par bya'o/ / sbyin sreg byed pa'o// mdzub mos rang mig btsum par bya'o// sos gzung bar bya'o// btung
62b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / rtse mo bskyod cing spyir sreg bya'o// mthe bo'i 'og tu matu brgyad la sbyin par bya'o// rdo rje'i sku'i phyag rgya'i mchog ni mthe bong sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gi mdzub mo rdo rje ni rdo rje
62b2(rgyud 'bum): sku mchog go/ / dbus ma'i mnyam pa'i mgo lcogs kyis ngag 'byin pa'o// snying khar gzhag nas/ oM bu d+hi tsi t+ta/ At+pa ra yA mi zhes bya ba sgom mo// mthe bo'i rtags g.yon pa'i
62b3(rgyud 'bum): mthe bo'i bu gar gzhug pa'o/ / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis glog 'gyur ba lhar bskor bas rdo rje 'khor lo'o// rdo rje bsnams ma rdo rje dang bcas pa'o// yi ge hUM gis sdigs mdzub bo// rab tu
62b4(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba'i rdo rje gar gyi kha sbyor ro/ / rdo rje bsnyems ma bshad do// mthe'u chung gi zur gyis mdud pa'i rtse mo mnyam pa yongs su bskor/ 'og nas bteg pa mdzub mo mnyam pa'i rtse mo dang
62b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gzhag na rdo rje mdzod spu'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o// rdo rje gar gyi bshad pa yin no// mdzub mo phyir phyogs pa
62b6(rgyud 'bum): spang ba'i rdo rje snying khar badz+re he zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'o/ / de bzhin du snying khar rdo rje sgom zhing ma hA sa ha haM zhes bya'o// ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis ta thA ga ta a haM/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
62b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen po bshad do/ / de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis bcing ba ni/ mdzub mo rdo rje bsdams pa bcing // mdzub mo bkug pa gnyis kyis brgyan// mtha' ma gnyis kyi nang du ni// mthe bong
63a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyi kha sbyar na/ / dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog/ khu tshur dngos grub mchog kun stsol// rdo rje khu tshur rab tu brtags// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
63a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud cho ga rgyas pa ni phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi ni/ ta thA ga to hUM zhes bya bas bcing bar bya'o// dam tshig cho ga mchog ni mthe bong mthe'u chung mnyam pa'o// rdo rje sna tshogs rdo rje'o//
63a3(rgyud 'bum): mda' la sogs pa'i de bzhin no// las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin du bcing ba'o// lcags kyu ma bzhin no// khu tshur gyi khyad par
63a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur mthe bong gnyis la gnas pa dam tshig gi khu tshur te/ de gnyis su byas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis dang dkyil
63a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lngas phyag 'tshal zhing 'jug par bya'o/ / 'di dag kyang dngos grub thams cad stsol ba'o// de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje sku mchog gi spyi gtsug dang / mdzod spu dang /
63a6(rgyud 'bum): snying khar bzhag ste bskor zhing bskor bas khu tshur chos dang gtsug tor du gzung bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub bya ba dang sbyin pa'i
63a7(rgyud 'bum): tshul bya'o/ / g.yon pa snying khar bzung ste g.yas pa'i mdzub mo gcig gis sa la reg pa'o// g.yon pa'i khro bo mdzub mo g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi nang du mngon par phyogs pas/ de bzhin
63b1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur sangs rgyas nyid du myur du 'thob pa'o/ / rdo rje bsdams pa'i 'og tu bcings pas bstan pa'i skyil mo krung ngo // de nas rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas
63b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyud ni 'jug pa'i phyag rgya rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i dgug pa'i phyag rgya de nyid do/ / phyag rgya chen po rnams kyang de bzhin no// dam tshig ni 'og tu rdo rje bsdams pa'i sor mo thams cad
63b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba'i nang du mthe bong rjen rje khro bo ti ran hi ri ste/ rdo rje 'chang chen po sgrub par byed pa'o// gzhan dag kyang de bzhin no// chos kyi rnams ni de bzhin te/ las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni de bzhin
63b4(rgyud 'bum): no/ khu tshur gyi khyad par ro// rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo sdigs mdzub bo// dam tshig las byung ba de bzhin no// de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni rdo rje hUM mdzad las byung ba'o// lag pa
63b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i mthe'u chung gdu bur bcings pa'i sngags mdzub ni/ rdo rje hUM mdzad de g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa'o// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo'i rdo rje sdigs mdzub bo// sna'i dbugs dang yi ge
63b6(rgyud 'bum): hUM gis so/ / khros pa yi ge a sbyar bar bya'o// ha har dgod pa bzhad par bya'o// snying khar rdo rje bsgoms pas rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po'o// de nas pad+ma'i rig kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud
63b7(rgyud 'bum): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug la de'i snying khar gzhag pa ni rdo rje pad+ma'o/ / phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni de bzhin no// dam tshig go/
64a1(rgyud 'bum): khyad par dang khu tshur gyi khyad par ro// kha 'bus pa'i thal mo las mthe bong dang mthe'u chung kha phye bas 'dab ma bzhi pa'i pad+ma chen po'o// thams cad bcing ba ni ji lta ba
64a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin no/ / khu tshur gyi khyad par ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bong ma nyams par brkyang la dbus ma gnyis phyi rol tu gshebs pa dang bcas pa gzhag pa ste/ de gnyis
64a3(rgyud 'bum): su byas pa pad+ma'i khu tshur ro/ / de las las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni pad+ma chen po'i bshad pa'o// de nyid spyi bo la'o// de nyid rdo rje lta bas blta bar bya'o// de nyid sor mo thams cad kha phye bas so//
64a4(rgyud 'bum): de nyid rdo rje gnyis gnyis kyi mig go// de nyid legs par byed pa'o// de nyid dpral bar byas nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nyid g.yon pa'i skye gnas su mthe bo'i rtags bcug pa'o//
64a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni rdo rje thal mo rab tu brkyang zhing mthe bong mnyam po la mdzub mo bkug pa bzhag ste/ dpral ba'i mdzod spu'i phyogs su bzhag na dbang bskur
64a6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad gsol ba'o/ / phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba de bzhin no// dam tshig gi rdo rje'i bsdams pa ni mdzub mo bkug pa'i sor mo mnyam pa'i nor bu mthe bong rdo rjes
64a7(rgyud 'bum): bkab pa rdo rje nor bu'o/ / gzhan rnams ni de las byung ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i khu tshur ro// de gnyis su byas rin po che'i khu tshur ro// de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni rdo rje rin po che bsgreng ba
64b1(rgyud 'bum): / bsgrub par bya ba'i myu gu'o// kha sbyar nas phrin lag dang mthe'u chung mnyam po kha phye bas mchog gi dar dbyangs 'dzin pa'o// dbus ma'i nor bu'o// mthe'u chung gi D+h+we no'o// 'og tu
64b2(rgyud 'bum): gtor ba'o/ / rdo rje bsdams pa las ni badzub mo mo rang bu'i bzung ba'i 'greng ba'o// rdo rje rin po che'i gsum bdun dang logs gnyis su bcing bar bya'o// rdo rje rin po che'i mdzad snga
64b3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su gzhag ste mdzub mo'i rtse mos steng du 'dud pa dar dpyangs kyi tshul du bya'o/ / mthe bong gnyis brtan pa'i skyil mo krung byas la mdzub mo gnyis bkug nas mnyam pa'i kha 'bus
64b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mchog gi lus can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog go/ des spyi bo nas brtsams te/ mdun dang / g.yas dang / rgyab dang / g.yon du bya ba byas nas/ de bzhin
64b5(rgyud 'bum): du mdun dang / rgya ba dang / logs gnyis su sgeg pa dang bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa bkrol ba byas nas/ 'phreng ba bcings pa'i mdud pa bya zhing dar dpyangs kyi tshul du bya ste/
64b6(rgyud 'bum): rdorje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba dang sred pa gsum gyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi mchog rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob pa yin no// rdo rje thams cad kyi rtogs pa thams cad ni gong du ji lta
64b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin no/ / de nas phyi'i phyag rgya shes par bya ba ni 'di yin to/ phyag rgya chen po ni g.yon par kham phor dang g.yas su mda' gtod pa'i phyag rgya'o// dam tshig gi 'jug pa ni mdzub mo
65a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / gung mo dang / srin lag mnyam par legs par sbyar la/ rtse gsum par byas la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu chud ni mgon po rnams kyi'o// ci nas/
65a2(rgyud 'bum): lhar bzung ba bzhin du lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// dam tshig ni gung mo dang srin log rdo rje bsdams pas mdzub mo dang / gung mo dang / mthe'u chung dang / srin lag mthe bo'i sor mo'i rtsa bar
65a3(rgyud 'bum): bsdus pa ni sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o/ / gal te dkyil 'khor brtag par mi nus na de'i tshe 'di bcings pas dkyil 'khor shin tu brtag par 'gyur te dngos grub kyang
65a4(rgyud 'bum): shin tu gsol ba yin no/ / lha mo rnams 'di nyid kyis spyan drangs par rang 'jug par bya'o// de nas sgyu ma'i 'khor lo ni g.yon pa'i steng du sor mo thams cad shin tu brkyang / dam
65a5(rgyud 'bum): tshig dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ste/ lha ma yin thams cad kyi sgyu ma thams cad don yod par sgrub pa'o// gdengs ka can gyi dbang po'i mthe bong gnyis pa rtse mo'i phyi rol tu phyogs pa'i
65a6(rgyud 'bum): sor mo brgyad kyis klu thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba'i dam tshig ste/ lto 'phye chen po'i lag pa'o// gal te 'da' bar byed na 'chi bar 'gyur
65a7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / gung mo dang srin lag bzhi pos mdud pa byas la mgu ba'i tshul gyis steng du sgreng ste bsdus nas mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mos bteg par byas na dug thams cad 'bar ba dang
65b1(rgyud 'bum): dug thams cad bcing ba dang / kun las bsdus te bteg pas dug thams cad 'jig pa'o// 'di nyid kyi dug thams cad za ba dang / 'pho bdug med par bya'o// phyi rol
65b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas rtog pa thams cad sgrub pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems
65b3(rgyud 'bum): dpas gsungs so/ / de la sku'i phyag rgya lnga ni phyag rgya chen po rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rigs la'o// dam tshig gi phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o// rdo rje hUM mdzad ni rdo rje'i rigs la'o//
65b4(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma chen po ni pad+ma'i rigs la'o// rdo rje nor bu chen po ni nor bu'i rigs la'o// de nas gsung gi phyag rgya lnga ni snyan pa'i glu'i yul thams cad kyi tshul rnams nus pa ji lta ba'i glu'i rgyan
65b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ni glu blangs te bzlas pa ni rdo rje sems pa'i rigs la rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i ngag go/ / lce dang mchu gnyis shin tu g.yo ba med cing ngos shin tu ma 'byar ba dbyangs dang bral ba'i
65b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ste rigs thams cad dgos pa'o/ / sprin gyi 'brug sgra yi ge hUM gi sgra phra mo dang ldan pa ni rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ngag rdo rje'i rigs so// ting nge 'dzin
65b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi ngag pad+ma'i rigs la ste thams cad dag pa'i pad+ma zhes bya'o/ / chos kyi ngag nor bu'i rigs la skye mchod pa'i nor bu'o// de nas thugs kyi phyag rgya lnga ste/ thams cad bsgrub par bya ba la ni
66a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos pos so/ / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o// bdag gam bdag gi mdun du gsad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo
66a2(rgyud 'bum): / rje'i rigs la'o// sbyang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni pad+ma'i rigs la'o// nam mkha' thams cad bsgom pas nor bu'i rigs la'o// de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya lnga ni rdo rje rtse mo lnga 'od zer gyi
66a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng bas rtse mo yongs su khyab pa dang bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la'o/ / rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od zer dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis de
66a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o/ / 'bar ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje rtse bzhi pa rdo rje khro bo khu tshur gyis rdo rje'i rigs la'o// pad+ma'i steng gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i pad+ma'i khu tshur gyis
66a5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i rigs la'o/ / rdo rje phyed pas rdo rje rin po che nor bu khu tshur gyis nor bu'i rigs la'o// de nas rigs thams cad rtogs pa'i gsang ba thogs pa med cing gdon mi za ba'i de kho na nyid
66a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis bden pa myur du mchog gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa sgrub pa thams cad kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod cing thogs pa med par myur ba mchog gi dngos grub can rdo rje sem
66a7(rgyud 'bum): dpas gsungs so/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig go// gsung gi phyag rgya ni snying po'o// thugs kyi phyag rgya ni nye ba'i snying po'o// rdo rje'i phyag
66b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya ni rdo rje bsnyems ma'o/ / de nas phra mo'i las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud don yod cing thogs pa med pa 'di yin te/ ma mchu'i spos so rnams kyis bzung nas rdo rje'i lha bas blta zhing thams cad rjes
66b2(rgyud 'bum): su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / rol pa dang / brtan par byed pa'i dngos grub skad cig gis so sor nyams su myong ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la'o// rdo rje phra mo'i byin gyis
66b3(rgyud 'bum): brlabs te/ dam tshig tsam du blta ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye she
66b4(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ngo / / khro gnyer dang bcas pa'i khro bos mi bzad pa'i lta ba bya ba shin tu ma 'gal bsdams nas thams cad
66b5(rgyud 'bum): lhung ba dang / dbab pa dang / rengs pa dang / nyal du bcug pa dang / rgyas btab pa dang / gsod pa dang / gzhan gyi dpung rmugs pa dang / thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub
66b6(rgyud 'bum): skad cig mas 'byung bar 'gyur ba/ khro bo'i rdo rje khu tshur rigs la'o// btsums pa med pas rdo rje blta bas mchu mnyam pa ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba dang / srung ba dang /
66b7(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pa'i dngos grub 'byung ba ni pad+ma'i rigs la'o// 'bar ba'i lta bas zhal rnam par bzhad pas dbang bskur ba thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /
67a1(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba sgrub pa ni/ nyin re mngon du lan cig tu// snying po rang nyid sgrub pa ste/
67a2(rgyud 'bum): rang gis bcings nas mdor bsdus pa// phyag rgya thams cad grub par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba grub pa ni/ snying po'i phyag rgya sngags rig pa'i// sgrub pa 'di ni rmad
67a3(rgyud 'bum): du byung / / ci nus ci 'dod bzlas pa yis// nye ba'i snying po gsang ba'o// don yod thogs med gsang ba dang // rang bzhin grub pa de bzhin du// bsod nams med pa rnams la yang //
67a4(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kun la grub par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa rnams la// snying po mchog 'di sbyin mi bya// gsang ba'am gsang rgyud dam pa ni// gal te dngos grub yid 'ong
67a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod/ / gang gi khyim du gnas gyur pa'i// phyag rgya sngags 'di dge ba ste// gzhan gyis mi thub mi sod cing // dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// sems can thams cad bde
67a6(rgyud 'bum): don dang / / sgrub pa thams cad sgrub pa'i phyir// sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rdo rje mchog 'dzin de la zhus// bde ba chen po rab bsgrub dang // chags pa chen po
67a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam dag phyir/ / rtogs pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyud// sems dpa' chen po bshad du gsol// rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la// 'dir ni rtog pa gang zhig brjod// snying po
67b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes ni gang bshad pa'i/ / ye shes rgyud ni ji ltar yin// dkyil 'khor zhes ni brjod pa ci// der 'jug yon tan ci dang ldan// rigs kyi 'khor lo'i khyad par dang // gzhan yang
67b2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa ji lta bu/ / rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' nyid// 'di yang ji ltar de nyid gang // thog ma mtha' ma med nyid dang // rab tu dga' ba ji ltar 'gyur// dang po snying po 'di yi
67b3(rgyud 'bum): yon/ de bzhin nyid ni gang zhig yin// hUM gi glu ni gang gis gsungs// 'di yi don ni ji ltar brjod// sems ni rdo rje nyid dang ni// de bzhin phyag rgya rdo rje nyid// sangs rgyas rnams
67b4(rgyud 'bum): ni 'byung ba dang / / rigs rnams kyang ni de bzhin du// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa dang // sangs rgyas bdud du ji ltar 'gyur// rtogs pa rnams kyang sgrub pa dang // dang po'i snying
67b5(rgyud 'bum): po'i de nyid dang / / snying po phyag rgya sngags rig pa'i// sgrub pa de bzhin dngos grub rnams// bsod nams med pas ji ltar 'grub// slob dpon nyid du ji ltar grub// me tog spos
67b6(rgyud 'bum): dang mar me dang / / dri rnams ci yin ji ltar 'gyur// mchod pa yang ni ji ltar bya// gsang ba'i mchod pa ji ltar yin// kun byed kun za sdig pa can// shin tu sdig can ji ltar grub//
67b7(rgyud 'bum): don yod thogs med dngos grub kyis// de rnams ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur// gsang ba de yang gang zhig yin// 'di nyid du ni gang gis grub// bde ba chen po rab grub dang // chags pa
68a1(rgyud 'bum): chen po rnam dag phyir/ / gsang ba'i de nyid gsang ba ni// bdag cag rnams la kun bshad gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs
68a2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas zhal rab tu bzhad de/ bzhad pa chen po'i dam tshig chen po thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas rtog
68a3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma 'di gsungs so/ / de la rnam par mi rtog pa khyab pa'i rgyud ni/ rnam rtog med pa'i ting 'dzin las// sems can don ni yongs su brtag/ des na brtag par
68a4(rgyud 'bum): bshad bya ste/ / rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro// de la bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ sa la yi ge'i gnas bris nas// bde ba chen po zhes brjod pa//
68a5(rgyud 'bum): de yi dam tshig rdo rje ste// snying po thams cad sgrub byed pa'o// de la dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ ji ltar gnas dang ji ltar dus// ji ltar 'jig rten ji lta bu// 'khor ni dgod par
68a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba ste/ / de lta bu yi dkyil 'khor bri// de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs pa'i rnam par smin pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' yi// 'khor bcas de tshe dkyil 'khor
68a7(rgyud 'bum): du/ zhugs pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba// de ltar bris pa'ang de dang 'dra// de nas rigs thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i khyad par gyi rgyud ni/ rdo rje 'khor lor brtan pa bzhin// lcags kyi 'khor
68b1(rgyud 'bum): lo dam pa ste/ / 'bar ba'i 'khor lo de bzhin du// pad+ma 'dab brgyad nor bu che// de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ dkyil 'khor brtag par byas nas ni// nang gi rim par
68b2(rgyud 'bum): zhugs bya ste/ / dkyil 'khor bdag la dzaHhUM baM// ho brang sid d+hu ba brjod bya// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid ni/ sangs rgyas la sogs 'gro kun gyis// thams cad bdag nyid bcom ldan
68b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ sems can 'byung phyir sems dpa' che// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu grags// de nas dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' mi/
68b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das de bzhin// de nas thog ma dang mtha' ma med pa'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ thog mtha' med pa
68b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ni/ / nam mkha' 'byung ba chen po'i gnas// nam mkha' skye ba skye med phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu dga' ba'i bshad pa'i rgyud ni// rab
68b6(rgyud 'bum): tu dga' phyir nyon mongs te/ / 'dod pa thams cad bde 'dod pa// de la bde ba rnam dag phyir// srid gsum snga rol bcom ldan 'byung // de nas dang po'o snying po'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'i
68b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyud ni/ chags pa kun las chags pa che// 'dod ldan thams cad sad par byed// 'dod chags 'bar ba dri za yi// snying po'i phyag rgya rdo rje'o// de nas yi ge hUM gi glu blang ba'i rgyud ni
69a1(rgyud 'bum): glu las chags pa dga' las 'dod/ / rab tu dga' las thams cad 'byung // thams cad 'byung bar grub pa'i phyir// bskal pa dang por bcom ldan gsungs// de nas
69a2(rgyud 'bum): yi ge hUM gis bzlas pa'i don gyi rgyu bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ myur du thams cad rjes chags pas// rjes su chags par byed mchog ni// snying po bzlas pa'i don yin no// de nas rdo rje sems rgyud ni//
69a3(rgyud 'bum): klu rnams ji ltar khro ba ni// bsdus nas kun tu 'jug pa na// rdo rje thogs ni brtan gyur pa// de bzhin rdo rje bsdus pa'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni/ thams cad
69a4(rgyud 'bum): de nyid sems dpa' ni/ / bdag gis bdag nyid la yang gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' dngos su ni// myur du thams cad du yang zhugs// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba shes pa'i
69a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyud ni/ 'dod chags pas ni dga' las bde// bde las sdig pa sdig pa sdug/ sdug las ting 'dzin shin tu brtan// rdo rje nyid las sangs rgyas 'byung // de nas de bzhin gshegs
69a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rigs la sogs pa 'byung ba'i rgyud ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs nyid dang // de nyid rdo rje rigs chen po// de nyid pad+ma'i rigs dag pa// de nyid nor bu'i rigs mchog bshad//
69a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud ni/ rang sems so sor rtog pa ni// byang chub sems ni yang dag 'byung // rdo rje nyid phyir sangs rgyas nyid// bdag nyid sangs rgyas rab tu sgom//
69b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa bdud nyid du shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rang sems nyid ni bdud nyid de// sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa yin// rang gi sems ni gdul ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas bdud nyid
69b2(rgyud 'bum): du ni 'gyur/ / de nas rtogs pa thams cad sgrub par shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rtog pa kun la grub bya gang // rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu yin// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// de dag thams cad bsgrub par
69b3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / de nas dang po'i snying po sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ bzlas pa'i don shes nus pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' rab sgrub ste// ji srid 'dod pa'i bzlas pa'i mchog/ dngos grub chen
69b4(rgyud 'bum): po'i bde ba ste/ / de nas snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang // phyag rgya sngags dang rig pa dang //
69b5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa'i don du sems dpa' che// bdag nyid dang ni bsgrub bya ste// de nas dngos grub shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub che// de bzhi de bzhin gshegs kun gyis//
69b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// las kun mchog gi dngos grub phyir// de nas bsod nams med pa rnams kyis grub par shes pa'i rgyud ni/ ci 'dod 'khor lo bris nas ni/
69b7(rgyud 'bum): ci yang rung ba'ang thal bas kyang // sems dpa' chen po bzhag byas nas// nyin zhag bzhi ni bsgrub par bya// de nas slob dpon nyid kyi dngos grub shes pa'i rgyud ni/ bde ba chen
70a1(rgyud 'bum): po rdo rje yi/ / gsang mchog dam tshig grong khyer ro// ji bzhin rang nyid rab zhugs te// bdud rtsi chu yi dbang bskur bya// de nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa
70a2(rgyud 'bum): 'bul ba'i shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje can la mchod pa kun// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dkar// rdo rje bdag nyid nag po ste// dmar po pad+ma nor bu ser// de nas 'bul
70a3(rgyud 'bum): bshes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdzogs pa 'am ni ma tshang ba// yang ni ji ltar rnyed pa ni// rdo rje gar sogs mchod pa yi// rtag tu thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas bdud kyi mchod
70a4(rgyud 'bum): pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ drug ldan la sogs snyan pa'i glu// glu ni thams cad ci 'dod pas// rdo rje 'byed pa la sogs 'grol// mchod pa dag ni rab tu bya// de nas gsang ba'i
70a5(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje gar bcas mchod pa ni// go rims ji lta ba bzhin du// bzlas pa'i don gyis ma brjod kyang // mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur//
70a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas sdig pa chen po byed pa'ang grub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ dkyil 'khor la ni ma zhugs kyang // tshul khrims 'chal pa la sogs pa// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni// sdig
70a7(rgyud 'bum): pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/ / de nas dngos grub mi 'thob pa'i rgyu shes pa'i rgyud ni/ chags pa smad par mi bya ste// rnam dag de bzhin bde ba sbyar// bcom ldan 'das kyang chags
70b1(rgyud 'bum): pa che/ / 'di ma dag pas 'grub mi 'gyur// de nas mchog gi dngos grub shes pa'i rgyud ni/ ji bzhin yul dang ldan gyur nas// mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par bya// rtog pa kun
70b2(rgyud 'bum): las rnal 'byor 'di/ / tshe 'di nyid la sgrub par byed// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i rtogs pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rdo rje rin po che chen po las/ rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas
70b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das rtog pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje rin po che/ de bzhin
70b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho ga gzigs pa'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug gi rdo rje'i pad+ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i mdzad pas 'phrin las dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rdo rje
70b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la khyab pa/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i rdo rje'i khams brtan pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par chos kyi dbyings spro ba thams cad khyab
70b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo mngon par mkhyen pa mdzad nas/ dang po'i snying po'i gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// ji srid
70b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba'i gnas la zhugs/ / de srid sems can gdon par mdzad// mya ngan 'das bzhugs gzi brjid can// sems can don ni nus pa min// de phyir sems dpa' dam pa
71a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / 'khor ba'i srid du 'khor bar bzhugs// sems can don ni mngon par zhen// thams cad dag pa'i mchog chos can// de bzhin gshegs pas mi
71a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dul bas/ / sems can don mi mdzad pa de// 'dir ni rab grub dngos grub mchog/ dus kun tu ni thams cad du// rdo rje 'chang chen la sogs pa// 'di ltar bsod nams rnam smin
71a3(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / kun la mthong ba la sogs kyang // rang gis las kyis mdzad mi spyod// dkyil 'khor la ni ma zhugs kyang // srid pa 'di la myur 'grub 'gyur// shin tu mthong ba la sogs/
71a4(rgyud 'bum): kun// sems can thams cad rab stsal mdzad// kun nas dus kun thams cad la// dngos grub thams cad rab stsol 'gyur// rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen po// srid pa'i dbang phyug kun
71a5(rgyud 'bum): gyis so/ / de phyir bsgrub bya 'di bshad bya// dngos grub shin tu rtag pa'o// gang gis srid pa 'di nyid du// shin tu rtag pa'i dngos grub thob// lugs ma 'am ni brdung ma 'am//
71a6(rgyud 'bum): ri mo bris pa 'am 'dus byas pa'i// phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs ni// ji bzhin bshad par rab gzhug bya// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i dngos grub
71a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgya'i ye shes kyis slar yang phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so//
71b1(rgyud 'bum): nyin re snga rol dus ji bzhin// dang po'i rdo rje bde ba che// 'di ni rdeg pa thams cad la// phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdus pas// dam tshig yang dgra bcings nas grub// phyin sa ma bsgrubs
71b2(rgyud 'bum): kyang grub 'gyur/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba'i sngags sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa'am// gang dang der ni gnas
71b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / thams cad rjes chags rnal 'byor gyis// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyud 'di gsungs
71b4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / gsang ba'i gar mchod mchod pa 'am// yang na mchod pa tsa bde bar// byas te mgon po bsgrubs byas nas// mchog gi dngos grub myur du 'thob// de nas rang gi phyag rgyas
71b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ phyag rgya chen po mnyam bzhag ste// rang gi snying pos lan cig sgrub// brtan zhing shin tu dgyes kun chags// shin tu dgyes myur bdag po grub//
71b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas yi ge hUM gi glu blangs pa'i grub pa'i rgyud ni/ ri b+hi da sogs rgyan dang ldan// ci nus pa dang ci 'dod pa// dri za dang po blangs nas ni// yi ge hUM gis grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom
71b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das chags pa chen po dang po'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de kho na nyid chen po'i gsang ba'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i rgyud do// rtog pa thams cad kyi las kyi phyag rgya bshad
72a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang mtha' ma med pa'i 'phrin las kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// shin tu ring ba'i tshe 'phel ba ni bde ba chen
72a2(rgyud 'bum): po'i rdo rje'i chos so/ / shin tu gzhon pa'i na tshod 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i bcud kyis len gyis so// gzugs chen po dang gzi brjid chen po 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i
72a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i gzugs kyi gzi brjid kyis so/ / 'du byed chen po thams cad 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje 'du byed chen pos so// sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid thams cad srung ba
72a4(rgyud 'bum): ni bde ba chen po rdo rje srung bas so/ / phyogs thams cad dang / mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcings pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje bskor bas te/ thams cad rdo rje chen po'i ngo
72a5(rgyud 'bum): nyid khro bo'i rgyal po chen po rdo rjes kyang 'jug par mi nus shing mi phyed par 'gyur ro/ / srid pa thams cad srung ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pas so// bdag nyid kyi
72a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thams cad dam gzhan dag rdo rje byed pa ni bde ba chen po'i go chas so/ / 'thab mo thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan
72a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis so/ / 'thab mo srung ba ni bde ba chen po'i gzhan gyis mi thub pas so// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad bshig pa ni rdo rje bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'dzin pas so// gzhan gyi dpung
72b1(rgyud 'bum): nyams pa dang / ldang ba dang / lhung ba dang / gsod pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje glog bskor bas so// rims thams cad la sogs pa'i nad thams cad dang nang chen po zhi ba ni bde ba chen
72b2(rgyud 'bum): po rdo rje phrogs pas so/ / dug thams cad gzhig pa dang dug med par bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'phrog pas so// phyag rgya gdon thams cad las dgrol ba ni bde ba chen po'i
72b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po bskrad pas so/ / ma mo mkha' 'gro dang / gdon thams cad dgrol ba chen po dang / gzhom pa dang / snying gzhan dbyung ba dang / shi ba gso ba dang / tshe 'phel ba de
72b4(rgyud 'bum): shin tu srung ba rnams ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i lan gyis so/ / thams cad dbab pa dang / g.yo ba dang / 'ching ba dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / glu len du gzhug
72b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / snga ma 'byung ba so sor bstan pa dang / rmad du byung ba dang / cho 'phrul bstan pa dang / bde chen thams cad pa thams cad smrar gzhug pa dang / dgrol ba dang / srung ba dang /
72b6(rgyud 'bum): sos su bcug pa rnams ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbab pas so// rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad la yid kyis 'dod pa'i pra dbab pa thams cad grub pa ni bde ba chen po
72b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje pra dbab pas so/ / rang gi lus dang / ngag dang / yid rdo rjes mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / smra ba dang / ston pa'i shes pa grub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgom
73a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / thams cad las 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi bka' mthong ba'i yi ge sna tshogs pa 'am/ dngos po sna tshogs pa
73a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis rna ba'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje thams cad mkhyen pas so/ / glog dang / char dang / thog dbab pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / sprin gzhig pa ni
73a3(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen po'i rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas so/ / sa'i 'og thams cad las sngar ma byung ba'i 'bru la sogs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba dang / nye bar len pa dang / chu med pa'i gnas las
73a4(rgyud 'bum): chu'i dngos po 'byung ba dang / nye bar len pa dang / mun pa chen por snang ba chen po bskyed pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / rlung thams cad la bka' bsgo ba dang / nye bar len pa dang
73a5(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' thams cad las yid kyis 'dod pa'i dngos po thams cad mthong ba dang / nye bar len pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas so// thams cad gzhom
73a6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / rengs pa dang / dral ba dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / ltung ba dang / rmongs pa dang / bsad pa dang / phyir ldog pa ni bde
73a7(rgyud 'bum): ba chen po'i gdug pa 'i rdo rje'i brag rgyas so/ / thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / bkrol ba dang / dral ba dang /
73b1(rgyud 'bum): lhung ba dang / ltung ba bslang ba dang / 'dren pa dang / bran du byed pa dang / mngag gzhug bka' bsgo ba byed pa dang / thams cad tshur drang ba dang / par gtang ba dang / gsad pa dang / sbyar
73b2(rgyud 'bum): gso ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa'i sgrub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje thams cad sgrub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i thams cad sgrub pas so// rigs thams cad kyi mchog
73b3(rgyud 'bum): gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad dang / mchog gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / thams cad rjes su chags
73b4(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs pa'i bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad rab tu gzhug pa dang / mchod pa chen po thams cad la sogs pa'i las thams cad myur du grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i
73b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi dngos grub kyis so/ / de la bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi dang po'i mchog gi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni 'di yin te/ bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i ni rdo rje sems
73b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' tshe ster ba'o/ / 'di'i las kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba'o// dbus ma'i rdo rje btung bar byas/ rtse mo 'od zer byas nas gdong pa yongs su sbyangs te gdong par dgrol bar bya'o//
73b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag kun tu bskor nas snying khar dgrol bar bya'o// gtsug tor dang / phyogs thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor bskor ba'o// snying khar dang / yid kyis rgyab dang / phrag pa dang /
74a1(rgyud 'bum): spyi bo dang / dpral bar bzhag la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis 'phreng ba bcings la go cha byas te/ mdud pa byas nas rdo rje'i gnas rnams su slar yang 'phreng ba byas pas rgyab tu mdud
74a2(rgyud 'bum): pa bya ste dar dbyangs bya'o/ / snying khar dang / dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / spyi bor gzhag par bya'o// dbus ma'i dar mchog go// byab pa'i gyen du kha bltas pa'i dbugs pa dang 'jig
74a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gdong gis blta bas so/ / 'bar ba bzhi'i tshul gyis 'dor zhing khros pa'o// rang gi snying khar bcings te zhi ba'i lta bas rtse mo 'phrog par bya'o// blta bas 'phrog par bya'o// dbab par
74a4(rgyud 'bum): myur du dgrol bar bya'o/ / yongs su bskor nas dpral bar gzhag ste dbus ma'i rdo rje sor mo'i rtse mo gnyis bskyod par byas na ci la bzhin du las byed pa'i snying khar gzhag ste/ dbus ma rdo rje'i las
74a5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ 'di lta ste/ snying khar stod pa dang / bskyed pa dang / bcing ba dang / gar byed du bcug pa dang / mgrin pa bsal ba dang / rtse mo btsir ba dang / kha 'bus pa dang / mgrin pa bsal
74a6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / bcings pa myur du dgrol ba dang / srung ba dang / byab pa'i las so// snying kha kha sbyor ba skyod pa'o// nyin re bzhin snga rol du lan cig lus yongs su sbyang ba dang / mgrin pa
74a7(rgyud 'bum): bsal ba'i ngag dang / rnying khar gzhag pa dang / phyag rgya lta ba ste/ nyin re snga rol du lan cig dbang po thams cad kun tu bsor bar bya'o// dbus ma rdo rjes byed pa ni khro ba'i rdo rje'i lha
74b1(rgyud 'bum): bas so/ / dbus ma rdo rje las ni 'og nas 'byung ste/ nye bar longs spyod pa dang / thams cad la dgug par byed pa dang / dbab pa sbyin pa dang / 'bar ba'i me rtag byed pa dang / nye bar
74b2(rgyud 'bum): len pa dang / rlung gi tshul dang / nam mkhar bsgoms pa las dus mo'o// dbus ma'i rdo rje'i lus ni phyag rgyas gzhom pa dang / rtse mo gnyis snying khar btsir ba dang / sen mo drung
74b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / mig la reg pa dang / btsum pa dang / sen mo mnyam pos snying khar bteg pa dang / lhung ba dang / glod par byed pa dang / phan tshun rdeg pa dang / rang gi snying khar rang
74b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du gzhag pa'i las so/ / dbus ma'i rdo rje las ni mda' gtod pa dang / lcags sgrog gnyis kyis dgug pa dang / g.yon pa la g.yas pa bcug pa dang / rtse mo bskyod pa dang /
74b5(rgyud 'bum): gdu bur bcing ba dang / myur du dgrol ba dang / sor mo mnyam por myur du dral ba dang / lhung ba dang / 'og nas bteg pa dang / g.yon pa g.yas pas drang ba dang / las thams cad
74b6(rgyud 'bum): la sbyar bar bya ba dang / 'og nas bskyod cing gyen du drang ba dang / tshur 'dren pa dang / phar gtad pa dang / g.yon dang g.yas kyis drag por 'degs pa dang / rang gi snying khar rtse mo
74b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dren pa dang / las thams cad la nges par sbyong bar byed pa'i las dang / snying khar 'khor lo gzhug pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i 'phreng ba dang / dar dbyangs 'ching bar byed pa
75a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / snying khar las drangs te bde ba tshur 'dren pa thams cad yongs su sbyang ba dang / gar gyis blangs te spyi bor dgrol ba'i las so// bde ba chen po rab grub
75a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / / chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// don yod thogs med sna tshogs pa'i// phyag rgya'i rgyud ni rab tu bshad// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis// sangs rgyas sras bcas bdag nyid
75a3(rgyud 'bum): kun/ / sems can thams cad myur grub dang // don yod dngos grub kun stsol ba'o// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa// sdig pa'i las ni kun dang ldan// de dag kyang ni sgrub
75a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ / bcings pa tsam gyis sdig byang phyir// gang zhig le lo nyid kyis sam// brtson 'grus ldan pa yang tshang ba// dkyil 'khor med pa'i sems can gang // slob dpon
75a5(rgyud 'bum): nyid byin ma brlabs dang / / de dag grub mchog rdo rje che// rdo rje slob dpon nyid du 'gyur// don yod mchog dang sna tshogs pa'i// bcings pa tsam gyis myur grub byed// bsam
75a6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ / mchog gi dngos grub kun la 'jug/ dang po 'byung ba'i rdo rje mchog/ bde ba che la yang dag 'byung // dag cing shin tu grub pa dang // 'grol
75a7(rgyud 'bum): ba thams cad la yang ngo / / de nas phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud ni/ las 'dod thog mar phyag rgya ni// skal ba ji bzhin snying pos sgrub/ rang gi bdag nyid nges
75b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bya/ / bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ bde ba chen po'i thams cad kyi dam tshig don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas
75b2(rgyud 'bum): pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yongs su mthar thug pa med pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
75b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad las kyi sbyor ba/ rdo rje 'chang ba dang bcas pa rnams kyis bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di sems can gyi khams ma lus pa kun khyab
75b4(rgyud 'bum): cing spro ba dang / dngos grub thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa srid pa thams cad kyi rtse mo'i yongs su mthar ma thug pa'i gsung rab yongs su mthar thug pa'i don du/ thog ma dang mtha' ma med
75b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab pa yin no/ / rdo rje nam mkha' chen po yi// chos kyi dbyings ni spro ba mchog/ rdo rje nam mkha' chen po yi// chos dbyings spro ba'i
75b6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub ster/ / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad ni// rdo rje 'chang chen bcas pa dang // rdo rje 'chang gi theg pa ni// yongs su mthar thug nus pa min// e ma'o mngon zhen sems
75b7(rgyud 'bum): can dang / / le lo can dang las kun dang // thugs rje dam pa'i rdo rje khyod// byang chub sems ni bla na med// bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// rtog pa
76a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni mthar thug pa/ / rab tu sgrub phyir mthar thug brjod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas/
76a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ting nge 'dzin rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// bde ba chen po rab sgrub
76a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// thams cad dgongs grub don du ni// yongs su mthar thug byin brlabs pa'o// gang gis tshul mchog 'di ni nyan 'gyur dang // gang gi
76a4(rgyud 'bum): khyim na gsang ba thams cad gnas/ / bde chen mchog gi rdo rje mchog gsang ba'o// dngos grub tshe 'dir de dag rnams la brtan// brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul bar rang mi byed// sems
76a5(rgyud 'bum): can don du rgyal ba las dag phyir/ / rnam par sbyang bar mdzad pa 'di yin te// rtog pa 'di ni bgegs med bdud rnams med// dngos grub 'phel med min par byin gyis brlabs//
76a6(rgyud 'bum): bdud dang brtan med nyid ni bdag mi byed// brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul ba nga mi byed// rtog pa chen po'i mchog 'di gang grub pa// myur du dngos grub mchog phyir bdag brtan 'gyur//
76a7(rgyud 'bum): brtan zhing rab dgyes brtan pas rjes su chags// bde ba chen po byed cing shin tu rgyas// nga yi dang po snying po gang sgrub pa// de la nga ni rtag tu dngos grub ster// de nas de bzhin
76b1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po
76b2(rgyud 'bum): zhes mchog tu grub pa yongs su rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'di nyid sngar yang ston par mdzad cing
76b3(rgyud 'bum): zhal rab tu 'dzum pa dang / mchog dang po'i rdo rje bde ba chen po rdo rje bsnyems pas gsor nas rang gi thugs kar stod pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing mchog tu gsang zhing mchog tu grub pa don yod cing
76b4(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa med pa bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig 'di rtogs pa thams cad kyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / bdud thams cad 'dul bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbang gis ma
76b5(rgyud 'bum): grub pa rnams kyang mchog dam par grub par byed pa dang / mchog tu gsang ba thog ma dang mtha' ma med pa'i mtshon cha mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i chen po rgyud
76b6(rgyud 'bum): phyi ma gsungs pa/ de nas thog ma'i gnas nyams dga'// nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas// rin chen 'od 'bar rab tu gsal// dri ma med pa'i mdangs kyis brgyan// zur
76b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ / sgo khrud rnams kyis rab tu brgyan// kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor// rdo rje lha mo tshogs kyis mchod// zla ba phyed ni rab tu gnas// rdo rje rin chen
77a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bar byed pa/ / rlung gis bskyod pa'i rtse mo mchog/ dar 'phan dril bu sgra sgrogs pa// dra ba me long rtag me long // me tog chun po'i brgyan gyis bskor// bde
77a2(rgyud 'bum): ba chen po rdo rje che/ / rdo rje kun gyis legs sbyar ba// rdo rje sems dpa'i bzhugs gnas che// sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes brten pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas kyi mchog
77a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi gnas/ / bde ba chen po rdo rje che// rdo rje rin chen mchog ces bya// rdo rje 'chang chen bzhugs nas ni// bde ba chen po rnam par bzhugs// thog mtha' med pa'i
77a4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' ni/ / rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag gis bdag/ sems can kun gyis sems gang yin//
77a5(rgyud 'bum): brtan pa'i phyir ni dpa' zhes bya// brtan par bzhag pas ting 'dzin te// nges pa las ni rdo rjer gyur// sems dpa' byin rlabs sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid
77a6(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur/ / de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'thun pa// bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid// byang chub sems rgyas de nyid do// rdo rje drag po
77a7(rgyud 'bum): mthar byed nyid/ / phyag na rdo rje nyid kyang de// de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// de nyid rdo rje rigs chen mo// de nyid pad+ma'i rigs dag pa// de nyid nor bu'i rigs bzang
77b1(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / de nyid 'dod chags bral ba nyid// 'dod dang grol ba de nyid ni// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum ste// 'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa// mi g.yo
77b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mchog de nyid/ / brtan pa sra ba nor chen po// rgyu ba sems kyi 'dus byas pa// thams cad byed pa thams cad nyid// dang po'i sems dpa' sems dpa' che// byang
77b3(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' bde bar stsol/ / sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni// pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs pa dang // btsun mo'i tshogs bcas sna tshogs pa// rdo rje lha mos yongs su
77b4(rgyud 'bum): bskor/ / bde ba chen po grub don du// 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir// ma lus gdul bya'i don du ni// dngos grub thams cad rab grub phyir// dam tshig mchog ni ma lus pa//
77b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal bas kyang ni bsrung bar bya// bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor ba dang // rdo rje bsnyems pa'i tshul 'chang zhing // phyag rgya kun myur grub mngon du// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog grub
77b6(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ dngos grub kun gyi thabs chen po// bsod nams kun gyis cher mthong ba// ye shes phyag rgya yang dag ldan// snying po chen po dam yin te// gang gis bsod nams mi ltar
77b7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa// don yod thogs pa med mchog 'gyur// dngos grub thams cad rnyed dka' min// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig
78a1(rgyud 'bum): brtan/ / dngos po thams cad sgrub pa ster// rtags pa thams cad myur sgrub byed// thog mtha' med phyir dang por 'byung // mchog dang po zhes bya bar bshad//
78a2(rgyud 'bum): tshig kun gyi ni ci 'dod pa// chags pa kun gyi ci dga' bar// rjes su chags par bgyi 'o zhes// ji bzhin 'bab pa'i ye shes 'jug/ nye ba'i snying po bcas snying po// bskal
78a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang por bcom ldan gsungs/ / hUM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas pa// rdo rje 'dzin bcas sna tshogs pa// skad cig gis ni 'dus par 'dus//
78a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin gyis thog mar ni// yud kyi 'jig rten gsum po 'byung // ji ltar 'gro ba rab sgrub ces// bde gshegs rnams kyis dngos grub dris// de rnams kyis ni bka' gsan nas
78a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin rang grol ba ni/ / 'byin dang stsol ba ston pa po// byed pas tshig ni 'di skad gsol// chags bral gyis 'dul 'jig rten rnams// chags bral nyid kyis dag par 'gyur//
78a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// 'di ni ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur// de yi tshig de gsan nas ni// rgyal ba rang nyid kyis gsungs pa// byang chub sems de thog ma'i lha// khyod ni
78a7(rgyud 'bum): thabs chen nyid yin no/ / ji srid 'khor lo'i gnas su ni// mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe// de srid mtshungs med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// ji srid
78b1(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnam rtog pa/ / de srid byang chub srid pa che// byang chub sems can la phan phyir// rdo rje can gyis ci bder gyis// de nas thog ma dang dkyil 'khor// dang po dkyil 'khor byin gyis//
78b2(rgyud 'bum): brlab// rdo rje kun gyi dam tshig mchog/ ji bzhin cho gas sgrub pa nyid// de nas bcom ldan 'das de ni// bde ba chen po grub phyir dang // 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir// gtso bo mgon
78b3(rgyud 'bum): la gsol ba btab/ / bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba ni// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// snying po 'di ni rtog pa mchog/ bde chen myur du grub pa'o// de rnams kyi ni bka' gsan nas//
78b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal to// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// bde ba chen po rdo rje
78b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ gsang ba dam pa zhes bshad do// thog mar dam tshig gsum thob pa'i// rdo rje slob dpon rang phyag rgyas// 'khor lo kun gyi cho ga la// rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang bya// rtog
78b6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad yang dag 'bebs/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed yin// dam tshig che gsum zhes bya ba'i// rgya 'di thams cad sgrub byed yin// dngos grub cho ga thams cad la//
78b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dril bu rab bskul ba// cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang // 'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// mchog gi dang po mtha' yas mchog
79a1(rgyud 'bum): bla na med cing mnyam med pa/ / nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas// mchog ste yi ge dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyang byas la// de yi dbus su cho ga bzhin/
79a2(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub byin rlabs cho ga yis// dkyil 'khor de ni grub par bya// glu dang rol mo'i cho ga dang // me tog spos sogs mchod pa yi// ci rnyed pa dong tso 'dod par// mchog dang por ni brta
79a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / mchog gi dang por mtha' yas mchog/ bla na med cing dpe med pa// nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas// grong khyer dag ni mi 'gyur mchog/ thog ma med mchog brtag pa'i phyir//
79a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang rab tu bzhugs// kun mchog mnyam pa nyid rten pas// lhag dang ma tshang med kun gang // mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha' ni// 'di ni dbu mar rnam brtag pas/
79a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis// de yi dbu mar rnam dag nyid// de yi dbus su pad+ma'i gzugs// yu bar bcas pa rab tu gzhag/ sna tshogs pad+mas yang dag khebs// thams cad da
79a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gdan de yin/ / de nas srad bu nyis 'gyur du// byas pa'i thig ni gdab bya ste// nam mkha' kun gyi tshang yi phyir// gdul bya'i blo ni mtha' yas pas// tshad ni tshad med pa yin no//
79a7(rgyud 'bum): mi mnyam med pas zur bzhi pa// dran dang dbang po'i sgo bzhi ste// bsam gtan rnams kyi rta babs bzhi// ting 'dzin khams su bshad pa yin// khyams la rten pa'i rdo rje'i bdag
79b1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs rnams lha mos mchod pa'o/ / rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra ba ni// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa// gdul bas skyod pa sna tshogs mchog/ dam chos mchog ste kun tu 'gro//
79b2(rgyud 'bum): rlung gis skyod pa sna tshogs pa'i// ba dan rtser btags dril sgra sgrogs// me long ye shes rtag me tog/ byang chub yan lag me tog 'phreng // dra ba me long me tog che// me tog 'phreng ba'i
79b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyan gyis bskor/ / kun grub mi 'gyur bde ba ni// bde ba chen po zhes bshad do// bde ba chen po'i gzhal yas khang // dang po'i gnas de bri bar bya// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog/
79b4(rgyud 'bum): kun mchog de ni legs bris nas// thog ma mtha' ma med pa'i dbyings// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid du bsam// phyi yi dkyil 'khor ro// de yi nang gi 'khor lo ni// dkyil 'khor brgyad
79b5(rgyud 'bum): pa lta bu yin/ / 'di ni rnam thar brgyad po ste// dngos grub kun gyi bde ba ster// byang sems theg pa chen po yi// mdo sde'i 'khor lo rab bskor ba// rdo rje thig gis yongs
79b6(rgyud 'bum): bskor ba/ / rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri// de ni sna tshogs pad+ma cher// rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya// lugs ma'am yang na brkos pa 'am// byas pa'am yang na bris pa ste//
79b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzum bcas zla ba'i mdog can la// dmar zhing sna tshogs 'od rapa rab// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang sogs dang // rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs pa// sems dpa'i skyil krung dag
80a1(rgyud 'bum): gis bzhugs/ / rdo rje bsnyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog/ su ra s+t+rai zhes brjod cing // rang snying pos kyang gzhag par bya// de yi phrogs ni thams cad du// tshon
80a2(rgyud 'bum): nam de bzhin bye ma yis/ / go rims dag ni ji bzhin du// rdo rje lha mo yang dag bris// rdo rje mchod bstod la brtson bya// rdo rje chags ma mdun du bri// lha mo rdo rje rol pa ni//
80a3(rgyud 'bum): can la rab tu 'khyud// rgyab tu rdo rje dran ma ni// rgyu sbyin rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bsgoms bri// de nas 'di rnams dgod pa
80a4(rgyud 'bum): byug d+hA ni/ dzA dzadz+ra d+hi sa ma ka~M ma rbatrUM/ oM badz+ra kI la~M kI li dz+haiM/ baM badz+rI Nis+pha ra rAT+Ta/ oM badz+ra kA me shar tshwa/ mtshams su rdo rje sems ma sogs// dus kyi mchod pa yang dag bri/
80a5(rgyud 'bum): sdong rtsi ma dang sbyin// skyon dang dgun no rjem// me tog bdug pA mAr mye re// d+hi spyi bor thal sgyur ba// rdo rje rgyal po'i lha mo ste// de nas phyag rdza rab bshad bya// oM ma d+hu badz+dza
80a6(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra mi u0f88u0f90 gu lu gu lu/ oM sha du 'jos oM/ oM badz+ra na ma nAdz+dza/ sgeg mo bzhad sa k+Sh+ma chen po// gar mdzad pa yi lha ma'i tshogs// rdo rje rol mo 'di dag ni/
80a7(rgyud 'bum): byi ni mtshams su bya// Ni ra ti badz+ra me g+ha bi la si ni/ traH/ her ting nr-i byeb babe ba/ sgo lo gnas ni thams cad du// gsol ka ba ni bzhi po ste// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa
80b1(rgyud 'bum): / dang // lcags sgrog de bzhin dril bu ma'i// badz+ra aM ku sha dzaHbadz+ra pA She hUM/ badz+ra shrI kha le baM/ badz+ra g+haN+Te ho// dam tshig mchog ni thams cad kyi// dgongs shing brtag pa nyid du
80b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rdo rje lha mo la sogs pa// dngos grub kun la 'byung bar 'gyuraro// gsol ka ba ni g.yogs mo yi// gtso mo dang / pho nya dang / bran mo dang / de nas sku mchog la sogs pa
80b3(rgyud 'bum): mngon bris yang dag bsgrub par bya/ / dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas su// dzaHhUM baM ho zhes brjod bya// sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni// rdo rje spyan gyi spyan sngar 'dug/
80b4(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen po rdo rje mchog/ bdag po lan cig yang dag dgug/ hUM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa/ ya hi shI g+h+ra~M/ ma hA su kha badz+ra a mo g+hA ya/ a nu pA lA yA/ pra bud+d+ha su ra ta traM a nu rak+to me b+ha
80b5(rgyud 'bum): bak+Sha to Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ su po Sha yo me b+ha wa/ b+ha ga b+haM na na da ni sa sat+te/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ a shaM ta ma tr-i Sha A be sha ya sa ma yer bad+d+ha/ ba shI ka re me/ yai mer mu drA bA daMHdza
80b6(rgyud 'bum): hUM baM ho/ 'di yis bcom ldan 'das rtag par// dkyil 'khor du ni rang nyid gshegs// bkug cing bcug la shin tu brtan// dbang du gyur na rab tu thub// ces bcom ldan 'das
80b7(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig chen pos gsungs so/ / rdo rje slob dpon rang lha ni// 'od zer kun tu ston la sogs// mtshan ma rnam pa mang po ni// ngo mtshar gyur pa mthong bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje mchod
81a1(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / rdo rje thal mo kha dbye dbul// bum pa gang dag ji snyed pa'i// me tog sogs kyis yang dag mchod// ba dan rtse mor dril btags pa// mtshams kyi char ni
81a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya/ / bum pa spos chus gang ba la// de nas rdo rje mchod yon ni// lcug ma la ni yongs su bzlas// de la bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi chur sgrub pa ni 'di yin te//
81a3(rgyud 'bum): hUM ma hA su kha badz+ra a mo b+ha sa ma yo da sa dad a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ sarba su kha sau ma na s+yA nu da da ku ru ku ru/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas la bdag nyid la rdo rjes dbang bskur
81a4(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / bsang gtor bya ba dang / 'thungs pas kyang sdug bsngal thams cad bsal ba dang / bde ba thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs
81a5(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas 'khor lor ma zhugs kyang // rang nyid thog mar byung zhugs shing // rdo rje kun gyi slob dpon che// rdo rje can gyis rang byin rlob// de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon// rang nyid khrus
81a6(rgyud 'bum): byas dris legs byugs/ / ci rnyed pa yi rgyan gyis brgyan// shin tu dmar ba'i gos bgo zhing // me tog 'phreng btags kha dris bsgo// rnam sgeg dga' ba'i rdo rje dang // rdo rje gar gyis
81a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / spyi bor me tog thal sbyar nas// gnas de mgon la phyag bya'o// zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de la ni// bskor ba dag ni lan gsum bya// de nas mdun du 'dug nas ni//
81b1(rgyud 'bum): de kho na nyid lan cig brjod// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// rdo rje chen po nor che ba// ye shes chen po las chen po// de dag rdo rje sems grub brjod// de nas me tog sil ma ni// mgon
81b2(rgyud 'bum): la gtor te cho ga bzhin/ / dang po Sha Da ba la sogs// bstod pa'i glu ru lan cig blangs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po de kho na nyid chen po ni 'di
81b3(rgyud 'bum): yin te/ dpal mchog dang po sems dpa' che// dga' ba chen po'i dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po'i kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ sems dang sems dpa'i
81b4(rgyud 'bum): ting 'dzin mchog/ rdo rje rdo rje mchog chen po// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/ bdud dang bdud ni rab 'joms pa// thams cad du ni byang chub che// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas skyes
81b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog skyes/ / rdo rje hUM mdzad yi ge hUM// 'jig rten dbang phyug nor rab gsal// 'dod chags chen po bde ba nyid// 'dod dang thar pa nor che ba// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum
81b6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ 'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa// brtan par rang byung gsal ba ste// rab phra sbom dang legs bsags pa// rgyu ba rab mchog thob mdzad pa// srid pa 'khor bar sbyong
81b7(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa/ / thog mtha' med cing thog mtha' can// mdangs ldan dang por thams cad gnas// snying po phyag rgya sbyor dam tshig/ de nyid bden pa mchog pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos
82a1(rgyud 'bum): grub che/ / chos dang las ni khams chen po// dam pa'i chos te las mchog bdag/ byang chub sems ni rab sbyong mdzad// rdo rje khro bo khro bo che// dus mtha' ltar bya bar 'dul
82a2(rgyud 'bum): ba po/ / 'dul mdzad chen po gdug pa'i mchog/ drag po drag nyid zad mdzad pa// thams cad dag pa pad+ma che// shes rab thabs te tshul chen po// 'dod chags dag pa ting 'dzin mchog/
82a3(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs chags pa dbang phyug che// nam mkha' mtha' yas brtag pa'i don// 'byung po thams cad gnas chen po// 'byor pa po ni thams cad gnas// 'byor pa dpal dang gtso bo rgyal//
82a4(rgyud 'bum): bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// phyag 'tshal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo// dad pas khyed la bdag rten bgyid// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub
82a5(rgyud 'bum): mdzod/ / gang zhig bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di// nyin re nang par rjod byed dam// chos kyi tshig gis lan cig brjod// dngos grub shin tu myur bar 'gyur// gal te 'dir grub mi 'dod na//
82a6(rgyud 'bum): dang por nyin re dus gsum du// bstod na sdig pa las nges grol// zhing dag pa ni grub par byed// rtag tu sdug bsngal thams cad sel// lan cig rab tu brjod pa yis// dngos grub
82a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad skal bzang byed/ / phun sum tshogs dpal 'phel bar byed// kun grub don yod yon tan can// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa'o// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pas ni// rab tu
82b1(rgyud 'bum): dga' bas mgon la mchod/ / rang gi phyag rgya lan cig ni// rang gi phyag rgyas bcings te grub// de nas lha yi chu dang ni// de bzhin sku mchog gis dbang bskur// rang gi snying po rjerje
82b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag/ snying po 'di ni blang bar bya// de la rdo rje sems dpar dbang bskur ba'i snying po 'di yin te/ hUM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa a b+hi She ke na hriHa b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ sArba badz+ra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM dr-i D+ho mo b+hA ba mi
82b3(rgyud 'bum): / d+ha nA ma ma ste b+ha ga bA na/ ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra su ra ha s+t+waM/ ma hA badz+ra satwa/ oM b+hur+m+ma ba swa/ de nas rdo rje dbang bskur ba// phyag na rdo rje mi 'dzin pa// rdo rje 'dzin chen slob dpon du// 'di nyid du
82b4(rgyud 'bum): ni rab grub 'gyur/ / de nas kyang ni ci 'dod par// cho ga'i dam pa bsgrubs nas ni// rdo rje gar gris mchod pa yis// legs par mchod la phyir phyung bya// de nas brtsams te rdo rje'i
82b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag/ rdo rje kun gyis gsang rab 'dzin// rdo rje thams cad 'dzin slob dpon// dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub che// phyag rgya kur bdag dang
82b6(rgyud 'bum): phug che/ / d+hIHthams cad mkhyen pa'i rdo rje che// las rnams thams cad nus la brtag/ mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pa// kun byed dngos grub thams cad ster// sems can kun gyi
82b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po che/ / tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs nus// thams cad rjes chags byed kun mchog/ kun rigs pa dang kun gyi bdag/ 'dod pa thams cad la rab sbyor// phun tshogs kun gyi
83a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug che/ / lha la sogs pa'i sems can kun// bsgo ba thams cad rtag tu byed// rdo rje sems dpa' rtag tu mthong // tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// de ni
83a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni 'dod par ldan/ / dga' zhing rang nyid de bdag por// rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur ba yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// bde ba chen po rdo rje slob dpon

83a4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / rdo rje mchod yon snying khar bskor// bcings nas bsam g.yos bzhin gyis ni// mgo bos yang dag phyag bya ba// dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed yin// dkyil 'khor du ni rab

83a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du ni dbang bskur bar// rdo rje gsang ba'i slob ma gzhug/ de nas ji bzhin brgyan nas ni// rdo rje slob dpon gyis rab gzhug/ slob ma'i tshogs rnams bcug nas ni/
83a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa yi dngos grub thob// de nas slob ma bcug nas ni// dga' chen po ni brjod par bya// rab dgyes rab bde bstan pa yi// rdo rje sems bdag 'di grub mdzod// de nas me tog 'phreng
83b1(rgyud 'bum): ba ni/ spyi bo nas ni myur du dor// gang du me tog babs gyur de// lhag pa'i lhar ni rab grub 'gyur// de nas lha yi chu yis ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa rang dbang bskur// rdo rje chen po rdo rje lnga/
83b2(rgyud 'bum): phyin la rdo rje bo d+hi brjod// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra/ badz+ra a b+hi She ke na s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ ma hA badz+ra d+hA ra/ he badz+ra nA ma sid+d+hi na maH/ gang la rdo rje ming gang zhig yin pa de la kye zhes bya ba'i sgra dang

83b4(rgyud 'bum): de nyid kyis ni dam tshig nyid// 'jug la sogs pa'i cho ga bshad// 'jig rten pa ni sna tshogs dang // de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa yang // thams cad rang gi ngo bo ni// rgyas
83b5(rgyud 'bum): par bsgrubs na rab tu grub/ / 'di la rab tu 'jug tsam gyis// mi tshugs pa dang mi ldog pa// nyid du rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur zhing // bde chen rab tu grub pa ster// de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob
83b6(rgyud 'bum): dpon/ / mna' ni mang du bsgrags nas kyang // de nyid chos dang dam tshig nI// rang nyid dang ni gzhan gyis brlab// de la 'di ni man 'a grub pa'i rdo rje chus dbang bskur nas brjod par bya'o// 'di
83b7(rgyud 'bum): ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ / dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig srung na 'grub par 'gyur// dngos grub rdo rje bdud rtsi chu// de nyid chos dang dam tshig ni// gal te dkyil 'khor
84a1(rgyud 'bum): ma mthong smra/ / kye 'o 'dug na gnas pa 'am// dad pa med pas bgad par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de kho na nyid dang dam tshig gi gsang ba'i cho ga rab tu sbyin pa yin te//
84a2(rgyud 'bum): thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ de kho na nyid mchog gi gsang ba'i
84a3(rgyud 'bum): lnga'i de kho na nyid chen por bshad par brjod par bya'o/ / bcom ldan de nyid chos kyi mchog bka' stsal par mdzad// srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas// rang bzhin
84a4(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog/ srid pa mchog ni byed pa yin// de la srid pa rnam par dag pa'i thabs rtogs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog dam tshig chen po bstan par bya ba ni 'di yin te/
84a5(rgyud 'bum): srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung // sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir// shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs// dam tshig rtag tu brten par bya// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni// ci 'dod par
84a6(rgyud 'bum): ni bsnyen bzhin du/ / rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas// bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya// de la rtog pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i mchog gi dam tshig chen po 'di brjod par bya ste/ ji srid
84a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ / mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe// de srid mtshungs med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig thabs// bsod
84b1(rgyud 'bum): nams byin rlabs sgrub byed pa/ / dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug mchog/ rgyun du sems can don byed pa'o// de ltar sems ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis// rang gi dam tshig mi bzad bde bskyed
84b2(rgyud 'bum): sten par gyis/ / de ni 'gro la myur du bde ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rab tu mtshungs shing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur// de nas khyed kyis bcud dang / kha zas dang / gnas pa
84b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / glu dang / rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams legs par stobs pas bdag nyid gang la sred pas kyang rdo rje slob dpon chen po mchod par bya'o// rdo rje slob dpon me tog sogs/
84b4(rgyud 'bum): ci 'dod par ni legs mchod cing // rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis// yang dag par ni mchod de byung // de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon// gar gyi mchod pas mchod nas ni// rdo rje thal
84b5(rgyud 'bum): mo sbyor ba yis/ / slob ma kun gyis rab tu mchod// ro dang kha zas gnas pa dang // glu dang rol mo ci 'dod pa// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin bdag/ yang dag mchod nas phyir byung bya//
84b6(rgyud 'bum): dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsang ba'o// de nas sgrub pa bshad bya ba// dngos grub shin tu rtag pa ste// gang gi srid pa'i 'di nyid la// dngos grub rtag pa
84b7(rgyud 'bum): thob byed pa'o/ / 'di yis byang chub sems dpa' ni// srid par gnas shing srid par sangs// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub// rtag tu sems can kun don byed// mi yis ji ltar
