85a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas ba pa ma 'gyu ra sgy
85a5(rgyud 'bum): u ma na ma/ dzi ma pa yang byung snu rgyu/ pa ma
85a6(rgyud 'bum): m ma gsu / hUM ni glur blangs pas/
85b1(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya// der rjes cha lugs ji bzhin du// mchog gi dang por rab dgyes pas// gzugs brnyan la sogs dang por ni// ci 'dod
85b2(rgyud 'bum): pabar ni rab tu sgrub/ / 'di yis 'dod pa kun dbang phyug/ 'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ong lding // dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub// kun mchog dang po'i dbang phyug yin// phun
85b3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kun bdag thams cad pa/ / 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// thams cad kun mdzad sna tshogs pa// rtag par kun tu 'dul ba po// dngos grub kun gyi bde ba mchog/ phyag rgya
85b4(rgyud 'bum): kun bdag dbang phyug yin/ / rdo rje kun gyi dngos grub che// thams cad mkhyen pa'i byung gnas che// mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pa// thams cad byed cing kun gyis gnas// khams
85b5(rgyud 'bum): gsum las rgyal sna tshogs pa/ / tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa// kun la rjes chags kun gyi mchog/ kun rigs dngos grub thams cad ster// rang gi rnam 'phrul rab ston
85b6(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste// dbang phyug chen pos dbang phyug che// gzugs dang tshe stobs rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa bzhin// 'gro ba rnams kyis
85b7(rgyud 'bum): mchod cing rjod/ / rang gi gnyen rnams kyis brten pa// rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen lhar// rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// gal te rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// sangs rgyas byang chub
86a1(rgyud 'bum): sems nyid 'dod/ / dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa nyid// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// phyi ma 'am ni 'jig rten pa'am// rtog pa kun bshad cho ga 'am// rang
86a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyis mdzad kyis rtag tu/ / dngos grub thams cad grub 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan rdo rje dngos grub kyis// dbang phyug bde ba chen po ni// rdo rje 'chang ba chen rgyal po// kun
86a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog sa yi dbang pos gsungs/ / de la ji ltar na rang gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ phyag rgya chen po mnyam bzhag la// rang gi snying po lan cig sgrub// dr-i D+ha su to Sh+ya san rak+ta/
86a4(rgyud 'bum): su bo sid+d+ha ta la gu/ de la ji ltar yi ge hUM// glu blang ba ya~M rgyud yin zhe na/ ri d+hi ta sogs kyis brgyan ldan// ci nus pa dang ci dga' dang // g+haN+Do la sogs glu blangs pa'i/
86a5(rgyud 'bum): yi ge hUM gis 'grub par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi// mchog de sgrub pa'i rgyud bshad de// gal te phyag rgya sgrub 'dod na// de bzhin yul dang ldan gyur pas// rang nyid
86a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni rgyu bcings la/ / yongs su mi skyo'i bar du bsgrub// de la ji ltar na dam tshig thams cad grub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ dam tshig phyag rgya bcings nas ni// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod la/
86a7(rgyud 'bum): rang gi snying khar rim bzhin du// phyag rgya'i mchog do bsgrub par bya// de nas las kyi phyag rgya yi// mchog sgrub pa ni rgyud du ni// rdo rje gar gyis mchod pa yis// yongs su mi skyo bas
86b1(rgyud 'bum): bsgrubs na/ / mchod pa kun sogs las rnams ni// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje 'chang chen nyid dang ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid dang // gzhan yang dngos grub
86b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ni/ / dam par myur du 'grub par 'gyur// rtog pa thams cad sgrub pa chen po don yod par grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// // de nas rtogs pa thams cad sgrub pa'i
86b3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kyi rgyud ni nyin re zhing dang por lan cig phyag rgya sgrub pa don yod pa dngos grub thogs pa med pa bshad par bya'o/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// thams cad rjes su mnyes
86b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje lta bas so// bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang / dngos grub thams
86b5(rgyud 'bum): cad mngon par 'phel bar bya ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rjes so/ / tshe dang / lang tsho dang / gzugs dang / gzi brjid chen po mngon par 'phel bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje bcud kyis
86b6(rgyud 'bum): len gyis so/ / dpal chen po dang / skal ba bzang po dang / grags pa dang / snyan pa 'phel bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje grub pas so// stobs chen po dang / ye shes dang /
86b7(rgyud 'bum): chos dang / las bsgrub par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje snying stobs che bas so// rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul dang / rmad du byung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston pa la ni dang
87a1(rgyud 'bum): po'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul pas so/ / thams cad du yi ge dang / gzugs kyis bden pa thams cad mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / smra ba dang / 'dri ba grub
87a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i bden pas so/ / dbang po thams cad kyis bden pa thams cad mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / smra ba dang / zil gyis gnon par bya ba la ni dang po'i
87a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje don yod pa'i bden pas so/ / sgyu ma thams cad dang / bde ba'i mchog dang / lung bsgo ba dang / lan thob pa grub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje rmad du byung bas so// gter thams cad dbyung
87a4(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / nor dbrog pa dang / rgyal srid thob pa dang / sa la nye bar longs spyod pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje dbang bskur bas so// yul thams cad dang / skye bo dang / grong khyer dang / nags dang /
87a5(rgyud 'bum): chu bor nye bar longs spyod sprul pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje grub pas so// thams cad las mngon ma byung ba'i lha yul dang / rin po che dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang / g.yog 'khor shin
87a6(rgyud 'bum): tu bzang po la sogs po yul de nye bar longs spyod pa la ni dang por rdo rje sprul pas so/ / skad cig gis sa gzhi thams cad 'bru la sogs pa smin par bskyed pa dang / chu'i phung po chen po
87a7(rgyud 'bum): srung ba dang / snang ba chen po bskyed pa dang / rlung thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug gis so// rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad bza' ba dang / btung ba dang /
87b1(rgyud 'bum): rang rtser gzhug pa dang / las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i thams cad dbang du byed pas so// dngos grub thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang
87b2(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje la sogs mthong ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje bsnyems pas so// rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad
87b3(rgyud 'bum): sprul cing ston pa mi snang ba dang / nam mkhar 'gro ba grub pa dang / shin tu phra ba dang / sbom pa dang / du mar ston pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje gzugs sna tshogs pas so// 'jig rten gsum
87b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi bdag por gyur pa thams cad dbab pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis so// lha thams cad dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang /
87b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang du bya ba dang / las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje lha'i bdag pos so// klu thams cad gdon pa dang / 'dul ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / las thams
87b6(rgyud 'bum): cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i rdo rjes so/ / gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba
87b7(rgyud 'bum): dang skrag par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje gdon 'dul bas so/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad brtag pa dang / 'jug pa dang / mchod pa dang / sgrub pa dang / las thams cad la nges
88a1(rgyud 'bum): par sbyar bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'khor los so/ / phyag rgya thams cad dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / brtan par bya ba sgrub pa la ni dang por
88a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje phyag rgyas grub pas so/ / dam tshig thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / sgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje dam tshig gi mchog gis so// las thams cad rab tu sgrub
88a3(rgyud 'bum): pa la rnam par mi 'jigs par bya ba dang / brtan par bya ba dang / grags pa chen po rab tu bsgrags pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje las kyis so// rdo rje thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa
88a4(rgyud 'bum): dang bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba sgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rjes so// sems dpa' chen po thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba sgrub pa la ni dang

88a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'dzin pas so zhe kyang gsungs so// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa 'am/ sdig pa thams cad byas pa 'am/
88a7(rgyud 'bum): rang gi snying po ma bsgrubs pa'am dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur/ ma bsgrubs par thams cad 'grub pa/ don yod par grub pa/ phyag rgya mchog tu grub pa'o// de nas dang
88b1(rgyud 'bum): po'i snying po ma bsgrubs pa'i thams cad don yod pa/ thogs pa med pa/ las thams cad kyi rgyu skad cig sgrub pa rjes su bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje thams cad kyi
88b2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs pa'i 'phron las rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ / don yod pa thogs pa med pa/ bdag kyang bder gshegs lhan cig tu// las kyi rab 'byams 'di dag ni// dngos
88b3(rgyud 'bum): grub skad cig gis sgrub byed/ / 'di lta ste/ thams cad shin tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su bya ba dang / tshe 'phel bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi
88b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i tshul gtsug gtor gyi phyag rgyas so/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad mtshams dang / phyogs dang / dam tshig dang / dngos grub bcing zhing srung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi so sor 'brang
88b5(rgyud 'bum): ba chen pos so/ / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / slar zlos pa dang / rtag pa can dang / khyab 'jug gi rigs thams cad gsal ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi nad med pas so// gdung
88b6(rgyud 'bum): ba thams cad dang / gnod byed dang / nad dang / mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'o// dug dang sbyar ba'i dug la sogs nye bar

89a1(rgyud 'bum): du gzhug pa dang / rab tu gdul ba dang / srung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gdon las thar pa'o// thams cad la bcing ba dang / thar pa dang / dral ba dang / lhung ba dang /

89a3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / shin tu srung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya'i lan gyis so// sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa dang / byur gzhig pa la
89a4(rgyud 'bum): ni rdo rje gar gyi zhi bas so/ / thams cad dbab pa dang / bskyod pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / thams cad bden par smrar gzhug pa dang / pra se na thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje
89a5(rgyud 'bum): gar gyi thams cad 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas so/ / thams cad rgyas gdab pa dang / gsad pa dang / lhung bar bya ba dang / bslang ba dang / slar gso ba la ni don yod grub pa'i rdo rje gar
89a6(rgyud 'bum): gyi mkha' 'gro ma chen mos so/ / thams cad rengs par bya ba dang / rmongs par bya ba dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / gsad pa dang / bza' bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gdug
89a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i srin pos so/ / gzhan gyi dpung thams cad skrag par bya ba dang / gzhig par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / lhung bar bya ba dang / gsad par bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gshed byed
89b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis so/ / khro bo thams cad bsal ba dang / bzhin ras dang bar bya ba dang / rtsod pa las rgyal ba dang / 'jigs pa las thar pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa la sogs pa'i rgyal ba
89b2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan gyis so/ / sprin thams cad yang dag par gzung zhing mi g.yo bar bya ba dang / char chen po dbab pa dang / rlung dang / char dang / glog
89b3(rgyud 'bum): dang ser ba bzlog pa dang / dro ba dang / grang ba bsal ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi dbang po'i rdo rjes so// gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya thams cad shin tu grub pa la ni
89b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gar gyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis so/ / rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / rtse ba dang / las thams cad la nges par
89b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi dngos grub thams cad kyis so/ / lha thams cad dbab pa dang / klu thams cad dbang du bya ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / ma mo thams cad
89b6(rgyud 'bum): las la nges par sbyar ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje glu'i mchog gis so/ / rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal drang ba dang / lha'i bu mo thams cad rab tu dbrog pa dang / lha dang lha ma yin
89b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi bud med thams cad rtse ba dang / 'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las rgyal ba dang / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug thams cad las rgyal ba dang / dbang phyug chen po thams cad dbrog pa
90a1(rgyud 'bum): la ni rdo rje gar gyi skyes bu byed pa chen pos so/ / mchod pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / thams cad rdo rjer bya ba dang / bdud la sogs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang /
90a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba dang / dngos grub kyi mchog la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad las kyi rgyu myur du grub par bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi don yod cing thog
90a3(rgyud 'bum): pa med pa'i myur ba'i las sna tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis so/ / de nas phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// nyin re dang po lan cig ni// phyag rgyas thams cad rab sgrub byed
90a4(rgyud 'bum): snying mchog lan cig bzlas nas ni/ / phyag rgya chen po rab grub bya// de yi rjes la nye snying po// las rnams kun la nges sbyar bas// don yod grub pas las rnams ni// kun la
90a5(rgyud 'bum): shin tu grub par 'gyur/ / phyag rgya thams cad rab byin rlob// phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni// dkyil 'khor dag kyang mthong ba la// ma bshad pa la'ang rab grub 'gyur// rtog 'dir
90a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig pa yod min te/ / 'khor lo med pa'i brgya byin la// gang phyir bdag la byin rlob pas// rang sras rgyu ni 'gyur ba yin// sdig pa chen po byed pa la'ang // bsam pa
90a7(rgyud 'bum): shes nas sbyin par bya/ / 'di dag bcings tsam nyid dag byed// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po bde ba chen po'i rdo rje
90b1(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa'i dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i rtog pa'o/ / // de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// 'byin pa byed pa bde ba che// bde chen can du bstan phyir dang // sems can thams
90b2(rgyud 'bum): cad rnam dag phyir/ / khams kun dang mnyam zad pa med// kun gyi bdag nyid la zhugs te// mnyam pa'i dngos grub mchog spros nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs phyung
90b3(rgyud 'bum): ngo / / mtha' yas pa yi zhing thams cad// 'jig rten kun gyi khams bcas pas// de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// til gyi gang bu bzhin myur gang // 'jig rten khams
90b4(rgyud 'bum): ni thams cad du/ / sems can kun mdun yang dag bzhugs// sems can thams cad ma dag pas// rung rig las kyis dag ma gyur// de tshe sems can khams rnams ni//
90b5(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin gyis ni gso dka' phyir// rang gi las ni sbyang don du// btang snyoms chen po mdzad pa yin// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// sems dpa' chen po bde ba che//
90b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub chen por thugs brtan pas// skad cig gis ni yang dag bskul// sems can la phan bsod nams tshog/ byang chub sems ni brtan pa dag/ sems can khams
90b7(rgyud 'bum): ni rgud 'gyur bas/ / shin tu btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ de nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi thabs//
91a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems mchog khyod smros shig/ de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// de tshe kun nas byin gyis brlabs// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yin/
91a2(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu khyon gyi// 'khor lo chen po gdod nas byung // de yis khams gsum gnas pa yis// sems can thams cad yang dag bsgrubs// sangs rgyas kun
91a3(rgyud 'bum): sogs dngos grub la/ / de tshe dag pa 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad la// 'dus nas gsol ba 'debs mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che// sangs
91a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kun mchog bshad du gsol/ / de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs la yang dag gnas// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje la// yang dag spros te 'di gsungs so//
91a5(rgyud 'bum): oM b+hU khaM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni// bdud bcom la sogs mdzad nas ni// byang chub snying por byin gyis brlabs// de nas ston pa
91a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin/ / dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog gsungs pa// sems can la ni bde don phyir// rtog pa kun gyi bde ba che// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste//
91a7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol mchog/ rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri// 'khor lo lte bar sangs rgyas nyid// 'dzum pa'i tshems ni mi snang ba// su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM// oM sid+d+hi mAM zhes
91b1(rgyud 'bum): brjod dgod/ / mdun du bdud las rnam par rgyal// mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas yang dag bri// g.yas su byang chub sems dpa' yi// nor chen pos ni dbang bskur ba// rgyab tu byang chub sems
91b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' dang / / mnyam du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// g.yon du log par rnams dregs pa// sdig pa bsdus par 'byin pa'o// de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po ni/ badz+ra satwa/ badz+ra rat+na/
91b3(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra d+harma/ badz+ra karma/ de nas phyag rgya rnams te/ satwa badz+ra/ badz+ra rat+ne/ badz+ra pad+me/ bi shwa badz+ra/ mtshams kyi char ni rdo rje dang // rin chen sdong bu nor bu bri'o// mtshams rnams su
91b4(rgyud 'bum): ni lha mo ste/ / lcags kyu la sogs sgo rnams su// de bzhin snga ma ji lta bar// 'khor lo de ni rtag par bya// mchod pa'i thal mo snying khar bcings// g.yon du de bzhin bskor bar bya//
91b5(rgyud 'bum): me tog dang bcas phyag rgya 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig rim// me tog bcas te snying khar bcing // bsam pa g.yos pas gdung par bya// mgon la mgo bos phyag byas
91b6(rgyud 'bum): la skor ba lan gsum byas nas ni/ / zhugs nas me tog dor bar bya// shin tu gsang ba yang dag dgug/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba dang / dbang du bya
91b7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / dgug pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po 'di yin te/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ A d+ya nuha ban na tAta/ de nas cho ga ji bzhin du// ston la me tog sil ma dor//
92a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas byang chub rab grub phyir// 'gro ba'i mgon la de nyid brjod// de yi kun nas sangs rgyas ni// thams cad 'dus pa nyid du 'gyur// thams cad mi
92a2(rgyud 'bum): dmigs sbyor ba yis/ / dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad// dkyil 'khor der zhugs pa la ni// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dga' ba la sogs mtshan ma
92a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ sna tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas de bzhin cho ga ni// rgyas pas slob ma mchog tu zhugs// mchod pa'i thal mos 'khor lo tshe// mchod nas slar ni dbyung bar/
92a4(rgyud 'bum): bya// sgrub pa byas nas dngos grub kyang // cho ga ji bzhin rab bshad bya// ras la bcom ldan bdud la sogs// rnam par rgyal du mnyes par bri// sgrub 'di lan cig tsam gyis ni//
92a5(rgyud 'bum): de'adra'i sgrub pas 'grub par 'gyur// sku gzugs sogs mdun yang dag par// ye shes khu tshur yongs gzung la// rdo rje'i tshig gi cho ga bzhin// bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya
92a6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / mdor na 'bum na rdzogs pa na// ci 'dod dngos grub thams cad dang // tshe mchog 'di la sangs rgyas nyid// thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
92a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ni/ phyag rgya gang rung gcig bcings nas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsgoms na// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub che// brtan par myur du thob
92b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / de nas dam tshig sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ snying khar rdo rje gzugs bzhag ste// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod la// bzlas brjod 'bum gyis bsgrubs nas ni// dngos grub
92b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad thob par 'gyur/ / de nas las kyi phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ bdud las rgyal ba'i mchog bcings te// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// mtshungs med sems
92b3(rgyud 'bum): can don byas la/ / las kyi phyag rgya rtag tu 'grub// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud

92b5(rgyud 'bum): lha ste/ nad thams cad dang / mya ngan dang / gnod pa dang / gnod byed dang / dug thams cad dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / gshed byed dang / g.yeng byed dang / ro langs dang /
92b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang / sman dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / sdig pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / rims dang / gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma
92b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / nye bar 'tshe ba dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par bshig pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa
93a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi sdug bsngal 'phrog par byed pas so/ / tshe dang / lang tsho dang / gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi byin chen po dang / mdangs dang / stobs dang /

93a3(rgyud 'bum): rtogs pa dang / stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / phung po dang / 'du byed dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs 'phel ba la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen pos

93a6(rgyud 'bum): dang las dang / sna tshogs pa'i bya ba dang / sems can gyi don dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i don dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs grub pa la ni de bzhin gshegs
93a7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad kyis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i cho ga spyod pa rdzogs par bya
93b1(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi don dang / 'pho ba dang / skye ba'i sa dang / gzhon nu'i rol pa ston pa dang / mngon par byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / byang chub
93b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang / byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mu stegs thams cad tshar gcod pa

93b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs las dmigs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul sgrub pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshog
93b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdo rjes so/ / ji ltar phyag rgya 'di dag gis// byang chub sems la mngon rten pa// de ltar byang chub spyod tshogs kyi// byang chub dam pa thob mi 'gyur// don yod bsod nams
93b7(rgyud 'bum): dam pa yis/ / las kyi rab 'byams sgrub byed pa// cho ga ma grub pa rnams grub// sangs rgyas chos ni rab ster byed// rnam pa kun tu dang ldan pa'i// sems can kun la sbyin
94a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa// skad cig gis ni sbyor bar byed// dpal mchog dang po rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
94a2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa'i rdo rje rtog pa rgyas pa'o/ / / de nas sna tshogs las chen po// khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin chen po// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog
94a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun la rjes ston mdzad/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bskyed cing // gang phyir nyes byas kyis gdug pa'i// rang gi rang sems spyod pa yis// zhi bas sems can kun gyi
94a4(rgyud 'bum): don/ gdul bar rab tu sgrub mi nus// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgrub bya ba'i// 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad yin// gang tshe bder gshegs sems can don// dam pa mdzad par mi
94a5(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa/ / de tshe nyid kyis dngos po kun// gtso bos rdo rje gsol ba btab// sems can thams cad 'dul mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab// u d+hiSh+Tha sa ma ya kro d+ha ni

95a1(rgyud 'bum): phyung nas kun tu 'gro ba rnams// thams cad du ni 'bar ba 'khrug/ rlung bskyod bskal pa'i me ltar bur// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba kun tu 'khrugs// 'jig rten kham/

98b6(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ba la ni khro bo'i gdan gyi phyag rgyas so/ / thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbab pa dang / pra se na sgrub pa dang / bden pa smra bar brjod pa dang / sgyu ma ston cing lan ston pa dang /
98b7(rgyud 'bum): dus tshogs kyi 'khor lo yongs su bzlog pa dang / dus ma yin par shing las me tog 'bras bu smin par byed par ston pa dang / 'bru thams cad yang dag par ston pa dang / rims dang
99a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba'i dug dang / gdon dang / dug dang / mkha' 'gro ma las thar par bya ba dang / g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad las thar par bya ba dang / gzhan gyi dpung gzhom pa dang /
99a2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs dang / mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / shin tu srung ba dang / yongs su skyob par bya ba dang / thar par bya ba dang / bslang ba dang / dbang du bya ba la ni khro bo chen po sna tshogs grub
99a3(rgyud 'bum): pas so/ / lha la sogs pa thams cad ltung bar bya ba dang / klu 'don par bya ba dang / gnod sbyin rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / srin po skrag pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad dang /
99a4(rgyud 'bum): bdud kyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa dang / ma mo rnams gdul ba dang / gdug pa'i tshogs rnam par gtor ba dang / gdug pa rnams tshar gcod pa dang / 'dam pa dang / 'jigs pa med par yang dag par
99a5(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa dang / nor bu bzang po dbang du bya ba dang / nor sbyin las nor thams cad dbrog pa dang / rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal drang ba dang / lha'i bu mo gzhon nu ma thams cad dang rtse 'jo bya ba dang /
99a6(rgyud 'bum): brgya byin mnan nas bde tsog ma dbrog pa dang / skem byed tshor gcad pa dang / tshangs pa lhung bar bya ba dang / khyab 'jug 'dul ba dang / dbang phyug chen po las rnam par rgyal ba dang / 'dod pa'i dbang
99a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag mnan nas dga' ba mo dbrog pa dang / rdo rje sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang /
99b1(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig gi bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / sgrub pa la ni rdo rje khro bo chen po rgyal po dam pa'i dngos grub kyis so zhes kyang gsungs so// lan cig bzlas pas mchog grub pa// thog ma'i rtsa
99b2(rgyud 'bum): snying bzang lan cig/ de yi 'og tu khro gnyer gyis// bsgrub bya thams cad grub pa yin// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje me dang nyi ma lhar rab tu 'bar ba'i rtog pa'i
99b3(rgyud 'bum): cho ga rgyas pa'o/ / / de nas ting 'dzin thams cad ni// rnam dag mchog gi chos nyid las// spyan ras gzigs dbang chen po ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i gtso chen yin// gdug pa
99b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'dul don du/ / rang rigs chen po che ni bskyed// sangs rgyas kun gyi khro bo che// thabs med pas ni thabs yin no// 'dod chags la sogs kun bsags pas// ma dag sems can
99b5(rgyud 'bum): khams dag ni/ / de rnams la ni rab spyod par// skyes bu mchog ni rnam par mkhyen// mchog tu mi 'dul ba nyid kyis// sangs rgyas kyang ni mnga' mi mdzad// 'jig rten kun na 'jig rten
99b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ rang snying bzang ba la snyoms zhugs// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes
99b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ gang la gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi thugs su chud par gyur pa'o// bsnyems
100a1(rgyud 'bum): pas pad+ma g.yos pa ni/ / bzung ste 'dab ma 'byed mdzad pas// ci nus pa li ting 'dzin gyis// rang bzhin gyis ni gzigs par mdzad// ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di// tshon
100a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis nyes pas mi gos pa/ / gnas kyi nyes pa sna tshogs pa'i// khams gsum pa ni de bzhin dag/ 'di la gzigs pa la sogs pas// rgyal ba rnams ni dbang por 'gyur// de yis rdo rje
100a3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' ni/ / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gyur// de bas bsgoms pa'i snying po 'di// dag par bsgoms pas sgom par ni// rdo rje 'chang ba chen po ni// pad+ma chen po 'chang
100a4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / gser sbyangs ri yi dbang po ste// rgyal po chen po dang mnyam pa// bsnyems pa g.yon pa'i pad mchog gis// tshul gyis 'dul ba mdzad pa na// pad+ma'i rigs mchog
100a5(rgyud 'bum): ston pa'i phyir/ / rgyal po rnams kyis gsol ba btab// de nas thams cad 'dul mdzad cing // shin tu dkar ba'i chos 'dzin pa// rdo rje chos te rang rgyal po// 'jig rten dbang pos
100a6(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ / phyi ni dkyil 'khor chen po la// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri// de yi dbus su spyan 'dzum pa// 'jig rten dbang phyug dgod par bya// gser sbyangs lta bu'i pad+ma ni//
100a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yon bsnyems tshul gyis gzigs mdzad pa// rgyal mtshan kun gyis rnam par spras// sangs rgyas sku mchog spyi bor bzhugs// de yi ngos ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku ni
100b1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad po bri/ / rang gi 'dzin pa pad+ma che'i// ting nge 'dzin la rnam par gzigs// 'jig rten dbang po'i gzugs logs su// sangs rgyas la sogs rigs kyi lha// zhi ba sred med bu tshangs
100b2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / 'dod pa'i gzugs ni pad+ma can// spyi bor 'tsher 'a zhing mgrin 'degs pa// rta mgrin lcags kyu bcings nas ni// chos kyi tshig gis spyan drang bya// de nas pad+ma'i snying po ni// sarba ta thA ga
100b3(rgyud 'bum): / ta pad+ma dza/ hUM badz+ra pad+ma he pad+ma/ pad+ma baM/ ho pad+ma nI rA dza/ de nas mtshams rnams su ni/ hUM pad+me tsaN+De shwa ra hUM/ he ma hA bi shwa pad+ma tsA ra Ne sid+d+ha hUM/ maT hrIHpad+ma pad+mo/ hUM a ho pad+ma a shA/
100b4(rgyud 'bum): kra ma kra ma hUM dzaM/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni// cho ga rgyas par byas nas ni// pad+ma chen po me tog bcas// ma yengs yid kyis phyag bya'o// dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ting nge 'dzim
100b5(rgyud 'bum): / las byung gzungs 'di brjod par bya// oM bi sho d+ha ya/ ma nu sa ni shud+d+ha ma hA satwa/ d+hA tu sa ma ya satwa/ rA ga dI pany+tsa ye/ tsat+ta me sar+b+ba d+ha meSh+TA badz+ra Ni tsit+ta me sar+b+ba d+ha me shra dza~M ni/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya
100b6(rgyud 'bum): gsan nas ni/ / dgyes pas pad+ma 'dzin pa ni// de nas mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing // chos kyi tshig gis legs spyan drangs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ke shwa ra pad+ma hasta/ ya hi shI g+h+raM ma me badz+ra
100b7(rgyud 'bum): mu drA a gri sh+ya sa be sa ma ye bad+ma bi shi ko ma/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ sho d+ha ya sarba sA d+ha ya ba ma me/ mahA badz+ra d+ha ra s+t+wa~M/ de nas/ 'jig rten 'dzin pa rang nyid byon// 'jig rten kun mchog grub 'gyur
101a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i/ / ting 'dzin cho ga nges par mdzad// de nas de bzhin slob ma rnams// gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni// dngos grub thams cad sbyin pa yis// ye shes dag ni bslab par
101a2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / ting 'dzin snying po 'di yi ni// sgrub pa chen po gdod nas 'byung // 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug nyid// go rims bzhin du bshad par bya// bud med rnams kyi nang zhugs pa 'am// gdug pa
101a3(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi nang chud pa 'am/ / gang yang rung bar 'dug nas ni// pad+ma chen po yongs su gzung // dus dang stobs ni ji bzhin du// nye ring ci nus bsgrub par bya// cho ga 'di yi tshe 'di la// myur du mchog
101a4(rgyud 'bum): ni 'grub par 'gyur/ / 'dod chags kun gyis bde myur ba// 'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ong lding // 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems
101a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' nyid/ / phyag na rdo rje nyid dang ni// dngos grub kun gyi mtha' yas mchog/ tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya sgrub pa ni// phyag rgya bcings te ting 'dzin gnas// dngos grub
101a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po nyid thob bo/ / dam tshig dam tshig mchog gis te// las kyi las mchog phyag rgyas so// sgrub pa chen po'i cho ga'i rgyud do// / de nas dngos grub ma grub pa'i// ting 'dzin

102a5(rgyud 'bum): bskur kun gyi don/ / kun dbang rin chen thams cad 'dzin// ting nge 'dzin gyis rab byin rlab// bdag po chen po rab sad mdzad// chos rnams la ni rnam gzigs pas// kun don dbang phyug
102a6(rgyud 'bum): gdod nas byung / / nyi zla dang ni gza' skar can// nam mkha' nyid du 'gyur ba yin// de nas rin chen ting 'dzin ni// nges par rdo rje can du brjod// de nas nam mkha' rdo rje nyid// ldeng
102a7(rgyud 'bum): sngon bai DUR+Ya mnyam mdangs/ / rdo rje rin chen rnams dge ba// nam mkha'i snying por yang dag gyur// de nas bcom ldan thog ma nyid// mdzod spu kun gyi gnas na bzhugs// ting nge 'dzi
102b1(rgyud 'bum): la rnam gzigs pas/ / 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag po nyid// sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas dang // de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog/ rdo rje rin chen de yis ni// kun rigs kun gyi dbang

103a2(rgyud 'bum): satwa dzaHbadz+ra rat+na hUM/ badz+ra d+har+m+ma baM/ badz+ra karma ho/ de nas gzungs rnams kyi snying po bshad de/ oM pra ti badz+ra Ni phaT/ oM badz+ra prI ti hi hi/ oM tsan+ta ma Ni ho/ oM badz+ra ma hA ma he haM/ dkyi
103a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen po'i khu tshur gyis/ / cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin bri// nor bu'i khu tshur gyis bzhugs pa// mkha' skyes las ni mgos phyag bya// bzhugs nas nam mkha' mkhas pa yi// dam tshi
103a4(rgyud 'bum): dam pa brjod par bya/ / khyed ni nam mkha' las byung ba'i// thams cad kyis ni lnga pa yin// oM e sid+d+ha b+hAr+N+Na ba sid+d+ha/ sid+d+ha swa/ sid+d+ha ma hA rat+na/ ba ba Ta Ta tAM/ 'di ni bzlas pa tsam gyis/

104b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum po khams gsum pa// 'jig rten gsum bdag thams cad la// 'jig rten gsum mchog 'dul mdzad pa// cho ga bzhin du sgom 'gyur zhing // sems can don phyir
104b6(rgyud 'bum): cho gas bzhugs/ / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// rtag tu rnam par gnas pa yin// mi mnyam pa yis rten gyur na// dug nyid du ni nye bar 'gro// bdud rtsir nyid du'ang 'gyur//

105a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ rtag tu gnas pas srid gsum gnas// chos kyi rten nas gsum mchog ste// chos min rten pas ngan song gsum// 'dod//
105a2(rgyud 'bum): chags sbrang rtsir byed par bshad// zhe sdang rgyal bar byed par bshad// gti mug don ni sgrub byed ces// kun tu gsang ba'i ming yin no// nga ni 'jig rten gcig pu nyid// 'jig rten gsum
105a3(rgyud 'bum): du rab tu bshad/ / nga ni 'dod pa gcig pu nyid// tshangs pa drag po g.yung drung yin// de nas gsum po 'di yis mchog/ sbyang phyir rdo rje sbyang 'dzin pa// gzugs ni gsum po 'di dag nyid//
105a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid kho na byung ba yin// gang phyir 'jig rten 'di dag ni// rtag tu yang ni 'di skad smra// tshangs sogs kyis 'dul yang dag pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub snod ma yin// de rnams srung
105a5(rgyud 'bum): phyir bcom ldan 'das/ / rdo rje 'chang chen rang nyid ni// gzugs ni gsum pa 'di mdzad nas// phyis ni sangs rgyas nyid ma 'gyur// de nas tshangs pa la sogs lha// 'jig rten gsum
105a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog dbang phyug che/ / dkyil 'khor der ni gsang snying po'o// rang gi rang grub phyir rab phul// oM b+hAr b+hu ba swa/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sgo srungs bzhis ni rab srung ba// kha khyer
105a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis ni legs bskor ba/ / phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang ma nyid dang ni// dkyil 'khor gzhu yi dbyibs can la// sbrang rtsi byed dang rgyal nyid byed// sgrub pa thams cad sgrub
105b1(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ / go rims dag ni ji bzhin du// legs par bri ba'am gzhag par bya// pus mo gnyis kyis zhugs la der// rtse gsum dam tshig gis mtshan pas// zhugs te dam tshig bcings nas/
105b2(rgyud 'bum): / ni// yang dag par ni dgug par bya// oM b+hur+m+ma ba swaH/ swas+thi nA ma swA hA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis// thams cad thams cad kyis bskor ba// thams cad grub phyir 'ongs pa la// de
105b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid pa yi gtor ma sbyin/ / slob dpon rab tu zhugs pa yi// slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya// de nyid gsang ba brjod nas ni// dam tshig mchog ni sbyin par bya// gal te khyod kyis rtse
105b4(rgyud 'bum): gsum bcag/ snying po snod min la smras sam// ji skad smras pa'i chos rnams ni// gal te 'dir ni ma spyad dam// snying stobs rdul dang mun pa nyid// tshangs pa drag po g.yung drung ste//
105b5(rgyud 'bum): ming po gsum po 'di nyid ni// nam yang brnyas par mi bya'o// gang zhig 'di rnams sgom pa slob// yang dang yang du zhugs nas ni// dkyil 'khor mchod par byed pa dang // dngos
105b6(rgyud 'bum): grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ / rang gi phyag rgya bslabs nas ni// de la gar gyi mchod pa dang // 'dod yon dam pa lnga rnams kyis// rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// 'jig rten
105b7(rgyud 'bum): gsum 'byin pa'i rgyud do/ / / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sems can kun rje ston mdzad pa// 'jig rten gsum phyung don grub tu// slar yang srin mo rnams 'byin mdzad/
106a1(rgyud 'bum): kun tu chags dang zhe sdang rmongs// brtan par byed pa'i rgyu yin no// dga' dang phrag dog bud med ni// rab tu grags pa'i grub kun ster// gang zhig 'jig rten kun tu
106a2(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / tshogs kun gyis mchod lha mo rnams// zhi dang 'jigs ma de bzhin gser// grub pa dang ni zhi bar bshad// phyi rol sems can phan phyir dang // rtogs don khong du chud bya'i phyir//
106a3(rgyud 'bum): de rnams kyi ni snying po dang // dkyil 'khor de bzhin dam tshig bshad// hi hUM shI sh+tsa/ dkyil 'khor chen po bzhi pa ni// srang bu gsum gyi dkyil 'khor bya// mtshams kyi thig ni ka ba che// bzhi
106a4(rgyud 'bum): po dag gi rim pa bzhin/ / de yi dbus su dkyil 'khor ni// bzhi po dag gi de bzhin bya// rang gi snying po bzhi po ni// rang gi sgor ni phyogs pa gzhag/ skal bzang lag na rang gi mtshon//
106a5(rgyud 'bum): sring mo phub can zhi ba ma// phag mo lag na gter nyid de// grub pa mo ni bsnyems dang bcas// de nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor du// kun nas de bzhin bzhugs nas ni// sring mo rnams
106a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis rang gi rgyas/ / go rims dag ni ji bzhin du// zhugs nas de bzhin cho ga bya// spros la sogs pas mchod par bya// de nyid gsang ba rab bsgrub pas// kun nas dgug pa
106a7(rgyud 'bum): ngag tu bya/ / oM suM b+ha ga ra tiSh+Tha ma ya hI b+hu/ rak+Sha sa mA ti/ ma ya hI b+hu b+hu ba/ ba ra hA a mir+ya tA ma ya swA hA/ sid+d+hi ke sid+d+hi sa ma ya hi I mAm+bi mu drA b+hiHdz+r-IMHhUM shrI b+h+yo/ de nas lus ni tham
106b1(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis/ / de bzhin du ni legs bzhugs la// de nas phyag rgya bcings brtan te// gsang ba mchog 'di brjod par bya// gal te gsang nyid ma gsungs na// gang zhig sems can don
106b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs dang / / gang yang dkyil 'khor sgrub byed pa// de rnams khyed kyis bsad par 'gyur// chos dang ldan la bdud rtsi nyid// chos min pas ni dug pas lhag/ ci rnyed pa dang dus dza
106b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / yul rnams nye bar bsten pa dang // phyag rgya gar gyis bshad pa yis// ci bde bar ni rtag tu mchod// sring mo bzhi'i rgyud do// / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//
106b4(rgyud 'bum): sa yi dbang phyug kun gyi mchog/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che// sgrub pa dag ni rab sgrub nyid// 'dod chags sogs dug gzhig phyir dang // kun nas bdud rtsi nyid bya'i phyir//
106b5(rgyud 'bum): zhe sdang las byung klu yi ni// dkyil 'khor dam pa 'byung bar 'gyur// de la snying po 'di yin te// phuHzur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// srad bu thams cad yang dag bri// sgo
106b6(rgyud 'bum): khyud klu yi gdengs ka mchog/ mtshams kyi rtse mchog mjug ma mdud// de yi dbus su klu rgyal ni// mtha' yas gdengs ka bcas pa ni// klu yi rigs ni brgyad po dag/ shes
106b7(rgyud 'bum): rab can gyis kun tu bri/ / de nas khros dang zhugs nas ni// klu 'dzin pa yi shugs kyis ni// zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de nyid du// sbrul gyi gdengs kas dgug par bya//
107a1(rgyud 'bum): oM hrIHa nI la dza ba be ga pri thi b+hin da ri She sha ya hi pu/ sar+b+ba nA ga ku lA nu na phu/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya phu/ sar+b+ba na sA d+ha ya phu/ ta ta sa sar+b+ba na ga pu Ta ka phu/ de
107a2(rgyud 'bum): lhar byas na legs par bzhugs shing dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas slob dpon gyis dug med par bsam par bya'o// de nas brtsams te dug thams cad zos pas kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur/
107a3(rgyud 'bum): ro// nor rgyas par brtse bar byed do// dug thams cad sbar ba dang gzhig pa nus par 'gyur ro// de nas mna'i snying po sbyin par bya ste/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// 'jig
107a4(rgyud 'bum): rten na ni 'di gsum dug/ gal te bden pa las 'das nas// 'di dag gis ni rtag gsod 'gyur// khyed kyis glog la brnyas mi bya// ser ba bzlog par mi bya zhing // gal/
107a5(rgyud 'bum): te dngos grub la dga' na// ci nas sbrul ni gsang mi bya// klu'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba'i mchog/ sem
107a6(rgyud 'bum): can kun la bde ba'i phyir/ / gdon gyi dkyil 'khor bsdu ba yi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// nyes byas kyi ni dug nyid 'gyur// gdon dang rims dang sdig pa dang /
107a7(rgyud 'bum): dmyal bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin// de nas gdug pa'i snying po ni// haM/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par// gdon gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu bri// de'i dbus dang por gdon la sogs// cho ga rgyas
107b1(rgyud 'bum): par dgod par bya/ / de nas bshad pa bzhin zhugs nas// dgod cing myur du dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje 'dzin pa zhugs nas ni// khros pas rkang pa g.yon pas mnye// de nas gdon dang rims sdig
107b2(rgyud 'bum): kun/ / dmyal ba thams cad rtag tu ni// sdig pa chen po byed pa yang // rdo rjes rab tu 'jigs par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// sdug bsngal thams cad
107b3(rgyud 'bum): 'don pa'i rgyud do/ / // de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yis// sems can kun don rab sgrub phyir// dkyil 'khor thams cad gsungs pa yin//
107b4(rgyud 'bum): de la snying po 'di yin te/ oM AHhUMHhriHtrAM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yin// gzugs kun gyis ni kun mchog ni// dbang phyug dam pa mdzad pa
107b5(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / gsang ba chen po lnga yis ni// gang tshe 'dul bar ma gyur pa// de tshe sna tshogs cher mdzad pa// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam pa yin// dam pa yang dag bshad bya ste// kun mchog sna
107b6(rgyud 'bum): tshogs rnam par rgyal/ / kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas ni// de yi dbus su cho ga bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' rab bzhag la// rdo rje lha mo tshogs
107b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor/ / de yi ngos ni thams cad du// kun mchog bdag po sku rnams so// rdo rje mchog bcas mtshan ma ni// rang gi rigs kyis bskor ba gzhag/ rgyal po rdo rje sred med bu'i/
108a1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs 'dzin 'khor lo rnam par bri// khyab bdag rdo rje can rdo rje// gtum dbang rdo rje mdung bsnams pa// rdo rje pad 'byung pad+ma 'byung // rdo rje 'dzin pa tshangs pa'i gzugs
108a2(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i snying po 'dod pa'i gzugs/ / rdo rje dang bcas me tog mtshon// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtshams rnams su// rigs kyi lha mo bri bar bya// rdo rje dpal mo dkar mo dang // rdo rje sgrol
108a3(rgyud 'bum): ma mkha' rdo rje/ / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po 'di rnams kyi snying po bshad par bya ste/ oM badz+ra nA rA ya Nats+tshin+da pra ti ha na badz+ra tsakre Na ho/ b+ha ga bAM badz+ra ta thA ga ta/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ badz+ra d+hA ra taM/
108a4(rgyud 'bum): / badz+ra ta thA ga ta hUM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA yo gi nI ga Ne shwa ra/ ma hA badz+ra ku lo gra pa ne ho/ b+ha ga bAM badz+ra tsan+de shwa rA ya/ ha ha ha ha hrIHbadz+ra pad+mo b+ha ba ho/ b+ha ga baM badz+ra lo ki shwa re/ ma hA pra me sid d+hu/ oM b+hA ra b+hu baHswaH
108a5(rgyud 'bum): sA sti na ma/ swA hA/ he badz+ra ku su mA yu d+ha/ sarba kA ma me sA d+ha ya ho/ b+ha ga bA badz+ra A kA sha gar+b+ha/ ba ba Ta Ta traM/ badz+ra A kA sha gar+b+ha a she ShaM mu drA/ na mo ye na sA d+he na/ b+hA ga ba te pradz+nyA pI ra mi tA yu d+ha/
108a6(rgyud 'bum): ts+tshin+tu badz+ra Ni tsakr-i Na te na sa t+ye na pA pa kAn/ oM d+hI shrI shru ti smr-i ti bi dza ye swahA/ na mo ye na/ oM badz+ra gau ro ma hA bi d+yA trai lo kya bi dza ye shwa ri badz+ra kro d+ha ag+ni sa ma ye/ badz+ra d+ha ri na mo stus+tha/ tad+ya thA/ oM hi li ma~M
108a7(rgyud 'bum): / le li hA li badz+ra mu ka ye swAhA/ badz+ra sa ma ya/ na mo ye na sA d+he na b+ha ga ba te/ bud+d+ha bud+d+hir+g+gad+hA d+hA ra/ badz+ra d+har+m+ma pra yo ge na/ te na sa te na sid+d+ha nA~M/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ badz+ra d+ha mo ta/ oM kA ma
108b1(rgyud 'bum): / badz+rI Ni sid+d+ha bi shud+d+ha sA d+hu ba ha/ ga ga mod+b+ha be yo ge na sid+ha mAM pa ra ma ka re/ tad+ya thA/ ga ga na bi shud d+he/ sar+b+ba ma b+hi pra ya pa ri pU Ni swA hA/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor gan sa rnams su// rdo rje 'dzin
108b2(rgyud 'bum): pa rab spyod gnas/ / lha dbang dang ni me mo nyid// 'jig rten skyong rnams dgod par bya// tshogs kyi dbang phyug rdo rje yi// rol mo che bcu rdung byed pa// phyi yi dkyil 'khor kha khyer la//
108b3(rgyud 'bum): sgo dang mtshams su'ang 'di bri'o// sgo rnams kun tu 'jug pa ni// rang gi phyag rgyas rab tu gzhug/ dkyil 'khor dam pa lnga par ni// dang po'i sbyor bas 'jug par bya'o// de nas
108b4(rgyud 'bum): / dbus su 'dug nas ni// dang po lcags kyu che ba nyid// snying po 'di ni rjod byed cing // 'gugs pa 'di ni brjod par bya// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa sid+hi hUM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA na/ sa ma ya A
108b5(rgyud 'bum): kaR+Sha ya dzaHbadz+ra ku la dI paM da ma ye tA pra be sha ya hUM/ sar+b+ba lo kaM shwa raM pra be sha ya sa ma ya ban+d+ha na baM/ sa ma ya sar+b+ba rat+na dI paM ma hA ma Ni rA dzA nAM/ ba shAM ku ru ho hUM a/ hUM hriHtraM/ de nas gsang
108b6(rgyud 'bum): ba chen po yi/ / snying po bzang po 'di brjod pas// rdo rje 'chang chen rgyal po ni// 'khor lo thams cad dang bcas pas// bkug cing rab tu bcug pa dang // bden pas bcings te
108b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang du byas/ / dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog thams cad// dngos grub kun gyi sgrub par 'gyur// de nas go rims ji bzhin du// dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa dang /
109a1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub de rnams nyid kyang ni// thams cad kyang ni bsgrub par bya// bde ba thams cad mi 'gyur gnas// bde ba chen po zhes brjod do// rdo rje 'di ni sgrub la sogs/
109a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni tshe 'dir 'grub par 'gyur// de ltar sna tshogs pa'i don sbyang ba'i don gyis cho ga 'gro ba dpag tu med pa 'dul ba mtha' med cing sna tshogs pas mnyam pa med cing phul du phung ba/ de bzhin
109a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rogs thams cad 'dzin pa'i bde ba'i mchog byed pa/ rgyal ba thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa srid pa'i bde ba'i cho ga byed pa gsungs pa yin no// dpal
109a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ / rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kun gyi mchog dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// /
109a5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che// dam tshig mchog gi sgrub pa dang // bde ba chen po gzhal yas khang // dngos grub kun gyi lus byas pa// de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po yi// rin
109a6(rgyud 'bum): chen rgyal ba sogs kyi brgyan/ / bde ba chen po'i chags pa che// glu dang rol mo rjes chags pa// bla med dga' ba chen po yi// mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mchod// dpa' ba chen po
109a7(rgyud 'bum): dpal gyi gnas/ / rang gi bzhugs gnas mchog de la// rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po mchog/ mi 'gyur mchog tu yang dag bzhugs// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid// rab tu
109b1(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/ kun tu bzang po 'khor ba dang // byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag
109b2(rgyud 'bum): kun mchog chags pa chen po yi/ / dngos grub dbang phyug rjes grub pa// glu dang rol mo thog mtha' med// mchog ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// hUMHde nas 'di ni gsungs
109b3(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis/ / rdo rje thams cad 'dzin pa ni// gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che// phyag rgya'i lha mo byung bar gyur// rtag tu chags dang dngos grub che// rnam rgyal dbang phyug lhag pa'i lha/
109b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dam pa bzhi pa ste// sems dpas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku// de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin te/ sku mchog so sor rtog pa dang // dngos grub kun gyis bde ba'i
109b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ kun mchog rnam rgyal mthong ba dang // thams cad dbang phyug mchod pa che// dngos grub rnams dang phun tshogs dang // dga' ba dag dang bdag po rnams// rdo rje lha mo thog mtha'
109b6(rgyud 'bum): med/ / rdo rje sems dpa' sku yi mchog/ ces bya'o// de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i mi rnams ni dga' ba chen po dpal don yod dga' ba'i dam tshig 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma dang / dga' ba chen po
109b7(rgyud 'bum): dpal don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje kI li kI li dang / dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje ma dang / dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje
110a1(rgyud 'bum): don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig rdo rje 'don pa'i dbang phyug ma'o/ / 'di rnams gsang ba'i mtshan dag ni// mkhas pas gang zhig dad pas brjod// de ni phyag rgya thams cad
110a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi/ / dngos po kun bdag bdag por 'gyur// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu gsang bas gsungs pa yin no// de nas 'di sgrub bshad bya ba// dngos grub shin tu brtag/
110a3(rgyud 'bum): pa ste// sdig pa che las dga' ba dang // sgrub pa gang zhig ma grub kyang // rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin// de dag kyang ni myur du 'grub// nyin re 'am ni zla re 'am// de bzhin lo
110a4(rgyud 'bum): ni re ra la/ / ci mngon mngon 'dod bsgrub par bya// ci rnyed pa dang ci bde bas// ras la bcom ldan bri bar bya// kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug ste// gang zhig bris par gyur na ni//
110a5(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu rtag pa'i thar pa thob// bzhad pa dang bcas zla ba'i 'od// sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'od 'bar ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur sogs// sna tshogs rgyan dang na bza' ldan//
110a6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rdo rje bsnyems pa'i mchog 'chang ba// g.yon pa dril bu mchog bsnyems pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu brtag/ de yi logs na bzhugs pa
110a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor brten// rab tu dga' ba bde ba'i sku// gsang ba chen po dgod par bya// dang po pad+ma ltar dkar dmar// gzhan ni pa la sha ltar dkar// gzhan ni
110b1(rgyud 'bum): ut+pal 'dab ltar sngo/ / rdo rje bsnyems ma ser po 'dzin// dang po dang ni gnyis pa dag/ g.yas kyi logs la brten pa ste// gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa dag/ g.yon gyi logs su bzhi pa yin//
110b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje kI la kI la ma// dbus kyi rang lha dgyes par spro// de yi logs la rdo rje che// mda' ni gsor ba la brtson pa// bsnyems pa'i phyag gis yongs 'khyud pa'i// chu srin rgyal mtshan bsgreng
110b3(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas/ / de yi logs na bzhad dang bcas// mchod pas bdag po la blta ba// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur mtshan// thams cad spyan gyi phyag rgya gzigs// rang la bdag gi
110b4(rgyud 'bum): thugs gtad pa/ / zur du lta zhing bzhugs pa'o// ras ris 'di ni mthong ba yis// rtag pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur// mchod pa dang ni brtag pa yis// mchog tu dga' ba'i
110b5(rgyud 'bum): thar pa thob/ / ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de ltar mchog tu dga' ba rab tu 'dod pa ni// mchog tu dga' ba dam pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// gsal zhing rgyal
110b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ras ris chen po 'di/ / thams cad gzigs rnams mchod pa chen po'i dpal 'dis rol// 'khor lo de ni brtag byas nas// mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// rnam par dben
110b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i khang par ram/ / yang na skyed mos tshal sogs su// de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po yi// ras ris rgyal po sogs kyis brgyan// dril bu dang bcas yid dga' ba'i// bla re phul
111a1(rgyud 'bum): bas mchog gyur pa'i/ / rdo rje glu yi mchod tshogs dang // glu dang rol mo rnam 'phrul pa/ me tog spos sogs rab sbyor ba// mar me'i sbyor bas yang dag mchod// khang
111a2(rgyud 'bum): pa gsum brtsegs dkyil 'khor du/ / mchog gi gsang ba bsgrub par bya// yang na bdag nyid kho na mchog/ rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgom bya// de nas 'khor lor ma zhugs kyang // rang nyid
111a3(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni rtag zhugs nas/ / rdo rje kun 'chang slob dpon ni// dngos grub kun la grub par 'gyur// rang nyid khrus byas dri zhim bsgos// ci rnyed rgyan dang gos dang ldan// sna tshogs gos kyis//
111a4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag klubs// 'phreng bcas kha ni dri zhim pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// me tog spos dang dri snod bcas// rdo rje glu ni 'di dag gis// gar byed grong khyer 'jug par bya//
111a5(rgyud 'bum): de la mchog tu gsang ba'i dpal dam tshig gsum 'jug la mchog tu gsang ba'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/ dngos grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba'i// thar pa'i grong du
111a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan bde chen 'jug/ mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis// dzaHhUM baM ho rab tu grub par mdzod// rab tu zhugs te g.yon pa yis// rdo rje mig gis mgon la 'dud// g.yon
111a7(rgyud 'bum): pa bsnyems pa cung zad bzhad/ / bstod cing mdzes pa'i mig gis btsums pa de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa dpal dam tshig gsum gyi phyag 'tshal ba'i me tog gi sil ma dor ba'i mchog tu
111b1(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/ mchog tu bde ba'i sems ni rol par ldan// sgeg pa'i phyag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'dud// dzaHhUM baM ho hi hi hi hi hi/ mgon
111b2(rgyud 'bum): po snyim pa'i me tog bzhes su gsol/ / de nas me tog sil mdor// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dang // ldan pa'i 'od gsal sbyin par bya// de la
111b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/ oM sangs rgyas kun ldan
111b4(rgyud 'bum): rin chen mchog gis brgyan/ / lha yi cod pan dang bcas khyod la 'dud// rdo rje 'chang bdag rin chen dbang bskur bas// sems dpa' sa ma ya s+t+waM hUM// de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //
111b5(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya// dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher// byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas// rdo rje la sogs thob bzung bas// rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra// rdo rje
111b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'dzin rgyal po/ / rdo rje can gyis byin gyis brlabs// 'gyur zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam chog gsum gyis bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa
111b7(rgyud 'bum): gcig pu'i cho ga mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de nas 'dir grub bshad bya ba// dngos grub shin tu brtag pa yang // gang gis sgrub pa dam pa
112a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / / sdig chen byed pa rnams kyang ni// rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin// ma grub rnams kyang grub par 'gyur// lugs ma 'am ni brdungs pa 'am// 'dus
112a2(rgyud 'bum): byas pa'am bris pa 'am/ / dang po'i sems dpa' bzhugs gsol nas// de yi mdun du cho ga bzhin// rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing // dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// thams
112a3(rgyud 'bum): cad dgug dang mchod pa che/ / bdag byin rlab sogs sgrub rnams su// de la ji ltar mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam chog gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad dgug pa'i rgyud ni 'di yin
112a4(rgyud 'bum): he/ rang lhag lha yi sbyor ba las// thams cad dgug pa'i sbyor ba las// yan lag mchog gi rol bcas pas// gar bya zhing ni dgug par bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs
112a5(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi glu'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te/ dza mchog dang po'i rdo rje 'chang ba rdo rje sems dpa' bde rtog rab tu dga' ba khyod bdag sangs
112a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas so sor rtogs/ / hUM mchog rdo rje las ni mchog tu zad med srid pa mi 'gyur bde dang yid bde dam tshig bdag la de grub mdzod// baM mchog bdag gi sku 'dzin rnal 'byor thams cad rnam rgyal
112a7(rgyud 'bum): bsgreng ba rab mchog dag pa bde bar 'gyur ba'i pad+ma'i rgyal po kye/ / ho rab mchog ni mchog gi dngos grub dam pa thams cad dbang phyug dam par bdag gyur cig/ rtag par bdag 'phel nam
112b1(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i snying po khyod/ / hu lu hu lu'i sgrub pas dbab par mdzod// dam tshig chen pos yang dag dgug pa khyod// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dam tshig ste// rab tu dga' ba mchog dang po// /
112b2(rgyud 'bum): de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga ji ltar yin/ rang lha'i rnal 'byor ji bzhin du// mchod pa kun mchog sku
112b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis/ / rol mo'i rnam 'phrul gyis rjes mchod// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchog gi dngos grub kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rnga
112b4(rgyud 'bum): rje'i glu'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te/ thams cad rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab tu dga' ba yin// bde ba chen po gsal mthong bdag la brtan gyur
112b5(rgyud 'bum): cig/ myur du so sor mkhyen nas rab tu 'dod pa bsgrubs// de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad byin gyis brlabs kyis sgrub pa chen po dza
112b6(rgyud 'bum): lhar yin/ rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du// phyag rgya kun gyis byin brlabs pas// de nyid chen po'i mchog gis ni// rang nyid bsgrubs te snying po bzla// de nas de bzhin gshegs
112b7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig gi rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa ni 'di yin te/ oM/ nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir//
113a1(rgyud 'bum): thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// kun mchog dngos grub
113a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po ste/ / dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal// mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod// nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod// 'dod chags kyis ni rjes chags pa//
113a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa chen po dga' ba che// bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod// shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// byang
113a4(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod/ / dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog/ grub pa'i rdo rje cher bskyod pas// rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig/
113a5(rgyud 'bum): dpal mchog dang po'i bcom ldan khyod// gang gis don dang glu yis bstod// de ni dngos grub kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po nyid grub 'gyur// zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid kyis
113a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu gsang ba'i glu chen po mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so/ / dngos grub cho ga 'di yis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rtogs// kun mchog dngos grub
113a7(rgyud 'bum): chen po yi/ / dbang phyug nyid ni rab sgrub pa'o// kun nas 'od zer ston sogs dang // so sor ston pa'i rmad byung rnams// rdo rje tshig gis rang lha las// ngo mtshar gyur rnams mthong bar
113b1(rgyud 'bum): gyur/ / rtog pa kun gyis sna tshogs che// dngos grub dbang phyug bde rnams kyis// myur du rang gis byin brlabs pas// rdo rje slob dpon gyis thob bo// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das
113b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' mchog dang pos gsungs so/ / de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gi lha thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ji ltar yin/
113b3(rgyud 'bum): rang lha rnal 'byor ji bzhin du// lha kun bdag nyid sku rnams kyis// rang lha rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis// rang lhag lha nyid bsgrub par bya// de nas mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i
113b4(rgyud 'bum): d pal dam tshig gsum gyi kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu mi 'gyur ba dam pa bla na med pa'i
113b5(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba bde ba dam pa dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rjes su sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ rang lha'i rnal 'byor ji bzhin du//
113b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje kun mchog sku rnams kyis// glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni// rdo rje nyid kyis rjes chags 'gyur// rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du// dbyangs kyi rtsa ba rnams sad pas// glu
113b7(rgyud 'bum): dang rol mo'i cho ga ni/ / dril bu nyid kyis rjes su brjod// rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag po mchog/ glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni// dam tshig gis ni rjes
114a1(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub bya/ / de yi rtog pa thams cad la// rdo rje 'bebs pa rab sad nas// rang gi lha yi dam tshig ni// thams cad gzhi 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur// mchog tu gsang
114a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi glu chen po dang rol mo'i cho ga mchog tu gsang ba mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de nas de rjes gnas ji bzhin//
114a3(rgyud 'bum): ci rnyed pa ni ci bde bas// me tog spos kyis mchod nas ni// khang pa 'am skyed mos tshal sogs su// bdag nyid ci 'dod rab bsgrubs nas// ci rnyed rgyan dang gos dang ldan// sna tshog
114a4(rgyud 'bum): gos kyis yang dag klubs/ / me tog 'phreng bcas kha dri zhim// lugs ma 'am ni brdungs pa'am// 'dus pa 'am ni ri mor bri// dang po'i 'khor lo de mdun du// cho ga bzhin du
114a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs gsol nas/ / rang lha'i rnal 'byor ji bzhin du// rdo rje dril bu rab sad pas// thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che// bdag byin rlab sogs bsgrub par bya// sngon du lan
114a6(rgyud 'bum): cig bsgrubs byas nas/ / de nas de rjes ci 'dod pa// ci 'dod ci spyod ci smras pa// thams cad bza' zhing thams cad byed// langs pa'am ni 'dug pa 'am// rab tu dgod
114a7(rgyud 'bum): dam smra ba 'am/ / ji bzhin de bzhin de dang der// ci 'dod par ni ji bzhin bzhag/ gsang ba mchog gi 'khor lo no// me tog sogs kyis mchod nas ni// ji bzhin du ni rjes
114b1(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub bya/ / 'dis ni 'dod pa kun dbang phyug/ 'gro dang 'od dang 'dod na 'phur// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'grub// rga shi med pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'
114b2(rgyud 'bum): grub chen po/ / phyag rgya kun gyis dbang phyug bdag/ rdo rje kun 'dzin rgyal po ni// rdo rje mtshon cha thams cad 'dzin// mi thub pa dang mi sod cing // thams cad byed cing kun gyi rten//
114b3(rgyud 'bum): sems na kun gyi rgyal po che// tshar gtsang rjes su bzung bar nus// kun mchog rjes su chags pa che// 'dod pa grub pa bde ba mchog/ kun las rnam rgyal grub 'gyur te// kun
114b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog dbang phyug dam pa yin/ / dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po'i go 'phang nas// rgyal po rdo rje kun 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas thams cad rab 'grub 'gyur//
114b5(rgyud 'bum): de ltar mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba pad+ma'i ra ba che// mchog tu gsang ba grub pa'i bla na med pa'i dngos grub stsol// mchog kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas gang zhig rjes su bstan pa
114b6(rgyud 'bum): ste/ mchog gi dngos grub dbang phyug chen po nyid des nyams myong ba// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po las/ gsang ba chen
114b7(rgyud 'bum): po dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum dang / dngos grub thams cad dgug pa dang / mchod pa chen po dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o//
115a1(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa dang // sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes brten pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi gnas// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// thog mtha'/
115a2(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// lhag
115a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lha ni gcig pu nyid/ / ces bya ba grub par 'gyur ro// de lhar mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba pad+mar che// mchog tu bsngags pa bla na med pa'i dngos grub stsol// mchog gi
115a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba gang zhig rjes su bstan pa ste/ / mchog gi dngos grub bde ba chen po nyid des nyams myong ba// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//
115a5(rgyud 'bum): dpal mchog dang po las/ dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor thams cad kyi dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam
115a6(rgyud 'bum): tshig gi dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsang ba'i yongs su rdzogs so/ / // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i slob ma'i cho ga rgyas pa rjes su bzung
115a7(rgyud 'bum): ba bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la dang por kho nar re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i sngags 'dis
115b1(rgyud 'bum): cig brjod pas sems bskyed du bcug ste/ oM sarba yo ga tsah+Na ud pA dA yA mi/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi 'bral zhing ldog pa dang / bdud thams
115b2(rgyud 'bum): cad zil gyis gnon pa'i phyag rgya byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du'ang rtogs par bya'o zhes byas gsungs so/ / byang chub sems ni bla med pa// mchog tu bskyed
115b3(rgyud 'bum): par byas nas ni/ / byang chub sems ni bzhag nas ni// su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM ho/ 'di yis rdo rje bskul ba na// 'dod pa kun las 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid bskul ba'i myur du ni//
115b4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems ni bla med pa// kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i mchog bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//
115b5(rgyud 'bum): gar byas spyi bor thal mo sbyar// gos kyis gdong ni g.yogs pa rnams// ci 'dod dngos grub 'dod pa yis// slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya// ci 'dod dngos grub sems
115b6(rgyud 'bum): pa yis/ / slob ma me tog dor du gzhug/ phyag rgya gang la de bcas pa'o// de de'i lha mo bsgrub par bya// de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol byas la// rnam pa kun gyi yon blangs
115b7(rgyud 'bum): nas/ sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur gyis// dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin// de la rdo rje chen po mna'i chus dbang bskur te 'di lhar brjod par bya'o// 'di ni khyod kyi
116a1(rgyud 'bum): dmyal ba'i chus/ / dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni// gas
116a2(rgyud 'bum): te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras/ / skye bo 'dus pa'i nang na gnas// dad pa med pas bzhad gad mod// ces bya bas mna' bsgag go// de la sangs rgyas kyi rin po che'i dbang bskur
116a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mchog ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje chu yis dbang bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ha ma hA sa ma ya a d+hi
116a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis rdo rje lag tu sbyin par bya'o/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje 'chang gi rdo rje ste// rdo rje 'chang gi brtul zhugs
116a5(rgyud 'bum): chetshe/ / khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mchog gi sems chen po yongs su mi spang bar rtag tu sgrub pa shin tu gsang ba de 'di yin te/
116a6(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra karma pA d+hi d+hi shrI badz+ra nA ma sid d+hi sa ma ya staM b+hur b+hu baHswaHgang la rdo rje'i ming btags pa de la kye'i sgra dang por sbyar bar bya'o// de'i ming de'ang ji srid byang chub snying po mthar thug pa'i
116a7(rgyud 'bum): bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang ming du 'gyur ro/ / de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum sbyin pa ni 'di yin te/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems
116b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' dga' ba che/ / kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi
116b2(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid bshad par byas nas rdo rje sbyin par bya'o/ / 'di bcom ldan 'das srid pa'i bdag po dam pa kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug gi dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa de
116b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid chos kyi mchog gi bka' yang dag par mdzad pa ni/ srid pa'i rang bzhin gyi ni dag/ rang bzhin gyis ni srid bral byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog/ srid pa'i mchog
116b4(rgyud 'bum): ni mdzad pa yin/ / mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa ni dril bu'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bya ba 'am lha sgrub pa dgrol bar bya'o// de nas chos thams
116b5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi de kho na nyid rab tu sad pa'i phab pa rnams kyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa yin no/ / rdo rje thams cad 'bebs par byed pa dang / rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang /
116b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang du byed pa dang / rab tu dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba sgrub par 'gyur ro// de nas srid pa dag pa'i thabs kyi mchog rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po dam tshig la rtag tu brten
116b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o zhes bya ba'o/ / de la 'di ni deng khyod kyi// srid bde shin tu gyur pa ni// sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir// shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs// dam tshig 'di ni rtag
117a1(rgyud 'bum): tu bskyed/ / 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la// ci 'dod par ni rten bzhin du// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya// de bzhin
117a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i theg pa chen po'i yang chen po dam tshig gi sbyor ba ni bcom ldan 'das dam tshig go/ / 'di ltar/ de bzhin gshegs pa
117a3(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis kyang / / 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas// phyag rgya'i dam tshig ces ni bsgrags// yid kyi sku ni brtan phyir ro// zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
117a4(rgyud 'bum): dpas gsungs so/ / de la 'di brjod par bya ste/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe// ji srid mtshungs med sems can don// mya ngan
117a5(rgyud 'bum): mi 'da' byed par nus/ / gsang ba dam pa dam tshig thabs// bsod nams byin gyis brlabs bsgrubs pa// rtag tu dngos grub kun dbang phyug/ sems can don ni byed pa yin/
117a6(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig 'dis ni bdag sgrub cing // ci bde bar ni sgrub byed pa// nyes pa spyad kyang sdig kun gyis// rnam pa kun tu gnod mi 'gyur// 'dod pa chen po sgrub par 'gyur// kun
117a7(rgyud 'bum): bdag dam tshig dbang phyug dang / / thams cad rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa'o// las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis// ma lus bsgrubs pas 'grub par
117b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / bdag gzhan thams cad rgyas btab pas// yang na bsgrub bya kun la yang // don yod mchog tu grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor thams cad rjes sgrub byed// dpal ldan
117b2(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal kun 'phrog byed/ / dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka' ba'o// zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rdo rje la sogs thob
117b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pas/ / dngos po kun gyi bde ba kun// phab pas rdo rje slob ma yis// dkyil 'khor du ni nyams su myong // de nas thams cad gzengs bstod pas// sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag
117b4(rgyud 'bum): nyid dngos/ / rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas// de bzhin gshegs ni lung bstan bya// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bskrun pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga 'di yin te// sangs
117b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kun gyis bstan pa che/ / gzengs bstod pa yis gang lung bstan// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba'o// oM/ 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan te// rdo rje
117b6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ / srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i ngan 'gro las khyod bton// he badz+ra nA maH/ ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi sa ma ya s+t+waM b+hur b+hu baHswaHgang la gzengs bstod pa 'di dang /
117b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen pos lung bstan mchog tu gsang ba'i cho gas byas pa de la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems
118a1(rgyud 'bum): d pa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon rnams dang mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
118a2(rgyud 'bum): tu lung bstan par mdzad do/ / 'di lta ste/ gzengs bstod pa 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po dang / mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyi byin gyis brlabs pa 'di dang / sngags kyi stobs las
118a3(rgyud 'bum): dad par bya'o/ / de na ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'chang
118a4(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa ji snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rang gi dam tshig la rjes su chags pa'i dir dgug pa dang / rab tu zhugs pa dang / dbang du bya
118a5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / sgrub pa dang / rjes su sgrub pa rnams kyis rdo rje'i dbyibs thams cad bstan par 'gyur pa nyid kyis 'di brtan par 'gyur pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kun tu khyab pa nyid kyis zhugs
118a6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyis rgya che ba nyid kyis 'dir rab tu bzhugs shing legs par rab tu bzhugs pa gang yin pa de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams
118a7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi rang gi dam tshig la rag las pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la lhag par dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di
118b1(rgyud 'bum): yin no zhes bya ba byin gyis brlabs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon gyis/ dam tshig gis mgrin gcig tu khyed rnam las dbugs dbyung ba mdzad pa yin te dad par bya'o// de bzhin
118b2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba 'di yin te/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// mthong ba dang ni zhugs pas kyang // sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing /
118b3(rgyud 'bum): khyed rnams 'dir ni legs par gnas// bde chen theg pa 'di la ni// slar 'chi ba ni yod min te// mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pas// cis kyang mi 'jigs rol bar gyis// srid pa'i sdug
118b4(rgyud 'bum): bsngal ldog pa ni/ / srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir// ston pa mchog tu gyur pa khyod// srid pa shin tu grub pa yin// dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di// khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya//
118b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyis 'thun par gsungs// dam pa brtag pa'i bka' yin no// gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid du dogs med pa'i// byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya//
118b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya rdo rje gang yin pa'o// dam pa'i chos ni mi smad cing // nam yang gtang bar mi bya'o// mi shes pa dang rmongs pa yis// des ni smad par mi bya'o// rang gi bdag nyid yongs spangs
118b7(rgyud 'bum): nas/ dka' thub rnams kyis gdung mi bya// ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung // 'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams// nam yang yongs su spang mi bya//
119a1(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon smad par mi bya ste// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma yi// slob dpon la ni gang smod pa// des ni sangs rgyas kun spang
119a2(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te// rims dang dug dang sbyar dug dang // mkha' 'gro rnams kyis gtses pa dang // gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis// bsad nas sems can dmyal
119a3(rgyud 'bum): bar lhung / / de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che// dge ba rab tu mi spyoms pa// nam yang smad par mi bya'o// bla ma la ni gus bcas yon// rjes 'thun
119a4(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis sbyin par bya/ / des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams// phyir zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni// sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang // rang srog gis rtag
119a5(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen bya na/ / longs spyod g.yo ba smos ci dgos// gang gis bskal ba bye ba ni// grangs med par yang rnyed dka' ba'i// sangs rgyas nyid kyang rtsod ldan la// tshe 'di nyid la ster
119a6(rgyud 'bum): bar byed/ / rtag tu rang gi dam tshig srung // rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod// rtag tu bla ma la yang mchod// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra// de byin sangs rgyas thams
119a7(rgyud 'bum): cad la/ / rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur// de byin bsod nams tshogs yin te// tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// de phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas// deng khyod sku
119b1(rgyud 'bum): ba 'bras bur bcas/ / rang byung dam tshig lha dang mnyam// deng khyod gyur pa the tshom med// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa// kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas// khams
119b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi ni rgyal po che/ / rgyal po bdag por bstan pa yin// de ni bdud las rnam rgyal te// grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs// khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid// deng
119b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dir thob pa the tshom med/ / ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'chang dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan
119b4(rgyud 'bum): 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bden pas gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dpal rang gi dam
119b5(rgyud 'bum): tshig gi slob dpon dang / slob ma'i tshogs rnams kyis dbugs dbyung ba ni 'di yin te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgya yis// byang chub sems dpa' lhan cig bskyed// sangs
119b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas nyid ni rtogs bya ste/ / zhes bya ba'o// de'i rgyu gang yin zhe na/ gang gi phyir khyed rnams kyis bdag nyid thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa tsam gyi mthu nyid
119b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yin no/ / phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyi phyir nges pa'i phung po la rnam par gnas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa nyid
120a1(rgyud 'bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par rjes su rtogs par bya'o zhes bya'o/ / de nas thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig gi
120a2(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon gyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag sbyor ba// rnal 'byor kun dang rjes sbyor ldan// sangs rgyas nyid du rtogs bya ste// mkhas pa
120a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu rtag pa'o/ / zhes bya'o// de'i rgyu gang yin zhe na/ gang gi phyir khyed rnams kyis bdag nyid thams cad 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig yongs su gzung ba
120a4(rgyud 'bum): gdon mi za ba nyid kyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa nyid du rtogs par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal
120a5(rgyud 'bum): rang gi dam tshig rjes su sgrub pa mchog gi dngos grub rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyid du de dag rtogs par bya'o/ / de'i phyir gnas skabs thams cad du'ang ci nus pas sdug bsngal
120a6(rgyud 'bum): dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi skabs mi 'byed pa khyed rnams kyis rang gi bdag nyid thams cad kho na rjes su srung zhing gsad par mi bya'o/ / ci rnyed pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa thams cad
120a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i dam tshig gi sbyor ba yang dag par mchod la/ bde bar gzung ba dang yang dag par 'phel bar bya'o//
120b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid la ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par brtson pa de bzhin du gzhan rnams la na tshod bskyed pa yin no// lta ba log pa dang / phyi rol du mu stegs pa dang / nyan thos thams cad dang /
120b2(rgyud 'bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung bas 'di shin tu gsang ba yin no// ngag ni shin tu mi smra bas so// sems ni shin tu 'gag pas so// gang gis kyang khyod kyis lus ngag yid gsum gyi rdo rje rnam
120b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dpal rang gi dam tshig bla na med pa'i dngos grub mchog tu rtogs par 'gyur zhes bya ba yang gsungs so/ / 'dod pa'i longs
120b4(rgyud 'bum): spyod thams cad kyis/ / cis kyang mi 'jigs rol par gyis// dam tshig 'di ni 'da' dka' ste// sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig/ ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'
120b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu bden pas gsungs so/ / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs la dgongs pa yin no// de ltar yid ni
120b6(rgyud 'bum): rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis/ / rang gi dam tshig mi bzad bde ster bsnyen par gyis// deng ni 'gro la myur bde rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rab tu mnyam zhing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par gyis// de nas
120b7(rgyud 'bum): ro dang bza' ba spyod pa glu/ / rol mo'i mchod sogs kyis ni mgon mchod la// rdo rje bla ma chen po bde phul nas// rang dang gzhan dag ci 'dod mchod par gyis// myos byed myos bral btung
121a1(rgyud 'bum): ba ni/ / ci 'dod pas ni bsten pa yis// glu dang rol mo'i cho ga sogs// ji bzhin rjes 'gro'i bzlas pa bya// rang gsang tshogs blangs pa yi// glu dang rol mo gar
121a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis/ / sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa dang // rdo rje sems dpa'i rol mo sogs/ bud med sogs dang ldan pa 'am// rang gi slob ma dang bcas pa// ci 'dod pa yi longs spyod kyi
121a3(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa byas pas myur du 'grub/ / ces bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la gsang ba'i cho ga'i khyad par ni 'di yin te/ hUM bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po'i
121a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa'i 'o/ / a de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o// hi dpal 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'o// oM pad+ma'i snying po'o'o// ha nam mkha'i snying po ste byang chub sems
121a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po'i rgyal po nam mkha'i snying po yin no zhes bya ba gsungs so/ / rang gsang snying po'i klu dag ni// yi ge lnga pos bya ba ste// rang gsang tshogs blangs pa 'di// mchog tu gshegs
121a6(rgyud 'bum): ba kun gyi yin/ / de nas mchog tu gsang ba rdo rje glu yi mchod pa ni/ rdo rje dril bu mnyam sogs bcas// rnam par dben par ral mo dkrol// rang gsang tsho gas glu blangs pa// gsang
121a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rol mo rab tu sgrub/ / de nas mchog tu shin tu gsang ba'i rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa ni/ 'dzin pa dang bcas bzung ba che'i// bgyi ba rab tu byas nas kyang // dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i ga
121b1(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ / yongs su bskor bas rab mchod bya// de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i// rtog pa thams cad rnam 'phrul
121b2(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / gtam rgyud phyag mtshan phyag rgya yis// gang zhig gar de rol mo yin// gser ram yang na dngul dang ni// de bzhin shing las byas pa yi// rang gi lha yi gdong rnams kyis//
121b3(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'i phyag rgyas gar rnams bya// dkyil 'khor gang dang gang brten pa// phyag rgya sna tshogs mchod pa yis// slob ma'i tshogs ni de dang de// bzla zhing thams cad mchog tu gzhug/
121b4(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs cho ga 'di yis ni// sdig pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur// bsod nams kun kyang 'phel 'gyur te// rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba yin// rims dang gdon dang dug dang nad//
121b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyar dug mkha' 'gro'i 'tshe ba dang // bdud dang gsod par byed pa rnams// 'di ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// dngos grub dag ni phun sum tshogs// dga' ba de bzhin bdag po rnams//
121b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyis// rnal 'byor dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bya ba shin tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas phyag
