121b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyasna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa/ lhag pa'i lha thams cad re re'i mchog gsang ba 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa mngon par brjod nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis byas pa 'am/
122a1(rgyud 'bum): de las gzhan ci 'dod pa'i glu rol mo rnams kyis rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba ste/ re re zhig thog ma kho nar bcom ldan
122a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i glu'i mchod pa ni/ thams cad rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod
122a3(rgyud 'bum): ni rab dga' dam tshig ste/ / bde ba chen po brtan zhing mtho ba gsal gyur cig/ so sor rtogs nas mngon du phyogs shing myur du bdag sgrubs shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
122a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi rigs kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas na// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// rdo rje chos ni zlar blangs pas// rdo rje las
122a5(rgyud 'bum): ni byed par 'gyur/ / de nas rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gis 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ hUM/ rdo rje mda' gzhu dang bcas khyod la 'dud// rdo rje chag
122a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dam tshig dpal khyod 'dud/ / kha T+wAM 'jigs dus rdo rje khyod la 'dud// rdo rje dril bu skyed pa'i dpal khyod 'dud// de nas pad+mo'i rigs thams cad mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig
122a7(rgyud 'bum): gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ la lar skye bo ma rungs pa yi srog 'phrog byed pa shin tu drag po'i sku// la lar 'gro ba mtha' yas 'dul phyir shin tu rno ba'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i sku/
122b1(rgyud 'bum): la lar pad+ma'i gdan gyi shin tu zhi ba'i sku ste 'gyur ba med pa ste// la lar shin tu 'bar ba'i 'dod pa'i dam tshig pad+ma'i rgyal po bdag sgrubs shig/ de nas nor bu'i rigs thams cad kyi
122b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ dbang bskur thams cad dbang phyug dam pa las// yang dag bsgrubs shing mi zad gter gyi mchog/ kun mchog rgyal mtshan
122b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam rgyal sgreng ba las/ / rdo rje rin chen dpal dag legs mchod 'gyur// de nas rang ming gsum gyi ni b+hA ra b+hu baHsAHde nas sring mo bzhi rnams kyis hUM hUM shrI b+h+yo/ de nas klu'i rigs
122b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ni phu phu/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag nA rdo rje bsdigs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ sar+b+ba maM ga maN+Dal mi daM badz+ra d+ha
122b5(rgyud 'bum): ra kra ma bi marda b+hi ki dza b+hi ki ra b+hany+dza ud sA da ya/ nA sha ya/ ha na da ha/ pa tse b+ha smai ku ru kro d+ha hUM ka ra man+ti Na/ de nas thams cad kyi mchog dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchog
122b6(rgyud 'bum): tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ la lar dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stong gi 'od kyi sku ni rnam par mdzes// la lar 'jig dus nyi ma 'char ka byed pa'i 'od zer tshogs
122b7(rgyud 'bum): ni 'jigs chen 'bar/ / la lar mdangs dang 'od zer dang ldan pa de zhing zhi ba'i rgyal po'i sku 'dzin pa// la lar shin tu mdzes pa'i gzugs 'chang mchog gi mda' dang bcas pa'i
123a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhu 'dzin pa/ / la lar gdul bya rnam par sbyang phyir brtson pa'i rdo rje sems khyod mkha' bzhin bzhugs/ ma lus 'dul ba mkhas pa'i bde ba dam pa nyid phyir
123a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag la 'grub gyur cig/ de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga dam pa'i gsang ba'i mchog dpal dam tshig gsum gyi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchog tu grub pa ni 'di yin te/ dngos grub
123a3(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba'i/ / thar pa'i grong khyer bcom ldan bde chen 'jug/ mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis// dzaHhUM baM hoHrab tu grub par mdzod// de nas shin tu
123a4(rgyud 'bum): m chog tu gsang ba'i cho ga mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i dam pa'i dpal dam tshig bla na med pa'i mchog shin tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu shin tu grub pa zhes bya ba mngon par
123a5(rgyud 'bum): brjod nas/ shin tu mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i mchod pa'i glu dang / gar dang / cho gas ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su bsgrubs nas so sor rjes su bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin
123a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu shin tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa yin no zhes bya bar yang gsungs so/ /
123a7(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs cho ga 'di yis ni// rdo rje sems dpa bsdus pa yin// kun mchog sna tshogs chen po yi// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu grub// ces bya ba shin tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das
123b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gtam rgyud sna tshogs can/ mchog tu gsang ba'i rol mo bla na med pa'i dngos grub nyams dang ldan
123b2(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ gang gis sna tshogs pa'i rgyal mtshan mthon po dang ldan pa kun tu rjes su bsten pa mchog gi dngos grub bde ba chen po nyid ni/ de yis yang dag nyams su myong // don yod mchod
123b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu bsod nams ldan/ / cho ga mchog tu brtag pa ste// kun mchog gsang ba chen po ni// dngos grub thams cad myur sgrub byed// gang zhig grong mchog rab dgyed par// zhugs
123b4(rgyud 'bum): te sgrub par byed pa ni/ / shin tu mchog gi 'dod pa yi// dngos grub dbang phyug bde des thob// gang gis dngos grub ma thob na// bsod nams phun tshogs byed pa rnams// dkyil
123b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor mchog tu rab zhugs na/ / sgrub po 'dir ni rab grub 'gyur// gal te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ nye ba'i snying po bsgrubs byas kyang // ma grub 'dir zhugs grub par
123b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / dpal mchog dang po'i rtsa rgyud du// de bzhin myur du grub pa min// ji ltar dang po'i khyim zhugs nas// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor grub pa ltar// dkyil 'khor thams
123b7(rgyud 'bum): cad sgrub pa yis/ / de ltar thams cad grub pa min// ji ltar mchog tu gsang ba yi// khang bzangs dam pa mthong ba yis// dam tshig rnams las nyams pa dang // sgrib pa
124a1(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis bsgribs pa dang / / bdud sogs gdon gyis reg pa yang // rtag pa'i thar pa thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa'am// yang na dkyil
124a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ma grub pa/ / slar yang mchog tu rab zhugs na// de dag myur du 'grub par 'gyur// sgrub min 'di ni cung zad med// dngos grub las dang bde de bzhin// dngos grub thams cad
124a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin 'gyur du/ / rtog pa kun las bsgrub par bya// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
124a4(rgyud 'bum): dpal dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shin tu gsang ba rdzogs so/ / / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi dam tshig mchog gi gsang
124a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dam tshig chen po gsum 'di yin// byang chub sems dpa' mchog 'dzin pa'i// ras la dkon mchog gsum bri bya//
124a6(rgyud 'bum): go cha dang bcas rdo rje mchog/ go cha sogs kyis legs par brgyan// rdo rje mtshon cha brjod pa dang // pad+ma rin chen 'chang ba'o// 'khor lo dA ni btags nas su// gsang ba'i dkyil
124a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dam pa'o/ / ci rigs par ni bsgrubs byas nas// sum 'gyur du ni 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba'i snying po mchog gi dngos
124b1(rgyud 'bum): grub ma lus pa ster ba 'di yin te/ oM b+hA khaM/ khyim mam yang na nags tshal lam// snga ma bzhin du brgyan nas ni// mtshon cha mchog gi cho ga yis// thams cad byas la 'di brjod bya//
124b2(rgyud 'bum): de nyid kyis ni bcom ldan 'das// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// lha ngan rnams la phan pa'i phyir// 'di dag mya ngan 'das pa ston// ma lus 'dul ba la brtson pas// brtan
124b3(rgyud 'bum): zhing nges pa'i cho ga dgos/ / shin tu srid pa la gnas mchog/ cho ga la sogs dgos pa yin// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun zhes// dkon mchog gsum du 'gyur ba yin// srid
124b4(rgyud 'bum): pa shin tu grub pa yis/ / rnam par dag pa'i dpal mdzad mchog/ ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'o// de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid kyi dril
124b5(rgyud 'bum): bu ni/ thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis// kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal// zhes bya ba ni
124b6(rgyud 'bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / de nas dam tshig chen po gsum gyi sdom pa zhes bya ba ni/ longs spyod kun la longs spyod pa// rang lha bdag nyid kyis bsnyen na// dkon mchog gsum
124b7(rgyud 'bum): la mchod pa'i mchog/ bdag gis bya zhes brjod cing mchod// ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor sgrub pa'o// thabs kyi cho ga 'di yis ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams
125a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / bza' min pa yang bza' byas na// rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig chen
125a2(rgyud 'bum): po gsum mo/ / de ltar brjod nas snying po byin la/ phyag rgya bcing ba slob tu bcug nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod par bsgrub par bya'o// de nas/ rdo rje 'dzin pa slob dpon gyis// rdo rje mchod
125a3(rgyud 'bum): bas mchod nas ni/ / ci 'dod pa yi mchod pa yis// slob ma thams cad mchod du gzhug/ longs spyod kun la longs spyod kyang // dkon mchog gsum po la phul bas// 'dod
125a4(rgyud 'bum): pas bdag kyang gzhan rnams la/ / mchod pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// dpal mchog dang po las/ mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga'o// // de nas rdo rje chen po khro bo'i rgyal
125a5(rgyud 'bum): po'i mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga ni/ ras la bcom ldan bri bya ste// rdo rje'i rigs kun bdag po ni// rdo rje nyi ma me lhar 'bar// cho ga ji bzhin mchog tu'o// de yi pad 'dab gcig
125a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pa/ / de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rten// gsang ba'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor che'i// mkha' 'gro ma rnams logs la bri// dang por dmar dang dkar ba dang // gzhan ni thal ba
125a7(rgyud 'bum): lhar dkar ba/ / gsum pa dkar dang lha ba dang // bzhi pa gser lhar dri med pa'o// rdo rje gtum pa'i dbang phyug grub// rdo rje kha T+wAM bsgrengs dang bcas// rdo rje 'dod pa me lhar
125b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bar/ / de yi logs la mtshan ma bcod// rdo rje khyab 'jug ma rdo rje'o// 'khor lo bstod pa de bzhin gzhan// rdo rje dril du ba dan nam// de yi logs na g.yon bsnyems ma/
125b2(rgyud 'bum): cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa yis// khro dang bcas pas zhal bzhad pa// rang bdag la ni thugs gtad cing // sku ni zur gyi phyogs la bzhugs// de nas 'di yi snying po ni// hUMHde
125b3(rgyud 'bum): nas nye ba'i snying po ni/ / rdo rje dril sogs lhan cig tu// rnam dbyen rol mo brdungs pa yis// hi yis glu dang rol mo ni// brdung zhing zur bzhi rab tu sgrub// ces bya ba ni 'dir
125b4(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa'i cho ga'o/ / 'khor lo de ni brtag byas nas// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// mtshon cha mchog gi cho ga yis// cho ga thams cad rgyas pa'o// de nas de kho na nyid
125b5(rgyud 'bum): dang chos dang dam tshig cho ga sbyin pa ni/ rtag tu chags pa las byung khro// rdo rje mi yi phung po'i sku// 'bar ba'i rdo rje khro bo che/ rab 'bar ba yi tshogs kyi sku// rdo rje 'bar ba'i rnal
125b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor che/ / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kun tu' bar// zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'o// de nas chos ni/ thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// nam mkha'
125b7(rgyud 'bum): dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas/ / thams cad myur ba nyid du sgrub// nam mkha' kun mchog sbyor ba yis// thams cad nam mkha' zhes brjod cing // rdo rje phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa//
126a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum yang za bar byed// ces bya ba ni rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig go// cho ga 'di yis thams cad du// mnyam
126a2(rgyud 'bum): par bzhag pas bsgrub par bya/ / kun mchog dngos grub chen po yis// las kyi tshogs rnams mi zad pa'o// zhes bya ba'o// de nas ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho gas
126a3(rgyud 'bum): rang gi phyag rgya rnams kyi sa gar gyi mchod pa byas nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / dpal mchog dang po las rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas mchog tu phra ba dang shin tu
126a4(rgyud 'bum): bzang ba'i rdo rje'o/ / grub mchog gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lor bshad// grong khyer skyed mos tshal sogs ni// ji lta ba bzhin rgyas byas nas//
126a5(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis// ji bzhin du ni rab sgrub pa'i// yid 'ong bzhi dang lhan cig tu// rang gis phyag rgyas me tog stod// ji lta ba bzhin grong khyer 'jug/ g.yon
126a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i kha ni gyen du bstod/ / rdo rje drag po bzhad chen po// sgra sgrog mchog gi phyag rgya yis// 'jug sde mgon la phyag 'tshal bya// de la phyag ni 'di yin te// oM zhes bya ba brjod
126a7(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ / shin tu dga' ba'i dbugs rlung gis// ru lu ru lu l+li/ drug ldan par ma'i ru lu ru lu l+le ste/ 'di ni rdo rje drag po phyag 'tshal ba'i sgra sgrog pa'i mchog ces bya ba 'dir
126b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje phyag rgya phyag rgya ste/ phyag rgya thams cad dang / gzhan rmongs pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / las thams cad la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o//
126b2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu gsang bas 'di gsungs so// de nas yid 'ong dam bcas pas// me tog sil ma dor nas ni// rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang bskur gyis
126b3(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin/ / de la rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di yin te/ pad+ma'i thod pa la bya ste/ de'ang rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pas na rdo rje pad+ma zhes bya ba'o// de nas 'dir
126b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ sor mo thams cad phan tshun sbyar// kun mchog rtse mo dang bcas pa// mthe bong rdo rje bkab pa ni// rdo rje pad+ma zhes grub bo// rdo rje pad+ma'i phyag rgya 'dis// rdorje
126b5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i sbyor ba dang / rdo rje pad+ma'i rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur bar bya'o// 'dis dbang bskur pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin tu gdug pa
126b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / drag pa dang / rab tu gtum pa dang / ma rungs pa'i sems can thal bar brlag nas/ khams gsum ma lus pa'i stobs chen po dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i de bzhin
126b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad ces bya bar byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ba dang / mchog tu brtag pa'i srung bar yang 'gyur ro zhes mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs
127a1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung // chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o// dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya che// byin gyis brlabs nas snying po badz+ra// rdo rje la sogs thob par/
127a2(rgyud 'bum): bzung // rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug grub// rdo rje can gyis byin brlabs 'gyur// bud med rnams kyang 'bebs gyur nas// ston pa'i rdo rje phab pa
127a3(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / rdo rje dang bcas phyag mtshan 'dzin// rnal 'byor ma rnams rab tu 'gyur// de la thog mar re zhig rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba chen po thal bar rab tu rlog pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin
127a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i khro ba'i rgyal po'i bdag po mchog dang po yang dag par 'bebs par byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyis 'khon
127a5(rgyud 'bum): du 'dzin pa'i khro bo'i me 'bar ba'i rdo rje rdo rje dang bcas pa'i kha T+wAM ga'i rgyal mtshan dang nges par sbyor ba/ ba dan dang bcas pa'i dril bu 'chang ba/ rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po shin tu khro ba 'beb
127a6(rgyud 'bum): pabs sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i smin mtshams kyi khro gnyer shin tu 'jigs par byed pa'i spyan ser po dang ldan pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs par
127a7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i spyan gyis blta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis stong phrag brgya bzlas pas 'grub par mdzad do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang /
127b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang du bya ba dang / 'bebs par nus so// thams cad nam mkha'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis khams gsum ma lus pa'i rdo rje bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i
127b2(rgyud 'bum): bdud thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdud pa dang / drag por rab tu gtum pa dang / ma rungs pa'i sems can rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma drag po thams
127b3(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / gang zhig nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams te/ de dag kyang thal bar zlog par 'gyur na/ dgra bo la sogs pa gzhan lha smos kyang ci dgos/ don yod cing thogs
127b4(rgyud 'bum): ba med pa dang / dngos grub thams cad dang / las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i thabs shin tu drag po'i
127b5(rgyud 'bum): man ngag gi bzlas pa ni/ sna'i dbugs phra ba nyid kyis bden pa'i rdo rje tshig gi grub pa'i yid kyi 'dod pa las tham cad kyi dngos grub kyi tshogs rnams la dam pa mchog tu grub pa'o//
127b6(rgyud 'bum): hUM/ de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ma'i lha chen mo rnams kyis bshad par bya ste/ de la thog mar re zhig rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen
127b7(rgyud 'bum): me rdo rje gzhu dang / mda' bstod pa'i spyan g.yon pa ste/ rdo rje spyan gyi lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa dang / sgeg pa dang bcas shing g.yo ba'i spyan gyi zur gyis
128a1(rgyud 'bum): gzigs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa tsam gyis thams cad la rgyas 'debs par mdzad pa dang / don yod cing thogs pa med pa dngos po thams cad dang las kyi tshogs rnam
128a2(rgyud 'bum): la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o/ / de bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'i rdo rje phra mo'i g.yon pa'i khro ba'i bzlas pa ni yid kyi 'dod pas dngos grub thams cad dang las kyi tshogs rnams las
128a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu grub pa'o/ / hrIH/ gnyis pa ni rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba'i dam tshig gi lan zhes bya ba'i lha mo ste/ dbus su rang gi lhag pa'i lha bstod pa'i zhal 'dzum pa'i spyan cung
128a4(rgyud 'bum): zhig 'dzums shing dga' ba chen po'i rdo rje'i lta ba'i phyag rgyas 'dis thams cad grub par mdzad pa dang / tsum pa dang / 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i reg pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa tsam
128a5(rgyud 'bum): gyis thams cad la rgyas 'debs par mdzad pa dang / phyag rgya thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa dang / thams cad kyis gsod par mdzad pa dang / don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i
128a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thams cad dang / las kyi tshogs rnams las dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'i bya rog gi mgrin pa'i dbyangs kyis rdo rje dag gi
128a7(rgyud 'bum): khro bo'i bzlas pa ni yid kyi 'dod pas dngos grub thams cad dang las kyi tshogs rnams la mchog tu grub pa'o/ / hUM/ gsum pa ni rdo rje chen po'i 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba thal bar rlog
128b1(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen mo ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje chen po dang / kha T+wAM ga'i rgyal mtshan 'chang ba dang / sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i bzhad pa smin mtshams kyi khro gnyer gyi khro bo
128b2(rgyud 'bum): spyan te/ rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i ki li ki la khro ba'i spyan gyis lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa'o// badz+ra zhes bya ba dang / ru lu ru lu ru lu hrI zhes bya ba tsam gyis bdud
128b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'joms pa dang / don yod cing thogs pa med par dngos grub thams cad dang / las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o// hi/ bzhi pa ni rdo rje chen po
128b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba thal bar rlog pa 'chi ba slong zhes bya ba g.yon bsnyems pa g.yas pas rang gi spyi bor rdo rje dril bu skyod par mdzad pa/ sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i spyan gyi shin tu gdang
128b5(rgyud 'bum): ba ste/ rdo rje rgyal po drin gyi spun gyis lta ba'i phyag rgyas thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa/ thal lcag la sogs pa dang / bzhad gad dang / brdeg pa dang / phyag rgyas rgyas btab
128b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'chi ba thams cad slospong bar mdzad pa/ don yod cing thogs pa med pa/ dngos grub thams cad dang las kyi tshogs la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
128b7(rgyud 'bum): yum 'di'i dril bu'i dbyangs kyi rdo rje khro bo'i bzlas pa ni yid kyis 'dod pas dngos grub thams cad kyi tshogs thams cad mchog tu grub pa'o/ / Sh+Tha/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/
129a1(rgyud 'bum): chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pas// nam mkha'i khams ltar grangs med cing // nam mkha' kun gyis gnas skabs kyis// dkyil 'khor 'di la rab zhug
129a2(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje mchog gi rnal 'byor gyi// dbang phyug ma lus kun nas 'bebs// de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor pa ston pa des rnal 'byor pa rang gi logs dag tu dgod pa yin te/ zla chos dkyil
129a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rnam pa yi/ / dkyil 'khor du ni dgod par bya// bkod nas thams cad kun mchog gi/ dngos grub dam pa bsgrub par bya// thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che// bdag byin rlab
129a4(rgyud 'bum): sogs sgrub pa yis/ / shin tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de// brtag pa dang ni bsgrubs nas kyang // rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis// rdo rje slob ma rnams gzhug bya// de la re zhig thog
129a5(rgyud 'bum): ma kho nar slob dpon gyis bcug ste/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du dam tshig gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams logs dag tu bzhag nas/ skyes pa rnams kyang
129a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhug cing byang chub kyi sems kyis rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i dam tshig dang sdom pa dag len du gzhug par bya'o/ / khye'u dang bu mo rnams rab tu gzhag la tshogs dang bcas pa'i rang nyid kyis zhugs
129a7(rgyud 'bum): te bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba thams cad bya'o// de nas 'dir slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni/ byang chub sems ni bla med pa// mchog tu bskyed par byas nas ni//
129b1(rgyud 'bum): / gar byas spyi bor thal sbyar mchod// slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya// ci 'dod pa yi dngos grub bskyed// slob ma me tog dor du gzhug/ rnal 'byor ma ni gang la babs// de dang
129b2(rgyud 'bum): de yi lha mo 'grub/ / de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol nas ni// rnam pa kun tu yon blangs nas// rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang bskur gyis// dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin// 'dir mna'
129b3(rgyud 'bum): bsgag pa dang dbang bskur ba ni de nyid do/ / de la 'dir dam tshig gsum sbyin pa ni 'di yin te/ mi byed pa dang so sor rtogs// gdug pa thams cad gnon pa dang // sangs rgyas kun
129b4(rgyud 'bum): dngos rdo rje ste/ / byang chub sems ni che zhing bstan// mtshon cha de ni rgyal kun gyis// kun tu bzang po'i lag tu sbyin// bstan pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir// de phyir phyag na rdo rje yin//
129b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje nyi ma me lhar 'bar ba'i mchog tu gsang ba ni/ rtag tu chags pa las byung khro// rdo rje sems dpa' gdul bya'i phyir// rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar// mchog tu 'jigs par
129b6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa yin/ / de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi gsang ba ni/ rdo rje nyi ma 'char las byung // de bzhin gshegs pa'i grib ma 'di// sprul te ma
129b7(rgyud 'bum): lus bdud la sogs/ / gdug pa'i khrag ni gsol bar spyod// ces bya ba ni gsang ba mchog gi de kho na nyid do// de nas 'dir mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa'i dril bu ni/ shin
130a1(rgyud 'bum): tu gdug cing drag pa dang / / bdag po rogs po bu rnams dang // shin tu gnyid ni log pa dag/ rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pas gsungs// zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis
130a2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa'i rdo rje kha T+wAM ga ba dan gyi dril bu thams cad 'bebs pa dang / rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang / thams cad ltung bar byed pa dang /
130a3(rgyud 'bum): slong bar byed pa'o// de nas rnal 'byor mchog gi dam tshig ni/ khrag chen ga pur dang bcas pa// tsan dan dmar dang sbyar ba ni// tshogs kyi nang nas rab zhugs nas// rdo rje dang
130a4(rgyud 'bum): bcas rdo rje 'dzin/ / srin lag mthe bo'i rtse mo yis// nam mkha' thams cad sbyor mchog ldan// zla ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na// rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa kun la
130a5(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod cing / / ci 'dod pa ni bsnyen bzhin du// nam mkha' kun mchog sbyor ba yis// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// nam mkha' kun mchog sbyor ba yis// nam
130a6(rgyud 'bum): mkha' thams cad ces brjod cing / / rdo rje phyag rgyas btab pa yis// 'jig rten gsum yang bza' bar bya// dngos grub las dang de bzhin bde// 'di la cung zad mi sgrub med//
130a7(rgyud 'bum): las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis// don sgrub ma lus sgrub par 'gyur// don yod mchog tu grub pa dang // gdug pa thams cad gnon par byed// sdug bsngal kun 'gro dpal
130b1(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan/ / rnal 'byor 'di ni las kun byed// ces bya ba mchog tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas ro dang bza' ba spyod pa glu// rol mo'i mchod pa
130b2(rgyud 'bum): sogs kyis mgon la spyod/ / phul ba de yi rdo rje bla ma che// bdag dang gzhan rnams mchod par bya// myos byed myos byed btung ba ni// ci 'dod par ni bsnyen pa yis// rdo rje nyi ma me 'bar sogs//
130b3(rgyud 'bum): ji bzhin rjes 'gro'i bzlas pa bzla// rang gsang tsho gas blangs pa yi// glu dang rol mo gar rnams dang // sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa dang // khams gsum rnam rgyal la sogs pa// bud
130b4(rgyud 'bum): med tshogs dang bcas pa yis/ / mchod pa rgya chen thams cad dang // ci 'dod pa yi longs spyod kyis// mchod pa byas nas rab tu sgrub// ces bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das
130b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya ste/ 'gro ba kun gyi khams rnams kyi// phra rab rdul dang mnyam
130b6(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid/ / rtog pa'i rgyal po grub pa ste// sangs rgyas la sogs mchog grub pa'o// gang zhig blo ni dpag med pa'o// khyad par du ni dmigs mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pas bden
130b7(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ dam pa thams cad bsdus pa'o// zad pa thams cad zad 'gyur dang // 'phel ba thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur// gang zhig mthong bas mi snang 'gyur// gang nas kyang ni 'jig
131a1(rgyud 'bum): mi byed/ / drag po dbang po nye dbang zla// nyi ma mkha' 'gro tshogs dkyil 'khor// khros nas yi ge hUM tsam gyis// ma lus pa ni thal bar byed// rnal 'byor mkha'
131a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor/ / mchog tu zhugs nas mthong nas ni// sdig pa kun las rnam grol te// khyod rnams dang ni rab tu gnas// slar khyod 'chi ba yod min te// khyad par du ni ngan 'gro
131a3(rgyud 'bum): med/ / gzhan gyis mi thub mi sod cing // cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// shin tu srid pa'i dngos grub rnams// ston pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin// dam chog sdom pa grub pa 'di//
131a4(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu yang ni srung ba 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyis 'thun par gsungs// dam pa rtag pa'i bka' yin no// byang chub sems ni spang mi bya// dam chos de bzhin dam tshig dang // slob dpon
131a5(rgyud 'bum): smad par mi bya ste/ / gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin kun de// sems can kun la phan phyir dang // theg pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir// gdug pa 'dul bas dag pa zhes// rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pas
131a6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / shin tu gdug cing gtum pa dang // bdag po'i grogs po bu rnams kyang // phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor mngon spyod kyis// shin tu gnyid ni log tu gzhug/ rtag tu rang
131a7(rgyud 'bum): gi dal tshig bsrung / / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod// rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul// de la phul na 'bras bu che// de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la// rtag tu byin pa
131b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid du 'gyur/ / de byin bsod nams tshogs rdzogs te// tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas// gang phyir 'di la rab tu gnas// dam tshig/
131b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po dang mnyam par// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin rnams kyis// de ring khyod la dbang bskur bas// khams gsum gyi ni rgyal srid che'i//
131b3(rgyud 'bum): stobs dpal 'khor lo sgyur ba yin// rdo rje dam pa'i gsang mchog rnal 'byor ma'i// mchog gi dam tshig gsang ba mthong nas ni// bdud la sogs pa'i sha yang zos nas ni//
131b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs sbyor thob nas khyod grub yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po las/ mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi
131b5(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shin tu grub pa'o/ / de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi mchog tu gsang ba 'gro ba 'dul ba'i cho ga ni/ ras la
131b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan bri bar bya/ / pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gtso// glog gi 'khor lo yongs 'khor ba'o// 'khor ba'i rnam 'phrul gar rnams kyis// pad+ma la sogs phyag mtshan bri// phyag
131b7(rgyud 'bum): rgya 'khor lo ltar mdzad pa/ / de yi logs ni thams cad la// khro gnyer ma sogs bri bar bya// drag po la sogs phyag mtshan gzugs// pad+ma'i lha mor pad+ma bcas// dkyil 'khor/
132a1(rgyud 'bum): de ni brtag byas nas// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// mtshon cha mchog gi cho ga yis// thams cad byas nas 'di brjod bya// de nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
132a2(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ste/ / 'dul ba'i thabs kyis dag pa yin// rol mo'i gar gyis mdzad pa yin// zhes bya ba ni mchog gi rdo rje ste/ ji ltar pad+ma dmar po ni// gnas kyi
132a3(rgyud 'bum): nyes pa sna tshogs kyis/ / tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa// de bzhin khams gsum dag pa'o// zhes bya ba ni mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid kyi dril bu'o// cho ga gang dang gang dag gis// 'gro
132a4(rgyud 'bum): ba rnams kyi 'dul 'gyur ba/ / pad+ma dag mchog rnal 'byor bdag/ de dang de yi bdag por bya// zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig go// de nas ji lta ba bzhin du pad+ma gar gyi
132a5(rgyud 'bum): mchod pas mchod la/ cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po don thams cad 'grub pa'i cho ga ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//
132a6(rgyud 'bum): ras ris de ni blo gros che// ljang khu bai DUR+Ya dang mtshungs// nam mkha'i snying po bri bar bya// de yi 'od kyi 'khor lor brten// dbang bskur ma dang gter ma dang // rgyal mchog mang
132a7(rgyud 'bum): ba mchod pa'o/ / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa de'i// 'khor lo brtag par byas nas ni// mtshon cha mchog gi cho ga yis/ cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin pa'o// de ni rdo rje mchog
132b1(rgyud 'bum): de ni/ / nyi ma 'di ni dam pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong // nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad// de nas chos kyi rin po
132b2(rgyud 'bum): che'i dril bu ni/ bsam pa grub pa thams cad kyi// nor gyi bsam pa grub pa mchog/ de yang 'dod pa rab sgrub phyir// 'dod las thar pa bde ba che// zhes bya'o// dman min rnams
132b3(rgyud 'bum): ni sbyin bya'o/ / 'dod pa kun gyi bde ba rnams// bdag nyid dang gzhan rnams la ni// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs phyir ro// zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi mchog go// dam chog 'di yis
132b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu ni/ / rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// myur du yang dag dam pa mchog/ mi 'gyur mchog ni grub par mdzod// de ltar gsang ba mchog gi tshul dag ni// ji bzhin cho ga mchog tu rgyas
132b5(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / mchog chen des ni rtog pa thams cad kyi// khyad par dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dpal mchog dang po las/ rtog pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga'o//
132b6(rgyud 'bum): / de nas grub chen thams cad kyi// sgrub pa'i mchog ni bde ba che// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya ste// rtog pa kun mchog grub pa'i phyir// snod ma yin pa'i sems can gang // sdig pa
132b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad byed rnams la/ / mthong ba la sogs sems can do// sems dpa' chen pos mdzad pa yin// mthong med long ba de rnams ni// bsod nams med tshogs rtags ldan la// rdorje
133a1(rgyud 'bum): sems sogs sems dpa' mchog/ mthong ba'i thabs kyi rgyu rnams ni// bsod nams sems sogs sems mchog gi/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// dam tshig
133a2(rgyud 'bum): mchog ni bcing ba ste/ / dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' yi// gang phyir sku rnams brtan pa ni// de yi phyag rgyar grags pa ste// dngos grub kun phyir
133a3(rgyud 'bum): de dag sprul/ / gang dag bzung ba tsam gyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs mchog/ mthong zhing mngon par mthong ba nyid// mchog bsdus nyid du gyur pa yin// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis
133a4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / gang phyir bsdus par gyur pa ste// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams// nyams pas 'jigs pas 'grub mi 'gyur// ji ltar rgyal po rnams kyi bka'i// rtags kyi phyag rgya 'da'
133a5(rgyud 'bum): dka' ba/ / phyag rgya gsang ba kun gyis kyang // 'da' bar nus pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin// de ltar bskal pa bye bas kyang // thob par mi 'gyur myur du ni// ji ltar
133a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya mchog gzung ba'o/ / ji ltar 'dul ldan 'jig rten ni// de ltar dngos grub gsungs pa yi// de yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste// dngos grub thams cad mchog tu byed// gang zhig bcing
133a7(rgyud 'bum): ba tsam gyis ni/ / 'dus na bde ba chen po rnams// rdo rje sems sogs skad cig gis// byin gyis brlabs par bstan par mdzad// ces bya ba'o// de nas 'di gsungs nas bcom
133b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis mkhas shing mchog tu phra ba dang / zab pa dang / rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mchog tu dag pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa/ mi zad cing zad pa med pa/ don yod cing thogs
133b2(rgyud 'bum): pa med pa/ shin tu mchog tu dga' ba ma lus pa'i bde ba chen po dang / yid mi bde ba ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i mchog
133b3(rgyud 'bum): tu mi 'gyur ba'i dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog rdo rje dbab pa rnams kyis rab hu sad par mdzad nas/ bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i don yod pa'i mchog gi gsang ba zhes bya ba'i mtshon cha mchog tu
133b4(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i cho ga rgyud phyi ma'i mchog byin gyis rlob par mdzad pa'o/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa gcig pu'i cho ga bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba
133b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / nyin re sngon du lan cig tu// phyag rgya che dang snying po bzla// kun gyi phyag rgya rab grub pa'i// bdag byin rlabs pa gcig pu'i 'grub//
133b6(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ba ni mchog tu grub pa'o// de nas mchog tu gsang ba dag la byin gyis brlabs pa gcig pu sgrub pa'i cho ga mchog grub pa ni/ lan cig dam tshig gsum mchog tu// gsang ba dam pa'i
133b7(rgyud 'bum): khang par ni/ / rdo rje la sogs thob zung na// rdo rje can gyi byin rlabs 'gyur// de nas shin tu mchog tu gsang ba'i bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa gcig pu sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i khyad par
134a1(rgyud 'bum): shin tu mchog tu grub pa ni/ rdo rje dril bu kun bdag nyid// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i skur bdag ldan// phyag rgya kun gyi rnal 'byor bdag/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur/
134a2(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bsdus// kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po nyid byin brlabs// don yod rab tu bdag byin brlabs// rang
134a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gyis ni thams cad du/ / mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// dngos grub las dang de bzhin bde// thams cad byir rlabs sgrub pa yi// mi 'gyur ba ni kun sgrub byed// ces bya ba bcom
134a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rdo rje sems rapas gsungs so/ / dpal mchog dang po las/ dngos grub thams cad byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga mchog tu gsang pa zhes bya ba'o// / de nas yang mchog tu
134a5(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i rnal 'byor thams cad kyi cho ga rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la thog ma kho nar re zhig don yod cher ni rnal 'byor gyi skad
134a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbyangs so/ / 'di yang brtson pa yin no zhes bya ba ni skad cig dbyings kyi don to// gang zhig brtson pa yin zhe na/ smras pa/ rang gi lhag pa'i lha rjes su dran par sbyor bas na rnal 'byor
134a7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ slar yang gzhan ni yang dag par bsdu ba dang / yang dag par kun tu sbyor ba dang / yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor brjod pa'i rnam grangs so// gang yang dag par kun
134b1(rgyud 'bum): tu sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rang gi lhag pa'i lha rjes su dran pa'i rnal 'byor rjes su bsgrubs pas rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba bya zhes bya'o// de la ji ltar thams cad kyi rnal
134b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor yin zhe na/ dam tshig gi rnal 'byor ni thams cad kyi rnal 'byor zhes bya ba yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang // 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas// phyag rgya dam tshig ces su
134b3(rgyud 'bum): bsgrags/ / yid kyi gzugs ni brtan phyir ro// zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi don to// de la rjes su sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor ni dam tshig gi rnal 'byor te/ thams cad kyi rnal 'byor zhes bya'o//
134b4(rgyud 'bum): 'a'adi lta ste/ rdzas mang po yang dag par sbyar bas sbyor ba zhes bya ba grub pa de bzhin du/ thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor bas dag par kun tu sbyor bas na thams cad kyi rnal 'byor ni dag
134b5(rgyud 'bum): tshig gi rnal 'byor ro/ / de la ji ltar na thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor yin zhe na/ sangs rgyas kun bdag yang dag sbyor// ji lta'i dbyibs dang sku dang ldan// bdag nyid bdag
134b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid la ni/ / bkod nas rjes su bsgrub par bya// zhes bya ba ni rang gi dam tshig rnal 'byor thams cad kyi rnal 'byor zhes bya'o// de la rjes su sgrub pa ni// lhag pa'i lha ni gang gang gis
134b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya gang dang gang 'ching ba/ de dang de yi rnal 'byor gyis// phyag rgya de dang der sbyor bya// zhes bya ba'o// gnas mchog tu gsang ba'i rab mchog gi rjes su sgrub pa'i tshi ga rdzas pa
135a1(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu shin tu grub pa ni/ bdag ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// gzi brjid can ni nyid kyang yin// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// de phyir bdag nyid brtag par bya//
135a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya thabs kyi rnal 'byor chen po mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya'o// de nas mchog tu shin tu gsang ba'i mchog gi rjes su sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i khyad par shin tu mchog tu grub pa ni/ rang
135a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba ji bzhin du/ / sna tshogs phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ldan// phyag rgya kun bdag rnal 'byor bdag/ mi 'gyur mchog tu grub par 'gyur// rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i
135a4(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig mchog gi rnal 'byor ni yang dag par kun tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ / de nas gzhan yang slar mchog tu gsang ba mchog tu gsang ba mchog gi rjes su sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i
135a5(rgyud 'bum): khyad par mchog tu grub pa las shin tu mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje sems dpar bdag sbyor ba'i// ji bzhin dbyings dang skur ldan pa// kun bdag phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor
135a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag/ mi 'gyur mchog ni grub par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig gsal ba'i rjes 'gro ba// rnal 'byor kun bdag grub pa ste// gsal zhing gi tu
135a7(rgyud 'bum): grub mchog yin/ / 'di yis mi 'grub cung zad med// dngos grub las dang de bzhin bde// las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub dang // dngos grub ma lus myur du 'grub// ces bya
135b1(rgyud 'bum): ba ni gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rnal 'byor te shin tu mchog tu rab tu grub pa'o/ / 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing // ci 'dod par ni brten pa yis// rnal 'byor dag ni 'di dag gis//
135b2(rgyud 'bum): rang gi bdag nyid rab mchod bya// zhes bya ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu gsang ba bla na med pa theg pa chen po'i dam tshig chen po'i rnal 'byor// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
135b3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi dpal gyi rang gi dam tshig rnal 'byor/ dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gi dngos grub kyi
135b4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'o/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog gi tshe dang / na tshod gzhon pa dang / nad med pa dang / gzugs dang /
135b5(rgyud 'bum): kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / mthu dang / stobs dang / spro ba dang / dngos grub mchog thams cad dang / dpal dang / skal ba bzang po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / shin tu bde
135b6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad la dam pa mchog tu 'grub pa'o// ji srid ma lus shing lus pa med pa lus pa'i dngos grub chen po dam pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la
135b7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu grub pa ste/ rgyas btab pa tsam gyis skar cig gis rab tu grub pa yin no// de'i rgyu gang gi phyir zhe na/ 'di lha ste/ spyod pa
136a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgyal rag lus/ / phyag rgya rnal 'byor la gnas pa// rnal 'byor khyad par gyis bsgrub bya// rnal 'byor dam tshig gis sgrub byed// sems ni stong pa sgyu mar mtshungs//
136a2(rgyud 'bum): lus dang bral bar ma grub ste// lus de yang ni rtsig pa 'dra// bya ba med cing sems dang bral// sems kyang lus dang bral ba dang // lus kyang sems dang bral ba ni// grub pa ma yin de bzhin
136a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di/ phyag rgya rnal 'byor cho gar brjod// ji ltar lus ni sems kyi sa dang // sems kyang lus kyis 'grub 'gyur ba// de bzhin phyag rgya rnal 'byor gyis// rnal 'byor dam tshig bsgrub
136a4(rgyud 'bum): pas so/ / de ltar dam tshig rnal 'byor dag/ phan tshun du ni sgrub pa'i phyir// phan tshun du ni rtag bdag nyid// de bzhin gshegs par 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bya ba ni shin tu mchog
136a5(rgyud 'bum): tu gsang ba mchog bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la ji ltar phyag rgya thams cad dang rnal 'byor dag rjes su sgrub pa yin zhe na/ phyag rgya sku ni bstan pa'i phyir// de yang
136a6(rgyud 'bum): bde bas brtan par 'gyur/ / sdug bsngal gyis ni g.yo 'gyur ram// yang na 'ching thob par 'gyur// de ni rnal 'byor sems las byung // yid bde ba yis rab tu sgrub// yid mi bde bas
136a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba'am/ / yang 'gog pa yang thob par 'gyur// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// phyag rgya rnal 'byor rjes sgrub byed// dka' thub med cing nges pa med// bde ba dga' bas
136b1(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya/ / zhes bya ba shin tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la dam tshig thams cad kyi rnal 'byor rjes su sgrub pa'i bde ba de gang yin zhe na/ 'dod pa kun
136b2(rgyud 'bum): la longs spyod cing / / ci 'dod par ni brten pa yis// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// bdag dang gzhan rnams mchod par gyis// zhes bya ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
136b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bde ba zhes bya'o/ / de la dam tshig thams cad rnal 'byor rjes su sgrub pa de gang yin
136b4(rgyud 'bum): zhe na/ dka' thub nyes pa mi zad pas// sdug bsngal ldan pas myur du bskams// sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g.yengs 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa ni sbyor ba min// de phyir ci 'dod la
136b5(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa/ / kun za de bzhin thams cad byed// ci 'dod bya ba la spyod pa// ci 'dod par ni spyod pa spyod// gang dang gang du 'chag pa dang // dgod pa 'am ni smra ba 'am// gang yang
136b6(rgyud 'bum): de rung ji bzhin te/ / dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa// sgrib pa rnams dang ldan pa 'am// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor bdag/ tshig gis kyang ni de bzhin 'gyur// de nyid rnal
136b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor 'di yis ni/ / thams cad nyid ni bsgrub pa bya// ngan spyod sdig pa thams cad kyis// rnam pa kun tu gnod mi 'gyur// 'dod pa chen po kun bdag nyid// dbang phyug dam
137a1(rgyud 'bum): pa 'grub par 'gyur/ / thams cad rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa'o// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyid// rnal 'byor 'di yis rnyed snga
137a2(rgyud 'bum): na/ / dngos grub rnams dang las mchog gi/ tshogs rnams gzhan lha smos ci dgos// don yod mchog tu grub pa dang // phyag rgya thams cad rjes sgrub byed// dpal ldan sdug bsngal kun
137a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phrog pa'i/ / rnal 'byor 'di ni mi 'gyur mchog/ ces bya ba mchog tu yid bde ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la rnal 'byor thams cad bcing ba ji ltar yin zhe na/
137a4(rgyud 'bum): bsam pa med cing thams cad smra// de bzhin tham cad bsams na kyang// ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa// rang bzhin nyid du snyoms par zhugs// de la ji ltar rnal 'byor thams cad bcing ba
137a5(rgyud 'bum): dang lung bstan pa yin zhe na/ rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyor bas// ye shes tsam la sbyor ba 'dis// rnal 'byor zhes ni brjod pa yin// zhes
137a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi rnal 'byor gyi cho ga mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor chen po dang / shin tu rnal 'byor
137a7(rgyud 'bum): bcings pa dang / lung bstan pa gsungs te/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor bas// mchod pa kun gyis rjes sbyor ba// rnal 'byor thams cad rab sbyor 'di// rnal 'byor zhes ni rje
137b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / de la 'di ltar brjod bya ste// de nyid chen po 'di 'grub ste// mchog gi bdag nyid 'di nyid ni// shin tu mchog tu gsang ba ste// sa sar skye bo la brjod min// rdo rje sngong
137b2(rgyud 'bum): dpon slob ma mchog/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brang ba'i// thams cad rnal 'byor cho ga sbyor// gzhan rnams la ni rims kyis so// 'di la sgrub med cung zad med// dngos grub las
137b3(rgyud 'bum): dang bde ba dang / / thams cad rnal 'byor rjes sgrub pas// mi 'gyur thams cad sgrub par byed// rnal 'byor cho ga gsal ba 'di// gcig pu'ang gang la yod gyur na// gzhan gyis
137b4(rgyud 'bum): mi thub mi sod cing / / bdud la sogs pa gnod mi 'gyur// de la rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// rnal 'byor
137b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug rab grub 'gyur/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po las/ shin tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang
137b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / // de nas rtog pa thams cad don yod cing thogs pa med pa mchog tu mkhas shing phra la rgya che zhing zab la bsam gyis mi khyab cing shin tu tshad med pa/ ma lus shing
137b7(rgyud 'bum): lus pa med pa'i mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad rab tu mchog tu grub pa'i rgyas pa'i rgyud bshad par bya'o/ / zhes bya ba phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rlung bshad
138a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o zhes bya ba phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rgyud bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / g.yon pa'i bang bar dgod pa la// zhabs kyi pad+mo cing de
138a2(rgyud 'bum): bar/ / sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcings te// rang nyid lus ni drang por 'dzin// rdo rje gsor bas kun las rgyal// mchog gi dngos grub kun gyi phyir// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/
138a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// 'dis ni rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// sangs rgyas nyid ni gzi can nyid// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug yin// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bya
138a4(rgyud 'bum): ba thams cad kyi bdag nyid brtan pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs kyang // phyag rgya chen po yongs bzung bas// bde bar gshegs pa rnams
138a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis kyang / / phyag byas mchod cing bkur bar 'gyur// gang gis 'di mthong phyag byed pa// bstod pa dang ni mchod par byed// ston pa mthong ba phyag byed dang // de yis bdag po mchod
138a6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / dngos grub kun gyi chags chen po'i// bde ba phun tshogs dbang phyug che// phyag rgya chen pos 'grub 'gyur te// rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra// lha la sogs
138a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dngos grub kun/ / las kun gyi ni bde ba yang // phyag rgya chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// khyad par du ni rab tu 'jug/ de yis mi 'grub gang yang med// dngos grub las dang de
138b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin te/ / phyag rgya chen po'i byin rlabs pas// bsgrubs pa'i spobs kyis mchog kun 'byung // de nas thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems dpa' chen
138b2(rgyud 'bum): bopo kun gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / chos dang / las dang / gdon mi za bar dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / 'bebs pa dang / rjes su chags pa dang /
138b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang du byed pa dang / sgrub pa thams cad dang / mchog gi sgrub pa dang / mchog gi sgrub pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po phyag rgya bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i de ma chog ces bya ba'o//
138b4(rgyud 'bum): de bcing ba ni 'di yin te// sor mo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje thal mo zhes brjod do// kun mchog nang du bsdams pa yis// rdo rje bsdams pa bshad pa yin// rdo rje
138b5(rgyud 'bum): bsdams pa'i nang du ni/ / mdzub mo mthe bong yang dag sbyar// g.yas pa'i mthe bong rtags kyis ni// rtse mo bkug nas btsir ba bya// mda' lngas bsdus pas bcings nas ni/
138b6(rgyud 'bum): dbus ma bcings pa'i nang du gnas// mthe bong mthe'u chung rdo rje bsnyems// de yi dang po rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje bsdam pa de bcings nas// dbus ma'i rdo rje lcags kyu gnyis/
138b7(rgyud 'bum): dgug pa'i tshul ni de nyid kyis// rang gi snying khar lcags kyu 'debs// lcags kyus rgyal po 'di yis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// dga' ba'i rdo rje lcags kyus
139a1(rgyud 'bum): dgug/ slar yang nye ba'i snying po sgrub// snying khar brdeg pa drag po na// rjes su chags pa'i me yis gdungs// snying po phyogs pas dbang grur dgyes// myur/
139a2(rgyud 'bum): du byon nas 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po dang bde ba chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams
139a3(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs pa dang / brtan pa dang / g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad rgyas btab pas 'ongs te myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal te ma 'ongs na 'jig
139a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po'i mchog gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje mchod yon rdo rje thal mo shin tu rab tu brkyang ba'i thal mo'o// de nas dang po'i
139a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje phyag rgya'i dbus ma'i rdo rje gzung ba'i me tog gi lcug mas bzla bar bya'o/ / rdo rje'i chu dang rdo rje khu tshur gyis dbang bskur na thams cad bdag po nyid dang / tshe 'phel ba la sogs pa'i dngos
139a6(rgyud 'bum): grub thams cad la dgos pa yin pas btung ba byas nas sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa yin no/ / de nas dang po dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ni/ ba dan gsum dang kha T+wAM ga
139a7(rgyud 'bum): bcings nas mi nus par ni dga'/ / rdo rje gar bskor sgrol ba yi// yongs su bskor ba 'dzin pa che// ka pu ta yi kha sbyor ni// spyi bor gzhag ste phab nas kyang // sgeg bcas mdzub
139b1(rgyud 'bum): mo mthe'u chung sogs/ / bkrol nas rdo rje can la dbul// 'di yi 'khor du ma zhugs kyang // rdo rje slob dpon nyid thob 'gyur// rang nyid zhugs pa tsam gyis ni// mchod pas don yod
139b2(rgyud 'bum): grub phyir ro/ / yongs su rdzogs pa'am ma tshang ba// yang na slar yang ci rnyed pa'i// me tog la sogs mchod pa yis// thun mong dngos grub kun 'grub pa'i// ba dan gsum mchog kha
139b3(rgyud 'bum): DA ga ldeg bcas mtha' ma la sogs bkrol/ / glog 'gyu mchog tu bskor ba yis// rdo rje gar gyi mchod pas mchod// sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum pa'o mig gis phyag 'tshal bas rdo rje sems

139b7(rgyud 'bum): pabs mthe'u chung la sogs pa bkrol te/ logs gnyis la dar dpyangs 'ching ba'i tshul byas la mnyam pa'i thal mo rgyas btab pas rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba yin
140a1(rgyud 'bum): no/ / de nas bde ba chen po na rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i chus dbang bskur bar bya ste/ thams cad kyi rdo rje slob dpon nyid dang rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du 'gyur ba yin no// rdo rje khwa
140a2(rgyud 'bum): tshur gyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa rdo rje'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i rtse mo can kha dog dmar por sbyin par bya'o/ / slob mas kyang slob dpon la yon phul la/ de nas me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bsgyur ba
140a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis slob dpon las rdo rje thal mo bskor ba'i phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgyas blang bar bya ste/ de ltar na dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi cho ga'o// de nas dngos grub thams cad kyi dbang
140a4(rgyud 'bum): phyug grub pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po rgyal po sgrub pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyud ni/ bde ba chen po'i gsang ba chen po'i lcags kyu rang gi snying po'i sngags lan cig brjod pas rdo rje sems dpa' spyan drang ngo //
140a5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i skyil mo krung dang ldan pas rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa 'bul bas glog 'gru ba'i gar dang / rdo rje khu tshur yongs su gzung bas bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs
140a6(rgyud 'bum): pa bsgreng bar byas la sgeg mo dga'i rdo rje mas phyag bya'o/ / rdo rje glu len cing bzlas pa'i don ni/ rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis// yang dag mchod na myur du 'grub// de las dang po'i rdo
140a7(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i glu 'di dang po la sogs pa rnams kyis blang bar bya ste/ thams cad bde ba dam pa rjes su chags pa'i thugs// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab tu dga' ba yin// bde ba
140b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po brtan zhing 'thor bar bdag gyur cig/ so sor rtogs nas myur du bsgrubs shing phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje glu ni 'di nyid kyis// bde chen la ni lan cig bstod// rjes su chags nas

140b6(rgyud 'bum): pas 'dzin cing / yi ge hUM gi glu'i bzlas pa bcom ldan 'das bsgrub par bya'o// lan cig sgrub pa ni ji lta ba bzhin mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pas so// de nas de'i 'og tu ji ltar mngon
140b7(rgyud 'bum): par brtson pa dang / ji ltar 'dod pa dang / ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa dang / ji ltar byin gyis brlabs nas yi ge hUM gis rlung gi bzlas pas dga' ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dga'
141a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i shugs kyi rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du 'dod pa dang / ji ltar dga' ba sgrub pa'o// de nas phyag rgya chen po ni// sku gsung
141a2(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ / ji bzhin gzugs kyis rjes 'brangs pas// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan// sems dpa' chen po rang nyid 'gyur// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni bde ba chen po
141a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bshad pa'o/ / 'di las rdo rje mda' la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ phyi rol tu kha bltas pa'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa tsam ni rdo rje'i mda' 'o// mthe bong yongs su bcig
141a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ni rdo rje ki li ki la'o/ / mthe bong gnyis kha phye nas mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mos dbus ma 'dren pa'i srin lag dang mthe'u chung mnyam pa'i kha phye ba ni rdo rje chu srin no// brla gnyis la bskor
141a5(rgyud 'bum): zhing gnas pa ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'o/ / rdo rje thal mo rang gi snying khar bskor bas sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta zhing mgo bos phyag byas la spyi bor gzhag la phab ste gyen
141a6(rgyud 'bum): du gtor ba dang / 'og tu blugs pa dang / mthe bong sbyar nas bskor ba dang / rab tu byug pa ni me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang / dril bu dang ldan pa'i rdo rje mchod pa rnams
141a7(rgyud 'bum): su brjod pa yin no/ / phyi'i mtshams rnams su rdo rje thal mo snying khar bskor bas sgeg pa'o// kha la yongs su bskor nas spyi bor 'jog pa'o// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug/ g.yon
141b1(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yas pas bkug pas rdo rje pi wang skyeng zhing rdo rje glus mngon par bstod pa'o/ / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi sa gar byas la spyi bor rdo rje thal mo bcing ba'o// rdo rje bsdam pa nang du bcings
141b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu'o/ / mthe bong gnyis kyis mdud pa'o// mdzub mo dang mthe bong gnyis kyis mdud pa'o// gnyis kyis nang du mthe bong bcings pa'o//

141b6(rgyud 'bum): tshur gnyis kyis so/ / 'di lha ste/ g.yon pa bsnyems pas g.yas pa bstod pa'i tshul gyis snying khar bzung ba ni rdo rje bsnyems pa'o// bstod pa dang bcas pa'i snying khar

142a1(rgyud 'bum): su rdo rje gar bshad pa'o/ / sgeg mo la sogs pa'ang de bzhin no// rdo rje spro ba rnams kyis ni g.yon pa'i mdud pa lag pa g.yas pa steng du byung bas rdo rje bka'
142a2(rgyud 'bum): bsgo ba byed pa'o/ / mdzub mo dang mthe bong mkhrig mar gzung ste mdud de btsar ba'o// rang gi snying khar dril bu dkrol ba'i tshul lo// 'di rnams kyis thams cad dgug pa dang /

143a1(rgyud 'bum): snying khar bzhag nas rang gi rdo rjer sgom pa'o// rang nyid byang chub sems dpar sgom pa'o// rang de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran pa'o// rang nyid rdo rje 'chang
143a2(rgyud 'bum): chen por rjes su dran pa'o/ / de nas las kyi tshogs thams cad sgrub pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyud ni rdo rje gar las byung ba'i phyag rgya rdo rje 'chang bdag dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang
143a3(rgyud 'bum): don yod cing thogs pa med pa'o/ / rdo rje sku mchog gi gtsug tor gyis las ni rdo rje bsdams pa btsar ba dang / dbus ma'i nor bu dang / bskor ba dang / sor mo thams cad
143a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdo rje dang / sor mo lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi 'khor lo'o// khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis 'khor lo bskor zhing bskor ba'o// khar bskor ba'o// snying khar phab cing 'bar bar
