143a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i rdo rje lta bu'i 'phrog pa rnams kyis gsum dang / bzhi dang / phyir ldog pa dang / rtag tu 'byung ba dang / dpag tu med pa ni bskor zhing btsum pa med pa'i mig gis rab tu zhi ba'o//
143a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe'u chung gi lcags kyu'i mdud pa dang / mdzub mo gnyis mnyam pa'i las ni snying khar rab tu bzhag pa'o// byab pa'o// mdzub mo'i rtse mos mnan par bya'o//
143b1(rgyud 'bum): dgos pas rab tu gzhag pa'o// yongs su bskor nas de bzhin du mdzod spur gzhag par bya'o// kha nag gnyis kyis rdo rje bcings pas mthe'u chung rdo rje'i legs par byed pa'i tshul gyis
143b2(rgyud 'bum): nyebar 'phel ba'o/ / bsdus pa'i tshul lo// rdo rjes brdeg pa'o// thal mos phrog pa'o// rdo rjes bsdus pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug cing bsnams la nang
143b3(rgyud 'bum): du bzhag ste mthe'u chung gnyis kyis kha phye ba'i mche ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/ / des mthil phra bar brdab pa'o// mdzub mo'i sen mo drud pa'o// dbus ma'i rdo rje brtan pa'o//
143b4(rgyud 'bum): byabs nas myur du phyag rgya dgrol ba'o// sor mo sbyar nas rdo rje gtsug tor ro// ba dan gsum pa gnyis kha gyen du lba ba dang / 'og tu kha lta ba'i mdzub mo dang dbus ma'i mdud pa byas
143b5(rgyud 'bum): la/ mdzub mo dang dbus ma de dag 'dus pa'o// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi las so// mdud pa btsir ba'o// cig car du phyag rgya dgrol ba'o// btsir nas dral ba'o// dbus mas bsnun
143b6(rgyud 'bum): te nam mkha' las lhung ba'i tshul lo/ / slong ba'i tshul yang ngo // ba dan gsum pa gnyis mnyam pa'i mthe'u chung rtse mo'i rdo rje dbus ma gdud pas yongs su bskor ba la dbang
143b7(rgyud 'bum): bskur ba'i gnas su mdzub mo'i rtse mo bzhag pa'o/ / dbye ba ni yi ge hUM gis so// gdon las dgrol ba ni yi ge hUM gis so// 'chi ba slong ba ni yi ge a yis so// tshe 'phel ba
144a1(rgyud 'bum): 'og nas blang ba'o/ / byab pa'ang ngo // rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas mdzub mo bkug cing yongs su bskor te mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i 'jigs pa'i gdong gi g.yo ba med pa nyid
144a2(rgyud 'bum): do/ / yan lag thams cad glod par 'gyur ba'o// rab tu gnyid log cing kha gdangs pa'o// rang gi snying khar brdeg pa'o// myur du myang ba'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas kha
144a3(rgyud 'bum): gdangs te 'jigs par byed pa'i kha dang ldan pa sgra gyen du brdzes pa'i spyi bos 'og nas gyen du blang bar bya ba'i las ni yi ge b+ho dang / rdo rje khu tshur mnan pa dang / yi ge hUM dang bcas pa'i
144a4(rgyud 'bum): yan lag gi mchog gi sdigs mdzub dang / rang nyid myur du khros pas lhung ba'o// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya srin lag dang mthe'u chung mnyam pa kha phye ba'i ba dan rgyal mtshan mchog gi
144a5(rgyud 'bum): dpung rgyan gyi las ni phyag 'tshal ba dang / dgod pa dang / lce bskyod pa dang / dpung pa gnyis bsnyems pas bstod pa dang / rgyal mtshan sgreng ba'o// sems dpa'i skyil mo
144a6(rgyud 'bum): kruklung gis gnas shing rdo rje gsor ba nyid kyis ni nam mkha' dbugs gtor ba dang / kun tu g.yo zhing btsums pa'i lte bas char 'bebs pa'i tshul dang / khro bo'i rdo rje nyi ma me lhar 'bar
144a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bzlas pa dang / lta ba dbrog pa dang / drang bas yan lag bskor zhing thams cad rab tu 'bar bar byed pa 'bebs pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa'i rdo rje dran ma'o// rdo rje bsdams pa'i
144b1(rgyud 'bum): ni yi ge hUM gi glus so/ / shin tu srung ba ni yi ge haM gi chos kyi ngag gis so// pad+ma chen po bcings nas ji srid 'dod pa'i bzlas pa 'am/ yang na pad+ma'i khu tshur
144b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa bsnyems pas mar dang / hil mar dang / til dang / 'bras dang / khams kyi phye ma sbyin sreg mchog tu grub pa ste/ oM ni ba ra Na sarba d+harmA hA badz+ra ha ni haM/ oM bi re dzo bi ga
144b3(rgyud 'bum): ta/ sarba d+harmA badz+ra ha ri Ni haM/ oM saM no pa sarba d+harmA pra ti ba d+hi badz+ra ha ri Ni haM/ oM ni ri ti mi ta sarba d+harmA tA badz+ra ha ra Ni haM/ oM sarba b+ha wa b+ha sa ra sarba d+harmA ha ri Ni ha~M/ ka ta ka gnyis kyi rdo rje
144b4(rgyud 'bum): bsdams pa legs par byed pa'i tshul gyis sen mo drud pa'o/ / 'og dang steng du rdo rje bsdams pas bskyod pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe'u chung la sogs pa dgrol bas gar ro//
144b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mos ngag 'byin pa'o// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi lcags kyus brtan pa dang / g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
144b6(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams dang / gzugs brnyan gyi tshul gyis gsal bar ston pa dang / sgra brnyan gyi tshul gyis sems can thams cad dang bdag nyid la bden pa thos su gzhug pa'o// rdo rje khro bar
144b7(rgyud 'bum): / khu tshur gnyis bcings nas rdo rje lta ba'i las so// 'di lha ste/ 'dzum med pa'i lta ba sbyin pa'o// mig 'bras steng du yongs su bskor ba'o// btsum pas myur du lhung ba'o//
145a1(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug pa'i shing bu'i g.yas pa'i mdzub mos bsdus pa ni rdo rje pi wang ngo // rdo rje bsnams pa'i lag mthil dang mnye ba'o// kha dbus mnyam
145a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dbus ma lce'o/ / rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje mchod pa'i las ni dang po'i glu'i bzlas pa ji srid mngon par 'dod pa'o// g.yo ba med cing dgod pa
145a3(rgyud 'bum): dang dgug pa ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i lte ba'i lcags kyu mas so/ / rang gi ma mchu so dag gis nang du yongs su gzung ba'o// rang gi dbang po bskyod pa'o// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje
145a4(rgyud 'bum): gar gyis yid kyis 'dod pa'i bka' bsgo ba yang ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la sbyor ba des kyang 'da' bar mi rus na/ brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po gzhan lnga
145a5(rgyud 'bum): smos kyang ci dgos/ rdo rje thal mo'i mthe bong gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung gis mdzub mo sgreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje'i sku mchog ste/ 'di skad cig bzung
145a6(rgyud 'bum): bas shin tu byin gyis brlabs nas bcom ldan 'das bzung zhing mchod nas sgrub par 'gyur ba dang / dngos grub thams cad la grub pa dang dgos pa yin no// spyi bo'i steng nas
145a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yas su bskor bar bya'o/ / sa la bzhag nas khro gnyer gyis gyen du drang bar bya'o// gnod sbyin gyi gzugs brnyan bris la de'i snying khar bzhag par byas na mangs gzhug tu
145b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su khro zhing bzla bar bya'o// ma mo'i gnas su bcing ba la yi ge b+h+yo sbyar bar bya ste/ ma mo 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyi bsnyen bkur dang
145b2(rgyud 'bum): rol mo la sogs pa'i bka' bsgo ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje gsor ba dang bcas pa'i bzhad pa'i gdong gi las 'di ltar bya ba yin te/ 'dus na rkang pa g.yon pas
145b3(rgyud 'bum): mnan nas bsgrub par bya'o/ / mdun du gzhon nu ma sgrub cing mig gnyis kyis 'phrog pa sbyar bar bya'o// b+ha ga bris nas bltas te bsgrub par bya'o// dbang phyug chen po rkang pa
145b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pas mnan la yi ge hUM la sbyar bar bya'o/ / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rdo rje mangs bsnun te/ de nas 'og tu kha lha bar bzhag ste gsor bar byed pa'o// rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod
145b5(rgyud 'bum): pas bde ba chen po'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i bshad pa'o/ / thams cad rdo rjer byed pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis go cha bcing bar byas la spyi bo dang dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gnyis
145b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bzhag la/ logs gnyis la gnyis dang 'phreng ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin du dar dpyangs bcing ba'o// g.yon du rdo rje mda' 'phang ba'o// rdo rje bsnyems ma'o// phyag rgya
145b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po'ang ngo / / dpal mchog dang po las/ phyag rgya thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni sems dpa'i
146a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rjema'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kha cur ro// rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur ba byas na rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od zer dang bcas pa sbyin par bya'o// mdzod
146a2(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa'i thal ma ji sgru ba bzhin du can du gtsar ba la sogs pa rnams kyis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'i sa tsur bzhes bcings pa ni mamon pa'i mdzu ma kyi rol du khe bskus pa
146a3(rgyud 'bum): bag bu tshur la bzlas pas bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brang chub mngon par rdzongs pa'i nga chubs sade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bu tshur zhes bya bar brjod pa ste/
146a4(rgyud 'bum): ma cing tshogs pa mang pa 'dzibacings pas thar med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang rgyub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / 'bras bu dang ldan pa dang / bdud mi sogs pa gzhan gyi mtha
146a5(rgyud 'bum): mgyur ro/ / phyag tu ba dgang gis bcing sgrubs de na de bzhin gshesas pa nyid du rtogs par byed bya'o// de mtshad na de bzhin ma shems pa thams cad mchong par bgyur t
146a6(rgyud 'bum): shan cananag shegs pathams cad mchong bar 'gyur ro/ / su mchog tsha gdang / dzardzal sa ci brag tu bcad pa'o// rnamams cas tu chung
146b1(rgyud 'bum): dang mdzub mo rtse mo bcing ba snying kha las bteg ste dbang bskur ba'i gnas su rtse mo rab tu bzhag pa ni rin chen ma'o/ / de nyid gyen du kha blta ba'i mdzub mo gnyis phyir bkug pas
146b2(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'o/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje ma ni phyi rol tu dbus ma bcings pa'o// chos kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad do// g.yon pa chos gos dang
146b3(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa rang gi snying khar bstod pa'i tshul gyis bzung ste/ g.yas pas sa gnon cing rab tu rgyal bar byed pa zhes bya ba ste/ des bdud kyi stobs rnams 'joms pa'o// de nyid yongs
146b4(rgyud 'bum): su bskor te gyen du kha blta bar bzung nas gzengs bstod pa zhes bya ba lhung ba slong bar byed cing lung ston par byed pa'o/ / de nyid chos gos mtha' mar pad+ma'i 'dab mkha'abyed par
146b5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa chos 'byung ste/ chos thams cad sbyong bar byed pa'o// de nyid ba dan gsum gyis bzung ba slong bar byed pa ste/ gdon mi za bar dngos grub rol ba'o// 'di rnams g.yas
146b6(rgyud 'bum): pas las byed cing don yod pa dang bcings pa tsam gyis 'grub pa'o/ / lhag ma ni ji lta ba bzhin du bzung bas so// de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
146b7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi khu tshur nad gzir ba'o/ / mig yongs su sbyang ba'o// snying khar gzhag pa'o// byab pa'o// khu tshur gyis 'phrog pa'o// bza' ba'o// khros nas gtor bar
147a1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / phur bu gdon pa'o// rting pa la brdeg pa'o// yi ge oM bris nas dbyi bar bya'o// so rnams kyis bzung bar bya'o// yi ge hUM dang bcas pas
147a2(rgyud 'bum): brdeg par bya'o/ / mtshon cha bris nas dbyi bar bya'o// kun tu sbyin sreg bya'o// dur ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o// spyi bor bzhag la blta bas byab par bya'o// stang du kha T+wAM ga bzung
147a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / rang gi khyim du bskor bar bya'o// rang gi khyim du gzhag par bya'o// 'jug par bya'o// snying kha las gdon par bya'o// lus la bskor bar bya'o// ngag 'byin pa'o//
147a4(rgyud 'bum): snying khar btsir bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po ni sku mchog go// brtan par bya'o// dbang po la gzhag par bya'o// kha la'o// de nyid du bskor bar
147a5(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / dpral bar gzhag par bya'o// snying khar ro// dpung ba gnyis la'o// brla gnyis la'o// 'phreng ba bcing ba'o// dbang po rnams la'o// spyi bo la'o// gdong pa
147a6(rgyud 'bum): la'o/ / kha las bton nas so// thams cad du bskor bar bya'o// phyogs rnams su bskor bar bya'o// rang dang gzhan dag de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran pa'o// snying kha las
147a7(rgyud 'bum): rjes su dran pa'o/ / snying khar bzhag nas dga' ba bskyed par bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid bskyed par bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad nyid sgom pa'o// phung po lnga la gzhag par
147b1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo ltar bskor bar bya'o// lus rjes su dran pa'o// lce gzhag par bya'o// yid kyis mngon par gdud par bya'o// gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o// rmug ci
147b2(rgyud 'bum): so/ / byams pa'o// brtson 'grus so// ting nge 'dzin no// shes rab bo// ye shes so// stobs so// thabs so// nges par brjod pa'o// sa'o// spyod pa'o// so so yang
147b3(rgyud 'bum): dag par rig pa'o/ / ma 'dres pa'o// chos so// lus sna tshogs so// sems can gyi don no// sangs rgyas kyang don no// lus so// ngag go// yid do// rdo rje chen po'o//
147b4(rgyud 'bum): / oM bo d+hi tsit+ta badz+rI/ oM sa man+ta b+ha dre tsAr+ya bi/ oM tsan+d+ra ma d+hi/ oM a ni ro d+ha/ oM dzi ti bi ra ba ra he/ oM sarba dz+nyA ne/ oM ma hA rA ga d+harmA te/ oM bidu ka btse/ oM badz+ra dr-iD+hA tsaN+De hUM/ oM sar+b+ba
147b5(rgyud 'bum): ta thA ga ha/ oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha/ d+harmA hA dz+nyA na bi shud+d+he/ oM kar+m+ma bi shud+d+he/ hUM sum+b+ha badz+ri Ni phaT/ oM kar+m+ma rA ge/ oM badz+ra badz+rI Ni/ oM hUM sarba d+harmA Ni/ oM hrIH/ oM a kA ro mu khaM/ oM
147b6(rgyud 'bum): pradz+nyA bA rA mi tA yai/ bar+b+hu/ oM a~M/ oM sarba ha thA ga ha~M kA yA gr-i/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta b+ha bi shud+d+he/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra/ a/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
147b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi ngag gi phyag rgya ni dbyangs shin tu zab pa'i sgra dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya'i chos kyi ngag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngag thogs pa med par 'grub pa'o// de nas bzlas pa
148a1(rgyud 'bum): ni rjes su dran pas so/ / sgrub pa la de bzhin no// las la nye bar sbyor ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
148a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyag rgya bcing ba'o/ / de nas rdo rje nyi ma me lhar 'bar ba'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ de la phyag rgya chen po ni bdag nyid thams cad kyis rjes su'o// dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje bsdams
148a3(rgyud 'bum): pa nang du bcings la sor mo thams cad kyi 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang mthe bong gi rdo rje bzhag la khams gsum pa thams cad sreg pa dang / 'tshed pa dang / thal bar byed par nus te/
148a4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi g.yon pa'i sor mo sdigs mdzub bya zhing g.yas pa'i lcags kyus dgug par byas na thams cad 'gugs pa'o//
148a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya'i ni khro bo'i rdo rje khu tshur gnyis pa'i rdo rjes mthe'u chung gi lcags kyus bcings te/ des sdigs mdzub bya zhing las thams cad rang dngos grub thams cad nyam
148a6(rgyud 'bum): su myong ba yin no/ / rdo rje thal mos mdzub mo bcings la khro gnyer thur du gzhag par bya zhing me stag tu myur du 'phro zhing g.yo ba ni rdo rje khro gnyer ro// thams cad sreg par byed pa dang
148a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'dul bar byed pa dang / rab tu bdul bar byed pa ni khro gnyer gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mos legs par bskor bar g.yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu ste dgug pa dang / gzhug
148b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / sgrub pa thams cad la don yod pa'o// rdo rje pad+ma dbus mnyam pa'i kha 'bus kyi mdzod do// rdo rje pad+ma ni thams cad gcod par byed pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa ni mthe bong dang
148b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo'i gdu bus g.yas pa'i hUM gis mdzub mo bzung ste thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / mchog tu grub pa'o// rdo rje hUM mdzad las byung ba ni g.yas pa'i mdzub mos
148b3(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa'i yi ge hUM bzung ba ste/ gzhu chud 'dren pa zhes bya ba thams cad rjes su chags par byed pa dang 'bigs par byed pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa las rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi mchog go/
148b4(rgyud 'bum): bsdams pa'i g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur g.yas pa'i rtse gsum gyis mtshan pas yongs su bzung ba ste/ thams cad dral bar byed pa'o// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis
148b5(rgyud 'bum): mthe'u chung yang dag par brkyang ba g.yon lag pa'i steng du bzhag pa ni kha T+wAM ga bsgreng ba ste/ gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya phye zhing dral bar byed pa dang / rgyas 'debs pa dang / gsod
148b6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / za ba la sogs pa'i yo byad thams cad g.yas pas 'khor lo bzung ba'i tshul gyis stod cing dor ba ste/ thams cad gcod pa dang / gcod par byed pa'o// rdo rje chen
148b7(rgyud 'bum): mam pa'i rdo rje'o/ / g.yas pa'i rdo rje 'bebs pa dang / sbyor ba sngo zhing g.yo ba'i 'dab ma can gyi b.ran gsum pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe bong dang mdzub ma gnyis
149a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje las byung ba'i srin lag mnyam par sbyar zhing mthe'u chung kha phye'o/ / dpal thams cad byed pa dang / rnam par rgyal bar byed pa dang / gdug pa thams cad 'jom
149a2(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa dang / thams cad 'bebs par byed pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bshad pa'o// rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi ni// rdo rje thal mo mnyam byas la// mdzub mo gnyis
149a3(rgyud 'bum): kyis dar dpyangs bcings/ / mthe bong srin lag rdo rje ni// yongs su bskor te dbang bskur ro// 'bar ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa phyag nas gzung bar bya'o// ci 'byor pas slob dpon la yon
149a4(rgyud 'bum): phul te/ dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog phun sum tshogs pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rdo rje phyag rgya rdo rje rin ti ri las
149a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba ste/ don yod thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// de nas las kyi phyag rgya bzhi ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi dam tshig ni rdo rje
149a6(rgyud 'bum): khu tshur g.yon pas bsnyems pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje gsor ba ste/ 'dis thams cad brgyal ba dang / 'bar ba dang / sreg pa dang /
149a7(rgyud 'bum): ltung ba dang / rgyas btab pa dang / bsad pa dang / slong ba dang / khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang / brtan pa dang / g.yo ba thams cad la nges par sbyor ba dang /
149b1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub dang / mchog thams cad sgrub pa'o// de nas las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo ni khro ba'i khu tshur ro// de dag gi las dam tshig phyag rgya'o//
149b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo'i sor mo gnyis kyis thams cad dgug pa'o// snying khar cig shos dag g.yas pa'i gdug pa thams cad gcod pa'o// mkhrig ma'i mdud pas g.yas pa'i khro bo 'gugs pas
149b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dgug pa rab tu gzhug pa'o/ / bstod pa dang bcas pa'i mda' 'phangs pa'o// de bzhin du rdo rje rtse gsum pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje gar gyi sbyor bas rang gi phyag rgya gyen du
149b4(rgyud 'bum): 'phang ba'o/ / las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas la rdo rje thal mo rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya ste/ rdo rje gar gyi sbyor bas rang gi dam tshig gis phyag rgya steng du dor bste thams cad
149b5(rgyud 'bum): la rgyas gdab pa dang / sgrub pa dang / gsod pa dang / 'bebs pa dang / 'tsho bar byed pa ni rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa'o// de nas ngag gi phyag rgya ni sprin gyi sgra sgrog pa'i hUM yig gi hUM phra ba'i
149b6(rgyud 'bum): sgra dang bcas pa khro zhing gsal ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje ngag go/ / sgrub pa'i don bsgrub par bya'o// de nas ma grub na las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba'o// sgrub pa ni de bzhin du phyag rgya chen po lan cig
149b7(rgyud 'bum): tu bya'o/ / las la nges par sbyor ba khro gnyer gyis so// rdo rje hUM mdzad las byung ba'o// ske tshe dang bcas pa'i til mar rnon po'i sbyin sreg ni g.yas pas so// de nyid kyis btang ba'o// /
150a1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid kyi thams cad 'ching ba'o// g.yo ba med pa nyid do// gnyid log pa bstan pa'o// khro bo'i rdo rje lta ba'i sdigs mdzub bo// phyag rgya glod par gyur pa'o// mdzub
150a2(rgyud 'bum): mo gnyis yang dag par sbyar nas phye ba'o/ / de dag nyid kyis gdu bu bcing ba'o// mche bas btsar ba'o// de nas dral ba'o// g.yas pas brdeg pa'o// mdzub mo gnyis kyis 'bar
150a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / g.yas pa'i mdzub mo g.yon pa lhung ba'i tshul lo// mdzub mo gnyis kyis 'bar bar phye ba'o// gcod pa'o// mdzub mo gnyis kyi sor mo sbyar ba'i rtse mo gcod pa'o// lag pa gnyi
150a4(rgyud 'bum): drag tu mnye ba'o/ / thams cad du sor mo thams cad dor ba'o// cig car du phyag rgya dgrol ba'o// drang zhing g.yo bas sdigs mdzub bo// g.yas pa'i mdzub mo gdengs ka bskyod pas
150a5(rgyud 'bum): sdigs mdzub bo/ / g.yas pa'i mdzub mo mche bas gzung ba'o// du ba dang / dgod pa dang / rgyug pa la sogs pas bstan pa'o// mdzub mo gnyis kyis se gol rdeb pa'o//
150a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa'i steng du g.yas pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// sa la rab tu gzhag pa'o// bskyod par bya'o// gar bya'o// 'byin pa'o// brlab par bya'o// thams cad du brlab par bya'o//
150a7(rgyud 'bum): ha har dgod pa'o// bskor ba'i dgug par bya'o// drang bar bya'o// gtang bar bya'o// yongs su bskor nas nub par bya'o// de nas dor ba'o// myur du dor ba'o// de bzhin du
150b1(rgyud 'bum): kun nas 'dren pa'o/ / de bzhin du gyen du drang ba'o// rang nyid kying ro bya'o// bdag nyid la brdeg par bya'o// snying khar brdeg par sbyin par bya'o// rang nyid kyis rang gi skra 'bal bar
150b2(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / sdang bar sdom pa'o// rang gis gos stod par bya'o// khro bas de bzhin du 'bar ba ston pa'o// g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu'o// de nyid kyi rab tu gzhug pa'o// g.yas
150b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i se gol lo/ / g.yon pa'i se gol lo// lce reg pa ni mdzub mo gnyis kyis so// yan lag la ba spu g.yas su bskor bskor bas 'khyil ba'o// lhung ba la sogs pa byed pa'o//
150b4(rgyud 'bum): dus su sgom pa'o// khro ba'i lha bas shing drung rnams la yid kyis 'dod pa'o// de bzhin du sa la'o// lta ba'o// smin ma'o// so'o// phu'o// phyag rgyas brdeg pa'o// rgyal
150b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan sgreng ba'o/ / khro bo dang bcas pa'i 'jigs byed kyi blta bas so// 'dzum pa med pas blta bas so// de bzhin du 'bar ba 'ching bas so// phyag rgya bskor ba'o// gtsug
150b6(rgyud 'bum): hor las mdzub mo'i rdo rje gzhag par bya'o/ / de bzhin du snying khar ro// phyag rgya de dgrol ba'o// phyag rgya zur du bslang ba'o// mdzub mo'i rtse mo brtan par sbyar ba'o// lha bas
150b7(rgyud 'bum): sbreng nas 'og tu lhung ba'o/ / 'og nas gyen du 'dren pa'o// yi ge hUM khros pa'o// 'jigs byed kyi blta bas so// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga dral ba khro bas so// rdo rje snying khar sgom
151a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / rdo rje rtse gsum dral ba'o// gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhig par bya'o// yi ge hUM gis so// hi'o// g.yas su dbugs dbyung ba'o// de nyid kyi dong rtse
151a2(rgyud 'bum): gsor ba'o/ / khro bo'i lta ba de bzhin du'o// khu tshur g.yas pas mnan te g.yon pas so// bzung nas dgug par bya'o// dong tshe gsor ba ni gnyis kyis so// g.yon pa'i dril bu
151a3(rgyud 'bum): dral ba'o/ / de bzhin du rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi g.yas pa'i khu tshur g.yon pa'i rdo rje khro bos mnan te mthe'u chung gi gdu bu dkrol ba'i khu tshur gyis 'phrog par bya'o// g.yas pa'i dril bu dral ba'o//
151a4(rgyud 'bum): tshegs dang bral ba lhung ba na yid kyis so// 'khor lo dral ba'o// rtse gsum dral ba'o// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi g.yon pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis mnan te/ de bzhin du gdu bu
151a5(rgyud 'bum): bkrol bas 'phrog par bya'o/ / rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po rjes su dran pas mdun du bsgrub par bya'o//
151a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khro bo rgyal po'i phyag rgya'i rgyud do// / de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni/ pad+ma chen po rdo rje thal mo kha sbub pa dbu mo dang / mthe bong
151a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / mthe'u chung kha phye ba'i 'dab ma bzhi pa chos nyid thams cad thob pa dang / thams cad rjes su chags par byed pa'o// phyag rgya chen po rnams ni de bzhin no// dam tshig phyag
151b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya rdo rje pad+ma bshad pa'o/ / pad+ma'i rigs rnams kyis rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'o// de la pad+ma de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni nang gi rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'o// de bzhin
151b2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i pad+ma pang par gyen du kha phye ba lha bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ming can gyi phyag rgya pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya'o/ / rdo rje pad+ma chen po'i rdo rje pad+ma snying khar rdo rje bcing brdo rje pad+ma'i chags pa zhes
151b3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / pad+ma chen po'i bdag po mdzub mo mnyam pa 'og tu kha lha babang bar bzung ba pad+ma'i sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// pad+ma chen po'i ba dan rin po che gnyis bzung zhing des pad+ma sbyin
151b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / 'di rnams kyi chos nyid thams cad las thob pa dang / thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshogs thams cad las sgrol ba dang / bsam pa thams
151b5(rgyud 'bum): cad yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu grub pa zhes bya'o/ / rdo rje rtse gsum dral ba'o// de nas pad+ma lha'i bdag po rnams kyi phyi rol gyi bsdams pa las byung ba'o// de la don yod rgyal po
151b6(rgyud 'bum): ni 'og tu mdzub mo gnyis kyi kha 'bus pa khro gnyer la gzhag par bya ste/ pad+ma'i khro gnyer gyi spyan no// rdo rje bsdams pa kha gyen du 'bar ba ni mgrin sngon gyi'o// g.yon pa'i
151b7(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo bkug pa mthe bos yongs su bzung ste/ dung gi dbyibs de g.yas pa'i mthe bong bsgreng ba bteg ste/ mthe'u chung mnyam pa'i kha 'bus pa'i pad+ma dang / sor mo lhag pa
152a1(rgyud 'bum): @yang dag par brkyang ba'i 'khor lo ni pad+ma'i khyab 'jug ma'o/ / pad+ma las byung ba'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa'i lcags kyu dang sor mo lcug ma kha phye ba'i pad+ma las byung
152a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i zhes bya'o/ / rta mgrin gyi ni mdzub mo gnyis shin tu sbyar ba'i lcags kyu rgod ma'i kha shin tu rab tu brkyang ba'i srin lag gi rtse mo dang / mthe'u chung dang gnyis rab tu brkyang ba so sor
152a3(rgyud 'bum): phye la g.yon g.yo zhing bzung ba ni pad+ma'i lcags kyu zhes bya'o/ / 'di rnams kyis dbang bskur ba thams cad dang / las thams cad dang / grol ba thams cad dang / dgug pa thams cad
152a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi dngos grub don yod pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bshad pa'o// de nas las kyi phyag rgya ni kha T+wAM ga bcings nas pad+ma'i rigs thams cad kyi dmatshas
152a5(rgyud 'bum): gi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du gzung bas so/ / ngag gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gzungs dgug pa ni chos kyi ngag gis bzlas pa'i don shes pa'o// pad+ma chen po bcings nas yid kyi sbyin sreg bya'o//
152a6(rgyud 'bum): sems kyis zhi bar bya'o// dngos po bsrung bar bya'o// rnam par sbyang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ba sgrub par bya'o// las thams cad pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
152a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i rgyud do/ / / de nas nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po de bzhin no// dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje rin chen te mthe bong dang mdzub mo'i sor mo bzhi ni rtse mo mnyam
152b1(rgyud 'bum): nas 'og tu rab tu bsdus te/ dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje thal mos dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa'o// des ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur ba'o// rdo rje de nyid snying khar ro// gyen du kha blta ba'o//
152b2(rgyud 'bum): de nyid khu tshur ro// khu tshur spyi bor bzhag la me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa dbul bar bya'o// 'di nyid dbus su bzhag nas las kyi phyag rgyar bzung ba'o// dbang bskur ba thams cad
152b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi rin chen po che'i gter gyi mchod pa thob pa'i don du yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi dam tshig ni gsal ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// g.yon pa'i khu
152b4(rgyud 'bum): tshur snying khar bstod nas g.yas pa nor sbyin pa bkrol ba'o/ / nor bu'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya nyid kyis so// snying po'i ngag klu'i rgyal pos bzla ba ste bka' bsgo zhing de bzhin du las la nye bar sbyor
152b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / gal te ma grub na dbang bskur bar gnas pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyis nam mkhar las thams cad kyi bka' bsgo ba'o// chos kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi tshogs ni 'di'o// don yod thogs
152b6(rgyud 'bum): med grub pa dang / / las kyi tshogs ni sgrub pa dang // ngag gi phyag rgya'i bka' bsgo ba// thams cad myur du mkha' las byung // zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/
152b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// // de nas phyi'i rgyud ni phyag rgya chen po ni g.yon par kham por dang g.yas na mda' bstod pa'o// de rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'jug pa
153a1(rgyud 'bum): la bya ste/ lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gi gdu bus lu gu rgyud bcing bar byas la mdzub mo dang / dbus ma dang / srin lag mnyam ste rtse gsum pas
153a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan pa ni ming po rnams kyi'o/ / ji lta ba bzhin du bzung bas lha mo rnams kyi'o// rdo rje bsdams pa'i dbus ma dang srin lag gis sor mo'i rtse mo bzhi la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung bzhi'i
153a3(rgyud 'bum): rtse mo 'dus pa ni lha mo rnams kyis 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ / sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// gang gi tshe dkyil 'khor gyis brtag par ma nus na de'i tshe 'di bcings
153a4(rgyud 'bum): te bltas na dkyil 'khor brtag pa dang / mthong ba dang / mchod pa ci dgar 'grub par 'gyur ro// gdengs ka can gyi dbang po rnams kyi ni mthe bong bcings nas phyi rol tu kha bltas
153a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sor mo gdengs ka sgreng ba ste/ klu thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba'i dam tshig ste/ gal te 'da' bar byed na 'chi bar 'gyur ro//
153a6(rgyud 'bum): lho 'phye lag pa ste thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// dbus ma srin lag bzhi'i mdud pa legs par byed pa'i sbyor bas nye bar spyod cing bsdus la mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis kyis
153a7(rgyud 'bum): brdeg par bya ste/ nye bar 'phel ba dug thams cad 'bar ba'o// kun nas bsdus na dug thams cad 'ching ba'o// 'di nyid kyis dug thams cad bza' ba dang / 'pho ba dang /
153b1(rgyud 'bum): dug med par bya'o// gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung ba'i rdo rjes khros nas myur du gzhig par bya'o// phyi'i phyag rgya'i rgyud do// / de nas bcom ldan
153b2(rgyud 'bum): 'das thams cad mchog dbang phyug dam pa sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje thal mo mnyam bzhag nas// ba dan gsum ni yongs su bzung // rdo rje khyab 'jug ces bya ba// der na
153b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad gcod par byed/ / rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas nyon mongs pa'i dgra thams cad kyi mgo rnams bcad nas mchog tu byung ba thams cad grub pa'o// mthe'u chung mthe bong dang
153b4(rgyud 'bum): sbrel ba'i/ / lag gnyis steng du 'og tu ni// dbus ma gsum gyi rtse gsum mtshan// rdo rje 'dzin ma zhes sgrub pa'o// rdo rje dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba don
153b5(rgyud 'bum): yod pa'i dam tshig go/ / rdo rje pad+ma mnyam bzhag nas// gang der ji bzhin de bzhin du// shin tu thob dka'i sangs rgyas kyang // sgrub pa bzlas pas sgrub par byed// rdo rje chos nyid
153b6(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ba'i phyag rgya sgrol ma'o/ / mdzub mo bsdams pa'i phyi rol dgug/ mthe bong rdo rje bkab pa ste// rdo rje chen po'i nor bu ster// zhes bya ba ni rdo rje nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//
153b7(rgyud 'bum): / de nas thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pas bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi tshogs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni 'di yin te/ de la dang po re zhig dang po'i dngos grub
154a1(rgyud 'bum): bcu rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya chen po stong 'gyur te/ ji lta ba bzhin du dam tshig phyag rgya mtshan rnams kyis lag pa g.yas pa dang
154a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa dag gi rdo rje chen po'i sbyor ba las thams cad kyi dngos rtsub tu sgrub par byed pa'i spong pa nyid du 'gyur te/ rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du bcings pas so// de ltar na rang gi mtshan
154a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi khu tshur rdo rje gar las byung ba'i phyag rgya skyong dang po'i las kyis tshogs brgya sgrub par byed pa'i rdo rje las byed pa gsum mo/ / de ltar lag pa g.yas pa dang / g.yon pa'i cig shos kyi
154a4(rgyud 'bum): las thams cad rab tu sgrib par byed pa'i las kyi phyag rgya spong bzhi pa'o/ / de ltar na ma lus pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni lag pa gcig gis phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba rab tu sgrub pa'o//
154a5(rgyud 'bum): de ltar 'gro ba don kun tu// 'khor dang dam tshig las dang bcas// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa ste// rdo rje sems dpas sgrub par mdzad// de ltar gsang ba rgya chen rmad du
154a6(rgyud 'bum): byung / / mchog tu 'gro ba thams cad sbyong byed pa// mchog dang po yi bla ma bla na med// gsal ba'i rgyud ni nga yis yang dag bshad// dpal mcho ga dang po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po
154a7(rgyud 'bum): las/ rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud do// / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// gsang ba kun gyi bdag brtan pas// de nyid phyag rgya'i rgyud chen po// mtshon changam
154b1(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa'i tshogs mchog tu mkhas shing phra ba/ rgya che la zab pa
154b2(rgyud 'bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad med pa/ gsal zhing mnyam pa med pa/ bla na med pa'i bla ma mthar thug pa med pa'i dngos grub kyi gsang ba sgrub pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub
154b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi las rnams sgrub pa po don yod cing thogs pa med pa bshad par bya'o/ / zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das mchog tu gsang bas gsungs so// ma mchu so rnams kyis bzung la
154b4(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba chen pos dang po'i rdo rje blta bas lha zhing byed pa dag gis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o/ / bde ba chen po'i gsang
154b5(rgyud 'bum): ba chen po'i rdo rje rdo rje can zhe bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen pos dgod cing brtan pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i byed pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las
154b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams sgrub par byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// khro gnyer dang bcas pa/ khro bo'i rdo rje lta ba dang bcas pa'i byed pa dang / sna'i dbugs
154b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i yi ge'i hUM gis rdo rje thams cad kyi dngos grub ste/ rdo rje nyi ma lhar me 'bar ba'i lta ba'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de bas cung zad 'dzub pas dngos grub thams cad kyi
155a1(rgyud 'bum): l as kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje lba ba'i byed pa rnams kyis mchu mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdo rje la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rnams sgrub par
155a2(rgyud 'bum): byed pa ste/ pad+ma chen po'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phra bar 'dzum pa'i lta ba'i byed pa rnams dang / bzhin 'dzum pa dang bzhad pas
155a3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' la dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs sgrub par byed pa ste/ rdo rje chen po ni nor bu'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// don yod thogs med grub pa dang // bden pa'i bdag
155a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid 'jigs pa med/ / sangs rgyas kun dang bdag nyid kyang // gsang ba'i phyag rgya legs grub stsol// dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs kyang // de nas de phyir mchog dang po// bcom
155a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ dang po shin tu mkhas shing phra la zab cing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ mchog gi mchog ni dang po dang // mchog tu gsang ba dam pa ste/
155a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya la sogs tshogs// rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin// rdo rje 'chang chen slob dpon ni// mchog tu dang zhing rab dga' bas// snying po la sogs rnam
155a7(rgyud 'bum): med kyang / / myur du thams cad sgrub par byed// snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs pa// sgrub pa 'di ni rmad byung ste// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pas// ma grub rnams kya
155b1(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur/ / gang zhig grub par ma gyur dang // bsod nams phun tshogs mi ldan na// bdag nyid dam ni rdo rje sems// bsgrubs na de ni myur du 'grub// gal te rdo rje sems dpa'
155b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ snying po sogs dang nye snying pos// bsgrub pa byas kyang ma grub na// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgyas bsgrub par bya// de phyir gsang ba'i btsun mo 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' rab
155b3(rgyud 'bum): dga' byed/ / rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// dgyes pa de yis myur du 'grub// de nyid chen po 'di grub pa// dam pa mchog gi bdag nyid ni// gsang ba mchog tu bsod nams
155b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / so so'i skye bo la brjod min// de nyid grub pa'i rjes 'brang ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i grub pa gang // gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// de bzhin gzhan la sbyin mi bya//
155b5(rgyud 'bum): gis grub par ma gyur na// de la de nyid sbyin par bya// de nyid 'dzum pas myur du ni// bdag byin brlabs pas 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid chen po dag pa 'di// rdo rje can gyi mtshon cha
155b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ phyag rgya'i rgyud ni bla med pa// mchog tu gsang ba bshad pa yin// de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brang ba'i// rdo rje slob dpon kun mchog la// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod ma/
155b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan rnams la yang de bzhin sbyin// phyag rgya'i rgyud ni gcig pu 'di// bdag nyid gang la yod gyur na// bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis ni// mi thub pa dang mi song 'gyur
156a1(rgyud 'bum): de la rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin/ / kun mchog dngos grub kun gsol ba// kun gsol kun byed thams cad du// bka' bsgo ba kun grub par 'gyur// dpal
156a2(rgyud 'bum): mchog dang po gsang ba'i bla ma dam pa'i dpal rang gi dam tshig gi bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i cho ga'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po
156a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog dang po mchog tu mkhas shing phra la zab cing rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab la mtha' med cing shin tu mtha' yas pa/ tshad med cing gzhal du med pa
156a4(rgyud 'bum): bla na med pa/ don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i mchog de kho na nyid kyi snying po mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i
156a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dam pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dang / rab tu dga' ba thams cad dang / bde ba dang /
156a6(rgyud 'bum): yid bde ba'i dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa dang / mchog gi phyag rgya'i rgyud bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// tsum pa nas
156a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das mchog dang rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni/ dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor zhes bya bar
156b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rnal 'byor zhes bya bar gang brjod pa'o/ / de gang dang gang la nye bar sbyor ba de dang der bcom ldan 'das ni/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po
156b2(rgyud 'bum): lhag pa'i lha/ / byin rlabs mchog ni rtags mdzad nas// rdo rje sems dpa' myur du 'grub// tsum pa na 'khrud pa la sogs pa'i reg bya'i rgyas btab pa tsam gyis kyang ma
156b3(rgyud 'bum): lus shing lus pa med pa dang / lhag ma med pa thams cad kyi mchog dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs yid kyi 'dod pa
156b4(rgyud 'bum): / grub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba shin tu mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya'o// rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum zhing g.yo ba'i mig gi zur gyis blta ba'i phyag rgya ste/ bcom ldan
156b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi dga' ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i mda' zhes bya bas rgyas btab pas thams cad rjes su chags pa dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dngos grub mchog la sogs pa'i dngos
156b6(rgyud 'bum): grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs yid kyi 'dod pa rnams sgrub par byed pa'o/ / 'dzum zhing cung zad phye ba'i mig gis lta ba ni mchog tu dga' ba'i dpal rdo rje spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya thams
156b7(rgyud 'bum): cad sgrub par byed pa ste 'dis blta zhing btung bar bya'o/ / 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod dga' ba'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gi dngos grub ces
157a1(rgyud 'bum): dra ba'i drug tu ste/ tshe zang pa thams cad kyang 'dis rdo rje sems dpa'i tshod gzhon pa dang / rang med pa dang / gzugs dang / spobs dang / 'azi brjid kyi slobs/
157a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / spro ba dang / dngos grub kyi mchog thams cad dang / dpal dang / skal ba bzang po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / shin tu bde ba thams cad dang / yid bde ba dang / dngos grub kyi
157a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog thob pa ste/ ji srid dngos grub kyi mchog thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu dam pa grub ste/ bcom ldan 'das yum gyis rgyas btab pa tsam gyis skad cig ma gcig gis grub pa'o//
157a4(rgyud 'bum): bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i yon pa'i mig dgod cing bstod pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dpal don yod pa'i dga' ba'i rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyun zhes bya ba'i
157a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya ste/ 'dis rgyas btab pas thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar byed pa dang / phyag byed du bcug pa dang / rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang / ji bzhin ji srid mchog thams
157a6(rgyud 'bum): cad grub cing dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug nyid rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o/ / sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i lta ba dang / 'dzum pa dang / gsong zhing phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan pa ni bcom
157a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi phyag cu phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya ste/ dga' ba cheran po dpal don yod pa'i dbang phyug gi ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya sde/ 'dis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i brtad
157b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos grub thams cad la rgyas btab pas 'dud par gyur nas/ dngos grub mchog thams cad la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs kyis mchog gi dam
157b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dngos grub kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / rnam par 'phrul pa dang sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum pa'i zhal nyid ni/ bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po rdo rje sems dpa'i dga' ba chen po'i
157b3(rgyud 'bum): dpal rdo rje don yod dga' bas rnam par 'phrul pa brtson pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi slob dpon
157b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog dang po'i glu ni/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po ni// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin kun rgyal po ste// mi 'gyur mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// rnam par 'phrul
157b5(rgyud 'bum): p a dang bcas pa'i sgeg pa'i 'dzum pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa tsam gyis thams cad kyis thams cad kyi dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag po nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams
157b6(rgyud 'bum): cad las kyi tshogs yid kyi 'dod pa rnams 'grub par byed do/ / sarba ku ru ya thA su khaM/ zhes bya ba brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i
157b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang po'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa'i gsang
158a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba 'di rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad rnam par dag pa la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin
158a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid thob pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dang / mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o//
158a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum zhing smin ma'i khro gnyer rdo rje lta ba'i phyag rgya ni bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis rgyas btab pas rdo rje sems
158a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' la sogs pa'i brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / 'bebs pa dang / gzhug pa dang / gar dang / glu dang / rnam par 'phrul
158a5(rgyud 'bum): ba ston pa dang / bden ngag thams cad dang / grol ba dang / phra dbab pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / sgyu ma thams cad dang / rmad du byung ba thams cad so sor ston pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i
158a6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs thams cad kyis bya ba ston pa dang / thams cad la rgyas btab pa dang / gnod pa dang / gdul ba dang / gsod pa dang / thams cad phyir 'dren pa dang / thams cad sgrub pa
158a7(rgyud 'bum): dang mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa gzhom du med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o/ / thams cad dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// thams
158b1(rgyud 'bum): cad mnyam pa nyid kyi gzugs/ / sna tshogs pa yi bya ba la// rab tu 'jug pa'i mchod pa byin gyis brlab// rdo rje pad+ma zhes bya ba'i ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
158b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya ste/ thams cad rnam par sbyang ba dang / srung ba dang / yongs su sbyong ba dang / rims thams cad dang / dug dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / gdon dang / nang
158b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya nye bar zhi ba dang / shi ba yang dag par gso ba dang / dbang phyug thams cad thob pa dang / gzugs sna tshogs pa'i bya ba thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa
158b4(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa'i dngos grub mtha' yas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu byed pa'o/ / nam mkha' phra bar bskyod pa dag gis rol zhing rnal 'byor thams
158b5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi rjes su chags par bya ste/ 'di la bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' snying po'i rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis rgyas btab pas bcom ldan 'das rjes
158b6(rgyud 'bum): su chags shing dgyes pa dang / brtan par rjes su chags nas nam mkha' thams cad kyi bdag nyid kun gyi dngos po nyid kyi phyir bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
158b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs yid la 'dod pa rnams sgrub par byed pa'o zhes bya ba yang gsungs so// mchog dang po ni mchog nyid du/
159a1(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba dam pa gsungs pa yin/ rig sogs phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin// rdo rje kun 'dzin slob dpon gyis// tsum+ba na dang
159a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khyud sogs kyis/ / thams cad rnal 'byor rjes sgrub ste// myur du kun la rgyas gdab bya// snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs pa'i// sgrub pa 'di ni rmad byung ste// grub pa med pa
159a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams la yang / / dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub byed// gang la dngos grub med gyur dang // bsod nams phun tshogs med pa yang // bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ma// rgyas gdab
159a4(rgyud 'bum): myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ / gal te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ snying po la sogs nye snying pos// bsgrub bya grub par ma gyur na// tsum+ba sogs kyis rgyas gdab bya// gang
159a5(rgyud 'bum): phyir gsang ba'i phyag rgya ni/ / dngos grub kun gyi bde dam pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa mchog/ de yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid chen po 'di grub pa// mchog gi
159a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid dam pa ste/ / mchog tu gsang ba bsod nams ldan// so so'i skye bo la brjod min// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brang la// gal te dngos
159a7(rgyud 'bum): thub mchog 'dod na/ / sbyin te gzhan la sbyin mi bya// phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di 'bo' zhig gis// bdag nyid gang la yod gyur na// bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyis// mi thub
159b1(rgyud 'bum): pab dang song mi 'gyur/ / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog dngos grub kun stsol ba// thams cad mdzad cing thams cad mkhyen/ thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa yin// zhes
159b2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / dpal mchog dang po las/ mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud phyag rgya bcu pa rdzogs so// /
159b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas mchog tu mkhas shing phra la zab cing rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ shin tu mtha' yas pa/ tshad med cing gzhal du med cing brjod kyis mi lang zhing rab tu khyab pa/ mchog tu grub
159b4(rgyud 'bum): ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud bshad pa'o/ / zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das mchog tu grub pa'i rdo rjes gsungs so// de la phyag rgya bcu ni bdag nyid thams cad skyed par byed pa'o// rdo rje/
159b5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'o// sngon du dang po'i dngos grub thams cad mchog la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi
159b6(rgyud 'bum): tshogs myur du sgrub par byed pa ste/ de la 'di ni sku'i phyag rgya ste ba dan gsum pa dang / kha T+wAM ga'i phyag rgya bcings nas g.yon pa dril bu dang bcas shing g.yas pa bslang ba'i tshul du byed
159b7(rgyud 'bum): ba ste/ sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo la sogs pa dkrol ba'i gar gyis rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma bstod pa ste/ thams cad kyi mchog dngos grub chen po dbang phyug chen po'i mchog na
160a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgyas dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje dor yod pa'i dgyes pa'i dmatshig dngos drub kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba ste/ des rdo rje bsnyems ma yongs su btang bar
160a2(rgyud 'bum): byas na dngos grub bzhir 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje bsnyems ma de nyid kyis rgyas btab na thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid mi 'gyur ba'i mchog go// mnga'
160a3(rgyud 'bum): gsor bas rgyas btab na rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang rjes su chags par byed na/ bud med gzhan rnams lha smos kyang ci dgos/ rdo rje ki li ki las rgyas btab na lha dang lha ma yin gyi bud med
160a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rol par byed cing ma grub na'ang thams cad sgrub par nus pa yin no/ / chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang gsod pa'o//
160a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mas yongs su dgod cing 'phreng ba dor ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas btab pa tsam gyis 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug thob pa'o// mchog tu gsang ba'i
160a6(rgyud 'bum): ras ris kyi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o/ / bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi mchod pas rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad thob pa mi bzang ba'o//
160a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bstod pa'i phyag rgyas srid pa gsum thams cad bskyod pa dang rab tu byed pa'o// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang rkang pas lha'i gzugs brnyan mnan cing rgyas btab nas sdigs mdzub
160b1(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ lha la sogs pa'i sems can de dang de ring por mi thogs par rgyas btab pas bka' bsgo ba thams cad dang las rnams byed par 'gyur ro// stan mthon po la skyil krung
160b2(rgyud 'bum): phyed pas 'dug ste rkang pa g.yon pas rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan yang mnan nas rdo rje gsor zhing rdo rje sems dpa' mnan nas/ dngos grub yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang phun sum tshog
160b3(rgyud 'bum): bab rnams nyams su myong na/ lha la sogs pa'i sems can rnams lha smos kyang ci dgos/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rang gi rtags bzung nas g.yas pa rdo rje la sogs pa bstod
160b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing / yid la 'dod pa'i lha'i bu mo thams cad la rgyas 'debs shing stobs kyis rol bar byed pa 'am sgrub par byed pa ste/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'o//
160b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba ni bcu ste/ snying khar sen mo 'drud pa'o// lcags kyu brdeg pa'o// g.yon pa'i lcags kyu la zhags
160b6(rgyud 'bum): pa de gzhug pa'i lcags kyu'i rtse mo btsir ba'o/ / phan tshun sems drung pa'i snying khar byas pa'o// lce mnyam par byin pa'o// snying khar rdo rje bstan par rab tu bzhag pa'o//
160b7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'o// rtse ba'i phyag rgya yang ngo // 'di rnams kyis dngos grub dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / chos
161a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / ye shes dang / las dang / bde ba chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub rnams don yod par thob par 'gyur ro// de nas gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje bsdams pa las byung
161a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i las bcu ni/ dbus ma'i lcags kyus so// kha sbyor gyin du rdo rje sor mo rnams thams cad kyi las so// mthe bong rdo rje'o// de nyid kyis mthil gnyis su drud pa'o// mdzub
161a3(rgyud 'bum): mo rdo rje de nyid kyi lcags kyu gnyis so/ / dbus ma'i rdo rje'o// de nyid kyi sor mo'i rtse mo bcing bar bya'o// srin lag gi rdo rje'o// de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo dag gi rol mo'o// mthe'u
161a4(rgyud 'bum): chung gi rdo rje'o/ / de nyid kyis mthe bong gnyis kyi sen mo btsir ba'o// 'di rnams kyis btab pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad sgrub pa dang / rjes su chag
161a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / dgug pa dang / rol pa dang / chags pas bcing ba dang / thams cad smrar gzhug pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / dgod du gzhug pa dang /
161a6(rgyud 'bum): gsod pa'o// de nas las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcu ni/ rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa lha dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad dang / bu mo gzhon nu ma thams cad brtan par rjes su chags pa ni
161a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje lta bas so/ / rab tu dga' ba'i sgrub pa ni ma mchu nang du g.yo bar byed pas mya ngan dang btung ba'o// chags pa brtan zhing lhung ba ni dbugs ring por gtong bas so// de nas las
161b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa thams cad kyis dbang phyug thob pa ni dpung pa gnyis bstod pas so/ / thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ba ni snying khar bzhugs pas so// yod par thams cad rnyed pa ni mig
161b2(rgyud 'bum): dgug pas so/ / 'dod pa'i chags pa bskyed pa ni dbus dang bcas pa'i sman pa'i gdong gis blta bas so// thams cad 'bebs pa'i cho ga ni rang gi snying phra bar bskyod pa'i las rnams
161b3(rgyud 'bum): kyis so/ / 'dod pa'i chags pa bsad pa ni dbugs btung bas rang nyid sdang bar byed pas so// 'dod pa thams cad kyi rjes su spod pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad kyi byed pa ni bka'
161b4(rgyud 'bum): bsgo bas so/ / de rnams rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad la'ang nye bar sbyor ba na don yod grub pas skad cig nyid kyis brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'i dngos
161b5(rgyud 'bum): grub kyis rgyas btab na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcu ni/ rdo rje bsnyems pa'i phyag rgyas thams cad sgrub
161b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / rdo rje mtshon chams thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang rjes su chags pa'o// rdo rje ki li ki las rab tu dga' ba'i reg bya dang dngos grub thams cad bde bas grub pa'o// rgyal mtshan
161b7(rgyud 'bum): bsgreng bas 'thab mo thams cad las rnam par rgyal lo/ / rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mas bdag po chen po nyid do// dus kyi mchod pas mchod par 'gyur ba nyid do// rdo rje gsor bas thams
162a1(rgyud 'bum): cad 'dul ba'o/ / rdo rje dor rabs thams cad gsod pa dang thams cad 'phrog pa'o// g.yon pa bsnyems shing g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis las rnams kyi sgyu ma dang
162a2(rgyud 'bum): rdzu 'phrul thams cad dang / so sor ston pa dang / rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / gnyid log tu gzhug pa dang / bskor ba dang / baspang ba dang / 'bru dang / ltung ba 'pho ba dang / dbang du
162a3(rgyud 'bum): byed pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcu ni/ rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'o// rdo rje sku mchog gi dngos grub thams cad do// mdzub
162a4(rgyud 'bum): mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus dngos grub thams cad do/ / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bdud thams cad la sogs pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i de nyid kyi mthe bo'i rdo rje btab pas thams cad rnyed pa'o// de nyid
162a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi mthe bong gnyis bcug pa'i gtsug tor rdo rjes thams cad srung ba'i mthe bong rdo rje nang du bcug pa de nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems can rjes su chags pa dang / dgug pa
162a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / dbang du byed pa sgrub pa'o// mthe'u chung rdo rje sor mo gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyis legs par bzung bas mthe bong ni dpal dgug pa dang dbang du byed pa'o// rdo rje gnod
162a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyin gyi rgyal mo de nyid kyis nor thams cad dang dpal dbrog pa'o/ / de nyid kyi dbus ma gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi rtse mo yongs su btsir bas bdud la sogs pa'i gdon las grol ba dang
162b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang du byas nas las thams cad la sbyor ba'o/ / rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes yul thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa'o// de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje las byung ba'o// sems
162b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' mnan nas rdo rje lha mo rol du gzhug pa'o/ / de'ang rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje chen pos rgyas btab pas so// rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje las so// de bzhin gshegs
162b3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi chags pa dang bral ba'i 'khor los so/ / mdzub mo dang / dbus ma dang / srin lag gi 'khor lo bsgreng bar byas la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung mnyam la bral bar bya ste/
162b4(rgyud 'bum): rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyis rgyas btab cing sgrub par 'gyur ro// btsar bas 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o// mdzub mo lcags kyus 'dod pa thams
162b5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi bde ba dgug pa'o/ / mdzub mo phrag dog la sogs pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi ba'o// rtag tu bskyod pas rab tu dga' ba 'bebs shing de nas sgrub pa'o//
162b6(rgyud 'bum): skye gnas g.yo bas dud med dang skyes pa dag gis rab tu dga' ba la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po shin tu mtha' yas pa'o// kha sbyor btsir bas ji srid
162b7(rgyud 'bum): 'tsho'i bar du 'dus pa dang bral ba'ang ngo / / rtags kyi sen mo g.yon pa'i mthil drud pas shin tu brtan pa'i 'dod pa la chags pa nyid du 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi 'dod pa la mi blta zhing
163a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan la mi 'gro bar shin du bde ba de yid bde bster ba'i bud med thams cad 'grudzub par 'gyur ro/ / skye gnas kyis ser mo drung bas skyes bu rnams so// de nas thams
163a2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi bdag nyid kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya bcu ste/ de la lus thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis 'khrud la ma mchu so rnams kyis bzung ste/ rmongs pas bde ba sngar du gzhug/ sgrub
163a3(rgyud 'bum): pas rab tu dga' ba'i dngos grub kyi rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / mchog dang po'i dngos grub kyis su ra ta s+t+waM zhes bcom ldan 'das la brjod cing de kho na nyid bskul bas
163a4(rgyud 'bum): grub par 'gyur ro/ / rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyis thams cad sgrub pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i gsang ba khu tshur ni thams cad sgrub pa'o// bde ba chen po rdo rje las byung ba'i rdo rje chen
163a5(rgyud 'bum): po'i blta bas thams cad grub pa'o/ / smin ma gyen du bteg pas lhung ba slong ba'o// rang gi ma mchu nang du myang bas skal ba bzang po chen po sgrub pa'o// rang gi lce bskyod pas rang nyid
163a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis bden pa thams cad dang de kho na nyid gsal zhing mi slu bar smra ba'o/ / rang gi lus la 'bebs pas gzugs thams cad yongs su bsgyur ba ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' 'am rang
163a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas su'ang 'gyur ba yin no/ / rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje bsgoms pas nam mkha' la 'gro ba'o// de nas dang po'i las thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcu ni/ rdo rje thal mo kha T+wAM gas so//
163b1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thams cad rdo rje khu tshur dag gis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur dag gis dngos grub thams cad do// thams cad gsod pa ni khro bo'i khu tshur dag gis so// thams
163b2(rgyud 'bum): cad sbyar ba ni pad+ma'i khu tshur dag gis so/ / nor thams cad dbrog pa ni nor bu'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad 'bebs pa ni thams cad 'bebs pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad gar
163b3(rgyud 'bum): byed du gzhug pa ni kha T+wAM ga gtor ba'i khu tshur dag gis so/ / thams cad smrar gzhug pa ni mdzub mo mnyam pa'i lce'i khu tshur dag gis so// thams cad bskyod pa ni brtan pa'i khu tshur dag gis so//
163b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad gzhug cing don yod par sgrub pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i khu tshur gyis so// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ci 'dod pa'i lag pa'i sor mo'i phyag rgya bcu ste/ don yod cing thogs
163b5(rgyud 'bum): par med pa skad cig mas myur du grub par byed pa 'di lta ste/ bi wang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / mu kuN+Da dang / cha lang dang / rnga bo che dang / rnga zlum dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang / guny+dzA
163b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / hi mi li ste/ 'di rnams kyis rgyas btab na thams cad du rjes su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / 'bebs pa dang / rims dang / dug dang / sbyar dug dang / gdon
163b7(rgyud 'bum): las grol ba dang / gsong ba dang / 'thab mo las rnam par rgyal ba dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob pa yin no zhes bya ba gsungs so// 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir/
164a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' tshan po yin/ thug rgyu rtog pa rab tu bas// rnga rje slob pon slob ma mchag/ de 'a dang pa'i rjes 'brang la// tshogs tsam gyis nis
164a2(rgyud 'bum): cig gis/ / don yod kun grub bde bar gsol// zhes bya'o// dpal mchog dang po las/ mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs so// de nas mchog
164a3(rgyud 'bum): tu mkhas shing mtha' las 'das pa/ tshad med cing gzhal du med pa/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyis
164a4(rgyud 'bum): las kyi tshogs mchog tu dam pa'i grub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje gar las byung ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya stong bshad par bya'o/ / zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//
164a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen po mnyam bzhag nas// sgeg bcas mdzub sogs bkrol ba yis// las kyi phyag rgya chen po rgyu// thams cad gar gyis bsgrub par bya// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i
164a6(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyus khyad par du las kyi phyag rgya bcing bste/ brgya phrag dang po mchog tu bsgrubs te rdo rje dam tshig lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni// kha sbyor nang
164a7(rgyud 'bum): du gsal ba ste/ / mchog dang po yi gsang chen gyis// las kyi phyag rgya brgya gzhan yin// zhes bya ba rdo rje lha mo gsang ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa che'i/
164b1(rgyud 'bum): thal mos spyi bor bzung nas ni// las kyi phyag rgya grub pas na// dbang po rnams dang sbyar bar bya// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje
164b2(rgyud 'bum): bsnyems mas gar bya zhing / / sgeg bcas mthe'u chung sogs bkrol bas// de nyid bcings nas gar bya zhing // phyi ma 'di ni 'byung ba yin// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi las
164b3(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i mchog gi phyag rgya brgya'o/ / rdo rje thal mo mnyam bzhag nas// thams cad kyis ni bsgrub par bya// mchog dang po yi las chen po'i
164b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya mchog ni gzhan yin no/ / zhes bya ba rgyal mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya/ mnga' lnga bsdus pa bcings nas ni// las kyi phyag rgya bde ba brgya// rab tu dga' mchog ma bkrol bas/
164b5(rgyud 'bum): bde ba nyid du mngon par sbyar// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i 'dod pa ma'i phyag rgya'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// ji bzhin phyag rgya mchog sbyor bas/
164b6(rgyud 'bum): las kyi phyag rgya sna tshogs brgya// mchog dang po ni rab tu brtag/ ces bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje lha mo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje lha mo'i kha T+wAM ga/ lus kun gyis
164b7(rgyud 'bum): ni gar bya zhing / / rdo rje gar mchog glu blang zhing // dang po'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'o// ji ltar gong du brgya gsungs pa/ rol mo mchog gi phyag rgya'i tshogs// rol mo brdung ring
165a1(rgyud 'bum): glu len pa/ / brag rgya kun gyi gsal ba brgya// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi lha'i bla mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byaste/ phyag tu srong mchog tu thub pa'o// de la sogs pa
165a2(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i mtha' lhur grangs med pa'i// phyag rgya'i rgyal mo grub mchog ster// kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi//
165a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug chen po'i mchog grub phyir// nam mkha' kun gyi go skabs kyis// dkyil 'khor 'di ni rab tu zhugs// dam pa mchog tu grub par byed// mchog gi dam pa rgyud chen po/
165a4(rgyud 'bum): dam pa mchog gi dngos grub ster// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brangs la// phyag rgya kun gyi tshul 'di ni// bstan par bya ste gzhan la min// de ltar mchog
165a5(rgyud 'bum): hutu mi 'gyur dam pa'i dngos grub bde ba yi/ / mchog tu rnam dag rdo rje bde grub mtha' yas 'bras bur ldan// dpal mchog dang po'i gsal ba'i de nyid mchog gi sku'i tshul lo// mchog tu
165a6(rgyud 'bum): rtag pa'i tshul 'di yongs su mthur thug pa'o/ / dpal mchog dang po las/ dam pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs so// // de nas sems
165a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po kun/ / rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas pa'i mchog/ rdo rje 'chang chen gtso bo ni// mgon la bde gshegs rnams kyis gsol// kun mchog nam mkha' chen po yi// dngos
165b1(rgyud 'bum): grub dbang phyug rab grub phyir/ / rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i// de nyid sems dpa' chen pos gsungs// rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la// rtog pa'i don 'di gang brjod pa/
165b2(rgyud 'bum): gang gis rgyud 'di phyi ma la// dang po'i gnas mchog ji ltar lags// de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// rab dga' nyid dang bzang ba nyid// rdo rje bsnyems bdag ji ltar lags/
165b3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin// de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje 'chang chen nyid dang ni// byang chub spyod pa ji ltar lags// bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid// byang chub
165b4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas ji ltar lags/ / rdo rje gtum mo mthar byed nyid// phyag na rdo rje ji ltar lags// ji ltar dang po'i rigs byung dang // 'dod pa thar pa ji ltar lags// ji ltar mgon po
165b5(rgyud 'bum): rnam gsum dang / / khyod ni ji ltar thams cad nyid// dang po'i snying po ji ltar lags// de ci nye snying ji ltar lags// bde chen rdo rje chen po yi// don yod dam tshig ji ltar lags//
165b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor zhes bya ji skad gsungs// de yi rnam smin ji lta bu// thig gdab pa dang brtag pa yis// dngos grub ji ltar gsungs pa lags// gsang ba lnga yi de bde ba// ji ltar
165b7(rgyud 'bum): zur pa ji lta bu/ / dkyil 'khor bdag po rnams dang ni// rigs rnams gsal ba ji ltar lags// thams cad dbang bskur de nyid dang // phyag mtshan tshogs kyi de nyid dang // thams/
166a1(rgyud 'bum): cad dgug gzhug mchod pa che// bdag byin brlabs sogs sgrub pa che// de ni de nyid gsang ba dang // don yod pa ni mchog nyid de// mi 'gyur dam pa grub pa'i phyir//
166a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bdag cag rnams la gsungs// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchog gi mdo gsungs so// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// rtog pa kun gyi
166a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag po ni/ / the tshom tshogs rnams gsan nas su// 'di yi lan ni gsungs pa yin// de la rtog pa'i don gyi rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na// rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams las// sems
166a4(rgyud 'bum): can don ni yongs brtags pas/ / des na rtogs par gsungs pa ste// rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro// de nas rgud phyi ma ji ltar yin zhe na/ rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar bshad// phyi ma sngar dang /
166a5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag byung // de nyid gsang ba'i gsang ba dang // phyi ma dang bcas rgyud du 'dod// de la dang po gnas zhes bya ba'i rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na/ nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas// rdo rje kun

166a7(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ba 'di gsungs so/ / de la thos mthar med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar yin na/ nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rje cherang
166b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de gang yin zhe na/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgya
166b2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/ de la bcom ldan 'das dga' ba chen po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na/ nyes pa med cing shin tu rtag/ 'dod chags kun gyis rjes chags pa// de nyid 'di yis
166b3(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba 'di/ / 'dod chags chen po'i dga' ba che// de la ci kun tu bzang po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na/ shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu
166b4(rgyud 'bum): bzang po kun bdag nyid/ / byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga mchog/ de la rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bcom ldan 'das ji ltar yin zhe na/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po yis// dbang phyug chen po'i
166b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i mchog/ rdo rje dbang phyug cher bstod pas// rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag/ ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o// mchog dang po yi nyid 'di/
166b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' gang gang brjod// dngos grub kun gyi 'byor pa rnams// de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
166b7(rgyud 'bum): dpas gsungs so/ / de nas de'i 'og tu las kyi byabs bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mchog nyid du bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//
167a1(rgyud 'bum): de la bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis sems can ji ltar yin zhe na/ bsam gyis mi khrab rgya che ba// zab dngos kun bde mi 'gyur ba// thams cad khyab cing dri ma med
167a2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems ni bdag brtan pa/ / de nas 'di las khyad par ni// sems nyid brtan pa nyid sems pas// ting 'dzin de la mnyam par bzhag/ rnam shes las ni rdo rje kun// rdo rje
167a3(rgyud 'bum): las ni 'dzin gyur te/ / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin ji ltar yin zhe na/ sems dpa'i byin rlabs sbyor ba ni// bdag la byin brlabs mchog sgrub pa// nyin re sgrub par byed na des// rdo rje
167a4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur/ / de la bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ji ltar yin zhe na/ snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang // gang phyir sems can don gyur pas// de phyir

167a7(rgyud 'bum): yin zhe na/ rang sems so sor rtog pa'i phyir// byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid// de phyir de nyid sangs rgyas nyid// bdag byin brlabs mchog grung phyir ro// de la ji ltar
167b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje yin zhe na/ mi phyed so sor rtogs pa dang // gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon// sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ste// byang chub sems ni brtan pa bdag/
167b2(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bzang po'i lag tu ni// mtshon cha de ni rgyal bas byin// brtan pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir// des na phyag na rdo rje des// de la ji ltar dang po'i rigs las byung ba shes pa rgyud
167b3(rgyud 'bum): yin zhe na/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa yum// yab ni thabs la mkhas pa ste// rdo rje sems dpa' gdul bya'i phyir// rigs rnams rab tu byung ba'o// de la ji ltar bcom ldan
167b4(rgyud 'bum): 'das 'dod pa thar pa yin zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ni chags pa che// dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir// dngos grub thams cad mi 'gyur bde// bde ba chen po zhes brjod pa'o//
167b5(rgyud 'bum): de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum pa yin zhe na/ bdag ni dus gsum mtha' yas phyir// nga ni srid gsum gdul bya'i phyir// gsum mchog 'jig rten gsum kun phyir//
167b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum nga khams gsum nga // de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad nyid yin zhe na/ nga ni brtan pa thams cad bde// bsod nams kun mchog che ba'i phyir// g.yo ba sems
167b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis 'dus byas phyir/ / sgyu ma thams cad nga yin no// zhes bya ba rang gi las kyi bya ba'i de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ji ltar dang po'i glu byung ba shes pa yin/
168a1(rgyud 'bum): zhe na/ srid pa shin tu grub pa yi// dbang phyug chen po mchog grub phyir// gzi can sems can don mdzad phyir// bskal pa thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyis

168a3(rgyud 'bum): nye ba'i snying po yi/ / de kho na nyid shes pa ni// de nyid gsang zhing gsang ba dang // snying po rab tu brjod par bya// snying po'i rjes su sgrub par 'grub// nye ba'i snying po nyid du brjod//

168b1(rgyud 'bum): shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bris/ / phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs la// shar dang nub dang byang dang sgor// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad// rdo rje thig gis
168b2(rgyud 'bum): yongs bskor bar/ / sab brgyad kyis nyer mdzes shing // gro ba ni rtsa babs/ gakhyer dang // rbab dra byed la sogs brgyan// der bdag po yi don shes ni// rdo rje sems dpa

168b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ / de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang gis// pad+ma rA ga dang mtshungs pa// thams cad dag pa bla na med// rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag

169a1(rgyud 'bum): can bsod nams mthong zhing che/ / nam mkha'i snying po sems dpa' dang // de nas nor bu'i rigs kyis ni// dbang bskur ba dang gter dang ni// rdo rje rgyal mtshan

169a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas mchog dang po'i phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid do/ / kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po'i mtshon cha che// gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che// rdo rje rtse lnga zhes brjod do//

169a6(rgyud 'bum): bu bsags pa'o/ / zhes bya ba dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ji ltar thams cad dgug pa'i
169a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyud yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang tshon gyis// rdo rje lcags kyu dril bcas pas// bkug ste de nas rjes sgrub pa// dril bu nyid kyi bya ba yin// ji ltar mchod pa thams
169b1(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi cho ga yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyi// rab tu dga' bas mchod nas ni// glu dang rol mo rnams 'phrul pas// mchod de slar yang rnal 'byor mchod// de la
169b2(rgyud 'bum): lhar dngos grub thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyi// phyag rgya kun gyis legs byin brlabs// dam tshig chen po'i
169b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid kyis/ / rang nyid bsgrubs nas snying po bzlas// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems
169b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bdag po'i bdag/ ces bya ba'i mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o// de la ji ltar rang lhag pa'i lha thams cad kyi sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud yin zhe na/ brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba dang // rtog
169b5(rgyud 'bum): pa kun las bsgrub bya gang / / rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas// de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya// de nas thams cad rjes su sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje dril bu 'dzin gyur
169b6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / rdo rje dril bus rab sad cing // rtog pa thams cad rjes sgrub pas// mchog dang la sogs 'grub par 'gyur// de la ji ltar 'bad pa med pa thams cad sgrub
169b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rlud yin zhe na/ bsgrub bu ci 'dod bsgrubs nas ni// phyi nas ji ltar 'dod pa yis// ci 'dod spyod pa la spyod cing // thams cad byed cing thams cad bza'
170a1(rgyud 'bum): langs pa'am ni 'dug pa 'am/ / gang dang de ru 'chag pa 'am// dgod pa dang ni smra ba 'am// gang der ci bzhin de bzhin no// dbang po gang dang gang lam 'gyur/
170a2(rgyud 'bum): de dang de yi ngo bor bya// mnyam par bzhag nas rnal 'byor gyis// rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bya// de nyi rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// thams cad nyid ni bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas kun
170a3(rgyud 'bum): dngos thams cad ni/ / rtag tu mthong zhing grub par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po de nyid ni// mkhas pa gang zhig dad pas klog/ de ni sdig kun dang bral bas// dngos grub kun
170a4(rgyud 'bum): gyis dbang phyug 'gyur/ / zhes bya ba dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid do// de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i cho ga ma nyams mchog gi bla ma gsal// mchog tu gsang ba sgrub pa'i cho ga
170a5(rgyud 'bum): bde mchog myur du grub phyir gsol/ / rdo rje mchog 'dzin dang bcas bde gshegs sras bcas rnams kyis byin brlabs pa// bde chen dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa dga' chen mchog gis de
170a6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga/ de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// mkha' lhar thug med kun tu 'gro// sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod nas ni/
170a7(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa'i mthar thug don gsungs so// bdag gi snying po dang 'di mchog chen po'o// bde chen mchog gi mchog dang rjes su chags pa che// kun mchog sems dpa' rnams kyi
170b1(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu 'byung gnas ni/ / kun mchog 'byor pa'i dbang phyug gso ba yin// mtha' yas pa dang thog med mthar thug med pa ni// mchod bya chen po thams cad rnams kyi tshul chen po/
170b2(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' dang mtshungs mchog gi dngos 'phel gsol// de ni sus kyang mthar thug byed par nus pa min// sems can rnams ni dman la zhen cing nyung la dga'// dad pa med
170b3(rgyud 'bum): cing slu ba byed la ma sbyangs pa/ / rtag tu rjes su chags shing chags bral la chags pa// de rnams la ni phan phyir 'di ni mthar thug pa'o// gang gi khyim na 'di gnas gang gis rab
170b4(rgyud 'bum): tu sgrub pa 'am/ / yang na ji bzhin gsungs pa rtag tu 'dir sgrub byed// so sor nyams su myong ba'i mthu yis thams cad du// bdud kyi la sogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus/
170b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'chang sogs sku ni gang gis sgrub byed pa// gzugs brnyan la sogs thams cad 'dir ni ji bzhin gsungs// des ni thams cad so sor nyams myong nus par ldan//
170b6(rgyud 'bum): bdud kyil sogs rnams kyis don gnod mi nus// gang zhig rdo rje la sogs gzugs brnyan la sogs pa// ji ltar 'dod pa 'di dag thams cad sgrub par byed// rab tu
170b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pas yi ge hUM las bris nas ni/ / 'dod pa'i dngos grub de yis ster zhing thob par 'gyur// rgyal po rnams kyis rnam par sbyangs par mdzad pa ni// gang la don kun dag
171a1(rgyud 'bum): phyir mdzad par mi 'gyur min/ / 'dir ni bgegs byed bdud rnams kyang ni yod ma yin// rtogs pas dngos grub 'phel zhing byin gyis brlabs pa yin//
171a2(rgyud 'bum): ni bdud nyid mi 'gyur brtan med nyid mi 'gyur// brtan pa nyid phyir dang ni brtan par mdzad pa yin// rtag pa 'di ni mchog chen gang gis sgrub byed pa// de la nga ni dngos grub myur
171a3(rgyud 'bum): du sgrub par byed/ / dngos grub chen po la thams cad du rjes su chags shing shin tu mnyes pa dang / shin tu brtan pa dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rtag tu rgya che bar 'gyur ba
171a4(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / gang zhig mchog gi rgyal po'i snying po sgrub byed pa// rgyal ba thams cad dgyes shing rgyal ba dgyes par mdzad// de dag grags pa chen po thob nas bde ba'ang thob// de
171a5(rgyud 'bum): phyir 'di la dad cing gus par bya ba yin/ / de nas rgyal ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ yab mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so legs// sras
171a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so legs/ / rdo rje mchog ni rdo rje 'byung ba legs// dam pa'i chos kyi bdag nyid legs so legs// sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag
171a7(rgyud 'bum): byir brlabs pa/ / rtag tu mi 'gyur don yod grub pa che// ji ltar dang po'i grub pa de bzhin du// phyis nas kyang ni de bzhin grub par 'gyur// de ltar ngag chen gsungs nas ni/
171b1(rgyud 'bum): skus dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yi// gsung la rjes su yi rang mdzad// dpal mchog dang po las/ rtog pa'i dral po thams cad kyi mchog rdzog
171b2(rgyud 'bum): so/ / // thugs dam sa'i snying po tho ling du rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po man+ta ka la sha dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba lha btsan po dge slong bla ma zhi ba'i 'od kyi
171b3(rgyud 'bum): zhal snga nas bskur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ lo tsa chen po rin chen bzang po yi// dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud 'di bskur ba la// bar bar dpe ma rnyed pas ma 'gyur nas// bdag
171b4(rgyud 'bum): gis 'bad pas dpe btsal rnyed pas bsgyur/ / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya br-idz+nyA pA ra mi tA na ya sha ta pany+tsa da sha ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags
171b5(rgyud 'bum): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
171b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyi cod pan gyis khams gsum du dbang bcu
171b7(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag
172a1(rgyud 'bum): rgya chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa sna tshogs kyis bya ba mdzad de/ ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad
172a2(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bslang ba'i 'phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs rje che ba rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa khams gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs thams
172a3(rgyud 'bum): cad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas/ / 'dod pa'i khams thams cad na nor bu rin po che chen pos rab tu spras pa dang / ba dan kha dog sna
172a4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs dril bu brgyus pa rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / rgyan 'phreng dang / chun 'phyang dang / zla ba lta bus mdzes par byas pa/ de bzhin gsheg
172a5(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad bzhugs pa shes pa bstod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lha ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
172a6(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba
172a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi bstobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
172b1(rgyud 'bum): bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs cig ste/ yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo
172b2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par ston
172b3(rgyud 'bum): to/ / 'di ltar rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// 'dod chags kyi mda' rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di
172b4(rgyud 'bum): lha ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// reg pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// sdug pa'i 'ching ba rnam par dag pa'i
172b5(rgyud 'bum): gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// thams cad la dbang phyug dang dbang rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i
172b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas so/ / lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lha ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lha ste/ byang chub
172b7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i gnas so/ / sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// snyems pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/
173a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// rgyan rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// yid tshim par byed pa rnam par dag pa'i
173a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lha ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lus bde ba rnam par dag
173a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lha ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// sgra rnam par dag pa'i
