173a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di
173a5(rgyud 'bum): lha ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// reg rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lha ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad
173a6(rgyud 'bum): rIniringo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dgra pa'o// lag na rdo rje su la la chos thams cad kyi ngos
173a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo sgrub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan cig thos na'ang / de byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad dang / tshod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i
173b1(rgyud 'bum): sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa cher po bsags kyang / sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song du nams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur/ sdig pa'ang byas ma thag tu sdug
173b2(rgyud 'bum): bsngal med par byang bar 'gyur ro/ / su zhig 'dzin pa dang / nyin re bzhin klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de tshe 'di nyid la chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid
173b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas/ chos thams cad la dbang bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad la dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
173b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po'i tshe bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa/ theg pa chen po
173b5(rgyud 'bum): mngon par rtogs pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad la rdo rje 'dzin mtha' dag gi sems can gyi mchog khams gsum ma lus pa dag na/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal
173b6(rgyud 'bum): sems can gyi khams lus med pa 'dul ba/ don thams cad grub pa/ dam tshig chen po la rdo rje gsang ba'i sems can du mas g.yog byas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
173b7(rgyud 'bum): tshul gyi don 'jo smon te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje bsgrengs te/ thog pa'i rdo rje chen po gsor nas/ rang gi snying bar bstod pa'i tshul chos 'dzin cing
174a1(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de khor nyid kyi snying po 'di smras so/ / hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis
174a2(rgyud 'bum): yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ rdo rje srab nyid kyi
174a3(rgyud 'bum): phyir rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ / don gcig pa'i phyir don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o//
174a4(rgyud 'bum): ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir thams cad mnyam pa nyid
174a5(rgyud 'bum): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ / lag na rdo rje sul la mo mngon par sgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyar ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa
174a6(rgyud 'bum): desdig pa thams cad spyod kyang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro// myur du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs
174a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub su mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa don gyi gnas
174b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid N+Da cher sgron cing / bzhin rab tu 'dzum dbul te/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po 'di rab tu smras so// ang de nas ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba bcom ldan 'das
174b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang / yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam par rgyal ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa 'di bshad de/ 'dod
174b3(rgyud 'bum): chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis so/ / zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do// zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis/ gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid do// gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid kyi/
174b4(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad spros pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med par rig par bya'o// lag na rdo rje su la la shes rab
174b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa des 'dul ba'i dbang gis khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song du
174b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos 'di'i don rgya chen
174b7(rgyud 'bum): po ston te/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas/ khro gnyer dang bcas shing smin ma bteg ste 'bar bar lha la pad+ma'i gdong khro zhing dgod de/
175a1(rgyud 'bum): mche ba gtsigs nas rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul du gnas pas gnas nas/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// d+hU/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
175a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa ngo bo nyid dag pa'i chos nyid thob pas/ yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i
175a3(rgyud 'bum): tshul 'di bshad de/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pas/ 'jig cen
175a4(rgyud 'bum): na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ / chos thams cad rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rten na sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// shes pa thams cad
175a5(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje su la la shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang
175a6(rgyud 'bum): klog pa dang / sgom pa de 'dod chags dang dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang / pad+ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams dang / dri ma rnams dang / glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa
175a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
175b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don gyi gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing / bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul te pad+ma'i 'dab mkha 'byed pas/ 'dod chags la sogs pa dri mas mi
175b2(rgyud 'bum): gos pa la lha zhing / pad+ma gzugs sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// hrIH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos yang de
175b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad de/ dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni khams gsum
175b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/ / nor sbyin pa ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos sbyin pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// zang
175b5(rgyud 'bum): zing gi sbyin pa ni lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po bzhin rab tu 'dzum ste//
175b6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi mgo la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i 'phreng ba 'ching zhing don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dam tshig rin po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// tAM/
175b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas
176a1(rgyud 'bum): yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa
176a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ chos thams cad
176a3(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
176a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro// su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
176a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / sgom pa des dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / shes pa thams cad dang /
176a6(rgyud 'bum): dgos pa thams cad dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
176a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig chen po ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pas don gyi gnas 'di rgya cher ston te/
176b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje sra ba'i dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// A/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin
176b2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pas yang 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa'o//
176b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o// smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis/ chos thams cad smon pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag
176b4(rgyud 'bum): pas/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum bzhin du/
176b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi ral gri des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i mchog 'di smras so// A/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
176b6(rgyud 'bum): pab thams cad kyi 'khor der 'dus pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// rdo rje mnyam pa nyid
176b7(rgyud 'bum): la 'jug pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// don gyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pon
177a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur / chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad mnyam pa
177a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid la 'jug pa ni/ 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ chos
177a3(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing bzhin 'dzum nas/ rdo rje 'khor lo bskor zhing rdo rje 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan
177a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i snod kyis mchod pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// byang chub
177a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi sems bskyed pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgya che ba'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
177a6(rgyud 'bum): la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger
177a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dri ba 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems pa dang / sgom pa dang / mchod pa byed pa ni/ de bani
177b1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing las tham
177b2(rgyud 'bum): cad don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ / oM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad 'dul nus pas yang ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs
177b3(rgyud 'bum): su 'dzin pa sems can thams cad 'dul ba shes pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ khro bo mnyam
177b4(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid do/ / sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas/ khro bo 'dul ba nyid do// sems can thams cad chos nyid pas/ khro bo chos nyid do// sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas/
177b5(rgyud 'bum): khro ba rdo rje nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa don
177b6(rgyud 'bum): de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// ha/ de nas bcom
177b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos thamams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas yang chos thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/
178a1(rgyud 'bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// thams cad don nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do//
178a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad chos nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid do// thams cad las nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan
178a3(rgyud 'bum): 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ don yod pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/
178a4(rgyud 'bum): / hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang sems can
178a5(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin
178a6(rgyud 'bum): pas/ sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no// thams cad snying rje'i snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas/ sems can thams cad ni rdo rje'i snying po can
178a7(rgyud 'bum): no/ / ngag thams cad rab tu byung bas/ sems can thams cad ni chos kyi snying po can no// sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa la sbyor bas/ sems can thams cad ni
178b1(rgyud 'bum): las kyi snying po can no/ / de nas pha rol gyi rdo rje rigs rnams kyis ca co'i sgra byung nas chos nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing snying po phul te/ de nas rdo rje'i dbang phyug chen pos rang gi de
178b2(rgyud 'bum): kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo/ / tI/ de nas ma mo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ mgrin gcig tu thams cad dgug pa dang / gzud pa dang / gzhig
178b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / sgrub pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo// b+h+yo/ de nas sbrang rtsir byed la sogs pa ming po gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/
178b4(rgyud 'bum): mgrin gcig tu rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di smras so// swA/ de nas sring mo bzhis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo// hUM/ de nas bcom
178b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas la mthar thug cing mu med pa'i chos dang ldan pas yang cho ga 'di mthar thug par byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam
178b6(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid kyi mthar thug pas byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid pas/
178b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid bas/ rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol
179a1(rgyud 'bum): tu phyin pa du ma nyid pas/ chos thams cad du ma nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pa med pa nyid pas/ chos thams cad mthar thug pa med
179a2(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid yin no/ / su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / brjod pa dang / sgom pa de sangs rgyas
179a3(rgyud 'bum): dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thug pa'i med pa'i mthar phyin te/ sgrib pa thams cad zad nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gsheg
179a4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad 'dus te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don yod pa dang / thogs pa med par myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/ lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin no// sems can
179a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po legs so legs/ / bde ba chen po legs so legs// theg pa chen po legs so legs// blo gros chen po legs so legs// cho ga 'di ni legs par smras//
179a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis// 'bras bu yod pa 'dul ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mdo sde byin gyis brlabs// cho ga'i rgyal po bla na med// gang rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa ni/
179a7(rgyud 'bum): bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyis// de dag mi song mi tshugs so// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas kun gyis
179b1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa bzhin/ / ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur// de skad gsungs nas sngags grub phyir// rdo rje can gyis bshad pa la// kun mchog sangs rgyas mkhas bcas
179b2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ thams cad kyis ni mngon par bstod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid
179b3(rgyud 'bum): brnyes pa chos thams cad spros pa med pas/ yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mchog dang po thog ma dang / tha ma dang /
179b4(rgyud 'bum): dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'dod chags chen po dngos grub dam pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen
179b5(rgyud 'bum): po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po dngos grub dam pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos
179b6(rgyud 'bum): grub chen po grub pa dam par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub dam pa ni/ bdud chen
179b7(rgyud 'bum): po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa
180a1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub dam pa ni/ khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi kham
180a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni/ ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir/ 'khor
180a3(rgyud 'bum): la'ang chags shing brtson 'grus che ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ma lus pa na/ sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems
180a4(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mchog tu shin tu bde ba chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkhas
180a5(rgyud 'bum): mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe/ / de srid mtshungs med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang // ye shes gnas su
180a6(rgyud 'bum): bsgrubs pas na/ / chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir// 'khor ba yongs su dag par gyur// chags la sogs pas 'dul na ni// 'khor ba'i bar du rtag par yang
180a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten sdig byed de sbyang phyir/ / 'khor ba srid du bdag nyid 'dul// ji ltar pad+ma rab 'bar yang // tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa// de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa
180b1(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / 'gro phan rnams la mi gos so// 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag/ bde ba che zhing nor che la// khams gsum dbang phyug thob pas na// sems can don rnam/
180b2(rgyud 'bum): brtan par byed// lag na rdo rje su la la nang par langs nas mchog dang po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgro'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re zhing 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang /
180b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de yid bde ba dang / bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi mchog kyang
180b4(rgyud 'bum): tshe 'di la thob par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog kyang grub ste/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi chen po 'am/ de bzhin gshegs par
180b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i sngags
180b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshig ni nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di rnams so/ / oM byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ oM kun tu bzang po'i spyod bya/ oM yid bzhin gyi nor bu/ oM 'gog pa med pa/ oM sde bzlog
180b7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ oM rnam par shes pa thams cad/ oM 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid chen po oM brtson 'grus kyi go cha/ oM kun tu 'gro ba/ oM rdo rje sra ba'i sem/
181a1(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ oM ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa/ oM mos nyid shes pa rnam par dag pa/ oM las rnam par spong ba/ hUM
181a2(rgyud 'bum): nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje can/ hUM phaT oM 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa/ oM spong ba'i rdo rje can/ oM hUM thams cad 'dul ba/ oM hrIHoM a zhes bya ba'i sgo/ oM shes ra
181a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ A pAM hUM oM a/ oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog/ oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam par dag pa/ oM de bzhin
181a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje aHoM a sdig pa 'ching ba thams cad tshoms shig/ ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las thar par gyis shig/ oM dam tshig thams ca
181a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdo rje hUM traT/ sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ dngos grub dam pa rdo rje 'dzin chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs
181a6(rgyud 'bum): pabar 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi lag tu thob par mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyis
181a7(rgyud 'bum): mnyan pa'am/ yi ger 'dri ba 'am/ yi ge thir gzhug pa 'am/ bklag pa 'am/ 'chang ba 'am/ bsgom pa 'am/ bsti stang du bya ba 'am/ ri mor bya ba 'a
181b1(rgyud 'bum): mchod par mi nus so/ / gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las za na yi ge 'bru gcig tsam zos na'ang / sems can de dag ni gzhan
181b2(rgyud 'bum): na sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin na mtha' dag rdzogs pa lha ci smos/ lag na rdo rje gang la la dag sangs rgyas bye ba phrag gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma la bkur sti
181b3(rgyud 'bum): ma byas pa dang / bla mar ma byas pa dang / bsti stang ma byas pa dang / mchod par ma byas pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos
181b4(rgyud 'bum): bapar mi nus so/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang la spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gi lus la thogs sam/ glegs bam la
181b5(rgyud 'bum): bris te spyod pa'i gang zag de phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro/ / de bskal pa bye ba mang por skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// de la bdud sdig to can bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ro//
181b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha gzhan rnams kyang de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// yang ba ma spangs par 'chi bar
181b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang der skye'o// de ltar
182a1(rgyud 'bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phan yon mang mod kyis/ ngas phyogs tsam zhig brjod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis
182a2(rgyud 'bum): de skad ces bka' stsal na swA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams ca dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
182a3(rgyud 'bum): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi
182a4(rgyud 'bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu rdzogs so/ / chu gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra maN+Da.a laM kA ra nA ma ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal
182a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma la spyi bos gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
182a6(rgyud 'bum): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / lus kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshi
182a7(rgyud 'bum): gis ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs shing khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal
182b1(rgyud 'bum): por dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi
182b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya brnyes baM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud cing las sna tshogs mdzad pa/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i
182b3(rgyud 'bum): sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rje'i las mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa dus gsum du
182b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan cing bsngags pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dang ldan
182b5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dril bu btags pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i dar gyi 'phan dang / me tog gi chun po dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas klubs shing nye bar
182b6(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad legs par yongs su dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi khang bzangs 'od mtha' yas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtsug
182b7(rgyud 'bum): lag khang la me tog gi 'khri shing mchog gi snying po'i rgyan gyis bkod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho rab tu bkram pa'i sprin nam mkha'i khams yongs su
183a1(rgyud 'bum): khyang pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ mtha' las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'khrungs pa'i dbus/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po
183a2(rgyud 'bum): bo'od gsal ba'i gzhal med khang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rdo rje snying po'i rgyan/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje/
183a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrungs mi 'gog 'gog par mi 'gyur ba'i yan lag gi spyod yul yang dag pa'i mtha' gsal ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul/ chos
183a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbyings kyi snying po'i khang bzangs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po sa chen po'i dam pa la
183a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs so/ / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
183a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdar te chos ston par mdzad pa ni thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/
183a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su dkar ba/ chos thams cad kyi tshul yongs su dag pa'i sgo ston par mdzad do// de nas yang bcom ldan
183b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
183b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi ye shes kyi nyi ma/ rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig 'byung gnas rdo rje snying po// chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ rgya mtsho lhar
183b3(rgyud 'bum): zab pa/ las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes thob pa/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje nam mkha' lta bu/ sku chen po rdo rje'i sku/ mtha' las 'das pa'i sku
183b4(rgyud 'bum): sku rin po che chos kyi sku/ sprul pa'i sku/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyi sku/ byang chub kyi sems/ don yod pa/ yongs su bsdus pa/ dge ba 'phel ba/ rgyal po chen po//
183b5(rgyud 'bum): snang ba'i tog bzhad pa po/ chos dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyi 'khor lo// skad thams cad pa/ sna tshogs pa can/ srung ba po/ gnod sbyin can/ mtshams
183b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba/ yang dag pa'i gter/ gtsug tor du gyur pa/ mchog ldan/ rdo rje can/ 'khor lo can/ ye shes can/ khyab 'jug chen po/ sku dang / gsung
183b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / thugs rdo rje/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du legs par bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bgrod pa/ rdo rje'i dbyings thams
184a1(rgyud 'bum): cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa' nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje'i byin rlabs kyi ye shes snying po/ de ba'in
184a2(rgyud 'bum): g shegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba chen po'i dam tshig nam mkha'i khams thams cad du spros pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes
184a3(rgyud 'bum): pas mngon par byang chub par gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rnam par dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa nam mkha' thams
184a4(rgyud 'bum): cad la khyab pa po/ gzugs thams cad yongs su mthong ba'i ye shes kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gsheg
184a5(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad don yod pa'i bka' lung mdzad pas sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid bla na med pa'i las sna tshogs pa can/ rnam snang mi 'gyur mi bskyod pa// rin chen
184a6(rgyud 'bum): tog ste 'od byed pa/ / 'od dpag med pa rgyal ba'i mgon// don yod pa ni las kun byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor/
184a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la rab tu gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa
184b1(rgyud 'bum): brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes yang dag par rjes su thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa/
184b2(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnyis su med cing mnyam nyid dmigs pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pa mthar
184b3(rgyud 'bum): phyin pa la gnas pa/ stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi po dag
184b4(rgyud 'bum): gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mnyam pa nyid la dmigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug nyid
184b5(rgyud 'bum): la byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs dang mtshams rnams la rnam par gnas so// de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka'
184b6(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drongs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam
184b7(rgyud 'bum): dpal gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur ba chen po rab tu dgyes pa'i zhal ras kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drang ba'i don du rdo rje se sol
185a1(rgyud 'bum): brdabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsdus pa chen po'i snying po 'di ched du brjod pa/ bud+d+ha sa mA dza AHhrIHoM hUM badz+ra sa mA dzaHde nas de skad
185a2(rgyud 'bum): ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyud rab 'byams
185a3(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho sprin khyab par mthong ngo / / de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang
185a4(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig tu mdzad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje blo gros kyis ye shes yongs su bskyed de gnas thams cad du rnam par gnas so// de nas bcom
185a5(rgyud 'bum): l dan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis
185a6(rgyud 'bum): brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor los
185a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba chen po'i snying po bdag la yod de ngas bshad par bya'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlobs shig/ b+h+rUM/ de nas/ mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs
185b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / rin chen 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med// don yod grub pa de bzhin gshegs// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs
185b2(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams dang lhan cig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dpal gyi be'u la rab tu zhugs te/ zhugs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba
185b3(rgyud 'bum): chen po thams cad kyi phyir byin gyis brlab par mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad zhal bzhir gyur te/ zhal bzhi po rnams las chos kyi dbyings
185b4(rgyud 'bum): dang nam mkha'i khams mtha' med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos kyi tshul dbyangs gcig gis ched du brjod pa 'di lha ste/ rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas
185b5(rgyud 'bum): gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ / lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dga' ba rnam
185b6(rgyud 'bum): par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ / sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas
185b7(rgyud 'bum): so/ / 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar
186a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ / gti mug rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'i
186a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ / mi khom pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so//
186a3(rgyud 'bum): yid sim pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems
186a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i gnas so/ / lus rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// ngag rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i
186a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas so/ / yid rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems
186a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i gnas so/ / sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems
186a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i gnas so/ / ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// reg rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems
186b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i gnas so/ / dngos po thams cad rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin//
186b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal
186b3(rgyud 'bum): nas chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gsang sngags thams cad kyi 'dren pa'o/ / sngags thams cad kyi bla mar gyur pa/ thams cad gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba brtan pa/ rdzi
186b4(rgyud 'bum): ba med pa/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ b+h+rUM/ 'jam dpal gang la las chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin bsdus pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di lan
186b5(rgyud 'bum): cig tsam yang thos na/ de'i byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad chod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa chen
186b6(rgyud 'bum): po thams cad nye bar bsags kyang nams kyang dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang sdig pa rnams byas na'ang sdug bsngal med cing zad par
186b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gang gis 'di 'chang ba dang / nyi ma re re 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / rgyun ma chad par yid la byed pa de ni skye ba 'di nyid la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting
187a1(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin so sor thob nas chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ / chos thams cad la dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po skye ba
187a2(rgyud 'bum): bcu drug na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ slar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
187a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshul de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang / rang bsgrub pa 'di ston par mdzad do// rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i
187a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub chen po'i rdo rje lta bur sra ba dang don gcig pa nyid kyis don mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i rang bzhin mngon par bzhin rnam par dag pas/ chos nyid mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub
187a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i byang chub chen po dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyis thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pas byang chub chen po ste/ 'jam dpal gang la las chos kyi gnas
187a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi po 'di thos nas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / sgom par byed na/ ji srid byang chub snying po la zug gi bar du sdig pa thams cad yang dag par ldan pa'ang sdig pa
187a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par byang chub par 'gyur ro// aM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gdug pa
187b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal bas bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nges par sgrub pa bkar
187b2(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa'i phyir/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa'o// zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa'i phyir/ zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa'o// gti mug gi spros pa med pa'i phyir/
187b3(rgyud 'bum): gti mug gi spros pa med pa'o// chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad spros pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
187b4(rgyud 'bum): byiphyin pa spros pa med par rig par bya'o/ / 'jam dpal gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas 'dzin cing 'don la klog par byed na/ des 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas
187b5(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams bsad par gyur kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro// hUM/ de nas bcom
187b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang chos thams cad rnam par gzigs pa'i dbang phyug ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi
187b7(rgyud 'bum): phyi pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten gyi 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ yul thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no// 'jig rten gyi zhe sdang thams cad rnam par
188a1(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i phyir/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no// 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no//
188a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa nyid yin no// 'jig rten gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i
188a3(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa nyid yin no// 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas nyan par byed cing 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byed na/ de 'dod
188a4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi nang na gnas kyang pad+ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi skyon glo bur ba'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par
188a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / hrIHde nas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum thams cad pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i 'byung gnas ye shes
188a6(rgyud 'bum): snying po zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ dbang bskur byin pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi rgyal po yongs su thob par 'gyur ro// don gyi sbyin pas
188a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / chos kyi sbyin pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// zang zing gi sbyin pas thams cad kyi lus dang / ngag dang / yid
188b1(rgyud 'bum): bde ba thob par 'gyur ro/ / trAM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg pa tham cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnyed pa thams cad kyi kha tshur 'chang ba de bzhin gsheg pa brtags pas/ sngar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams
188b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi ye shes phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs
188b3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ba dang / gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas chos thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang / thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob pa'i don du
188b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba dang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas sku dang / gsung dang / thugs thams cad rdo rje mchog tu 'grub pa'i don du 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
188b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshul 'di thos nas 'dzin cing 'don la 'chad cing sgom par byed na/ des dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / ye shes thams cad dang / las thams
188b6(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gi dngos grub thams cad so sor yongs su thob par 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
188b7(rgyud 'bum): bapar rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro/ / AH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang rdo rje'i yi ge yongs su bsgyur ba zhes byab/
189a1(rgyud 'bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ rang bzhin med pa sbyor ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad spong ba nyid dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med par nye bar bzang
189a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad mtshan mas dben pa dang / smon pa las nye bar grol ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad smon pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir
189a3(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o/ / AM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dus pa'i khongs su chud pa de bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang
189a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa chen por 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'dus par 'jug
189a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba dang / don mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'dus par 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas dam pa'i chos kyi
189a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dus par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / las mnyam pa nyid la zhugs par 'dus pa thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
189a7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i snod de bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu zin par
189b1(rgyud 'bum): tshul bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pas de bzhin
189b2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / shes rab kyi
189b3(rgyud 'bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / brjod pa dang / sgom pa mngon du 'gro ba'i las kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
189b4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ / oM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i nus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang sems can thams cad 'dul
189b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ye shes snying po zhes bya ba'i shes pa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba
189b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dul ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad chos nyid nyid pas khro ba chos nyid nyid dang / sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro ba rdo rje nyid de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems
189b7(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub ste/ ha/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang chos thams cad mas/
190a1(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid kyi mchog ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang / thams cad
190a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don nyid dang / chos nyid thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang / thams cad kyi bya ba nyid pas
190a3(rgyud 'bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba nyid du rig par bya'o/ / hrI/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis
190a4(rgyud 'bum): rlob pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po bdag nyid thams cad pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas
190a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi snying po dang / rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rin po che'i phung po dang / ngag
190a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la rab tu 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos kyi snying po dang / las thams cad byed pa'i sbyor bas sems can thams cad las kyi snying po'o// hrIH/ de nas bcom
190a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das mtha' las 'das shing mu med pa'i chos la mi gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang chos thams cad yongs su mi gnas pas byin gyis
190b1(rgyud 'bum): brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
190b2(rgyud 'bum): mtha' med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mu med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gcig pa nyid kyi phyir/
190b3(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad yongs su mi gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'jam dpal
190b4(rgyud 'bum): gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas nyan par byed 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byed na/ de ni dag cing mthar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la nges
190b5(rgyud 'bum): par gnas nas sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid myur du thob par 'gyur ro// rgyo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
190b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa/ chos thams cad spros pa med pas/ slar yang bde ba chen
190b7(rgyud 'bum): bo rdo rje don yod pa dam tshig ces bya ba rdo rje chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dam pa thog ma dang / za ma dang / dbus las grol ba pa'i mchog 'di bka'
191a1(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po mchog tu grub pas bde ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems
191a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po mchog tu grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams
191a3(rgyud 'bum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mchog tu grub pas bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pas mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
191a4(rgyud 'bum): bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub pas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig
191a5(rgyud 'bum): r ten gsum mtha' dag gis dbang phyug mchog tu grub pas ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su skyob pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i
191a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog shin tu bde ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur te/ swa/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkhas pa mchog rnams gnas gyur pa/
191a7(rgyud 'bum): srid mnyam med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs// ye shes byin gyis brlabs kyis 'grub// las ni tham
191b1(rgyud 'bum): cad rnam dag pas/ / srid pa dag par 'gyur phyir ro// chags sogs rab ldan 'jig rten ni// kun nas srid par sdig byed pa// de dag rnam par sbyang don du/
191b2(rgyud 'bum): de rnams 'dod chags chen po 'dzin// ji ltar pad+ma legs dmar ba// dmar po'i skyon gyis mgos ltar// bag chags skyon gyis srid pa ru// rtag tu 'gro phan gos
191b3(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur/ / 'dod chags chen po rnam dag pa// bde ba chen po nor chen po// khams gsum dbang phyug thob nas su// de dag don ni brtan par byed// haH/ 'jam
191b4(rgyud 'bum): dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re bzhin du nang par langs te/ gang 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa
191b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / rjod par byed na/ des bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur zhing bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dngos grub mchog tu gyur pa skye ba 'di 'dri
191b6(rgyud 'bum): la thob par 'gyur ro/ / hUM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di
191b7(rgyud 'bum): dag ni nges par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo ste/ 'di lta ste/ oM na ma sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwAnA~M/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta badz+ra/ oM sa man+ta b+ha dra ts+tshaH
192a1(rgyud 'bum): oM tsan+ti ma NI/ oM a ni rod+b+ha/ oM dzaHb+h+rUM b+he te/ oM dzA ti pa ri wa ra te/ ma hA rU g+hA d+hAr+m+ma te/ oM b+hir+yaM ka rba ts+tshe/ oM sarba kA mI ni/ oM badz+ra TAD+D+h+ya ka
192a2(rgyud 'bum): wa tsi te hUM phaT/ oM sarba ha thA ga te/ oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/ oM pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA dz+nyA na bi shud+d+he/ oM kar+m+ma bi sho d+ha ne hUM/ oM ni su~M b+ha badz+ro Ni hUM phaT/ oM kar+m+ma rA ge/ oM badz+ra
192a3(rgyud 'bum): hUM badz+re/ oM sarba d+harma t+tI/ oM hrIHoM a kA ro mA kha~M/ oM pradz+nyA bA ra mi te oM ha~MHyaM hU~M oM au/ oM sarba ta thA ga ha kA ya a gr-i/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAg badz+raM/ oM sarba tA
192a4(rgyud 'bum): thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+re aH/ oM s+pho Ta ya sarba A pa ya big+h+nAM ni pra mo k+Sha ya/ sarba a pA yA ga taM b+h+yaHsarba sa ma ya badz+ra hUM phaT/ sdig pa dang bral ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// de brjo/
192a5(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am/ de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di ni dge ba'irtsa
192a6(rgyud 'bum): ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du grags par mi 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can gyis bris pa dang / bklag pa dang / brjod pa dang
192a7(rgyud 'bum): rim gro bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'ang nus pa ma yin no// gzhan du na gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgom
192b1(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chung ngu na/ yi ge gcig yang thos na sems can de sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par rig par bya na/ slar yang mtha' dag ma lus par rdzogs
192b2(rgyud 'bum): pa lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal sems can gang la la gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma brgyad cu snyed kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la phyag byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod
192b3(rgyud 'bum): par byas nas des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par nus so/ / sa'i khams gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de mchod rten du gyur pa ste phyag bya/
192b4(rgyud 'bum): baba'i gnas so// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la bzung ba 'am/ glegs bam du bris par gyur na de bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por skye ba dran par 'gyur ro//
192b5(rgyud 'bum): de la bdud sdig to can gyis bar du mi gcod do// rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang / gzhan yang lha rnams kyis phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang ste/ de la srung ba dang / skyab pa
192b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur zhing tshul ma yin pas dus byed par mi 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro//
192b7(rgyud 'bum): mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang yid la 'dod pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta bu'i phan yon mang po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
193a1(rgyud 'bum): tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje snying po thams cad kyi rgyan theg pa chen po mngon par/
193a2(rgyud 'bum): rtogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug dam pa 'khor los sgyur ba chen po bzhis yongs
193a3(rgyud 'bum): su bskor ba rdo rje snying po rgyun ces bya ba'i snying po 'di phyung ngo / / mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'o// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i phyir/
193a4(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// spros pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa'o// thams cad kyis sems gsal ba'i mtshan
193a5(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi phyir/ chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings yongs su rgyas pa'o// AHb+h+rUM trA hrIHhUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje yi ge'i tshig 'di brjod pa tsam gyis
193a6(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pas sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad shin tu gsal bas snang bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
193a7(rgyud 'bum): dang thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi slar yang bsdu bas byon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i
193b1(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya
193b2(rgyud 'bum): ba bshad par byas nyon cig/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gyis shig bshang par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos/ 'jam dpal
193b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes la zhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po
193b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po la rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs byos shig/ de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos
193b5(rgyud 'bum): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar zhugs te/ byin gyis brlabs nas de las 'thon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar rnam par
193b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung gnas rdo rje snying po'i rgyan byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
193b7(rgyud 'bum): snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje chen po snying po'i rgyan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nA
194a1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bshad bya ba/ / dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rdo rje snying po gsang chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun ldan dge/ rdo rje snying po dang mtshungs pa// khams
194a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad rnam par sprul/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi bdud rtsi dang // gzhan yang bcud len dang mtshungs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo rje kun gyi rang bzhin grong //
194a3(rgyud 'bum): gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rdo babs bzhis ni rnam par mdzes// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog chun pos spras// grwa yi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo 'gram dang ni mtshams
194a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams su/ / rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ nang gi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// de yi phyi rol du bya ba// dkyil 'khor yang ni rnam pa bdun// sgo khyud du ni rin chen ni// mchog tu rmad
194a5(rgyud 'bum): byung gzhag par bya/ / rdo rje srad bu dag dang ldan// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan// rdo rje ka ba'i mdun bzhag pa// bum pa la sogs dag gis spras// tshad mdzes pa yi snying po
194a6(rgyud 'bum): / / rdo rje 'khor lo sogs pas brgyan// rab rab chen po ni// ri bo gnyis kyi phyi rol tu// sngags pas kun nas yongs bskor ba/ khyad par rdo bzhin bri bar bya// nang gi dkyil
194a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor phyogs kyi char/ / dkyil 'khor dag ni rnam bzhir bya// gru bzhi pa dang zlum po dang // gru gsum rnam pa las byung dang // zla ba phyed pa'i tshul 'dra ba// dkyil 'khor yang ni bzhi pa'o// de yi nang
194b1(rgyud 'bum): gicha la ni/ / pad+ma lo ma brgyad pa bri// de ltar shes rab chen po yi// slob dpon rdo rje 'byung bas bri// de yi rjes su lha rnams kyi// go rims ji bzhin bri bar bya// gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug
194b2(rgyud 'bum): tor dang / / gzi brjid dra ba rnam par rgyal// dam tshig mchog gi rnam pa bzhi// slar yang 'dab ma'i mtshams su bri// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhi po ru// mi bskyod
194b3(rgyud 'bum): la sogs rnam pa bzhi/ / rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bri// mi bskyod pa yi dkyil 'khor ni// zla 'od lta bu'i mdog tu bya// der ni rdo rje sems dpa' sogs// kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug
194b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / rdo rje slob dpon stobs po che// shes rab chen pos dgod par bya// rdo rje rin chen sogs gang ba'i// rin chen 'byung gnas dkyil 'khor yin// rdo rje chos sogs gsang ba
194b5(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / dkyil 'khor tshe dpag med pa'i 'o// rdo rje las la sogs ldan pa// don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// dkyil 'khor gsum pa bri bar bya//
194b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam gzigs la sogs sangs rgyas rnams// dkyil 'khor der ni bri ba yin// rdo rje snying po rgyal po che// khyab bdag gsang ba'i dbang phyug gtso// 'dod pa'i don kun grub pa'i phyir//
194b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// blo gros rgya mtsho mi zad blo// byams pa bdag nyid chen po dang / nam mkha'i snying po grags chen po// kun tu bzang po nyid dag dang / phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid
195a1(rgyud 'bum): che/ / kun nas 'bar ba'i 'khrigs pa'i 'od// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rigs kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas sras bzang dri ma med// sgrib pa thams cad nges par sel// de nang /
195a2(rgyud 'bum): sa yi snying po mchog/ nam mkha'i mdzod ni mdzod dam pa// lag na rin chen bla na med// mi phan pa kun 'joms pa ni// dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya// dpa' bo 'di dag gsang ba che// dkyil 'khor/
195a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag bri bar bya// 'khor lo de ni dor nas ni// blo gros ldan pas phyir song ste// shar du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya go rims bzhin du dgod// 'khor lo mdzes pa'i/
195a4(rgyud 'bum): dge legs bri// rdo rje dpal be'u pad ces bya// gtsug tor rnam pa sna tshogs pa// rdo rje pad+mas rnam par brgyan// lhung bzed dang ni 'khar gsol dang // chos gos kyang ni khyang
195a5(rgyud 'bum): par du/ / 'di dag shAkya seng ge yi// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu gsungs// gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod pas// de rnams blo ldan brtan par bri// byang du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/
195a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog de bzhin te// pad+ma ut+pa la nyid dang ni// spyi blugs pags pa'i g.yang gzhi dang // dbyug gu'i shing ni mkhas pa yis// ma myos pa ru bri bar bya// slar yang lho ru song nas
195a7(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che// slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis// phyag rgya 'bar bas bri bar bya// rdo rje bany+tsi sha dang ni// dril bu rab tu mdzes pa dang // dbyug gu dang ni tho ba dang // dbyug pa
195b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rjes mtshan pa dang / / lcags sgrog dang ni rtse gsum yang // 'di dag dpa' bo'i phyag rgya'o// dkyil 'khor nub tu song nas ni// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo gros kyi// gsang ba'i chos ni dam pa
195b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ brtson 'grus chen po'i phyag rgya bri// ut+pal 'khor lo rdo rje dang // ral gri yang ni khyad par du// zod pa dang ni dgra sta dang // rma bya dang ni seng ge nyid// phyag rgya 'di rnams brtson 'grus
195b3(rgyud 'bum): che/ / mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// 'khor lo'i grwa ni legs gnas par// rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs bri// phyi yi 'khor lo'i grwa ru ni// rdo rje bdug pa zhes bya sogs// bdag nyid
195b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'bad pa yis/ / mchod pa 'di dag bri bar bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor gA rnams su// gzugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya sogs// gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni// khyad par du ni ro dang yang //
195b5(rgyud 'bum): reg dang chos kyi dbyings dang ni// mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// sgo yi nang ni thams cad du// sgo skyong ba ni dgod par bya// de bzhin dkyil 'khor gzhan pa ru// rdo rje shugs kyis song
195b6(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / go rims bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi// yum rnams 'bad pas bri bar bya// nam mkha'i spyan zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba dang // shes rab pha rol phyin ma dang // phyag rgya
195b7(rgyud 'bum): kun dang yang dag ldan/ / ji srid de bzhin gshegs rig ma// thams cad shar du dgod par bya// de nas blo gros ldan pa yis// byang gi phyogs su song nas ni// gos dkar las gnas sgrol ma
196a1(rgyud 'bum): che/ / khro gnyer can dang grags 'dzin ma// khyad par du ni dpal bdun dang // mda' bdun dang ni dbyangs can ma// de la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams// bran dang bran mor yang
196a2(rgyud 'bum): / dag ldan// de bzhin pho nya pho nya mo// gsang ba'i phyag rgya lhan cig bri// rdo rje shugs kyis song ba ni// lho yi phyogs su rab phyin la/ mA ma kI dang lcags sgrog dang // khab rtse rdo rje mtshan ma
196a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ de ltar bris nas blo ldan gyis// nub kyi phyogs su song nas ni// der ni phyin nas shes ldan gyis// sgra can stobs chen bri bar bya// de bzhin 'dam bu mda' rgyu dang // lha
196a4(rgyud 'bum): mo zla ba'i 'od zer 'dra/ / lha mo nye ba'i sgra can ma// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// rab bkra nor gyi blo gros dang // 'gugs byed pho nya lnga dang ldan// grwa yi cha ru bri bya ba// rdo rje mdung rtse
196a5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya sogs/ / sgo yi nang ni thams cad du// sgo skyong ba ni rnam par bri// gzhan gyis mi thub lha mo che// de bzhin ral pa gcig ma mchog/ rdo rje dregs ma lha mo che// rdo rje kum+b+hi
196a6(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bri/ / de nas blo ldan dkyil 'khor ni// thams cad las ni 'thon nas su// shar gyi cha ni thams cad du// sngags pa rnam par gzhag pa yis// khro chen gzhan gyis mi thub
196a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin mi g.yo zhes bya dang / / khams gsum rnam rgyal snying po ni// mnga' bdag brgya phrag lnga yis bskor// de ltar bris nas sngags pa yis// de nas byang gi char song ste//
196b1(rgyud 'bum): namagrin khro bo chen po dang // skar ma'i spyan ni khyad par du'o// khro gnyer rim pa rnam bsgyings pa// khro bo blo ldan brtson 'grus che// pho nya bran rnams thams cad dang / ma mo stong gos yongs
196b2(rgyud 'bum): bskor bar/ / 'jig rten mgon gyis bka' stsal to// de nas blo gros ldan pa yis// lho yi phyogs su song nas ni// der ni phyin te brtson chen po// khro bo chen po stobs po che// rdo rje
196b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan pas legs mtshan pa/ / shes rab chen pos dgod par bya// khro bo zla ba'i thig le dang // de bzhin khro chen rdo rje 'chang // sgra gcan khro bo stobs po che// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang //
196b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sa 'og sa 'og dang // de bzhin 'jigs pa'i mig can dang // rkang pas bsnun pa rdo rje mchog/ gsang dang rab gsang rjes 'gro dang // bran dang pho nya khro bo ni// stong phrag gsum dang phyed
196b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis bskor/ / de ltar bris nas blo ldan gyis// nub kyi phyogs su phyin nas ni// der ni song ste brtson chen po// gshin rje mthar byed ces bya ba// gdong drug pa la lag drug pa// khro bo
196b6(rgyud 'bum): yi ge bdun zhes bgyi/ / khro bo'i gtsog stong phrag ni// bdun dag gos ni yongs bskor ba'o// dkyil 'khor cha ni thams cad du// khro bo gtum po thams cad bri// de nas sgro ldan 'ongs
196b7(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / rang rgyal rgyal ba thams cad kyi// dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya// de nas sngags pa 'ongs nas ni// rgyal ba nyan thos bri bar bya// de yi phyi ru tshangs sogs lha// dkyil 'khor
197a1(rgyud 'bum): kun tu rnam par bri/ / dbang phyug che dang khyab 'jug dang // zla ba nyi ma zhes bya dang // gza' brgyad dang ni 'jig rten skyong // rgyal chen ris ni bzhi po dang // de bzhin sum cu
197a2(rgyud 'bum): rtsa gsum dang / / 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan dang // 'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang // tshangs pa mdun na 'don pa rnams// tshangs chen rnams dang // 'od chung rnams
197a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang // sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams
197a4(rgyud 'bum): dang 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba rnams dang / 'og min rnams dang / dag pa'i gnas rnams
197a5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mtshams su dgod par bya'o/ / de nas dbang ldan du dbang ldan dang / dbang por dbang po dang / mer me'i lha dang / gshin rjer gshin rje dang / bden bral du bden
197a6(rgyud 'bum): bral dang / chur chu lga dang / rlung du rlung lha dang / lus ngan du lus ngan rnams dang / phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o// lho
197a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o/ / nub tu khro bo'i rgyal po chen po gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o// byang du rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya chen po rnam par dgod
197b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / phyi rol dur ba dag gi nang du rgya mtsho chen po bdun dgod par bya'o// de'i phyi rol tu 'gro ba lnga po gzhag par bya'o// de lta bu'i gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi pa/ dkyil 'khor chen po dang dang / me tog gi chun
197b2(rgyud 'bum): po dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgreng ba/ dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas klubs pa/ de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris la bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du dbus su ri'i rgyal po lhun
197b3(rgyud 'bum): po'i tshad du dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du mar rgyas pa de'i steng du rdo rje seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par bsams nas nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis cho gas mchod/ la mnyes par byas te/
197b4(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / byin gyis brlabs pas spro ba dang bsdu ba la sogs pa byas pas/ nam mkha'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya
197b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po rnam par bsams nas spyan drangs te bcug la bcings nas dam chog la rnam par gzhag ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje sems pa'i sku mdog nyid rnam
197b6(rgyud 'bum): pabapar snang mdzad yin no snyam du snyoms pa bsgom par bya'o/ / de nas snying rje dang byams pa'i mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' las 'das pa thams cad khyab pa'i rgya
197b7(rgyud 'bum): mtsho'i sprin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sprin gyis kun nas bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim pa mchog gis rdo rje sems dpa' hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya rang gi lus la zhugs nas/
198a1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs thams cad hUM gi yi ge'i sgra brjod cing bsnun pa bzhis rol pa dang bcas pas phyag byas la bzlas pa byas te/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ cho ga bzhin du rdo rje
198a2(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon gyis bkug nas bcug ste bcings la dam tshig la bzhag pa byas nas/ rdo rje se gol gyi sbyor ba dang kun nas 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbab ste/ snying po 'di bzhis rol
198a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang bcas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag mtshungs so snyam du bsam par bya'o// de la de'i snying po ni/ a A aM aHbdag byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas nas
198a4(rgyud 'bum): brjod la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag mtshungs pa yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje lcags kyu'i se gol gtogs nas snying po 'dis
198a5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o/ / de la snying po ni 'di yin te/ b+h+rUM trAM hrIHhUM/ badz+ra sa mA dza/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha nu sarba ta thA ga ha sarba bo d+hi satwa pa ri pri ti pra t+ye ka ri ha te swA hA/ oM badz+ra sa
198a6(rgyud 'bum): pU dzaHA gats+tsha A gats+tsha sarba te thA ga hA badz+ra yo gI shwa ra satwa nA yeHsa hA a hAHoM haH/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad
198a7(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang / rgyud dang / gzungs rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor du 'dus nas 'byon par 'gyur ro// den/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
198b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms nas ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa bton la cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan par byas nas sgo bzhi po rnams
198b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa las byas te/ las chen po dam pa'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs par byas te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ su ra ta badz+ra badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM hoHa
198b3(rgyud 'bum): d+hi tiSh+Tha n+tu sarba ha thA ga ha ma hA maN+Da laM/ de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
198b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' thams cad la bdag gsol ba 'debs lags kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sem dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ sems can thams cad kyi don
198b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad du gsol/ bdag la dngos grub thams cad stsal du gsol/ ji ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi
198b6(rgyud 'bum): mthas klas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul kun nas bkang ste byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas 'dir
198b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje snying po'i rgyan chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas par 'gyur ba ni/ de nas gos dmar po phrag par gzar te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sngags 'dis phyag
199a1(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar nas/ sngags 'das snyan gsan dbab par bya ste/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya badz+rA a b+hiSh+TA na me ku ru nAM/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ye me ar+d+ha
199a2(rgyud 'bum): / tiSh+Than+tu sarba bud+d+ha mAM pra be sha yan+tu/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra maN+Da la a laM kA re ma hA badz+ra maN+Da le pra ti ba la yan+tu mAM sU dzAny+tsa me pra yats+tshan+tu/ de nas slob dpon gyis do thal sor mo me tog dkar po'i 'greng ba sngags 'di
199a3(rgyud 'bum): btags nas nang du me tog bzhi dang / sor mo'i rtse mor me tog re re bcug la/ de nas sngags 'di brjod cing gzhug par bya'o// hUM d+haM hri/ kruM shru dzI baHkaHpro khri shri dzI haM/ aM a d+hi tiSh+Tha mAM/ sarba ta thA ga ta
199a4(rgyud 'bum): sa ma ya satwa pra bi shA mi/ de nas slob dpon gyis de'i gdong g.yogs bcings la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i khams rab tu
199a5(rgyud 'bum): khyab pa'i sbyor bas de bcug la/ sngags 'dis me tog gtor bar bya'o// sngags ni/ sa ma yo he sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya hUM/ gang la me tog rnams lhung ba de nyid de'i lhar byin par bya'o// de nas tshe
199a6(rgyud 'bum): ga bzhin du sngags 'dis dbab par bya'o/ / sa ma yo haM sa ma ya stAM/ sa ma ya hUM/ na maHsarba ta thA ga he b+h+yaHta Ta ta Ta/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ badz+ra hUM/ bi kr-i ta bi dU/ dz+nyAM hwA dur dAn+ta da ma ka/ ha si ta
199a7(rgyud 'bum): lam+bo dar/ ka ha ka ha/ tsu lu tsu lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ aT+TAn+da ha sa da ra bi dar/ badz+ra badz+ra/ badz+rod ga te/ badz+ra ne tra/ badz+ra shro tra/ badz+ra d+hA Ne/ badz+re da~Mn+da ny+tsi ra ya si pra bi hisha badz+ra bA
199b1(rgyud 'bum): Nil+r-ing ya nA bi mI bi gan+d+haHb+hUH/ prAr+N+Na pUH/ b+hUd+d+had+b+ha pa ya b+hUd+b+ha pa ya/ b+hU ma ya b+hU ma ya/ pA ta ya mo Ta ya/ A be sha ya/ dzalpA dzal+la/ dzal+lA ya dza lpA ya/ la b+hU la g+hA/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA kar
199b2(rgyud 'bum): phra ba ra/ d+har+m+ma lab+h+yAM/ bi dza ya he haM badz+ra dze kA ra hUM kr-i ta swAhA/ dbab pa'i dam tshig go// de ltar babs nas kye khyod kyis gang dge ba 'am mi dge ba mthong ngamo zhes 'dri'o// de nas da
199b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am/ rige pa'am/ mi dge ba bdag gis 'di lta bu mthong ngo zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas slob dpon gyis de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa
199b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du yongs su gzhag la mig bcings pa bkrol la dbang bskur ba'i don du dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi pa byas la/ de'i dbus su kha dog thams cad kyis pad+ma chen po 'dab
199b5(rgyud 'bum): ma brgyad pa yid du 'ong ba 'am seng ge'i khri rang nyid kyis bris te/ de nas de la dar gyi bgo ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa khyad par du gzugs dang / sgra dang /
199b6(rgyud 'bum): dridang / ro dang / reg pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga bo che dang / dung la sogs pa dang / gur dang / glu rnams kyis legs par mchod nas
199b7(rgyud 'bum): cod pan lnga'i dbang bskur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyi go 'phang la rab tu bzhag pa rigs dang rjes su 'thun pa'i ming du byas nas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par
200a1(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ha badz+roSh+NI Sha a b+hi Shiny+tsi/ oM badz+ra satwa a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ spyi bo dang / dpral ba dang / mgrin
200a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / snying kha dang / lte ba dang / rked pa nas/ rje dar gyi bar du yi ge'i phyag rgya bkod la/ rang gi lha'i gzugs kyi sbyor bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas rdo rje'i tshig rnams
200a3(rgyud 'bum): bslab par byas te/ de la rdo rje'i gnas tshigs rnams ni 'di dag ste/ rang bzhin gyis dbyer med pa'i phyir rang gi lus rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis lta ba'i thibs pa
200a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nges par 'joms par 'gyur ro/ / ma rig pa rdo rje'i gnas kyi rig pa la 'jug pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis dmigs pa'i dngos po yongs su shes pa la 'jug par 'gyur

200a6(rgyud 'bum): phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'dod chags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// ha/ zhe sdang gi mtha' zhi ba 'i phyir byams pa'i mtha'i rdo rje'i gnas te/
