200b1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ raM/ sems can thams cad sems can gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems can mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i don dang sems can gyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// hrI
200b2(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad sems can gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems can nges pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba mngon par rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// /
200b3(rgyud 'bum): a/ sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i don dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su rtogs pa'i don
200b4(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur ro/ / aM/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rdo rje'i gnas 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjes su rtogs par 'jug pa'i don dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su
200b5(rgyud 'bum): rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ / aM bdud kyi las thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis las thams cad rjes su rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / las thams cad las
200b6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su 'das pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ / hU~M/ ngag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sgra ji bzhin pa thams cad rjes su rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / brjod
200b7(rgyud 'bum): pa las 'das pa'i chos rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ / baM/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'chi 'pho med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang /
201a1(rgyud 'bum): na ba dang / 'chi ba'i lam las 'da' ba'i don du 'gyur ro// maM chos thams cad ma byung ba ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'gog pa med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / chos thams
201a2(rgyud 'bum): cad 'gog pa med pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ / khaM/ 'di la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa// bdag gi de nyid rab rtogs te// bdag gis de nyid rab brtags nas// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med/
201a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur// de la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / gter thams cad dang / 'khor lo thams cad dang / rdo rje thams cad dang / ral gri
201a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / yid bzhin nor bu dang / dngul chu dang / bcud len rnams dang / gyen du 'gro ba dang / rkang 'og dang / mi snang ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / 'khor lo sgyur ba nyid dang / brgya byin
201a5(rgyud 'bum): nyid dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams des myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ hUM/ yid ni rtse gcig gyur pa yi// sangs rgyas rjes dran
201a6(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms nas ni/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bsgom par bya// sbyor ba de yi bka' drin gyis// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil
201a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dbus gnas par/ / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab gsal ba'i// kun tu bzang po phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// lo ni phred kyi sbyor ba yis// kun tu bzang po 'dra bar
201b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rgyal po'i dbang bskur nyid dam ni// yang na dbang phyug thob par 'gyur// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// de nas rang gis brtan
201b2(rgyud 'bum): bopor bsgom/ / 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug kyang // thob na dngos grub gzhan ci smos// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya gang // de bzhin nyid kyi 'od gsal ba// rdo rje'i sbyor bas de bsgoms pas// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor
201b3(rgyud 'bum): brtan por 'gyur/ / de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems kyi mchog sgom pa phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes nyid yin no// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// phyag rgya
201b4(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi bdag nyid kyis/ / dam pa'i don nyid thob par 'gyur// gzi brjid dra ba phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// gsang ba'i rgyal po thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lha ci zhig smos//
201b5(rgyud 'bum): gdugs dkar gtsug tor chen po ni// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// gtsug tor ye shes thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lha ci zhig smos// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya che// de ni yang dang yang du sgo//
201b6(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi rgyal po rnam rgyal nyid// mdor bsdus pa ni thob par 'gyur// rnam rgyal gtsug tor phyag rgya yi// dam pa'i yi ge bsgom par bya// legs par rab gnas
201b7(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer can/ / dngos grub ye shes thob par 'gyur// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// gtsug tor rnams kyis legs bshad pa// phyag rgya de rnams bdag nyid mchog/
202a1(rgyud 'bum): de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// lhag pa'i lha ni gcig pu nyid// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// rang byung mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang
202a2(rgyud 'bum): phyug go 'phang mchog/ sangs rgyas ye shes dri ma med// bdag nyid chen po thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnams so// da ni de bzhin gshegs
202a3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi chos kyi yi ge'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes de la bslab par bya'o/ / zhes bya ba ni rnam par spyod pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor shes par bya'o// a zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ma skyes
202a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad par bya'o// oM A aM a aHpa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ don dam par chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzog
202a5(rgyud 'bum): par blta bar bya'o/ / oM paM/ na zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi ming dang / gzugs dang / shes rab dang / chos dang bcas pa yongs su shes pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor
202a6(rgyud 'bum): bshad do/ / oM naM/ da zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba dang zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor brjod do// oM daMHsa zhes bya ba ni thogs pa med pa las yang dag pa
202a7(rgyud 'bum): 'das shing yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par spong ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sgo nas phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la sogs pa don dam pa'i bden pa la
202b1(rgyud 'bum): gnas te mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go// oM sU/ ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par
202b2(rgyud 'bum): blta'o/ / oM taM/ ka zhes bya ba ni las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par bgrod pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bya'o// oM kaM/ ma zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu nyid dran pa med cing snying rje che ba dang shes rab rno
202b3(rgyud 'bum): ba las byung ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bshad do// oM maM/ ga zhes bya ba ni zab mo la spyod pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ga/ dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang /
