202b5(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM d+haM/ sha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM shaM/ Sha zhes bya ba ni gang zag
202b6(rgyud 'bum): dang chos kyi bdag med pa nam mkha' lhar gsal zhing chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go// oM ShaM/ k+Sha zhes bya ba ni g.yo ba skye ba med pas
202b7(rgyud 'bum): mi bzad pa'i ye shes so sor dmigs te chos thams cad yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM k+ShaM/ nga zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi'ang yul ma yin
203a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM dza/ tha zhes bya ba ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi
203a2(rgyud 'bum): / sgor blta bar bya'o// oM dz+rIM/ DA zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa thams cad rab tu spangs pas zad pa'i ye shes mi skye zhing mthar thug pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM D+heHdzA zhes bya ba ni
203a3(rgyud 'bum): myur du 'chi ba med pa rjes su dmigs pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM dz+nyA/ ka zhes bya ba ni lus rnam par spyod pa ni 'dod chags dang bral bas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/
203a4(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje snying po'i lus so sor thob pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM kaM/ A zhes bya ba ni sems rnam par spyod po ni nyes pa dang / rmongs pa dang / bag la nyal ba rab tu spangs
203a5(rgyud 'bum): nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM AM/ ba zhes bya ba ni ngag rnam par spyod pa ni ngag gis spros pa chos kyi dbyings rnam
203a6(rgyud 'bum): bapar dge pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM baM/ tsha zhes bya ba ni grib ma ma dmigs shing rang bzhin gyis dang ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM tsha/
203a7(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba ni gcig tu 'dres pa ma dmigs pa'i don dam par gnyis su med par gyur pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM g+haM/ Ta zhes bya ba ni ca co dang bral ba'i rdo rje snying po 'dzin pa'i
203b1(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM TaM/ pha zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad dbu ba rdos pa lha bu'i tshul gyis gsang ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do//
203b2(rgyud 'bum): / oM phaM/ Da zhes bya ba ni dgra chen po las grol ba'i nam mkha' las 'gro ba grub pas so sor thob pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM DaM/ Sha zhes bya ba ni tsha sgo mi dmigs pa'i
203b3(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ShaM / u zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go// oM AM/ ya zhes bya ba ni rgyan
203b4(rgyud 'bum): du byed pa ni nges par 'byung ba'i don du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la nye bar gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM yaM/ ta zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid ni spros pa
203b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go// oM taM/ hu zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i chos rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi//
203b6(rgyud 'bum): sgor bshad do/ oM hUM/ hrI zhes bya ba ni yongs su bzung ba med pa ni 'thab pa dang rtsod pa spangs pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM hrI/ kun nas nyon mongs
203b7(rgyud 'bum): ba med pa ni mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ka kha ga g+ha nga / rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid bzung ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor gnas
204a1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / oM tsa tsha dza dz+nyA nya/ snang ba ni gsal zhing 'bar ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// oM Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ sgom pa ni chos thams cad gnyis su mi gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams
204a2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi sgo'o/ / oM ta tha da d+ha na/ gzhi med pa ni chos thams cad ma 'dres pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go// oM ba pha ba b+ha ma/ byang chub ni chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyir/ chos
204a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ / oM yar la wa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni glo bur ba thams cad nges par dor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings so sor thob cing mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ye shes
204a4(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen pas sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su thob pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM shwa Sha sa pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par
204a5(rgyud 'bum): dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sgo rnam par nges pa'o/ / // de nas rig pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas par gyur pa ni/ sngon bzhin nges par byas nas ni// phyog
204a6(rgyud 'bum): kun mnyam pa nyid bsgoms nas/ / ri rab chen po gru bzhi pa// rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de yi steng du rdo rje che// de yi steng du pad+ma gzhag/ 'dab ma brgyad pa cher bkra ba// rnal 'byor
204a7(rgyud 'bum): ston zhes rnam par bshad/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya che// 'od zer gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor can// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa// yongs su rdzogs par bdag nyid kyis/
204b1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor thams cad bsgom par bya// mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgoms na ni// bskal mthar yang ni de gnas 'gyur// b+ha ga chen po rnal 'byor che//
204b2(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa gnas mi bzad pa// sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgoms na ni// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs par 'gyur// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// sems can kun la thams
204b3(rgyud 'bum): cad du/ / gang tshe rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// de tshe dngos grub lag na gnas// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal chos// gdod nas dag cing ma 'dres pa// gang tshe ye shes mthong ba ni// /
204b4(rgyud 'bum): de yi tshe na dag par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mdor bsdus pa// sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis// gang tshe rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// sna tshogs las ni byed par 'gyur//
204b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes so// / 'khor lo sgyur ba rgyal po che// kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug ni// rdo rje sbyor bas bsgoms na ni//
204b6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam med 'khor lo sgyur ba mtshungs// gzi brjid 'phreng ba phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhig pas bsgom// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs shing mdzes// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs
204b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'od/ / rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// rang bzhin gzi brjid 'phreng bar 'gyur// gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi// phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni// 'od zer gsal ba'i sbyor ba
205a1(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / sems can dag pa nyid du 'gyur// rnam par gsal ba'i gtsug tor rgya// ral gri 'bar ba'i 'od kyis 'khrugs// zag pa med pa'i sbyor ba yis// ma'am med
205a2(rgyud 'bum): gsal ba'i gtsug tor mtshungs/ / rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor sbyor ba yis// de yis rnam pa'i spyod yul 'gyur// rdo rje
205a3(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig ye shes che/ / legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// kun tu bzang po dam pa'i gzugs// mnyam med rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/
205a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// byang chub sems dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// gtsug tor lnga ldan stobs po che// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur/
205a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya che// de yi don du bsgoms nas ni// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed na// skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par
205a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhag pas bsgom/ / skye dgu thams cad chags 'gyur na// bud med gzhan lha smos ci dgos// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// legs so ba ni rab
205a7(rgyud 'bum): gsol bas/ / bud med thams cad tshim par bya// byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya che// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od/
205b1(rgyud 'bum): dpral ba'i phyogs su gnas pa bsgom// de yi dar thod dbang bskur thob// rdo rje gzi brjid phyag rgya che// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'i 'od// snying khar gnas pa bsgom par bya// kun mkhyen ye
205b2(rgyud 'bum): shes ster bar byed/ / rin chen tog gi phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa mchog/ sgrub po dam pas rdzogs par byed// rdo rje bzhad pas phyag rgya che//
205b3(rgyud 'bum): legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rdo rje bzhad pa lhar gyur te// de ni skye dgu dga' byed 'gyur// dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// / pad+ma yi ni pad+ma che// dag pa'i
205b4(rgyud 'bum): chos ni mnyam bzhag pas/ / dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// mnyam med rdo rje chos dang mtshungs// shes rab ye shes rdo rje rno// bsgoms pas de ni rdo rje 'chang // shes rab pha rol phyin dag
205b5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / stong nyid sbyor bas bsgoms nas ni// dam pa'i don du bsgom bya de// mnyam med 'jam dbyangs dang ni mtshungs// rdo rje rgyu yi phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag bsgoms nas//
205b6(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi 'khor lo kun mchog rtse// mdor bsdus nas ni de yis bskor// rdo rje smra ba'i phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje bzlas pa'i nus pa yis// ldem po'i ngag ni de yis 'chad//
205b7(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// / rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgoms nas ni// kun nas kun nas rang nyid kyis// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// rdo rje srung ba bya ba/
206a1(rgyud 'bum): pa che// rdo rje chos zhes grags pa ste// chos kyi sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// rdo rje srung ba dang mtshungs 'gyur// rdo rje gnod sbyin brtson 'grus che// khro bo chen po stobs po che/
206a2(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin dang mtshungs 'gyu ro// rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che// lus ngag yid kyi de bzhin du// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin par
206a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// / sgeg mos mngon par dga' ba ster// 'phreng ba yang ni dbang 'gyur ba// glu mas mdzes pa'i sgra dbyangs byed// gar mas rdzu 'phrul
206a4(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur/ / dri mas bzang po'i dri yin te// me tog byang chub yan lag nyid// sgrol mas mtha' dag gsal ba'o// bdug pa bdug pa dag la brtson// lcags kyus dbang phyug 'gugs byed na//
206a5(rgyud 'bum): skye bo gzhan lha smos ci dgos// zhags pas dbang po'ang 'tshong 'gyur na// gdug pa'i sems can smos ci dgos// lcags sgrog gis ni 'phrog byed dang // tshangs sogs dbang phyag chen po'ang
206a6(rgyud 'bum): 'ching / / 'bebs pas thams cad 'bebs 'gyur na// dman pa'i mi dag smos ci dgos// 'di nyid kyi ni sbyor ba yis// chos kyi yi ge dang ldan pa'i// phyag rgya'i ye shes dang bcas pas// de dag
206a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad myur du 'grub/ / 'di yi sbyor ba shes par bya// phyag rgya'i 'khor lo khyad par bya// spyi gtsug nas ni rkang pa'i bar// yi ge yis ni yongs gang bar// gzugs brnyan gcig gis go 'phang
206b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / sems ni rtse gcig 'gyur bar bsam// sa la rab gnas pad+ma ni// dbang chen gyi ni gnas zhes bshad// dbang po gnyis ni mtshungs sbyor bas// dbang phyug kyang ni bsgrub par bya//
206b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang chen dag ni gru bzhi pa// dbang chen dag gi las su bshad// chu ni zlum por shes par bya// pad+ma'i 'dab mas rnam par mtshan// zhi bar byed pa'i las dang ldan// zhi ba'i don du de bshad
206b3(rgyud 'bum): do/ / me ni gru gsum shes par bya// bzhi mdo yi ni gnas su bshad// dbang du bya ba sgrub don du// pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba'i 'od// mngon spyod la ni brtson 'grus che// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dam
206b4(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / ral gri yi ni phyag rgya'i dbyibs// dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// ser dang dkar dang de bzhin dmar// nag po yang ni khyad par ru// dang po'i dkyil 'khor nas sbyangs te/
206b5(rgyud 'bum): tha ma'i bar du rab tu brtag/ dang po rdo rje rab tu gzhag/ de yi rjes su rin chen te// pad+ma dang ni las rnal 'byor// grub pa'i go 'phang rim par bshad// phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes so//
206b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das rtag pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bka' stsal pa/ gnyis dang gnyis su med pas yongs su dag pas/ chos thams cad rnam par grol ba'i
206b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / rtag pa dang chad pa yongs su dag pas/ chos thams cad zhi ba dang / mtha' dang / mtha' med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// zad pa'i sgo dang / zad pa'i
207a1(rgyud 'bum): mtha' dang / zad pa'i mur thug pa dang ldan pas/ chos thams cad zad pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha' rnam par dag
207a2(rgyud 'bum): pas/ chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mig lnga las yang dag par 'das pas/ chos thams cad nam mkha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sems can thams
207a3(rgyud 'bum): cad nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos kyi dbyings yongs su khyab pas/ chos thams cad dbyer
207a4(rgyud 'bum): mi phyed pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems dang tha mi dad pas/ chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos kyi dbyings mi phyed pa'i
207a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid yin pas/ chos thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// ngo bo nyid med pas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'tsho ba med pas
207a6(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / skad cig ma nyid pas/ chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i mtha'
207a7(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pas/ chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' de bzhin nyid pas/ chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//
207b1(rgyud 'bum): gdod pa nas yongs su dag pas/ chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid pas/ chos thams cad spong ba nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas
207b2(rgyud 'bum): btab pa'o/ / spros pa'i dmigs pa rnam par bral bas/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// re ba thams cad las rnam par grol bas/ chos thams cad smon pa med pa'i phyag
207b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis na/ chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// phung po lnga yongs su 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid kyis na/ chos thams
207b4(rgyud 'bum): cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / rang bzhin gyis bdag med pas/ chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// shin tu mi g.yo ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad zhi ba'i phyag
207b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / don dam pa'i bden pas yongs su khyab pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad bden pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'tsho ba rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i
207b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / shin tu gdon mi za bar gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad 'khrug pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' bcad pa'i phyir/ chos
207b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ji lta ba bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / ming rnams kyi gzhi gzhi med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad sgro 'dogs pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// byed pa pos byas pa'i
208a1(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ chos thams cad 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang
208a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'gag pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad gdod ma nas skye ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab
208a3(rgyud 'bum): paba'o/ / rnam par spyod pa kun tu spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gzugs rnam par lta ba med pa'i phyir/ chos thams
208a4(rgyud 'bum): cad mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / gnas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad nye bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mi mthun pa'i phyog
208a5(rgyud 'bum): nye bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad las kyi
208a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par smin pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / skye ba dang gnas pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// nam mkha'
208a7(rgyud 'bum): dang khyad par med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes
208b1(rgyud 'bum): / dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// snying po med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad phung po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// snying po dang bcas pa med pa'i phyir/
208b2(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas// chos thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab
208b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / mtha' gcig tu 'jig rten gyi lam rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// lha'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir/ chos thams
208b4(rgyud 'bum): cad phyag rgya chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / mtha' gcig tu chos la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// thams cad kyi las sna tshogs byed
208b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// thams cad dam tshig thams cad rjes su sgrub pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sangs
208b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi phyag rgyas rgyas
208b7(rgyud 'bum): btab pa dang / theg pa chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / gsang sngags kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyas rgyas
209a1(rgyud 'bum): btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / ye shes thams cad kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / thams cad
209a2(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye
209a3(rgyud 'bum): shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//
209a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phyag rgya'o// muH'jam dpal phyag rgya'i cho ga 'di dag ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi tshig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
209a5(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa theg pa chen po'i tshig ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kyi phyag rgya'i tshig rnams la 'das pa
209a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / byang chub kyang byung ba yin no/ a aM aHAM/ sngags pas phyag rgya 'dis rgyas btab
209a7(rgyud 'bum): na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya yang dag par 'du'o/ / hUM/ myur du ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par 'gyur/ khaM/ de nas da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyor ba thams
209b1(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes su gyur pa'i/ snying gi dbus su rtag tu sgom/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// pad+ma'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad
209b2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// de yi steng du rtag sgom pa// yi ge yi ni gtso bo mchog/ thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// kha ba ba mo'i 'od 'dra 'od// dpa' bo kun da zla lhar dkar// nyi ma'i
209b3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor lhar 'od gsal/ / zhi ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin sku// kun mkhyen ye shes kyis gang ba// de bzhin gshegs pa gnas kyi gsang // ra sa ya na dang mtshungs mchog/ kha yig
209b4(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'drar shes par bya/ / thig le nA ngas rnams par spras// gsang ba chen po mchog tu mdzes// thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/ de yi steng du rdo rje che// rtse mo lnga dang yang dag ldan// de yi
209b5(rgyud 'bum): steng du sgron ma che/ / 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od// de yi steng du rtag bsams pa// yi ge mchog gi go 'phang ngo // man ngag mchog las shes bya ste// gzhan du na ni nga mi smra//
209b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas mkhas pa thams cad kyis// mdor bsdus nas ni 'di gsungs so// rnam par grol ba gsum thob nas// thob 'gyur 'di ni gzhan du min// lce ni rkan la sbyar bar bya// sna yi rtse mor
209b7(rgyud 'bum): yi ge hUM/ / dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// phyag rgya'i go 'phang tshig gis ni// shes rab ldan pas rang sems sgom// snang ba med cing spros med pa// shin tu mchog tu phrar shes bya//
210a1(rgyud 'bum): khyab bdag bsod nams ye shes dngos// bsam bya bsam gtan gcig bya ste// mig dang sgron ma'i 'od bzhin du// kun tu 'bar ba dang ldan pa// mgrin pa 'bad pas bcum nas
210a2(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / dkar po ser po sngon po 'od// dmar po yang ni thams cad du// 'bar ba 'di dag 'bad pa yis// sgrub po dam pas mtshon par bya// snying khar gsal bar byas nas su// de bzhin
210a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad spyi bor song / / gnas de la ni 'thon nas kyang // dbang po thams cad dga' bar 'gyur// de la 'thon nas 'jig rten ni// mtshungs par kun nas thams cad du// slar yang de ru
210a4(rgyud 'bum): 'ongs nas ni/ / de ni 'jug pa rab tu bsam// yid kyis de ltar bsgoms na ni// rang nyid 'khor lo sgyur lta bu// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas
210a5(rgyud 'bum): bsgom/ / dbang po lngas ni dmigs nas yang // mi rnams lus ni dag par 'gyur// ji snyed bud med yon tan dang // ldan pa kun tu gnas pa ni// bkug nas bcug ste bcings nas su//
210a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang du bya ste bsgrub par bya// de rnams lhan cig yongs bsten nas// sngags pas mchog gi dngos grub thob// gsang ba mchog tu dgyes pa na// shes rab pha rol phyin pa che// zhi ba'i chos kyi
210a7(rgyud 'bum): rim pa ni/ / shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub che// de 'grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// mchog ni rtag par shes par bya// bar mas phun sum tshogs
210b1(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / stong pa nyid dang mtshan med mchog/ smon pa med pa zhes su grags// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs par byed// sa bcu yi ni stobs dag gis/
210b2(rgyud 'bum): pha rol phyin pa thams cad thob// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgoms na// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// de nyid 'di ni bcud kyis len// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ theg chen
210b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu yid 'ong ba/ / stong nyid sgom pa'i bdag nyid can// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ gang gis rtag tu sgom byed na// de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// yon tan mchog las skyes par
210b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / bud med gang zhig sngo bsangs ma// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// lus ngag yid kyi sbyor ba yis// yongs reg A ling gtsum pas// mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur//
210b5(rgyud 'bum): bud med kha dog ljang khu gang // rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de tshe don sngags pas te// mnyam med gsang ba'i ye shes mtshungs// bud med gang zhig kha dog dkar// pad+ma'i 'dab
210b6(rgyud 'bum): ma 'dra ba'i 'od/ / de dang lhan cig sngags pas bsdad// dam pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar// ut+pa la yi rgyan 'chang ma// sngags pas de dang ldan
210b7(rgyud 'bum): cig gnas/ / shes rab pha rol phyin mtshungs 'gyur// bud med in+d+ra nI la mtshungs// gsang ba rdo rje rnal 'byor gyis// sngags pa cho ga shes pas bstan// rig 'dzin rnams kyi stob
211a1(rgyud 'bum): chen 'gyur/ / gsang chen mar ka ta mtshungs// gang gis rtag tu bsten pa ni// de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// myur du gsang ba'i dam par 'gyur// bud med pad+ma rA
211a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dra/ / rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje 'dzin ma lta bu sgrub// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
211a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ gang gis rtag tu sgom pa ni// mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi// mchog gi gnas kyi bsgoms pa ni// rnal 'byor mchog gis mi ring
211a4(rgyud 'bum): bar/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'gyur/ yang dag spong ba rnam pa bzhi// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// mnyam med 'jig rten
211a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug mtshungs/ / so sor yang dag rig pa bzhi// shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni// zhen med rdo rje sangs rgyas mtshungs// mnyam med 'jam pa'i mchog dang 'dra// mi 'jigs
211a6(rgyud 'bum): pa ni rnam pa bzhi/ / rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu ste// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni rkang pa bzhi// shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni//
211a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi po// tshad med pa yi sems kyis ni// rdo rje sbyor bar bdag bsgoms na// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur
211b1(rgyud 'bum): 'grub/ / sbyor ba'i bdag nyid dbang po lnga// dam pa'i don gyis bsgoms na ni// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// mnyam med rdo rje sangs rgyas mtshungs// yid kyi stobs ni rnam pa lnga/
211b2(rgyud 'bum): shin tu mnyame bzhag bsgoms na ni// 'khor lo sgyur ba brtson 'grus che// stobs 'dzin lta bu nyid du 'gyur// byang chub yan lag rin chen bdun// gsang sngags bsgoms pas bsgoms na ni//
211b3(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa'i ye shes sbyor ba yis// khyab bdag chos kun 'dzin par 'gyur// 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi lam// kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa// de ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten
211b4(rgyud 'bum): shes las rab tu 'do'/ / rjes su dran pa rnam pa drug/ bdag nyid rtse gcig gis bsgoms na// sngags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa ru// sngags pa dus mi ring bar 'gyur// stobs bcu po ni yang dag bsgoms// sgoms pa'i rnal
211b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor de nyid kyi/ / bsod nams ye shes yongs rdzogs te// rtag tu stobs bcu'i dam par 'gyur// pha rol phyin bcu yongs su rdzogs// stobs rnams dang ni dbang rnams dang // sa rnam
211b6(rgyud 'bum): kun ni nges bskyed nas/ / mU tu mtshan ma dag par 'gyur// bud mang nu ma shin tu bsnun// rje ngar rje ngar de bzhin du// mchu yis mchu ni yongs su bzung // 'bad pas dam du A ling ga/
211b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam grol gos kyis bsgribs nas su// byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje ye shes brtson 'grus che// rdo rje dbyings su bdag bstan pas// rnam pa sna tshogs kang na/
212a1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor shis pa de bsnyen bya// sngar bzhin thams cad byas nas su// bud med rnams kyi dam tshig sgrub// rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs par 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi nyer nas
212a2(rgyud 'bum): bsnun/ / ling ga myur du gang bar 'gyur// sbyor ba 'di ni mkhyen pa yis// stobs chen sangs rgyas rab tu grub// gsang ba 'di ni dam pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi skyeb pa'o// gsang ba 'di yi sbyor
212a3(rgyud 'bum): ba yis/ / yi ge dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i// chos su grags pa gang yin pa// de rnams sgom byed gtso bo ni// dngos grub thams cad rab rdzogs pa//
212a4(rgyud 'bum): ma 'dres pa yi chos bco brgyad// sangs rgyas chos su grags pa ste// de rnams sgom pa dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster byed// bsam gtan bzhi po thob nas ni// gzugs
212a5(rgyud 'bum): med pa yi rtag par yang / / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug ldan pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa po// byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun// chos ni mchog tu rmad byung ba// de rnams sgom pa
212a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pas/ / byang chub sems dpa'i skyob pa'o// sngags rnams thams cad rab 'grub cing // sbyor ba thams cad thams cad du'o// de nas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas chos nyid
212a7(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i las// ye shes rin chen rab snyed dka'// mchod dang dbang bskur byin brlabs pas// rnyed 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no// zhu zhing
212b1(rgyud 'bum): gsol ba gdab pa dang / / bdag nyid dbus pa de bzhin no// sangs rgyas sogs la yi rang bzhin// de bzhin yongs su bsngo ba dang // byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed// khyad par du ni dus kun tu'o//
212b2(rgyud 'bum): thog ma bar nang phye ra red du// ji lta bzhin du rjes bsgoms pas// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgrub bya ste// 'di la the tsom yod ma yin// 'gro ba sems kyi spro ba ni// brtan pa'i snying po legs par bshad// stong
212b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid de bzhin nyid las byung / / rdo rje sems dpa' de bshad do// 'gro ba thams cad bkug nas su// sangs rgyas byang chub sbyar bar bya// don yod ye shes dag pa ste// rdo rje rgyal po mchog ces bshad//
212b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje chags pas chags gyur na// rang bzhin gyis ni brtan par 'gyur// 'gro ba ma lus lus med pa// de yi sems ni chags par bshad// chos rnams kun ni rang bzhin gyis// rnam par dben zhing
212b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis su med/ / gang tshe dag pa'i bdag nyid mthong // de tshe rdo rje legs par bshad// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po yis// ming dang brda ni sbyar ba'o// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//
212b6(rgyud 'bum): sdom pa mdog tu dam pa'o// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par byas pa ste// sa dang pha rol phyin mchog gtso// rdo rje dbang bskur las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs
212b7(rgyud 'bum): kun ye shes te/ / rnyog pa med cing yi ge med// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid mchog/ brtan pa rtag pa nyid du 'gyur// nam mkha'i mdzod ni mdzod chen po// chos rnams thams cad legs gnas pa/
213a1(rgyud 'bum): yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje che// rdo rje chog ni bla na med// ye shes snang ba rin chen che// yongs su skye ba yongs su blta// de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ni// rdo rje bzhad pa zhes su
213a2(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / chos kyi bdag med las byung ba// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ chos nyid dam pa bsam du med// rdo rje chos zhes rab tu grags// rdo rje blo gros snang ba che// shes rab ye shes
213a3(rgyud 'bum): dri med mchog/ zag med shes rab chen po pa// de ni rdo rje rnon por bshad// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos 'khor lo// gnyis su med las byung bar mtshon// yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel ming //
213a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rgyu zhes nges par bshad// dgongs pa'i skad ni spros pa'i mchog/ yul rnams kyis ni bshad pa de// sangs rgyas kun gyi bzlas pa che// de ni rdo rje smra bar bshad// sems can kun
213a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi don la sbyar/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che// gdod nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor che// de ni rdo rje las su bshad// bla na med pa'i byams pa che// bsrung ba'i bya ba gong ma med// dga'
213a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i chos ni brtson chen po/ / rdo rje srung ba zhes su grags// shes rab thabs kyi khro ba che// sangs rgyas kun dang rjes 'thun pa// nyon mongs thams cad ze ba che// de ni gnod sbyin chen por
213a7(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / lus ngag yid ni yang dag sbyor// sgrib pa med cing yi ge bral// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang // de ni rdo rje mtshams sbyor bshad// rdo rje ye shes rnal 'byor che//
213b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs po che// thog ma tha ma med zhig/ rig pa mchog ces bya bar bshad// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i glus/
213b2(rgyud 'bum): / debazhin gshegs pa thams cad legs par mchod nas glur blangs pa/ oM sarba bud+d+ha pa ra me shwa ra bu d+d+ha shud+d+ha/ la li ho su b+ha ga su ra ta ma hA ma hA A d+hi ma hA bo d+hi bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ yo gI shwa ra ta thA ga tA d+hU bi twA ta ma ka ta
213b3(rgyud 'bum): thA ga ta/ byang chub sems bskyed las 'khrungs pa// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa'i chos// gdod nas zhi ba la phyag 'tshal// byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa po// rdo rje
213b4(rgyud 'bum): can kun la phyag 'tshal/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje che// sangs rgyas byang chub la phyag 'tshal// mi dmigs go 'phang la gnas pa// mtha' las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal// 'dren pa rnams kyi stobs
213b5(rgyud 'bum): po che/ / hUM gi yi ge ma lus pa// thams cad mkhyen pa mtha' dag dang // shin tu yongs su mya ngan 'da'// 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon bzang po// rdo rje ye shes dri ma med// rnam par dag par rdo rje
213b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ dngos grub thams cad rab gsol byed// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyi mchog/ dus gsum bsam pa dbang gyur pa// sems can rnams la phan don du// khyab pa khyod la phyag 'tshal
213b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dud/ / rdo rje snying po rgyan las/ dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur nas de bzhin
214a1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje'i snying po'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya'i don zhu ba zhus pa/
214a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje snying po zhes grags pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par mdzes//
214a3(rgyud 'bum): sgo khyud rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan dang // phyag rgya dang ni rab tu mdzes// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// 'khor lo gnyis ni rab tu gnas// rtsibs brgyad pa dang bcu drug rtsibs// rnam par dbye
214a4(rgyud 'bum): ba legs par brtag/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor nang gi ni// lte ba'i gnas su legs brtag pa// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// ge sar gtams pas rab tu mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dbus/
214a5(rgyud 'bum): su ni// khyab bdag rnal 'byor dbang phyug che// rnam par snang mdzad brtson chen po// sems can rnams kyi rjes brtse bas// de yi nye 'khor kun tu ni// de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad
214a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams dgod/ / shar du dgod bya 'khor lo can// gtsug tor dkar po nub tu ste// gzi brjid phung po lho ru'o// rnam par rgyal ba byung du gnas// dbang ldan rnam par gsal bar
214a7(rgyud 'bum): bri/ / mer ni spang du dgod par bya// steng 'gro chen po bden bral du// rlung du rgyal po chen po gnas// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa yi// rnal 'byor ldan pa 'di dag bri// mi
214b1(rgyud 'bum): bskyod pa ni shar du dgod/ / lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan no// nub tu 'od dpag med par 'gyur// byang du don yod grub pa'i ming // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa'o// dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsam
214b2(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bri// thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas// 'khor rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la'o// 'phreng ba rnam par dgod bya ba// rang gi phyag rgya 'od zer
214b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bar/ / rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i// lha mo 'bad pas dgod par bya// rdo rje bdug pa la sogs bri// de bzhin gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa// sgo srungs 'bad pas
214b4(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya/ / phyi yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// kun tu bzang sogs rim bzhin bri// rang gi phyag rgya'i 'khor rnams drang // pho nya yi ni 'khor dag dang // khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang // de bzhin
214b5(rgyud 'bum): pho nya pho nya ma/ / rgya mtsho yi ni dkyil 'khor ni// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba'o// phyi ru phyi rol rdo yang ming // dkyil 'khor la ni 'bad pas bri// dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas su//
214b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po bri// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen min// dbang po la sogs lha thams cad// ma mo kun dang srin mo rnams// rgyal chen rnams dang klu dang bcas// de bzhin lha rnams
214b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / / brtson 'grus chen po nam mkha' lding // 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas su// khyad par du ni mchod par bya// me tog bdug spos rol mo dang // de bzhin
215a1(rgyud 'bum): bza' dang sngon mo sogs/ / 'phreng ba'i rgyan ni sna tshogs kyis// de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod par bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi cho ga yis// mchod pa kun gyis thams cad
215a2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / 'khor lo kun gyi cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// de nas slob ma thams cad gzhug/ yongs su dag pa khyad par du// byang chub sems ni bskyed nas su// byang
215a3(rgyud 'bum): chub bslab pa rjes spyod pa/ / cho ga shes pa'i sngags pas gzhug/ 'dren pa rnams la mchog tu gzhug/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur sbyor ba yis// dbang bskur ba ni de nas sbyin// seng ge'i khri
215a4(rgyud 'bum): yi steng du ni/ / dar dang me tog chun pos spras// dkar po'i gdug dang rin chen che// bla re rgya che 'bar ba dang // de yi g.yas kyi drung du ni// mkhas pa yis ni gzhag par bya// ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs
215a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / sna tshogs ras las yang dag sprul// g.yon gyi drung du thams cad nas// 'bad pa yis ni gzhag par bya// rin chen sman kun gyis gang ba'i// bum pa legs par gzhag bya ste// rdo rje chu sogs
215a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur gyis/ / de la rang gis dbang bskur bya// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba// mkhas pa yis ni slar yang bya// kun gyis cod pan dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya// chos kyi cod pan
215a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur dang / / sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa ni// sna tshogs las kyi dbang bskur sbyin// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam mtshungs pa'o// chos kyi sku yi dbang bskur ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi sgron ma'i sbyin//
215b1(rgyud 'bum): de ltar slob ma dbang bskur ba// khyad par du ni sngags pas byas// de la dam tshig cho ga yis// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyin par bya// slob dpon brnyas par mi bya zhing // sgrub po kun la smad mi bya// sngags
215b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi spyod pa thams cad la/ / 'da' bar mi bya smad mi bya// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang // grub mtha'i rigs pa thams cad la// smad par mi bya blang mi bya// de la mngon par dga' ba spangs//
215b3(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs shing // de bzhin bsod nams thams cad bsdu// bza' dang sngon mo du ma la// bza' bar mi bya smad mi bya// 'dod pas bcom ldan sems dpa' ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi
215b4(rgyud 'bum): sras bdag skyes/ / thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad chags las 'khrungs// de bzhin zhe sdang rmongs las 'khrungs// mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kun
215b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / dbu ma'i gnas la gnas nas su// de nyid dam tshig shes nas su// sangs rgyas byang chub yongs mi spong // lus can kun la 'tshe mi bya// khyod kyis ser sna mi bya ste// phrag dog bya bar mi bya'o//
215b6(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i chos ni spang mi bya// byang chub sems ni mchog tu bde// chang gi btung ba spang bya ste// pha rol bud med rnam par spang // thams cad mkhyen pa yongs mi dor// rtag tu srog chags gsung mi
215b7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / sems can rnams la snying rje dang // byams pa yang ni rnam par bsgom// sems can rnams la phan pa ni// yang dang yang du yongs su bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes skyob pa// dam tshig 'di
216a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid 'di dag ni/ / slob ma rnams la rjes brtse bas// mkhas pa yis ni bstan par bya// de nas phyag rgya rjes bcings pa// go rims bzhin du bstan par bya// phyag rgya 'di dag khyad par
216a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi/ / mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya// me tog zum pa'i tshul bzhin du// thal mo legs par bsdam par bya// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// pad+ma'i thal mo zhes su bsgrags// sems dpa'
216a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog ni legs brkyang ba/ / pad+ma'i phyag rgya zhes su brjod// re re'i mtshams su nges bcings pa// de ni rdo rje thal mor btags// sor mo thams cad nges bsdams pa// rdo rje bsdams pas legs bcings pa//
216a4(rgyud 'bum): sor mo brkyang ste steng du bstan// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// khu tshur nang du byas nas ni// gnyis ka sbyar bas yongs su brtag/ 'khor lo sgyur sogs phyag rgya'o// dam pa sbyin pa yin/
216a5(rgyud 'bum): par bshad// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi// dam tshig phyag rgya 'di yin no// ming ming nang bcug khu tshur gyis// kun gyis gtso mor yongs su brtag/ rdo rje'i rnam par legs par sbyar/
216a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje chen po zhes su bsgrags// mthe'u chung sprin lag khu tshur las// gung mo legs par brkyang nas su// mdzub mos mthe bong yongs su sbyar// 'khor los sgyur ba nyid gsol byed// brkyang
216a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rtse mo sbyar ba ni/ / gdugs dkar zhes ni rab tu grags// srin lag dang ni mthe bong sbyar// gung mo gnyis ni brtag par bya// gzi brjid 'phreng ba phyag rgya che// gzi brjid 'phreng ba nyid gsol
216b1(rgyud 'bum): sa / zhu sa nags/ ts+tsha ma wA/ na sa // ma ma /
216b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyu ba dka' sangs rgyas thams ca byis// steng du 'phyo ba zhes smra bshad// rdo rje bsnams pa yongs su m+b+har// dus cig kun rje 'thung gnas te// yu ma kyimamachog tu gyur// mthe'u chung da na
216b3(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong brkyang / / lcags kyu mnga' yi sbyor ba yis// legs so ba ni sbyar bar bya// gung mo rdo rje rin chen rtse// phye ba gzi brjid mchog gi mchog/ rgyal mtshan gnas/ su nges par sbyar// bzhad pa'i gnas su
216b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bar bya/ / rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// dbum pad+ma lba bur bskus// ral ze'i chos ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i 'khor lo 'dra// kha ru phye ba'i phyag rgya che// rdo rje smra ba nyid du 'gyur/
216b5(rgyud 'bum): las kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni// kar mtshungs rdo rje sna tshogs can// chos yongs sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje srung bar brtag par bya// mche ba gnyis ni rnam par gtsigs// rdo rje gnod sbyin zhes su bshad
216b6(rgyud 'bum): khu tshur bcangs pa khu tshur gyis/ / rdo rje thal mo snying khar gzhag/ rdo rje smrig mo zhes su grags// yongs su sbyar ba spyi bor gzhag/ rdo rje 'phreng ba zhes su brjod// khal mo sbyar ba gdong du dkrol/
216b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo gru par rjes su bsgrags// brtsed cing bdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// de ni rdo rje gar mar bshad// bad+ma'i ril mo gdong du dbre// spyi bor yongs su sbyar la gzhag/ snying khor mthe thong mo nyes po
217a1(rgyud 'bum): las/ / gdong ni legs par brkyang bar bya// lag pa steng du yongs brkyang ba// gzugs kyi phyag rgya nyid du 'gyur// lag gnyis rna ba'i lam du gzhag/ sgra yi phyag rgya nyid
217a2(rgyud 'bum): du bshad/ / dri ni byug pa'i sbyor ba yis// dri yi phyag rgya zhes su bshad// gdong du snyim pa phye ba ni// ro yi phyag rgya zhes su bsgrags// mkha' la myur ba'i sbyor ba yis// reg pa reg pa zhes su
217a3(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / mthe'u chung gnyis ni yongs su sbyar// mdzub mo lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las// de nyid zhags pa'i dbyibs dang ni// lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par brtag/ bzhi pa rdo rje dril bu zhes// rdo rje 'bebs par rnam
217a4(rgyud 'bum): par brtag/ phyag rgya kun dang nye ba'i rgya// blo gros ldan pa rang gis brtag/ thal mo yongs su sbyar la bsdams// mdzub mo gnyis po bskums nas ni// rin po che yi rnam par bcing // kun tu bzang po
217a5(rgyud 'bum): blo ldan gyis/ / de las rtse mo rtse mo bskum// sems kyis byams pa bsgoms nas su// mdzub mo sbyar la bcug nas ni// ral gri'i rnam pa brtag pa ste// 'di ni nam mkha'i snying po yi// phyag rgyar
217a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags/ / de nas ral gri'i mtshon cha yi// rnam pa ru ni nyer gnas pa// phyag rgya 'di ni rnam 'gog pa// thams cad kyis ni yongs su brjod// gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yi//
217a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje thal mo rab tu brkyang // pad+ma lha bur rnam par brtag/ pad+ma'i lag pa blo ldan gyis// de nyid me tog zum tshul dang // ut+pal rnam pa ltar mdzes pa// 'di ni pad+ma sgrol ba'i rgya// pad+ma'i mgon
217b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes su grags/ / mche ba gtsigs pa dang ldan pa'i// kha dang 'dra bar legs par brtag/ 'di ni rta mgrin phyag rgya ste// kha yi phyogs su rab tu brtag/ pad+ma'i thal mo dpral ba yin// khro gnyer du ni nye
217b2(rgyud 'bum): bar sbyar/ / rdo rje thal mo 'bebs pa che// dpal gyi snying po rin chen ldan// yid bzhin nor bu'i rnam pa zung // thal mo legs par rab tu brkyang // mi zad blo gros phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas kun
217b3(rgyud 'bum): / kyigyis rab tu brtag/ gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rin chen rdo rje snying khar gzhag/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya ste// nam mkha'i mdzod nyid ster bar byed// rdo rje chen po legs par brkyang // mthe'u
217b4(rgyud 'bum): chung mthe bong nges par bcing / / lag pa gnyis ni nges par brtag/ blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyar 'gyur// rdo rje thal mo steng du bsgreng // mdzub mo gnyis po sbyar bar bya// 'di ni rdo rje snying po'i rgya//
217b5(rgyud 'bum): rdorje snying pos bka' stsal to// khru tshur nang du byas nas su// mdzub mo gnyis po rtse mo sbyar// 'di ni 'jam dpal phyag rgya ste// rdo rje ral gri zhes su brtag/ de nyid sha ti'i rnam pa ni// 'jam
217b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan gyi'o/ / gshin rje mthar byed mdung rtser 'gyur// mdung rtse chen por rab tu brtag/ mdzub mo bskum par byas nas ni// gung mo'i steng du yongs su gzhag/ zhags pa'i rnam
217b7(rgyud 'bum): pa rab ldan pa'i/ / gshin rje yang ni 'jigs par byed// de nyid ral grir byas pa ni// skra can gyi ru rab tu bshad// khu tshur thams cad nges bcings te// mdzub mo gcig ni bskum par bya// 'di
218a1(rgyud 'bum): ni nye ba'i skra can rgyar/ / 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal to// rdo rje bsdams pa steng bcings te// dbu ma gnyis ni rnam par spangs// mdzub mo rdo rje'i rnam par
218a2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ mthe'u chung dang ni mthe bong brkyang // 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i// phyag rgya don kun sgrub byed yin// mdzub mo mthe bong bsdams pa ni// mA ma kI ni yongs su bshad// mdzub mo
218a3(rgyud 'bum): lcags sgrog rnam pa mas/ / gung mo'i dbu ma rdo rjer bya// 'di ni rdo rje lcags sgrog rgya// rdo rje lta bur yongs su bshad// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// khro bo gzegs mar rnam par bshad//
218a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi rtse mo rtse gcig bya// rdo rje rtse mo nyid kyir bshad// lag na rin chen phyag rgya ni// lag gnyis legs par brkyang bar bya// sor mo pad+ma'i dbyibs su bya// skul byed lha mor yongs
218a5(rgyud 'bum): su bshad/ / thal mo yongs su sbyar ba las// mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong dag/ mig gi tshul du sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas spyan gyir rnam par bshad// bkra shis kyi ni skyil krung bca'
218a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam 'byor rig pas lung srang ste/ / lag gnyis lhung bzed 'dzin 'dra ba// bsam gtan phyag rgyar rab tu bshad// 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad rgyu// sangs rgyas kun gyi don mdzad pa'i// mi
218a7(rgyud 'bum): bskyod ba yi sa la reg/ rin chen tog gi mchod sbyin bshad// bsam gtan phyag rgya 'od dpag med// ngo bo nyid kyi don rtogs byed// don yod gzigs pa'i phyag rgya ni// mi 'jigs pa ni med pa
218b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin/ blo ldan rnal 'byor skyil krung gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ mnyam par bzhag pas phyag rgya kun// 'ching ba 'am ni 'ching du gzhug/ 'jig rten pa yi phyag rgya la//
218b2(rgyud 'bum): lelog pa gcig ni rab brkyang ste// dbang ldan gyi ni rtse gsum pa// mthe bong mthe'u chung mnan par bya// lha yi dbang po'i rdo rjer 'gyur// lag pa g.yas pas bteg par bya// mi yi oM yig lag
218b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dag/ mthe bong gung mo nyid la gzhag/ gshin rje'i rdo rje dbyug pa ste// mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong sbyar// de nyid khyab 'jug 'khor lo ste// 'khor lo'i yi ge dgod par bya// lag pa gcig
218b4(rgyud 'bum): gis thod pa ni/ / ma mo rnams kyir yang dag bshad// sor mo gnyis bsgreng ral gri ni// srin po'i bdag nyid chen po'i'o// mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar ba ni// chu lha'i zhags pa nyid du bshad//
218b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo dang ni gung mo dag/ rgyal mtshan lta bur legs par brkyang // rlung lha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya ni// lag pa gnyis kyis rab tu brtag/ dbu ma gcig pu legs brkyang ba// dbyug
218b6(rgyud 'bum): to'i phyag rgyar rab tu bshad/ / gnod sbyin kun gyi dbang phyug ni// lus ngan bdag nyid chen po'o// mchod phyir thogs kyi phyag rgya ni// tshangs pa yi ni legs par bshad// drag po'i gsam shing
218b7(rgyud 'bum): shes bya ste/ / lha mo'i paTi s+ya ru brjod// tshogs bdag gi ni sna ru bshad// zla ba'i bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor ro// nyi ma'i 'od zer stong phrag ni// lag pa gnyis kyis bstan par bya// 'od kyi dkyil
219a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor sbyor ba yis/ / dbang po'i rdo rje mtshon cha ltar// 'di ni lha rnams kun gyi rgya// dpa' bo kun gyi rab tu gnas// dri za rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// glu len lta bur rab tu
219a2(rgyud 'bum): bsgrags/ / dga' byed dbang phyug phyag rgya che// rdza rnga'i sgra dbyangs rab tu 'bar// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod phyir// don chen pos ni rab tu brtags// ting ting cag 'dzin sbyor ba yis//
219a3(rgyud 'bum): dri za rnams kyir rab tu bsgrags// pi wang bsgreng pa'i sbyor ba yis// dbyangs can gyir ni rnam par bshad// rtag tu dun du b+hi sgrog pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyir brjod// lag gnyis
219a4(rgyud 'bum): gdengs ka'i tshul byas pa/ / klu rnams kyir ni legs par bshad// gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'gyeng dang 'dud pa'i de bzhin no// lag pa zhags pa nges bcings pa// de ni phyag rgyar rab tu
219a5(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / 'di rnams dam tshig phyag rgya ru// de bzhin gshegs rnams legs par gsungs// las kyi sbyor ba 'ab ba yis// 'di rnams kyang ni phyag rgyar bshad// phyag rgya dor nas sems kyi ni//
219a6(rgyud 'bum): rin chen yang du yang du bsam// rnam par rtog med gdod nas zhi// chos dbyings mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa// stong pa mkha' 'drar shes nas su// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya//
219a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag thams cad ma skyes shing // rmi lam lta bur rab tu garas// dri za'i grong khyer lta bur snang // 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten yang dang yang // mig 'phrul lta bur shin tu ni// 'gro ba thams
219b1(rgyud 'bum): cad rab tu gsal/ / mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa ru// srid pa thams cad mdor bsdus pa// bdag med pa zhes mthong nas ni// sangs rgyas kun dang dpa' bo yis// sgyu ma smig rgyu
219b2(rgyud 'bum): brag cha dang / / lbu ba chu yi chu bur dang // gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jig rten na// de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgongs// thams cad mgal mo'i 'khor lo ltar// zo chun khyud mo ji bzhin du//
219b3(rgyud 'bum): gar gyi gnas kyi tshul 'dra ba// zla ba gnyis dang mtshungs par blta// rtag tu glog gi 'phreng ba 'dra// sbrang bu'i sgra dang mtshungs par bshad// 'khor ba shin tu brlang ba ste// rgod ma'i kha dang 'dra
219b4(rgyud 'bum): bar gnas/ / 'di ltar shes shing rtogs nas ni// sgom pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin gyis// sems ni legs sgrub rnal 'byor pa// de la phyag rgya rab tu bshad// stong pa mtshan ma med pa dang //
219b5(rgyud 'bum): smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin las// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni// dam tshig gsum ni brtags pa'o// phyag rgya sngags dang lha nyid dang // de nyid gsum ni rab tu gnas/ bdag nyid sbyor ba'i rnal
219b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor gyis/ / mtshan nyid gcig tu rnam par gnas// de 'di dam pa'i phyag rgya ru// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' stsal to// phyag rgya yi ge bral ba ste// rnam pa med cing snang ba ste// dngos po med
219b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshogs rnams la/ / dngos po'i de nyid nyid du bshad// dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin yin// dngos med nyid kyang dngos po yin// dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol// rnal 'byor ye shes mchog
220a1(rgyud 'bum): tu bde/ / rtog ge med cing snang ba med// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge med// sbyong pa nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i sems// gang tshe de ltar nyid 'gyur ba// de tshe phyag rgya rnams dang sngags//
220a2(rgyud 'bum): lnga nyid du yang rab tu brtag/ sngags las phyag rgya ma mthong zhing // phyag rgya las kyang sngags min zhing // rang nyid lha yi rnal 'byor ni// gnyis med sngags dang phyag rgyar brtags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
220a3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ de
220a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba chen po rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po ma gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan
220a5(rgyud 'bum): 'das shAkya thub pa de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/ 'og min gyi gnas nas byon te dga' ldan gyi gnas su bzhugs nas/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la chos bstan nas zas
220a6(rgyud 'bum): gtsang gi rigs la mngon par gzigs te/ mngon par byung bar mdzad nas byang chub kyi snying po dag la nye bar gnas nas nye bar 'khod do// bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal bar bstan nas byang chub kyi snying po
220a7(rgyud 'bum): la bzhugs par gyur te/ bzhugs nas kyang kun nas 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin sngon du 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin
220b1(rgyud 'bum): / gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje se gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa mA dza A kaR+Sha ya sarba ta thA ga tAn hUM/ de
220b2(rgyud 'bum): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rnams legs par byon te/ chos kyi dbyingasu spos nas phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab pa'i
220b3(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams bkang ste/ nam mkha'i khams na gnas pa thams cad til gyi gang bu ltar 'dzam bu'i gling du 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bkug
220b4(rgyud 'bum): cing bcug ste bcings nas dbang du mdzad de/ de nyid kyi thugs kar rab tu bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas byin gyis
220b5(rgyud 'bum): brlabs te/ sngags 'dis rang gi sems so sor rtogs par mdzad do// oM tsat+ti pra ti bi d+haM ka ro mi/ de'i rjes thogs nyid la sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs
220b6(rgyud 'bum): kar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku las chos sku rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba sems rin po che nges par 'byung ste spros par mdzad do// de nyid sems 'od gsal ba/ thugs rje chen pos khyab
220b7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnyog pa spangs pa/ nam mkha' ltar gdod nas zhi ba de las thugs rje chen po la mngon par phyogs par byas nas/
221a1(rgyud 'bum): sems can gyi khams thams cad la rnam par gzigs te/ mi shes pas rga ba dang 'chi bas rnam par khyab par 'jig rten la gzigs nas/ slar yang sngags 'dis byang chub kyi sems
221a2(rgyud 'bum): nye bar bskyed pa bstan pa/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ud pA da yA mi/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa de'i thugs kar sems 'od gsal ba de yongs su
221a3(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs po'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar rnam par gzhag go/ legs par rnam par dag pa'i nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa
221a4(rgyud 'bum): spros pa thams cad spangs pa/ me long lta bur bstan par byas nas gnas te byang chub kyi sems chen po la sngags 'di brjod do// oM dz+nyA na rasmi bi sri dzaHhUM/ de'i rjes thogs nyid la 'od zer rngam pa
221a5(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las rnam par phyung ngo / / de phyung nas kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du zhugs te/ shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gsal bar byas nas sems can thams cad
221a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi sems kyi ri bo'i rtse mo bsnyil te rab tu rtogs par byas nas gcig tu 'dres te/ rdo rje'i sku chen po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar rjes su zhugs nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
221a7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu gnas so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos sngags 'di byin gyis bslabs so// oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra pa rad b+hU ya pany+tsa mu d+ha/ slar yang sngags 'dis spros pa/
221b1(rgyud 'bum): oM swa ra badz+ra/ slar yang sngags 'dis bsdus so// oM saM ha ra badz+ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ye shes rdo rje'i snying po 'di ched du brjod pa/ oM dz+nyA na badz+ra/ de nas bcom ldan
221b2(rgyud 'bum): 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badz+ra hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs mnyam
221b3(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid mnyes pas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa/ oM badz+ra At+ma kohaM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan pa nyid du nye bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
221b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gzigs nas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par mdzad do// oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga tA sta thA a ha mi pa/ de nas bcom ldan
221b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i rgyu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku bdag nyid seman gyi khams thams cad du nges par bstan to/ / de nas brgya byin dang /
221b6(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mthong nas/ lha dang mi rnams kyis mngon par byang chub pas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa zhes sgra bsgrags so// de nas tshangs pas gsol
221b7(rgyud 'bum): ba btab ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor nas de dang des 'dul ba'i skye bo btul te gang gis slar ldog pa med pa nyid du gyur to// 'di rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sgom pa'i rim pa'o//
222a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bstan te/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa nye bar
222a2(rgyud 'bum): bsgrubs nas de thugs ka las rdo rje phyung ste nyid kyi phyag tu gzhag par gyur to/ / de nas 'od zer rnam par phyung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas slar log ste/
222a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur byin gyis brlabs te/ mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rgyan thams cad kyis
222a4(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa/ dar dang 'phreng bas dbang bskur ba/ zla ba'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer can du byin gyis brlabs te rnam par gnas so// de nas thugs ka nas phyung nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te/ de
222a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga dang / rgyab dang / drung du rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje chos dang // rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje las la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'phreng ba rnam par
222a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas so/ / de bzhin du sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams dang / bdug pa la sogs pa khyad par du nges par bskyed cing gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang / lcags kyu la sogs pa'i lha rnams bskyed de/ 'di
222a7(rgyud 'bum): ngag gi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rdo rje snying po zhes su gsungs// gru bzhi po la sgo bzhi
222b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dar dang me tog 'phreng bas brgyan/ / sgo logs dang ni rig byed dang // rta babs kyis ni so sor spras// de yi dbus su khri chen po// kun nas yongs su gru bzhi pa// de yi steng du pad chen po// ge
222b2(rgyud 'bum): sar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa/ / de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kyi ni drung kun tu// sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi nye 'khor
222b3(rgyud 'bum): du'akhor lo sgyur ba la sogs bri/ / phyi yi gnas ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas sras po rnam par dgod// kha dog ser po gzi brjid che// dbang chen dkyil 'khor rab 'bar ba// thams
222b4(rgyud 'bum): cad rnam pa sna tshogs rgyun/ / brgyan pa de dag dgod par bya// rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las// dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
222b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad kyis slar yang rgya'i lha'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog 'gyur ba// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bas na// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes
222b6(rgyud 'bum): su brjod/ / de yi phyi rol gnyis pa la// zlum po ru ni rtogs par bya// ri mo rnam pa sna tshogs pas// sgro dang sgro logs brtag par bya// rta babs rnam pa sna tshogs pa// ngar dang me tog 'phreng bas
222b7(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / de yi dbus su pad chen pos// ga~M sar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa// 'dab ma brgyad kyi ka ba la// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// rgyal ba thams cad dkar/
223a1(rgyud 'bum): kho mchog/ kha ba pa no ltar dkar gsal// shel dang zla ba lta bu 'ong // kun da zla ba ltar dkar bsam// zla ba'i dkyil lakhor dbus son par// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// sangs rgyas
223a2(rgyud 'bum): sras po rnam par dgod/ / thams cad zla ba ltar dkar zhing // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// mtshon cha sna tshogs zla ba 'dra// zla ba 'bar mtshungs mnyam med pa// chu yi ming zhes bya ba yi//
223a3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dam pa nyid du 'dod// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ chu'i lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos me
223a4(rgyud 'bum): lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rdo rje ye shes gzi brjid mtshungs// rdo rje gzi brjid ces su brjod// gru
223a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum rnam pa nyid du bya/ / shing rta'i rnam pa dang mtshungs shing // rabar ba'i 'phreng 'khrugs 'jigs pa'o// kha dog dmar po stobs po che// 'jig pa'i dus kyi me 'dra ba// rtag tu pad+ma rA ga mtshungs//
223a6(rgyud 'bum): de yi dbus su gzi brjid che// nyi ma'i kha dog stobs po che// rdo rje rtse gsum sna tshogs pa// shing rta'i snying khar gzhag par bya// bal po se'u'i me tog mtshungs// ya ba'i me tog dag dang 'dra// pad+ma
223a7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma rA ga mtshungs/ / sangs rgyas dpa' bo yang dga' bar// bzang po mtsham dang mtshungs 'dra ba// rgya skyegs bcud dang 'dra bar gnas// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// de bzhin sangs rgyas
223b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas sras/ / khro bo dang ni mngag pa dag/ mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// de dag thams cad kha dog dmar// gzi brjid khams la 'od ldan pa// 'od zer dmar po rab 'phro ba// nyi ma'i
223b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dbus son par/ / thams cad dmar po'i mtshon cha can// dmar po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// dmar po'i gos kyis bkab pa'i lus// 'phreng ba dmar po mchog 'dzin pa// 'di
223b3(rgyud 'bum): ni gzi brjid gter zhes bya/ / dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba'o// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ me lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan
223b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dge bshad bya ba/ dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rlung gi khams dang 'dra bas na// rlung gi dkyil
223b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor zhes su bshad/ / zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa 'dra// dbyar gyi sprin gyi 'od dang mtshungs// a ta si yi me tog 'dra// in+d+ra nI la'i 'od dang mtshungs// de yi dbus su pad chen po// bai DUR+Ya yi 'od
223b6(rgyud 'bum): dang 'dra/ / shin tu gnag pa'i mig sman mtshungs// sngon dmar gyi ni rnam par gnas// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dpa' bo rab 'bar ba// rgyal po 'khyil pa 'bar ba'i gzi// mtshan
223b7(rgyud 'bum): mo nag mo lha bur gnas/ / ut+pal sngon po 'dab ma'i tshul// stong pa nam mkha' lta bur gnas// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras rnams bri// khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang/
224a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin po nya pho nya mo// thams cad sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// de bzhin dag po'i gos gyon pa// ba dang rnam pa sna tshogs bsdams// kha dog nag po thams cad
224a2(rgyud 'bum): du/ gdugs ni rnam pa du ma'i dbyibs// kha dog sna tshogs migs 'bar ba// bla re rgyas pa mnyam pa ni// kha dog nag po sna tshogs pa// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// mdor
224a3(rgyud 'bum): bsdus nas ni bsgom par bya/ / dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'di lta bu// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa// bris nas shes rab can gyis bsgom// gal te dngos grub rang 'dod na// rdo rje snying po
224a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ / rlung lnga'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis slar yang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal
224a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan
224a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/ sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga mchog tu gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa/ sgeg mo sogs
224a7(rgyud 'bum): pas mchod pa kun/ / yang dag mdor bsdus byas nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen por// bdag gis rtag tu bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yi ge yang dag ldan// 'dod pa ster ba'i skur bya//
224b1(rgyud 'bum): sgra dang gzugs dang de bzhin sbyor// yi ge'i 'phreng ba de bzhin te// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sngags pas thams cad rnam par bsam// hUM sngags pas snying khar
224b2(rgyud 'bum): son par sgom/ / gsang sngags dge ba brjod nas su// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa// dung gi sgra ru rab tu brjod// dril bu'i sgra ni rab gsal ba// pad+mo rnal 'byor dbang
224b3(rgyud 'bum): phyug go/ dus min sprin gyi hUM gi sgra// tsa Ta tsa Ta'i sgra 'phro ba// rdo rje rin chen dbang phyug gi/ sgra ru de bzhin gshegs rnams gsung // nor bu mas kyi rigs kyi yang // rnga chen sgra ru rab//
224b4(rgyud 'bum): tu bshad// pi wang gling bu de bzhin glu// gar gyi rgyan gyi sgra dang ni// rdza rnga'i ngar sgra hUM gi sgra// spyi yi nyid du rab tu bshad// rtog pa kun las rnam par sbyar// sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las rnams
224b5(rgyud 'bum): dang de nas gzugs kyi bzlas pa mchog/ go rims ji bzhin rab tu bshad// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // lha rnams dbang du bya ba ste// de la rang gi tshul rab sbyar// sngags dang
224b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya rab tu sbyar/ / de rjes rnam pa kun gyi mchog/ rtag tu lus chen bsam bya bsam// lha yi sku gzugs bsgom par bya// lag pa'i phyag rgya rab nges pa'i// phyag rgya'ang snying khor son shes bya//
224b7(rgyud 'bum): rang gi rigs rimachog yis// de yi lus ni 'od gsal zhing // sgron ma'i nod ltar gsal ba'i khyim// de ltar kun nas thams cad du// kun nas ba spu'i rtse dag nas// 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'phreng dge
225a1(rgyud 'bum): bas/ gzugs kyi bzlas pa zhes su bshad// de nas sbyor ba'i bzlas pa yis// gsang sngags sgrub pa brtsam par bya// mchod dang byin brlabs dbang bskur mchog/
225a2(rgyud 'bum): spro la sogs rim thams cad du// sbyor ba'i bzlas pa gtso bo 'di// 'bad pa yis ni rab tu bshad// snying kha mgrin pa mchu lce min// dkan dang spyi bo nyid ma yin// nang min phyi dang gnyis
225a3(rgyud 'bum): par min/ / chos ni 'ba' zhig kho na la// bzlas pa'i sgra yang 'byung ma yin// 'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor che// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba// sgom pa'i sngags pa de nyid ni// rnal 'byor pa
225a4(rgyud 'bum): yi gnas su bshad/ / de nas rjes su mdor bsdus te// snying khar dkyil 'khor rab zlum pa// zla ba gang ba lhar bsam bya// dri ma med cing legs par gnas// de la yi ge rnam par dgod//
225a5(rgyud 'bum): tshig gi 'phreng ba ma chad pa// mu tig 'phreng ba ltar brgyud pa// char sprin gyi ni me 'dra'i 'od// de tshe thams cad gsam par byed// lha yi lus ni snang byed cing // ji lta ji lta yi ge'i 'phreng /
225a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi lus la rab 'jug pa// de lta de ltar sngags kyi lus// lha yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur// mthu stobs lha dbang thams cad ni// tshangs pa khyab 'jug las chen lhag/ bzlas pa'i de nyid
225a7(rgyud 'bum): mchog 'di ni/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'o// ji ltar sems ni sgom pa yi// de ltar dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje'i snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ bzlas pa'i de kho na nyid kyi
225b1(rgyud 'bum): le'u'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa rin po che bka' stsal pa/ mnyam med mi g.yo
225b2(rgyud 'bum): mnyam med mchog gi chos nyid can/ / thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam med
225b3(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i mchog chos can/ / yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de// dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin// dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams// sems
225b4(rgyud 'bum): can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol/ / rtag tu dri ma med pa thugs rje'i shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don grub rab
225b5(rgyud 'bum): tu brtson pa mthan yas pa/ / thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa go 'phang dam pa bsnyes gyur kyang // kham
225b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi/ / thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yong mi 'gyur// e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin rnams kyi
225b7(rgyud 'bum): nang na go 'phang mchog bsnyes pa/ / khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pas// dam tshig mchog gsum dngos
226a1(rgyud 'bum): grub dam pa dag la gsol/ / 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang dag yon tan rgyas pa ste// lan cig tsam zhig brjod pas kyang // gsang sngags thams cad 'grub
226a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// de bzhin gshegs de kun bstod na// rab yangs dngos grub stsol gyur te// bskal par gnas shing bskal par bskul// lus ni
226a3(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba med pa ru/ / bdag nyid brtan par byas pa yis// mgon po chen po rnam snang mdzad// mi bskyod rin chen 'byung gnas dang // rgyal ba dag pa 'od dpag med// don yod rgyal ba
226a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du/ / dngul chu bcud len de nyid dang // mchog kyang rab tu gsol bar byed// dngos grub yid 'ong ma lus pa// rgyas pa'i don dang phun sum tshogs// re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs
226a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ yid la 'dod pa ster bar byed// ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs// mchog tu dge ba gsol bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs
226a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal pa/ chos grangs
226a7(rgyud 'bum): med cing rgyu skar med/ / smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga med// ji ltar bshad pa tshogs bslab pa'i gnas nye bar bzung ste gang yang rung ba'i yid dga' bar ji ltar rung ba'i dkyil 'khor byas te/
226b1(rgyud 'bum): me tog sil ma bkram la bdug spos kyis bdug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la ji ltar nus pa'i me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas te/ sngags 'dis yid kyis kyang sdig
226b2(rgyud 'bum): pa bshags te/ oM sarba pA paM ta kA ya bA krit+ta ma na shud+d+ha b+hU tAM rA ga dwe Sh+wa mo ha mA na mA na biSh+pe ra Na ya da kri tri kA li kaM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ sarba pA paM s+pho Ta yA mi swA hA/ oM sarba pA paM pra ti de sha yA mi
226b3(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ / de'i rjes thogs la bdag nyid kyis dngos po dbul bar bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA nAn At+ma b+ha bA nir yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga taHpra ti grih+Nan+tu mAM swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
226b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pra N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha rA na a nu mo da yA mi swA hA/ yang dang yang du byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags kyis
226b5(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta/ b+ha dra ma hA badz+ra/ sa ma yaM/ ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta/ ut+pA da yA mi swA hA/ de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs la zla ba'i kha dog can zla ba'i
226b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa/ sa bcu'i dbang phyug nor bu rin po che chen po'i pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri'i steng du bdag nyid bsam
226b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / oM shud+d+ho haM/ sngags 'dis bdag yongs su dag par byas te/ oM sa b+hA b+ha shud+d+haHsarba ta thA ga tAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ sngags 'dis bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings yangs pa 'ong
227a1(rgyud 'bum): gsal ba'i snang bar shin tu gnas par bya ste/ oM d+har+m+ma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ 'jig rten tham
227a2(rgyud 'bum): cad las shin tu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi skur bdag nyid sngags 'dis gnas par bya ste/ oM pra b+he shwa ro haM/ de bzhin du rim pa 'dis chos kyi dbyings rgya chen por
227a3(rgyud 'bum): spros nas/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas nyid do zhes nga rgyal bskyed la/ bdag skye dgu ma lus pa'i dpung gnyen du byas la/ chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar lhan cig gnas par byas te//
227a4(rgyud 'bum): nye bar rgyas par thun mtshams bzhir bzlas pa bsam par bya ste/ yi ge la rjes su gzhol ba'i yid kyis 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas par bya zhing / nyi ma re rer stong phrag brgyad dam stong phrag ro
227a5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas te ji srid mtshan ma ma thob pa de srid du'o/ / tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gur kum la sogs pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor byas te/ nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod pa cho 'phrul gyi zla
227a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'am/ sa ga'i nya gang ba la mar gyi mar me stong phrag brgyad spar la rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas te/ sna ma'i me tog gam me tog pad+mas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mchod rten mchod de/
227a7(rgyud 'bum): ji srid 'brug gi sgra sgrog pa ma thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bdag la gsal bar 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// de nas sreg blugs 'bum phrag gcig
227b1(rgyud 'bum): dgang bar byas pas mtshan ma thams cad gsal bar 'gyur ro/ / bye ba phrag bzhi bzlas pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa chen po
227b2(rgyud 'bum): byed par 'dod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten byas la/ mchod rten re re'i mdun du stong phrag re re bzlas pa 'am/ yang na dri'i mchod rten
227b3(rgyud 'bum): gyi drung ngu 'bum lhag pa'i bye ba phrag bdun bzlas so/ / bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshad kyi mchod rten nyi ma re re la re re ji srid bye ba phrag bdun bzlas pa rdzogs pa de srid du bya'o// tha ma'i mchod
227b4(rgyud 'bum): rten 'bar ba'i 'od des sgrub pa'i lus la zhugs pas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs nas/ ji srid dag pa'i gnas kyi ris kyi dbang phyug chen po la sogs lha rnams
227b5(rgyud 'bum): me tog gi char 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ / lba dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci la sogs pa 'ongs nas kyang stong par byed cing / ji srid a
227b6(rgyud 'bum): bi tsi mnar med pa'i bar gyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad bsil bar 'gyur ro/ / yi dgas rnams kyang yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal ba rnams kyis
227b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams la gdung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par gzigs par 'gyur ro// de'i rjes la lus dang gser gyi mdog lta bu dang / lo brgyad gnyis
228a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi rnam pa can dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes thob pa dang / kha dog dang / tshe dang / stobs dang / shugs dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
228a2(rgyud 'bum): khams su rgyu ba dang / 'khor lo sbyar ba ltar che ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par bstod cing stang du 'gro ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen
228a3(rgyud 'bum): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba dang / phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rdzu 'phrul gyis
228a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis legs par mchod cing grub pa thams cad 'od kyis ltung bar 'gyur ro// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang //
228a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten skyong ba'i stan phyed ster bar 'gyur ro// gzi brjid dang / gzugs dang / dpa' bas rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i
228a6(rgyud 'bum): sa'ang so sor thob par 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad 'dul ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// phyi ma'i mthar tshe byin gyis brlab ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed par mthong bar 'gyur ro//
228a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bya ba nges par ston par 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i sprin thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byams pa dang /
228b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba ste dang por// / sgrub pa'i thabs gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs/
228b2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad mchod par byas te/ gi'u wang ngam ldong ros pad+ma'i snod du gzhag la/ ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum byung ba de srid bzlas par bya'o// sems can thams cad dbang du
228b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba dang / mi snang ba dang / rig pa thams cad 'dzin pa nyid do// rig pa 'dzin par gyur nas nyi ma stong shar ba'i kha dog dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam par sba li zhing 'khyil ba dang / gdu
228b4(rgyud 'bum): gu dang ldan zhing lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing rig pa 'dzin pa'i grub pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang / bskal pa chen po'i mthar gnas pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa
228b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ / rim pa 'dis gsum bsgrubs na dbang phyug chen por 'gyur ro// mchod phyir thog bsgrubs na tshad par 'gyur ro// 'khor los khyab 'jug tu 'gyur ro// grog mkhar gyi rtse mo'i sa bzung ste sa srungs kyi bus byA
228b6(rgyud 'bum): la de la zhon te bzlas na dbang por 'gyur ro/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor byas te de'i steng du bsdad na nyi ma dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zla ba'i ste/ 'di nyid kyis lha'i bye
228b7(rgyud 'bum): brag gang gis mtshan mar bzung ste/ des de'i longs spyod la spyod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rim pa 'dis dngul chu 'am bcud len gang bsgrubs pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal ta ma
229a1(rgyud 'bum): grub na de'i tshe sgrub pa lan bdun bya'o/ / bdun byas pas ci nas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo sgyur bas bka' stsal
229a2(rgyud 'bum): pa 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas ri bo lhun po'i tshang tsam gyi ri bo yang hUM zhes brjod pas lhung ba dang / rgya mtsho skems pa dang / ljon pa drung nas 'byin pa dang / bum pa
229a3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' la 'phen pa dang / glang po che rengs par byed pa dang / pha rol gyi sde mngon par 'joms par byed pa dang / bar snang na gnas pa thams cad ltung bar byed pa'o// sems
229a4(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad 'bebs par byed do/ / sgrub pa po las gang dang gang sgrub par 'dod pa de dang de thams cad byed do// yang na zla ba gcig tsam mi smra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
229a5(rgyud 'bum): skur bdag nyid bsgoms na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / sgyu 'phrul dra ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la gnas shing 'chag par byed do// me 'bar ba dang
229a6(rgyud 'bum): glog 'gyur ba la sogs pa ston par byed do/ / gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag kyang g.yo bar byed do// sgrub pa pos bye ba phrag bdun bzlas nas
229a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ / rim pa 'dis lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / stong g.yogs dang / khar gsil las gang yang rung ba bzung nas ji srid rig pa 'dzin par gyur pa de
229b1(rgyud 'bum): srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang / sprul pa du ma byed pa dang / 'dod na 'chi ba dang / skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro zhing de

229b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mtho'i tshad kyi mchod rten 'bum phrag gcig byas te/ rma med pa'i ril gri blangs la cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed la nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod de brgyad pa 'am/ bcu bzhi pa 'am/
229b4(rgyud 'bum): nyagang ba la skyil krung bcas te ji srid du ral gri 'bar ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o// de'i rjes thogs nyid la rnga bo che rnams kyi sgra grag go/ steng nas me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// ldan
229b5(rgyud 'bum): cig pa ji snyed pa dang bcas pa steng du 'gro'o/ / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro// ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin pa chen po'i
229b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo sgyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i chos gos dang rgyan 'chang ba 'dod dgur smra ba skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par spyod pa dang / rga shi med pa dang
