230a1(rgyud 'bum): phrag tu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang 'khor lo 'am pa Ti sa blangs te 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang dpal gyi sgor song ste/
230a2(rgyud 'bum): nim pa'i lo ma tsha ba'i mar khu la btab pa 'bum phrag gcig sreg blugs bya'o// lha ma yin gyi 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur
230a3(rgyud 'bum): ro/ gal te ma grub na 'bum phrag gnyis sam/ gsum du sreg blugs bya'o// lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad bsregs bzhin du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// 'ongs nas kyang sgrub pa po la zhu
230a4(rgyud 'bum): bar byed de/ kye skyes bu dpa' bo 'jug tu gsol zhes smra'o// de nas grogs dang bcas nas 'jug par bya'o// ral gri'am 'khor lo de bzung nas lha ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por
230a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / sa 'og gi rdzas rnams kyi mnga' bdag lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad kyi bdag po/ gsang sngags grub pa gzhan dang lha ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi dbang phyug/ sa 'og
230a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi bdag po/ lha ma yin chen po'i sprul pa byed pa po bskal pa chen por gnas pa/ khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo hUM zhes bya ba brjod pa tsam gyis rlag par byed pa/ khyab 'jug
230a7(rgyud 'bum): kyang hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis rlag par byed na/ gzhan lha smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'bum phrag sum cu byas te/ mchod
230b1(rgyud 'bum): rten re re'i mdun du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzla bar bya'o/ / thams cad la nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la/ tha mar me tog can gyi lcags ma 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa mtho gang tsam

230b7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad des ster bar byed do/ / gal te mi ster na ji srid kha las lce ma byung ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o// de nas mtshon rnon pos de gcad par bya'o// de bzung bas nyi ma stong gi gzi
231a1(rgyud 'bum): brjid can rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba stong phrag drug cu'i mkhor can/ tshe bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag drug cu 'tsho ba/ sangs

231a5(rgyud 'bum): phyug chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ / de bzhin du yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / dpag bsam gyi shing dang / bum pa bzang po dang / nor gyi char pa dang / nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting
231a6(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin chen po dang / rin po che chen po'i lag pa dang / nor rgyun gyi rtog pa chen po dang / sems can gyi re pa thams cad rjes su 'gengs pa dang / 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / rin po

233a7(rgyud 'bum): 'og tu 'bar ba mchog/ dang po dbyangs la de'i rjes su// yi ge phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa// ka tsa Ta ta pa ya shA// dag cing chu yi dkyil 'khor ldan// 'di rnams myur du 'grub par byed/

233b6(rgyud 'bum): la ba rlung / / me dang dbang ldan bdag po ste// 'byung ba chen po'i khams rnams so// rlung me bdud rtsi'i bcud ces bshad// mnyam dang mi mnyam cha dbye bas// thams cad nyid kyi lam zhes bya//
233b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dang ni dkyil 'khor sngags// ting 'dzin mdor bsdus bshad pa'o// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// chos kun las ni bton nas ster// stong pa mtshan med smon med pa//
234a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par thar pa gsum du bshad// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya// da ni sngags kyi ka k+Sha'i sbyor ba las// rab tu btus pa sbyar ba
234a2(rgyud 'bum): dang phral ba bshad par bya'o/ / yi ge rnams kyis byang chub dpyod// sangs rgyas nyid kyang mya ngan 'das// lhan cig nyid du sbyar bar bya// dbyangs rnams kyis ni bsdus pa bshad// mtshan
234a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyang ni rab bshad bya/ / dbyangs ni byang chub gzugs nyid de// gzhan dang lhan cig sbyar bar bya// de la nges par sangs rgyas nyid// ster ba nyid du legs par bshad// thog mar
234a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ / gsang sngags dri ma med pa 'byung // thog mar dbyangs ni thig ler ldan// rdo rje'i steng du yang dag gnas// 'bar ba'i 'phreng can rab zhi pa// rnam par 'phro
234a5(rgyud 'bum): ba nyid du gnas/ / zla ba'i dbus su bsgom bya ba// kun gyi ye shes 'od po che// kun tu 'gro ba rab tu thob// thams cad du yang rnyed par dka'// de ni gdod nas gnas rtag pa// yi ge
234a6(rgyud 'bum): med cing dbyer med pa/ / byang chub sems zhes rab tu bshad// dung dang kun da zla ltar dag/ gnyis pa'i sgra dang yang dag ldan// de ni shin tu ring por shes// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod pa
234a7(rgyud 'bum): sa dang pha rol phyin pa rnams/ / usma rnams kyi rnam pa ni// mya ngan 'das pa zhes su bsgrags// dbyangs dang yi ge khyad par can// mtshan nyid rab tu sbyar bar bya// rang gi phyag rgya sogs
234b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa/ / sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// da ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi de nying 'di bshang bya// thog mar spyod pa byas nas ni// gnyis pa smra ba po ru bshad//

234b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / chos kun nam mkha' dang mtshungs par// yang dang yang du bshad pa yis// de ni lnga par shes par bya// yi ge lnga pa stobs po che// yi ge lnga yi stobs lnga'i bdag nyid las skyes

234b5(rgyud 'bum): kyang rab tu ster byed dri ma med/ / de nyid bcom ldan spyod pa so// mi bskyod pa zhes rab tu grags// byang sems rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ brtan pa'i sems dpar rab byung ba// chos kun gyi ni

234b7(rgyud 'bum): chos rnams can gyi byed tshom/ ming banyid du rang ba gang pa'o// ye mas zin yang dag lam/ yin pa'i dbyangs kyi spyi bo/ yan partsal pa' da gnas// ma ma ma
235a1(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ni/ / sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa kun// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// don yod pa yi snying por grags// sde lnga pa yi bzhi pa ni// dngos dang
235a2(rgyud 'bum): dngos med rab rtogs byed/ / me yi sa bon rab tu ldan// 'khor lo'i dbus su rab tu gnas// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// thig le sgra yis rnam par spras// 'khor lo sgyur ba
235a3(rgyud 'bum): ye shes che/ / rnam par rgyal ba'i nor ster byed// gang zhig sde lnga pa yi mtha'// sgyu ma'i chos la rab tu gnas// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// gdugs dkar zhes su bshad pa'o//
235a4(rgyud 'bum): brgyad pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// spyi bor thig le mnan pa'o// 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang ye shes che// mA ma kI
235a5(rgyud 'bum): ru de bsgrags so/ / lnga yi dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// spyod pa'i gar mkhan rab rtogs ming // sdig pa thams cad rengs byed de// rnam par sel
235a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhes bya ba/ / sdig kun rnam par sbyod byed pa// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa ni// phyag na rdo rje stobs chen dang // gshin rje mthar byed khro bo che// yi ge gsum ni stobs chen po// thog mar
235a7(rgyud 'bum): dgu pa yi ni dbyangs/ / de yi dbus su spyod pa gzhag/ tha mar sna tshogs zhes bya sbyar// sku gsum du ni rnam par sgom// tha ma'i sde tshan gsum pa ni// gang yin kun tu bzang por bshad
235b1(rgyud 'bum): sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni/ / sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba'o// de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ni// nam mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags// rdo rje khro bo stobs po che// de nyid rab tu grags pa'o//
235b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di kun thams cad stong pa ste// rgyu ni rab tu spang ba'o// dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// rdo rje hUM mdzad hUM mdzad do// gang zhig bzhi pa'i sde dang po'o// me dang rab tu ldan pa dang //
235b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// gzi brjid phung po stobs po che// de nyid gang dang ma sbyar ba// sgrol ma zhes su rab tu grags// bzhi pa yi ni gnyis pa gang // shes rab pha rol phyin
235b4(rgyud 'bum): par nges/ / thig le lhan cig yang dag ldan// sgra dang ldan pa'i mchog tu gyur// sde mtshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa gang // me nyid dang ni yang dag ldan// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyi yang dag
235b5(rgyud 'bum): mnan/ / khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan zhes bya ba// spyod pa'i gar mkhan zhes bya'i mtshan// de yi rjes nyid la ni me// dgu pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag
235b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / gsum pa'i dbyangs kyis mnan pa yi// sde tshan dang po'i dang po ste// de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ni// 'jig rten mgon po thub pa che// ye shes rgya che ba sgrub par bya// sangs
235b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed/ / sde tshar lnga pa rir chen mchog/ bzhi pa'i sa bor dam pa ste// 'og tu ma yi yan lag ldan// khro gnyer can zhes rab tu grags// dbang chero yi ge dag pa
236a1(rgyud 'bum): la/ thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas spyan zhes rnam grangs pa// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog par byed// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni// nam
236a2(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i spyan zhes brjod pa'o/ / sgyu ma'i chos la rab gnas nas// gsod pa'i don du rab tu gsal// mA ma kI zhes bya ba'i ming // rig pa mchog tu gsang ba ste// rgyu mi dmigs pa'i
236a3(rgyud 'bum): chos rnams kyis/ dri ma med pa stsol pa byed// gnyis pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya// dbang chen sa bon yang dag ldan// 'gro ba'i rdo rje rengs byed na//
236a4(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa gzhan kun smos ci dgos// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyar byas pa// rang gi sa bon gnas shing 'phro// 'gro ba thams cad skrong byed na// gdug sems can gzhan smos ci dgos//
236a5(rgyud 'bum): de nyid me dang ldan pas na// dbang dang dgug pa'i las rnams dang // bgegs dang dgra rnams zhi ba ni// khyad par mi g.yo ba yis byed// don dam bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs// rnam par snang
236a6(rgyud 'bum): mdzad gnas las byung / / gzhan gyi dmag dpung 'joms pa ni// me dang ldan pa nyid kyis bya// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan// rlung gi dkyil 'khor
236a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis grangs pas/ / 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed// ti si man ngar la sogs// de yis phye mar rlog par nges// rdo rje la gnas 'khor lo yi// dbus nas 'gro kun rangs par byed/
236b1(rgyud 'bum): gnas nas bskyod par byas pa yis// 'byung po rnams ni dbang du byed// rtag pa'i gzugs su gnas nas ni// mi g.yo ba yi snying khar son// chos kyi dbyings mtshungs thob nas ni// bdag
236b2(rgyud 'bum): gi bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ / rlung gi sa bon rin po che// spyod pa'i steng du yang dag ldan// me las byung ba me la gnas// 'gro ba thams cad 'bebs par byed// sde tshan dang po'i dang po
236b3(rgyud 'bum): gang / / sa yi yi ge steng du mnan// sde tshan lnga pa'i tha ma ni// drug pa'i sgra yi stang du gnas// 'og tu me yi sa bon ldan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ste// sa gsum thams cad 'bar
236b4(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / me yi phyogs su gnas nas ni// phyag rgya'i bdag nyid thams cad sgom// rlung lha me lha yang dag sbyor// rgyu ni byed pa mtshungs pa'o// rnam par snang mdzad ye shes che// de nyid
236b5(rgyud 'bum): kho na bsgrub par bya/ / dbang chen me ni sbyor ba las// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i go 'phang gnas// ye shes rgya chen bsgrub par bya// yang na phun su tshogs pa'i don// rig pa 'dzin dang sangs rgyas
236b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ rnal 'byor ye shes phun sum tshogs// skye ba 'di las 'grub 'gyur te// 'di la the tshom mi bya'o// dbyangs dang yi ge thams cad la// sbyor ba'i dbye ba rnam par gnas// tshig dang
236b7(rgyud 'bum): ngag gi tshad rnams dang / / ting nge 'dzin rnams thams cad du// slob dpon man ngag shes bya ste// gzhan du bya ba ma yin no// rdo rje snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rdo rje ka k+Sha
237a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba mdor bsdus te bstan pa ste/ rgyas par slob dpon gyis mngon par dpyad par bya'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur
237a2(rgyud 'bum): pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug la gsung dag gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba btab pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ de rnams kyis gsol
237a3(rgyud 'bum): pa btab pa'i tshig gi rjes nyid la/ 'brug gi sgra mtha' yas pa'i legs par bsgrags pa nam mkha'i mdzod kun nas rdo rje rgya che ba tshangs pa chen po'i sgra yongs su rdzogs pa'i don dang /
237a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor so sor yongs su rtogs pa'i don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen
237a5(rgyud 'bum): po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor che// zlum po kun nas bzang po ste/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gnas// de yi steng du pad chen po//
237a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dab ma brgyad la ge sar can// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// yi ge mchog gi go 'phang nyid// bdag gi dngos grub bsgom par bya// ngag gi dbang phyug 'od chen po// snying khar zla ba dang pad+ma// de yi
237a7(rgyud 'bum): steng du dung brtag bya/ / dung gi dbus su lce yin te// rdo rje'i rang bzhin dge ba'o// de yi steng du rin chen par// yang ras sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan yang // 'bar zhing rkan gyi mthar khyab pa// bdud
237b1(rgyud 'bum): rtsi'i rgyun ni rab 'bab pa/ / pa yi yi ge spyi tshugs pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni steng du gnas// bdud rtsi'i thig pa 'dzag pa ni// go rims bzhin du bsam par bya// zla ba phyed dang zla ba gcig/ yang na
237b2(rgyud 'bum): zla ba bzhi 'am ni/ / zla ba brgyad du rab mchog bsgoms// dkyil 'khor bzang po bsgrub par bya// skyil krung gis ni nyer gnas te// dang po'i sbyor ba'i dbang phyug skyes// chos kyi dbyings ni
237b3(rgyud 'bum): mtha' dag tu/ / thams cad du ni yongs su gang // sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bsgom par bya// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa'i// ji snyed rig pa
237b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ni/ / lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// phyag rgya de rnams bdag nyid mchog/ de rnams thams cad bdag nyid kyis// lus kyi 'khor lo la 'jug bsam// dung gi sgra ni gsal ba
237b5(rgyud 'bum): bsam/ / pad+ma'i khams la yang dag rten// pad+ma'i ge sar thig le las// sgra yi rang bzhin rdul phran rnams// mgrin par son nas sgra gyur te// de las kyang ni ji ltar gyur// slar yang
237b6(rgyud 'bum): lce ru son pa dang / / yi ge mchog tu dge ba'o// lce yi yi ge cher 'bar ba// gcig nas gcig tu rdo rje'i tshul// kun nas rab tu 'od gsal ba// rdo rje'i ngag ni dam pa'i don// sgra yis nam
237b7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' kun gang bar/ / sgrub pos mdo ru bsdus te bzla// de bzhin du ni snying khar sla// lce la 'od zer nges 'phros nas// mchu 'am solas rab bkra ba'i// gal te 'od zer mthong na ni//
238a1(rgyud 'bum): grub par rnam par shes/ grub pa'i ngag ni dam pa'i don// yang na lnga ni gzhan pa yis// ngag gi sgrub thabs chen po mchog/ rang lde rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsam// bdag
238a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i rang / / 'bar ba'i sgron ma dang mtshungs pa// rang gi snying gi dbus kyi cha// yi ge mchog tu phra ba yis// a yi yi ge mnga' bdag mchog/ rnam par bkra ba nyi ma bzhin
238a3(rgyud 'bum): rang gi sde pa'i mthar thug mtshungs/ / yi ge yi ger yongs su gzhol// phra mo mnyam pa'i mthar thug ni// 'bar zhing thig le dang mtshungs shing // snying gi dkyil 'khor gsal byed pa/
238a4(rgyud 'bum): de yi 'bar ba rab phra ba// ji srid dkan gyi bar du son// slar yang yi ge thams cad ni// yang dang yang du gsal byed cing // rdo rje 'bar ba stong phrag dang // yang dang yang du rnam par 'don//
238a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten kun tu de song ste// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// yi ge'i rang bzhin rnam bkra ba/ rang gis 'gro ba rnam byas te// slar yang 'ongs nas
238a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas su/ / 'jug pa ru ni yongs su brtag/ de nas sgra dang yi ge ni// lte bar song ste yongs su gnas// lte bar ru ni pad+ma mchog/ pad+mar rdo rje dri med mdzes// de yi steng du dung chen
238a7(rgyud 'bum): po/ rab tu 'phro ba nyid du gnas// de las 'bar ba'i rnam pa'i sgra// brang gi gnas nas yongs su byung // slar yang mgrin par song nas su// rdo rje lce la yang dag reg/ 'gram pa sbyar ba'i
238b1(rgyud 'bum): dbus su ni/ / sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma med// kha ba ba zho ltar dkar 'od// bcud len bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'dra// rdo rje lce ni mtha' dag rnams// yang dang yang du gas
238b2(rgyud 'bum): bar byed/ / ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsar son te// slar yang snying kha nyid du song // thig le las ni gug kyad gyur// kug kyang ri mo ring po can// cha shas rnam bzhi 'dus pa las// de ri yi ger
238b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par shes/ / yi ge las ni sgra skye zhing // sgra las nA da de las dbyangs// dbyangs las ngag tu rnam par 'gyur// yi ge las ni cha shas tshogs// tshig rkang dang ri ngag tu 'gyur//
238b4(rgyud 'bum): tshig rkang las ni tshigs bcad dang // de bzhin du ni gA thA dang // 'phreng 'dzin rgyun tshogs de bzhin te// 'di ltar sngags dang rig sngags dang // rang gi snying por rab tu 'gyur// de nas bzlas
238b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rnal 'byor che/ / blo gros ldan pas brtan byas te// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya// bzlas pa 'di yi sbyor ba yis// thams cad du ni brtur par
238b6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ yid bzhin gyi ni ngag 'grub bo// rmad byung mchog tu rnyed dka' ba'o// yang dag lha ni gzhan pa yi// ngag 'grub thams cad skyo ba rnams kyi// yi ge gcig pa gsang chen po// ngag gi sgrub
238b7(rgyud 'bum): thabs mchog tu dge/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom// rang snying zla bar rdo rje che// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// de las bstan
239a1(rgyud 'bum): bcos thams cad ni/ / nges par gdor ba nyid du bya// ngag grub pa yi ye shes 'dis// thams cad mkhyen pa thob par byed// bstan bcos thams cad rab 'don cing /
239a2(rgyud 'bum): de nyid kyang ni 'chad par byed// sems can kun gyis thams cad du// dngos po cung zad gang bsams pa// de dag thams cad rnam shes te// skad cig tsam la smra bar byed// rdo rje snying po rgyun
239a3(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ba las/ ngag gi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams slar yang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
239a4(rgyud 'bum): thugs mchog gi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi cho ga rgyas pa sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol/
239a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis de dag gis gsol ba btab pa nye bar gsan nas de de bzhin no zhes bka' stsal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags
239a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim par phye ba'i cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rnam par bri//
239a7(rgyud 'bum): yang na bcu drug rtsibs kyang bri// lte bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgod// 'khor lo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// mtha' ru rin chen rnam pa bdun// mkhas pa yis ni spel bar byed//
239b1(rgyud 'bum): de yi lte bar bdag nyid ni// 'khor lo sgyur ba stobs po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen po// chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/ de yi phyag rgya bgrang las 'das// skad cig ma ni nyid la/
239b2(rgyud 'bum): 'thon// 'gro ba thams cad snang byas nas// sngags kyi dbang phyug nyid la gzhug/ 'khor lo'i dngos grub gza brjid che// 'khor lo sgyur bar bdag nyid 'gyur// chung dang tshe dang dpang
239b3(rgyud 'bum): phyug dang / / rang dbang 'dod dgur spyod pa dang // kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang ni// kun gyi dbang phyug phun tshogs 'bras// rga dang 'chi ba med thob cing // nges par 'khor lo sgyur dang mtshungs//
239b4(rgyud 'bum): ga ser gyi 'khor lo rin po che// de bzhin dngul dang shel nyid dang // me tog can gyi lcags kyang rung // rang gi lag gis bzung nas su// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas tham
239b5(rgyud 'bum): cad bsgom par bya/ / 'khor lo sgyur ba gzi brjid che// mtshan rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan// de ltar bdag nyid bsgoms nas ni// 'khor lo sgyur ba nyid du 'gyur// de la de'i sngags kyi tshig tu
239b6(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+To Sh+Tha a ba lo ki ti/ mu NI tsakrA la rti dz+wa la dz+wA la d+hu na bi d+hu na tra sa ya mA ra ya/ uts+tshu Ta ya han b+hAny+dza pro khi ni kuN+Da la nI a ba rA dzi tAm+ma d+hA ri Ni/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/
239b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sngags so// oM oM a paM rA dza~M ta d+hika swA hA/ snying po'o// ra maHsar+b+ba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAn oM ba rA dzi ta d+hi ka swA hA/ mchog gi snying po'o// 'khor lo sgyur bar rab grub ste/
240a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas nyid ni thob nas ni// ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs// yang na dbang phyug dam pa kun// dpa' bo thams cad ster byed ma// dngos grub gzhan
240a2(rgyud 'bum): smos ci dgos/ / 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// nam mkha' la ni yongs su sgom// gzi brjid phung po ye shes che// sangs
240a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur/ / gnyis su meng 'byung sems kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor mchog tu rmad byung ba// de ni me yir shes par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// de
240a4(rgyud 'bum): yang 'khor lo 'dzin rgyal po/ / 'khor lo sgyur ba legs 'bar ba// de la de bzhin rin chen bdun// 'khor lo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//
240a5(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma re re'i bkra shis sgom// gzi brjid phung po sku chen po// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// 'bar ba'i 'phreng 'khrugs dpa' bo ni// snang ba shar ba lta bur gnas// de yi phyag rgya rtag
240a6(rgyud 'bum): tu bsam/ / nam mkha'i rnam par legs par gnas// chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// 'od zer 'phreng bas rnam par khyab// de dang bdag nyid rdo rjer sgom// sangs rgyas byang chub rab
240a7(rgyud 'bum): sgrub byed/ / kun tu kun nas thams cad du// dngos po kun las 'byung bar 'gyur// ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs// kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang ni// sangs rgyas thams cad nyid dag dang //
240b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje can kun nyid dang ni// gzi brjid mchog kun thob gyur nas// gzi brjid phung po 'dra bar 'gyur// de la sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa ni/ oM ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a na ba mo ki ti murti te/
240b2(rgyud 'bum): dza ra si dz+wa la dz+wa la d+ha ka d+ha ka/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi b+ha bi b+ha/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM te dzo rA si swA hA/ snying po'o// oM dza la te dzo rA si hUM phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o// dag pa'i
240b3(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags 'di rnams kyis/ / nyi ma'i ye shes rab tu gsal// kun tu 'gro ba'i 'grub par bya// rig pa 'dzin pa nyid thob 'gyur// gzi brjid phung po gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so//
240b4(rgyud 'bum): / kun nas snang ba zhes bya mchog/ yi ge gsum pa stobs po che// gser gyi kha dog legs 'bar zhing // gtsug tor steng na 'od gsal ba// sngags pa rang bdag gis bsgom
240b5(rgyud 'bum): bya/ kun nas snang ba lta bur 'gyur// oM AHhUM/ gsang sngags rtse mo dam pa 'di// bsgoms pa tsam gyis thams cad du// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi// 'gro kun kun nas snang bar
240b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / kun nas snang ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// chos kyi 'khor lo phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// sangs rgyas kun nyid kun
240b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor byed// 'khor lo 'di ni rtsibs bcu gnyis// rnam pa bcu gnyis yongs su gnas// rnam gsum gsum ni yongs bskor ba// bya ba'i don du dag pa
241a1(rgyud 'bum): / sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po// nam mkha'i khrugs na gnas pa ste// chos kyi dbyings ni khyab pa ni// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/
241a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba ni// 'di kun rten cing 'brel 'byung ba// 'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// de yi sngags su gyur pa ni// oM d+hu na pA ta ya ts+tsha
241a3(rgyud 'bum): kre Na/ badz+ra Ni hUM/ gsang sngags 'di ni dpal ldan mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis med 'char// skad cig tsam gyis thams cad du// dam pa'i chos ni stobs ldan byed// chos kyi
241a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo sgrub pa'i thabs so/ / / chos kyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa 'dra// sangs rgyas sku gzugs legs 'bar ba// rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog bsgrubs na// nyon mongs rdo rje
241a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dra bar 'gyur/ / snying nas rdo rje gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// de yi snying la rdo rje me// dri ma med pa skye bar 'gyur// nyon mongs rtag rgyu yongs zad kyi//
241a6(rgyud 'bum): dgra rnams kun las rgyal bar byed// bden pa bzhi ni rtogs pas na// bden pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur// sngags ni/ oM kI sha a~M sha ni hU~M phaT/ 'di ni nyon mongs rdo rje'i sngags/
241a7(rgyud 'bum): drag cing drag po'i gzhan gnon pos// sangs rgyas nyid kyang ster byed na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// nyon mongs rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs so// / dbang chen dkyil
241b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la gnas pa'i/ / sangs rgyas rang bzhin stobs po n+de// bdud bzhi las ni rnam rgyal ba// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom// bden pa bzhi yi khA tshung me// lus dang
241b2(rgyud 'bum): ngag dang de bzhin yid/ / khu tshur sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// gnyis med skye ba'i mtshan nyid do// rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom par bya// rang nyid sangs rgyas yin no zhes// brtan dang
241b3(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba'i 'gro ba ni/ / 'di dag thams cad ma skyes par/ rdo rje khu tshur bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje khu tshur 'dra bar 'gyur// de la sngags su gyur pa ni// oM bi dza ye daH/ de bzhin
241b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i khu tshur che/ / shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba// sngags pas rtag tu bsgoms na ni// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'thob// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi
241b5(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa'i thabs so/ / / dngos grub las byung 'od gsal ba// gdod nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su'o//
241b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag nyid sgom// 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis// 'di yis 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ 'khor lo sgyur ba nyid du ni// 'jig rten kun gyi thams cad du// kun nas phun sum tshogs
241b7(rgyud 'bum): pa kun/ / bkug nas gus pas sbyin par bya// sngags ni/ oM dz+wa la dz+wA la dI pya dI pya ud ga toSh+NI Sha d+hu ra d+hA na hU~M/ snying 'gro'i gtsug tor zhes bya bar// sangs rgyas dpa' bo kun gyis
242a1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so//
242a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rang bzhin phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// tshang skyob gdugs dkar chen po ni// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//
242a3(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i kha dog cher 'bar zhing // chu yi dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa// dri med puN+Da ri kar gnas// ri mo bdun gyis yongs su gang // bcud
242a4(rgyud 'bum): lenar lta bur bsgom par bya/ / dngos grub 'di yi sbyor ba yis// sems can rnams la thams cad du// re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// 'di ni gtsug tor gdugs dkar che// sngags
242a5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ oM ma ma ma ma hUM ni/ 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// ye shes tshe dang stobs mgyogs 'gro// dpa' bo thams cad thob 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min// gdug
242a6(rgyud 'bum): dkar po yi sgrub thabs so/ / / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par// 'bar ba'i 'phreng 'khrugs ral gri ni// sngags pas snying khar bsgom par bya// rang gi bdag nyid sangs
242a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas zhes/ / sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin chen pos// nam mkha'i mthongs rnams yongs gang ba// bdag nyid gnyis med ngo bo yis// rnal 'byor gcig tu bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yi ge
242b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo che/ / 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// sngags pas snying khar bsgom par bya// rgyal ba dam pa nyid du 'gyur// sngags ni/ oM dz+wa la dzA loSh+NI Sha dz+wa la dzA ma ban+d+ha bad+d+ha da ma dam
242b2(rgyud 'bum): chu ma dru ma da ha da ha na hUM/ rgyal ba'i gtsug tor ral gri che// shes rab ye shes dri ma med// sngags pas kun nas bsgoms nas ni// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'dri bar 'gyur// rgyal ba'i
242b3(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so/ / / sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// seng ge'i khri yi steng du bsam// yang na rdo rje'i gdan la gan/
242b4(rgyud 'bum): kun tu gtsug tor cher 'bar ba// snying khar yongs su bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni// yi ge dam pa yi ni gnas// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// chos kyi sgra ni mchog tu che//
242b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// kun tu gtsug tor bstobs po che// skad cig de la 'grub 'gyur te// rdo rje sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin no// sngags ni/ oM badz+ra ban d+ha hUM/ gsang
242b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di ni dam pa gtso/ / sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur byed// rtag tu rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// de ni kun gyis dbang bskur ro// rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud chen po las
242b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gtsug tor gyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rim par phye ba yongs su rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang 'dus
243a1(rgyud 'bum): par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'ad rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa rgyas pa

243a3(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis brlabs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi rim par phye ba bka' stsal pa/ shes rab ye shes rdo rje che// snying khar yongs su bsgoms nas su//
243a4(rgyud 'bum): ral gri 'bar ba gzi brjid che// mtha' klas pa la rnam par gnas// 'jam dbyangs zhes bya bsgom par bya// gur kum gyi ni rnam pa 'dra// gtsug na zur pud lnga ldan pa// gzhon nu

243a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po gzi brjid che/ / 'khrul pa med cing yi ge bral// sangs rgyas kun bdag shes rab mchog/ nyon mongs thams cad zad par byed// rdo rje kun bdag bkod pa po// kun tu 'gro ba'i
243a7(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i don/ / dbyer med mchog tu gsang ba po// rig pa mchog gi bdag nyid 'di// zhal drug pa la phyag drug mchog/ mngon shes drug ldan yi ge drug/ rjes dran drug gi sbyor ba yis//
243b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dam pa stobs po che// gzi brjid yang na stobs kyis kyang // kun nas yongs su gsal ba po// gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste// nam mkha'i khams na rnam par gnas// yang na
243b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag gnyis shes par bya/ / ting nge 'dzin gnas sdig pa bcom// dpa' bo pad+ma la gnas pa// zla ba'i mdog can 'od po che// rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes phra// shes rab pha rol phyin par ba/
243b3(rgyud 'bum): gdod nas ma skyes pa zhes bsam// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// de'i sngags ni/ oM bA
243b4(rgyud 'bum): kye daM na maH/ gsang sngags 'di ni mchog tu gsang // gsang chen gyi ni dam par bzhed// rnam thar gsum gyi sgo mar gnas// pha rol phyin drug rab tu gsal// rang nyid shes rab yin
243b5(rgyud 'bum): no zhes/ / sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// dbang po drug ni rab bsgyur te// sangs rgyas nyid ni rnal 'byor las// pad+ma rA ga lta bu'i mdog/ ston zla lta bur cher gsal ba// sems
243b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po gser gyi mdog/ stobs po che ni bsgom par bya// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// shes rab dri ma med par 'gyur// bstan bcos thams cad rab smra zhing // dbang
243b7(rgyud 'bum): phyug thams cad mdun na gnas/ / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang // byang chub kun gyi pha rol son// dbang phyug kun dang bde ba che// chos rnams kun gyi yon tan mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin
244a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad dang / / yang na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// kun tu 'gro ba thob 'grub na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// dngul chu bcud len de nyid dang // rkang
244a2(rgyud 'bum): pas spyod pa de nyid mchog/ ril bu dang ni mi snang ba// thams cad du ni ster bar 'gyur// dpal ldan 'jam pa'i mchog 'di ni// chos kyi dung gi mchog las 'khrungs// sangs rgyas
244a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ / 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// bsams pa'i phun sum tshogs kun gyis// sangs rgyas kun tu brtan

244a7(rgyud 'bum): bar yongs su bsgom par bya/ / 'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor lo che// kun tu rnam par 'gro ba yis// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrigs shing zhi// ral pa'i thor tsugs 'dzin pa po// ral pa'i
244b1(rgyud 'bum): dbus su dpa' bo che/ / 'od dpag med pa ldan pa'i bdag/ ston ka'i zla ba lta bur gsal// kun tu nam mkha' yongs gang ba// gsang sngags sbyor bdag bsgom par bya// rang nyid 'jig
244b2(rgyud 'bum): rten gsum rnam rgyal/ / chos kyi dbyings kyis mtha' klas pa// pad+ma'i lus kyis yang dag gang // kun tu pad+ma rnams la ni// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sku// khyad par du dag
244b3(rgyud 'bum): dgang bar bya/ / 'gro ba brten dang g.yo ba kun// snang dang mi snang dngos po ni// yang dang yang du blta bar bya// gdul bya ma lus sems la ni// stobs po ches ni dgang bar bya// rtsa don
244b4(rgyud 'bum): dbyibs ni 'di bzhin du/ / sna tshogs gzugs la cher 'bar ba// kun nas yongs su bsdus nas ni// sngags pa'i bdun du gzhag par bya// de nas sngags pas de ma thag/ slar yang

244b6(rgyud 'bum): cad sgrol 'gyur zhing / / rang gi dngos grub mchog rnams dang // rnal 'byor thams cad 'dzin nyid dang // rnam par rgyas pa'i nor ster 'gyur// rig pa 'dzin dang 'khor lo can// sa dang
244b7(rgyud 'bum): rol phyin sogs dang / / sangs rgyas rnams kyang stsol 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// de'i sngags ni/ oM A ro li ka/ gsang sngags dpal ldan mchog 'di ni// rang nyid
245a1(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum rnam par rgyal/ / longs spyod thams cad bkug nas ni// skad cig tsam gyis rnam par skyer// pad+ma'i sgrub pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid 'jig rten
245a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug sgrub/ / 'jig rten gsum gyis rgyal rnams ni// srid pa bkug nas rnam par sbyar// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs so// / thams cad rdo rje'i rang
245a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gzugs/ / me yi dkyil 'khor dge ba ste// de yi dbus su bya ba ni// dkyil 'khor rlung dang rab mtshungs pa// de yi dbus su de 'dra bsam// nyi ma yi ni dkyil 'khor ro// de yi
245a4(rgyud 'bum): dbus su gzi brjid che/ / 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can// rdo rje'i lag pa gzi brjid che// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// tshangs pa'i yulas thams cad du// kun nas
245a5(rgyud 'bum): yongs su gsal bar byed/ / hUM gi yi ge sgra zab mo// dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// rgyal po 'khyil ba dang mtshungs pa// zar ma yi ni me tog 'dra// 'bar ba dmar pos 'khrigs
245a6(rgyud 'bum): shing 'jigs/ / bskal pa'i me dang 'dra bar gnas// zhal bzhi pa las mche ba bzhi// 'jigs pa'i dus kyis thal ba 'dra// hUM gi yi ge bzhi dang ldan// sprin 'khrugs pa dang rab
245a7(rgyud 'bum): tu 'dra/ / rdo rje hUM mdzad ces bya ba// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom// sngags kyi tshigs ni/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ grih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ye hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga wAn/ 'ang+ga
245b1(rgyud 'bum): rAdzA hUM phaT/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po 'di// kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis// 'jig rten gsum yang 'gugs byed na// bud med gzhan lta smos ci dgos// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang

245b3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs brnyan snying khar son/ / dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje can gyi sngon du sgrub// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa/ bcom ldan rdo rje can 'grub 'gyur// rgyal po

245b6(rgyud 'bum): khar bzla zhing gzugs brnyan 'od/ / rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba ldan// 'jig rten khams ni 'byam klas pa// rang bzhin gcig tu byas nas ni// rdo rje yis ni spro ba dang // dbang bskur ba yi
245b7(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin dge/ gser gyi kha dog legs 'bar ba// ral pa'i thor tsugs 'dzin pa po// ral pa'i dbus su mchod rten che// dung dang kund zla 'od bzang // bsgoms nas sems can thams
246a1(rgyud 'bum): cad la/ / brtan pa'i don du dbang bskur bya// yang na sems can thams cad la// bu gcig lta bur rnam par spro// bsgom pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// gnyis med
246a2(rgyud 'bum): ma rgyal ba las rgyal/ / spro ba dang ni bsdu ba dang // gnas sogs dbye bas rnam par dbye// byams pas kun tu rnam par spro// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// thams cad bdag
246a3(rgyud 'bum): dang bdag gi bar/ / shin tu dri ma med par gnas// ri rab lta bur brtan pa'i sems// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge bral// de ltar sems ni brtan byas nas// mnyam med sems can kun
246a4(rgyud 'bum): dang mnyam/ / bdag nyid byams pa yin no zhes// dga' ldan gnas pa'i tshul 'dzin pa// cung zad la zhing 'khyil ba'i sgra// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// rin chen sems ni rnam dag
246a5(rgyud 'bum): pas/ bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom par bya// 'di'i gsang sngags rang bzhin gyis grub pa ni/ oM a dzi tany+dza ya sarba satwa sa ma yA nu ga ta swA hA/ gsang sngags bdag nyid rgyal po 'di/
246a6(rgyud 'bum): byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste// chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par khyab// byams pa'i thugs ni yid du 'ong // dang po'i sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// sgrub pa'i thabs mchog bsgom par bya/

246b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni byams pa lta bur 'gyur/ / byams pa'i sangs rgyas zhing du ni// rang bzhin gyis ni skye bar 'gyur// de mdun chos ni legs mnyan nas// sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang // dbang dang ting 'dzin

246b3(rgyud 'bum): gi lus ni thams cad ni/ / nam mkha' mtshungs pa nyid du sgom// chos bdag med pas bskyed nas kyang // rang nyid nam mkha'i snying porar gyur// gsang sngags 'di mi sbyor ba yis// mkha'

246b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rang gi dngos grub thams cad ni// ster bar 'gyur te dpyad mi dgos// dpa' bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// dngos grub ji snyed bka' stsal pa// nam mkha'i snying po bsgrubs
247a1(rgyud 'bum): pa yis/ / de dag thams cad myur du ster// nam mkha' snying po sgrub pa'i thabs so// // sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan

247a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rang gi phra rab rdul rnams kyis/ / de dag thams cad mtshungs par bya// sangs rgyas sku yi sku nyid du// yang na ba spu'i khung rnams su// rang gi 'khor los yongs bskor nas/

247b1(rgyud 'bum): bde blag tu/ / ring po nyid du mi thogs par// sgrib pa rnam sel mtshungs par 'gyur// oM sarba ni wa ra Na biSh+Ta ma b+hi swAhA/ oM ni sa ra ya swA hA/ gtso bo gsang sngags 'di 'dzin la/

248a1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thams cad rab gsal mdzad// sa yi snying po zhes grags pa// dam pa'i don du rnal 'byor pas// sa'i snying po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so//
248a2(rgyud 'bum): zad pa med cing 'khrul pa med// zad med mchog gi shes rab can// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// shes rab rdo rje'i bdag nyid dge/ blo gros mi zad rnyed dka' ba// 'bad pa yis
248a3(rgyud 'bum): ni bsgom par bya/ / me yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// gser gyi mdog dang ldan pa'i gzugs// rgyal po chen po zla ba'i 'od// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gsal// sngags ni/ oM ak+Sha
248a4(rgyud 'bum): ya ma ti swA hA/ sngags kyi yi ge gsang ba 'di// thams cad blo gros gsal bar byed// ye shes mi zad 'dod pa yis// 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste// dngos grub kun gyi mchog ces bya//
248a5(rgyud 'bum): shes rab ye shes dri med mdzes// sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// blo gros mi zad pa'i sgrub thabs so// // kun nas shes rab chen po cam//
248a6(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten par// gser gyi kha dog gzi brjid che// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i// gzhon nu'i gzugs can rtag tu bsam// re ba thams cad rdzogs par mdzad//
248a7(rgyud 'bum): rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor ba// nam mkha'i bdag po bdag yin zhes// lus ngag yid kyis thams cad du// thams cad rig pas brtan par bya// shin tu dri med byang chub sems// rang snying
248b1(rgyud 'bum): me long lta bur bsam/ / de nas yi ge'i tshig bkod de// mkha' mdzod bdag ces bdag nyid kyis// bsgoms nas rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag/ mkha' la rin chen 'byung gnas dang // yid bzhin nor bu
248b2(rgyud 'bum): dpag bsam shing / / de bzhin bum pa bzang po sogs// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug gis// nye bar mkho ba thams cad 'bab// 'jig rten kun gyi rdzas thams cad// ji snyed yod pa de dag
248b3(rgyud 'bum): kun/ / 'dir ni skad cig tsam nyid la// dngos grub dam pa stsol bar 'gyur// oM ga ga na gany+dza gaM swA hA/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi dngos grub che// nor gyi rgyun ni rab 'bebs pa// nam mkha'i
248b4(rgyud 'bum): mdzod ni stobs po che/ / skad cig ma la byed par 'gyur// nam mkha' mdzad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// / rin chen dkyil 'khor las byung ba// rin chen phung po char rab 'bebs//
248b5(rgyud 'bum): rin chen gzi brjid mchog tu rol// lag na rin chen de bsgrub bya// lag na rin chen phyag brkyang ba// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje sbyor bas bsgom par bya// bdag nyid
248b6(rgyud 'bum): rin chen zhes bya/ / rin chen thams cad stsol bar mdzod// thams cad rdo rje bzhin bdag nyid// pri yang ku mdog sngo bsangs 'od// dbang chen dang ni ma las byung // phyag na rin chen cher
248b7(rgyud 'bum): gsal ba/ / rab tu 'bang de bsgom par bya// oM rat+na pA Ni ra muHswA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni brtson 'grus che// rab tu 'bang de bsgrubs nas ni// 'gro ba kun gyi lag tu ni// rin chen thams
249a1(rgyud 'bum): cad rabacos byed/ / lag na rin po che sgrub pa'i thabs so// chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems// bdud rtsi'i chu mis rab gang ba// stong gsum nas
249a2(rgyud 'bum): ni bsam par bya/ / pad+ma gcig gi steng na gnas// de yi steng du gzi brjid che// chu lha yi ni gzugs kyi mchog/ de steng du yang gsang chen po// me yi dkyil 'khor dam pa yin// de yi steng du
249a3(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus che/ / rtse mo brgya pa'i rdo rje byung // de yi steng du pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa 'od gsal ba// de steng rtag tu bsam pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che// rgya mtsho'i blo
249a4(rgyud 'bum): gros zhes grags pa/ / 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// dung dang kun da zla ba'i mdog/ rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de yi lag na phyag rgya che// rdo rje steng du rab tu grags//
249a5(rgyud 'bum): / rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas// rang nyid rdo rje yin no zhes// rgya mtsho'i blo gros shes rab che// slar yang gsang sngags bzla bar bya// sngags ni/ oM sA ga ra ma ti sa ra swA hA/ sngags 'di mchog
249a6(rgyud 'bum): dang gtso bo ste/ / shes rab ye shes dri med mdzes// rdo rje'i sbyor bas myangs nas ni// shes rab rgya mtsho'i blo gros mtshungs// rang nyid sangs rgyas 'jam pa'i dbyangs// thub rten 'jig rten dbang
249a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya la/ / dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rgya mtsho'i blo gros kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// / dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// ut+pal sngon po 'dab 'dra'i 'od//
249b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje snying po brtson 'grus che// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// ji snye sa stengs mtha' dag tu// khyab la sdug cing mtho ba yi// sra zhing snying po rnams dag pa'i// mchog gi yi ge 'gyur
249b2(rgyud 'bum): med pa/ / sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ni// chos kyi sprin la spyod mdzad pa// bsam yas sa ni yang dag brnyes// in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni// yi ge
249b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog ni steng du 'bar/ / thugs kyi rdo rje cher gsal ba// rang nyid rnam par 'phro ba bzhin// sngags ni/ oM badz+ra gar+b+ha hUM/ 'di ni sngags mchog gtso bo ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rab
249b4(rgyud 'bum): sgrub byed/ / ye shes yangs pa stsol mdzad cing // rnam pa kun tu phun tshogs kun// sangs rgyas nyid kyang stsol mdzad na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// dgug dang gzhug
249b5(rgyud 'bum): dang bcing ba dang / / dbang du bya ba sgrub par byed// bdag nyid rdo rje yin no zhes// nga rgyal rab tu bskyed nas ni// rdo rje snying po bzhin du gzham// bdag gi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya// thugs kyi
249b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje nyid gyur nas/ / chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa thob// des na rnam pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje snying pos yang dag byung // rdo rje snying po mkha' dziH// sbyin pa byed pa de yis bsgrub// rdo rje
249b7(rgyud 'bum): po sgrub pa'i thabs so/ / / dbang chen me las yang dag blang // nor bur rin can 'dra ba'i 'ong // zla ba'i dkyil mthor gnas pa mo/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'i sa
250a1(rgyud 'bum): rin chen 'byung ba sems chen po/ / 'gro ba snang bar byed de gnas// pad+ma mkha' 'dra'i rnam pa can// phyag rgya de yi snying khar gnas// rin chen skyo bas bsgom
250a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rin chen char pa 'bab par 'gyur// sngags ni// oM rat+na ka rahU~M rat+na na da da swA hA/ rin chen 'byung gnas rgyal po 'di// mchog rnams kyi ni sa yi phyug/ sbyor ba kun gyis bsgrub
250a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rgya che'i nor rnams stsol bar 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
250a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa dam
250a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khro bo bcom ldan 'das skyed du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo 'khor lo sgyur ba chen pos de skad ces
250a6(rgyud 'bum): gsol ba btab ma thag kho nar rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba las ches gsang ba bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// khro bo yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/ rlung khams rab tu gsal ba la/
250a7(rgyud 'bum): me ni dbus nas dbus su'o// de yi dbus su rdo rje che// 'od zer lnga yi 'phreng bas mdzes// de yi mdun du bya ba yang // bdud rtsi rabar ba chen po yi// de yi g.yas kyi gdan la ni// rdo rje chen po
250b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bar 'phreng can/ / g.yon nyid du ni be con can// rig pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par spras// rgyab tu ral gri'i phyag rgya ni// rin chen 'bar bas rnam par brgyan/ phyi ngos rnams su rnam khros pa'i
250b2(rgyud 'bum): khro bo thams cad dgod par bya/ / de yi sngags kyi yi ge gsang // gsang chen mchog tu 'bar ba'o// gzhal du med cing grangs med mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// yi ge
250b3(rgyud 'bum): gcig pa gsang chen po/ / rgyu yi don du rtogs par byed// dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan// de nyid gsang ba'i mgon po ni// dbyangs bdun pa ni bshad
250b4(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / he ru ka dpal rdo rje che// 'jigs pa'i bskal pa can thal bas// sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i bdag/ 'bar ba me yi dkyil 'khor bzhin// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus mtshan
250b5(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / char sprin dang ni 'dra ba'i 'od// pad+ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra// 'bar ba kun gyis rnam par brgyan// dur khrod me bzhin shin tu yang // gsal ba'i sgra ldan stobs po che// rno ba'i rdo rje
250b6(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba/ / thod pa'i cod pan steng du 'bar// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus mtshan gyis// rgod ma kha yi me lhar gnas// smin 'khyog rnam par 'khrug pa can// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis
250b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs/ / khro bo la sogs nyams dang ldan// rnam pa sna tshogs 'khrugs pa'i gdong // gar dang sdud par yang dag ldan// 'jig rten snang ba'i gar mdzad pa// phyag ni brgya phrag stong dang ldam/
251a1(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu gyur cing rnam pa mang // rnam mngazhal ldan de dag gi/ sngo ser la sogs tha dad ldan// zhabs kyang rnam pa dum ldan// sna tshogs mdog ldan rnam par 'khrug
251a2(rgyud 'bum): de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/ / khro bo'i rgyal po stobs po che// shin tu gdug cing drag rnams la// sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes byar gnas// phyag drug zhabs drug snang ba can// zhal drug pa ste
251a3(rgyud 'bum): gsus po che/ / char sprin mdog 'dra cher gnag pa// dus mtha'i me dang 'dra bar gnas// mdog chen rgyal po 'khyil ba 'dra// zur ma yi ni me tog mtshungs// khro bo thod pa'i 'phreng ba
251a4(rgyud 'bum): 'chang / / gshin rje mthar mdzad stobs po che// de la sngags kyang / oM AHhUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha na hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+TIHbi kr-i tA na na hUM sarba sha dz+nyA na nA sha ya stam+b+ha ya hUM phaT/ sngags
251a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal po'i bdag nyid 'di/ / khyab bdag gdul dka' 'dul ba po// gshin rje mthar mdzad khro bo che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gtso// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren
251a6(rgyud 'bum): cing / dbang du yang ni mdzad par gnas// rtag tu gdul dka' 'dul mdzad cing // rdo rje snang mdzad legs par 'dul// shin tu gdug pa drag rnams la// zhi ba'i nye bar mi sbyar te//
251a7(rgyud 'bum): shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyis// de bzhin gshegs rnams khro bor mdzad// thugs rjes khro bo'i ngang tshul can// 'jig rten gsum yang nges sreg mdzad// de bas 'bad pa thams cad
251b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid smra/ / thugs rjes khro bos ma lus mchog/ gdug pa 'dul bar mdzad pa bskyed// gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so//
251b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// khro bo gzegs ma zhes su grags// rin chen 'bar ba'i khro bo che// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus dang 'dra// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma bzhin// de yi kha dog
251b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par gsal/ / drag po chen po'i zhal bzhi pa// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// spyan gsum pa la khro gnyer bsnyer// phyag drug pa la mchog tu 'bar// me yi khams dang
251b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dra ba'i mdog/ li khri'i mdog ltar shin tu dmar// de yis khro gnyer bsnyer ba yis// gdug pa 'dul mdzad byin par byed// khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis pa ni// yang dang yang du bsam
251b5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / ma lus sa rnams thams cad du// son pa'i bdag nyid chen po des// 'gugs pa dang ni dbang byed na// skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sngags ni/ oM ka Ni ka Ni hUM
251b6(rgyud 'bum): khro bo 'di yi sngags 'dzin pa/ / 'jig rten gsum mchog stobs po che// sa rnams thams cad sreg byed na// skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// khro bo gzegs ma sgrub pa'i thabs so// /
251b7(rgyud 'bum): / de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gyur// rta mgrin zhes su bshad pa yin// rtag tu 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba/
252a1(rgyud 'bum): rgya skyegs mdog ltar dmar ba'o// chu dang gzi brjid can reg pa// me yi dkyil 'khor dag dang ldan// 'dod ldan rnams la 'dod pa 'byung // gdug pa can rnams gdu
252a2(rgyud 'bum): pa 'byung / / zhi ba la yang zhi ba 'byung // stobs ldan rnams la stobs kyis sbyor// zhal bzhi pa la zhabs bzhi pa// bsam gtan bzhi dang mnyam par ldan// phyag bzhi pa la brtson
252a3(rgyud 'bum): 'grus che/ / seng ge lhur gnas mchi ba bzhi// rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ni// dam pa'i dbang phyug bsgrub par bya// skad cig nyid la gnas nas ni// thams cad lhung ba bsgrub par bya//
252a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni// oM a mr-i tod+b+ha bod b+ha be hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i tod b+ha ba hUM phaT/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// g.yon brkyang ba ni rab tu sbyar// khro bo rgyal krung byis nas ni// 'jig
252a5(rgyud 'bum): rten thams cad rab tu mnyes/ / pad+ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po 'di// sa yi dbang phyug kun gyi mchog/ rta yi mgrin pa stobs po che// stobs kyi sbyor ba bsgrub par bya// dbang phyug chen po la
252a6(rgyud 'bum): sogs lha/ tshogs kyi bdag po gzhan dag dang // mi dang gdug pa'i bsam pa can// sa rnams thams cad dgug par bya// rta mgrin gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// / de nyid
252a7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan rnal 'byor de/ / gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid gyur// khro bo mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// kun sbyor bdag gi rnal 'byor gyis// thugs rjes khro ba'i
252b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang du song / / de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// b+ha yi tsi mor yid kyis ni// g.yo ba med par bsam par bya/ slob dpon mi gam tshwa tha ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad les// ral gri zhags pa 'dzin pa
252b2(rgyud 'bum): gsang / / thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ pri yang ku ru sngo ba'i gzugs// 'khrigs shing byis pa lta bur gnas// ma lus pa yis rnams kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/
252b3(rgyud 'bum): khro bo mngag pa bran dang ni// pho nyas kyang ni rnam par brgyan// skye bo kun gyis yongs su gang // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan snga na// bka' lung yang ni yongs su stsol// sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA/
252b4(rgyud 'bum): NAM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra ka hAM maM/ khro bo gzi brjid chen po 'di// gzugs mang mnga' ba stobs po che// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed// dbang du yang ni mdzad par gnas// rlung dang
252b5(rgyud 'bum): me las yang dag byung / / 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can// sngags dang phyag rgya sogs kun mchog/ lus dang ngag yid de bzhin no// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du bya ba sgrub
252b6(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klus mchog/ khro bo'i phyag rgya rang byang ba// drag po thog ma tha ma med// rnam par 'phro ba bzhin du gnas
252b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor 'di yongs su rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang
253a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dus te gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/
253a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das gzungs rnams thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor skyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba
253a3(rgyud 'bum): gzungs rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khor dge/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs kyis ni rnam par mdzes// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bshad// de yi dbus su pad
253a4(rgyud 'bum): chen po/ / lo ma kun gyis shin tu mdzes// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'dab ma ldan// rdo rje rin chen legs par brgyan// de yi dbus su rtag bri ba// dpag med shes rab pha rol phyin// de yi nye 'khor thams cad
253a5(rgyud 'bum): du/ sna tshogs las ni 'bar rnams la// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis// shes rab pha rol phyin ma bri// shar gyi 'dab ma nas brtsams te// thog mtha' nyid kyang brtag par bya// phyag rgya'i yi ge ci rigs
253a6(rgyud 'bum): par go rims bzhin du rnam par dgod/ / phyogs cha'i dbye ba tha dad kyis// kha dog bye ba thams cad du// rnam dbye mchog tu sna tshogs pa// chos nyid mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// de las 'od zer bsam
253a7(rgyud 'bum): mi khyab/ / sngo sar la sogs dbye ba yis// shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// 'gro ba thams cad gsal bar bya// 'dus par gyur nas de dag kun// lha nyid kyi ni gzugs ji bzhin// shes rab
253b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po gzugs chen po/ / 'bar bcas mdzes pa'i gzi brjid can// da yi lte ba'i dkyil du mi// sngags kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rten// sku ni gser gyi mdog dang 'dra// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par
253b2(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / rang gi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs// du ma'i gzugs kyi gzus ldan pa// shes rab pha rol phyin ma ni// sems can khams ni rnam skyong mdzad// kun nas sems can rnams kyi yum// sems
253b3(rgyud 'bum): can kun gyi thams cad du/ / thams cad lus la mnyam par khyab// sems kyi rgyun bzhin legs par bzhugs// zag pa med cing bsam mi khyab// dri ma med cing ngang gis stong // nam mkha' dang
253b4(rgyud 'bum): ni mtshungs 'dra ba/ / dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs// thog ma tha ma med cing zhi// chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug sku// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// bden pa gnyis la rnam par gnas//
253b5(rgyud 'bum): kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don// chos kyi sku ru de bshad do// dbang po kun kyang rnam par shes// sems dang thams cad thams cad du// yid kyi rnam shes zhes su bshad// shes rab blo dang blo gros dram/
253b6(rgyud 'bum): lhag mthong dang ni ye shes kun// kun nas nyon mongs mi mthun phyogs// rtag dang chad pa'i mtha' dang ldan// mtha' gnyis po ni rnam par spangs// kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don// rnam pa gnyis su de
253b7(rgyud 'bum): rab brtags/ / ji ltar bud shing la brtan nas// mi yi sa bon gnas pa dang // til la til mar ji bzhin no// bur shing ro bzhir rab tu brtag/ me tog dri ni ji bzhin nam// yol mar gsar ji bzhin du//
254a1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes srub// bdud rtsi lta bu'i snying po 'byung // gtsub shing dang ni gtsub stan las// ji bzhin gtsubs pas me 'byung ste// de bzhin ye shes rnal 'byor
254a2(rgyud 'bum): pas/ bsrubs pas yongs su brtag par bya// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la// yang nas yang du bsrub par bya// mun pa thams cad rnam sel ba'i// nyi ma'i 'od zer ji bzhin bdag
254a3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i dri ma med rten nas/ / nyi ma zla ba ji bzhin gnas// 'char ba yi ni gsal byed pa// 'bar ba stong phrag gi ni snod// mun pa kun 'joms skar ma la// kun nas kyang ni mdzes pa yin/
254a4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pas ni ji ltar sems// mkha' bzhin shin tu dri ma med// gzung 'dzin las ni nges par grol// mnyam dang mi mnyam dngos po kun// der gnas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis// ye
254a5(rgyud 'bum): shes nyi zla mtshungs pa'i 'od/ / shes rab pha rol phyin bsgoms te// gsang sngags 'di ni bsam par bya// rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa'i dngos// rang bzhin med par rnam par gnas// rang bzhin
254a6(rgyud 'bum): gyis ni 'od gsal kun/ / 'dod nas ma skyes rnyog pa med// yi ge de nyid de lta bu// gnas dang mi gnas rnam par spangs// sde tshan bzhi pa'i gnyis pa la// thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan//
254a7(rgyud 'bum): de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ste// shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad// oM dz+nyA swA hA/ oM swA hA/ oM shru ti smr-i ti bi dza ye swA hA/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab 'dis// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs
254b1(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi yum// de nyid 'khor los rnam par sbyar// 'dis ni dngos grub thams cad dang // grub pa nyid ni byed par gnas// bstan bcom rab tu 'chang byed dang /
254b2(rgyud 'bum): shes bya thams cad khyad par du// thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams kun// dbang phyug dam pas shes par 'gyur// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so//
254b3(rgyud 'bum): shes rab pha rol phyin gnyis pa// rdzu 'phrul chen po mkha' dang mnyam// gser gyi mdog can 'bar ba can// zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs// brtson 'grus chen po bsam gtan bya//
254b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi yi ge rnam par brgyan// mchog tu rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// sangs rgyas spyan zhes btags pa yis// de yi gsang sngags rab bshad bya// nyon cig sa rnams 'dod pa rnams// sngags
254b5(rgyud 'bum): ni.oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ 'di de mchog tu gsang ba ni// rnal 'byor ma la mchod du bshad// dam chen yi ge'i mthar thug pa// bsgoms pas dge ba rab tu
254b6(rgyud 'bum): ster/ chos kyi phyag rgya 'di shin tu// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// dpung dang bcas pa myur bkug ste// bran du gyur nas nye bar gnas// phyag rgya gcig pa'i lha mo che// rol cing g.yo ba'i
254b7(rgyud 'bum): zhal mnga' ba/ / sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// rol ci snang ba'i gar mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyan ni 'grub par 'gyur// mig gi phyag rgya rab tu sbyar// mig gi phyag rgya 'di shin tu// 'jig
255a1(rgyud 'bum): rten gsum yang gar byed do/ / sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// chu yi dkyil 'khor dgas pa na// bcud kyis len dang mtshungs pa'i mchog
255a2(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas rgyas shing langs pa yi/ / dri ma med pa'i mkha' la gnas// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// lha mo mchog tu mdzes pa mo// 'dam bu mngar rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar// grub ma ral pa
255a3(rgyud 'bum): cod pan 'chang / / 'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad ma// rtag tu nam mkha' bzhin du gnas// sngags ni/ oM a ka Te bi ka Te ka TaM ka Te swA hA/ gos dkar mo yi phyag rgya che// dung dang kun zla
255a4(rgyud 'bum): ba 'dra/ / sngags kyi yi ge 'phreng ba che// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas// 'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad na// sgrub pa pos ni bsgrub par bya// dam pa'i lha mo 'grub par 'gyur// pad+ma'i dkyil
255a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs/ / zhi ba'i yi ge mnyam par ldan// zhi bar mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi// sa gsum sgrub par byed pa'i thabs// gos dkar mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// / sngo bsangs
255a6(rgyud 'bum): dkar mo sna tshogs gzugs/ / rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// sgeg pa'i nyams kyis yongs gang ba// 'gro ba mtha' dag skyob mdzad ma// thugs rje'i
255a7(rgyud 'bum): thugs dang ldan pa can/ / rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya// rol pa yini yi gas mchod// sngags ni/ oM tA re tud+hA re tu re swA hA/ chos kyi phyag rgya mtha' yas mchog/ sgrol mas legs par rnam
255b1(rgyud 'bum): par gnas/ / gsang chen bzhin du thams cad la// bcud kyis len dang 'dra ba'i mchog/ kun tu kun tu thams cad du// dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad// sgrol ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so//
255b2(rgyud 'bum): / dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su mi// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo mchog/ phyag bzhi spyan ni gsum pa dang // ral pa'i cod pan dag gis brgyan// 'dam bu mnga' rgyun
255b3(rgyud 'bum): mdog ltar dkar/ / dpa' ba la sogs nyams kyis brgyan// brtson 'grus chen mo 'jigs sel ma// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rab tu 'bar ba'i me bzhin du// shin tu
255b4(rgyud 'bum): gsal ba'i gzi brjid can/ / hUM gi yi ge zab mo'i sgra// sa gsum po ni 'khrugs par mdzad// khro gnyer can zhes legs par grags// sngags kyi 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// sngags ni/
255b5(rgyud 'bum): oM b+ha ya nA sha ni/ trA sa ni tA sa/ tra sa ya/ b+hI ku TaM ta DaM be tA Di be ra Ti shwe te shwe ta dzi Tin/ oM Tak+ki hUM dzaHswA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni brtson 'grus che// gsang sngags kun gyi bdag nyid mchog/
255b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba kun kyang mgu byang na// gdug pa'i sems lha spros ci dgos// khro gnyer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
255b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje ldan/ / rdo rje'i 'phreng bas yongs su bskor// gzi brjid dkyil 'khor kun nas dkris// der gnas rtag tu lha mo ni// stobs chen pri yang gu ltar ldang // phyag bzhi pa der bsam par bya/
256a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rnal 'byor ma rnams cher zhi ba// dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ma// sngags kyi yi ge 'phreng ba che// rdo rje'i dbus song rab tu
256a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / khro bo hUM mdzad gang ba'i mtha'// dpa' ba'i nyams la sogs par ldan// lha mo 'jig rten gsum rmongs byed// dngos grub chen po rab stsol ma// skad cig tsam gyis 'gro ba kun
256a3(rgyud 'bum): nges par dbang du byed par 'gyur/ / rdo rje'i rlung gi 'phreng ba che// rdo rje'i 'khor la rab tu gnas// 'jigs pa chen po'i me ltar drag/ snang ba chen po stobs po che// pad+ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra// rdo rje 'bar
256a4(rgyud 'bum): bas rnam par brgyan/ / mtshan ni mA ma kI zhes bya// lha mo 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod// sngags ni/ oM ku la d+hA tI ye na maHshaM ka re/ shAn+tiM ka re/ g+huT+Ta g+hun+ta g+hur+b+hi ni g+hA ta ya g+hur+t+ti ni swA hA/
256a5(rgyud 'bum): oM ku lan+d+ha ri/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni don gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yin// sa gsum po ni 'gugs byed cing // tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams kun// 'gro ba
256a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'gugs byed la/ / rang gi dbang du gnas pa rang yin// mA ma kI'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// / rlung gi dkyil 'khor drag po la// rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis bskor// de yi dbus su snang
256a7(rgyud 'bum): ba che/ / zla ba'i gzugs kyis rnam par brgyan// de spros pa las bdag nyid ni// rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi sku// phyag bzhi ma la lha mo de// rdo rje yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan// dmar po 'bar ba de yis ni// sa
256b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum po ni 'ching bar mdzad/ / tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// bkug nas dbang du mdzad par gnas// dngos grub thams cad 'dzin pa dang // de yi thugs kar rdo rje che// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs
256b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'od/ / de yi 'bar ba lcags sgrog gi/ rnam pa rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan// nges par phyung nas de dag kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// 'jig rten khams na mtha' dag tu//
256b3(rgyud 'bum): kun nas rnam par bkang nas kyang // bsgom bya rdo rje thams cad du// khro bo dang ldan spro ba'i zhal// lte ba 'phyang zhing sku che ba// mche ba bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// 'bar ba yi ni 'phreng ba gsal// gzugs
256b4(rgyud 'bum): mdzes drag po'i gzugs dang ldan/ / sngags ni/ oM badz+ra shrI kha lA yA d+hi pa ta ye/ ma hA ba lA ya/ mahA bi d+yA rA dzA ya te pra dz+wa li ta/ has+thA ya na ni la kar+N+Na ya ki ra ta rU pa lam po da rA ya/ b+hU b+hI ku Ti mu khA ya/
256b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzA ra mu khA ya/ tsa tur daMSh+T+rA ka rA lA ya/ e h+ye hi a s+ya ra shi rA ra/ ma nu pra wi sh+ya shi r-i gr-ih+Na/ grI bA gr-ib+da/ dAs+thA pa daM gr-ih+Na bi Sha/ A be sha ya/ kaM pa ya kaM pa ya/ b+hU ma b+h+ra ma ya/ maN+Da la me d+h+ye/
256b6(rgyud 'bum): kuH bi kraH/ srAts+tshuSh+Ta/ n+d+hek+ShaH/ Ta ya stA Tas/ / dz+dzaT+TA/ 5/ sUH/ bal ba/ kis+thir ya si/ ba/ nAg+sa/ 5/ rak+Sha.a/ bi shA n+ta ma~M/ sems ma u0f7f8/
256b7(rgyud 'bum): rum+ba ra swA hA/ ni d+hin d+hi/ rnaM'i mo Shi/ badz+ra shaM ka lA/ Ar+yA pa ya ti swA hA/ oM badz+ra ra~MNi hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ni hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kA mo sU Ta swAhA/ gsang sngags 'di la sbyor ba yis// bcud kyis len
257a1(rgyud 'bum): ni bde ba dang / / 'gro ba thams cad 'bebs pa dang // gdug pa rnams ni 'ching ba dang // tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams dang // lha dang lha min lto 'phye che// 'jig rten skyong dang
257a2(rgyud 'bum): klu rnams kyang / / rang gi gnas nas bskyod nas ni// grub pa kun gyi dngos grub ni// dngos grub 'gugs par 'dod pa yi// thams cad gus pas sbyin par byed// bud med gzugs kyis sgrub par byed/
257a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje lug rgyud ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+ma dmar pos rab tu gnas// phyag bzhi pa la du ma'i gzugs// dung dang kun nga zla ba 'dra/
257a4(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi rdo rje'i ngo nyid yin// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// zhi ba la sogs nyams dang ldan// chos rnams kun gyis bdag skyes mchog/ rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu sgom// sangs rgyas
257a5(rgyud 'bum): mtha' las yang dag 'byung / / der bdag yang dag sgom pa ni// skul byed ma zhes yongs su grags// sngags kyi 'phreng ba'i yi ge ni// kun nas 'phro ba mu tig 'dra// nam mkha'i khams ni yongs
257a6(rgyud 'bum): gang ba/ / ji srid de yi spyod yul yang // de srid de yi 'od zer sgom// rnal 'byor ye shes kyis rab sbrul// sngags ni/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun+da swA hA/ 'di yi sngags kyi mchog gtso bo// sangs rgyas
257a7(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi mchod pa po/ / mtshungs pa med pa'i dngos grub ster// lha dang lha min bcas pas mchod// 'di yis sdig kun 'dzad byed cing // phun sum tshogs kun rab stsol mdzad// pad+ma'i phyag rgya
257b1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag ldan/ / sangs rgyas nyid kyang sbyin par mdzad// skul byed ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// / gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// sangs
257b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyus kun bdag dgyes pa ni/ / rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma yi zab
257b3(rgyud 'bum): sdom 'dod chags med cing chags bral med/ / dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya// 'di ni gnyis mang theg pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las// bud med sgyu
257b4(rgyud 'bum): ma khyad par 'phags/ / rang bzhin nyid kyis de grub pa// nus pa yis ni rang bzhin gyis// 'jig rten gsum gyi bud med 'dir// bkur bar bya bar 'os ma yin// ngan spyod rnams kyis kyang
257b5(rgyud 'bum): 'grub ste/ / rnyed pa kun dang bde dang spro// thams cad bud med sgyu mas 'grub// rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur ba// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di// shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad// kun las
257b6(rgyud 'bum): tshogs phyag rgya ni/ / kun la sna tshogs sdom pa yis// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par sbyor// stong pa nyid kyi de nyid bskul// kun la kun nas thams cad du// kun tu kun nas rang nyid kyis// sangs
257b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thams cad brtan dang g.yo/ / thams cad dngos po rang nyid 'gyur// sems dang sems can ting 'dzin dang // byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid// sa dang pha rol phyin spyod pa// dbang nyid du
258a1(rgyud 'bum): yang de bshad do/ / bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid// sangs rgyas rdo rje de bzhin gshegs/ thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// byang chub sangs rgyas bcom ldan de'o// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin
258a2(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid/ / pad+ma de bzhin pad+ma 'dzin// nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa nyid// sna tshogs de bzhin sna tshogs 'dzin// ral gri ral gri 'dzin rgyal po/ 'khor lo de bzhin 'khor lo 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum
258a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal nyid dang ni/ / 'di rnams kyi yang rigs nyid 'gyur// de nyid chags dang chags bral ba// 'dod dang thar pa ru yang 'gyur// dus gsum dang ni srid gsum mchog/ 'jig rten gsum dang /
258a4(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum pa// brtan pa thams cad de nyid de// rnam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur// g.yo ba kun nas sna tshogs pa// thams cad du ni de 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa sna tshogs mchog/
258a5(rgyud 'bum): chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa// dngos po kun tu de 'gyur ro// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// nam mkha'
258a6(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi skabs na dpal/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dpal ldan sgyu ma chen po 'chang // rnam snang rtag pa thams cad du// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso chen khyab// sangs rgyas 'khor
258a7(rgyud 'bum): lo can mi bskyod/ / che dang rin chen 'byung stobs che// tshe dpag med pa kun nas mchog/ don yod sna tshogs mdzad pa dang // rdo rje sems dpa' blta na sdug/ dgug pa mchog gi sbyor ba dang // legs/
258b1(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad par nyid yin/ rin chen sgrol ma de bzhin tog/ rdo rje bzhang ba snang ba che// rdorje chos dang rno ba cha/ rgyu dang sgra mchog bdud ci dang // las dang rgo da kyi// khu tshur de bzhin gshegs
258b2(rgyud 'bum): pa kun/ / de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// rdo rje sems dpa' stobs po che// rdo rje hUM mdzad mdzad dang // rta mgrin zhes ni rnam par grags// he ru ka dpal rdo rje che// mchog gi gshin rje gshin rjeg shed//
258b3(rgyud 'bum): khro bo gzegs ma snang ba che// rdo rje mi ni 'od chen po// gzugs rnams kyi ni mchog gcig tu// ting nge 'dzin las dbang sgyur ma// shes rab pha rol phyin mchog gtso// sa dang pha rol phyin pa stobs//
258b4(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen po bzhi// dbang ni mchog tu 'bar ba dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi// dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang // rjes dran drug por gyur pa gang // bsgom par bya ba rab tu
258b5(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / de nyid bcom ldan gcig pu ste// byang chub yan lag bdun brtags pa// mtha' gcig yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog gi mtshan// 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam
258b6(rgyud 'bum): po che/ 'phags lam yan lag brgyad brtags pa// stobs bcu yi ni bcu pa nyid// sangs rgyas chos kyis bdag nyid nas// byang chub phyogs kyi chos chen po// rnam par dbye ba sum cu bdun//
258b7(rgyud 'bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug ni// dgu la gnas par 'gyur ba dang // bsdu ba'i dngos po chen po bzhi// sems can bsdu bas sdud pa dang // so so yang dag rig pa bzhi// de bzhin srung ba mi
259a1(rgyud 'bum): mnga' ba/ / skal ba chen po'i mi 'jigs pa// mchog tu gyur pa nyid dang ni// bsam gtan gzugs med bzhi phrag gnyis// tshad med pa yang de bzhin mo// byang chub kyi ni
259a2(rgyud 'bum): skye mchog gtso/ / bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po// nyon mongs can gyi mi mthun phyogs// zag bcas zag pa med pa'i mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// dbang phyug mchog gi dbang phyug dab/
259a3(rgyud 'bum): skyeskyo dgu'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon// mchog gi bdag nyid dbyangs bdag po// kun rdzogs brjod pa thams cad dang // sgra rnams kyi ni spyod yul 'gyur// brjod du med cing spros pa bral// stong
259a4(rgyud 'bum): pa mkha' mnyam mtshungs pa med/ / tshig mtha' sgra yi rnam dgod pa// 'jig rten tha snyad tshul du gtogs// de tshe lus sogs dbye ba yis// sa rnams kyi ni yongs su brtags// sku ni sprul pa
259a5(rgyud 'bum): nyid du 'gyur/ / mongs spyod rdzogs pa yang dag brnyes// rdo rje'i sku dang de bzhin du// ye shes sku sogs yongs su brtags// mthara' yas sku dang sku chen po// rin chen sku ni 'od byed pa// pad+ma'i sku ni
259a6(rgyud 'bum): snang ba che/ / thams cad sku ni las bzang byed// rtogs par bya ba las kyi sku// rnam pa gsum du'ang dbye bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// byang chub sems ni 'od gsal ba/ kun tu 'od kyi
259a7(rgyud 'bum): sa chen po/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gzi brjid ldan// gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya// zla ba'i 'od ni 'od gsal ba// gsum pa nam mkha' 'od ces bya// mkha' bzhin legs par rab tu gnas/
259b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i 'od mtha' gang zhig sa// bzhi pa de ni yid 'ong ba// bsam pa brtan pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje zhes ni yongs su bsgrags// lnga pa rin chen mod ces bya// dbang bskur ba ni rab tu gnas// drug pa
259b2(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo 'chang zhes bya/ / pad bzhin rab tu rnam par snang // rang bzhin gyis ni chos nyid dag/ bdag gi med cing yongs bzung med// bdun pa las kyis zhes bya// sangs rgyas 'phrin las mdzad pa che// brgyad pa
259b3(rgyud 'bum): dpe med pa zhes bya/ / dpe ni de la yod ma yin// dgu pa dpe dang bral zhes bya// dpe rnams thams cad rab 'jug pa// bcu pa shes rab 'od ces bya// sangs rgyas sa ni bla na med// bcu gcig kun
259b4(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen nyid ces bya/ / sa chen po ni 'od gsal ba// bcu gnyis so sor bdag rig pa// rnal 'byor ye shes yongs rdzogs nyid// sa chen po ni 'di dag rnams// sangs rgyas rnams kyis don dam du//
259b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas chos// rnal 'byor ye shes gang brjod pa// thams cad nyid ni mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying
259b6(rgyud 'bum): po rgyun gyi rgyud chen po las/ / sngags kyi de kho na nyid do// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa chos kyi 'khor mo
259b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po bskor ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi de ma thag nyid du
260a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i de ma thag tu yang bcom ldan 'das
260a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje la rjes su bcug nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi lus dang / ngag dang / yid mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs nas mnyam par bzhugs so//
260a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid rtogs nas ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
260a4(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal to/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yod do zhes gsungs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par
260a5(rgyud 'bum): gyur to/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi bla bas kyis stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
260a6(rgyud 'bum): sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lnga nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas btud de 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs kyi theg pa chen po
260a7(rgyud 'bum): mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang du zhugs pas/ sems can rnams thabs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba bka' stsal du
260b1(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam
260b2(rgyud 'bum): tshig la rjes su zhugs pa ni 'jam dpal khyod legs so legs so/ / de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya'o//
260b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig chen po rdo rjes
260b4(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis rlob pa theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bka' stsal pa/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog/
260b5(rgyud 'bum): snying po chen po'i rgyan ces bya// klu bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya// thig bzhi dang ni mnyam par ldan// 'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje snying po yongs bcug pa//
260b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub shing gis nye bar mdzes// rdo rje dkyil 'khor grwa rnams dang // sgo yi logs kyi mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// rdo rje pad+ma thams cad du// las kyi rdo rje thams cad du/
260b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// dril bcas sna tshogs mchog dang ldan// rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba rlung bskyod pa'i// gos dang me tog chun pos spras// zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes// ral gri lha
261a1(rgyud 'bum): bur ut+pa la/ / lcags kyu la sogs sna tshogs rgyan// chu yis dkyil 'khor yongs bskor ba// mu khyud bzhin du rnam par gnas// de la'ang sgo logs la sogs pa/
261a2(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pa yis ni spro bar bya// de yi nang du brI bya ba// 'khor lo chen po rab tu gnas// cha brgyad dang ni yongs su ldan// dkyil 'khor legs pa rnam par spras// rdo rje'i thig dang yongs su ldan/
261a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i 'khor lo char 'bar ga/ de yi dbus su snying po che// rdo rje'i snying po zhes su bshad// de yi steng du rdo rje che// rdo rje pad+ma rab tu gnas// pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje che// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dag
261a4(rgyud 'bum): gis brgyan/ / dung dang kun da zla ba dkar// sangs rgyas kun gyi gdan du bshad// de yi steng du legs bzhugs pa// khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad che// zla ba'i mdog ldan 'dzum bcas pa// ting
261a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin ldan ni sdig pa bcom/ / rdo rje'i 'phreng bas rnam par spras// sna tshogs 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// rin chen chen po'i 'phreng ba ches// spras pa rnam par dgod par bya// de sngags rtag tu
261a6(rgyud 'bum): shes bya ba/ / yi ge yi ni mchog gtso bo// sa yi sted dang ldan pa g.yas// mchog gi dbang phyug rgya gcig pu// drug pa'i dbyangs kyis legs gsal ba// thig le nA das legs par brgyan//
261a7(rgyud 'bum): rten cing 'brel 'byung 'khor lo yis// don can rab tu bskyed par bya// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'a byor can// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// chos kyi sku ni ye shes che// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug
261b1(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa ye shes kyi 'od zer dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par gnod
261b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje nyid du rang gi bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i phyogs thams
261b3(rgyud 'bum): cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir 'khod do/ / dbang chen dkyil 'khor mi bskyod pa// me yi dkyil 'khor ye shes 'od// chu yi dkyil 'khor 'od dpag med// rdo rjes rnam gnon rlung
261b4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i dam tshig las 'byung ba sems dpa' byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
261b5(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po'i rgyun gyi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas
261b6(rgyud 'bum): phyung ba'o/ / oM badz+ra satwa/ de nas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs ka nas rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams phyung ste/ rdo rje'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig can gyi khams
261b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad snang bar byas te gsal bar gyur nas/ de nas rdo rje'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skus
262a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su gshegs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad de/ sems can thams cad kyi don mngon par rdzogs nas slar yang
262a2(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu 'dus te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i thugs kar gnas te ched du brjod pa 'dis
262a3(rgyud 'bum): ched du brjod pa/ e ma he rdo rje snying po bdag/ sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// snying po ye shes rnam dag pa// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid gyur nas// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed de//
262a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// gang zhig brtan phyir lus min yang // sangs rgyas sku nyid du gyur to// de nas rdo rje'i sku byang chub sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'thon
262a5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i nye 'khor thams cad rnam pa bzhis phye ste/ dkar po/ ser po/ dmar po/ ljang khu'i mdog tu mngon par sprul nas/ rang gi sngags kyi yi ges zla ba'i
262a6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor la brten te gnas par gyur to/ / dgug pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ oM badz+ra rA dza/ rjes su chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra rA ga/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la legs par
262a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra sA d+hu/ de bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni// oM badz+ra rat+na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra tarba/
262b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra ke tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra hAs/ de bzhin du 'od
262b2(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor yang thugs rje'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra d+harma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra tIk+Sh+Na/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin ni
262b3(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra he tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' smra ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra b+hA Sha/ de bzhin du rdo rje don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor la las sna tshogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni
262b4(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra kar+m+ma/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
