262b5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs khur tshur bcangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra san+d+hi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag
262b6(rgyud 'bum): rgya'i dam tshig rdo rje'i dbyings kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas 'di phung ngo // oM badz+ra d+hA tu hUM/ rang gi rig pa mchog ni/
262b7(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra d+hA tI shwa ri hUM/ badz+ra NaM/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob
263a1(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di phyung ba/ oM ak+Sho b+h+yaHa/ oM dz+nyA na muSh+Ti tsit+ta badz+ri Ni hUM/ de bzhin
263a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' sprul pa/
263a3(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra rat+na saM b+ha ba tAM/ oM badz+ra dz+nyA nA gar+b+ha ti hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams
263a4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal
263a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ oM a mi tA b+hA hrIHoM badz+ra d+hA ri Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gnod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor
263a6(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sar+b+ba a mo g+ha sid+d+hi aM/ oM badz+ra ma hA ba le hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de
263a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad yul la rnam par gzigs shing / / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i snying po 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA dz+nyA na
263b1(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di dag bshad pa tsam gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de
263b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i bdag nyid rtogs nas rdo rje mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+ra sa ma tA dz+nyA na bud+d+ha hUM/ de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs
263b3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi snying po rnams phyag na rdo rjer mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po 'di phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba d+harmA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badz+ra hUM
263b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis kyang slar yang phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis brlabs par mdzad nas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du
263b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor par mthong ngo / / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi thugs ka nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po 'di phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba satwa sa ma hA pra bats+tsha
263b6(rgyud 'bum): bud+d+ha hUM/ de nas 'di phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas phyag na rdo rje rnam par phyung ste/ slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na gnas nas bka' nod
263b7(rgyud 'bum): cing 'khong po/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
264a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor rnams la byin gyis rlob par byos shig/ de de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi thugs ka nas
264a2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis brlabs te brtan par gyur nas/ rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha rnams phyung ste/ lha mo de rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi grwa rnams su de bzhin du rnam par gnas
264a3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / sgo rnams su sgo skyong ma rnams dang / mtshams rnamasu bzug dang / lga dang rjing / ro dang / reg bya rnams bshad do// de dag gi sngags su gyur pa ni/ oM badz+ra me g+hA nA~M nA~M/ 'khor lo'i mtshams su gzhag
264a4(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / oM sne ha badz+ra Ni haM/ oM badz+ra sha rang badz+ra aM aM/ oM badz+ri Ni kI li kI li hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa chen po'i mchod pa phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa dang / mtshams rnams
264a5(rgyud 'bum): su dri rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye bar gnas par dgod par bya'o/ / oM badz+ra gan+d+he hUM/ oM ma d+ha badz+ri Ni hUM/ b+hu g+h+raM/ oM ma nod b+ha ba bidz+ri Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra shi shi ra ho ho/
264a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rol pa chen po'i lha mo'i sgo'i mtshams rnams su gzugs la sogs pa'i.oM badz+ra d+hU pe/ oM badz+ra shab+da/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he/ oM badz+ra ra sa/ oM badz+ra s+phar she
264a7(rgyud 'bum): mnyes par byed pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu dga' bde rdo rje'i snying po ni/ oM sa ma ya hoHsu r-i ta s+t+waM/ dga' bde chen po'o rdo rje'i snying po 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa
264b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kun nas mnyes pas dkyil 'khor thams cad la brtan par gyur nas/ dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzod// dgug dang legs par rab gnas dang // ji bzhin gnas su
264b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba nyid/ / kun nas dgyes mdzad sangs rgyas kun// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin dge/ sngags kyi tshig rnams kyang / oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wan badz+ra aM ku sha dzaHoM pra be sha hUM
264b3(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te/ oM sa ma ye ban+d+ha tiSh+Tha b+ha ga wan/ oM tuny+tsa hoH/ b+ha ga wAn badz+ra A be sha aH/ 'di dag ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sgo'i 'phrin las so// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor 'dri ba la
264b4(rgyud 'bum): byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / kun tu bzang po dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dgod par bya'o// sngon du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
264b5(rgyud 'bum): gas slob ma bcug ste dbang bskur ba la sogs pa byas/ slob ma dang bcas pas thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o// de la dang po
264b6(rgyud 'bum): nar re zhig dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon ni dam tshig thams cad shes pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos dngos grub thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa
264b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa/ rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug lta bu/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya la bslab par bya'o// de nas
265a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar 'gyur ba ni skyil krung bcas nas/ dri la sogs pa rnams kyis phyag rgya bcing ba rab tu bsgrub par bya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje bsdams
265a2(rgyud 'bum): pa byas te sor mo phan tshun bcings nas skyil krung gi dbus su rdo rje bsdams pa bzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni gar gyi sbyor bas so//
265a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid de rkeng pa'i phyogs su bzung ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar bzung ba ni rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid mnga' 'phen pa lta bu'i
265a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba ni rdo rje mnga'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las legs so ba sbyin pas rgyab tu 'jog pa ni rdo rje legs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid dpral bar 'jog pa ni rdo rje rin
265a5(rgyud 'bum): chetshon gyi phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje bsdams pa la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor ba ni rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor sbyar ba ni tog gi phyag rgya'o// kha'i thang du
265a6(rgyud 'bum): bskor ba ni rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid kha'i thad du bskor ba ni rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid snying khar byas pa ni rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid 'kho lo ltar yongs su bskor
265a7(rgyud 'bum): ba ni rdo rje rgyu'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid snying khar sgreng ba ni rdo rje smra ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid gar nyid du ston pa ni las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis spyi bo dang
265b1(rgyud 'bum): snying kha dang / mgrin par 'jog pa ni rdo rje srung ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa 'gram pa gnyis su 'jog pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid snying khar bcangs pa ni dziH
265b2(rgyud 'bum): khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du sgeg mo dang bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i sbyor bas lha mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// rol cing rnam par dgod pa dang // sgeg dang snying
265b3(rgyud 'bum): rje'i bdag nyid dang / / dpa' dang khro sogs chos bdag nyid// rang nyid zhi ba'i bdag nyid nyams// phyag rgya thams cad rab tu sbyar// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// bdag nyid rdo rje'i ga
265b4(rgyud 'bum): byed dam/ / skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya bcing ba rab tu sbyar// thams cad grub par 'dod sogs kyis// skyil krung sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// de phyir gnyis med rdo rje can/
265b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyi drang po'i sku// sgeg pa'i sbyor ba'i rdo rje can// sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi ba'i spyan// bsnyems bcas rdo rje can gyir dgongs// sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje can// ting 'dzin dbye ba
265b6(rgyud 'bum): las shes bya/ / 'khrugs pa'i lha stangs khro rnams kyi// btsun mo rnams kyi rol pa nyid// 'jig rten pa yi wa rnams dang // bsdigs spyod rnams kyi lta stangs te// chos rnams kun gyi rjes
265b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa'i/ / shugs kyi lha stangs phyag rgya'o// tshogs dang po nya pho nya mo'i// lha stangs rnam pa sna tshogs nyid// mchu yi phyag rgya yongs ldan pa// g.yo ba med cing mi 'gul ba// sangs rgyas
266a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// mtshams sbyor cung zad yang dag ldan// rnam 'gyur med cing mtshungs med gnas// rol pa'i yi ge yang dag
266a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ mchu yi phyag rgya rdo rje can// rnam 'gyur can dang 'khor ba can// khro bas su ni yongs su bsdams// 'di ni khro ba'i phyag rgyar bshad// mchu yi phyag rgya gzugs mdzes can// 'jig rten pa
266a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams mchu'i phyag rgya/ / rnam 'gyur 'jig cing gzugs dang bral// shin tu gnag dka'i 'dod chags dang // sdang dang rmongs las thams cad du// rol cing rnam 'khor dang ldan pa// g.yo bcas
266a4(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'phro ba yang / / mchu yi phyag rgyar shes par bya// lha mo pho nya tshogs kyi yang // de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ lha stangs mchu la sogs pa'i ming // phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdu ba//
266a5(rgyud 'bum): skyob pa rnams kyi kun shes bya// ji srid sku yi dbye ba dang // dbang po la sogs rab dbye dang // de dag phyag rgya sna tshogs mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi brtags pa nyid// sna tshogs sku ni gzi brjid che//
266a6(rgyud 'bum): tshad med yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid gsang ba zhes bya
266a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dkyi 'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs so/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par dbang
266b1(rgyud 'bum): bskur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bka' stsal pa/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya/
266b2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs khams ni bsam yas mchog/ dar dang me tog chun pos brgyan// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// sna tshogs pad+mo de bzhin gzhan// dkyil 'khor de mi dbus su mi// sangs rgyas
266b3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs yid 'ong ba/ / mgon po sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// 'bar ba mchog gis brgyan pa po// de sngags rtags su shes bya ba// dang po'i dbyangs dang gnyis pa'o// de yis nye 'khor brgyad du ma
266b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gram du rtsibs brgyad pa yi yang / / 'khor lo dag ni bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// 'khor lo kun tu 'bar ba gzhag/ 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus su ni// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas
266b5(rgyud 'bum): sgeg sogs sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ / ji ltar sngon bzhin bri bar bya// nye bar mkho ba'i mchod kun gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya// dgug sogs cho ga'i sbyor ba ni// dkyil 'khor snga
266b6(rgyud 'bum): ma ji bzhin no/ / dkyil 'khor nye bar spyod pa kun// cho ga dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i rtog pa'o// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad
266b7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal zhes// bya ba rdo rje hUM mdzad grags// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi nang du 'khor lo ni// dkyil
267a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor brgyad pa lta bu'o/ / de yi dbus su khro bo che// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal yang // khro gnyer ldan zhing smin ma 'khyog/ spyan gsal 'bar ba chen po pa/
267a2(rgyud 'bum): cung zad che ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// rnam par dgod cing slar khro ba// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni// dga' zlog dbang phyug chen po gnon// sangs rgyas 'phreng ba sogs pas spras//
267a3(rgyud 'bum): in+d+ra ni la mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag bzhi pa la spyan gsum pa// zhal bzhi pa la thub par dka'// be con dang ni zhags par mdzod// dang po na ni rdo rjer bshad// gnyis pa zhags pa sdigs
267a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzub can/ / phyag gnyis khu tshur dam pa mchog/ khu tshur gnyis ni rab tu brtag/ mthe'u chung gnyis ni mnyam sbyar ba'o// lu gu rgyud kyis rnam par sbrel// snying khar phyag rgya legs gzhag
267a5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ sdigs mdzub gnyis kyis bsdigs par mdzad// 'jig rten gsum rgyal zhes bya ba'i// phyag rgya mchog tu thub par dka'// sngags ni ming gi de nyid ldan// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas
267a6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par 'khrigs/ / dkyil 'khor de yi gnas rnams su// cha rnams kun tu thams cad nas// phyag rgya thams cad mnyam par bri// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyam gnas par// ral gri 'khor
267a7(rgyud 'bum): lo gzhu dang mnga'/ / de bzhin du ni dgra sta nyid// de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas mchog/ mdor bsdus nas ni phyag rgya dgod// de ltar khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par bkod nas nye bar
267b1(rgyud 'bum): mkho ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o/ / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'idakyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang ngag rab
267b2(rgyud 'bum): tu bshad bya ba/ / sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes su bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// dar dang me tog chun pos brgyan// de dbus dkyil 'khor chen po ni// chu
267b3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i ming can no/ / de yi dbus su pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba// zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i mdog/ ral pa'i cod pan
267b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa can/ / phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// sangs rgyas 'phreng ba sogs pas spras// sku rnams thams cad kun nas spro// mtha' yas rab 'byams rgya
267b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i/ / chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam la// de yi sngags su yongs grags pa// sha Sha'i sde yi mtha' dge ba// kA yig don ldan sngon byung ba// rgyu yi don du rab sgrub byed// bzhi pa'i
267b6(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs kyis spyi bor mnan/ / me yi sa bon gsal bar byed// thig le sgra ni mchog tu sbyin// 'jig rten dbang phyug ces bya'i mtshan// de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad// pad+ma'i thal mo rab tu brkyang
267b7(rgyud 'bum): bris pa'i phyag rgyar yang dag bshad/ / dbyug gu'i ril ba spyi blugs bri/ mdun du bgrang 'phrang pad+ma yi// rgyal po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhag/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ phyag rgya mchog
268a1(rgyud 'bum): tu'abar de dag/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// ji ltar rigs pa dgod par bya// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba// dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyal po'o//
268a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ gzhan ni rab tu bshad par bya// dpa' bo rin chen snying po yi// rdo rje rin chen zhes su bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// cha babs bzhis ni mdzes par
268a3(rgyud 'bum): byas/ de yi dbus su rin chen che// yan lag brgyad pa mchog tu 'bar// de dbus rin chen pad+ma ni// rin chen 'phreng bas rnam par mdzes// de dbus ma ra ka ta 'dra// rin chen rdo rje cher 'bar
268a4(rgyud 'bum): ba/ sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// rin chen 'phreng bas rnam par mdzes// mdun du kun gyi dbang bskur gtso// rin chen de yi gtso bo mchog/ g.yas su pad+ma rA ga ste// rgyab tu in+d+ra nI
268a5(rgyud 'bum): la'o/ / yid bzhin nor bu rin chen g.yon// phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs mchog/ sna tshogs rin chen rnam par brgyan// dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa bzhi ni// gnas rnams su ni gzhag par bya// sangs
268a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis/ / de yi sngags su yongs grags pa// bzhi pa'i sde yi dang po gang // me yi sa bon gyis gsal byas// dbyangs kyi gnyis pas kun nas mnan// dbang sgyur ba ni
268a7(rgyud 'bum): steng du gnas/ / de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad// rin chen snyim pa rgyab bskums te// rin chen rnam pa legs 'byung ba// de ni rdo rje rin chen no// rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ro//
268b1(rgyud 'bum): nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rdo rje 'phreng bas rnam par mdzes
268b2(rgyud 'bum): de yi dbus su zhal bzhi pa'i/ / 'khor lo bzhi ni yongs bskor ba'o// de yi dbus su pad chen po'o// kha dog sna tshogs yongs 'bar ba// de yi dbus su brtson chen po// rdo rje'i gzugs ni yongs
268b3(rgyud 'bum): su bri/ / rdo rje khur 'dzin mdzes pa ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che// sangs rgyas 'phreng bar rnam par mdzes// de yi sngags ni yang dag bshad// bcu
268b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa yi dbyangs kyi mtha'/ / mya ngan 'das don legs gsal bya// sgeg sogs rig ma thams cad kyis// de bzhin rang gi phyag rgya yis// rdo rje'i thig le yongs su ldan// sna tshogs
268b5(rgyud 'bum): bkra ba mchog tu 'bar/ / de yi dbang bskur phyag rgya yis// mchod pa kun gyis thams cad nas// kun nas yongs su bskor ba yis// las kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro//
268b6(rgyud 'bum): / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// shes rab ye shes 'khor lo che// sngags kyi yi ges rnam par brgyan// de yi dbus su pad chen po// 'dab
268b7(rgyud 'bum): ma brgyad pa shin tu mdzes/ / de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// gzhon nu sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa// sku mdog dmar zhing 'dzum bcas pa// sna tshogs gzugs can ral gri can// phyag bzhi pa la zhal
269a1(rgyud 'bum): ban pa/ / ral gA'i 'byung bas rnam par brgyam// gsang sngags can pa y-i ge wa// dzam drung dra lags par gnas// dbyangs dang smra ba kun nas ngon// thugs ts+tsha
269a2(rgyud 'bum): ni yang dag gnas/ phyi rol nyid ni zla bzhin no// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldam/ rta babs bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor// sgo gcig gis mi shin tu mdzes// shes rab pa rom phyin pa nyid/ la
269a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dbus su ni/ / gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod ma// 'bang pa yis ni bri bar bya// sngon du bshad pa'i tshig yis// mchod sogs cho ga rgyas pa nyid// gzugs pa'i cho ga de bzhin du/
269a4(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar dkyil 'khor 'dir mthong bzhin// shes rab ye shes dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/
269a5(rgyud 'bum): chababs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig pa ni yis ni yang dag ldan// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yang nang du bri bya ba// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// rten cing 'brel 'byung 'phreng ba ni/
269a6(rgyud 'bum): 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// 'khor lo'i dbus su brtson chen po// rdo rje'i rgyu'i stobs po che// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// kha dog nag po gzi brjid che/
269a7(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor mdzad// de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni// rgyu yingon du so sor bskyes// dbyangs drug dang ni yang dag ldan// thig le phyi mos rnam par brgyan// yi ge chen po'i 'phreng ba
269b1(rgyud 'bum): can/ / 'khor lo gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan// de yi mdun du dung yin la// rgyab tu zhags pa brjod par bya// rdo rje'i thal mo phyag rgya che// 'khor lo bzhin du rab tu gnas// mchod pa
269b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rab tu brtag/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// thog mar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// dngos grub thams cad yang
269b3(rgyud 'bum): dga' bar/ / chos kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// thog ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor
269b4(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi thig gdab bo/ / de yi dkyil du snang ba che// mkhar bzhin shin tu 'od gsal ba// sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu bzhugs// zla ba'i mdog can
269b5(rgyud 'bum): gzi rjed ce/ / sna tshogs mtshon cha 'dzin pa'i mchog/ gzhon nu rab tu brjid pa'i zhal// nam mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags// sangs rgyas 'phreng ba sogs pas spras// rdo rje dkyil 'khor rgyun
269b6(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad/ / 'di yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che// dbyangs dgu pa la thig le dang // nA da yis ni rnam par brgyan// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa la// thig le nA ngas rnam par brgyan// gtso bo de yi
269b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags pa yang / nam mkha'i mdzod ni rab skor mdzad// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sngags kyi 'phreng ba mchog ldan pa// ma lus pa yi sa rnams kun// thams cad nas ni na mkha'i
270a1(rgyud 'bum): tshul tog ni phyag rgyar gyur pa de'i/ / de bzhin du ni nges par bcing // de ma'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// nam mkha' yi ni mdzad de la// gal te bdag ni grub 'dong ma
270a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa kun gyis rnam par mchod/ / nam mkha'i mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyor ba
270a3(rgyud 'bum): yis dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab bo/ / dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa// der yang rdo rje 'di yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog tu 'dod// de yi
270a4(rgyud 'bum): dbus su gzi brjid che/ / rdo rje gnod sbyin bla na med// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// pad+ma'i rgyal po la rab gnas// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i lus// 'dud rnams thams cad rab
270a5(rgyud 'bum): 'joms mdzad/ / de sngags yi ger gyur pa na// sha Sha'i sde tshan mthar dge ba// rgyu yi don du legs gsal bya// khro bo'i dkyil khor chen po bskor// sngags kyi yi ge 'phreng ba che// 'bad pa
270a6(rgyud 'bum): yis ni bri bar bya/ / de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje gnod sbyin de yi ni// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// sgyu ma thams cad gzhom par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'o//
270a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshang bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes pa byas// de yi dbus su 'khor lo che// lcags kyu
270b1(rgyud 'bum): yis ni rnam par mdzes/ / dbus su bcom ldan rdo rje rgya// lcags kyu la ni rab tu bzhugs// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams thams cad rab tu 'bar// rdo rje lcags kyu khu tshur che//
270b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba 'phro bas rnam par brgyan// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par mdzad// sngags kyi yi ges legs par sbyar// sha Sha'i sde yi drung gnas pa// byed pa'i rgyu ru legs par gnas// dbyangs
270b3(rgyud 'bum): drug pa yis legs par phye/ / zla phyed thig legs legs par brgyan// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya legs par sbyar// 'gugs par byed la don yod pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//
270b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje lcags kyu mchog tu dge/ dgug pa la sogs thams cad la// 'gro ba 'dul ba yongs su bsdu// don yod rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po
270b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dngos grub dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor
270b6(rgyud 'bum): de yi dbus su ni/ / dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i rnam pa can// de yi dbus su gru gsum grags// lcags kyu mchog tu dge ba'o// de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// rdo rje rgyal po stobs
270b7(rgyud 'bum): po che/ phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// gzi brjid chen po dkar dang dmar// zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin dge ba// de yi gsang sngags yang dag bshad
271a1(rgyud 'bum): don yod 'bras bu stsol ba po/ / sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa ni// gnyis 'gyur nyid du rnam par gnas// de yi thig le mya na 'das// sngags kyi 'phreng ba gzhan gyis bskor/
271a2(rgyud 'bum): sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// sgo skyong ba dang mchod pa yang // sbyor ba ji bzhin rnam par dgod// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad yongs
271a3(rgyud 'bum): su sgrub/ / rdo rje rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rdo rje chags pa zhes su
271a4(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// chags pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// thams cad dmar pos rab dregs pas/
271a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang du byed pa'i dam pa yin// de yi dbus su pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// rdo rje chags pa bri bar bya// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag bzhi pa
271a6(rgyud 'bum): la zhal bzhi pa/ / spyan gsum 'od kyi 'phreng ba can// de yi phyag rgya mchog tu ni// mdzes pa yis ni mda' gzhur 'gyur// rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes pa'i lus// 'gro ba kun la ches mchog 'gyur//
271a7(rgyud 'bum): de yi gsang sngags mdzes gyur pa// rdo rje chags pa mchog tu bde// sha Sha'i sde yi mthar gyur pa// k+Sha yi yi ge'i sngon du gnas// dbyangs dgu pa dang yang dag ldan// sngags kyi 'phreng bas yang
271b1(rgyud 'bum): ngag brgyan/ / me tog mnga' ni yongs su 'phen// re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod byed// rdo rje chags pa'i dkyil 'khor ro//
271b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje legs pa zhes grags pa// gnyis su med pa'i dga' ba'ang 'phel// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta
271b3(rgyud 'bum): babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ / de yi dbus su cher mdzes pa'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa gru bzhi pa// de yi dbus su pad chen po// ze 'bru yis ni nye bar mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni/
271b4(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yang dag 'bar// der gnas dpa' bo bsam par bya// rdo rje legs pa stobs po che// dung dang kun da zla ba dkar// kha ba ba zho'i 'od ltar mdzes// legs so stsol ba tshim
271b5(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad/ / ting nge 'dzin dbang mang po sbyar// rdo rje sgeg mo sogs mchod pa// de bzhin me tog bdug pa sogs// sgo yi skyong ba nyid kyang ni// rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya// de yi sngags gyur
271b6(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa ni/ / gsang ba chen po mchog tu 'bar// lha mi yi ge sngon gang de// sems can don ni rab sgrub byed// thig le gnyis dang yongs su ldan// legs stsol bas ni rnam par gnas// de lta'i
271b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bris nas mi/ mchod pa thams cad rab tu bskor// bdag nyid dag pas gzhug pa sogs// thams cad yongs su spyad par bya// rdo rje legs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro//
272a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje gzi brjid ces su grags// rdo rje nyims blo gros ldan// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis
272a2(rgyud 'bum): ni mdzes par byas/ / thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya// de yi nang du bri bya ba// rdo rje nyi ma 'odang po che// rdo rje nyi ma'i steng du ni// gru gsum rnam pa las byung ba// de yi
272a3(rgyud 'bum): dbus su gzi brjid che/ / 'bar ba yi ni me lta bu// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// me 'bru yis ni shin tu mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje gzi brjid stobs po che// bzang po'i mtshal dang
272a4(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs pa'i 'od/ / rgya skyegs khu ba mtshungs pa'i mdog/ phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// de yi sngags su yongs grags pa// kun nas sangs rgyas mtshungs
272a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i nyid/ / dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yi mtha'// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sngags kyi 'phreng bas yongs su bskor// rang gi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ldan// de lta'i dkyil
272a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bris nas ni/ / sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje gzi brjid dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ yid bzhin no/
272a7(rgyud 'bum): bu'i rgyal mtshan ming // bdag nyid chen po rdo rje tog/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil
272b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ / mchog tu 'bar ba yi ni rlung // zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa 'dra// rin chen rgyal mtshan yongs bsgreng ba// de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po//
272b2(rgyud 'bum): zhal bzhi pa la gzi brjid che// in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// rin chen char pa rab tu 'bebs// phyag bzhi pa la snang ba che// de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che// sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po
272b3(rgyud 'bum): la me yis rab tu gsal byas pa/ / tog gi phyag rgyas yongs su bskor// sngags kyi 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod
272b4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ rdo rje tog gi dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje bzhad pa zhes grags pa// rdo rje bzhad pa mtshungs pa'i 'od// glu
272b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ / rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de dbus zlum po ni// in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od//
272b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin chu ni gzi brjid can// phyag rgya 'khor los rnam par mdzes// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// ston ka'i zla ba 'dra ba'i 'od// 'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad pa// rgyan rnams kun
272b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis brgyan pa po/ / phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// dbang phyug thams cad yang dag ldan// de yi gsang sngags gsang chen po// rgyu yi don du bsgrub par bya// stong pa mngon brjod bsam mi khyab//
273a1(rgyud 'bum): rang ming rtog pas mtshan pa'o// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje bzhad pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas
273a2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dngos grub dkyil 'khor
273a3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bri/ / de yi steng du'ang pad+ma che// pad+ma me las yang dag byung // gru gsum mchog tu mdzes pa po// thor cog dag gis rnam par brgyan// chos dbyings yi ge'i de kho na// thams
273a4(rgyud 'bum): gzi brjid bdag nyid dag/ de yi mdog gi de nyid ni// 'phro ba'i ma ra ka ta 'dra// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kur gyis brgyan pa po// gnyis pa'i mdog tu gyur pa ni//
273a5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// ji srid dag gi 'khor lo ni// smra ba'i dbye bas rab tu gnas// thams cad so sor gsal bar byed// sprin gyi dkyil 'khor mchog rmad byung // de lha'i dkyil
273a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bris nas ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje smra ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor snga ma'i
273a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// de yi dbus su go cha che// rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de yi dbus su brtson chen po// rdo rje srungs par yang dag bri// phyag bzhi pa
273b1(rgyud 'bum): la zhal bzhi pa/ / rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che// thams cad srung ba mchog tu dge/ phyag rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan// gsang ba chen po go 'phang
273b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che// sha Sha'i sde yi mthar gnas mchog/ mgon po'i rgyur ni mngon par brjod// steng du nA das brgyan par bya// kun nas kha dog du ma yis//
273b3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bskor bar bsgom par bya// sngags kyi 'phreng ba yongs su ldan// glog gi 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad rab bsgrub bya/
273b4(rgyud 'bum): rdorje srung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya/
273b5(rgyud 'bum): thig bzhi rang ni yang dag ldan// khu tshur dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// rdo rje pad+ma yid 'ong ba// gzi brjid chen po gser gyi mdog/ 'dab ma brgyad pa yid
273b6(rgyud 'bum): 'ong ba/ / de yi steng du gzi brjid che// rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// kun da dung dang zla ba dkar// khu tshur de bzhin
273b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs kun gyi/ sku dang gsung dang thugs khu tshur// rdo rje nyid du mnyam nyid mchog/ gnyis su med pa mchog gsang ba// khu tshur gyis ni sdud par bshad// de sngags mchog tu
274a1(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba ni/ / brjod du med nyid stsol mdzad pa// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa ni// 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor car// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku// 'di yi sngags
274a2(rgyud 'bum): la rnam par gnas/ / de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje khu tshur mchod par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor ro// / de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas mchog/ dkyil 'khor
274a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu 'bar ba ni/ / chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub stsol bar mdzad// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ de bzhin gru bzhi
274a4(rgyud 'bum): bris nas ni/ / sgo khyud la sogs rnam par spang / rtse gsum snam bu nyid dang ni// dung dang pad+ma sogs pas brgyan// thog mar dbang phyug chen po dgod/ rtse gsum pa yi phyag rgyar ldan
274a5(rgyud 'bum): khyu mchog la zhon mig gsum pa/ / stag gi pags gyon phyag bzhi pa// thal bas byugs shing mgo bo la// ral pa'i tshogs ni rab 'phyang ba// chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// de bzhin gshegs
274a6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad la/ / phyag 'tshal ba de de bri'o// de'i sngags ni/ oM hrI sa suM hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni cher gsang ba// bdag nyid chen po dbang phyug che'i// dbang phyug chen po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so//
274a7(rgyud 'bum): / dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid la// dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su nag po chen po gzhag par bya'o// lag pa stong gi gar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dga' byed dbang phyug dang lhan cig phyag bzhi
274b1(rgyud 'bum): pa lag pa stong gis gnas pa'o/ / rang gi sngags ni/ oM ma hA kA la hUM b+h+yaH/ oM nin+di ka shwa ra hUM b+h+yaH/ 'di bzlas na dngos grub thams cad byed do// dga' byed dbang phyug dang nag po chen po'i
274b2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa'i thabs so/ / / de nyid kyi ni cho ga yis// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi thig gang po bya// der ni pad+ma yang dag bri// pad+ma'i dbus su sbrang rtsi byed// la sogs mthar byed spun
274b3(rgyud 'bum): bri'o/ / gzhu yi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin// sbrang rtsi byed dang rgyal bar byed// nyid kyi sgrub thabs de bzhin no// me tog mda' dang yongs su ldan// rang gi ming rtogs mtshan ma can// sngags ni//
274b4(rgyud 'bum): oM ma d+hA krid+d+ha saM/ oM sA d+hA na sAH/ gsang sngags 'di ni 'dod gzugs can// dbang du byed pa thams cad sgrub// sbrang rtsi rdo rje la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// / dkyil
274b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gru bzhi pa bris nas dbus su thig bzhi gdab bo/ / dbus su tum pu ru'o// shar gyi 'dab mar rgyal ba'o// lho ru rnam par rgyal ba'o// nub tu mi thub pa'o// byang du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o//
274b6(rgyud 'bum): de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bris nas/ go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gsang sngags dgod par bya'o// oM tuM bu ru hUM/ oM dza ye hUM/ oM bi dza ya hUM/ oM a dzi te hUM/ oM a pa rA dzi ta hUM/ dga' ba 'di dag
274b7(rgyud 'bum): lag g.yon du/ / khu tshur g.yon pas rab grub rtsol// 'di yi phyag rgya nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags// lag pa dgod par rab bshad bya// go rims ji lta ba bzhin du// tum
275a1(rgyud 'bum): bu ru ni mthe bor dgod/ / sdigs mdzub la ni rgyal ba gnas// rnam rgyal gung mo nyid la'o// mi thub de bzhin ming med la// gzhan gyis mi thub mthe'u chung la// lag
275a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dbus su yi ge oM/ / dgod bya de nyid lag pa'i rgyab// rdo rje 'phrang ba'i mthar thug tu// dgod par bya ba mchog tu bshad// sbyor dang rnam par dbye ba yang // phyag rgya kun spyod yongs su bsdu//
275a3(rgyud 'bum): so sor brtan par bya ba nyid// sor mo rnams la khyad par du// dbang dang dgug dang rmongs la sogs// rengs byed la sogs go rims bzhin// las rnams dag ni thams cad du// sngags
275a4(rgyud 'bum): pas mnyam par bzhag ste bya/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la/
275a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mtshan rnams kyi legs par mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das mnyes par mdzad pa/ byang chub sems ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs
275a6(rgyud 'bum): pa kun/ / dgra bcom 'dod chags bral ba dang // legs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas mchog/ blo gros dag pa ye shes che// thams cad mkhyen pa kun rig mchog/ mchog gi dbang phyug dpa' ba ma/
275a7(rgyud 'bum): thog ma tha ma med khyab pa// ma 'dres ma 'dres pa yi don// shin tu phra ba mchog sbyin rgyal// rdo rje can chen rnal 'byor che// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ mi bskyod pa dang mi zad mgon//
275b1(rgyud 'bum): chos dbyings gzhan dang gzhan min pa// rin chen 'byung gnas rdo rje mchog/ dbang bskur kun gyi bla ma'i bla// theg chen che ba'i mchog gi mchog/ dpa' bo mchog tu dpa' ba'i mchog/
275b2(rgyud 'bum): cing yangs la phra ba dang // thams cad thams cad de bzhin gsheg/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po che// tshang skyob dkar po stobs po che// gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid che// phul byung phul las
275b3(rgyud 'bum): phul du byung / / rgyu med mchog gi mchog dpa' mchog/ gzi mchog gzi brjid byed mtshungs pa// rgyal ba rgyal ba mchog nyid dang // legs pa'i rgyal po bdag nyid che// rdo rje sems dpa'
275b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' che/ / rdo rje rgyal po lcags kyu che// rdo rje chags pa mda' chen po// rdo rje legs pa legs grub mdzad// rdo rje rin chen che mchog mchog/ rdo rje gzi brjid legs brjid
275b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / rgyal mtshan chen po rin chen tog/ rdo rje bzhad pa legs bzhad mdzad// 'jig rten dbang phyug pad+ma che// shes rab ye shes legs rno mdzad// chos kyi 'khor lo chos chen po/
275b6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' smra ba legs bzhang mdzad// sna tshogs las ni rgyal po che// rdo rje srung ba legs srung mdzad// khro bo chen po gnod sbyin che// rdo rje mtshams sbyor mtshams sbyor sel// phyag
275b7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal sangs rgyas kun khyod la/ / dang po'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ legs so rdor can rnal 'byor che// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dge/ snying po'i rgyan ces mtshan gsol pa/
276a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag thams cad legs par gsungs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub sems// ye shes snying po shin tu mdzes// gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang // sna
276a2(rgyud 'bum): bya shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ / shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mdo// brjod du med cing yi ge bral// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i
276a3(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa rgyas pa 'di yongs su rdzogs so/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha
276a4(rgyud 'bum): ma med pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab bo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas
276a5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das ma'ang snyoms par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'ad
276a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po 'di skad cig nyid la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes rdo rje la zhugs par gyur to/ / zhugs nas/
276a7(rgyud 'bum): kyangade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar mdzad cing brtan par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs de las
276b1(rgyud 'bum): 'thon te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas/ sems can thams cad kyi'ang
276b2(rgyud 'bum): shes rab dang ye shes rnam par sbyang te/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas bkug cing rjes su mnyes par byas nas legs par mdzad nas rnam par gnas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
276b3(rgyud 'bum): legs par yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas mngon par dbang bskur te gzi brjid dang / tog dang / bzhad pa dang / de dag la nges par sbyar te mchog gi dbang phyug chen po las rdo rje sems dpa'
276b4(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin gyis chos rtogs pa la'ang rab tu gnas nas rnon po dang / rgyu dang smra ba'i sems dpa' rnams la'ang thugs brtan par mdzad de/ yongs su dag nas yang pad+mo'i sems dpa'i ting nge
276b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin la rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i dbang phyug chos nyid gzhi med pa la sbyar nas/ sna tshogs pa'i las kyi bdag pos kyang sems can yongs su smin cing srung ba'i khro bos de bzhin gshegs pa thams
276b6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje mtshams sbyor ba rnams sems can gyi khams mtha' dag yongs su smin pa dang / byin gyis brlabs te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
276b7(rgyud 'bum): kar rjes su zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes la zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched ngu brjod// e ma ho zag mang shes rab ni// sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad
277a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi/ shes rab shin tu dri med sems// sems dpa'i lus su bdag gyur to// dri med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad nas// e ma'o//
277a2(rgyud 'bum): chos ni bsam med nyid// bdag gi dbang du rnam par gnas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
277a3(rgyud 'bum): bcu drug gi lus su mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la yongs su bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye 'khor kun tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / 'od kyi
277a4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dang / byin gyis brlabs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying
277a5(rgyud 'bum): po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mdor bstan pa'i chos kyi tshig bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka'
277a6(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni legs so legs so// legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// de nas bcom ldan
277a7(rgyud 'bum): rangs rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni nang gi lus dang /
277b1(rgyud 'bum): phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par
277b2(rgyud 'bum): spyod do/ / lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la mi gnas pa'i rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do//
277b3(rgyud 'bum): nonang gi tshor ba dang / phyi'i tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi sems dang / nang gi chos dang / phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing
277b4(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par
277b5(rgyud 'bum): spyod do/ / chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la mi gnas pa'i rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// rtag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lus dang /
277b6(rgyud 'bum): ngag dang / sems dang / chos mnyam pa nyid kyis gan so// oM kAM/ oM tsat+tA ra smr-i t+yA pa s+thA nA nA hUM/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir mi dmigs
277b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dun pa skyed cing rtsol lo/ / brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems kyi mthu skyed do// smon lam yang dag par 'debs so// sdig to mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa la
278a1(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do// 'bad do// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag
278a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'debs so/ / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang / sbom po yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do// 'bad do// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems
278a3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'dzin to/ / smon lam yang dog par 'debs so// chos tshad med pa thams cad don dam par tshad med par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
278a4(rgyud 'bum): / pos 'di bka' stsal to// oM samya ka pra hA Na sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa ma tA a d+hiSh+Ti te aHhUM/ yang dag par spong ba brjod pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
278a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi ni mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom par byed do/ / sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu
278a6(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom par byed do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don dam pa dang / kun rdzob kyi sgo'i chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi 'khor
278a7(rgyud 'bum): lo sgyur bas bka' stsal to/ / oM ri d+hi pA da pA ra mi te la ba pa ra hUM hUM/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// dbang po lnga ni dang
278b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la dbang
278b2(rgyud 'bum): / sbyar bas spros pa med pa'i dbang po 'di dag bka' stsal to// oM in+d+ra ya ba bo d+ha pra dz+nyA e shany+dza nA ma n+ya nA pa ga tA ya AHhUM/ dbang po mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
278b3(rgyud 'bum): stobs lnga ni dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs so zhes bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das
278b4(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa/ stobs thams cad rtogs pa/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba// gdod ma nas dag pas 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ba la AHhUM
278b5(rgyud 'bum): hUM ba/ stobs 'phel ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi ni byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms pa'o// oM brah+ma bi hArA d+hASh+ThA
278b6(rgyud 'bum): ki maM dz+r-i k+ShaM hUM hUM/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bka' stsal to// tshangs pa'i gnas pa byin gyis rlob pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni
278b7(rgyud 'bum): spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das chos
279a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bka' stsal to// oM pra ti sam+bi daHswa hUM/ shes rab kyi pha rol
279a2(rgyud 'bum): tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ / rjes su dran pa drug gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims
279a3(rgyud 'bum): rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / chos thams cad gcig tu rjes su dran pa ni chos thams cad don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid med pa rnam par dpyod
279a4(rgyud 'bum): pas mnyam pa nyid kyi sgo zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur bas bka' stsal to/ / oM sarba a nu smr-i ti bud d+haM saM pa dA di shi hUM hUM hUM/ dran pa drug gi shes rab bo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
279a5(rgyud 'bum): gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag
279a6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang
279a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub kyi yan lag mnyam pa nyid skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bka' stsal to/ / oM sarba tA saM bo d+h+yaM ga sa ma tA pra tiSh+Thi te dru paM/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
279b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i
279b2(rgyud 'bum): las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// lam zad mi shes pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po la
279b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa legs par so sor rig par thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so/ / oM Ar+yA Sh+TAM ga mArga ma Ta/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol kyi pha rol tu phyin
279b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / ting nge 'dzin gsum ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i
279b5(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa dang / med pa'i rnam pa dang / rang bzhin med pa'i rnam pa thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa sems rtse gcig pa ste/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces brjod do// de la mtshan
279b6(rgyud 'bum): ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ gang la mtshan mar mi byed pa dang / 'dod pa med pa dang / shes pa med pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / rnam par bral ba'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ 'di ni/
279b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
280a1(rgyud 'bum): ces bya'o/ / chos thams cad rtogs nas smon par mi byed de/ lha 'am lha las gzhan gang yang rung ba don du mi gnyer zhing 'phags par yang mi 'dod pa ste/ dngos po
280a2(rgyud 'bum): / thams cad la ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo yis kyang ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis ting nger dzin gyi sgo gsum nye bar rtogs par bya'o// oM kha sa mAHsarba d+harmAHkhaM/
280a3(rgyud 'bum): de la stobs bcu ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog
280a4(rgyud 'bum): ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa so sor mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gzhi mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
280a5(rgyud 'bum): sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mngon par shes pa lnga mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid so
280a6(rgyud 'bum): sor rtogs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / oM da sha ba la sa ma tA thA/ stobs bcu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can
280a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ / nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos
280b1(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ / gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam
280b2(rgyud 'bum): mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las
280b3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes
280b4(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med
280b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes
280b6(rgyud 'bum): med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o// chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i mtshan nyid
280b7(rgyud 'bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa/ bsam gtan med cing bsam gtan med pa ma yin pa/ snyoms par 'jug pa med cing snyoms par 'jug pa med pa ma yin pa 'di bka'
281a1(rgyud 'bum): stsal to/ / oM sa man+ta b+ha dre swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he d+haM ShaM khaM/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang
281a2(rgyud 'bum): zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/
281a3(rgyud 'bum): lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan ci'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag
281a4(rgyud 'bum): par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' 'o// 'khor
281a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra skrag go/ / tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor
281a6(rgyud 'bum): bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ / bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas nas/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram
281a7(rgyud 'bum): ze'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su
281b1(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa de dag la bstan na bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyor ro/ / gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par
281b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur bar brten pa de dag la nan tan byas nas/ sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar mi 'byung ngo zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i
281b3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba la sogs pa ji ltar gyur pa thams cad yongs su spros te brjod par bya'o//
281b4(rgyud 'bum): mi 'jigs pa ni ngar 'dzin pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid do zhes/ oM bai sha ra d+ya sa ma tA pra b+hA a a/ aM aH/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi
281b5(rgyud 'bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pas dben pa/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde
281b6(rgyud 'bum): ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa
281b7(rgyud 'bum): dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms su
282a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas te/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o/
282a2(rgyud 'bum): zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas
282a3(rgyud 'bum): nub pas/ bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal ba'ang med/ btang snyoms pa dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du
282a4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha'
282a5(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes
282a6(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched
282a7(rgyud 'bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam
282b1(rgyud 'bum): ba thams cad du 'du shes med 'dra shes min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// rnam par thar pa brgyad po dang mnyam pa nyid rjes su
282b2(rgyud 'bum): thob nas dngos por rtogs par mi byed/ dngos po med par rtogs par mi byed/ chos thams cad gnyis su med par rtogs so// 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
282b3(rgyud 'bum): dgu mnyam pa nyid do/ / oM a nan+taHbi mo k+Sha mu khe shu/ dngos po thams cad mthar gyis gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la pha rol
282b4(rgyud 'bum): tu phyin pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
282b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi pha rol
282b6(rgyud 'bum): tu phyin pa dang / thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / spros pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
282b7(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
283a1(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ bsten pa'i rjes su rtogs pa'i sbyor bas so// oM sarba pA ra mi ta anA pa ri pU ra Ni/ oM prA dz+nyA taM/ thams cad kyi pha rol
283a2(rgyud 'bum): tu phyin pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / de la sa bcu pa gang zhe na/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sa dang / dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i sa dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od 'phro ba
283a3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba dang / sbyang dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba dang / ring du song ba zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi sprin zhes
283a4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba dang / sa thams cad don gcig ste/ 'di ltar ye shes kyi don to// ye shes kyang ci'ang med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ yi ge med pa/ don yod pa/ gdod ma nas dag pa/ dri ma med
283a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'od gsal ba/ brjod pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to// oM b+hU mi bi sho d+ha ni sarbA NA pa ri pU ra Ni bi pru/ sa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i
283a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa bcu gang zhe n+d+ha/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa dang / gzhon nur gyur pa dang // las dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / skye ba nas skye bar sbyor ba dang ldan pa dang / bsam
283a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang ldan pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob bo dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa dor ba ste/
283b1(rgyud 'bum): don dam par gnas pa gcig yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ltar gnas pa med pa'o// oM sarba bya ba s+thA na bi ga te hUM/ rnam par gnas pa med pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub
283b2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang
283b3(rgyud 'bum): skye ba la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba'o// dbang ba dang mi dbang ba rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba thams cad la dbang ba dang / dbang phyug
283b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la dbang rjes su thob pa/ chos thams cad dang legs par rab tu ldan pa'i phyir ro// oM sarba bi shi te tre hUM hUM/ thams cad la dbang ba zhe bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
283b5(rgyud 'bum): de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga' 'o// ca co mi mnga' 'o// dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// thugs mnyam par ma
283b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhag pa mi mnga' 'o/ / 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga' 'o// ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga' 'o// mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi
283b7(rgyud 'bum): mnga' 'o/ / dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa
284a1(rgyud 'bum): mi mnga' 'o/ / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/
284a2(rgyud 'bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// sku'i 'phrin las thams cad
284a3(rgyud 'bum): ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / / gsung gi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes
284a4(rgyud 'bum): sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni yul thams cad du dus thams cad kyi tshe thams cad mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa ste/ stong pa nyid la
284a5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rjes su rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir na shes rab yongs su dag pa'o/ / oM a we Ni ka bud+d+ha d+harmA sa ma te aHbI ra hU~M khaM/ ma 'dres pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
284a6(rgyud 'bum): / de la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams ci zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los mtshan pa nyid de/ 'di yi phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dag la 'khor lo rtsibs
284a7(rgyud 'bum): stong can lte ba dang bcas pa mu khyud dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ / phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil legs par gnas pa ste/ zhabs kyi mthil thams cad kyis sa gzhi la reg
284b1(rgyud 'bum): cing / de'ang 'di'i mtho ba ni dma' ba dang dma' ba ni mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ngang pa'i rgyal po lta bu rngabs 'brel ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag dag dang zhabs
284b2(rgyud 'bum): de dag gser gyi mdog can gyi ri mo'i 'phreng ba rnams kyis rkang pa brgyad pa bzhin du mdzes pa'o/ / phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid de/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i phyag
284b3(rgyud 'bum): dang zhabs dag ras bal 'jam po bzhin dang / skyes nas zla ba lon pa'i byis pa bzhin du gzhon sha can dang / kA tsa lin da ltar 'jam pa reg na bde ba'o// bdun mtho bar gyur te/ phyag gnyis
284b4(rgyud 'bum): ngadag dang / zhabs gnyis dag dang / phrag gong dag dang / mgrin pa'i phyogs gcig go/ sor mo ring ba ste/ 'di yi zhabs kyi sor mo rnams rim gyis ring ba nyid do// rting pa yangs pa ste/
284b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di'i rting pa che zhing zhabs kyi rjes su 'tsham par yangs par 'gyur ro// sku che zhing drang ba nyid do// 'phye bo ma yin zhing zhom pa ma yin/ ma tshang ba ma yin/ 'thas pa ma yin/ legs par skyes pa
284b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa thams cad pa bdun dad ldan pa'i sku ste/ mtho ba 'di'i srid dang rjes su 'tshams pa'i zheng du 'gyur ro// zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa nyid de/ 'di'i pus mo dang long bu mtho bar 'gyur ro//
284b7(rgyud 'bum): kha spu'i rtse mo gyen du phyogs pa ste/ 'di' ba spu rnams rtse mo gyen du phyogs par 'gyur zhing / ba spu rnams g.yas phyogs su 'khyil la 'khor ba mig sman gyi mdog can rnams te/ de rnams kyis
285a1(rgyud 'bum): gser gyi mdog can gyi sku mngon par gsal bar byed do/ / byin pa ri dgas e n+yA ya'i lta bu ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin pa dag zlum pa ri dgas e n+yA ya rnams
285a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi lha bu'o/ / phyag ring zhing mdzes pa ste/ rgyas shing ma btung ba nyid du phyag mthil dag gis rang gi pus mo'i lha nga la reg pa'o// mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ste/ sbubs kyis rab tu
285a3(rgyud 'bum): g.yogs pa glang po che'i gsang gnas lta bur 'gyur ro/ / sku mdog gser 'dra ba ste/ 'di'i kha dog gser lta bur 'gyur ro// pags pa srab pa ste/ shin tu 'jam pa gser shog ltar 'jam
285a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i pagla pa can du 'gyur zhing rdul med pa'i na bza' 'dzin pa'o/ / s+phu re re nas skyes pa ste/ 'di'i ba spu'i khung bur spu rnams re rer 'gyur ro// smin ma'i dbus na mdzod spu can te/ 'di'i smin
285a5(rgyud 'bum): ma dag gi dbus na ros skud legs pa lta bu dung bcag pa'i mdog can g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bar 'gyur te/ mdzod spu nyid kyis zhal gser gyi kha dog lta bur shin tu gsal bar byed do// sku stong
285a6(rgyud 'bum): seng ge lta bu ste/ 'di'i sku steng du yangs pa seng ge'i lta byar 'gyur ro// dpung mgo zlum pa ste/ yongs su zlum pa'i mgrin pa can du 'gyur ro// thal gong rgyas pa ste/ 'di'i nye bar rgyas par
285a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing gser shog bzhin du rnam par gsal ba'i mgrin pa can no/ / yar lag so so rnams su ro rnams myong bar byed do zhes pas na/ ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa nyid de rtsa rnams yin la/
285b1(rgyud 'bum): de rnams kyi mchog tu rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan la sogs pa rnams kyis ma dkrugs pa nyid kyis phyir yang dag par gsal ba'o// shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa skyes bu chen po'i
285b2(rgyud 'bum): chu dang zheng dag mnyam pa'o/ / dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/ dbu zlum par 'gyur zhing / gtsug tor gdugs lta bus yas bkab pa gtsug tor yang shin tu mtho ba'o// ljags ring bas te/
285b3(rgyud 'bum): snyan gyi mtha'i bar du ljags kyi rtse mos reg par byed cing / dbu skra'i mthar thug par yang dbral ba'i mthar ljags kyis khebs pa'o// tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/ 'khor stong phrag du mar dbyangs
285b4(rgyud 'bum): nang du ji lta ba de lta phyi rol du'ang thos shing / bya ka la bing ka'i bzhin du snyan pa nyid du 'gyur ro// 'gram pa seng ge lta bu ste/ 'gram pa dag seng ge'i bzhin du zlum por 'gyur ro// tshems
285b5(rgyud 'bum): dkar bas te/ dung dang / kun da dang / zla ba'i kha dog can gyi tshems rnams so// choms mnyam pa ste/ ha cang dma' ba ma yin/ mtho ba ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin pa'i rtse mo can gyi
285b6(rgyud 'bum): tshechoms rnams su 'gyur ro/ / tshems thags bzang ba ste/ tshems rnams par med pa'o// tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste/ tshems 'og tu nyi shu dang / steng du tshems nyi shu'o// spyan mthon
285b7(rgyud 'bum): mthing ste/ spyan dag gi sngon po gang yin pa de shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ ri mo dmar mo rnams dang ma 'dres pa nyid kyi phyir la/ gang dkar po yin pa de dkar po kho na shin tu rnam par 'gyur ro//
286a1(rgyud 'bum): rdzi ma pa'i lta bu ste/ spyan gyi rdzi ma rnams khyu mchog gi bzhin du gang 'og ma yin pa de rnams 'og kho na dang / gang steng ma yin pa de rnams steng kho nar gnas pa ma 'dzings pa
286a2(rgyud 'bum): legs par gzhol ba'o/ / sems can 'ga' zhig rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi mdog can du mthong ba/ 'ga' zhig rnams kyis shel gyi mdog can du mthong ba/ 'ga' zhig
286a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis pad+ma rA ga'i kha dog dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis dung dang /
286a4(rgyud 'bum): kun da dang / zla ba ltar dkar ba dang / 'ga' zhig gis kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / 'ga' zhig gis nam mkha'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig gis khru phyed dang bcu gsum pa'i tshad dang / ji
286a5(rgyud 'bum): srid du dpag tshad 'bum gyi tshad dam dpag tshad bye ba'i tshad dang / ji srid du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin mtha' yas pa rnams su snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dang /
286a6(rgyud 'bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa dang / ji srid du me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgya mtsho rnams snang bar byed cing / chos kyi
286a7(rgyud 'bum): dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gdul bya'i dbang las thams cad snang bar byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dbyings kyis rnam par
286b1(rgyud 'bum): rig par mdzad pa dang / stong gnyis dang / gsum dang / ji srid nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i bar thams cad 'od dang dbyangs kyis snang bar byas nas/ rnam par rig par mdzad pa dang /
286b2(rgyud 'bum): chos dang / zang zing dang / don 'thun pa dang / don bya ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams kyis sems can rnams la phan 'dogs shing / phan btags nas byang chub chen po la rab tu dgod par
286b3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad do/ / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnyam pa nyid kyis chos rnams thams cad mnyam zhing mnyam pa ste/ lha rnams kyi mtshan mngon par 'grub par blta bar bya'i/ mtshan
286b4(rgyud 'bum): ma yin pa mngon par 'grub pa ni ma yin no/ / byang chub mtshan nyid med pa'i nyid kyi phyir chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can no// lha thams cad
286b5(rgyud 'bum): kyang stong pa nyid du mnyam pa'o/ / lha thams cad dang / byang chub dang / chos rnams thams cad kyang mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid
286b6(rgyud 'bum): can/ zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can rnams so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA ba ra lak+Sha nA sa ma tA d+harmA te aM/ mtshan thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
286b7(rgyud 'bum): dpe byad brgyad cu rnams ci zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bur 'gyur te/ sen mo snum pa dang / sen mo mtho ba dang / sor mo rnams zlum par 'gyur
287a1(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / sor po rnams rim gyis phra ba dang / sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang / rtsa mi mngon pa dang / rtsa rnams mdud pa med pa dang / long bu mi mngon pa dang / zhabs
287a2(rgyud 'bum): mi mnyam pa med par mtshungs pa dang / glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa dang / seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa dang / g.yas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa dang / drang por gshegs
287a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / mdzes par gshegs pa dang / rim gyis gshegs pa dang / che zhing yangs la yongs su gyur pa'i pus mo'i lha nga can dang / mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gom pa snyoms
287a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / sku rnam par dag pa dang / sku 'jam pa dang / sku rnam par dang ba dang / sku zhum pa med pa dang / sku dgu pa med pa dang / kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba dang / khyu mchog ltar kun nas
287a5(rgyud 'bum): rab tu dang ba can dang / gzigs pa yongs su dag cing mngon par 'dod pa la mnyam pa'i 'od can dang / dku zlum pa dang / dku skabs phyin pa dang / dku ma rnyongs pa dang / dku skyed
287a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhu'i lag bcangs lta bu dang / lte ba zab pa dang / lte ba mi g.yo ba dang / lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / lte ba thogs pa med pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag shin tu rnam par 'byed pa dang /
287a7(rgyud 'bum): pags pa skyon dang bral ba dang / gnag bag dang sme ba med pa dang / sku brtan pa dang / phyag shing bal lta bu dang / phyag yangs pa dang / phyag gi ri mo snum pa dang / phyag gi ri mo mi yo bdang
287b1(rgyud 'bum): mchu bim pa lta bu dang / zhal ha cang mi ring ba dang / mnyen ning srab la dmar ba'i ljags dang / glang po che'i nga ro n+dan dang / snyan cing mnyen pa'i dbyangs dang / sgra phun sum tshogs pa
287b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / dbyangs 'jam pa dang / shangs mtho ba dang / mche ba zlum pa dang / mche ba dkar ba dang / mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang / spyan gtsang ba dang / spyan yangs pa dang / smyan
287b3(rgyud 'bum): mthon mthing dang / rdzi ma gnag pa dang / smin ma stug pa dang / smin ma 'jam pa dang / spyan dkar gnag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma lho bu dang / smin tshugs ring ba dang / smin mo'i
287b4(rgyud 'bum): sgra nag pa dang / smin ma'i spu phra ba dang / smin ma rjes su 'thun pa dang / kha dog ma nyams pa dang / snyan mi mnyam pa med pa dang / snyan skyon dang bral ba dang / dbang po thams cad ma nyams
287b5(rgyud 'bum): shing skyon dang bral ba dang / yongs su rdzogs shing mtho la mchog tu gnas pa'i zhal gdong dang dpral ba can dang / dbu shin tu rgyas pa dang / dbu skra gnag pa dang / dbu skra skyug pa dang /
287b6(rgyud 'bum): dbu skra 'jam pa dang / dbu skra dri zhim pa dang / dbu skra mnyam pa dang / dbu skra snum pa dang / dbu skra ma 'khums pa dang / dpal be'u dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil bas
287b7(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa dang / rgyal mtshan yang dag par gnas pa dang / dpral ba dung lta bu dang / dbu mchog tu mtho ba dang / gtsug tor yar 'phags pa dang / dbu gdugs kyi rnam pa can dang /
288a1(rgyud 'bum): kun nas mdzes pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni tshad med pa'i dpe byad can mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ gsal byed dang gsal byed ma yin pas
288a2(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad gsal byed med par mnyam pa nyid la rab tu legs par gnas pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad sgyu ma'i chos dang ldan pa la legs
288a3(rgyud 'bum): par rab tu gnas pa/ dus gsum gyi dpe byad mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ stong pa nyid thob pa nyid kyi chos thams cad dang dpe byad mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ gnyis su med pa'i
288a4(rgyud 'bum): don la legs par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams so zhes pa'o/ / oM a nu byany+dza ni sa ma tA su pra tiSh+Thi te badz+rany+dzan hUM laM aM/ dpe byad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
288a5(rgyud 'bum): / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug tshon po can legs so zhes bya ba rnams
288a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis mnyes par mdzad do/ / oMd byang chub sems chen khyod legs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mchog/ sangs rgyas chos chen khyod legs so// tshad med ched du khyod legs so//
288a7(rgyud 'bum): shes rab dam pa'i ched du yang // mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// sangs rgyas snga mas ma gsungs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen pos lha rnams
288b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba bzhi yis dges par mdzad do/ / sangs rgyas kun khyong la phyag 'tshal// chos kyi sgra yi mchog gi mchog/ gdod ma'i sngags kyi don nyid la// rdo rje ye shes stobs/
288b2(rgyud 'bum): can la// shin tu sgrib meng zhi ba la// rdo rje chos rnams legs gnas pa// theg pa chen po'i go 'phang thob// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi lha// gdod nas dag pa dpa' bo che// dbang
288b3(rgyud 'bum): phyug dam pa mchog gi mchog/ dge chos mchog tu 'gyur ba med// bder gshegs de rnams la phyag 'tshal// ces pa'o// na mo stu te/ oM mAM hUM na mo sU te swA hA/ 'di ni brjod pa tsam zhig
288b4(rgyud 'bum): gis/ / sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa'o// zhes pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so//
288b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad
288b6(rgyud 'bum): slar yang 'dus par mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyod nyid kyi rigs thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskyed par mdzad
288b7(rgyud 'bum): du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gsol ba btab pa'i gsung gi de ma thag kho nar/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bos te bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal
289a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po nyon cig ces te/ de nas 'di las yang dag bshad/ byang chub dkyil 'khor bla na med// rdo rje ye shes
289a2(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba mchog/ sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi'o// dben pa'i sa gzhi nyam dga' ba/ me tog 'phreng bas rnam brgyan pa// kun tu sna tshogs cha bzang ba// kun tu sna tshogs sdom
289a3(rgyud 'bum): par ni/ / kun nas sna tshogs bya ba rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// ri yi mchog gam grong khyer ni// me tog 'bras bus rnam brgyan pa// der gnas sngags pas dngos grub
289a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ gal te 'dod na yang dag bri// gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa'i gnas// ri stengs rnams su kun nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bya ba rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya//
289a5(rgyud 'bum): ma mo'i gnas dang zhi ba'i gnas// dur khrod lha yi gnas su ni// rdo rje 'dzin dpal bya ba rnams// don dam par ni bsgrub par bya// pad+ma'i skyed mos tshal kun dang // chu bo 'dus pa rnams
289a6(rgyud 'bum): su yang / / phyag na pad+ma dpal bya ba// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// rgyal po'i pho brang nyams dga' ba/ rgyal po'i skyed tshal rnams su ni// rdo rje rin chen de yi ni// rin chen bya ba rnams
289a7(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub bya/ / rtags gcig pa dang ba glang gnas/ chu klung 'dus pa rnams su yang // sna tshogs bya ba thams cad rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa'
289b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / lha rnams gnas mchog kun tu'o// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// gang du mnyam par bzhag pa der// rtag pa bsod nams mchog gyur pa/ khya ba thams cad bsgrub
289b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / phyogs kun mnyam nyid gnas dkyil 'khor// shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya// shar lho nub dang byang rnams kyi// phyogs su dkyil 'khor thig brgyad pa'o// de yi
289b3(rgyud 'bum): phyi ru 'khor lo nI/ / kha dog lnga pa cher 'bar ba'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis mdzes pa ste// sna tshogs gos dang me tog 'phreng // rnga yab sogs kyis rnam
289b4(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa/ / dkyil 'khor kun la gnas pa yi// sgro dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus
289b5(rgyud 'bum): su ni/ / gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bri bar bya// shar du bcom ldan 'khor lo can// rdo rje sems dpa' yang
289b6(rgyud 'bum): dgra ldan/ / 'khor lo sgyur ba thams cad ni// sgeg par bcas pa kun bri bya// lho ru gtsug tor dkar po ni// rin chen 'bar ba yang dag ldan// gtsug tor dkar po'i ngos su ni// rdo rje
289b7(rgyud 'bum): gzi brjid la sogs bri/ / byang du brtson 'grus chen po ni// gzi brjid phung po stobs po che// sna tshogs rdo rje sogs bcas pa// rim pas kun nas bri bar bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyis
290a1(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / dbang phyug mgon po'i nub phyogs su// gtsug tor rgyal ba brtson 'grus che// rdo rje chos sogs dang bcas pa// thams cad sngags pas bri bar bya/
290a2(rgyud 'bum): gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// dbang ldan phyogs su 'phags pa gnas// me mtshams su ni cher 'phags so// bden bral du ni rnam rgyal nyid// rlung du de bzhin rnam 'phro ba'o//
290a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// sems dpa' kun gyi mdun du ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// gsang zhing 'bar 'khrigs 'od zer can// mkhas pas dkyil
