290a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rnams su ni/ / mchod pa rnams ni bzhag byas te// sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che// de bzhin gzugs sgra la sogs dang // bdug pa la sogs gsang chen no// sgo skyong ba
290a5(rgyud 'bum): ni bzhi yin te/ / phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// kun tu bzang po sogs rnams bri// de ltar dkyil 'khor bri bya ste// mchod pa byas nas snga ma bzhin// de bzhin 'jug pa
290a6(rgyud 'bum): sogs byas la/ / sgrub pa'i thabs ni brtsam par bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sngogs// dkyil 'khor mngon sum mthong ba las// snga ma brtag pa ji bzhin du// phyi nas b
290a7(rgyud 'bum): zhin dri bar bya/ / bsod nams ji bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams// thams cad tshon gyi rab brtag pa// rang gi lhag pa'i lha ngo bos// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar 'gyur// rang lngan
290b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid rnal 'byor gyis/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu grub// cho ga dman dang lhag pas kyang // 'grub par 'gyur te skyon ma yin// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang ba// kun nas
290b2(rgyud 'bum): tshogs 'khor lo can/ / 'khor lo sgyur ba bdag nyid che'i// ran chen bdun gyi mchod pa che'ang // yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla bltar// dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi 'byung zhes bya// sangs rgyas
290b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin sogs kyis/ / dkyil 'khor 'di ni bshad byas pa'o// phyag na pad+ma bdag nyid che// pad+ma'i rnam par brtag shes bya// rin po che yi rin chen rnams// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rnam pa'o//
290b4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dman zhing dam tshig rnams// dor bar byas pa de nyid ni// gsang ba shes pa ma yin na// sgrub pa'i thabs ni 'grub mi 'gyur// de phyir gsang ba thams cad kyi// dkyil 'khor thams
290b5(rgyud 'bum): cad lta ba ni/ / gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// gdon mi za bar rtag tu bya// bla ma la ni yon phul nas// rjes su rim pas bsgrub par bya// brtan pa'am ni g.yo ba yi// rdzas rnams ji
290b6(rgyud 'bum): snyeng thams cad de/ / rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu sogs// bu mo legs par brgyan byas dang // 'dod pa'i chung ma phul byas nas// slar yang rin gyis bslu bar bya// grong dang de bzhin gtsug lag
290b7(rgyud 'bum): khang / / kun dga' ra sogs rgyal srid mchog/ gang la sbyin bya cung zad yod/ 'tshe ba de ni sbyin par bya// bdag gi dngos po yongs gtong ba// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa'o// bla ma
291a1(rgyud 'bum): la ni yon phul nas/ / gsang ba ngam pa rmad byung ba/ mngon par dbang bskur de nas bya// 'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong la// slob ma bzhag nas yan lag kun// phyag rgya kun/
291a2(rgyud 'bum): nas bcings byas nas// khams kun rang bzhin rtsa ba dang // sa bon 'bras bu dud pa yi// bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur te// sangs rgyas 'phreng ba'i dbang bskur las// spyi bo dang ni
291a3(rgyud 'bum): dpral ba dang / / gzhogs dang de bzhin rgyab tu yang // sangs rgyas rin chen chen po kun// cod pan mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o// dpal ldan sangs rgyas gtsug nor bu// gdugs dkar steng na
291a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'o/ / rgyal srid kun gyi dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya// dpal kun gyis ni ma don mtho ba// zhes bya'i dbang bskur bshad pa'o// khams kun rang bzhin glang
291a5(rgyud 'bum): bo dang / / rta ni mchog tu 'bar ba 'am// seng ge'i gdan gnas dbang bskur ba// dpal gyi sngags ni rjod byed cing // dpal gyi mngon mtho zhes bya ba'i// dam pa'i don gyis dbang bskur ba/
291a6(rgyud 'bum): bkra shis sam ni dpal be'u// gang yang bris nas dbang bskur bya// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi// rnam rgyal dbang bskur zhes bshad do// tsan dan chu dang bum pa che// gzhan
291a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis mi thub sman thugs pa/ / kun nas dbang bskur ched du ni// rtag tu shes rab can gyis brtag/ gzhan gyis mi thub dbang bskur mchog/ dkyil 'khor gang gang bris byas nas// phyas
291b1(rgyud 'bum): gang dang gang bkod pa/ / de ni de dang de brtag bya// de rnams phyag rgya dam par bshad// dbang bskur ched du sangs rgyas rnams// lha de rnams ni yid du 'ong // sman gyi dam pa mchog gyur pa/
291b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bshad// tsan dan dang ni rgya spos dang // ga pur de bzhin gur kum dang // a ka ru dang lha yi shing // tsan dan dmar po nyid dang ni// saM hUM byA g+h+r-i de bzhin mchog
291b3(rgyud 'bum): kun nas sa ha de ba dang / / gi ri kar Na tshangs mchod sbyin// sman gyi dam pa rnams su bshad// lhag nas kun gyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mchod pa rab 'jug cing // dang po rdo rje dbang bskur
291b4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ shes rab thams cad rab 'jug byed// rin chen dam pa'i dam pa ni// gser la sogs kyis thams cad nas// sman kun dang ni sa bon kun// 'bru rnams thams cad bzang po ni/
291b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas byin brlabs rnal 'byor las// dbang bskur don du rab brtag bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che// dbang bskur dam pa 'od 'bar ba'o// sangs rgyas kun nas sangs rgyas 'gyur// zhes
291b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud du ji ltar rnyed pa yongs su rdzogs so// rigs gzugs skal bzang mang thos blo 'byor sogs// phun tshogs ldan pa dpal ldan chos rje yis/
291b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyud 'di bsgyur las cung zad ma rdzogs pa// dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas rdzogs par bsgyur/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra maN+Da a lang
292a1(rgyud 'bum): kA ra nA ma ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma la spyi bos gus par
292a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyis byin gyis
292a3(rgyud 'bum): brlabs pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba bsnyes
292a4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa

298b5(rgyud 'bum): b zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i snod de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
298b6(rgyud 'bum): phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / sems can gyi kham thams cad yongs su skyob pas de bzhin
298b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ba dang /
299a1(rgyud 'bum): 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / rjod pa dang / sgom pa sngon du 'gro ba'i las kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o//
299a2(rgyud 'bum): oM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i nus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu
299a3(rgyud 'bum): phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul ba nyid dang / sems can
299a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad chos nyid nyid pas khro ba chos nyid nyid dang / sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro ba rdo rje nyid de/ de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub ste/
299a5(rgyud 'bum): haHde nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mchog ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
299a6(rgyud 'bum): phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang / thams cad kyi don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don nyid dang /
299a7(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang / thams cad las nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o// hrIHde nas
299b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ byang
299b2(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po bdag nyid thams cad pas sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad
299b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i snying po dang / rin po che thams cad kyis dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rin po che'i snying po dang / ngag thams cad la rab tu 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos kyi snying
299b4(rgyud 'bum): po dang / las thams cad byed pa'i sbyor bas sems can thams cad las kyi snying pa'o// hrIH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das shing mu med pa'i mthar phyin pa'i de bzhin gshegs
299b5(rgyud 'bum): pas slar yang mu med cing mthar phyin pa'i chos dang / slar yang 'di rtog pa dang yongs su mthar thug pa byin gyis brlab pa'i don du chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid yongs su mthar thug pas byin gyis
299b6(rgyud 'bum): brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' med pa dang /
299b7(rgyud 'bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mu med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gcig pa nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang / shes
300a1(rgyud 'bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mthar thug pa'i phyir chos thams cad yongs su mthar thug par 'gyur pa ste/ 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
300a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshul 'di nyan par byed/ 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byed na/ de ni dag cing mthar phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mthar phyin pa la gan pa nyid kyis sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol
300a3(rgyud 'bum): bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid myur du thob par 'gyur ro// b+h+yoHde nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa
300a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid bsnyes pa/ chos thams cad spros pa med pas slar yong bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rdo rje chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol
300a5(rgyud 'bum): tu phyin pa'i sgo dam pa thog ma dang / tha ma dang / dbus las grol ba'i mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po mchog tu grub pas bde
300a6(rgyud 'bum): ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po mchog tu grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po mchog tu grub par
300a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mchog tu grub pas bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang /
300b1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub pas khams gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chu sems dpa'
300b2(rgyud 'bum): c hen po rnams kyi 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub pas ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su skyob pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang
300b3(rgyud 'bum): bde ba'i mchog shin tu bde ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ro/ / saM/ de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkhas pa mchog rnams gnas gyur pa// de srid mnyam med
300b4(rgyud 'bum): sems can don/ / mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs// ye shes byin gyis brlabs kyis 'grub// las ni thams cad rnam dag pas// srid pa dag par
300b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur phyir ro/ / chags sogs kyis 'dul 'jig rten ni// kun nas srid par rtag sdig byed// de dag rnam par sbyang don du// srid pa'i bar du rang 'dul byed// ji ltar pad+ma legs
300b6(rgyud 'bum): dmar ba/ / tshon gyi skyon gyis ma gos ltar// bag chags skyon gyis srid pa ru// rtag tu 'gro phan gos mi 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po rnam dag pa// bde ba chen po nor chen po//
300b7(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum dbang phyug thob nas su// de dag don ni brtan par byed// haH'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re bzhin du nang
301a1(rgyud 'bum): par langs te/ gang 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / rjod par byed pa des bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur zhing / bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod
301a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dam tshig gi dngos grub mchog tu gyur pa skye ba 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur ro/ / hUM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
301a3(rgyud 'bum): / dpal nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di dag ni nges par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo ste/ 'di ltar/ oM na maHsarba bud d+hA bo d+hi satwA nAM/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta badz+ra/ oM sa man+ta b+ha dre tsar+ye bI/ oM tsan
301a4(rgyud 'bum): tA ma Ni/ oM a ni ro d+ha/ oM dzat+ti b+hi b+ha te/ oM dzA ti pa ri war te/ oM ma hA rA ga d+harma te/ oM bIr+ya ka ba tse/ oM sarba gA mo ni/ oM badz+ra dr-ir+tha ka bi tsa he hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta
301a5(rgyud 'bum): oM sa b+hA ba shud+d+he/ oM pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA dz+nyA na b+hi shud+d+ha/ oM karma bi sho d+ha nr-i hUM phaT/ oM ni sum+b+ha badz+ri NI hUM phaT/ oM karma rA ge/ oM badz+ra hUM badz+re/ oM sarba dA ma NI/ oM hrIHoM a kA ro mu /
301a6(rgyud 'bum): oM pradz+nyA pA ra mi ti/ oM haHpaM hUM/ oM aM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya a gri/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka bi sho d+ha ne/ oM sarba ta thA ga ha tsit+ta badz+ri aH/ oM s+pho Ta ya sarba a pA ya ban+d+ha nA ni pra mo k+Sha ya/
301a7(rgyud 'bum): sarba a pA ya ga ti b+h+yaHsarba sa ma ya badz+ra hUM phaT/ sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// de brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub rdo rje 'dzin pa
301b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'am/ / de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa bam pa skrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun
301b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems can gyis bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / brjod pa dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar yang nus pa ma yin no// gzhan du na gang
301b3(rgyud 'bum): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na yi ge gcig tsam yang thos nas/ sems can de sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par rig par bya na/ slar
301b4(rgyud 'bum): yang mtha' dag ma lus pa rdzogs pa lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal sems can gang la la gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma brgyad cu snyed kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la phyag byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par
301b5(rgyud 'bum): byas/ mchod par byas na/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par nus so// gang du na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du gyur par
301b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ gang zag de'ang phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la gzung ba 'am/ glegs bam du bris par gyur na/ de bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por
301b7(rgyud 'bum): skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ / de la bdud sdig to can gyis bar du mi gcod do// rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang / gzhan yang lha rnams kyis phyi bzhin rjes su 'brangs te/ de srung ba dang / skyob pa dang /
302a1(rgyud 'bum): sbed pa byed par 'gyur zhing / tshul ma yin pas dus byed par mi 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// mdor na
302a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang yid la 'dod pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal 'di lta bu'i phan yon mang po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam
302a3(rgyud 'bum): grangs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje'i snying po thams cad kyi rgyan theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu
302a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba chen po/ mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug dam pa chen po/ 'khor los sgyur ba chen po bzhis yongs su bskor ba/ rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i snying po 'di
302a5(rgyud 'bum): phyung ngo / / mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod nas ma skyes pa'o// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// spros pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir chos
302a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad gdong ma nas yongs su dag pa'o/ / thams cad kyi sems gsal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings yongs su rgyas pa'o// aHb+h+rUM dzA hrIHhUM/ de bzhin gsheg
302a7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje yi ge'i tshig 'di brjod pa tsam gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad de snyed nyid du shin tu gsal ba rgya chen po snang bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom
302b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang bsdu bas byon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
302b2(rgyud 'bum): zhugs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya yis
302b3(rgyud 'bum): nyon cig/ de legs par nyon la rab tu yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka'
302b4(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes la zhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po chen po la byin gyis brlab
302b5(rgyud 'bum): par byos shig/ de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
302b6(rgyud 'bum): thugs kar zhugs te/ byin gyis brlabs nas de las 'thon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar rnam par gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs
302b7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung gnas rdo rje snying po'i rgyan byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje chen po snying po'i rgyan de bzhin gshegs
303a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa chen po bkar stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rdo rje snying po gsang chen
303a2(rgyud 'bum): po/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun ldan dge/ rdo rje snying po dang mtshungs pa// khams rnams thams cad rnam par sprul// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdud rtsi dang // gzhan yang bcud len dang
303a3(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo rje kun gyi rang bzhin grong // gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par mdzes// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag
303a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / dur dang me tog chun pos sbas// grwa yi cha rnams thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// rdo rje'i thig rnams kyis spras
303a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// de'i yang phyi rol du bya ba// dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi yi ni 'od// khyad par ji lta ba bzhin du// sngags pas kun nas yongs bskor bya//
303a6(rgyud 'bum): de ltar rnam bzhi'i rnam pa dang // ji srid grong ni rnam pa bdun// sbyor ba bdun dang yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog 'phreng bas brgyan// sgo dang sgo khyud rin chen ni// yang dag mtho ba
303a7(rgyud 'bum): legs par gnas/ / de yi grong gi nang du ni// rab zhugs 'khor lo 'dra ba ru// rdo rje thig gis yongs su bskor// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes// rdo rje ka mdun gnas rnams su//
303b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa'o// de ltar 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis// nang gi dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa// tshad mdzes pa yi snying po che// rdo rje 'khor los rnam par brgyan// gru bzhi
303b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang zlum po nyid/ / gru gsum rnam par yang dag byung // zla phyed rnam pa dang mtshungs pa// dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi slar yang // slob dpon rdo rje yang dag 'byung // shes rab chen
303b3(rgyud 'bum): pos rab brtag bya/ / dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// pad+ma chen po 'angab brgyad pa// pad+ma rA ga'i 'od mtshungs la// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan gzhag par bya// dkyil
303b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du/ / sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi ni ngos kun tu// shes rab can gyis gzhag bya ba// dam tshig mchog bzhi rnam bzhi ni// go rims
303b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du yang dag bri/ / rdo rje chen po seng ge'i khri// 'khor lo car gyi khyab bdag gzhag/ gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang // gzi brjid phung po skal ba che// rnam par 'phro
303b6(rgyud 'bum): byed rnam rgyal nyid/ / de bzhin gtsug tor lnga po ni// sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad la// yongs su bskor nas snam bu la// dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya/ rdo rje shugs kyis song
303b7(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / dkyil 'khor dag ni ba'i po ru/ mi bskyod la sogs rnam pa bzhi// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bri// mi bskyod pa yi dkyil 'khor ni/ khwa 'od lta bu'i mdog tu bya// rdo rje sems
304a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sogs rgyal po/ / kun mchogs yi dbang phyug rnams// rdo rje slob dpon stobs po che// shes rab chen pos dgod par bya// rin chen 'byung gnas dkyil 'khor
304a2(rgyud 'bum): du/ rdo rje rin chen sogs kyis dgang // rdo rje chos sogs gsang ba yi// dkyil 'khor tshe dpag med pa'o// rdo rje las la sogs ldan pa// don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// gnyis pa
304a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du/ / rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// rnam gzigs la sogs sangs rgyas rnams// dkyil 'khor kun tu der ni bri// rdo rje snying po rgyal po che// khyab bdag gsang
304a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i chos dbang phyug/ 'dod pa'i don kun grub pa'i phyir// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// blo gros rgya mtsho mi zad blo// byams pa bdag nyid chen po dang // nam mkha'i snying po grags chen po// kun
304a5(rgyud 'bum): tu bzang po nyid dag dang / / phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che// kun nas 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rigs kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas sras bzang dri ma med// sgrib
304a6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad nges par sel/ / de nas sa yi snying po mchog/ nam mkha'i mdzod ni mdzod dam pa// lag na rin cher bla na med// ngan song kun ni 'joms pa ni// dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya// dpa'
304a7(rgyud 'bum): bo 'di dag gsang ba che/ / dkyil 'khor 'di dag bri bar bya// 'khor lo de ni dor nas ni// blo gros ldan pas phyir song ste// shar du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya go rims
304b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du dgod/ / 'khor lo mdzes pa'i dge legs can// rdo rje dpal be'u pad ces bya// gtsug tor rnam pa sna tshogs pa// rdo rje pad+mas rnam par brtan// lhung bzed dang ni 'khar
304b2(rgyud 'bum): gsil dang / / chos gos kyang ni khyad par du// shAkya seng ge ji srid par// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu gsungs// gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod pas// de rnams blo ldan brtan pas
304b3(rgyud 'bum): gri/ byang du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog de bzhin te// pad+ma ut+pal nyid dang ni// spyi blugs pags pa'i g.yang gzhi dang // dbyug gu'i shing ni mkhas pa yis//
304b4(rgyud 'bum): ma myos pa ru bri bar bya// slar yang lho ru song nas ni// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che// slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis// phyag rgya 'bad pas bri bar bya// rdo rje paT+Ti sha dang ni// dril bu rab
304b5(rgyud 'bum): tu mdzes pa dang / / dbyug gu dang ni tho ba dang // dbyug pa rdo rjes mtshon pa dang // lcags sgrog dang ni rtse gsum yang // 'di dag dpa' bo'i phyag rgya'o// dkyil 'khor nub tu song nas ni//
304b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo dang ldan// gsang ba'i chos ni dam pa'i mchog/ brtson 'grus chen po'i phyag rgya bri// ut+pal 'khor lo rdo rje dang // ral gri yang ni khyad par du// thod pa dang ni dgra sta
304b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid rma bya dang ni seng ge nyid/ / phyag rgya 'di ni brtson 'grus che// mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// 'khor lo'i grwa ni legs gnas par// rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs bri// phyi yi 'khor lo'i grwa
305a1(rgyud 'bum): ru ni rdo rje bdug pa zhes bya sogs/ / bdag nyid chen po 'bad pa yis// mchod pa 'di dag bri bar bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su// gzugs kyi rdzu
305a2(rgyud 'bum): la sogs ming / / gzugs smra de bzhin dri drang ni// khyad par du ni ro nyid dang // reg dang chos kyi dbyings dag ni/ ma bas pA yis ni dgod par bya// sgo yi rang ni thams cad du// sgo slong
305a3(rgyud 'bum): ba ni dgod par bya/ / de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ru// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// go rims bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi// sum rnams 'bad pas bri bar bya// nam mkha'i sbyin
305a4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba ni/ / sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba dang // shes rab pha rol phyin ma yang // phyag rgya kun dang yang dag ldan// ji srid de bzhin gshegs rig ma// thams cad shar du dgod par bya//
305a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas blo gros ldan pa yis// byang gi phyogs su song nas ni// gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma che// khro gnyer can dang grags 'dzin ma// khyad par du ni dpal bdun dang // mnga' bdun dang na
305a6(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs can ma/ / de la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams// bran dang bran mor yang dag ldan// de bzhin po nyo bo nya mo// gsang ba'i phyag rgya lhan cig bri/ rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// lho yi phyogs su
305a7(rgyud 'bum): rab phyin la/ / mA ma kI dang lcags sgrog dang // khab rtse rdo rje'i mtshan ma mchog/ de ltar bris nas blo ldan gyis// nub kyi phyogs su song nas ni// der ni phyin nas shes ldan gyis// skra
305b1(rgyud 'bum): can stobs chen bri bar bya/ / de bzhin 'dam bu mda'i rgyu dang // lha mo zla mdzes 'od zer 'dra// dkyil 'khor kun gyi mtshams rnams su// de bzhin nye ba'i sgra can ma// 'bad pa yis
305b2(rgyud 'bum): ni bri bar bya/ / rab bkra nor gyi blo gros dang // 'gugs byed pho nya lnga dang ldan// grwa yi cha ru bri bar bya// rdo rje mdung rtse zhes bya sogs// sgo yi nang ni thams cad du// sgo skyong ba ni
305b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par bri/ / gzhan gyis mi thub lha mo che// de bzhin ral pa gcig ma mchog/ rdo rje dregs mo lha mo che// rdo rje kum b+hi yang dag bri// de nas blo ldan dkyil 'khor ni// thams
305b4(rgyud 'bum): cad las ni 'thon ras su/ / shar gyi cha ni thams cad du// sngags pa mnyam par bzhag pa yis// khro chen gzhan gyis mi thub pa// de bzhin mi g.yo zhes bya dang // khams gsum/
305b5(rgyud 'bum): rnam rgyal snying po ni// mnga' bdag brgya phrag lnga yis bskor// shar du bris ras sngags pa yis// de nas byang gi char song ste// rta mgrin khro bo chen po dang // skar ma'i spyan ni khyang
305b6(rgyud 'bum): par du'o/ / khro gnyer rim pa rnam bsgyings pa// khro bo blo ldan brtson 'grus che// pho nya bran rnams thams cad dang // ma mo stong gis yongs bskor bar// 'jig rten mgon gyis bka'
305b7(rgyud 'bum): stsal to/ / de nas blo gros ldan pa yis// lho yi phyogs su song nas su// der ri phyin te brtson chen po// khro bo chen po stobs po che// rdo rjes mtshan pas legs mtshan pa// shes rab
306a1(rgyud 'bum): chen pos dgod par bya/ / khro bo zla ba'i thig le dang // de bzhin khro chen rdo rje 'chang // khro bo gzegs ma stobs po che// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang // rdo rjes
306a2(rgyud 'bum): 'og sa 'og dang / / de bzhin 'jigs pa'i mig can dang // rkang pas bsnun pa rdo rje mchog/ gsang dang rab gsang rjes 'gro dang // bran dang po nya rjes 'gro ba// rjes 'gro can blong
306a3(rgyud 'bum): bopo ni/ stong phrag gsum dang phyed kyis bskor// de ltar bris nas blo ldan gyis// nub kyi phyogs su phyin nas ni// der ni song skye brtson chen po// gshin rje mthar byed ces bya ba// gdong
306a4(rgyud 'bum): drug pa la lag drug pa/ / khro bo yi ge bdun zhes bya// khro bo'i gtso bo stong phrag ni// bdun dag gis ni yongs bskor ba'o// dkyil 'khor can thams cad du// khro bo gtum po thams cad bri//
306a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas blo ldan 'ongs nas su// rang rgyal rgyal ba thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya// de nas sngags pa 'ongs nas ri// rgyal ba nyan thos bri bar bya// de nas thams cad bris nas su//
306a6(rgyud 'bum): de rnams tshangs sogs lha de dag/ dkyil 'khor kun tu rnam par bri// dbang phyug che dang khyab 'jug dang // zla ba nyi ma zhes bya dang // gza' brgyad dang ni 'jig rten skyong // rgyal chen ris ni bzhi
306a7(rgyud 'bum): po dang / / de bzhin sum cu rtsa gsum nyid// 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams// 'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams// tshangs pa mdun na 'don pa rnams// tshangs chen rnam
306b1(rgyud 'bum): dang 'od chung rnams dang / tshad meng 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod
306b2(rgyud 'bum): nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba rnams dang / 'og min rnams dang / dag
306b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gnas pa rnam dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mtshams su dgod par bya'o/ / de nas dbang ldan du dbang ldan dang / dbang por dbang po dang / mer me lha dang / gshin rjer gshin rje dang / bden bral

306b5(rgyud 'bum): dgod par bya'o/ / phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o// lhor rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o// nub tu
306b6(rgyud 'bum): khro bo'i rgyal po chen po gshin rje gshed kyi phyag chen po dgod par bya'o/ / byang du rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya chen po rnam pa dgod par bya'o// de lta bu'i gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po dar dang

307a1(rgyud 'bum): rol du 'gro balnga po gzhag par bya'o/ / de bzhin du dbus su ri'i rgyal po lhun po'i tshad dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du ma rnam par bsams nas/ de'i steng du rdo rje seng ge'i
307a2(rgyud 'bum): khri la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhag par bya'o/ / de ltar dkyil 'khor rim gyis bkod nas nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyi cho gas mchod nas/ nye bar zhugs te dgugs
307a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dam tshig gis bcings nas mnye bar byas te/ mchod pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spro ba dang / bsdu ba la sogs pa byas nas/

307a5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bsgom par bya'o/ / de lta bu las langs nas de'i snyoms pa 'chang zhing snying rje dang / byams pa'i 'dren byed dang / mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' las 'das pa rab
307a6(rgyud 'bum): 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sprin gyis kun nas bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'bab pas rdo rje sems dpa'i hUM mdzad kyis phyag rgya rang
307a7(rgyud 'bum): gi lus la zhugs nas phyogs thams cad hUM gi yi ge'i sgras rab tu bsgrag par bya'o/ / bsnun pa bzhis rol pa dang bcas pas phyag byas la bzlas pa bya ste/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la
307b1(rgyud 'bum): cho ga bzhin du rdo rje slob dpon gyis bkug nas bcug ste bcings la dam tshig la bzhag par byas nas/ / rdo rjes grol gyi sbyor ba dang / kun nas 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbab ste/
307b2(rgyud 'bum): snying po 'di bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag mtshungs so snyam du bsam par bya'o// de la 'di ni thams cad 'bebs pa'i snying po bzhi por 'gyur ro// a A aM aH
307b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag byin gyis rlob pa la sogs pa byas nas/ slob dpon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag mtshungs pa yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
307b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi rdo rje lcags kyu'i se gol gtogs nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o// de la snying po ni 'di yin te/ badz+ra sa mA dzaH/ A gats+tsha A gats+tshan+tu sarba ta thA ga ta/ sarba
307b5(rgyud 'bum): bo d+hi satwa pa ri bri tAHprat+ye kA ra ha teH/ sa ha/ zhes so// oM badz+ra sa mA dzAHA gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra yo gi shwa raHsatwa na yaiHsa ha a haHa haH/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
307b6(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang / rgyud dang / gzungs rnams dang
307b7(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig dkyil 'khor du 'dus na byon par 'gyur ro/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms nas/ ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa bton la cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du
308a1(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan par byas nas/ sgo bzhi po rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas te/ las chen po dam pa'i phyag
308a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzhug par bya'o/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ su ra ta badz+ra badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM hoHa d+hi tiSh+Tha tu/ sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA maN+Da laM/ zhes so// de nas gsang ba'i mchod
308a3(rgyud 'bum): babal sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol pa btab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag gsol ba
308a4(rgyud 'bum): 'debs lags kyis/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bang gA la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad du gsol/ bdag la dngos grub thams
308a5(rgyud 'bum): cad stsal du gsol/ ji ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i sangs rgyas thams
308a6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi yul kun nas bka' sti byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas 'dir rdo rje snying po'i rgyan chos kyi dbyings
308a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi dkyil 'khor du slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas par 'gyur ba ni/ de nas gos dmar po phrag par gzar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar nas
308b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'dis snyan gsan dbab par bya ste/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya badz+ra d+hiSh+ThA naM/ ku ru mAM/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ye Shu me a d+hi tiSh+ThAn+tu sarba bud+d+ha mAMHpra be sha yan+tu/ pra ti pA la
308b2(rgyud 'bum): yan+tu pU dzAny+tsa ma pra yats+tshan+tu/ pra bidz+dzi smai/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra maN+Da a lang kA re/ ma hA badz+ri maN+Da le pra ta~M ba la yan+tu man+t+ra dzany+tsA ma pra yats+tsha yan+tu/ de nas slob dpon gyis de'i thal mor me tog dkar po'i
308b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba sngags 'dis btags nas/ nang du me tog bzhi dang sor mo'i rtse mor me tog re re bcug la/ de nas sngags 'di brjod cing gzhug par bya'o// tsU d+ha hri/ kruM shru dzu baHka pro khi shrI dz+dza hUMn
308b4(rgyud 'bum): a d+hi tiSh+Tha mAM/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya satwa pra bi shA mi/ de nas slob dpon gyis de'i gdong g.yogs bcings la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer chos kyi
308b5(rgyud 'bum): dbyings nam mkha'i khams rab tu khyab pa'i sbyor bas de bcug la/ sngags 'dis me tog gtor bar bya'o// sngags ni/ sa ma yo haM/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya hUM/ gang la me tog rnams
308b6(rgyud 'bum): lhung ba de nyid de'i lhar byin par bya'o/ / de nas cho ga bzhin du sngags 'dis dbab par bya'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ta Ta ta Ta/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ badz+ra hUM/ bi kr-i ti bi d+h+ya/ dzI hwA dur darlang ma
308b7(rgyud 'bum): ka/ ha si ta laM bo d+ha ra/ ka ha ka ha/ tsu lu tsu lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ an+d+ra ha sa dar bi dar/ badz+ra badz+rong+ga ta badz+ra ne tre/ badz+ra sho tra/ badz+ra g+hA Na/ badz+ra daMSh+Ta kiny+tsi rA yi sa pra bi sha badz+ra pA Ni
309a1(rgyud 'bum): da ya ma bi sha/ g+hur+Na b+har+dz+dza/ pUr+N+Na pUr+t+ta/ g+hAr+N+Na pa ya g+hur+N+Na pa ya/ b+h+ra ma yA b+h+ra ma yA/ pA ta ya mo Ta ya/ a be shA ya/ dzalpa dza wa/ dzam+bA ya dzalpA ya/ la b+hA la g+hu
309a2(rgyud 'bum): sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA ka ra/ pra ba ra/ d+harma lab+hU/ bi dza yo hi ha~M badz+ra kA ra hUM kr-ita swA hA/ dbab pa'i dam tshig go/ de ltar phab nas/ kye khyod kyis gang dge ba 'am mi dge ba mthong ngam zhes
309a3(rgyud 'bum): dri'o/ / de nas de de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am/ dge ba'am/ mi dge ba bdag gis 'di lta bu mthong ngo zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas slob dpon gyis de thams cad de
309a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du yongs su bzhag la/ mig bcings pa bkrol la/ dbang bskur ba'i don du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ de'i dbus su kha dog thams
309a5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis pad+ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa yid du 'ong ba 'am/ seng ge'i khri rang nyid kyis bris te/ de nas de la dar gyi bgo ba dang / me tog bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod la/ khyad par
309a6(rgyud 'bum): du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa nye bar mkho ba dang / dung dang / rdza rngu dang / rnga bo che dang / drung la
309a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa dang / gar dang / glu rnams kyis legs par mchod nas/ cod pan lnga'i dbang bskur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyi go 'phang la sngags 'dis rab tu
309b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya'o/ / oM sarba ta thA ga tA badz+reSh+NI Sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra satwa a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ spyi bo dang
309b2(rgyud 'bum): dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / snying kha dang / lte ba dang / rkeng pa nas/ rje ngar gyi bar du yi ge'i phyag rgya bkod la rang gi lha'i gzugs kyi sbyor bas blta bar bya'o// de de ltar dbang bskur nas
309b3(rgyud 'bum): rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming byas nas rdo rje'i tshig rnams bslab par bya'o/ / de la rdo rje'i gnas tshig rnams ni 'di dag ste/ rang bzhin gyis dbyer med pa'i phyir rang gi lus rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas
