309b5(rgyud 'bum): yongs su shes pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / hUM/ mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir mtshams med pa'i mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis lta bar gyur pa thams cad du nges par rig par
309b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / aM 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir 'dod chags kyi mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'dod chags 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ched du 'jug go// ha/
309b7(rgyud 'bum): byams pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir zhe sdang gi mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis nyes pa thams cad gcod pa'i ched du 'jug go// me shes rab sgron ma mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir
310a1(rgyud 'bum): gti mug gi mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis mun pa bsal bar byed par 'gyur ro// ra sems can thams cad sems can gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gan/
310a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dis sem can mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i don dang / sems can gyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// hrI/ sems can thams cad sems gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems
310a3(rgyud 'bum): nges pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba mngon par rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// a/ sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis
310a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i don dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// aM/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos te/ rdo rje'i gnas
310a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjes su rtogs par 'jug pa'i don dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// A.AMHbdud kyi las thams cad sangs rgyas kyi
310a6(rgyud 'bum): las te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis las thams cad rjes su rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / lus thams cad las yongs su 'das pa'i don du 'gyur ro// hUM/ ngag thams cad de bzhin gshegs
310a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gsung ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sgra ji bzhin pa thams cad rjes su rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / brjod pa las 'das pa'i chos rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// d+haM/ chos tham
310b1(rgyud 'bum): cad ma skyes pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'chi 'pho med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i lam las 'da' ba'i don du 'gyur ro// maM chos thams
310b2(rgyud 'bum): cad ma byung ba ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'gog pa med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i don du 'gyur ro// khaM/ 'di la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa// bdag gi
310b3(rgyud 'bum): de nyid rab rtogs te/ / bdag gis de nyid rab brtags nas// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur// de la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams
310b4(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / gter thams cad dang / 'khor lo thams cad dang / rdo rje thams cad dang / ral gri dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / dngul chu dang / bcud len rnams dang / gyen du 'gro ba
310b5(rgyud 'bum): dang rkang 'og dang / mi snang ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang // khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po nyid dang / byang chub
310b6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i sa rnams de myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / hUM yid ni rtse gcig gyur pa yis// sangs rgyas rjes dran bsgoms nus ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas
310b7(rgyud 'bum): sku gzugs bsgom par bya/ / sbyor ba de yi bka' drin gyis// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab gsal
311a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i kun tu bzang po phyag rgya na/ / legs par mnyam par bzhag pas sgom/ yo ni byed kyi sbyor ba yis// kun tu bzang po 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya
311a2(rgyud 'bum): legs par mnyam par bzhag pas sgom/ / rgyal po'i dbang bskur nyid ngam ni// yang na dbang phyug thob par 'gyur// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// de ni rang gis brtan por bsgom// 'jig
311a3(rgyud 'bum): rten kun gyi dbang phyug kyang / / thob na dngos grub gzhan ci sngos// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya gang // de bzhin nyid kyi 'od gsal pa// rdo rje'i sbyor bas de bsgoms pas// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor
311a4(rgyud 'bum): brtan por 'gyur/ / de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems kyi mchog sgom pa phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes nyid yin no// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// phyag
311a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyu kun gyi bdag nyid kyi/ / dam pa'i don nyid thob par 'gyur// gzi brjid phung po phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// gsang ba'i rgyal sring thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhanas
311a6(rgyud 'bum): tsonig smos/ / gdugs dkar btsug tu rkun po ni// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// gtsug tor me shes thob 'gyur// dngos grub gzhan su ci nag smos/ rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag
311a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyade ni yang dang yang du bsgom/ / chos kyi rgyal srid rnam rgyal nyid/ mdor bsdus pas ni thob par 'gyur// nam rgyal gtsug tor phyag rgya yis// dam pa'i yi ge bsgom par bya/
311b1(rgyud 'bum): legs par rab gnas 'od zer can// dngos grub ye shes thob par 'gyur// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// gtsug tor rnams kyis
311b2(rgyud 'bum): legs bshad pa/ / phyag rgya de rnams bdag nyid mchog/ de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// lhag pa'i lha ni gcig pu nyid// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// rang byung mchog tu mi 'gyur
311b3(rgyud 'bum): ba/ sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug go 'phang mchog/ sangs rgyas ye shes dri ma med// bdag nyid chen po thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
311b4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi gtsug tor gyi dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnams so/ / da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi yi ge'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes de la bslab par bya'o// zhes bya ba ni rnam par dpyod
311b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo s+ye/ rnam par 'byed pa'i don du shes par bya'o// oM baM/ a zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM a A aM
311b6(rgyud 'bum): aHpa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ don dam par chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par blta bar bya'o// oM paM/ na zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi
311b7(rgyud 'bum): ming dang / gzugs dang / shes rab dang / chos dang bcas pa la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM naM/ nga zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba dang zhi pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
312a1(rgyud 'bum): su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do/ / oM de/ sa zhes bya ba ni thogs pa med pa las yang dag par 'das shing / yongs su nyon mongs pa
312a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / rnam par spong ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sgo nas phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la sogs pa don dam pa'i bden pa la nye bar len pa mi dmigs pa'i
312a3(rgyud 'bum): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go/ / oM sruM/ ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par blta'o// oM te/
312a4(rgyud 'bum): ka zhes bya ba ni las kyi rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bya'o// oM kAM/ ma zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang / dran pa med cing snying rje che ba dang / shes rab
312a5(rgyud 'bum): rno ba las byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bshad do/ / oM mAM/ ga zhes bya ba ni zab mo gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM kaM/
312a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya bar skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs su rgal ba'i rang bzhin mi phyed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM dze d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi phyed
312a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rdo rje jo po rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ / oM d+haM/ sha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o//
312b1(rgyud 'bum): oM / kha zhes bya ba ni gang zag dang chos kyi bdag med pa nam mkha' ltar gsal zhing chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go//
312b2(rgyud 'bum): oM khaM/ k+Sha zhes bya ba ni g.yo ba skye ba med pas mi zad pa'i ye shes so sor dmigs te chos thams cad yongs su dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM k+ShaM/ nga zhes bya
312b3(rgyud 'bum): ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ / oM daM/ tha zhes bya ba ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
312b4(rgyud 'bum): su sbyong ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ / oM thaM/ D+ha zhes bya ba ni mthar phyin pa dang / mur thug pa med pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rab tu spangs pas zad pa dang mi skye ba'i
312b5(rgyud 'bum): ye shes thob pa'i mchog tu byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do/ / oM D+haM/ dz+haiM zhes bya ba ni dri ma'i rnam par dmigs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM dz+nyA/
312b6(rgyud 'bum): lus rnam par byed pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te rdo rje snying po'i lus so sor thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM kaM/
312b7(rgyud 'bum): sems rnam par 'byed pa ni nyes pa dang / rmongs pa dang / bag la nyal ba rab tu spangs nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor
313a1(rgyud 'bum): blta bar bya'o/ / oM aM/ ngag rnam par 'byed pa ni ngag gi spros pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi song blta bar bya'o// oM baM/ tsha zhes bya ba ni grib
313a2(rgyud 'bum): ma ma dmigs shing rang bzhin gyis dang ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ / oM tshe/ g+ha zhes bya ba ni gcig tu 'dres pa ma dmigs pa'i don dam par gnyis su med pa'i phyir
313a3(rgyud 'bum): chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ / oM g+haM/ Ta zhes bya ba ni ca co dang bral ba dang rdo rje snyems pa 'dzin pa'i phyir chos kyi sgor bshad do// oM TaM/ pha zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad
313a4(rgyud 'bum): dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'i tshul gyis gsang ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do/ / oM pheM/ Da zhes bya ba ni 'tshe ba las grol ba'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba grub pas so/
313a5(rgyud 'bum): sor thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM Da~M/ Sha zhes bya ba ni cha sgo mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ShaM/ chos thams cad nye bar
313a6(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go/ / oM uM/ chos bzhin ni nges par 'byung ba'i don du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jug pa'i phyir chos
313a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ / oM yaM/ de kho na nyid ni spros pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go// oM taM/ ma skyes pa'i chos rnam par grol
313b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don yod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do/ / oM hUM/ yongs su gzung ba med pa ni 'thab pa dang rtsod pa spang ba'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir chos thams kyi sgor blta bar
313b2(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / oM hU~M/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ni mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ka kha ga g+hang / rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid gzung ba'i
313b3(rgyud 'bum): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gnas so/ / oM tsa tsha dza dz+nyA nya/ snang ba ni gsal zhing 'bar ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// oM Ta Sha Da D+hA Na/ sgom pa ni chos thams cad kun tu sbyor ba dang bral ba
313b4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par sdud pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ / oM ta tha da d+ha na/ gzhi med pa ni chos thams cad ma 'dres pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go/ oM pa pha ba b+ha ma/ byang chub
313b5(rgyud 'bum): ni chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ / oM a ra la wa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni glo bur ba thams cad nges par dor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings so sor thob
313b6(rgyud 'bum): cing mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ye shes mkhyen pas sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM sha Sha sa ha/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa
313b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa rnam par 'byed par byed pa'o zhes so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sgo rnam par nges pa'o// // de nas rigs
314a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas par gyur pa ni/ sngon bzhin nges par byas nas ni// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid bsgoms nas/ ri rab chen po gru bzhi pa/ rin
314a2(rgyud 'bum): chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ / de yi steng du rdo rje che// de yi steng du pad+ma gzhag/ 'dab ma brgyad pa ches bkra ba// rnal 'byor gnas zhes rnam par bshad// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms
314a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa/ / yongs su rdzogs par bdag nyid kyis// sangs rgyas thams cad nyid bsgoms na// de ni bskal pa'i mthar thug gnas// sangs rgyas ku gyi phyag rgya che// 'od zer gsal ba'i
314a4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor can/ / rnal 'byor thams cad bsgom par bya// mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// b+ha ga chen po rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor pa gnas mi bzad pa// sangs rgyas
314a5(rgyud 'bum): kun bdag bsgoms nas ni/ / sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs par 'gyur// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// sems can kun la thams cad du// gang tshe rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// de
314a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub lag na gnas/ / rang bzhin gis ni 'od gsal chos// gdod nas dag cing ma 'dres pa// gang tshe ye shes mthong ba yi// de yi tshe na dag par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mdor
314a7(rgyud 'bum): bsdus pa/ / sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis// gang tshe rnal 'byor pa bsgom na// sna tshogs las ni byed par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya chen po'i ye she so//
314b1(rgyud 'bum): / 'khor lo sgyur ba rgyal po che// kun mchog sa yi dbang po ni// rdo rje sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// mnyam med 'khor lo sgyur ba mtshungs// gzi brjid phung po phyag rgya /
314b2(rgyud 'bum): legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs shing mdzes// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// rdo rje sbyor bas bsgoms nas ni// rang nyid gzi brjid phung por
314b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi// phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni// 'od zer gsal ba'i sbyor ba yis// sems can dag pa nyid du 'gyur// rnam par gsal ba'i gtsug
314b4(rgyud 'bum): tor rgya/ / ral gri 'bar ba'i 'od kyis 'khrugs// zag pa med pa'i sbyor ba yis// mnyam med gsal ba'i gtsug tor mtshungs// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par
314b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhag pas bsgom/ / rgyal ba'i gtsug tor sbyor ba yis// de yi rnam pa'i spyod yul 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig ye shes che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// kun tu bzang por
314b6(rgyud 'bum): sogs gzugs kyis/ / mnyam med rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// byang chub sems dang mtshungs pa'i
314b7(rgyud 'bum): 'od gtsug tor lnga ldan stobs po che/ / rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya che// don dam par ni bsgoms na ni// 'gro
315a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad 'gugs byed na/ / skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ skye dgu thams cad chags
315a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur na/ / bud med gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rdo rje legs pa'i phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// legs so ba ni rab gsol bas// bud med thams cad tshim par byed// byang chub
315a3(rgyud 'bum): kyisems kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ / rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya che// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od// dpral ba'i phyogs su gnas pa bsgom// de yis dang thod dbang bskur
315a4(rgyud 'bum): thob/ / rdo rje gzi brjid phyag rgya che// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'i 'od// snying khar gnas pa bsgom par bya// kun mkhyen ye shes stor bar byed// rin chen tog gi phyag rgya che// legs par
315a5(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa mchog/ sgrub po dam pas rdzogs par byed// rdo rje bzhad pa phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rdo rje bzhad pa ltar
315a6(rgyud 'bum): gyur te/ / de ni bskye dgu dga' byed 'gyur// da dang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// / pad+ma pad chen pad+ma la// dag pa'i chos ni mnyam bzhag pas// dam pa'i don du bsgom
315a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / mnyam mod rdo rje chos dang mtshungs// shes rab ye shes rdo rje no// bsgoms pas de ni rdo rje 'chang // shes rab pha rol phyin dag pa// stong nyid sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// dam pa'i don
315b1(rgyud 'bum): du bsgom byed/ / mnyam med 'jam dbyangs dang ni mtshungs// rdo rje rgyu yi phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag bsgoms nas// chos kyi 'khor lo kun mchog rtse/ mdor bsdus nas
315b2(rgyud 'bum): yis bskor/ / rdo rje smra ba phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje bzlas pa'i nus pa yis// ldem po'i ngag ni de yis 'chang // chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so//
315b3(rgyud 'bum): rje las kyi phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgoms na ni// kun nas kun nas rang nyid kyis// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// rdo rje srung ba byams pa che// rdo rje chos zhes grags pa ste// chos kyi sbyor
315b4(rgyud 'bum): bas bsgoms na ni/ / rdo rje srung ba dang mtshungs 'gyur// rdo rje gnod sbyin brtson 'grus che// khro bo chen po stobs po che// dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin dang mtshungs 'gyur//
315b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che// lus ngag yid kyis de bzhin du// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin par 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// / sgeg mos mngon
315b6(rgyud 'bum): par dga' ba ste/ / 'phreng ba yi ni dbang bskur ba// glu mas mdzes pa'i sgra dbyangs byed// gar mas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// dri mas bzang po'i dri yin te/ me tog byang chub yan lag nyid
315b7(rgyud 'bum): sgron mas mtha' dag gsal ba'o/ / bdug pas bdug pa dag la brtson// lcags kyus dbang phyug 'gugs byed na// skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// zhags pas dbang po 'ching 'gyur na
316a1(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa'i sems can smos ci dgos/ / lcags sgrog gis ni 'phrog byed dang // tshangs sogs dbang phyug chen po'ang 'ching // 'bebs pas thams cad 'bebs 'gyur na/
316a2(rgyud 'bum): dman pa'i mi dag smos ci dgos// 'di nyid kyi ni sbyor ba yis// chos kyi yi ge mchog gi ni// phyag rgya'i ye shes rab sbyor bas// sbyar te myur du bsgrub par bya// 'di yi sbyor ba shes par bya//
316a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i 'khor lo khyad par du// spyi gtsug snying kha rkang pa'i bar// yi ge yis ni yongs gang bar// gzugs brnyan gcig gi go 'phang gyur// sems rtse gcig gyur bsam gtan gyi//
316a4(rgyud 'bum): sa la rab gnas pad+ma ni// dbang chen gyi ni gnas zhes bshad// dbang po gnyis ni mtshungs sbyor bas// dbang phyug kyang ni bsgrub par bya// dbang chen dag ni gru bzhi pa// dbang chen gyi ni
316a5(rgyud 'bum): las su bshad/ / chu ni zlum por shes par bya// pad+ma'i mtshan mas rnam par mtshan// zhi bar byed pa'i las dang ldan// zhi ba'i don du de bshad do// me ni gru gsum shes par bya// sum mdo
316a6(rgyud 'bum): yi ni gnas su gnas/ / dbang du bya ba sgrub don du// pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba'i 'od// mngon spyod la ni brtson 'grus che// rlung gi dkyil 'khor brjod bya ste/ ral gri yi ni phyag rgya'i dbyibs/
316a7(rgyud 'bum): dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// ser dang dkar dang de bzhin dmar// nag po yang ni khyad par du// dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi nas ni// tha ma'i bar du rab tu brtag/ dang po rdo rje rab tu gzhag
316b1(rgyud 'bum): de yi rjes su rin chen te/ / pad+ma dang ni las rnal 'byor// grub pa'i go 'phang rim par bshad// phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rtag pas de bzhin
316b2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bka' stsal pa/ gnyis dang gnyis su med pas yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rtag pa dang chad pa
316b3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su dag pas chos thams cad zhi ba dang / mtha' dang / mtha' med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// zad pa'i sgo dang / zad pa'i mtha' dang / zad pa'i mur thug pa dang ldan pas chos thams cad
316b4(rgyud 'bum): zad pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha' rnam par dag pas chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mig lnga las yang
316b5(rgyud 'bum): dag par 'das pas chos thams cad nam mkha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / sems can thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyis phyag rgyas rgyas btab
316b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// byang chub kyi sems dang tha mi dad pas chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi/
316b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos kyi dbyings mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// ngo bo nyid med pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas
317a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas btab pa'o/ / 'tsho ba med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skad cig ma nyid pas chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab
317a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i mtha' dang ldan pas chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' de bzhin nyid pas chos thar
317a3(rgyud 'bum): cad de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / gdod ma nas yongs su dag pas chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam
317a4(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid pas chos thams cad chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / spros pa'i dmigs pa rnam par grol bas chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// re ba
317a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad las rnam par grol bas chos thams cad smon pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis na chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//
317a6(rgyud 'bum): phung po lnga yongs su 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid kyis na chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyis bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas
317a7(rgyud 'bum): btab pa'o/ / shin tu mi g.yo ba'i phyir chos thams cad zhi ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// don dam pa'i bden pa yang dag par 'du ba'i phyir chos thams cad bden pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab
317b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / 'tsho ba rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mchog tu mthar phyin pa'i chos thams cad 'khrugs pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab
317b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' bcad pa'i phyir chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'jal ba'i dbang du byed pa dang dbang du bya ba med pa'i phyir chos thams
317b3(rgyud 'bum): cad sgro 'dogs pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / byed pa pos byas pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad 'byung
317b4(rgyud 'bum): pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'gag pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdong ma nas
317b5(rgyud 'bum): skye ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / rtog ge kun tu spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gzugs rnam par lta ba med pa'i
317b6(rgyud 'bum): phyir chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / gnas yongs su bcad ba'i phyir chos thams cad nye bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mi mthun pa'i phyogs
317b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nye bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad la rjes su sbyor ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad med pa'i phyir chos thams cad las kyi rnam par smin pa
318a1(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / skye ba dang gnas pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// nam mkha' dang
318a2(rgyud 'bum): khyad par med pa'i phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos thams cad gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
318a3(rgyud 'bum): shes pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / snying po med pa'i phyir chos thams cad phung po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// snying po dang bcas pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad khams dang skye mched
318a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas chos thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtha' gcig tu 'jig rten
318a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi lam rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / lha'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad phyag rgya chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//
318a6(rgyud 'bum): mtha' gcig tu chos la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// thams cad kyi las sna tshogs byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//
318a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dam tshig thams cad rjes su sgrub pa'i phyir chos thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi
318b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// theg pa chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / gsang sngags kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab
318b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang /
318b3(rgyud 'bum): ye shes thams cad kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid
318b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / so sor tog pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / chos thams cad chos kyi
318b5(rgyud 'bum): dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o// muH/ 'jam dpal phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag ni mi mnyam pa dang /
318b6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi tshig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa theg pa chen po'i tshig ste/
318b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyag rgya nyid kyi phyag rgya'i tshig gang gis/ phyag rgya'i tshig 'di rnams kyis kyang
319a1(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong skyed par byed do/ / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// a aM aHAM/ sngags pas phyag rgya 'di lha
319a2(rgyud 'bum): bus rgyas btab na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shA kya phyag rgya yang dag par 'du'o// hUM/ myur du ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// khaM/ de nas da ni de bzhin gshegs
319a3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi sbyor ba thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes su gyur pa ni/ snying gi dbus su rtag bsgom bya// pad+ma chen po'angab brgyad pa// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i
319a4(rgyud 'bum): 'od/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// de yi sbyang du rtag sgom pa// yi ge yi ni gtso bo mchog/ thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// kha ba pa mo'i 'od 'dra 'od// dpa' bo kun da zla ltar
319a5(rgyud 'bum): dkar/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar 'od gsal// zhi ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin sku// kun mkhyen ye shes kyis gang ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // ra sA ya na dang mtshungs
319a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ kha yig mkha' 'drar shes par bya// thig le nA dus rnam par spras// gsang ba chen po mchog tu mdzes// thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/ de yi steng du 'od zer che// 'bar ba'i
319a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ / rdo rje rdo rje lta bur gnas// spyi bor rtse mo lnga dang ldan// de yi steng du rtag bsam pa/ yi ge mchog gi go 'phang ngo // man ngag mchog las shes bya ste// ga
319b1(rgyud 'bum): du na ni nga mi smra/ / sangs rgyas mkhas pa thams cad kyis// mdor bsdus nas ni 'di gsungs so// rnam par grol ba gsum thob nas/ thob 'gyur 'di ni gzhan du min// lce ni rkar la sbyar
319b2(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / sna yi rtse mor yi ge hUM// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// phyag rgya'i go 'phang tshig gis ni// shes rab ldan pas rang sems sgrom// snang ba med cing spros med pa//
319b3(rgyud 'bum): shin tu mchog tu phrar shes bya// khyab bdag bsod nams ye shes dngos// bsam bya bsam gtan brtson byas te// mig dang sgron ma'i 'od bzhin du// ra yig 'bar ba dang ldan pa/
319b4(rgyud 'bum): mgrin pa 'bad pas bcum nas ni// dkar po ser po sngon po'i 'od// dmar po yang ni bdag gis spro// 'bar ba 'di dag 'bad pa yis// 'di dag yang dag nyer mtshon bya// snying
319b5(rgyud 'bum): khar gsal bar byas nas su/ / de bzhin thams cad spyi bor song // gnas de las ni 'thor nas kyang // dbang po thams cad dgang bar bya// de las 'thon nas 'jig rten ni// mtshungs
319b6(rgyud 'bum): par kun nas thams cad du/ / slar yang de ru 'ongs nas ni// de ni 'jug par rab tu bsam// yid kyis de ltar bsgoms na ni// rang nyid 'khor los sgyur lta bur// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor
319b7(rgyud 'bum): bas/ legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// dbang po lngas ni dmigs nas yang // mi rnams lus ni dag par 'gyur// ji snyed bud med yon tan dang // ldan pa kun tu gnas pa'i//
320a1(rgyud 'bum): bkug nas bcug ste bcings nas su// dbang du bya ste bsgrub par bya// de rnams lhan cig yongs brten nas// sngags pa mchog gi dngos grub thob// gsang ba mchog
320a2(rgyud 'bum): tu dgyes pa na/ / shes rab pha rol phyin pa ste// zhi ba'i chos kyi rim pa mchog/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub gang // de 'grub gzhan lha smos
320a3(rgyud 'bum): ci dgos/ / mchog ni rtag par shes par bya// bar mas phun sum tshogs pa ste// stong pa nyid dang mtshan med mchog/ smon pa med pa zhes su grags// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/
320a4(rgyud 'bum): kun khyen ye shes rdzogs par byed// sa bcu yi ni stobs dag gis// pha rol phyin pa thams cad thob// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgoms na// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// de nyid
320a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni bcud kyis len/ / gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ theg chen mchog tu yid 'ongs pa// stong nyid bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ gang gis rtag tu
320a6(rgyud 'bum): sgom byed na/ / de yang rdo rje 'dzir rgyal po// yon tan mchog las skyes par 'gyur// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// bud med lus ngag yid sbyor bas// yongs reg a ling gtsum pas//
320a7(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bud med kha dog ljang khu gang // rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de tshe de ni sngags pas bsten// mnyam med gsang ba'i ye shes mtshungs// bud med/
320b1(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig kha dog dkar// pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i 'od// de dang lhan cig sngags pas bsdad// dam pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bu mo gang zhig kha dog dmar// ut+pa la yi rgyan 'chang ma/
320b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags pas de dang lhan cig gnas// shes rab pha rol phyin mtshungs 'gyur// bud med in+d+ra nI la mtshungs// gsang ba rdo rje rjes su sbyor// rig 'dzin rnams ni rgyal po ni// stobs chen grub par de
320b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gsang chen ma ra ta ka mtshungs// gang gis rtag tu bsten pa ni// de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// myur du gsang ba'i dam par 'gyur// bud med pad+ma rA ga dang // rgyan rnams kun gyis
320b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par brgyan/ / dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje 'dzin ma lta bur sgrub// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ bsam pas rtag tu sgom pa
320b5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / mnyam meng sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi// mchog gi gnas kyis bsgoms na ni// rnal 'byor mchog gis mi ring bar/ rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'gyur// yang
320b6(rgyud 'bum): ngag spong ba rnam pa bzhi/ / legs par mnyam par bzhag pa sgom// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// mnyam med 'jig rten dbang phyug mtshungs// so so yang dag rig pa bzhi// shin tu
320b7(rgyud 'bum): mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni/ / rdo rje sangs rgyas ting 'dzin mchog mnyam med 'jam pa'i mchog dang 'dra// mi 'jigs pa ni rnam pa bzhi/ rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni
321a1(rgyud 'bum): snyoms 'jug pas/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu ste// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni rkang pa bzhi// shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdzu 'phrul
321a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ / tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi po// tshad med pa yi sems kyis ni// rdo rje sbyar bar bdag bsgoms na// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'grub// sbyor ba'i bdag nyid dbang po
321a3(rgyud 'bum): lnga/ dam pa'i don gyis bsgoms na ni// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// mnyam med rdo rje sangs rgyas mtshungs// yid kyi stobs ni rnam pa lnga// shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni//
321a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo sgyur ba brtson 'grus che// stobs 'dzin lta bu nyid du 'gyur// byang chub yan lag rin chen bdun// gsang sngags sgom pas bsgoms na ni// rtog pa'i ye shes sbyor ba yis//
321a5(rgyud 'bum): khyab bdag chos kun 'dzin par 'gyur// 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi lam// kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa// de ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten shes la rab tu 'da'//
321a6(rgyud 'bum): rjes su dran pa rnam pa drug/ bdag nyid rtse gcig gis bsgoms na// sngags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa ru// sngags pa dus mi ring bar 'gyur// stobs bcu po ni yang dag bsgoms// bsgoms pa'i
321a7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor de nyid kyis/ / bsod nams ye shes yongs rdzogs te// rtag tu stobs bcu'i dam par 'gyur// pha rol phyin bcu yongs su rdzogs// stobs rnams dang ni dbang rnams dang //
321b1(rgyud 'bum): sa rnams kun gyis nges bskyed nas// myur du mtshan ma dag par 'gyur// rnam grol gos kyis bsgribs nas su// de yi nu ma shin tu bsnun// rdza ngar gyis kyang de bzhin du// mchu
321b2(rgyud 'bum): yis mchu ni yongs su bzung / / 'bad pas dam du a ling ga/ byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje ye shes brtson 'grus che// rdo rje dbyings su bdag brten pas// rnam pa sna tshogs
321b3(rgyud 'bum): ka ra na/ / rnal 'byor shes pa de bsten bya// bud med rnams kyi dam tshig 'grub// rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs par 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi b+ha gas bsnun// ling gA myur du gang
321b4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / sbyor ba 'di ni mkhyen pa yis// stobs chen sangs rgyasku rab tu grub// gsang ba 'di ni dam pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'o// gsang ba 'di yi sbyor ba yis//
321b5(rgyud 'bum): yi ge dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i// chos su grags pa gang yin pa// de rnams sgom byed gtso bo ni// dngos grub thams cad rab tshogs pa'o//
321b6(rgyud 'bum): ma 'dres pa yi chos bco brgyad// sangs rgyas chos su grags pa ste// de rnams bsgom pa dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyar byed// bsam gtan bzhi po thob nas ni//
321b7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs med pa yi rtag par yang // 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug ldan pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa po// byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun// chos ni mchog tu rmad byung ba//
322a1(rgyud 'bum): de rnams bsgoms pa dang ldan pas// byang chub sems dpa'i skyob pa'o// sngags rnams thams cad rab 'grub cing // sbyor ba thams cad thams cad du'o//
322a2(rgyud 'bum): des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas chos nyid bsgom par bya// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam// ye shes rirab rnyed dka'// mchod dang dbang bskur byin
322a3(rgyud 'bum): brlabs pas/ / rnyed 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no// bshags dang gsol ba gdab pa dang // bdag nyid dbul ba de bzhin no// sangs rgyas sogs la yi rang zhing // de bzhin yongs su
322a4(rgyud 'bum): bsngo ba dang / / byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed// khyad par du ni dus kun tu'o// thog ma bar dang phye ma red du// ji lta bzhin du rjes bsgoms pas// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgrub bya ste/
322a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di la the tshom yod ma yin// 'gro ba sems kyis spro ba ni// brtan pa'i snying por legs par bshad// stong nyid de bzhin nyid las phyung // rdo rje sems dpar de bshad do// 'gro ba
322a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bkug nas su/ / sangs rgyas byang chub sbyar bar bya// don yod ye shes dag pa ste// rdo rje rgyal po mchog ces bshad// rdo rje chags pas chags gyur nas// rang bzhin gyis
322a7(rgyud 'bum): ni brtan par 'gyur/ / 'gro ba ma lus lus med pa// de yi sems ni chags par bshad// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// rnam par dben zhing gnyis su med// gang tshogs dag pa'i
322b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid mthong / / de tshe rdo rje legs par bshad// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po yis// ming dang brda ni sbyar ba'o// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// sdom pa mchog tu dam pa'o//
322b2(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par byas pa ste// sa dang pha rol phyin mchog gtso// rdo rje dbang bskur las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes te//
322b3(rgyud 'bum): rnyog pa med cing yi ge med// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid mchog/ brtan pa rtag pa nyid du 'gyur// nam mkha'i mdzod ni mdzod chen po// chos rnams thams cad dbang sgyur ba// yid
322b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nor bu rdo rje che/ / rdo rje tog ni bla na med// ye shes snang ba rin chen che// rmad du byung ba nges par mthong // de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ni// rdo rje bzhad pa zhes su grags/
322b5(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi bdag med las byung ba// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ chos nyid dam pa bsam du med// rdo rje chos zhes bya bar dran// rdo rje blo gros snang ba che// shes rab ye shes dri yang
322b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ zag med shes rab chen po pa// de ni rdo rje rnon por bshad// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos 'khor lo// gnyis su med las byung bar mtshon// yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel ming //
322b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rgyu las nges par bshad// dgongs pa skad ni spros pa'i mchog/ yul rnams kyis ni bshad pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyis bzlas pa che// de ni rdo rje smra bar bshad// sems can kun gyi
323a1(rgyud 'bum): don la sbyar/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che// gdod nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor che// de ni rdo rje las su bshad// bla na med pa'i byams pa che// bsrung ba'i bya ba gong na me pa//
323a2(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i chos ni brtson chen po// rdo rje bsung ba zhes su grags// shes rab thabs kyi khro bo che// sangs rgyas kun dang rjes 'thun pa// nyon mongs thams cad za ba che// de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin brjod//
323a3(rgyud 'bum): lus ngag yid ni yang dag sbyor// sgrib pa med cing yi ge bral// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // de ni rdo rje mtshams sbyor bshad// rdo rje ye shes rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs
323a4(rgyud 'bum): po che/ / thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// rig pa mchog ces bya bar bshad// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i glus de bzhin gshegs pa thams
323a5(rgyud 'bum): / cad legs par mchod nas glur blangs pa/ oM sarba bud+d+ha pa ra me shA ra pu d+h+ya shud+d+ha/ la li hoHsu b+ha gaHsu ra taHma hA ma hA A di ma hA bo d+hi shuD+ha shun+ta/ yo gI shwa ra tA b+ha bi tA da ma ka ta thA ga ta/ byang chub
323a6(rgyud 'bum): sems bskyed las 'khrungs pa/ / sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa'i chos// gdod nas zhi ba la phyag 'tshal// byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa po// rdo rje can kun la
323a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje cha// sangs rgyas byang chub la phyag 'tshal// mi dmigs go 'phang la gnas pa// mtha' las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal// 'dren pa rnams kyi stobs po
323b1(rgyud 'bum): tshehUM gi yi ge ma lus pa/ / thams cad mkhyen pa mtha' dag dang // shin tu yongs su mya ngan 'das// 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon bzang po// rdo rje ye shes dri ma med// rnam par dag pa rdo rje
323b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ dngos grub thams cad rab gsol byed// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyi mgon// dus gsum bsam pa dbang sgyur ba// sems can rnam la phan don du// 'byung ba khyod la phyag 'tshal
323b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dud/ / rdo rje snying po rgyan las/ dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur nas// de
323b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya'i don ched du brjod pa/ de nas yang dag
323b5(rgyud 'bum): bshad bya ba/ / dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje snying po zhes grags pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par mdzes// sgo khyud rdo rje'i
323b6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs brnyan dang / / phyag rgya dang ldan rab tu mdzes// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// 'khor lo gnyis ni rab tu gnas// rtsibs brgyad pa dang bcu drug rtsibs// rnam par dbye ba legs
323b7(rgyud 'bum): par btag/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor nang gi ni// lte ba'i gnas su legs brtags pa// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// ge sar gtams pas rab tu mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ri
324a1(rgyud 'bum): khyab bdag rnal 'byor dbang phyug che/ / rnam par snang mdzad brtson chen po// sems can kun la rjes brtse bas// de yi nye 'khor kun tu ni// de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad//
324a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams dgod// shar du dgod bya 'khor lo can// gtsug tor dkar po nub tu gnas// gzi brjid phung po lho ru'o// rnam par rgyal ba byang du gnas// dbang ldan rnam par gsal ba
324a3(rgyud 'bum): bri/ mar ni steng 'gro dgod par bya// steng 'gro chen po bden bral du// rlung du rgyal ba chen po gnas// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor ldan pas 'di
324a4(rgyud 'bum): dag bri/ / mi bskyod pa ni shar du dgod// lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan no// nub tu 'od dpag med par 'gyur// byang du don yod grub pa'i ming // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lo brten pa'o//
324a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bri// thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas// 'khor rnam 'i dkyil 'khor ba'o// 'phreng ba rnam par dgod
324a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba/ rang gi phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar// rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i// lha mo 'bad pas dgod par bya// rdo rje bdug pa la sogs rI// de bzhin gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs// rdo rje lcag
324a7(rgyud 'bum): kyu la sogs pa/ / sgo srungs 'bad pas bri bar bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor la gnas par// kun tu bzang sogs rim bzhin bri// rang gi phyag rgya'i 'khor rnams dang // pho nya yi ni 'khor dag
324b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang // de bzhin pho nya pho nyam// rgya mtsho yi ni dkyil 'khor ni// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba'o// phyi ru phyi rol rdo rje'i ming // dkyil 'khor la ni 'bad
324b2(rgyud 'bum): pas bri/ / dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas su// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po bri// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen ming // dbang po la sogs lha thams cad// ma mo kun dang srin mo
324b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang klu// de bzhin lha rnams thams cad dang // brtson 'grus chen po nam mkha' lding // 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas
324b4(rgyud 'bum): su/ khyad par du ni mchod par bya// me tog bdug spos rol mo'i tshogs// de bzhin bza' dang ston mo sogs// 'phreng ba'i rgyan ni sna tshogs kyis// de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod
324b5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / dkyil 'khor kun gyi cho ga yis// mchod pa kun gyis thams cad nas// 'khor lo kun gyi cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// de nas slob ma thams cad
324b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhug/ yongs su dag pa khyad par du// byang chub sems ri bskyed nas su// byang chub bslab pa rjes spyod pa// cho ga shes pa'i sngags pas gzhug/ 'dren pa rnams la mchog tu
324b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhug/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur sbyor ba yis// dbang bskur ba ri de ras smin// seng ge'i khri yi steng du ni// ngar dang me tog chun pos sbas// dkar po'i gdugs dang rin chen che// bla re N+ya
325a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba dang / / de yi g.yas kyi drung du ni// mkhas pa yis ni gzhag par bya// ba ngan rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs ras kyis rab mchod pa// g.yon gyi drung du thams
325a2(rgyud 'bum): cad nas/ / 'bad pa yis ni gzhag par bya// rin chen sman kun gyis gang ba'i// bum pa legs par bzhag byas te// rdo rje'i ming gi dbang bskur gyis// de la rang gis dbang bskur bya//
325a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba// mkhas pa yis ni slar yang bya// kun gyi cod pan dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya// chos kyi cod pan dbang bskur dang // sangs rgyas
325a4(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi skyob pa ni/ / sna tshogs las kyi dbang bskur byin// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam mtshungs pa'o// chos kyi sku yi dbang bskur ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi sgrol ma sbyir// de ltar slob
325a5(rgyud 'bum): ma dbang bsgyur ba/ khyad par du ni sngags pas bya// de la dam tshig cho ga yis// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya// slob dpon brnyas par mi bya zhing // sgrub po kun la smad mi bya/
325a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad la// 'da' bar mi byasmra mi bya// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang // grub mtha'i rigs pa thams cad la// smad par mi bya blang mi bya// de la mngon par dga'
325a7(rgyud 'bum): ba spangs/ / sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs shing // de bzhin bsod nams thams cad bsdu// bza' dang ston mo du ma la// bza' bar mi bya smang mi bya// 'dod pas bcom ldan sam
325b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' ste/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi sras bdag skyes// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas thamacad chags las 'khrungs// de bzhin zhe sdang rmongs las
325b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khrungs/ / mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kun dang // dbu ma'i gnas la gnas nas su// de nyid dam tshig shes nas su// sangs rgyas byang chub yong mi spong // lus can kun la 'tshe mi bya//
325b3(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis ser sna mi bya ste// phrag dog bya bar mi bya'o// dam pa'i chos ni spang mi bya// byang chub sems ni mchog tu bde// chang gi btung ba spang bya ste// pha rol bud med rnam par spang // thams
325b4(rgyud 'bum): cad mkhyen pa yongs mi dor/ / rtag tu srog chags gsad mi bya// sems can kun la snying rje dang // byams pa yang ni rnam par bsgom// sems can rnams la phan pa ni// yang dang yang du yongs bsdu
325b5(rgyud 'bum): bya/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa// dam tshig de nyid 'di dag ni// slob ma rnams la rjes brtse bas/ mkhas pa yis ni bstan par bya// de nas phyag rgya rjes bcing ba// go rims bzhin du
325b6(rgyud 'bum): bstan par bya/ / phyag rgya 'di dag khyad par gyi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya// thal mo bstan par bsdam par bya// me tog zum pa'i tshul du mdzes// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis//
325b7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i thal mo zhes su bsgrags/ rtse mo thams cad legs brkyang ba// pad+ma'i phyag rgya zhes su brjod// re re'i mtsham su ngas bcings pa// de ni rdo rje thal mor brtags// sor mo thams cad nges
326a1(rgyud 'bum): bsdams pa/ / rdo rje bsdams pas legs bcings pa// sor mo brkyang ste steng du bstan// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// khu tshur nang du byas nas ni// gnyi
326a2(rgyud 'bum): ka sbyor bas yongs su brtag/ 'khor lo sgyur sogs phyag rgya'o// dam pa sbyin pa yin par bshad// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi// dam tshig phyag tu 'di yin no// ming med nang bcug
326a3(rgyud 'bum): khu tshur gyis/ / kun gyi rtse mor yongs su brtag/ rdo rje'i rnam pa legs par sbyar// rdo rje chen po zhes su bsgrags// mthe'u chung srin lag khu tshur las// gung mo legs par brkyang nas su//
326a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mos mthe bong yongs su sbyar// 'khor los sgyur ba nyid gsol byed// brkyang ba'i rtse mo sbyar ba ni// gdugs dkar zhes ni rab tu grags// srin lag dang ni mthe bong sbyar// gung mo
326a5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ni brtag par bya/ / gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya che// gzi brjid phung po nyid gsol byed// de nyid ral gri lta bur sbyar// rnam par rgyal ba zhes su grags// de nyid rgyal ba zhes bya ba//
326a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje ldan pa de bzhin gshegs// khu tshur snying po ldan byas pas// gtsug tor rnam pa'i 'byung gnas te// thub dka' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// steng du 'gro ba zhes su bshad// rdo rje
326a7(rgyud 'bum): bsdams pa yongs su sbyar/ / dam tshig kun gyi 'byung gnas te// gung mo'i rtse mo mchog tu sbyar// mthe'u chung dang ni mthe bong brkyang // lcags kyu mda' yi sbyor ba yis// legs so ba'i
326b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bar bya/ / gung mo rdo rje rin chen rtse// phye ba gzi brjid mchog gi mchog/ rgyal mtshan gnas su nges par sbyar// bzhad pa'i gnas su sbyar bar bya// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// dbu
326b2(rgyud 'bum): ma pad+ma lha bur bskum/ / ral gri 'dzin pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i 'khor los sgyur// kha ru phye mo'i phyag rgya che// rdo rje smra ba nyid du 'gyur// las kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya che//
326b3(rgyud 'bum): gar mtshungs rdo rje sna tshogs can// chos yongs sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje srung bar brtag par bya// mche ba gnyis ni rnam par gtsigs// rdo rje gnod sbyin zhes su bshad// khu tshur bcangs
326b4(rgyud 'bum): pa khu tshur gyi/ / rdo rje thal mo snying khar gzhag/ rdo rje sgeg mo zhes su grags// yongs su sbyar ba spyi bor gzhag/ rdo rje 'phreng ba zhes su brjod// thal mo sbyar ba gdong du dgrol// rdo rje glu mar
326b5(rgyud 'bum): rjes su bsgrags/ / 'gyed cing 'dud pa'i sbyor ba yis// de ri rdo rje gar mar bshad// pad+ma'i thal mo gdong du dbye// spyi bor yongs su sbyar la gzhag/ snying khar mthe bong mnyam pa dang //
326b6(rgyud 'bum): rab tu brkyang ba byug pa'o// lag pa steng du yongs brkyang ba// gzugs kyi phyag rgya nyid du 'gyur// lag gnyis rna ba'i lam du gnag/ sgra yi phyag rgya nyid du bshad// dri ni byug pa'i sbyor ba
326b7(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / dri yi phyag rgya zhes su brjod// gdong du snyim pa phye ba ni/ ro yi phyag rgya zhes su brjod// mkha' la myur ba'i sbyor ba yis// reg pa reg pa zhes su bshad// mthe'u chung gnyis ni yongs
327a1(rgyud 'bum): su sbyar/ / mdzub mo lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las// de nyid zhags pa'i dbyibs dang ni// lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par brtag/ bzhi pa rdo rje dril bu zhes// rdo rje 'bebs par
327a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par bcag/ phyag rgya kun dang nye ba'i rgyu// blo gros ldan pa rang gis brtag/ thal mo yongs su sbyar la bsdum// mdzub mo gnyis po bskum nas ni// rin po che yi rnam par bcing /
327a3(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bzang po blo ldan gyis// de las rtse mo rtse mo bskum// sems kyis byams pa bsgoms nas so// mdzub mo sbyar la bcug nas ni// ral gri'i rnam par bcag pa ste// 'di ni nam mkha'i
327a4(rgyud 'bum): snying po yi/ / phyag rgyar sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags// de nas ral gri'i mtshon cha yi// rnam par ru ni nyer gnas po// phyag rgya 'di ni rnam 'gog par// thams cad kyis ni yongs su brjod//
327a5(rgyud 'bum): gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje thal mo rab tu brkyang // pad+ma lta bur rnam par brtag/ pad+ma'i lag pa blo ldan gyis// de nyid me tog zum tshul dang // ut+pal rnam pa ltar mdzes pa// 'di
327a6(rgyud 'bum): ni pad+ma'i sgrol ba'i rgya/ / pad+ma'i mgon po zhus su grags// mche ba gtsigs pa dang ldan pa'i// kha dang 'dra bar legs par brtag/ 'di ni rtswa mgrin phyag rgya ste/ kha yi phyogs su rab tu brtag/
327a7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i thal mo dpral ba yi// khro gnyer du ni nye bar sbyar// rdo rje thal mo 'bebs pa che// dpal gyi snying po rin chen ldan// yid bzhin nor bu'i rnam pa bzung // thal mo legs par rab tu brkya
327b1(rgyud 'bum): mi zad blo gros phyag rgya che/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags// gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rin chen rdo rje snying khar gzhag/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya ste// nam mkha'i mdzod nyid
327b2(rgyud 'bum): ster bar byed/ / rdo rje chen po legs par brkyang // mthe'u chung mthe bong nges par bcing // lag pa gnyis ni nges par brtag/ blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyar 'gyur// rdo rje thal mo steng du
327b3(rgyud 'bum): bsgreng / / mdzub mo gnyis po sbyar bar bya// 'di ni rdo rje snying po'i rgyu// rdo rje snying pos bka' stsal to// khu tshur nang du byas nas su// mdzub mo gnyis po rtse mo bya// 'di ni 'jam dpal
327b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya ste/ / rdo rje ral gri zhes su brtag/ de nyid shag ti'i rnam pa ni// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan gyi'o// gshin rje mthar byed mdung rtser 'gyur// mdung rtse chen por rab tu brtag/
327b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo bskum par byas nas ni// gung mo'i steng du yongs su gzhag/ zhags pa'i rnam pa rab ldan pa'i// gshin rje yang ni 'jigs par byed// de nyid ral gri byas pa ni// sku can ma
327b6(rgyud 'bum): ru rab tu bshad/ / khu tshur thams cad nges bcings te/ mdzub mo gcig ni bskum par bya// 'di ni nye ba'i sku can ma yi rgyar// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal to// rdo rje bsdam
327b7(rgyud 'bum): pa steng bcings te/ / dbu ma gnyis ni rnam par spangs// mdzub mo rdo rje'i rnam par bya// mthe'u chung dang ni mthe bong brkyang // 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i// phyag rgya don kun sgrub byed yin
328a1(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo mthe bong bsnams pa ni/ / mA ma kIr ni yongs su bshad// mdzub mor lcags sgrog rnam pa las// gung mo'i dbu ma rdo rjer bya// 'di ni rdo rje lcags sgrog
328a2(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje lta bur yongs su bshad// rdo rje chen po ce lnga pa// khro bo gzigs mar rnam par bshad// mchog gi rtse mo rtse gcig bya// rdo rje rtse mo nyid kyi bshad// lag na rin chen byug tu
328a3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / lag gnyis legs par brkyang bar bya// sor mo pad+ma'i dbyibs su bya// skal byed lha mor yongs su bshad// thal mo yongs su sbar ba las// mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong dag/ mig
328a4(rgyud 'bum): gi tshul du sbyar bar bya/ / sangs rgyas spyan gyir rnam par bshad// bkra shis kyis ni skyil krung bca'// rnal 'byor rig pas lus bsrangs te// lag gnyis lhung bzed 'dzin 'dra ba// bsam
328a5(rgyud 'bum): gtan phyag rgyar rab tu bshad/ / 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad rgya// sangs rgyas kun gyi don mdzad pa'o// mi bskyod pa yi sa la reg/ rin chen tog gi mchog sbyin bshad// bsam gtan phyag rgya 'ongad
328a6(rgyud 'bum): dpag med/ / ngo bo nyid kyi don rtogs byed// don yod gzigs pa'i phyag rgya ni// mi 'jigs 'jigs pa med pa sbyin// blo ldan rnal 'byor skyil krung gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bdag
328a7(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par bzhag pa phyag rgya kun/ / 'ching ba 'am ni 'ching du gzhug/ 'jig rten pa yi phyag rgya la// lag pa gcig ni rab brkyang ste// dbang ldan gyi ni rtse gsum pa// mthe bos mthe'u chung mnan
328b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / lha yi dbang po rdo rjer 'gyur// lag pa g.yas pas brtag par bya// me yi oM yig lag pa dag/ mthe bong gung mo nyid la gzhag/ gshin rje'i rdo rje dbyug pa ste// mdzub mo dang
328b2(rgyud 'bum): ni mthe bong sbyar/ / de nyid khyab 'jug 'khor lo ste// 'khor lo'i yi ge dgod par bya// lag pa gcig gis thod pa ni// ma mo rnams kyir yang dag bshad// sor mo gnyis bsgreng ral gri ni//
328b3(rgyud 'bum): srin po bdag nyid chen po'i'o// mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar ba ni// chu lha'i zhags pa nyid du bshad// mdzub mo dang ni gung mo dag/ rgyal mtshan lha bur legs par brkyang // rlung lha rgyal mtshan
328b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya ni/ / lag pa gnyis kyis rab tu brtag/ dbu ma gcig pu legs brkyang ba// dbyug to'i phyag rgyar rab tu bshad// gnod sbyin kun gyi dbang phyug ni// lus ngan bdag nyid chen po
328b5(rgyud 'bum): 'o/ mchod phyir thogs kyi phyag rgya ni// tshangs pa yi ru legs par bshad// drag po'i gsal shing zhes bya ste// lha mo'i pa Ti sa ru brjod// tshogs bdag gi ni sA ru bshad// zla ba'i
328b6(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor ro/ / nyi ma'i 'od zer stong phrag ni// lag pa gnyis kyis bstan par bya// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// dbang po'i rdo rje mtshon cha ltar// 'di ni lha rnams
328b7(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi rgya/ / dpa' bo kun gyis rab tu gnang // dri za rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// glu len lta bur rab tu bsgrags// dga' byed dbang phyug phyag rgya che// rdza dza'i sgra dbyangs rab tu 'bar// sangs
329a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thams cad rab mchod phyir/ / lha chen pos ni rab tu brtags// tIng ting cag 'dzin sbyor ba yis// mi 'am ci rnams kyir brjod bya// pi wang bsgreng ba'i sbyor ba yis//
329a2(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs can gyir ni rnam par bshad// rtag tu dun du b+hi sgrog pa// rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyir brjod// lag gnyis gdengs ka'i tshul byas pa// klu rnams kyir ni legs par bshad// gar ni
329a3(rgyud 'bum): sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis/ / 'gyed dang 'du ba'i de bzhin no// lag pa zhags pa nges bcings pas// de ni phyag rgyar rab tu bshad// 'di rnams dam tshig phyag rgya ru// de bzhin gshegs
329a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams legs par gsungs/ / las kyi sbyor ba 'bad pa yi// 'di rnams kyang ni phyag rgyar bshad// phyag rgya dor nas sems kyis ni// rin chen yang dang yang du bsam// rnam par rtog
329a5(rgyud 'bum): med gdod nas zhi/ / chos dbyings mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa// stong pa mkha' 'drar shes nas su// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// 'di dag thams cad ma skyes shing // rmi lam lta bur rab
329a6(rgyud 'bum): tu gnas/ / dri za'i grong khyer lta bur snang // 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten yang dang yang // mig 'phrul lta bur shin tu ni// 'gro ba thams cad rab tu gsal// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa ru// srid pa
329a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mdor bsdus pa/ / bdag med pa zhes mthong nas ni// sangs rgyas kun dang dpa' bo yis// sgyu ma smig rgyu brag cha dang // lbu ba chu yi chu bur dang // gzugs brnyan lta bur
329b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten ni/ / de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgongs// thams cad mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar// zo chun khyud mo ji bzhin du// gar gyi gnas kyi tshul 'dra ba// zla ba gnyis dang
329b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs par blta/ / rtag tu glog gi 'phreng ba 'dra// sbrang bu'i sgra dang mtshungs par gnas// 'khor ba shin tu bslang ba ste// rgod ma'i kha dang 'dra bar gnas// 'di ltar shes shing rtog
329b3(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis rang nyid kyis// sems ni legs sgrub rnal 'byor pa// de la phyag rgya rab tu bshad// stong pa mtshan ma med pa dang // smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin las//
329b4(rgyud 'bum): lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni// dam tshig gsum ni brtags pa'o// phyag rgya sngags dang lha nyid dang // de nyid gsum ni rab tu gnas// bdag nyid sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// mtshan nyid
329b5(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu rnam par gnas/ / de 'di dam pa'i phyag rgya ru// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' stsal to// phyag rgya yi ge bral ba ste// rnam pa med cing snang ba med// dngos po med pa'i chos rnams
329b6(rgyud 'bum): la/ / dngos po'i de nyid du ni bshad// dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin yin// dngos med nyid kyang dngos po yin// dngos dang dngos medu rnam par grol// rnal 'byor ye shesna mchog tu bde/
329b7(rgyud 'bum): rtog ge med cing snang ba med// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge med// stong pa nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i sems// gang tshe de ltar nyid gyur pa// de tshe phyag rgya rnams dang sngags// lha nyid du yang rab tu
330a1(rgyud 'bum): brtag/ sngags las phyag rgya ma mthong zhing // phyag rgya las kyang sngags min cing // rang nyid lha yi rnal 'byor ni// gnyis med sngags dang phyag rgyar brtags/
330a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
330a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba chen po rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
330a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi rigs bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/ 'og min gyi gnas nas byon te
330a5(rgyud 'bum): dga' ldan gyi gnas su bzhugs nas/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la chos bstan nas/ zas gtsang gi rigs la mngon par gzigs te/ mngon par byung bar mdzad nas byang chub
330a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi snying po dag la nye bar mnan nas 'khod de/ bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal bar bstan nas byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs par gyur te/ bzhugs nas kyang kun nas 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin sngon du
330a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhug nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa
330b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad spyan 'dren cing gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa mA dzaHA kaR+Sha ya sarba ta thA ga tan hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor
330b2(rgyud 'bum): chen po rnams legs par byon te chos kyi dbyings su spros nas/ phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams khyab ste/ nam mkha'i khams na
330b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa thams cad til gyi gang bu lhar 'dzam bu'i gling du 'khod par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bkug cing bcug ste/ bcings nas dbang du mdzad de/
330b4(rgyud 'bum): de nyid kyi thugs kar rab tu bzhag par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas byin gyis brlabs te/ sngags 'dis rang gi sems
330b5(rgyud 'bum): so sor rtogs par mdzad do/ / oM tsit+ti pra ti bA d+haM kA ro maM/ de'i rjes thogs nyid la sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar longs spyod rdzogs
330b6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / sprul pa'i sku las chos kyi sku rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba sems rin po che nges par byung ste spros par mdzad do// de nyid sems 'od gsal ba/ thugs rje chen pos khyab pa/
330b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan// gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnyog pa spangs pa/ nam mkha' ltar gdong nas ni ba de las thugs rje chen po la mngon par phyogs par byas nas/
331a1(rgyud 'bum): sems can gyi khams thams cad la rnam par gzigs te/ mi shes pas rga ba dang 'chi bas rnam par khyab pa'i 'jig rten la gzigs nas/ slar yang sngags 'dis byang chub//
331a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi sems bskyed pa nye bar bstan pa/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mi/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar sems 'od gsal ba de
331a3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lhar byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar rnam par gzhag go// legs par rnam par dag pa'i nam mkha' ltar
331a4(rgyud 'bum): dri ma med pa/ spros pa thams cad spangs pa/ me long lta bur bstan par byas nas gnas te byang chub kyi sems chen po la sngags 'di brjod do// oM dz+nyA na rasmi bi sra dza hUM/ de ni rjes thogs
331a5(rgyud 'bum): nyid las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las rnam par phyung ngo / / de phyung nas kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du zhugs te shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gi sal bar byas
331a6(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ri bo'i rtse bsnyil te rab tu rtogs par byas nas gcig tu 'dres te/ rdo rje'i sku chen po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar rjes su zhugs nas zla ba'i
331a7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rab tu gnas so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs so// oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ slar yang sngags 'dis
331b1(rgyud 'bum): spros pa/ oM s+pha ra badz+ra/ slar yang sngags 'dis bsdus so// oM saM ha ra badz+ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ye shes rdo rje'i snying po 'di cheng du brjod pa/ oM dz+nyA na badz+ra
331b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badz+ra hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
331b3(rgyud 'bum): dang gsung dang / thugs mnyam pa nyid brnyes pas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa/ oM badz+ra At+ma koH/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan pa nyid du nye bar gyur to//
331b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gzigs nas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par mdzad do//
331b5(rgyud 'bum): oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga ta sta thA a ha ma pi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i rgyu/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku bdag nyid
331b6(rgyud 'bum): sems can gyi khams thams cad du nges par bstan to/ / de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mthong nas/ lha dang mi rnams kyis mngon par byang chub pas
331b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa zhes smra ba sgrags so/ / de nas tshangs pas gsol ba btab ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor nas/ de dang des 'dul ba'i skye bo btul te/ gang
332a1(rgyud 'bum): gis slar ldog pa med pa nyid du gyur to/ / 'di rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sgom pa'i rim pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ting nge 'dzin/
332a2(rgyud 'bum): de las bzhengs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bstan te/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa nye bar bsgrubs nas de'i thugs ka las rdo rje phyung ste/ nyid kyi phyag tu bzhag par gyur te/ de nas
332a3(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer rnam par phyung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur byin
332a4(rgyud 'bum): gyis brlabs te/ mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar dang 'phreng bas dbang bskur ba/ zla ba'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer can du byin gyis brlabs te rnam par
332a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas so/ / de nas thugs ka nas phyung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga dang / rgyab dang / drung du rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje rim chen dang
332a6(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'phreng bar rnam par gnas so/ / de bzhin du sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams dang / bdug pa la sogs pa'i lha khyad par du nges par bskyed cing / gzugs la sogs
332a7(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams dang / lcags kyu la sogs pa'i lha rnams bskyed de/ 'di dag gi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshang bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/
332b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rdo rje snying po zhes su gsungs// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// dar dang me tog 'phreng bas brgyan// sgo khyung dang mi ba khyer dang // rba babs kyis ni so sor
332b2(rgyud 'bum): spras/ / de yi dbus su khri chen po// kun nas yongs su gru bzhi pa// de yi steng du pad chen po// ge sar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs dgod
332b3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / sangs rgyas kyi ni drung kun tu// sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi nye 'khor du// 'khor lo sgyur ba la sogs bri// phyi yi gnas ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas
332b4(rgyud 'bum): sras po rnam par dgod/ kha dog ser po gzi brjid che// dbang chen dkyil 'khor rab 'bar ba// thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs rkyen// brgyan pa de dag dgod par bya// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud
332b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang chu'i lha'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag
332b6(rgyud 'bum): bshad bya ba/ / dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bas na// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes su brjod// de yi phyi rol gnyis pa la// zlum po ru ni rtogs par bya// rim
332b7(rgyud 'bum): mang po sna tshogs pa/ / sgo dang sgo khyud brtag par bya// rta babs rnam pa sna tshogs pa// dar dang me tog 'phreng bas brgyan// de yi dbus su pad chen po/ go sar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa/
333a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dab ma brgyad kyi ka ba'i mdun// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// rgyal ba thams cad dkar por mchog/ kha ba ba zho ltar
333a2(rgyud 'bum): dkar gsal/ / shel dang zla ba lta bu'i 'od// kun da zla ba ltar dkar brtan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// sangs rgyas sras po rnam par dgod/
333a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad zla ba ltar dkar zhing // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// mtshon cha sna tshogs zla ba 'dra// zla ba 'bar mtshungs mnyam med pa// chu yi ming zhes bya ba yi// dkyil 'khor dam pa
333a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid du 'dod/ / rdo rje snying po brgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ chu lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos me lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil
333a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rdo rje ye shes gzi brjid mtshungs// rdo rje gzi brjid ces su brjod// gru gsum rnam
333a6(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid du bya/ / sum mdo'i ris kyi rnam par mtshungs// 'bar ba'i 'phreng khrugs 'jigs pa'o// kha dog dmar po stobs po che// 'jig pa'i dus kyi me 'dra ba// rtag tu pad+ma rA ga
333a7(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs/ / de yi dbus su gzi brjid che// nyi ma'i kha dog stobs po che// rdo rje rtse gsum sna tshogs pa// sum mdo'i snying khar gzhag par bya// bal po se'u'i me tog mtshungs//
333b1(rgyud 'bum): ya ba'i me tog dag dang 'dra// pad+ma pad+ma rA ga mtshungs// sangs rgyas dpa' bo yang dga'abar// bzang po mtshal dang mtshungs 'dra ba// rgya skyegs bcung dang 'dra bar gnas// de
333b2(rgyud 'bum): yinye 'khor thams cad du/ / de bzhin sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras// khro bo dang ni mngag pa dag/ mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// de dag thams cad kha dog dmar// gzi brjid khams la
333b3(rgyud 'bum): 'od ldan pa/ / 'od zer dmar po rab 'phro ba// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// thams cad dmar po'i mtshon cha can// dmar po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// dmar po'i gos kyis
333b4(rgyud 'bum): bkab pa'i lus/ / 'phreng ba dmar po mchog 'dzin pa// 'di ni gzi brjid gter zhes bya// dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba'o// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ me lha zhes bya ba'i
333b5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/
333b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rlung gi khams dang 'dra bas na// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad// zla ba phyeng pa'i rnam pa 'dra// dbyar gyi sprin gyi 'od dang mtshungs// Atra
333b7(rgyud 'bum): si yi me tog 'dra/ / in+d+ra ni la'i 'od dang mtshungs// de yi dbus su pad chen po// bai DUR+Ya yi 'od dang 'dra// shin tu gnag pa'i mig sman mtshungs// sngon dmar gyi ni rnam par
334a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dpa' bo rab 'bar ba// rgyal po 'khyil pa 'bar ba'i gzi// mtshan mo nag mo lta bur gnas// ut+pal sngon po 'das
334a2(rgyud 'bum): ma'i tshul/ / stong pa nam mkha' lta bur gnas// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras rnams bri// khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang // de bzhin po nya pho nya mo// thams
334a3(rgyud 'bum): cad sna tshogs brgyan gyis brgyan/ / de bzhin nag po'i gos gyon pa// kha dog nag po thams cad du// ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs bsnams// gdugs ni rnam pa du ma'i dbyibs// kha dog sna
334a4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs legs 'bar ba/ / bla ra rgyas pa mnyam pa ni// kha dog nag po sna tshogs pa// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// mdor bsdus nas ni bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor chen po 'di
334a5(rgyud 'bum): lta bu/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes skyob pa// bris nas shes rab can gyis bsgoms// gal te dngos grub rang 'dod na// rdo rje snyi po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi
334a6(rgyud 'bum): cho ga'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang bsdu bas byon pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal
334a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bskyed du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam
334b1(rgyud 'bum): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/ sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga mchog tu gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa/ sgeg mo sogs pas mchod
334b2(rgyud 'bum): pa kun/ / yang dag mdor bsdus byas nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen por// bdag gis rtag tu bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yi ge yang dag ldan// 'dod pa sbyar ba'i sku
334b3(rgyud 'bum): ru bya/ sgra dang gzugs dang de bzhin sbyor// yi ge'i 'phreng ba de bzhin te// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// sngags pas thams cad rnam par bsam// hUM/ sngags
334b4(rgyud 'bum): pas snying khar son pa bsgom/ / gsang sngags dge ba brjod nas su// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa// dung gi sgra ru rab tu brjod// dril bu'i sgra ni rab gsal ba// pad+mo rna la
334b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor dbang phyug go/ dus min sprin gyi hUM gi sgra// tsa Ta tsa Ta'i sgra 'phro ba// rdo rje rin chen dbang phyug gi/ sgra ru de bzhin gshegs rnams gsungs// nor bu las kyi rigs kyi yang // rnga chen
334b6(rgyud 'bum): zla ru rab tu bshad/ / pi wang gling bu de bzhin gru// gar gyi rgyan gyi sgra dang ni// rdza rnga'i ngar sgra hU~M gi sgra// spyi yi nyid du rab tu bshad// rtog pa kun la rnam par sbyar// sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las
334b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / de nas gzugs kyi bzlas pa mchog/ go rims ji bzhin rab tu bshad// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // lha rnams dbang du bya ba ste// de la rang gi tshul rab sbyar//
335a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang phyag rgya rab tu sbyar// de rjes rnam pa kun gyi mchog/ rtag tu lus chen bsam bya bsam/ lha yi sku gzugs bsgom par bya// lag pa'i phyag rgya rab nges
335a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ phyag rgya'ang snying khar son zhes bya// rang gi rigs rims cho ga yis// de yi lus ni 'od gsal zhing // sgron ma'i 'od ltar gsal ba'i khyim// de ltar kun nas thams cad du//
335a3(rgyud 'bum): kun nas baspu'i rtse dag nas// 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'phreng dge bas// gzugs kyi bzlas pa zhes su bshad// de nas sbyor ba'i bzlas pa ni// gsang sngags sgrub pos brtsam par bya// mcho
335a4(rgyud 'bum): dang byin brlabs dbang bskur mchog/ spro la sogs rims thams cad du// sbyor ba'i bzlas pa gtso bo 'di// 'bad pa yis ni rab tu bshad// snying kha mgrin pa mchu lce min// rkan dang
335a5(rgyud 'bum): spyi bo nyid ma yin/ / nang min phyi dang gnyis par min// chos ni 'ba' zhig kho na la// bzlas pa'i sgra yang 'byung ma yin// 'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor che// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal
335a6(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / sgom pa'i sngags pa de nyid ni// rnal 'byor pa yi gnas su bshad// de nas steng du mdor bsdus te// snying pa'i dkyil 'khor rab zlum pa// zla ba gang ba ltar bsam bya// dri ma med
335a7(rgyud 'bum): cing legs par gnas/ / de la yi ge rnam par dgod// tshig gi 'phreng ba ma chad pa// mu tig 'phreng ba ltar brgyus pa// char sprin gyi ni me 'dra'i 'od// de tshe thams cad gsal bar byed//
335b1(rgyud 'bum): lha yi lus ni snang byed cing // dzi lta ji ltar yi ge'i 'phreng // mchog gi lus la rab 'jug pa// de lta de ltar sngags kyi lus// lha yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur// mthu stobs lha dbang /
335b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ni// tshungs pa khyab 'jug las cher lhag/ bzlas pa de nyid mchog 'di ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'o// ji ltar sems ni bsgom pa yis// de ltar dngos
335b3(rgyud 'bum): grub mchog tu 'gyur/ / rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ bzlas pa'i de kho na nyid kyi le'u'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhi
335b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa rin po che bka' stsal pa/ mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam med mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad//
335b5(rgyud 'bum): yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can// yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de// dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang
335b6(rgyud 'bum): bskrun du yod ma yin/ / dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol// rtag tu dri ma med pa thugs rje'i shugs
335b7(rgyud 'bum): las byung / / smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // tshad med tshad
336a1(rgyud 'bum): dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi/ / bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas su gshegs kyang e ma chos nyid bzang // bde bar gshegs pa go 'phang dam pa brnyes
336a2(rgyud 'bum): gyur kyang / / khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yong mi 'gyur// e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang
336a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pa// khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med pa rab mkhyen pas/
336a4(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la gsol// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang dag yon tan rgyas pa ste// lan cig tsam zhig brjod pas kyang // gsang sngags
336a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ / bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// de bzhin gshegs de kun bstod na// rab yangs dngos grub stsol 'gyur te// bskal par gnas shing bskal par
336a6(rgyud 'bum): bskul/ / lus ni g.yo ba med pa ru// bdag nyid brtan par byas pa yis// mgon po chen po rnam snang mdzad// mi bskyod rin chen 'byung gnas dang // rgyal ba dag pa 'od dpag med//
336a7(rgyud 'bum): don grub rgyal po thams cad du// dngul chu bcud len de nyid dang // mchog kyang rab tu gsol bar byed// dngos grub yid 'ong ma lus pa// rgyas pa'i don dang phun sum tshogs// rab
336b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ / yid la 'dod pa ster bar byed// ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs/ mchog tu dge ba gsol bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa'i
336b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bka'
336b3(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med// smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga med// ji ltar bshad pa cho gas bslab pa'i gnas nye bar bzung ste/ gang yang rung ba'i yang dga' bar ji ltar rung ba'i
336b4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor byas te/ me tog sil ma bkram la/ bdug spos kyis bdugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la ji ltar nus pa'i me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa
336b5(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ sngags 'dis yid kyis kyang sdig pa bshags te/ oM sarba pA pU ta kA yi ka bA ka tsit+ta ma na song b+hU tA na rA ga/ dwe Sha mo ha ma da mA na biSh+Te Na yang kri taM tan traM kA li kaM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/
336b6(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ sarba pA pa s+pho Ta yA mi swA hA/ oM sarba pAn pra ti de sha yA mi swA hA/ de'i rjes thogs la bdag nyid kyi dngos po dbul bar bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta nAn Ad ma b+hA ba ni ra yA ta yA mi/
336b7(rgyud 'bum): sarba ta thA ga taHpra ti gr-ih+Nan tu mAM swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta puN+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha rAn a nu mo di yA mi swA hA/ yang dang yang du byang
337a1(rgyud 'bum): chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags kyis bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta b+ha dra ma hA badz+ra sa ma ya ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta uta pA da ya mi swA hA/ de nas byang chub/
337a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs la zla ba'i kha dog can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa/ sa bcu'i dbang phyug ner bu rin po che
337a3(rgyud 'bum): / chen po'i pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri'i stang du bdag nyid bsam par bya'o// oM bud d+hohaM/ sngags 'dis bdag yongs su dag par byas te/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba ta thA ga tAHswa b+hA ba shu
