343a7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po gsang sngags kyi ka k+Sha pu tra bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes su skyob// gsang sngags ka k+Sha byar zhes bya// gsang
343b1(rgyud 'bum): chen mchog tu rmad du byung / / glu bzhi pa la tshad mdzes pa// kun nas yongs su bzang zhing dag/ re mig bzhi bcu zhe dgu pa// mdor bsdus nas ni sngags pas bya// dang po'i 'phreng bzang
343b2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis la ni/ a sogs blo gros ldan pas dgod// ka sogs lhag ma'i re mig la// sngags pas mdo ru bsdus te bri// sbyor ba ji bzhin yi ge kun// go rims bzhin du dgod par bya/
343b3(rgyud 'bum): rerimig stong pa dag la ni// k+Sha yig dang ni rdo rje bri// rim pa 'di dag bkod nas ni// rang sde'i 'og tu 'bar ba mchog/ dang po dbyangs la de'i rjes su// yi ge phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa//
343b4(rgyud 'bum): ka tsa Ta ta pa ya shA// dag cing chu yi dkyil 'khor ldan// 'di rnams myur du 'grub par byed// pad+ma'i rigs kyi lha nyid do// don kun grub par yang dag ldan// me yi dkyil 'khor zhes
343b5(rgyud 'bum): su bshad/ / 'bar ba'i me dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// kha tsha' tha pa ra ShA// dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor ldan// ga dza Da da ba la sA// dngos grub kur byed rlung gzugs ldan// dbyar
343b6(rgyud 'bum): gyi sprin lhur shin tu 'jigs/ / g+ha dz+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha wa ha// steng 'gros dngos grub byed por brjod// slar yang nga nya Na na ma// chos kun dbang du byed pa mchog/ thog mi'i dbyangs yig gang yin pa/
343b7(rgyud 'bum): deni de bzhin gshegs stobs bcu// khyad par yan lag bcu gnyis bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bcu gnyis// ma ning yi ge bzhi po spong // r-i r-I l-i l-I zhes bya ba// dbyangs dang sa
344a1(rgyud 'bum): bon de bzhin sngags/ / de dag yi ge ru yang bshad// dbang du byed pa'i sde tshan kun// thig le sgra gtsug zla phyed ces// rjes dbyangs kyi ni 'phreng zhes bshad//
344a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas de bzhin byang sems kyis// yi ger brjod pa de bzhin zhing // gsal byed ces kyis gsal ba'o// de bzhin ya ra la wa rlung // me dang dbang tshon chu dag ste// 'byung ba chen po
344a3(rgyud 'bum): khams rnams so/ / rlung me bdud rtsi'i bcud ces bshad// mnyam dang mi mnyam cha dbye bas// thams cad nyid kyi lam shes bya// phyag rgya dang ni dkyil 'khor sngags// ting 'dzin mdor
344a4(rgyud 'bum): bsdus bshad pa'o/ / mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// chos rnams kun gyi sdom du brjod// stong pa mtshan med smon med pa// rnam par thar pa gsum du bshad// phung po khams dang
344a5(rgyud 'bum): skye mched rnams/ / mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya// da ni sngags kyi ka kA'i sbyor ba la rab tu btus pa sbyar ba dang phral ba bshad par bya'o// yi ge rnams kyis byang chub spyod// sangs rgyas
344a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyang mya ngan 'das/ / lhan cig nyid du sbyar bar bya// dbyangs rnams yig rnams bsdus par bshad// mtshan nyid kyang ni rab bshad bya// dbyangs ni byang chub gzugs nyid de// gnan
344a7(rgyud 'bum): dang lhan cig sbyar bar bya/ / de la nges par sangs rgyas nyid// ster ba nyid du legs par bshad// thog mar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang sngags dri ma med pa 'byung // thog mar dbyangs
344b1(rgyud 'bum): nithig le ldan/ / rdo rje'i steng du yang dag gnas// 'bar ba'i 'phreng can rab zhi pa/ rnam par 'phro ba nyid du gnas// zla ba'i dbus su bsgom bya ba// kun gyi ye shes 'od chen po// kunaH
344b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba rab tu thob/ / thams cad du yang rnyed par dka'// de nyid bral ba rtag pa ste// yi ge med cing dbyer med pa// byang chub sems zhes rab tu bshad// ngung dang kun da zla ltar dag/ gnyis
344b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sgra dang yang dag ldan/ / de ni shin tu ring por shes// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod pa ste// sa dang pha rol phyin pa rnams// dro ba'i bzhi pa sbyar ba ni// mya ngan 'das pa zhes su bsgrags//
344b4(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs dang yi ge khyad par can// mtshan nyid rab tu sbyar bar bya// rang gi phyag rgya sogs ldan pa// sangs rgyas byang chub ba gsol byed// da ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi de
344b5(rgyud 'bum): nyid 'dir bshad bya/ / thog mar spyod pa byas nas ni// gnyis pa smra ba po ru bshad// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis kun nas mnan// gsum pa me yi ming cad ro// rgyu med pas te cung zad pa/
344b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa yis ni gsal bar byas// drug pa'i sgra dang tha dad med// de yi sbyang du thig le gnas// chos kun nam mkha' dang mtshungs par// yang dang yang du bshad pa yin// de ni lnga par shes
344b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / yi ge lnga pa stobs po che// yi ge lnga yi stobs lnga'i bdag nyid las skyes gtso// mthu stobs chen po khyab bdag srid pa'i bdag nyid skyes// mthu stobs chen po srid gsum las
345a1(rgyud 'bum): rab grol byed pa/ / yi ge lnga ni 'gro ba drug las grol ba'i bdag/ mngon shes drug kyang rab tu ster byed dri ma med// de nyid bcom ldan spyod pa ste// mi bskyod pa zhes
345a2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu grags/ / byang sems rdo rje sems dpa' ste// brtan pa'i sems dpa' rang byung ba// chos kun gyis ni de bzhin nyid// gang bsgrags de nyid thams cad du// 'bar ba me yi sa bon ldan//
345a3(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa yi ni steng du gnas// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// rin chen 'byung ldan zhes su bshad// chos rnams kun gyi byed pa ni// med pa nyid du'ang bshad pa'o// me yi sa bon yang dag ldan//
345a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyi spyi bo ru// mnan pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa kun// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// don yod
345a5(rgyud 'bum): pa yi snying por grags/ / sde lnga pa yi bzhi pa ni// dngos dang dngos med rab rtogs byed// 'bar ba me yi sa bon gyi// 'khor lo'i dbus su rab tu gnas// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan//
345a6(rgyud 'bum): thig le sgra yis rnam par spras// 'khor lo sgyur ba ye shes che// rnam par rgyas pa'i nor ster byed// gang zhig sde lnga pa yi mtha'// sgyu ma'i chos la rab tu gnas// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni/

345b1(rgyud 'bum): dang ye shes che/ / mA ma kI ru de bsgrags so// lnga pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// 'jam pa'i dpal zhes rab tu grags// spyod pa'i gar mkhan rab rtogs ming // sdig pa thams cad
345b2(rgyud 'bum): rengs byed de/ / sdig kun rnam par sbyong byed pa// rnam par sel ba rnam shes bya// sde mtshan lnga pa'i gsum pa ni// phyag na rdo rje stobs chen dang / gshin rje mthar byed khro bo che// yi ge
345b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum ni stobs chen po/ / thog mar dgu pa yi ni dbyangs// de yi dbus spyod pa gzhag/ tha mar sna tshogs zhes bya sbyar// sku gsum du ni rnam par sgom// tha ma'i sde tshad gsum pa ni//
345b4(rgyud 'bum): gang yin kun tu bzang por bshad// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni// sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba'o// de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ni// nam mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags// rdo rje khro bo stobs

346a1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag mnan/ / khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan zhes bya ba// spyod pa'i gar ma khan zhes bya'i mtshan// de mi rjes nyid la ni med// da
346a2(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs dang yang dag ldan/ / me dang dbang chen du brjod bya// gsum pa'i dbyangs kyis mnan pa yi// sde tshan dang po'i dang po'i yig/ de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ni// 'jig rten mgon po
346a3(rgyud 'bum): thub pa che/ / ye shes rgya che bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// sde tshan lnga pa rin chen mchog/ bzhi pa'i sa bon dam pa de// 'og tu me yi yan laga' bar/

346b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis brlabs/ / nam snang mdzad bya gnas las byung // gzhan gyi dmag dpung 'jom pa ni// rgyu ni ma yis gsal byas pa// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// thig sa sgra yis rnam
346b3(rgyud 'bum): par brgyan/ / 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis grangs pa'i// ti sa mnadar la sogs// de yis phye mar rnyog par nges// rdo rje la gnas 'khor lo so//

346b6(rgyud 'bum): 'bebs par byed/ / sde tshan dang po'i dang po gang // sa yi yi ge steng du gnas// sde tshan lnga pa'i tha ma ni// drug pa'i sgra yi steng du gnas// 'og sum yis bon ldan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor

347a1(rgyud 'bum): bsgyu / 'byu pon bsgrub pad+d+haH/ dbang nam ra ba las/ mtsha sa byu ba'i go sa can ba nga/

348a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor la 'jug bsam/ / dung gi sgra ni gsal ba bsam// pad+ma'i khams la yang dag brten// pad+ma'i ge sar thig le las// sgra yi rang bzhin rdul phran rnams/

348b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba ni/ / rdul phran lta bur byed bzhin pa'i// rdo rje 'bar ba stong phrag dag/ yang dang yang du rnam par 'don// 'jig rten kun tu de song ste// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// mi

349b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhug/ 'khor lo'i dngos grub gzi brjid che// 'khor lo sgyur ba bdag nyid 'gyur// chung dang tshe dang dbang phyug dang // rang dbang 'dod dgur spyod pa dang // kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang ni/
350a1(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi dbang phyug phun tshogs 'bras// rga dang 'chi ba med thob cing // nges par 'khor lo sgyur dang mtshungs// gser gyi 'khor lo rin po che// de bzhin dngul dang shul
350a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid dang / / me tog can gyi lcags kyang rung // rang gi lag gis bzung nas su// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// 'khor lo sgyur ba gzi brjid cha
350a3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ / de ltar bdag nyid bsgoms nas ni// 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du 'gyur// de la de yi sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a ba lo ki ti/
350a4(rgyud 'bum): mur+t+ti tsakra la Ni dz+wa la dz+wa la d+hu na bi d+hu nA trA sa ya mA ra ya/ uts+tshu Ta ya ha na b+hany+dza pro khi nI kAN+Ta li ni a ba rI dzi tA stA d+hA ri Ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM i a pa na dzid+hid+ha ka swA hA/ sIng
350a5(rgyud 'bum): po'o/ / na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+hA nA~M/ a pro ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM a pa rA dze tA d+ha ki swA hA/ cho ga'i sbyang pa'o// 'khor lo sgyur ba rang grub ste// sangs rgyas nyid kun thob nas ni// ye shes tshe dang stobs dang
350a6(rgyud 'bum): dang shugs/ / yang na dbang phyug dam pa kun// dpa' bo thams cad ster byed na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// nyi ma'i dkyil
350a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bri bar bya/ / nam mkha' la ni yongs su sgom// gzi brjid phung po ye shes che// sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur// gnyis su med 'byung sems kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor mog
350b1(rgyud 'bum): tu rmad byung ba/ / de ni me mir shes par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// de yang 'khor lo 'dzin rgyal po// 'khor lo sgyur ba legs 'bar ba// de la de bzhin rin chen bdun
350b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo'i 'phang bas rnam par brgyan/ / 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// nyi ma re rang bkra shis sgom// gzi brjid phung po sku chen po// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba
350b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba'i 'phre 'khrugs dpa' ba ni/ / sdang ba shar ba lta bur gnas// de yi phyag rgya rtag tu bsam// nam mkha'i rnam par legs par gnas// chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// 'od
350b4(rgyud 'bum): zer 'phreng bas rnam par khyab/ / de dang bdag nyid rdo rjer sgom// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// kun tu kun nas thams cad du// dngos po kun las 'byung bar 'gyur// ye shes
350b5(rgyud 'bum): tshe dang stobs dang shugs/ / kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang ni// sangs rgyas thams cad nyid dag dang // rdo rje can kun nyid dang ni// gzi brjid mchog kun thob gyur nas// gzi brjid phung po 'dra
350b6(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / de la sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa ni/ oM ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a ba lo ki ta sun+d+ha tidz+re rA shi dz+wa lA dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+hu ka/ dA ra dAr/ bin+d+ha ban+ti/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so//
350b7(rgyud 'bum): oM ta~M dzi rA si swA hA/ snying po'o// oM dz+wa la te dzo ra si hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// dag pa'i sngags tshig 'di rnams kyis// nyi ma'i ye shes rab tu gsal// kun tu 'gro ba bsgrub par bya/
351a1(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin pa nyid thob 'gyur// gzi brjid daphung po'i gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// kun nas snang ba zhes bya mchog/ yi ge gsum pa stobs
351a2(rgyud 'bum): bo che/ gser gyi kha dog legs 'bar zhing // gtsug tor steng son 'od gsal ba// sngags pa rang bdag gis bsgom bya// kun nas snang ba lta bur 'gyur// oM AHhUM/ gsang
351a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags rtse mo dam pa ni/ / bsgoms pa tsam gyis thams cad du// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi// 'gro kun kun nas snang bar 'gyur// kun nas snang ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs
351a4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / chos kyi 'khor lo phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// sangs rgyas kun nyid kun gyi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor byed// 'khor lo 'di ni
351a5(rgyud 'bum): rtsibs bcu gnyis/ / rtsibs bcu gnyis pa yongs su gnas// rnam gsum gsum ni yongs bskor ba// bya ba'i don du dag pa ste// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po// nam mkha'i khrugs na
351a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa ste/ / chos kyi dbyings ni khyab pa ni// legs par mnyam parabazhags pas bsgom// 'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba ni// 'di kun can cing 'brel 'byung ba// 'di ni chos kyi
351a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya che/ / sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// de yi sngags su gyur pa ni/ oM d+hu na pa ta ya tsin+da tsakre Na badz+ri Ni hUM/ gsang sngags 'di ni dpal ldan mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis med
351b1(rgyud 'bum): 'char/ / skad cig tsam gyis thams cad du// dam pa'i chos ni rab sbyor byed// chos kyi 'khor lo sgrub pa'i thabs so// pad+ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra// sangs rgyas sku gzugs leg
351b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba/ / rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog bsgrubs na// nyon mongs rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// snying nas rdo rje gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// de yi snying la rdo rje ma/
351b3(rgyud 'bum): dri ma med pa skyes par 'gyur// nyon mongs rtag tu yongs zad cing // dgra rnams kun las rgyal bar byed// bden pa bzhi ni rtogs pas na// bden pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur// sngags ni/
351b4(rgyud 'bum): oM k+She sha a sha ni hU~M phaT/ 'di ni nyon mongs rdo rje'i sngags// drag cing drag pos gzhan gnon pa'o// sangs rgyas nyid kyang sbyar byed na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// nyon mongs rdo rje sgrub
351b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i thabs so/ / / dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas rang bzhin stobs po che// bdud bzhi las ni rnam rgyal ba// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// bden
351b6(rgyud 'bum): pa bzhi yi khu tshur rje/ / sras dang ngag dang de bzhin yid// bu tshur sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gnyis med skye ba'i mtshan nyid de// rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom par bya// rang nyid sangs rgyas yin no zhes/
351b7(rgyud 'bum): brtan dang g.yo ba'i 'gro ba ni// 'di dag thams cad ma skyes pa// rdo rje khu tshur bsgoms na ni// rdo rje khu tshur 'dra bar 'gyur// de la sngags su gyur pa ni// oM bi dza ya haH/ de bzhin gshegs
352a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i khu tshur che/ / shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba// sngags pas rtag tu bsgoms na ni// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'thob// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur
352a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so/ / / dngos po thams cad gyen 'phags pa// gdod nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su'o//
352a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag nyid sgom// 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis// 'di yis 'jig rten thams cad kyi// 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du ni// 'jig rten kun gyis thams cad du// kun nas phun sum tshogs
352a4(rgyud 'bum): pa kun/ / bkug nas gus par sbyin par bya// sngags ni/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la dI pyA di pyA ut+ma NoSh+NI / Sha d+hu na d+hu na hUM/ steng 'gro'i gtsug tor zhes bya ba// sangs rgyas dpa' bo kun gyis gsungs/
352a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// / sangs rgyas rang bzhin phyag rgya
352a6(rgyud 'bum): che/ legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// tshad skyob gdugs dkar chen po ni// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i kha dog
352a7(rgyud 'bum): cher 'bar zhing / / chu yi dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa// dri med puN+Da ri kar gnas// ri mo bdun gyis yongs su gang // bcud kyis len gyi mchog lta bur// sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgom par bya//
352b1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub 'di yi sbyor ba yis// sems can rnams la thams cad du// re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// 'di ni gtsug tor gdugs dkar che// sngags ni/ oM ma ma ma ma hA ni/
352b2(rgyud 'bum): ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// ye shes tshe dang stobs mgyogs 'gro// dpa' bo thams cad thob 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min// gdugs dkar po'i sbubs pa'i thabs so//
352b3(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// 'bar ba'i 'phreng 'khrugs ral gri ni// sngags pas snying khar bsgom par bya// rang gi bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin chen
352b4(rgyud 'bum): pos/ / nam mkha'i mthongs rnams yongs gang ba// bdag nyid gnyis med ngo bo yis// rnal 'byor gcig tu bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yi ge 'khor lo che// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs
352b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'od/ / sngags pa snying khar bsgom par bya// rgyal ba dam pa nyid du 'gyur// sngags ni/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa loSh+NI Sha dz+wa la dz+wa la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ dam dam/ drum dru ma/ da ha da ha na hUM phaT/ rgyal ba'i
352b6(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor ral gri che/ / shes rab ye shes dri ma med// sngags pas kun nas bsgoms nas ni// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'dra bar 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so//
352b7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// seng ge'i khri yi steng du bsam// yang na rdo rje'i gdan la gnas// kun tu gtsug tor tshe 'bar ba// snying khar yongs
353a1(rgyud 'bum): su bsgom par bya/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni// yi ge dam pa yi ni gnas/ thog ma tha ma med zhig// chos kyi sku ni mchog tu che// de ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni/
353a2(rgyud 'bum): kun tu gtsug tor stobs po che// skad cig de la 'grub 'gyur te// rdo rje sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin no// sngags ni/ oM badz+ra ban+d+ha hUMHgsang sngags 'di ni dam pa gtso// sangs
353a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thams cad dbang bskur byed/ / rtag tu rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// de ni kun gyis dbang bskur ro// kun gyi gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud chen
353a4(rgyud 'bum): po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rim par phye ba yongs su rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
353a5(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi
353a6(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas par bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chun pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshogags na nas/ de ma thag pa kho nar de bzhin gshegs
353a7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi rim par phye ba bka' stsal pa/ shes rab ye shes rdo rje che// snying khar yongs su bsgoms nas
353b1(rgyud 'bum): su/ ral gri sngon po phyag na bsnams// dbang chen dang ni me las 'khrungs// ye shes chen po gzi brjid che// 'khrul pa med ci yi ge bral// sangs rgyas kun bdag shes rab mchog/ nyon mongs
353b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad zad par byed/ / rdo rje kun bdag bkod pa po// kun tu 'gro ba'i dam pa'i don// dbyer med mchog tu gsang ba po// rim pa mchog gi bdag nyid 'di// zhal drug pa la phyag drug mchog/
353b3(rgyud 'bum): mngon shes drug ldan yi ge drug/ rjes dran drug gi sbyor ba yis// phyag drug dam pa stobs po che// gzi brjid yang na stobs kyis kyang // kun nas yongs su gsal ba bo// gzugs che lus
353b4(rgyud 'bum): kyang che ba ste/ / nam mkha'i khrugs na rnam par gnas// yang na phyag gnyis shes par bya// ting nge 'dzin gnas sdig pa bcom// dpa' bo pad+ma la gnas pa// zla ba'i mdog can 'od po che// rnam
353b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa yI ye shes phra/ / shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'bar// gdod nas ma skyes pa zhes bsam// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog/
353b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// de'i sngags ni// oM bAkya daM na maH/ gsang sngags 'di ni mchog tu gsang // gsang chen gyi ni dam par bzhed// rnam thar gsum gyi sgol
353b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / pha rol phyin drug btu gsal// rang nyid shes rab yin no zhes// sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// dbang po drug ni rab bsgyur te// sangs rgyas nyid ni rnal 'byor las/
354a1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma rA ga lta bu'i mdog/ ston zla lta bur cher gsal ba// sems dpa' chen po gser gyi mdog/ stobs po che ni bsgom par bya// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni/
354a2(rgyud 'bum): shes rab dri ma med par 'gyur// bstan bcos thams cad rab smra zhing // dbang phyug thams cad mdun na gnas// kun gyi rgyal po sngags pa nyid// rang nyid kun gyi rgyal mo mtshungs//
354a3(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang // byang chub kun gyi pha rol son// dbang phyug kun dang bde ba che// chos rnams kun gyi yon tan mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang // yang na sangs rgyas thams
354a4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi/ / kun tu 'gro ba thob 'gyur ba// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// dngul chu bcud len de nyid dang // rkang pas spyod pa dri med mchog/ ril bu dang ni mi snang ba// thams cad du ni sbyar
354a5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / dpal ldan 'jam pa'i mchog 'di ni// chos kyi gsung gi mchog las 'khrungs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshangs pa'i dbyangs// 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// 'di ni
354a6(rgyud 'bum): bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni/ / bsam pa'i phun sum tshogs kun gyi// sangs rgyas kun tu brtan 'gro na// gzhan pa'i lha lta smos ni dgos// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so//
354a7(rgyud 'bum): / snying khar pad+ma chen po la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gnas// 'jig rten dbang phyug dpa' bo che// thugs rje chen po'i thugs ldan pa// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/
354b1(rgyud 'bum): drung dang kun da zla ltar dag/ chos kyi dbyings las yang dag byung // chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po la// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug ches// de la gnas pa dge bsgom// rang bzhin
354b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis ni 'di dag kun/ / gdod nas ma skyes ma byung ba// gsang sngags chen po 'di yis ni// snying khar yongs su bsgom par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor lo tsha// kun tu rnam par
354b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phros pa yis/ / 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrigs shing zhi// ral pa'i thor tshugs 'dzin pa po// ral pa'i dbus su dpa' bo che// 'od dpag meng po ldan pa'i bdag/ ston ka'i zla ba ltar
354b4(rgyud 'bum): bur gsal/ / kun tu nam mkha' yongs gang ba// gsang sngags sbyor ba dag bsgom par bya// rang nyid 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal// chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// pad+ma'i lus kyi
354b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag gang / / kun tu pad+ma rnams la ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag gnas// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sku// khyad par du bdag dgang bar bya// 'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba
354b6(rgyud 'bum): kun snang dang mi snang dngos po ni/ / yang dang yang du blta bar bya// gdul bya ma lus sems la ni// stobs po ches ni dgang bar bya// kha dog dbyibs ni 'di bzhin du// sna tshogs gzugs
354b7(rgyud 'bum): la cher 'bar ba/ / kun nas yongs su bsdus nas ni// sngags pa'i mdun du gzhag par bya// de nas sngags pas de ma thag/ slar yang rtse gcig sems kyis ni// dgug dang gzhug dang
355a1(rgyud 'bum): bcing ba las/ / dbang du bya ba bsgrub par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug thub chen po// bcom ldan rnal 'byor can grub na// dpa' bo thams cad stsol 'gyur zhing /
355a2(rgyud 'bum): rang gi dngos grub mchog rnams dang // rnal 'byor thams cad 'dzin nyid dang // rnam par rgyas pa'i nor ster 'gyur// rig pa 'dzin dang 'khor lo can// sa dang pha rol phyin sogs dang /
355a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyang stsol 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lha spos ci dgos// de'i sngags ni/ oM A ro li ka/ gsang sngags dpal ldan mchog 'di ni// rang nyid khams gsum rnam par rgyal
355a4(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod thams cad bkug nas ni/ / skad cig tsam gyis rnam par sbyar// pad+ma'i sgrub pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub// 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal srid ni// sring
355a5(rgyud 'bum): par bkug nas rnam par ste/ / 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs so// / thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin gzugs// ma yi dkyil 'khor dge ba ste// de yi dbus su bya ba
355a6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor rlung dang rab mtshungs pa/ / de yi dbus su de 'dra bsam// nyi ma yi ni dkyil 'khor ro// de yi dbus su gzi brjid che// 'char ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can// rdo rje'i lag pa gzi
355a7(rgyud 'bum): brjid can/ / rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// tshangs pa'i yul sa thams cad du// kun nas yongs su gsal bar byed// hUM gi yi ge sgra zab mo// drabar gyi sprin dang mtshungs
355b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'od/ / rgyal po 'khyil ba dang mtshungs pa// zar ma yi ni me tog 'dra// 'byur ba dmar pos 'khrigs shing 'jigs// bskal pa'i me dang 'dra bar gnas// zhal bzhi pa la mches
355b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi/ 'jig pa'i dus kyi thal ba 'dra// sprin gyi sgra dang mtshungs pa yi// hUM gi yi ge bzhi dang ldan// rdo rje hUM mdzad ces bya ba// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu sgom// sngags kyi tshig ni/
355b3(rgyud 'bum): oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ a na ya ho b+ha ga bAn bid+d+ha rA dza hUM phaT/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po 'di// kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis// 'jig rten
355b4(rgyud 'bum): gsum yang 'gugs byed na/ / bud med gzhan lta smos ci dgos// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen sogs// chung ma dang bcas phyag rgyar bcas// de dag thams cad 'gugs byed
355b5(rgyud 'bum): na sdug bsngal can gzhan smos ci dgos/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan snying khar son// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje can gyis sngon du
355b6(rgyud 'bum): sgrub/ bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa// bcom ldan rdo rje can 'grub 'gyur// rgyal po thams cad sbyin gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lha smos ci dgos// sngags ni 'dir/ oM tsa/
355b7(rgyud 'bum): hUM dzaHgsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// longs spyod ji snyed thams cad rnams// de skad thams cad rnam par ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa sgrub pa'o//
356a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// byams pa chen po'i bdag nyid sku// snying khar zla ba'i gzugs brnyan 'od// rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba ldan// 'jig rten khams
356a2(rgyud 'bum): ni 'byam klas pa/ / rang bzhin gcig tu byas nas ni// rdo rje yis ni spro ba dang // dbang bskur ba yi rang bzhin dge/ gser gyi kha dog legs 'bar ba// ral pa'i thor tsugs 'dzin pa po//
356a3(rgyud 'bum): ral pa'i dbus su mchod rten che// dung dang kun da zla 'od bzang // bsgoms nas sems can thams cad la// brten pa'i don du dbang bskur bya// yang na sems can thams cad la// bu gcig/
356a4(rgyud 'bum): lta bur rnam par spro// sgom pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// gnyis meng ma rgyal ba las rgyal// spro ba dang ni bsdu ba dang / thim sogs phyogs dbyes rnam par dbye// byams pa kun tu rnam par spro/
356a5(rgyud 'bum): chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// thams cad bdag dang bdag gi bar// 'das shing shin tu dri ma med// ri rab lta bur brtan pa'i sems// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge bral// de ltar sems ni
356a6(rgyud 'bum): brtan byas nas/ mnyam med sems can kun dang mnyam// bdag nyid byams pa yin no zhes// dga' ldan gnas pa'i tshul 'dzin pa// cung zad li zhing 'khril pa'i sgra// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i
356a7(rgyud 'bum): 'od rin chen sems ni rnam dag pas/ / rang bdag nyi ni bsgom par bya// 'di'i gsang sngags rang bzhin gyis grub pa ni/ oM i dzi tany+dza sarba satwa sa ma ya ma nu ga ta swA hA/ gsang sngags
356b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid rgyal po 'di/ / byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste// chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par khyab// byams pa'i thugs ni yid du 'ong // dang po'i sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyi// sgrub pa'i
356b2(rgyud 'bum): thabs mchog bsgom par bya/ / oM mai tre ya tI/ 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis kyang // dga' ldan du ni gan+da par 'gyur// sgrib pa kun dang bral ba'i bdag/ rang nyid lha yi bu dang mtshungs/
356b3(rgyud 'bum): byams pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// 'di ni byams pa lte byar 'gyur// byams pa'i sangs rgyas zhing du ni// rang bzhin gyis ni skye bar 'gyur// de mdun chos ni legs mnyan nas// sa dang
356b4(rgyud 'bum): rol phyin pa dang / / dbang dang ting 'dzin thob nas ni// de ni byang chub sems dpar 'gyur// mthar yang sangs rgyas thams cad ni// byams pa'i yid kyis thob par 'gyur// byams pa'i sgrub pa'i
356b5(rgyud 'bum): thabs so/ / rang gi lus ni thams cad ni// nam mkha' mtshungs pa nyid du sgom// chos bdag med pa bskyed nas kyang // rang nyid nam mkha'i snying por 'gyur// gsang sngags
356b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ / mkha' mtshungs dpe las rnam par 'das// nam mkha'i 'od zer gyur pa yis// sems can rang gi sems las spro// thams cad sems las spros nas ni// slar yang rim
356b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis bsngo bar bya/ nam mkhar mnyam par 'gro ba blta// rang gi de nyid kyis sbyar bya// rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rin chem kha dog 'od chen po// rgyan rnams kun gyis lus brgyartan
357a1(rgyud 'bum): pa/ lag na rin chen stobs po che// rin chen sbyor ba bsgom pa yis// nam mkha'i dam pa 'grub pa yin// sngags ni/ oM A kA sha gan+d+ha ya swAhA/ nam mkha'i snying po stob po che/ bcom ldan rnal
357a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor 'grub par 'gyur/ / rang gi dngos grub thams cad ni// ster bar 'gyur te dpyad mi dgos// dpa' bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dngos grub ji snyed bka' stsal pa// nam mkha'i snying
357a3(rgyud 'bum): po bsgrubs pa yis/ / de dag thams cad myur du ster// nam mkha'i snying po sgrub pa'i thabs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yis// kun
357a4(rgyud 'bum): tu bzang po 'od bzang po/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rang gi lus ni ji snyed pa'i// rang gi phra rab rdul rnam
357a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ de dag thams cad mtshungs par bya// sangs rgyas sku yi sku nyid du// yang na ba spu'i khung rnams su// rang gi 'khor los yongs bskor nas// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs byas te//
357a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag ni kun tu bzang po zhes// yi ge lnga pa zhes su bshad// 'di yi sngags chen bzlas par bya// yang na 'dir ni lha gzhan gyi// rtag tu sngags su gyur pa'o// oM swA hrIHkA ya swA hA/
357a7(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags rgyal po che gsang zhing // gdong nas dag cing rang byung ba// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// shes rab dri ma med par 'gyur// de yi ye shes dri med cing // gzugs mdzes
357b1(rgyud 'bum): pa ni de dang mtshungs/ / bstan bcos thams cad rab smra ba// kun bzang mchog tu bdag 'gyur ro// kun tu bzang po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
357b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas par/ / rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi// sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba dang // bcud kyis len gyis bde
357b3(rgyud 'bum): blag tu/ / ring po nyid du mi thogs par// sgrib pa rnam sal mtshungs par 'gyur// sngags 'byung ba ni/ oM sarba ni war Na biSh+kam+b+hi swA hA/ oM ni sa rA ya swA hA/ gtso bo gsang sngags 'di
357b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin la/ / rnam par sel ba grags pa ste// thams cad sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya kun gyis thams cad du// gdod nas skyi mang rang bzhin gyis// gdod nas dag cing 'gyur ba med//
357b5(rgyud 'bum): de ltar chos 'di shes nas ni// lha nyid dang ni mnyam byas nas// rnyog pa med cing zag med pa'i// rjes su rnal 'byor gyis bsgrub bya// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma ltar// gsal ba'i rnam par
357b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'o/ / dbang chen dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i// me yis yongs su bskor ba yi// phyag na ral gri gzi brjid che// yang nas yang du sems byed cing // dngos grub 'di ni gzi brjid che//
357b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam sel mchog gi dbang phyug ni// mtha' las 'das pa'i dngos grub mchog/ thams cad nas ni stsol ba nyid// rnam par sel ba sgrub pa'i thabs so// / dbang chen dkyil 'khor
358a1(rgyud 'bum): steng du ni/ / rdo rje yi ni dbus na bzhugs// gser gyi mdog can sku chen po// 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can// snying khar rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnas// sa snying zhes byar bdag
358a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid sgom/ / rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas// rang gi gsang snga ga brjod par bya// sa snying zhes byar bdag bsgoms nas// sngags kyi yi ge mchog bde 'di// oM k+Shi haHrA dzaHswA hA/
358a3(rgyud 'bum): bsam yas sngags mchog 'di yis ni// dngos grub thams cad rab gsol mdzad// sa yi snying po zhes grags pa// dam pa'i don du rnal 'byor pas// sa'i snying po'i sgrub pa'i thabs
358a4(rgyud 'bum): zad pa med cing 'khrul pa med/ / zag med mchog gi shes rab can// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// shes rab rdo rje'i bdag nyid dge/ blo gros mi zad rnyed dka' ba/
358a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bad pa yis ni bsgom par bya// ma yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// gser gyi mdog dang ldan pa'i gzugs// rgyal po chen po zla ba'i 'od// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gsal// sngags ni//
358a6(rgyud 'bum): oM a k+Sha ya ma ti swA hUM/ sngags kyi yi ge gsang ba 'di// thams cad blo gros gsal bar byed// ye shes mi zad 'dod pa yis// 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste// dngos grub kun gyi mchog
358a7(rgyud 'bum): shes bya/ / shes rab ye shes dri me mdzes// sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos// blo gros mi zad pa'i sgrub thabs so// / kun nas shes rab
358b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po can/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten par// gser gyi kha dog gzi brjid che// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i// gzhon nu'i gzugs can rtag bsam bya// re ba thams cad rdzogs
358b2(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad/ / rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor ba// nam mkha'i bdag po bdag yin no// lus ngag yid kyis thams cad du// thams cad rig pas brtan par bya// shin tu dri med byang chub sems// rang
358b3(rgyud 'bum): snying me long lta bur bsam/ / de nas yi ge'i tshig bkod de// mkha' mdzod bdag ces bdag nyid kyis// bsgoms nas rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag/ mkha' la rin chen 'byung gnas dang // yid bzhin nor/
358b4(rgyud 'bum): bu dpag bsam shing // de bzhin bum pa bzang po sogs// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug gis// nye bar mkho ba thams cad 'bab// 'jig rten kun gyi rdzas thams cad// ji snyed yod pa
358b5(rgyud 'bum): de dag kun/ / 'dir ni skad cig tsam nyid la// dngos grub dam pa stsol bar 'gyur// / oM ga gA na gany+dza gaM swA hA/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi dngos grub che// nor gyi rgyun gyi rab 'bebs pa// nam
358b6(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i mdzod ni stobs po che/ / skad cig tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// nam mkha' mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// rin chen dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ rin chen phung po char rab
358b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bebs/ / rin chen gzi brjid mchog tu rol// lag na rin che dang bsgrub bya// lag na rin tshon phyag rgya che// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdorje sbyor bas bsgom par bya// bdag nyid
359a1(rgyud 'bum): rin chen zhes bya dang / / rin chen thams cad sgrol bar mdzad// thams cad rdo rje bzhin bdag nyid// pri yang ku mdog sngo bsangs 'od// dbang chen dang ni me las byung // phyag
359a2(rgyud 'bum): na rin chen cher gsal ba/ / rab tu 'bad de bsgom par bya// oM rat+na pA Ni ra mu swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni brtson 'grus che// rab tu 'bad de bsgrubs na ni// 'gro ba kun gyi lag tu ni/
359a3(rgyud 'bum): rin chen thams cad rab stsol byed// lag na rin po che'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// / chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems// bdud rtsi'i chu yis rab gang ba// stong gsum zhes ni
359a4(rgyud 'bum): bsam par bya/ / pad+ma gcig gi steng na gnas// de yi steng du gzi brjid che// chu lha yi ni gzugs kyi mchog/ de skang du yang gsang chen po// me yi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// de yi
359a5(rgyud 'bum): steng du brtson 'grus che/ / rtse mo brgya pa'i rdo rje byung // de yi steng du pad chen po// 'dab ma brgya pa 'od gsal ba// de steng rtag tu bsam pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che/
359a6(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho'i blo gros zhes grags pa// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// dung dang kun da zla ba'i mdog/ rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de yi lag na phyag rgya che// rdo rje dung du
359a7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu grags/ / rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas// rang nyid rdo rje yin no zhes// rgya mtsho'i blo gros shes rab che// slar yang gsang sngags bzla bar bya// sngags ni/ oM sA ga ra ma ti sar
359b1(rgyud 'bum): swAhA/ sngags 'di mchog dang gtso bo ste// shes rab ye shes dri med mdzes// rdo rje'i sbyor bas myangs na ni// shes rab rgya mtsho'i blo gros mtshungs// rang nyid sangs rgyas 'jam pa'i
359b2(rgyud 'bum): / dbyings// thugs rje 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rgya mtsho'i blo gros kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// dbang chen dkyil 'khor lnga gnas
359b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ut+pal sngon po 'dab 'dra'i 'od/ / rdo rje snying po brtson 'grus che// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// ji snyedas stengs mtha' dag tu// khyab la sdug cing mtho ba yi//

359b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs pa'i 'od/ / de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni// yi ge mchog ni steng du 'baro// thugs kar rdo rje cher gsal ba// rang nyid rnam par 'phro ba bzhin// sngags ni/ oM badz+ra
359b6(rgyud 'bum): gar+b+ha hUM/ 'di ni sngags mchog gtso bo ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// ye shes yangs pa stsol mdzad cing // rnam pa kun tu phun tshogs kun// sangs rgyas nyid kun snol mdzad
359b7(rgyud 'bum): na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du bya ba sgrub par byed// bdag nyid rdo rje yin no zhes// nga rgyal rab tu bskyed nas ni// rdo rje snying po
360a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du gzhan/ / bdag gi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya// thugs kyi rdo rje nyid gyur nas// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa thob// des na rnam pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje snying
360a2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag byung / / rdo rje snying po mkha' rdo rje// sbyin byed rtse mo drug pas bsgrub// rdo rje snying po sgrub pa'i thabs so// dbang chen med las yang dag byung // nor bu rin chen 'dra ba'i
360a3(rgyud 'bum): lus/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'i 'od// rin chen 'byung ba sems chen po// 'gro ba snang bar byed de gnas// pad+ma mkha' 'dra'i rnam pa can//

360a6(rgyud 'bum): snying po rdo rje'i rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar
360a7(rgyud 'bum): yang 'dus te gshegs nas/ / bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khro bo
360b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das skyed du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo 'khor lo sgyur ba chen pos de skad ces gsol ba btab ma thag kho nar// rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba las ches gsang
360b2(rgyud 'bum): ba bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// khro bo yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/ rlung khams rab tu gsal ba la// me ni dbus nas dbus su'o// de yi dbus su rdo rje che/
360b3(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer lnga yi 'phreng bas mdzes// de yi mdun du bya ba yang // mdung rtse 'bar ba chen po yi// de yi g.yas kyi cha ru ni// rdo rje chen po 'bar 'phreng can// g.yon nyid du ni btson che//

362b1(rgyud 'bum): dzakun mchogs yi dbang phyug ste/ / rta yi mgrin pa stobs po che// stobs kyi sbyor bas bsgrub par bya// dbang phyug chen po la sogasaH// tshogs kyi bdag po gzhan dag dang /

362b7(rgyud 'bum): ramaHsa maN+Da badz+ra NA tsaN+Da ma hA ro/ dam mr-i Ta ya hU~M/ tra ka rbA ma~M/ khro ba'i gzi brjid chen po 'od// gzugs mang mnga' ba stobs po che// 'gro ba thams cad 'grags par byed// dbang duya
363a1(rgyud 'bum): ni mdzad par gnas/ / rlung dang me las yang dag byung // 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can// sngags dang phyag rgya sogs kun mchog/ lus dang ngag yid de bzhin
363a2(rgyud 'bum): no/ / dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du byas nas bsgrub par bya// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas mchog/ khro bo phyag rgya rang 'byung ba/
363a3(rgyud 'bum): drag po thog ma tha ma med// rnam par 'phro ba bzhin du gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor 'di yongs su rdzogs so//
363a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs thams cad kyi dbang
363a5(rgyud 'bum): phyug gi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs rnams thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi
363a6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gzungs rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khor dag/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs kyis ni rnam par mdzes// thig bzhi dang
363a7(rgyud 'bum): ni yang ngag ldan/ / dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bshad// de yi dbus su pad chen po// lo ma kun gyis shin tu mdzes// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'dab pa ldan// rdo rje rin chen legs par brgyan// de yi
363b1(rgyud 'bum): dbus su rtag bri ba/ / dpag med shes rab pha rol phyin// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// sna tshogs las ni 'bar rnams la// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis// shes rab pha rol phyin ma bri//
363b2(rgyud 'bum): shar gyi 'dab ma nas brtsams te// thog mtha' nyid kyang brtag par bya// phyag rgya'i yi ge ci rigs par// go rims bzhin du rnam par dgod// phyogs cha'i dbye ba tha dad kyis// kha
363b3(rgyud 'bum): dog dbye ba thams cad du/ / rnam dbye mchog tu sna tshogs pa// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// de las 'od zer bsam mi khyab// sngo ser la sogs dbye ba yis// shes rab snang
363b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ / 'gro ba thams cad gsal bar bya// 'dus par gyur nas de dag kun// lha nyid kyi ni gzugs ji bzhin// shes rab chen po gzugs chen po// 'bar bcas
363b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa'i gzi brjid can/ / de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// sngags kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas brten// sku ni gser gyi mdog dang 'dra// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rang gi ting
363b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin la zhugs/ / du ma'i gzugs kyi gzugs ldan pa// shes rab pha rol phyin ma ni// sems can khams ni rnam sbyong mdzad// kun nas sems can rnams kyi yum// sems can kun
363b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi thams cad du/ / thams cad lus la mnyam par khyab// sems kyi rgyun bzhin legs par zhugs// zag pa med cing bosam mi khyab// dri ma med cing ngang gis stong // nam mkha' dang ni
364a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs 'dra ba/ / dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs// thog ma tha ma med cing zhi// chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug sku// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// bden
364a2(rgyud 'bum): pa gnyis la rnam par gnas/ / dam pa dang ni dam pa'i don// chos kyi sku ru de bshad do// dbang po kun kyang rnam par shes// sems can thams cad thams cad du// yid kyi rnam shes
364a3(rgyud 'bum): zhes su bshad/ / shes rab blo dang blo gros ldan// lhag mthong dang ni ye shes kun// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang// rtag dang chad pa'i mtha' dang ldan// mtha' gnyis po ni rnam par
364a4(rgyud 'bum): spangs/ / kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don// rnam pa gnyis su de rab brtags// ji ltar bud shing la brten nas// me yi sa bon gnas pa dang // til la til mar ji bzhin no// bur
364a5(rgyud 'bum): shing ro bzhin rab tu brtag/ me tog dri ni ji bzhin nam// zhol mar gsar ji bzhin du// rnal 'byor pa yis ye shes srub// bdud rtsi lta bu'i snying po 'byung // gtsub shing dang ni gtsub
364a6(rgyud 'bum): stan la/ / ji bzhin gtsub pas me 'byung ste// de bzhin ye shes rnal 'byor pas// bsrubs pas yongs su brtag par bya// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la// yang nas yang du srub
364a7(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / mun pa thams cad rnam sel ba'i// nyi ma'i 'od zer ji bzhin bdag/ nam mkha'i dri ma med brten nas// nyi ma zla ba bzhin du gnas// 'char ba yi ni gsal byed pa// 'bar
364b1(rgyud 'bum): ba stong phrag gi ni snod/ / mun pa kun 'joms skar ma la// kun nas kyang ni mdzes pa yin// rnal 'byor pas ni ji ltar sems// mkha' bzhin shin tu dri ma med// gzung 'dzin las/
364b2(rgyud 'bum): ni nges par grol// mnyam dang mi mnyam dngos po kun// de nas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis// ye shes nyi zla mtshungs pa'i 'od// shes rab pha rol phyin bsgoms te// gsang sngags
364b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dis ni bsam par bya/ / rang bzhin gyi ni dag pa'i dngos// rang bzhin med par rnam par gnas// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal kun// gdod nas ma skyes rnyog pa med// yi ge de nyid de lta/
364b4(rgyud 'bum): bu/ gnas dang mi gnas rnam par spangs// sde tshan bzhi pa'i gnyis pa la// thig le sgra yi rnam par brgyan// de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ste// shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad// oM
364b5(rgyud 'bum): prany+dza swA hA/ oM shru tI smr-i ti bi dza ye swAhA/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab 'dis// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed// oM yaM/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi yum// 'di ni 'khor
364b6(rgyud 'bum): lo rnam par sbyar/ / 'di ni dngos grub thams cad dang // grub pa 'di ni byed par gnas// bstan bcos rab tu 'chad byed dang // shes bya thams cad khyad par du// thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos
364b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kun/ / dbang phyug dam pas shes par 'gyur// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// / shes rab pha rol phyin gnyis pa// rdzu 'phrul chen po mkha'
365a1(rgyud 'bum): dang mnyam/ / gser gyi mdog can 'bar ba can// zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs// brtson 'grus chen po bsam gtan bya// sngags kyi yi ge rnam par
365a2(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / mchog tu rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// sangs rgyas spyan zhes btags pa yi// de yi gsang sngags rab bshad bya// nyon cig sa rnams 'dod pa rnams// sngags ni/ oM ru ru
365a3(rgyud 'bum): / sU ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swAhA/ 'di de mchog tu gsang ba ni// rnal 'byor ma la mchog tu bshad// dbang chen yi ge'i mthar thug pa// bsgoms pas dge ba rab tu ster//
365a4(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi phyag rgya 'di shin tu// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// dpung dang bcas pa myur bkug ste// bran du gyur nas nye bar gnas// phyag rgya gcig pa'i lha mo che// rol cing g.yo
365a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i zhal mnga' ba/ / sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// rol cing snang ba'i gar mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyan ni 'grub par 'gyur// mig gi phyag rgya rab tu sbyar// mig gi phyag rgya
365a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di shin tu/ / 'jig rten gsum yang gar byed do// sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// // chu yi dkyil 'khor dgyes pa na// bcud kyis len dang mtshungs pa'i
365a7(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ mtha' yas rgyas shing yangs pa yi// dri ma med pa'i mkha' la gnas// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// lha mo mchog tu mdzes pa mo// 'dam bu mnga' rgyu'i mdog ltar
365b1(rgyud 'bum): dkar/ / grub ma ral pa'i cod pan 'chang // 'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad ma// rtag tu nam mkha' bzhin du gnas// sngags ni/ oM ka Te bi ka Te ka T+wA~M kaT+Te swAhA/ gos dkar mo
365b2(rgyud 'bum): yi phyag rgya ni/ / dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra// sngags kyi yi ge 'phreng ba che// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas// 'gro ba mtha' dag sdang mdzad na// sgrub pa pos ni bsgrub par bya//
365b3(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i lha mo 'grub par 'gyur// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs// zhi ba'i ro dang yang dag ldan// zhi ba'i yi ge mnyam par ldan/ zhi bar mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi// sa gsum sgrub par byed pa'i thabs/
365b4(rgyud 'bum): gos dkar mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// sngo bsangs dkar mo sna tshogs gzugs// rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// sgeg pa'i
365b5(rgyud 'bum): nyams kyis yongs gang ba/ / 'gro ba mtha' dag skyob mdzad ma// thugs rje'i thugs dang ldan pa can// rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya// rol pa yi ni yi ge mchod// sngags ni/ oM tA
365b6(rgyud 'bum): re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ chos kyi phyag rgya mtha' yas mchog/ sgrol mas legs par rab tu gnas// gsang chen bzhin du thams cad la// bcud kyis len dang 'dra ba'i mchog/ kun tu kun tshe
365b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du/ / dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad// sgrol ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// / dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su ni// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo mchog
366a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag bzhi spyan ni gsum pa dang / / ral pa'i cod pan ngag gis gnas// 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar// dpa' ba la sogs nyams kyis brgyan// brtson 'grus
366a2(rgyud 'bum): chen mo 'jigs sel ma/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rab tu 'bar ba'i me bzhin du// shin tu gsal ba'i gzi brjid can// hUM gi yi ge zab mo'i sgra// sa gsum po ni
366a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khrug par mdzad/ / khro gnyer can zhes legs par grags// sngags kyi 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// sngags ni/ oM b+ha ya nA sa ni trA sa ni trA se/ tra sa ya/ b+h+r-i ku Ti ta DI twe tA Di be ra shwa te sheH
366a4(rgyud 'bum): dzadziTi ni/ oM Tak+ki hUM dzaHswA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni brtson 'grus che// gsang sngags kun gyi ba gnyid mchog/ 'gro ba kun kyang 'gugs byed na// gdug pa'i sems lta smos ci dgos//
366a5(rgyud 'bum): khro gnyer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje ldan// rdo rje'i 'phreng bas yongs su bskor// gzi brjid dkyil 'khor
366a6(rgyud 'bum): kun nas dkris/ / der gnas rtag tu lha mo ni// stobs chen pri yang ku ltar ldang // phyag bzhi par de bsam par bya// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rnal 'byor ma rnams cher zhig/
366a7(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba// sngags kyi yi ge 'phreng ba che// rdo rje'i dbus song rab tu gnas// khro bo hUM mdzad gang ba'i mtha'// dpa' ba'i nyams la sogs par ldan// lha mo
366b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum rmongs byed/ / dngos grub chen po rab stsol ma// skad cig tsam gyis 'gro ba kun// nges par dbang du byed par 'gyur// rdo rje'i rlung gi 'phreng ba che// rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab
366b2(rgyud 'bum): tuganas/ / 'jig pa chen po'i me ltar drag/ snang ba chen mo stobs mo che// pad+ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// mtshan ni mA ma kI zhes bya// lha mo 'jig rten
366b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyis mchod/ / sngags ni/ oM kA la d+hA tri ya na ma/ shaM ka rA/ shAn+tiM ka re/ g+hun+da g+hun+na g+hun+da ni/ g+hA ta ya g+hu Ti ni swAhA/ oM ku lan d+hA ri/ ban d+ha ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni don gyi
366b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yin// sa gsum po ni 'gugs byed cing // tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams kun// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed la// rang gi dbang du gnas pa'ang
366b5(rgyud 'bum): yin/ mA ma kI'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// rlung gi dkyil 'khor drag po la// rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis bskor// de yi dbus su snang ba che// zla ba'i gzugs kyis rnam par brgyan//
366b6(rgyud 'bum): des spros pa las bdag nyid ni// rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi sku// phyag bzhi ma la lha mo de// rdo rje yi ni rgyun gyis brgyan// dmar po 'bar ba de yis ni// sa gsum po ni 'ching bar mdzad// tshangs
366b7(rgyud 'bum): pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ / bkug nas dbang du mdzad par gnas// dngos grub thams cad 'dzin pa dang // de yi thugs kar rdo rje che// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od//
367a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba lcags sgrog gi/ rnam pa rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan// nges par phyung nas de dag kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// 'jig rten khams ni mtha'
367a2(rgyud 'bum): dag tu/ / kun nas rnam par bkang nas kyang // bsgom bya rdo rje thams cad du// khro bo dang ldan spro ba'i zhal// lto ba 'phyang zhing sku che ba// mche ba bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// 'bar ba
367a3(rgyud 'bum): / yi ni 'phreng ba gsal// gzugs mdzes drag po'i gzugs dang ldan// sngags ni/ oM badz+ra shri kha lA ya d+hi pa ta ye/ ma hA ba lA ya/ ma hA bi tA rA dzA ya tA pra dz+wa li tA/ ha s+thu ya na mo nI la
367a4(rgyud 'bum): kar+N+Na ya ki rA ta rU pa lam+bo da rA ya/ b+h+r-i ku TI mu khA ya/ mA dzA ra mu khA ya/ mA dzA ra mu khA ya/ tsa tu daMSh+Ti kA rA lA yA/ e t+ye he a s+ya sha rA ri/ ma nu pra ba sh+tsa/ shi r-i gr-ih+Na grI bA gr-ih+NA
367a5(rgyud 'bum): ha staM pa daM gr-ih+na bi Sha/ A be sha yA/ ka pa ya/ kaM pa ya/ b+h+ra ma ya b+hU ma ya/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ya/ bi rgurba bi rgurba/ tsur+t+ta tsUr+d+ha kuT+Ta kun+da/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ maR+YArtA/ ni krim+b+haH
367a6(rgyud 'bum): hr-i da ya/ ts+tshin+da/ ba lA ba la/ kiny+tsa rA ya si/ de ba/ nA ga/ yAMk+Sha/ rAk+Sha sa pi shA tsAn sA d+ha ya/ sa ma ya ya ma nu smA rau/ dzA ti ma nu smai ra hA hA/ ni d+h+r-i nid+d+hi/ ni shi ni shi/ badz+ra
367a7(rgyud 'bum): shri ba la/ A dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ oM badz+re re Ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+re Ni hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kA li hU~M phaT swA hA/ gsang sngags 'onga'i myor ba yis// bcud kyis len ni bde ba dang // 'gro ba
367b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'bas pa dang / / gdug pa rnams ni 'ching ba dang // tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams dang // lha dang lha min lto 'phye che// 'jig rten skyong dang klu rnams kyang // rang gi gnas
367b2(rgyud 'bum): nas bskyod nas ni/ / grub pa kun gyi dngos grub ni// dngos grub 'gugs par 'dod pa yis// thams cad gus pas sbyin par byed// bud med gzugs kyis bsgrub par bya// rdo rjel
367b3(rgyud 'bum): gu rgyud mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/ / / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+ma dmar po rab tu garas// phyag bzhi pa la du ma'i gzugs// dung dang kun zla ba 'dra/
367b4(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi rdo rje'i de nyid yin// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// zhi ba la sogs nyams dang ldan// chos rnams kun gyi bdag skyes mchog/ rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu sgom// sangs
367b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bye ba yang dag 'byung / / dar bdag yang dag sgo ba ni// skul byed ma zhes yongs su grags// sngags kyi 'phreng ba'i yi ge ldan// kun nas rnam par 'phro byed pa// nam mkha'i
367b6(rgyud 'bum): khams ni yongs gang bya/ / ji srid de yi spyod yul yang // de srid de yi 'od zer bsgoms// rnal 'byor ye shes kyis rab sprul// sngags ni/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun+de swA hA/ 'di yi sngags
367b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi mchog gtso bo/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis mchod pa po// mtshungs pa med pa'i dngos grub ster// lnga dang lha min bcas pas mchod// 'di yis sdig kun 'dzad byed cing // phur sum tshogs
368a1(rgyud 'bum): kun rab stsol mdzad/ / pad+ma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas nyid kyang ster byed pa'o// skul byed ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// / gsang ba mchog
368a2(rgyud 'bum): gi dgyes pa na/ / thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun bdag dgyes pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu nyid
368a3(rgyud 'bum): ni lhag pa'i lha/ / sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// 'dod chags med cing chags bral med// dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// bud med kun
368a4(rgyud 'bum): gyi sgyu ma'i rgya/ / 'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las// bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags// nus pa yi ni rang bzhin gyis// rang bzhin nyid kyis de grub
368a5(rgyud 'bum): bo 'jig rten gsum gyi bud med 'dis/ / bskur bar bya ba 'os pa yis// ngan spyod rnams kyis kyang 'grub ste// rnyed pa kun dang bde dang spro// thams cad bud med sgyu mas 'grub//
368a6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur ba// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'dis// shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad// kun la sna tshogs phyag rgya ni// kun la sna tshogs sdom pa yis// sangs rgyas
368a7(rgyud 'bum): kun dang mnyam par sbyor/ / stong pa nyid kyi de nyid bskul// kun la kun nas thams cad du// rnam kun kun tshe rang nyid kyi// sangs rgyas thams cad brtan dang g.yo// thams cad dngos
368b1(rgyud 'bum): po rang nyid 'gyur/ / sems dang sems can ting 'dzin dang // byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid// sa dang pha rol phyin spyod pa// dbang nyid du yang de bshad do// bdud dang bdud
368b2(rgyud 'bum): lhas rgyal ba nyid/ / sangs rgyas rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// thog mA tha ma med zhi ba// byang chub sangs rgyas bcom ldan de'o// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid// pad+ma de bzhin pad+ma
368b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin/ / nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa nyid// sna tshogs de bzhin sna tshogs 'dzin// ral gri ral gri 'dzin rgyal po// 'khor lo de bzhin 'khor lo 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum rgyal nyid dang
368b4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ 'di rnams kyi yang rigs nyid 'gyur// de nyid chags dang chags bral ba// 'dod dang thar pa ru yang 'gyur// dus gsum dang ni srid gsum mchog/ 'jig rten gsum dang
368b5(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum pa/ / brtan pa thams cad de nyid de// rnam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur// g.yo ba kun nas sna tshogs pa// thams cad du ni de 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa mchog gi mchog
368b6(rgyud 'bum): chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ / nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa// dngos po kun tu de 'gyur ro// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// nam mkha
368b7(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi skabs na dpal/ / rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dpal ldan sgyu ma chen po 'chang // rnam snang rtag pa thams cad du// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso chen khyab// sangs rgyas
369a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo can mi bskyod/ / tshe dang rin chen 'byung stobs che// tshe dpag med pa kun nas mchog/ don yod sna tshogs mdzad pa dang // rdo rje sems dpa' blta na sdug
369a2(rgyud 'bum): dgug pa mchog gi sbyor ba dang / / logs par mdzad pa de nyid yin// rin chen sgrol ma de bzhin tog/ rdo rje bzhad pa snang ba che// rdo rje chos dang rno ba che// sgyu dang smra mchog bdud rtsi
369a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / las dang go cha gnod sbyin che// khu tshur de bzhin gshegs pa kun// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' stobs po che// rdo rje hUM mdzad hU~M mdzad dang /
369a4(rgyud 'bum): rta mgrin zhes ni rnam par grags// he ru ka dpal rdo rje che// mchog gi dbang phyug gshin rje gshed// khro bo gzegs ma snang ba che// rdo rje ma ni 'od chen po// gzungs rnams kyi ni mchog
369a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig pu/ / ting nge 'dzin las dbang sgyur ma// shes rab pha rol phyin mchog gtso// sa dang pha rol phyin pa stobs// tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen po bzhi// dbang ni mchog tu 'bar
369a6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi// dbang po rnam dang stobs rnams dang // rjes dran drug por gyur pa gang // bsgom par bya bar rab tu gnas// de nyid bcom ldan gcig pu nyid//
369a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub yan lag bdun btags pa// mtha' gcig yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog gi mtshan// 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam po che// 'phags lam yan lag
369b1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad btags pa/ / stobs bcu yi ni bcu pa nyid// sangs rgyas chos kyi bdag nyid gnas// byang chub phyogs kyi chos chen po// rnam par dbye ba sum cu bdun// mthar gyis gnas

375b7(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pas thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o/ / de la dang po kho nar re zhig dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon ni dam tshig thams
376a1(rgyud 'bum): cad shes pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos dngos grub thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa/ rdo rje rnam
376a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor gyi dbang phyug lta bu/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya la bslab par bya'o// de nas 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings par
376a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur pa ri/ skyil krung bcings nas dri la sogs pa rnams kyis lag pa gnyis byugs nas phyag rgya bcings pa rab tu bsgrub par bya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa byas te/
376a4(rgyud 'bum): sor mo phan tshun bcings nas skyil krung gi dbus su rdo rje bsdams par bzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni gar gyi tshogs kyi/
376a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyor bas so// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid rkeng pa'i phyogs su bzung ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsnams pa las mdzub mo lcags kyu lhur bzung ba ni rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o//
376a6(rgyud 'bum): denyid mnga' 'phen pa lta bu'i sbyor ba ni rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid la legs so ba sbyin pas rgyab tu 'jog pa ni rdo rje legs pa'i'o// byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya rnams so// rdo rje
376a7(rgyud 'bum): bsdams pa de nyid dpral bar 'jog pa ni rdo rje nin gyi phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje bsdams pa la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis sbyor ba ni rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa
376b1(rgyud 'bum): spyi bor sbyar ba ni tog gi phyag rgya'o/ / kha'i thad du bskor ba ni rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid khar byas pa ni rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid snying khar byas pa ni rdo rje ral
376b2(rgyud 'bum): gri'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid 'khor lo ltar yongs su bskor ba ni rdo rje rgyu'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid snying khar bsgreng ba ni rdo rje smra ba'i phyag rgya'o// chos kyi phyag rgya rnams so// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid gar
376b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid du ston pa ni las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis spyi bo dang / snying kha dang / mgrin par 'jog pa ni rdo rje srung ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa las 'gram pa gnyis su
376b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jog pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid snying khar btsir ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du sgeg mo dang bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i sbyor bas lha mo thams
376b5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ / rol cing rnams 'khor dgod pa dang // sgeg dang snying rje'i bdag nyid dang // dpa' dang khro sogs chos bdag nyid// rang nyid zhi ba'i
376b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid nyams/ / phyag rgya thams cad rab sogs pa// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// rang nyid rdo rje'i gar byed dam// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya bcing ba rab tu
376b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyar/ thams cad grub par 'dod sogs kyis// skyil krung sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// de phyir gnyis med rdo rje can// sangs rgyas rnams kyi drang po'i sku// sgeg pa'i sbyor bas rdo
377a1(rgyud 'bum): can/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhi ba'i spyan// bsnyems bcas rdo rje nan gyis dgongs// sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje can// ting 'dzin dbye ba las shes bya//
377a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khrugs pa'i lha stangs khro rnams kyis// btsun mo rnams kyis rol pa nyid// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang // sdig spyod rnams kyi lha stangs steng // chos rnams kun gyi
377a3(rgyud 'bum): rjes 'jug pa'i/ / shugs kyi lha stangs phyag rgya'o// tshogs dang pho nya pho nya mo'i// lta stangs rnam pa sna tshogs nyid// mchu yi phyag rgya yongs ldan pa// g.yo ba med cing mi
377a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gul ba/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// mtshams sbyor cung zad yang dag ldan// rnam 'gyur med cing mtshungs meng gnas//
377a5(rgyud 'bum): rol pa'i yi ge yang dag ldan// mchu yi phyag rgya rdo rje can// rnam 'gyur can dang 'khor ba can// khro bas so ni yongs su bsdam// 'di ni khro ba'i phyag rgyar bshad// mchu yi phyag rgya
377a6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs mdzes can/ / 'jig rten pa rnams mchu'i phyag rgya// rnam 'gyur 'jig cing gzugs dang bral// shin tu gnag dka'i 'dod chags dang // sdang dang rmongs las thams cad du//
377a7(rgyud 'bum): rol cing rnam 'khor dang ldan pa// g.yo bcas rab tu 'phro ba yang // mchu yi phyag rgyar shes par bya// lha mo po nyi'i tshogs kyi yang // de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ lha stangs mchu
377b1(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa'i ming / / phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdus pa/ skyob pa rnams kyis kun shes bya// ji srid sku yi dbye ba dang // dbang po la sogs rab dbye dang // de dag phyag rgya mtha
377b2(rgyud 'bum): yas mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis brtags pa nyid// sna tshogs sku ni gzi brjid che// tshad meng yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog/ sangs rgyas
377b3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub rab spyir byed/ / rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid gsang ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs so// // de nas
377b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bka' stsal pa/ de nas
377b5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ sna tshogs khams ni bsam yas mchog/ dar dang me
377b6(rgyud 'bum): tog rgan pos brgyan/ / rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// sna tshogs pad+mo de bzhin gzhan// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs yid 'ong ba// mgon po sum cu
377b7(rgyud 'bum): rtsa gnyis mtshan/ / 'bar ba mchog gis brgyan pa po// de sngags rtags su shes bya ba// dang po'i dbyangs dang gnyis pa'o// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// 'khor lo can brgyad bri
378a1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// 'khor lo kun tu 'bar ba gzhag/ 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus su ni// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas/ sgeg
378a2(rgyud 'bum): sogs sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ / ji ltar sngon bzhin bri bar bya// nye bar mkho ba'i mchod kun gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya// dgug sogs cho ga'i sbyor ba ni// dkyil
378a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor snga ma ji bzhin no/ / dkyil 'khor nye bar spyod pa kun// cho ga 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i rtog pa'o// // de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog
378a4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ / 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal zhes// bya ba rdo rje hUM mdzad grags// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi nang
378a5(rgyud 'bum): du 'khor lo ni/ / dkyil 'khor brgyad pa lta bu'o// de yi dbus su khro bo che// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal yang // khro gnyer ldan zhing smin ma 'khyog/ spyan gsal 'bar ba
378a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po pa/ / cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// rnam par dgod cing slar khro ba// g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni// dka' bzlog dbang phyug chen po gnon// sangs rgyas
378a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba sogs pas spras/ / in+d+ra ni la mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag bzhi pa la spyan gsum pa// zhal bzhi pa la thub par dka'// be con dang ni zhags par brjod// dang po na ni rdo rje
378b1(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / gnyis pa zhugs pa sdigs mdzu ba can// phyag gnyis khu tshur dam pa mchog/ khu tshur gnyis ni rab tu brtag/ mthe'u chung gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba// lu gra rgyang /
378b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis rnam par spel// snying khar phyag rgya legs bzhag nas// sdigs mdzub gnyis kyis bsdigs par mdzad// 'jig rten gsum rgyal zhes bya ba'i// phyag rgya mchog tu thub pa
378b3(rgyud 'bum): dka'/ / sngags ni ming gi de nyid ldan// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba mnyam par 'khrigs// dkyil 'khor de yi gnas rnams su// cha rnams kun tu thams cad nas// phyag rgya thams cad
378b4(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par bri/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyam gnas par// ral gri 'khor lo gzhu dang mda'// de bzhin du ni dgra sta nyid// de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas mchog/ mdor bsdus nas
378b5(rgyud 'bum): ni phyag rgya dgod/ / de ltar khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par bkod nas nye bar mkho ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil
378b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ro/ / / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes su bshad// gru bzhi
378b7(rgyud 'bum): pa la sgo bzhi pa/ / dar dang me tog chun pos brgyan// de dbus kyil 'khor chen po ni// chu zhes bya ba'i ming car no// de yi dbus su pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba/
379a1(rgyud 'bum): de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba// zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i mdog/ ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa can// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa
379a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyun rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po/ / sangs rgyas 'phreng ba sogs pas spras// sku rnams thams cad kun nas sgo// mtha' yas rab 'byam rgya che ba'i// chos dbyings mnyam dang
379a3(rgyud 'bum): mnyam la/ / de yi sngags su yongs grags pa// shaSha 'i sde yi mthar dge ba// k+Sha yig don ldan sngon byung ba// rgyu yi don du rab sgrub byed// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis spyi bor mnan//
379a4(rgyud 'bum): me yis sa bon gsal bar byed// thig le sgra ni mchog tu sbyin// 'jig rten dbang phyug ces bya'i mtshan// de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad// pad+mo'i thal mo rab tu brkyang // bris
379a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgyar yang dag bshad/ / dbyug gu ril ba spyi blugs bri// mdun du bgrang 'a phreng pad+ma yi// rgyal po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhag/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog
379a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya mchog tu 'bar de dag/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// ji lta rigs par dgod par bya// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po'o// /
379a7(rgyud 'bum): / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchog/ gzhan ni rab tu bshad par bya// dpa' bo rin chen snying po yi// rdo rje rin chen zhes su bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis
379b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzes par bya/ / de yi dbus su rin chen ni// yan lag brgyad pa mchog tu 'bar// de dbus rin chen pad+ma ni// rin chen 'phreng bas rnam par mdzes// deng bus pad+ma rA ga 'am
379b2(rgyud 'bum): rin chen rdo rje cher 'bar ba/ / sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// rin cher 'phreng bas rnam par mdzes// mdun gyi kun gyi dbang bskur gtso// rin chen de yi gtso bo mchog/ g.yas
379b3(rgyud 'bum): su pad+ma rA ga ste/ / rgyab tu in+d+ra nI la'o// yid bzhin nor bu rin cher g.yon// phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs mchog/ sna tshogs rin ched rnam par brgyan// dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa
379b4(rgyud 'bum): ni gnas rnams su ni gzhag par bya/ / sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi// de yi sngags su yongs grags pa// bzhi pa'i sde yi dang po gang // me yi sa bon gyis gsal
379b5(rgyud 'bum): byas/ dbyangs kyi gnyis pas kun nas mnan// dbang sgyur ba ni stang du gnas// de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad// rin chen snyim pa rgyab bskums te// rin chen rnam pa legs
379b6(rgyud 'bum): byung ba/ / de ni rdo rje rin chen ro// rdo rje ring po che'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa
379b7(rgyud 'bum): rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ / thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rdo rje 'phreng bas rnam par mdzes// de yi dbus su zhal bzhi pa// 'khor lo bzhin du yongs bskor ba'o//
380a1(rgyud 'bum): de yi dbus su pad chen po// kha dog sna tshogs yongs 'bar ba// de yi dbus su brtson chen po// rdo rje sna tshogs yongs su bri// rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin mdzes pa/
380a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che// sangs rgyas 'phreng bas rnam par mdzes// de yi sngags ni yang dag bshad// bcu gnyis pa yi dbyangs kyi
380a3(rgyud 'bum): mtha'/ / mya ngan 'das don legs gsal byas// sgeg sogs rig ma thams cad kyis// de bzhin rang gi phyag rgya yis// rdo rje'i thig le yongs su ldan// sna tshogs bkra ba
380a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu 'bar/ / de yi dbang bskur phyag rgya yis// mchod pa kur gyis thams cad nas// kun nas yongs su bskor ba yis// las kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// las kyi dkyil
380a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ro/ / / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// shes rab ye shes kyi 'khor lo// sngags kyi yi ges rnam par brgyan// de yi dbus
380a6(rgyud 'bum): su pang chen po/ / 'dab ma brgyad pa shin tu mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// gzhon nu sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa// sku mdog dmar zhing 'dzum bcas pa// sna tshogs gzugs
380a7(rgyud 'bum): can ral gri can/ / phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// ral gri'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// gsang sngags chen po'i yi ge lnga// de yi drung du legs par gnas// dbyings kyi bcu
380b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis gsang sngags ni/ / thugs kA ru ni yang dag gnas// phyi rol nyid ni gru bzhi mdzes// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rtababs bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor// sgo bzhi yis ni
380b2(rgyud 'bum): shin tu mdzes/ / shes rab pha rol phyin pa nyid// de la dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// sngon du bshad pa'i cho ga yis//
380b3(rgyud 'bum): mchod sogs cho ga rgyas pa nyid// bzhugs pa'i cho ga de bzhin du// ji ltar dkyil 'khor 'dir mthong bzhin// shes rab ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil
380b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar
380b5(rgyud 'bum): bya/ de yi nang du bri bya ba// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// rten cing 'brel 'byung 'phreng ba ni// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// 'khor lo'i dbus su brtson chen po// rdo rje'i rgyu ri stobs
380b6(rgyud 'bum): po che/ phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// kha dog nag po gzi brjid che// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor mdzad// de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni//
380b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyu yi don du so sor bskyed// dbyangs drug dang ni yang dag ldan// thig le phyi mos rnam par brgyan// rang gi yi ge'i 'phreng ba che// 'khor lo gnyis kyi rnam par brgyar// de yi mthu
381a1(rgyud 'bum): du drung yin la/ / rgyab tu zhags par brjod par bya// rdo rje'i thal mo phyag rgya che// 'khor lo bzhin du rab tu gnas// mchod pa thams cad rab tu brtag/
381a2(rgyud 'bum): staltar dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor bla na med// thog mar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// dngos grub thams cad yang dag
381a3(rgyud 'bum): 'bar/ / chos kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro// // de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// thog ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// dkyil
381a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor kun gyi thig gdab bo/ / de yi dkyil du snang ba che// mkha' bzhin shin tu 'od gsal ba// sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod// dam pa'i rgyal po rab tu bzhugs//
381a5(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i mdog can gzi brjid che// sna tshogs mtshon cha 'dzin pa'i mchog/ gzhon nus rab tu brjid pa'i zhal// nam mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags// sangs rgyas 'phreng ba sogs
381a6(rgyud 'bum): pas spras/ / rdo rje dkyil 'khor brgyan par mdzad// 'di yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che// dbyangs dgu pa la thig le dang // nA da yis ni rnam par brgyan// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa
381a7(rgyud 'bum): la/ thig le nA das rnam par brgyan// de yang gtso bo'i gsang sngags 'gyur// nam mkha'i mdzod ni rab bgor mdzad// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sngags kyi 'phreng ba
381b1(rgyud 'bum): mchog ldan pa/ / ma lus pa yis rnams kun// thams cad nas ni nam mkha'i mtshungs// tog ni phyag rgya gyur pa de'i// de bzhin du ni nges par bcing // de lha'i dkyil 'khor
381b2(rgyud 'bum): bris nas ni/ / nam mkha' yi ni mdzod de la// gal te bdag ni grub 'dod na// mchod pa kun gyis rnam par mchod// nam mkha'i mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas
381b3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab bo// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// khro bo'i
381b4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/ / der yang rdo rje ma yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog tu 'dod// de yi dbus su gzi brjid che// rdo rje gnod sbyin bla na med// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhig
381b5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i rgyal po la rab gnas/ / rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i lus// bdud rnams thams rlab 'joms mdzad// de sngags yi ger gyur pa ni// sha Sha'i sde tshan mthar dge ba/
381b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyu yi don du legs gsal bya// zo bo'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskor// sngags kyi yi ge 'phreng ba che// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje gnod
381b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyin de yis ni/ / gal te grub pa mchog 'dod na// sgyu ma thams cad gzhom par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'o// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog
382a1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ Na babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi dbus su 'khor mo che// lcags kyu mis ni rnam par mdzes/
382a2(rgyud 'bum): dbus su bcom ldan rdo rje rgyal// lcags kyu la ni rab tu bzhugs// phyag bzhi pa la sbrul bzhi pa// rgyan rnams thams cad rab tu 'bar// rdo rje lcags kyu khu tshur che// 'bar
382a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phro bas rnam par brgyan/ / 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par mdzad// sngags kyi yi ges legs par sbyar// sha Sha'i lnga yi drung gnas pa// bying ba'i rgyu ru legs par gnas/
382a4(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs drug pa yis legs par bya// zla byed thig les legs par brgyan// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya legs par sbyar// 'gugs par byed la don yod pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor
382a5(rgyud 'bum): bris nas ni/ / rdo rje lcags kyu mchog tu dge/ dgug pa la sogs thams cad la// 'gro ba 'dul ba yongs su bsdu// don mong rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas
382a6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dngos grub dkyil 'khor
382a7(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya/ / dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i rnam pa can// de yi dbus su gru gsum grags// lcags kyu mchog tu dge ba'o// de yi dbus su sems dpa'
382b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rgyal po stobs po che/ / phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// gzi brjid chen po dkar dang dmar// nags pa lcags kyu 'dzin dge ba/
382b2(rgyud 'bum): yi gsang sngags yang dag bshad// don yod 'bras bu stsol ba po// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa ni// nyis 'gyur nyid du rnam par gnas// de yi thig le mya ngan 'das// sngags
382b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'phreng ba gzhan gyis bskor/ / sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// sgo skyong ba dang mchod pa yang // sbyor ba ji bzhin rnam par dgod// de lha'i dkyil
382b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bris nas ni/ / mchod pa thams cad yongs su sgrub// rdo rje rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas kyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/
382b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rdo rje chags pa zhes su bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// chags
382b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ / thams cad dmar pos rab dregs pa// dbang du byed pa'i dam pa yin// de yi dbus su pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas// de yi lte ba'i
382b7(rgyud 'bum): dbus su ni/ / rdo rje chags pa bri bar bya// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// spyan gsum 'od kyi 'phreng ba can// de yi phyag rgya mchog tu ni// mdzes
383a1(rgyud 'bum): pa yi ni mda' gzhur 'gyur/ / rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes pa'i lus// 'gro ba kun la ches mchog gyur// de yis gsang sngags mdzes gyur pa// rdorje
383a2(rgyud 'bum): rjes chags mchog gi bde/ / sha Sha'i sde yi mthar gyur pa// k+Sha yi yi ge'i sngon du gnas// dbyangs dgu pa dang yang dag ldan// sngags kyi 'phreng bas yang dag brgyan// me
383a3(rgyud 'bum): tog mnga' ni yongs su 'phen/ / re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod byed// rdo rje chags pa'i dkyil
383a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ro/ / // de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje legs pa zhes grags pa// gnyis su med pa'i dga' ba'ang 'phel// gru
383a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ / rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi dbus su cher mdzes pa'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa gru bzhi pa// de yi dbus su pad chen po// ze 'bru yis ni nye bar
383a6(rgyud 'bum): mdzes/ / de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yang dag 'bar// der gnas dpa' bo bsam par bya// rdo rje legs pa stobs po che// dung dang kun da zla ba dkar/
383a7(rgyud 'bum): kha ba bzho'i 'od ltar mdzes// legs so stsol ba tshim par mdzad// ting nge 'dzin dbang mang po sgyur// rdo rje sgeg mo sogs mchod pa// de bzhin me togs dug pa sogs// sgo ni
383b1(rgyud 'bum): skyong ba nyid kyang ni/ / rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya// de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni// gsang ba chen po mchog tu 'bar// ha yi yi ge sngon gang de// sems can don ni rab sgrub byed//
383b2(rgyud 'bum): thig le gnyis dang yongs su ldan// legs stsol bas ni rnam par gnas// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad rab tu bskor// bdag nyid dag pas bzhugs pa
383b3(rgyud 'bum): sogs/ / thams cad yongs su spyad par bya// rdo rje legs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje gzi brjid
383b4(rgyud 'bum): ces su grags/ / rdo rje nyi mas blo gros ldan// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya// de yi nang
383b5(rgyud 'bum): du bri bya ba/ / rdo rje nyi ma 'od chen po// rdo rje nyi ma'i steng du ni// gru gsum rnam pa las byung ba// de yi dbus su gzi brjid che// 'bar ba yi ni me lta bu// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/
383b6(rgyud 'bum): ze 'bru yis ni shin tu mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// rdo rje gzi brjid stobs po che// bzang po'i mtshal dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// rgyu skyegs khu ba mtshungs pa'i mdog/ phyag bzhi pa la
