384a1(rgyud 'bum): dbus su ni/ / sngags kyi 'phreng bas yongs su bskor// rang gi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ldan// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod
384a2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ rdo rje gzi brjid dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ming // bdag nyid chen po
384a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i tog/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su
384a4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ mchog tu 'bar ba yi ni rlung // zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa 'dra// rin chen rgyal mtshan yongs bsgreng ba// de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// zhal
384a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa la gzi brjid che/ / in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// rin chen char pa rab tu 'bebs// phyag bzhi pa la snang ba che// de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che// sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la//
384a6(rgyud 'bum): me yis rab tu gsal byas pa// tog gi phyag rgyas yongs su bskor// sngags kyi 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya//
384a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje tog gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje bzhad pa zhes grags pa// rdo rje bzhad pa mtshungs pa'i 'od/
384b1(rgyud 'bum): / gru bani pa la sgo ba'ig/ rgyu babs banyis ni mdzes par byas// dag pa ni dang ni yang dag zan// dkyil chen po zla bAr bya// dkyil 'khor dang rgyas rnam pan/ i ni
384b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs pa'i 'od/ / de bzhin nu ni gzi brjid can// phyog rgya 'khor los rnam par mdzes// dkyil 'khor de mi dbus su ni// skyon ka'i zla ba 'dra ba'i 'od// 'gro ba mtha' dag
384b3(rgyud 'bum): snang mdzad pa/ / rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa bo// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// dbang phyug thams cad yang dag ldan// de yi gsang sngags sngags chen po// rgyu yi don du grub
384b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / stong pa mngon brjod bsam mi khyab// rang ming rtogs pas mtshan pa'o// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje bzhad pa'i dkyil
384b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ro/ / / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang
384b6(rgyud 'bum): ngag ldan/ / dngos grub dkyil 'khor yang dag bri// de yi steng du'ang pad+ma che// pad+ma mA las yang dag byung / glu gsum mchog tu mdzes pa po// um mdo'i ris kyis rnam par
384b7(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ chos dbyings yi ge'i de khon// thams cad gzi brjid bdag nyid dge/ de yi bdag gi de nyid ni// 'gro ba'i mar ka ta'adra// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyam/
385a1(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis brgyan pa po// gnyis pa'i mdog tu gyur pa ni// bad+ma rA gA mtshungs pa'i 'od// ji srid ngag gi 'khor ma na// smra ba'i dbye bas rab tu gnas/
385a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad so sor gsal bar byed// sprin gyi dkyil 'khor mchog rmang byung // de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje smra ba'i dkyil 'khor ro//
385a3(rgyud 'bum): / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// de yi dbus su
385a4(rgyud 'bum): go cha che/ / rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de yi dbus su brtson chen po// rdo rje srung ba yang dag bri// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// kha
385a5(rgyud 'bum): dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che/ / thams cad srung ba mchog tu dge/ phyag rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan// gsang ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog/ de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che// sha
385a6(rgyud 'bum): 'i sde yi mthar gnas mchog/ mgon po'i rgyur ni mngon par brjod// steng du nA das brgyan par bya// kun nas kha dog bu ma yis// yongs su bskor bar bsgom par bya// sngags kyi 'phreng
385a7(rgyud 'bum): ba yongs su ldan/ / glog gi 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ mchod pa thams cad rab bsgrub bya// rdo rje srung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro//
385b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po mcho/ yang dag rab tu bshang byug/ gru bzhi pa la sgo byini pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ thig pa'i dang ni yang dag ldan/ kha tshur dkyil 'khor zhi ba
385b2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ri// rdo rje pad+ma yid 'ong ba// gzi brjid chen po gser gyi mdog/ 'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba// de yi steng du gzi brjid che// rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che/
385b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brtan pa po// kun dadung dang zla ba dkar// khu tshur de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs khu tshur// rdo rje nyid du mnyam nyid
385b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ gnyis su med pa mchog gsang ba// khu tshur gyis ni sdud par bshad// de sngags mchog tu dga' ba ni// brjod du med nyid stsol mdzad pa// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa ni// 'bar ba'i
385b5(rgyud 'bum): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku// 'di yi sngags la rnam par gnas// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje khu tshur mchod par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor so//
385b6(rgyud 'bum): de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub stsol bar mdzad// de nas
385b7(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bshad bya ba/ / 'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ de bzhin gru bzhi bris nas ni// sgo khyud la sogs rnam par spangs/ rtse gsum paT+Ti sa dang ni// dung dang pad+ma sogs
386a1(rgyud 'bum): pas brgyan/ / thog mar dbang phyug chen po dgod// rtse gsum pa yi phyag rgyar ldan// khyu mchog la zhon mig gsum pa// stag gi pags gyon phyag bzhi pa// thal
386a2(rgyud 'bum): bas byugs shing mgo bo la/ / ral pa'i tshogs ni rab 'phyang ba// chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// phyag 'tshal ba ni 'di bri'o// de yi sngags ni/
386a3(rgyud 'bum): oM tri sa suM hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni cher gsang ba// bdag nyid chen po dbang phyug che'i// dbang phyug chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro// / dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid la dbang phyug
386a4(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i gnas su nag po chen po gzhag par bya'o/ / lag pa stong gis gar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dga' byed dbang phyug dang lhan cig phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa'o// lag pa stong gis gnas
386a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / rang gi sngags ni/ oM ma hA kA la hUM b+h+yoH/ oM nan di ke shwa ra hUM b+h+yo/ 'di bzlas ra dngos grub thams cad byengo// dga' byed dbang phyug dang nag po chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro//
386a6(rgyud 'bum): de nyid kyi ni cho ga yis// dkyil 'khor gri bzhi thig gang ba bya/ dor ni pad+ma yang dag bri// pad+ma'i dbus su sbrang cir byed// la sogs ming po gsum bri'o// gzhu yi phyag rgya
386a7(rgyud 'bum): yongs su 'dzin/ / sbrang rtsir byed dang rgyal bar byed// de bzhin nyid du'ang sgrub byed do// me tog mda' dang yongs su ldan// rang gi ming gtogs mtshan ma can// sngags ni/ ma d+h+ya
386b1(rgyud 'bum): oM sA/ d+ha na swa/ gsang sngags 'di ni 'dod gzugs can// dbang du byed pa thams cad sgrub// sbrang rtsi rdo rje la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa
386b2(rgyud 'bum): bris nas dbus su thig bzhi gdab bo/ / dbus su tum pu ru'o// shar gyi 'dab mar rgyal ba'o// lho ru rnam par rgyal ba'o// nub tu mi thub pa'o// byang du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o//
386b3(rgyud 'bum): de lha bu'i dkyil 'khor bris nas go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gsang sngags dgod par bya'o// oM tum bu ru hUM/ oM dza ya hUM/ oM bi dza ye hUM/ oM a dzi te hUM/ oM a pa rA dzi te hUM/
386b4(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba 'di dag lag g.yon du// khu tshur g.yon pas rab grub stsol// 'di yi phyag rgya nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags// lag par dgod pa rab bshad/

386b6(rgyud 'bum): gyis mi thub mthe'u chung la/ / lag pa'i dbus su yi ge oM// dgod bya de nyid lag pa'i rgyab// rdo rje 'brang ba'i mthar thug tu// dgod par bya ba mchog tu bshad// sbyor dang
386b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dbye ba yang / / phyag rgya kun spyod yongs su bsdu// so sor brtan par bya ba nyid// sor mo rnams la khyad par du// dbang dang dgug dang rmongs la sogs// rengs byed la
387a1(rgyud 'bum): sogs go rims bzhin/ / las rnams ngag ni thams cad du// sngags pas mnyam par bzhag ste bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

387a7(rgyud 'bum): cad thams cad de bzhin gshegs/ / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po che// tshad skyob dkar po stobs po che// gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid che// phul byung phul las phul du byung // rgyu med
387b1(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi mchog dpa' mchog/ gzi mchog gzi brjid byed mtshungs pa// rgyal ba rgyal ba mchog nyid dang // legs pa'i rgyal po bdag nyid che// rdo rje sems dpa' sems cher po//

387b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kun khyod la/ / dang po'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ legs so rdor can rnal 'byor che// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dag/ snying po'i rgyan ces mtshan gsol ba// 'di dag
387b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad legs par gsungs/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub sems// ye shes snying po shin tu mdzes// gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang // swa bya shin tu rnyed dka' ba// shes
387b7(rgyud 'bum): rab pha rol phyin pa'i mdo/ / brjod du med cing yi ge bral// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dkyil 'khor 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rgyas pa 'di
388a1(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang
388a2(rgyud 'bum): ma med pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab bo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/
388a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul 'jug pa ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das ma'ang snyoms par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan
388a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po 'di skad cig nyid la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes rdo rje la zhugs par gyur to/ / zhugs
388a5(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po shes rab ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin gsel bar mdzad cing brtan par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs de las 'thon te/
388a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi'ang shes
388a7(rgyud 'bum): rab dang ye she rnam par sbyangs te/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas bkug cing rjes su mnyes par byas nas legs par mdzad nas rnam par gnas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin legs par
388b1(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas/ mngon par dbang bskur te gzi brjid dang / tog dang / bzhad pa dang / de dag la nges par sbyar te mchog gi dbang phyug chen po las rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge
388b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin gyis chos rtogs pa la'ang rab tu gnas nas/ rnon po dang / rgyu dang / smra ba'i sems dpa' rnams la'ang thugs brtan par mdzad de yongs su dag nas/ yang pad+ma'i sems dpa'i ting nge
388b3(rgyud 'bum): la rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i dbang phyug chos nyid gzhi med pa la sbyar nas sna tshogs pa'i las kyi bdag po dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bsrung ba dang / khro bo dang / de bzhin gshegs
388b4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje mtshams sbyor ba rnam sems can gyi khams mtha' dag yongs su smin pa dang / byin gyis brlabs te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
388b5(rgyud 'bum): kar rjes su zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes la bzhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di tshad du brjod do// e ma'o zag med shes rab bdag/ sangs rgyas skyob
388b6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi/ / shes rab shin tu dri med sems// sems dpa'i lus su bdag gyur to// dri med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dngos dang dngos med rnams dpyad na// e ma'o chos
388b7(rgyud 'bum): ni bsam med nyid/ / bdag gi dbang du rnam par gnas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal bcom 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu
389a1(rgyud 'bum): drug gi lus su mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la yongs su bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye 'khor kun tu nyi ma'i dkyil
389a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang / byin gyis brlabs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la 'di skad ces
389a3(rgyud 'bum): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mdor bstan pa'i chos kyi tshig bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
389a4(rgyud 'bum): snang mdzad kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni legs so legs so// legs par

395b2(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gnas pa dang mi gnas pa dor ba ste/ don dam par gnas pa gcig yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ltar gnas pa med pa'o// oM sarba bya ba
395b3(rgyud 'bum): swa na bi ga te hUM/ rnam par gnas pa med pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba
395b4(rgyud 'bum): dang yo byad la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos
395b5(rgyud 'bum): la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba'o// dbang ba dang mi dbang ba rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba thams cad la dbang ba/ dbang phyug thams cad la dbang rjesu thob pa/ chos
395b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad legs par so sor rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ / oM sarba ba shi te trA trAM hUM/ thams cad la dbang ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
395b7(rgyud 'bum): bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga' 'o// ca co ma mnga' 'o// dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa mi mnga' 'o//
396a1(rgyud 'bum): 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga' 'o// sa brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga' 'o// 'dun pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// brtson 'grus yongs su nyams parmi
396a2(rgyud 'bum): mnga' 'o/ / dran pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'a'o// ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'a'o// rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams
396a3(rgyud 'bum): pa mi mnga'a'o/ / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mI mnga' 'o// 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ ma 'ongs
396a4(rgyud 'bum): dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes
396a5(rgyud 'bum): sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / / gsung gyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon
396a6(rgyud 'bum): du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ngo / / 'di chos rjes smra ba'i bsgyur 'phro lags// rgya dpal gtugs shing slob dpon rab bzhi bshes gnyen gyi 'grel pa
396a7(rgyud 'bum): dang yang bstun nas zhus dag byas shing / mi bcos su mi rung bai re re tsam 'grel pa dang bstun nas bcos shing / zhu thug g.yar khral du blangs nas/ bu sngon gyis bgyis pa'o//
396b1(rgyud 'bum): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de la sa bcu rnams ci zhe na/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sa dang / dri ma med pa zhes bya ba
396b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba dang / thub par dka' ba zhi bya ba dang / mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba dang / ring du song ba zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang / legs pa'i
396b3(rgyud 'bum): blo gros zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba'o// sa rnams thams cad don gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi don no// ye shes kyang don dam par ci'ang med pa/

396b5(rgyud 'bum): bi sho d+ha ni sarbAr+tha pa ri pU ra Ni bi b+h+yAM/ sa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa bcu rnams ci zhe na/
396b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang / byis par gyur pa dang / las dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / skye ba bskyed pa dang / sbyor ba phun su tshogs pa dang /
396b7(rgyud 'bum): bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa ni don dam
397a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thunas par gnas pa dang thAs / rnam pa gags pa ga nyid kyi phyir ma / tshul gzhag pa ma bag/ mosas pa bstan pag

397a5(rgyud 'bum): par so sor rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ / oM sarba ba shi he d+b+ha b+h+rUM hUM/ dbang thams cad ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres

397b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med cing rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa nyams pa med pa dang

398a2(rgyud 'bum): mtho ba ni dma' ba dang / dma' ba ni mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dang pa'i rgyal po lta bur dra bas 'bral ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag dag dang / zhabs de dag
398a3(rgyud 'bum): gser gyi mdog can gyi ri bo'i 'phreng ba rnams kyis rkang pa brgyad pa bzhin du mdzes pa'o/ / phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid de/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i phyag dang zhabs

398a7(rgyud 'bum): par skyes pa rnam pa thams cad pa bdun dang ldan pa'i sku ste/ mtho ba 'di'i srid dang rjes su 'tsham pa'i zheng du 'gyur ro// zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa nyid de/ 'di'i pus mo dang long bu mtho ba
398b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / ba spu'i rtse mo gyen du phyogs pa ste/ 'di'i baspu rnams rtse mo gyen du phyogs par 'gyur zhing / ba spu rnams g.yas phyog su 'khyil la 'khor ba mig sman gyi mdog can rnams te//
398b2(rgyud 'bum): de rnams kyi gser gyi mdog can gyi sku mdog gsal bar byed do// byin pa ri dgas a n+ya ya'i lta bu ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin pa dag zlum pa ri dgas e n+ya ya rnams lta bu'o// phyag
398b3(rgyud 'bum): ring bzhin mdzes pa ste/ rgyas shing ma btung ba nyid du phyag mthil dag gis rang gi pus mo'i lha nga la rag pa'o// mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub ste/ sbubs kyis rab tu g.yogs pa

398b5(rgyud 'bum): pags pa can du 'gyur zhing / rdul med pa'i na bza' 'dzin pa'o// s+phu re re nas skyes pa ste/ 'di'i ba spre'i khung bur spu rnams re rer 'gyur ro// smin ma'i dbus na mdzod spu can te/ 'dig
398b6(rgyud 'bum): smin ma dag gi dbus na ras skud legs pa lta bu dung bcag pa'i kha dog can g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bar 'gyur te/ mdzod spu nyid kyis zhal gser gyi kha dog lta bu shin tu gsal bar byed do//
398b7(rgyud 'bum): sku stong se ga lta bu ste/ 'di'i sku steng du yangs pa seng ge lta bur 'gyur ro// dpung mgo zlum pa ste/ yongs su zlum pa'i mgrin pa can du 'gyur ro// thal gong rgyas pa ste/ 'di'i che bar rgyas
399a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur zhing gser shog bzhin du rnam par gsal ba'i mgrin pa can no/ / yan lag so so rnams su ro rnams myong bar byed do zhes pas na/ ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa nyid de/

399a4(rgyud 'bum): gyi mtha'i bar du ljags kyi rtse mos reg par byed cing dbu skra'i mthar thug par yang / dpral ba'i mthar ljags kyis khebs pa'o// tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/ 'khor stong phrag du mar dbyangs nang du

399b1(rgyud 'bum): tu rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ ri mo dmar po rnams sa dang ma 'dres pa nyid du phyir la/ gang dkar po yin pa de dkar po kho na shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// rdzi ma pa'i lta bu ste/ spyan gyi rdzi ma rnams
399b2(rgyud 'bum): khyu mchog gi bzhin du 'og ma yin pa de rnams 'og kho na dang / gang steng ma yin pa de rnams steng kho nar gnas pa/ ma 'dzings pa/ legs par gzhol ba'o// sems can 'ga' zhig rnams kyis de
399b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi mdog can du mthong ba/ 'ga' zhig rnams kyis shel gyi mdog can du mthong ba/ 'ga' zhig rnams kyis pad+ma rA ga'i mdog dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog dang

399b5(rgyud 'bum): dog dang / 'ga' zhig gis khru phyed dang bcu gsum pa'i tshad dang / ji srid du dpag tshad 'bum gyi tshad dam dpag tshad bya ba'i tshad dang / ji srid du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin mtha' yas pa rnams su
399b6(rgyud 'bum): sdang bar mdzad pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa dang / ji srid du me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgya mtsho rnam par snang
399b7(rgyud 'bum): bar byed cing / chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gdul bya'i dbang las thams cad snang bar byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dbyangs kyis rnam par rig par mdzad
400a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / stong gnyis dang / gsum dang / ji srid nam mapa'i mthar thug pa'i bar thams cad kyi 'od dang dbyangs kyis snang bar byas nas/ rnam par rig par mdzad pa da cos dang thang ci rang /

400a7(rgyud 'bum): mdog lta bur 'gyur te/ sen mo snum pa dang / sen mo mtho ba dang / sen mo rnams zlum par gyur pa dang / sor mo rnams rim gyis phra ba dang / sor mo rnams rgyas pa dag rtsa mi mngon pa dang / rtsa rnams mdud pa med pa

400b2(rgyud 'bum): drang po gshegs pa dang / mdzes par gshegs pa dang / rim gyis gsheg pa dang / che zhing yangs la yongs su gyur pa'i pus mo'i lha nga can dang / mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gom pa snyoms pa dang / sku

400b7(rgyud 'bum): nga ro can dang / snyan cing mnyen pa'i dbyangs dang / sgra phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbyangs 'jam pa dang / shangs mtho ba dang / mche ba zlum pa dang / mche ba dkar ba dang / mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang / spyan gtsang ba dang / spyan yang

401a2(rgyud 'bum): dang smin ma'i sgra nag pa dang / smin ma'i sgra phra ba dang / smin ma rjes su 'thun pa dang / kha dog ma nyams pa dang / snyan mi mnyam pa med pa dang / snyar skyon dang bral ba dang / dbang po thams
401a3(rgyud 'bum): cad ma nyams shing skyon dang bral ba dang / sku yongs su rdzogs shing mtho la mchog tu gnas pa'i zhal gdong dang dpral ba can dang / dbu shin tu rgyas pa dang / dbu skra gnag pa dang / dbu skra skyug pa

401a6(rgyud 'bum): gdugs kyi rnam pa can dang / kun nas mdzes pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni tshad med pa'i dpe byad can/ mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ gsal byed dang gsal byed ma yin pa
401a7(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad gsal byed med par mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad sgyu ma'i chos dang ldan pa la
401b1(rgyud 'bum): legs par rab tu gnas pa/ dus gsum gyi dpe byad mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyi chos thams cad dang dpe byud mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ gnyis su med pa'i/
401b2(rgyud 'bum): don la gnas par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams so zhes pa'o// oM a nu bany+dza na sa ma tA su pra tiSh+Thi ta badz+ra dz+nyA na hUM dz+dza a~M/ dpe byang mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
401b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po can la legs so zhes bya ba rnams kyis mnyes
401b4(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad do/ / oM byang chub sems chen khyod legs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mchog/ sangs rgyas chen po khyod legs so// ting 'dzin dbang du 'jug pa yi// rdorje
401b5(rgyud 'bum): ye shes khyod legs so/ / rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// tshad med ched du khyod legs so// shes rab dam pa'i cheng du yang // mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// sangs
401b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas snga mas ma gsungs pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba bzhi'i mngon par
401b7(rgyud 'bum): dgos par mdzad do/ / sangs rgyas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi sku yi mchog gi mchog/ gdod ma'i sngags kyi don nyid la// rdo rje ye shes stobs chen la// shin tu sgrib
